name: Double bedroom-best spot in town !
summary: Large and sunny room in a quiet neighborhood. Easy transportation: Iberville metro (blue line) at the corner + several bus lines nearby. Parks, bars, restaurants, grocery store and movie theatre at a 5 minutes walk. Best place in town !
space: Check out the map on the other tab to see our guide of the neighborhood. I work in the famous Mile End neighborhood, so I can take you there by car with pleasure if you stay with us during the week! The apartment is 1200 square feet (115 square meters) on the 3rd floor (no neighbors above or on either side: it’s very quiet !) - Large double living room - 50 inch HD TV - Apple TV - Large dining room - Kitchen recently renovated - Dishwasher - Washer and dryer - Large balcony  - BBQ
description: Large and sunny room in a quiet neighborhood. Easy transportation: Iberville metro (blue line) at the corner + several bus lines nearby. Parks, bars, restaurants, grocery store and movie theatre at a 5 minutes walk. Best place in town ! Check out the map on the other tab to see our guide of the neighborhood. I work in the famous Mile End neighborhood, so I can take you there by car with pleasure if you stay with us during the week! The apartment is 1200 square feet (115 square meters) on the 3rd floor (no neighbors above or on either side: it’s very quiet !) - Large double living room - 50 inch HD TV - Apple TV - Large dining room - Kitchen recently renovated - Dishwasher - Washer and dryer - Large balcony  - BBQ I am a young man, quiet and clean, I love to travel, watch movies, meet new people and discover different type of food. I have a very quiet and docile dog named Java that never goes in the rooms!  It would be nice to meet you ! Feel free to email if you have any questions !
interaction: I am a young man, quiet and clean, I love to travel, watch movies, meet new people and discover different type of food. I have a very quiet and docile dog named Java that never goes in the rooms!  It would be nice to meet you ! Feel free to email if you have any questions !

host.host_about: I am a young man from Montreal, Canada. I work in the film industry, making documentary films and advertising. I obviously like films, but also music and books. I like to travel, especially to discover new cities. I like hiking, mountain bike and skiing !

reviews.comments: This was my first time using Airbnb and had a great experience, will definitely use again!  Patrick was a great host, very professional, friendly, and overall a great guy.  The bedroom in which I stayed was very comfortable, there were fresh bed linens and towels ready for my arrival and the host made me feel welcomed. Patrick has a very spacious, nicely decorated apartment, that is in a great neighborhood close to the metro.  The directions on how to arrive to apartment using public transportation was fantastic.  Patrick has a busy work schedule but I was able to enjoy a chat with him and having something to eat together.  Would definitely recommend Patrick as a host to travelers going to Montreal.

Spotlessly clean, cool and very comfortable apartment that is in a nice neighborhood. We felt very lucky to have found such a great place at short notice and Patrick was the perfect host. Easily the best airbnb experience we've had and would highly recommend Patrick and his place to anyone planning a trip to Montreal

Patrick and his place were awesome. Great location near a trendy area and very cool, clean and tidy apartment. Very well equipped kitchen. We had fun chilling and chatting with Pat in the evenings - he suggested some awesome things for us to see which really made our time in Montreal! Highly recommended, you da man Pat.
It was a lovely apartment in a quiet but lively neighborhood. The room itself is neat and artistic! Patrick is a very nice and considerate landlord.
We had to cancel our reservation a few days before arrival, which must have been an annoyance to Patrick. However he wished us a great trip, and was very kind about it.

Great experience, would totally recommend it to anyone! Patrick is a very friendly and attentive host. He's always willing to give a recommendation about anything Montreal! His stylish apartment is always clean and quiet and close to public transit. His dog is very friendly dog and respectful. Definitely a good experience!

J'ai passé un très agréable séjour chez Patrick. Il est une personne ouverte à la discussion et qui est de  bon conseil concernant la ville Montréal et le Québec en général. Son appartement est très  bien situé et très propre. N'hésitez pas à passer un séjour chez lui, vous vous y sentirez comme chez vous.
Un très bon accueil de Patrick dans une chambre et un appartement très agréables. Merci Patrick et à bientôt!

Very nice place to stay, I definitively recommend it. The neighborhood is very quiet, easy to park your car in front. Downtown is a bit far by walk (1h at least, Montreal is huge!), but there is a subway station 5mn away and it will take you downtown in 20mn.
Great host, clean room. Beautiful apartment. Not very central but easy to get places by metro.

Gorgeous old apartment with plenty of character in a beautiful neighbourhood, 5 minute walk from metro station. Its a little ways from Downtown Montreal but there are plenty of shops and restaurants around the corner. Patrick is a great host, the bed was very comfy and the apartment was easy to find. Looks exactly like the pictures. Very quiet at night, the dog doesn't make any noise and is very calm.

I would definitely recommend this place, especially if you appreciate heritage homes and woody neighbourhoods.

Patrick was a great host! Very helpful in finding things to do in the city, the apartment was very close to the metro and it was easy navigating. The apartment was lovely with a sweet little balcony to enjoy snacks and drinks.  I would absolutely consider returning to Patrick's welcoming home if we should return to Montreal.

Patrick was an excellent host, and it couldn't have been a better first experience with airbnb. The house and the room was very clean and the dog was very tame. Also, the location was ideal to arrive with car, because you have the possibility to park in the street and walk to the metro.
Very enjoyable stay with Patrick! Super relaxed, and easy going. Friendly and helpful.  Beautiful room with a wonderful view of the sunset. Thank you for such a memorable first stay in Montreal!

I had a comfortable stay at Patrick's house . He gave me good advice where to look around . His place is spacious , tidy and the location is great for those who are foodie since the famous market Jean- Talon is walking distance from the house I cant help going back for more oysters and cheeses . If you feel like cooking on your own you can get the freshest produce in Jean-Talon . And it is 3 minutes walking to subway takes just 20 minutes to get to downtown . Patrick's dog Jarva is super cute and friendly very easy to get along with him .

Très bon séjour dans l'adorable appartement de Pat. Chambre spacieuse et lumineuse, salon et cuisine confortables et bien équipés le tout à moins de 10 min du métro et des bus. Vraiment un place de choix pour un séjour à Montréal! Pat est accueillant et super arrangeant, on se sent comme à la maison! Je conseille.

Logement un peu excentré mais proche du métro pour se rendre dans le centre. Quelques bonnes adresses à proximité (cinéma, restaurants, supermarchés). L'appartement est grand. Le lit, un peu petit pour 2 personnes. Bref, bien pour quelques jours si vous souhaitez découvrir la ville. Et n'hésitez pas à demander à Patrick, il saura vous conseiller.

Pat's place was great. I was a long term guest and I found it very comfortable and convenient. The animals were both sweet and it was a very nice place to stay. The metro was very convenient and parking was easy to find. I'd highly recommend staying here!

Patrick was a welcoming and accommodating host. His place has a very relaxed, comfortable atmosphere. Everything was as I expected; all facilities very adequate and efficient.  The bed was super comfortable, I slept well.  I agree its the best spot in town!!!

Patrick was great, room was great, location was great. His dog was friendly and never barked when we snuck in late. We would have hung out with him more but our schedules didn't line up. All of his suggestions were on point, if we return to Montreal we will definitely try to stay with him again

I had booked another room but since there was a problem with that listing, I went to Patrick’s place. So it was a very last minute booking but he kindly accommodated me. He was very fast in answering the messages. Patrick and his girlfriend recommended me very interesting restaurants, so ask them for that! ;)
The room was very clean with a comfortable bed. Also Patrick provided me some towels. The dog, was very friendly, quiet and respectful. The place was close to metro (5mins) so you can reach the down town in 25 mins.

This was our first time using airbnb and it was a pleasant experience! We had a nice stay at Patricks apartment and he is a very friendly and welcoming host. Thank you very much for letting us stay in your home!
Convenient location, comfortable bed, friendly welcome. Thank you so much, Patrick!

I had a good stay at Patrick's apartment.  He was very responsive to messages and he was friendly and helpful in providing directions. His dog is quite sweet and quiet. The apartment is walking distance from the subway and bus lines.  The room was as pictured in the listing.

Venant pour la première fois à Montréal , j'ai été agréablement surpris par l'accueil chaleureux et la gentillesse de Patrick et de sa compagne Édith . Ils sont aussi très attentifs à ce que leurs hôtes se sentent à l'aise et ils n'hésitent pas à donner de précieux conseils pour visiter Montréal .
Leur appartement , décoré avec beaucoup de gout , est très spacieux , propre et très bien tenu . Le quartier est calme et sympathique , avec le métro et toutes sortes de commerces tout proche. Bref , une autre bonne raison pour moi de revenir à Montréal , est d'aller redonner un petit bonjour à Patrick et Édith .

We had a terrific stay at Patrick's place. The neighbourhood was quiet and very lovely. The subway is just a five minute walk, making the Jean Talon Market among many other sites and attractions easily accessible. The apartment itself was just as advertised, but with even more charm and was very clean. Patrick himself is very kind, and responsive. I highly recommend staying with Pat and his cute dog (who is totally gentle and calm).
Merci encore Patrick et Edith pour cet accueil chaleureux ! Au plaisir de vous recroiser à Montréal !

J'ai choisi cet appart car il a l'air vraiment chic et ça m'a absolument pas déçu. Toutes les pièces sont bien meublées (un divan et plusieurs chaises très confortables). La cuisine est tout équipée. Les animaux du appart étaient trop adorable et extrêmement calme. Juste une marche de 5 minutes du Métro. Patrick et sa copine étaient très arrangeants et réspecteux. Je me suis senti comme chez moi. Vraiment un excellent choix pour un séjour à Montréal.

We throughly enjoyed our stay with Patrick and his lovely girlfriend. Their apartment was beautiful and conveniently located to public transportation. There is also a street just two blocks south with plenty of delicious restaurants and a lush park as well; the neighborhood is perfect and gave us a real sense of authentic Montreal while avoiding the overrun tourist areas. Their dog Java was a sweet heart and always the first to welcome us in. The hosts were a great resource and gave us many recommendations of things to do and places to visit during our stay. Overall we had a terrific stay in Montreal and would love to return soon!

This place is not only exactly as pictured, it is also super close to the metro. The Jean-Talon market is close, walkable, and there are a couple of great parks close by. I would recommend BOTH he space and the host.

Je suis arrivé dans un appartement bien entretenu et par les propriétaires qui était  adorable ! Le quartier était super sympa avec une station de métro à 2 pas du logement !
Expérience à refaire !
Dream home, period. Pat is a super nice host, and his place is super clean and cozy. Five mins walk to metro. Will definitely stay again. Highly recommended.
The place is 5 min walk to the metro and close bus stop. Pat and his girlfriend Edith have been friendly host. Edith recommended places to eat around as I was new to Montreal. Great stay

What a lovely and kind couple. I felt comfortable and at ease with them and they were both so good at recommending local spots and good places to go in town. I really appreciated that. The flat is lovely and light and only about 5 mins walk from a metro station, as well as a park and the many cafes and shops on Beaubien. Highly recommend.
A very polite and friendly couple, close to the subway station with market on the side. Very cozy and beautiful house besides very clean.

Patrick’s place was perfect and its great location made it super convenient to get around! The apartment is just as amazing as it looks in the photos and everything is kept in great condition. Being five minutes away from the Iberville metro station made it super easy for us to get from place to place and really make the most out of our stay! Would 100% recommend staying here to anybody and would gladly come back the next time I’m in the city.

This is by far my best Airbnb experience! 
Patrick and Edith are not just a lovely couple but wonderful human beings.  They were very amicable and were always available for any help or guidance.  About the place, it is designed and decorated with artsy touch, minimal yet deep, and very clean too. It has a pretty tranquil vibe to it and their dog and cat would be very nice company. For me, the balcony was the cherry on the top.  Metro is 5mins walk away and grocery store is steps away - which is awesome.  And yeah, they have some pretty amazing recommendations so don't forget to ask them. :)

Will definitely visit again, highly recommended!

name: Charming apartment in the city center
summary: O meu espaço fica perto de restaurantes, zonas de lazer e principais atrações turísticas, bem no centro da cidade. Vai adorar o meu espaço porque muito bem localizado, sossegado e muito confortável. O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, e famílias (com crianças).
description: O meu espaço fica perto de restaurantes, zonas de lazer e principais atrações turísticas, bem no centro da cidade. Vai adorar o meu espaço porque muito bem localizado, sossegado e muito confortável. O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, e famílias (com crianças).

host.host_about:
Olá o meu nome é Miguel.
Adoro a minha cidade, trabalho na área do enoturismo, gosto de ler, estar com os amigos e ,como bom português que sou, gosto da nossa gastronomia e dos nossos vinhos.
Gosto de viajar e conhecer novas culturas.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Casa ideal para quem deseja passar uns dias no Porto. A localização é excelente, é possível ir a pé para todo o lado e fica mesmo no centro da cidade. A casa está bem equipada e é ideal para 4 pessoas. O senhor Miguel recebeu-nos muito bem, foi muito simpático e dispos-se sempre a ajudar caso tivessemos algum problema. Excelente hospitalidade e simpatia características dos habitantes do Porto! :) Recomendo!
Muy buena ubicación y tranquila, perfecto para la familia, Miguel el anfitrión ha sido encantador! recomendable
Localización perfecta para conocer Oporto. Céntrico, con muchos servicios pero sin ser ruidoso.

El alojamiento es muy acogedor y nuevo!la ubicación es ideal, muy cerca del centro
, pero a la vez una zona tranquila!Miguel es un gran anfitrión,  muy atento en todo y nos dio muy buenas recomendaciones!!

La estancia ha sido muy satisfactoria y agradable. El piso muy nuevo, limpio y bien situado, en el centro. Se puede ir andando a los sitios de interés turístico.
Miguel nos esperaba para indicarnos dónde poder aparcar y con un mapa de la ciudad para aconsejarnos.
Muchas gracias por todo.
Oporto nos ha encantado y sin duda un acierto con este alojamiento.
Muy buen apartamento, bien ubicado.

O apartamento eh uma graça, bem cuidado, limpo, bem localizado. O Miguel foi um anfitrião incrível, nos esperou e chegamos tarde, nos ajudou, nos deu um mapa com dicas, foi super diaponivel o tempo todo, tirei algumas dúvidas por (Hidden by Airbnb) e ele sempre muito atencioso. Super recomendo mesmo!

we had a very good time in this apartment. it's cosy and offers you everything you need.  close to lots of interesting stores and the center.  it was very easy to communicate with miguel and he was super friendly. definitely recommending this apartment.

Miguel's place is top notch. It doesn't get much better. For a short or long-term stay, this place is awesome. I love the area: artsy, trendy and cool. In 3-4 years Cedofeita will be the "it" street and be restored to all its past glory. If you want a youthful vibe of an area peppered with the old school grandeur... this is it! 

The apartment is simple and clean. It's contemporary without being cold or boring. I love how the back windows open onto a nice green backyard (no access, but a nice view for Porto).

Miguel know service and hospitality. I highly recommend his place.
O espaço é igual às fotos, a localização é muito boa, perto de tudo. O anfitrião é muito simpático e bem prestativo. Gostei muito.
Miguel estuvo muy atento y nada más llegar ya estaba allí esperándonos. El apartamento está muy bien y contiene todo lo descrito. Tuvimos una estancia genial.
Miguel is a great host, very helpful and kind. He answered each question within a few seconds. His apartment is close to the main square, but still quiet. Thank you for nice stay, Miguel!
una estancia estupenda en casa de Miguel, muchas gracias por toda la información y la amabilidad

The apartment was very nice with good location. Miguel was really friendly and flexible! 

Would recommend!
O apartamento é bonito, mas não é próximo do metro. Apesar disso, há muitos lugares para comer e visitar bem próximos.

Bonne situation dans Porto,bruyant côté rue...
Un problème dans notre logement mais Miguel a réagi en nous re-logeant...
Belle décoration mais un manque d entretien ...
Miguel es un excelente anfitrión, todo son facilidades para el huésped y el piso está muy bien situado, llegas a todos los rincones de Oporto andando. Nosotras volvemos seguro!
Miguel was very responsive and the location of the apartment is perfect for a weekend in Porto!
Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Miguel que nos deixou dicas preciosas para a nossa estadia, o apartamento impecável, sossegado, muito central próximo de tudo!
Quite apartament, but close by to The Porto going out area. Everything is in a walking distance

Miguel è una persona molto disponibile che ci ha aiutato e suggerito posti da visitare e per mangiare. Molto gentile da parte sua, ci ha fatti entrare prima nell'appartamento nonostante il check-in fosse alle 15.00. Consiglio questo appartamento per soggiorni corti di un week-end se non si ha intenzione di mangiare in casa.
Non ci ha dato questa casa che avevo prenotato bensì un'altra che ha al primo piano (visibile nel suo profilo). Appena arrivati abbiamo subito informato Miguel della scarsa pulizia del bagno e ci ha detto che avrebbe mandato di nuovo la signora delle pulizie anche se non fu necessario. 
La casa è molto carina ma a mio parere non è adatta per un lungo soggiorno dato che il riscaldamento è elettrico e l' angolo cucina è sacrificato, manca l' essenziale come sale, olio ecc. Nella casa si può trovare detersivo per piatti, spugna, bagnoschiuma, phon, carta da cucina e da bagno (anche se per 4 persone in un soggiorno di 5 giorni ci vorrebbero più di 2 rotoli).
Nel nostro caso erano giorni piovosi e le finestre di legno non sono molto isolanti quindi la casa rimaneva umida. 
Il frigorifero è di quelli piccoli,  non so se si fosse rotto però le cose fresche si sono rovinate. 
Detto questo la casa rimane un buon compromesso perché si trova in una posizione strategica a pochi passi dal centro e supermercati.
Bom local, confortável apesar de alguns contra-tempos.
Great location, nice spot, very nice host.  Porto is an amazing city and this place is in the heart of it.
Espaço limpo, confortável, super acolhedor, perto de vários locais de interesse.
Appartement bien situé

El alojamiento de Miguel está en una zona perfecta de la ciudad, una vía peatonal cerca de los monumentos y edificios más signifivativos. En este piso está todo lo esencial para pasar unos días explorando Porto.
Alloggio in zona pedonale, vicino al centro.
El departamento está muy bien ubicado, cerca de todo y en una calle peatonal muy agradable. Es pequeño pero lindo y Miguel es muy atento. Totalmente recomendado.
Perfecta ubicación y Miguel fue muy amable. La casa tenía todo lo necesario para pasar un fin de semana en Porto

Miguel's place couldn't be in a better location! It's very easy to find too. 

Some hand soap and tea/coffee wouldn't go amiss in future.

I have never given a negative review but unfortunately I cannot give this apartment / stay a positive review. When we arrived we were told we had been 'upgraded' and were given a different apartment to the one we had booked. The apartment we were given was sadly not yet fully operational / suitable for guest rental. Issues included exposed wiring in a bathroom powerpoint which was a potentially dangerous situation given that the bathroom floor was extremely wet due to inadequate shower drainage.  When this powerpoint was used it shorted the household power. Other issues included water leaking from the kitchen wall, inadequate heating, security issues (apartment could be entered via a hole in the wall and through a locked cupboard door), no hot water in the kitchen. I let Miguel know in detail the issues we encountered, but he was out of town until late in the evening, however he did come by the following morning but was unable to resolve the issues during our stay.  Once these issues are resolved this apartment certainly has the potential to be a great place to stay. It has a lovely ambience, is well furnished and is in a great location.

name: Tapioles Triplex Apartment
summary: Spacious and comfortable triplex located in the neighborhood of Poble Sec, between Plaça Espanya and the Port of Barcelona. It has 125m2 composed of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large kitchen and spacious living room with a sofa and a large dining table. Its maximum capacity is 10 people. Apartment for tourist use with license number: HUTB-001800.
space: Spacious apartment with 125m2 divided into three levels and can accommodate up to 10 people, so it is ideal for groups of friends or families who want to visit the city. It was renovated in late 2013 and has the most modern finishes. It features free WiFi, air conditioning and heating. Paralel Triplex has 4 rooms spread over three levels. The first one is a suite bedroom; the other two are identical rooms with two single beds each and finally there is a studio at the bottom which has a double sofa bed.
description: Spacious and comfortable triplex located in the neighborhood of Poble Sec, between Plaça Espanya and the Port of Barcelona. It has 125m2 composed of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large kitchen and spacious living room with a sofa and a large dining table. Its maximum capacity is 10 people. Apartment for tourist use with license number: HUTB-001800. Spacious apartment with 125m2 divided into three levels and can accommodate up to 10 people, so it is ideal for groups of friends or families who want to visit the city. It was renovated in late 2013 and has the most modern finishes. It features free WiFi, air conditioning and heating. Paralel Triplex has 4 rooms spread over three levels. The first one is a suite bedroom; the other two are identical rooms with two single beds each and finally there is a studio at the bottom which has a double sofa bed. The apartment has a large living room differentiated by two levels. Entering the apartment you find the living room with sofa, puff, coffee table
neighborhood_overview: With its quiet streets, parks, traditional bars and its welcoming atmosphere Poble Sec represents the ideal neighborhood for visiting the city. From the Poble Sec, you can reach in a few minutes-walk to the heart of Barcelona. The statue of Columbus, the Port Vell and the Rambla are a few minutes-walk along the Avenida del Paral.lel. In this street there are several important theaters and is full of terraces, bars and restaurants. Across the street is the Raval district.
notes: Parking is available at 15 minutes walk with agreed prices of € 12 / day or € 60 / week. To get the apartment keys at the checkin, you must call the contact a person 20 minutes prior to arrival, so he can get the building.  Organize your check-in, a few days before by email.  Please, when you get to the building do not press the intercom, wait for the contact person outside the building without obstructing the door and allowing other people on the street to move around.  Be polite and respectful at all times, especially in the apartment, in the building and on the street. If you're a big group, the check-in is done with a maximum of 3 people to show and verify the apartment. Please remember the following:  - To have the ID or passport copies of all guests prepared.  - To have a copy in paper of email confirmation of the booking where all terms and amounts are shown.  - You will have to pay the tourist tax demanded by the city council of Barcelona. HUTB-012626 Late check-in and early ch
transit: The location of the apartment is ideal as it is located very close near the center of Barcelona and Montjuïc. Near the apartment you will find everything you need including supermarkets, bars, cafes, banks and pharmacies. You have the subway station Paral • lel to 5 minutes from the apartment, so you can easily move around the city. It is located next to the Carrer Blai, considered La Rambla of Poble Sec.
access: The apartment has a large living room differentiated by two levels. Entering the apartment you find the living room with sofa, puff, coffee table and flat screen TV. Down a few steps there is the large table that welcomes more than 10 people. It has a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, washing machine and all kitchen utensils you'll need to cook during your stay kitchen. The apartment is reviewed periodically, especially the dishes and utensils, so that everything is in perfect condition and nothing is missing.
interaction: In Espai Barcelona we have made a guide that will be delivered via email in which there is the best places to go near the apartment and also throughout Barcelona. In addition we give you tips for your visit to the city to make it as pleasant as possible.
house_rules: ======== ESPAÑOL ======== El propietario no alquila a grupos donde todos los miembros son más jóvenes de 25 años. Es imprescindible respetar el descanso de los vecinos, sin ruido después de las 21.00 horas. Las fiestas no están permitidas. Cargos severos serán aplicados si no se respetan estas normas. Este alojamiento es estrictamente de no fumadores. Si viaja con un bebé / niño pequeño podemos proporcionar una cuna / trona. Por favor avise antes de viajar para que podamos confirmar la disponibilidad y el precio. Podemos ofrecer cafeteras Nespresso a nuestros clientes bajo petición y previa reserva. Si tiene coche, tenga en cuenta que no se puede aparcar en la calle y se tendrá que utilizar un aparcamiento público / garaje, que por lo general puede ser bastante caro. Sin embargo, se facilita parking a 5 minutos caminando con precios convenidos de 12€/dia o 60€/semana. No se permiten mascotas. Late check-in y check-out: 50 Euros después de 20:00. 70 Euros después de las 24:00 y antes de

host.host_about:
Hola, vivo en Barcelona, una ciudad encantadora y apasionante. Te invito a que disfrutes de su magia en uno de mis apartamentos. 

Hasta pronto.

reviews.comments: Francisco was an excellent host.  He met us and took us through the apartment.  It is located in a busy neighborhood and may get noisy outside on Friday and Saturday.  On the good side, markets, tapas, bakeries and coffee shops are steps away.  The Parallell metro station is a bout 2 blocks away and you can walk to attractions such as Joan Miro Foundation.

Estábamos en un grupo de 10 amigos, luego el piso estaba lleno a sua capacidad total. El salón y la cocina (las áreas comunes) son suficientement grandes para que todos estuviéramos juntos, lo que es muy bueno. A nosotros nos gustó mucho el acceso del piso, que es hecho directamente desde la calle en una esquina (está en la planta baja del edifício, con un piso arriba, y otro abajo), es muy práctico y trae mucha vida al piso. Pero, por eso, el local donde hay uno de los sofá camas en el sótano, no tiene ventanas y es un poco más frío que las otras habitaciones. Y por eso también, el piso no tiene mucha luz natural (los vidrios de las ventanas no son completamente transparentes lo que es bueno para la privacidad, pero no tan bueno para la iluminación).
Tuvimos un problema con una de las dos duchas pero Francisco estuvo siempre accesible por mensaje y vino cambiar la manguera desde que posible.
El barrio del Poble-Sec es perfecto, con mucha vida, bares, restaurantes, se hace todo a pie y tampoco está lejos del casco antiguo. El piso fue una buena solución de alojamiento para un grande grupo.

Logement à fort potentiel, proche des lieux touristiques et transports.
Supermarchés et restaurants à proximité.
Appartement agréable pour dix personnes, quelques petits rafraîchissements sont à prévoir ainsi que de l'équipement (vaisselle, rideau de douche à remplacer par une cabine).
Nous le recommanderions pour une famille avec enfants ou groupe d'amis.
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Bien cet appartement,si on es plus jeune,c mieux pour nous:-)
Excellent place to stay. Area is plenty of good places for food and drinks (tapas). House is great but not recommended for kids due to many stairs. Francisco is a great host, recommended!
Great place, great location, great host

Francisco's place was perfectly located for our trip to Sónar Barcelona; only a ten minute walk from the 'by day' site. It accommodated ten people comfortably and was as pictured. 

For some reason Francisco had only made the bed for eight people, there was no hand soap in the 2nd bathroom and he hardly spoke a word of English - which was fine since I could manage in Spanish, but I don't envy those who have no Spanish and will try to work out the check-in details with him over the phone. On that note, Francisco was very insisting - to the point of being rude - that I don't call him again until I'm outside the apartment: 'don't call me on your way, don't call me around the corner, just call me when you're in front of the house.' That would've been fine if he would've been inside waiting, but after I called it took him twenty minutes to come over and open (he said five).

There were ten of us on our way to an all-night festival so I was surprised that Francisco only had two sets of keys (and only one alarm-disarmer). When I asked if it was possible to have more sets he arrogantly told me it was an impossibility (when of course he can have more keys cut) and that he had rented the place to a group of friends, not ten individuals. While that is true, it still over-complicated things for us and when you're renting such a big place I think an investment in one or two more sets would really please your guests.
Very well located in Poble Sec. Quiet neighborhood. At 10/15 min (walk distance) far from La Rambla. Very spacious and modern. Many restaurants, bars and supermarkets are around.

Квартира прекрасно расположена, рядом есть магазин и кафешки для завтрака. Находится рядом с горой Монжуик. Апартаменты находятся на 1 этаже, вход в квартиру сразу с улицы, нижний этаж без окон. В квартире достаточно шумно ночью, обратите внимание, если едете с детками. В квартире чисто, но ей уже нужен косметический ремонт) Есть полотенца, постельное белье, фен и утюг.

La casa es grande y muy bien ubicada, cocina un poco chica para 10 personas. Tuvimos un problema de plomería y fue resuelto en menos de 15 minutos, excelente predisposición y atención por parte de Raquel!
地理位置好,近市中心,去哪都不远｡唯一不满意就是热水系统差｡每次两个人洗澡后就只剩下冷水,没有热水用了｡无法满足十个人正常洗澡｡

I think the best part of this accommodation was the location. Ten of us stayed here, and paid about £90 each, expecting we would have general amenities. The apartment worked on a water tank, so everyday only 3 people could have a hot shower in the morning, the water only reset again at night, which I thought wasn’t acceptable. The apartment was also missing lightbulbs in many lamps, so it was quite dark at night. The heating varied across the apartment, with the basement being freezing, and the top floor very hot. I wouldn’t be recommending this place to future stays

The photos are accurate. It’s also close to tons and gazillions of restaurants, mini markets which made it very convenient for us to eat when we required it. It’s close to attractions, and we literally walked almost all the time when we wanted to get somewhere. Very nice place.

Cette reservation a ete annulee. Apres l'entree sur les lieux, l'agence de voyage (pas de hote) nous a demande d'aerer quand nous avons notifie de l'odeur de moisissure. Airbnb apres l'envoie de plusieurs photos de traces au sol et sur les murs nous a immediatement rembourse. Je ne conseille pas du tout cet endroit. Certains meubles etaient bien plus vieux que sur les photos voire casses (lit, sommier...)

The flat is in a great location... lots of great food options within a few minutes walk as well as great public transport nearby.  Unfortunately there were several issues when we first arrived including cleanliness issues as well as ripped and dirty furniture not represented by the photos shown in the listing.  These were brought up to the host and he responded promptly and had folks out to fix things like a broken bed, missing linens, broken railing, moldy bathroom, missing glass door on the shower, etc within 1-2 days.  We had booked the flat with the description stating that it can fit 10... long story short... it can fit 10, but not comfortably and with 2 keys total, it is very hard to make plans with a larger group.  Additionally, it's important to note that some of the "rooms" which sleep 2 each are not rooms so privacy can also be a concern.  1 of the rooms is in the basement which does not have AC to it, so this could also be an issue if the weather is warm.  While we were in town, the weather was warm so we had to run the AC... which we were messaged that it was too loud for the neighbors a few days in to our stay.  Additionally, like other guests have stated, the hot water heater accommodates about 2 showers at a time, so with a group of 10, this makes getting ready for the day very difficult.  We had 1 of our group members leave after the first night due to some cleanliness, privacy and difficulties with the 2 key issues.  Overall, it's in a great location, so if you have a small group or if you don't care about showering or having only 2 keys, it is wonderful!

Logement efficace et agréable dans l’ensemble.

Francisco a été très réactif quant à nos demandes.

Un seul point négatif que vous devriez arranger, c’est la prise électrique dans la salle de bain de la 1ère chambre qui sort complètement du mur, trop proche d’un point d’eau et qui peut être dangereuse.


Si on rien à dire

I do not recommended this place.  The actual condition of the apartment is worse than described in the listing. For example, there was mold and insect in the bathroom; furnitures are old and dirty.  The photos are not a true representation of the house and the descriptions are not accurate.  The place is not spacious for 10 people. Host did not bother to come to the apartment when we called him to notify him of the water leaking from the ceiling. Host was late during our check in and check out and offered no apologies in both cases. He does not speak good English and he is rude.

Francisco was reachable and responsive.  The apartment can sleep 10 but might not be suitable for all groups and is basic.  One double bed is in the basement and the other in a common space. Air circulation in the basement is limited. Our group liked the location of the apartment. If you are arriving late, it is good to know there is a shop right opposite which is open from 9 to 23:00.
Furnitures are a bit run down but usable.

THIS WAS THE WORST AIRBNB EXPERIENCE: 
Our check out meeting was supposed to be at 11h. You came at 10:40 when we were still getting dressed and you tried to get in. you came back at 10:50, you said that we only have 5 minutes and you entered inside while the girls were almost naked. This is called harassement. Until now we stayed polite because we are all well educated and came to Barcelona to enjoy our weekend not to create problems even if your attitude was very rude, you don’t know what is apologizing and what is tourism.
At 11:02, you started screaming and threatening us that we won’t have our money back( the change from the taxes + late check in)  because we had 2 minutes delay which is extremely annoying. Until now we didn’t say anything we just got off the house without even checking if we didn’t forget anything because it was 11:02 and you seemed very impatient and agressive toward all of us while we were just asking for our money back( the change from taxes) 
This being said, let’s come back to how things happened during this weekend:
1- the communication to retrieve the keys was extremely bad, we spent around 2 hours to succeed to reach you. The person that was supposed to give us the keys didn’t answer our call for one hour and then my friend waited for 30 minutes before she came!!!!! And she didn’t have the change and still we didn’t say anything even if it was cold and dangerous. As we are regular travelers we learned to be indulgent and to be human in our exchanges which is not your case.
2- The pictures on airbnb don’t look like reality, they are fake as we didn’t have the same furnitures, the house is very dusty and dirty, we even found a cockroach!!!!  The beds are very thin and uncomfortable. And above all, the house is very noisy we hear everything when we are sleeping from outside.
3- Let’s now talk about the neighborhood, what about these guys who sit in front of your house all the day smoking weed, drinking and talking aggressively to us?? What about these neighbors who threw eggs on us because we were talking from 8:00 pm to 9:00 pm(from 10:00 pm we were at the restaurant, with proof)?? Your house is  insecure. 
4- Even inside the house, it’s dangerous:
- electrical plugs not covered and my friend got hurt
- no electricity in one room
- insects in the ceiling and on the table
- the entrance door is very fragile and we were very afraid that the guys on the step in front of the door got in because they were knocking at the door.
Ultimately, it seems very enigmatic for us how there were some old good comments as this is the worse Airbnb experience for the 10 of us. We are very disappointed of your agressive attitude and we intend to take the necessary measures to make sure that this bad experience won’t occur for other travelers and to restore justice for all of us.

Thank you for allowing us to stay at your home. The apartment was great, the only issue was the broken shower downstairs which made 8 people using one shower very difficult. 
Location brilliant and plenty of items to use to cook. 
Host was great showing us around however we would have loved to have been in the apartment as soon as we arrived and not wait on the street

Overall, a fantastic place to stay. Yes the water will be cold after a few showers but you can’t beat the space you’re given and the location of the apartment. Everything is walking distance and seemingly 2 minutes away from everything. I enjoyed this place very much and wish that many others do the same and understand when someone says this place is not as expected, they are wrong. It’s a nice place in a great city.

Francisco è stato molto attento e puntuale, la casa tutto sommato è carina ed abbastanza pulita, la posizione è accettabile. Non abbiamo avuto alcun disagio, i letti sono abbastanza comodi e la casa è calda.

name: Downtown Montreal Modern Appartement
summary: This appartement is Located in the best area for touristes, it is right on Catherine, the main downtown montreal street where you'l find malls , amazing restaurants, parcs and museums. You’ll love my place because of the location, the people, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
description: This appartement is Located in the best area for touristes, it is right on Catherine, the main downtown montreal street where you'l find malls , amazing restaurants, parcs and museums. You’ll love my place because of the location, the people, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Sophia was a great host. Met us on time when we arrived and showed us the apartment and the facilities. She was reachable 24x7. The location was great for me as it was in the heart of downtown surrounded by shops and restaurants. Inside the apartment it was clean and quiet. Would definitely stay there again.

Sophia is an amazing host. We felt very welcomed and at home. Her place is in a central location, mins away from all main attractions and restaurants! We absolutely loved our stay and would definitely come back!

My stay in Sophia's apartment was amazing not only was it aesthetically pleasing but the location was perfect (Downtown). Everything was within walking distance. Sophia was a great host...she was always willing to answer any questions and provide suggestions on what to do and places to visit in. Her hospitality was incresible. She was also very helpful, understanding and accommodating.  I would definitely recommend her to anyone wanting to visit Montréal. I will definitely come again!!!

Did not love this place, though the pictures on the profile looked super nice! It was dirty and hardly anything in the kitchen. A few plates and glasses, a small pot and pan - not for making any dinners at home. I even had to get my own coffee cup! Also to me, a very hard bed but others might like that. 
I will not visit here again.

First time visiting Montreal and we couldn't have picked better place. The condo was walking distance to everything.  Restaurants, shopping, transit it's near to everything.  Place was spotless when we arrived.  Sophia communicated everything in a timely manner.  We can't wait to come back here to stay at her place again.
It was downtown.  Everything was close by.  The spot was clean. Loved it.

Thank you sophia for being a great host! The apartment was exactly like the pictures and her hospitality was amazing. She responded to all of our questions and even offered to purchase movies from her T.V for us to watch. The place was also extremely clean and private. Not to mention the location is close to shops, restaurants and anything you might need. I enjoyed my stay there!
Tres bel appartement tres récent il y a tout le nécessaire pour y vivre manque juste seche cheveux et la télévision sinon tres tres bien merci

Sophia was a fantastic host. She was always a quick call away when we needed help or advice. The apartment was stellar and exactly as shown in the photos. Would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Montreal!

Sophia's place is really beautiful and is/has everything you'd want and need to have a great time in Montreal. It's in walking distance of everything, so there is no shortage of options after you check in. She was also a great host who checked in with us to make sure everything was alright and if we were enjoying ourselves, and was open to communicate with whenever, and gave quick, helpful responses, when contacted. I highly recommend this place to all wanting to stay in Montreal, and it's for a reasonable price which is always great!
Sophia was a lovely host and the condo was perfect for some days in downtown Montreal. Ultra modern, totally renovated, very clean and great downtown central location. Would come again.

Sophia was a great host! Easy check-in (even though we were late, she easily accommodated our ETA), incredibly clean, and great location. The apartment is walking distance from pretty much everywhere we went and is easy to access. I would definitely stay here again.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location right on St Catherine's Street, clean, quiet, modern and Sophia was a wonderful host :)
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very central, entrance is on a street with lots of restaurants and stores.
Sophia was an excellent host! I had a wonderful stay.
modern clean apartment in a lively location.
We loved staying at Sophia's clean, modern apartment in downtown Montreal!
Good location, close to subway and convinience stores. Apartment is clean and pretty.
Very clean listing; host was timely with communication; check in was easy
great location, lovely place, but not for kids or anyone pregnant.
Good location, the apartment what the perfect size and was just enough for a weekend.

Will list a few key things to help other travelers out:

- Loft is wonderful and perfect for a couple and / or family of 3-4. Bed is a double which makes it a tight fit with two grown adults but it does the job.
- The location is definitely A+ and you will be extremely happy. It is walking distance to a plethora of restaurants, shopping as well as misc. stores (Shoppers Drugmart, Convinience, etc).
- Bixi bikes are within 20 ft of the entrance / exit making it that much more enjoyable to ride a bike throughout Montreal
- Uber to and from this space is extremely accessible and I didn't spend more than $20 to get from the bnb to the casino, schwartz deli, old montreal, etc.
- Host provided us with towels, cleaning supplies, soap, etc. for our stay although we did use our own
- Pictures in the listing are 100% accurate and you won't see any surprises
- Wifi is also available at this location as well for those who rack up data usage.

Overall, I give this space a 5/5. This was my first airbnb stay as well as first time in Montreal and I thoroughly enjoyed it. Will be booking this space in the future if I do come back to Montreal soon.

THANK YOU!
Excellent location for access to restaurants and metro.
Great communication! The condo was beautiful!! Will definitely stay again next summer!
The host canceled this reservation 106 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Cancelled my booking a few hours before check-in. To make things worse I booked three months in advance. Would not recommend to anyone, and the whole experience has turned me off of Airbnb.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: +Spacious Studio&Kitchenette near Blue Mosque+
summary: A spacious, private studio with high speed Wi-Fi wireless internet. It is located in historical district of Sultanahmet oldcity center. It's Only 10 minutes (by walking) away from Sultanahmet  Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapı Palace, Underground Cistern and Hippodrome. This area is called Kadirga and it's famous with it's local restaurants. There are more gorcery stores and supermarkets in this are since it's not %100 touristic area. There is children playground right in front of the building.
space: Car parking is also available just in front of the apartment and it's 5 euros per day ( per 24 hours). There are historical Turkish baths and many supermarkets, local restaurants in the area. It's safe for families and the area is very quiet in the evenings comparing the crowded center of Sultanahmet Square. Tram is only 10 minutes away from this building and you can easily reach to Taksim area by metro where you will find full of great shopping, nightlife venues & cafes, the Çiçek Pasajı & Fransiz Sokak. Reaching to Taksim square by taksi is only 10-15 minutes.
description: A spacious, private studio with high speed Wi-Fi wireless internet. It is located in historical district of Sultanahmet oldcity center. It's Only 10 minutes (by walking) away from Sultanahmet  Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapı Palace, Underground Cistern and Hippodrome. This area is called Kadirga and it's famous with it's local restaurants. There are more gorcery stores and supermarkets in this are since it's not %100 touristic area. There is children playground right in front of the building. Car parking is also available just in front of the apartment and it's 5 euros per day ( per 24 hours). There are historical Turkish baths and many supermarkets, local restaurants in the area. It's safe for families and the area is very quiet in the evenings comparing the crowded center of Sultanahmet Square. Tram is only 10 minutes away from this building and you can easily reach to Taksim area by metro where you will find full of great shopping, nightlife venues & cafes, the Çiçek Pasajı & Fra
neighborhood_overview: All historical relics in old peninsula can be reached by walk or by tram, taxi. But the best way of feeling the atmosphere is to walk around through old crowded streets. In neighbourhood you may easily find shops, restaurant(Turkish & international cuisine), Turkish bath (Hamam) and mini markets to buy whatever you want.
notes: I do not live in this house. I keep it only for my guests.  Me or my housekeeper will meet you in person to hand over the keys and show you all the features of the house and area, give useful information whenever you want. 7/24 service available in emergency.
transit: Easily reached by M1 metro & T1 tram from Ataturk airport. Comfortable journey from Sabiha Gokcen  airport ( a bit far) by Havabus and again T1 tram after it.    Within 1-10 minutes walk from the studio -Grocery, bakery and mini markets -Supermarkets (KIM and ŞOK and A101),  -Restaurants with Turkish and European Cousin -Sultanahmet - Blue Mosque, -Hippodrome square,  -Arasta Bazaar, -Little Hagia Sophia,  -KadirgaHamam (Turkish Bath), -Several banks and ATMs -Pharmacies,  -Hagia Sophia Museum,  -A post office,  -Basilica Cistern, Within 10-15 minutes walk: -Famous Kumkapi Fish Restaurants Alley -Beyazid Grand Bazaar -Istanbul University -Museum of Turkish and Islamic Art,  -Gulhane Park,  -Topkapi Palace -Archaeological Museum, -Mİgros Supermarket, Within 15-20 minutes walk(by tram quicker): -Transcontinental undersea subway Marmaray -Sirkeci International Train Station,  -Ferries Dock (Eminonu) ,  -Galata Sea Port (Karakoy),  -Galata Tower, More than 30 min by walk(by tram quicker) -
access: Studios are fully furnished with a kitchenette, refrigerator,  air-conditioning/ heating system. *Airconditioning *Flat Tv/ Satellite with thousand of world channels *Heating system  *Refrigarator *Microwave oven and hot plate cooker *Bathroom with hair dryer *iron & ironing board *All linens and towels are provided  *Nearby parking (5 euros a day) on Street
interaction: I was born in Istanbul and worked as receptionist and as a concierge for more than 20 years. I am doing my best to make my guests' visit easier. *After the reservation is complete, my guests will receive an e-mail consisting of the exact adress, contact number ( (Hidden by Airbnb) available), description about how to reach from the airports and most importantly the Wi-Fi password for communication at arrival. You can simply connect to Wi-Fi when you arrive at the front door and call us fron (Hidden by Airbnb) or Viber. Airport shuttle service is also available on reasonable prices.

reviews.comments: 地点很方便,房间也很大,有好多张床,如果是家庭出游将是不错的选择｡

The room was great. I was able to get the much needed Rest and relaxation I was looking for. What stood out for me was Emre's concern for my piece of mind. I approached him with a few minor concerns and he went to great lengths to ensure that I would have a restful stay at his hotel. He was extremely helpful in helping me secure ground transportation to my next destination, as I had failed miserably ha in get attempted to do it on my own. Stay here, the neighborhood will give you a true taste of Istanbul, a healthy step away from the too touristy neighborhoods.
Great place, very friendly host, I would recommend this place to anyone.
With a good honest people everything is great, thanks boys
Thanks for your nice guest house
这个房间性价比真的很好呀!位置也ok,离景点不远｡但是离metro有点远,去交通点上坡好累｡洗手间还是有点脏,去的时候地上有小虫｡厕所马桶有点摇摇欲坠,厕所门锁不上｡但是看在这价钱,休息几晚能接受｡
The flat is perfect for preople who want to visit Istanbul! thanks
place is closer to main attractions and at the same time in quite locality. i recomend fellow travellers to try kadirga park when visiting istanbul. good for families.
Emre wad a great host. His communication before and during our stay had been absolutely top notch. He was very helpful and accommodating and we would stay with him again,  no question!

I had a great time staying here. Emre has a wealth of local useful information. Ask him anything and he'll basically plan your holiday for you :) I was greeted when I arrived by one of his staff and quickly shown to my room. The room was basic but spacious, clean and safe - great value for money. Istanbul is incredibly beautiful and very exciting. There's a supermarket literally across the road, as is the Istanbul photography museum. The Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque are a stone throw away. Lots of restaurants and cafes in the area. Easy to walk everywhere and public transport is easy, cheap, mosern, safe and fast - speak to Emre and he'll quickly help you get your head around it. Stay here, you won't regret it.

The place is near to the tram, around 8-10 mins walk. The room is clean, big, and comfy. The only drawback is that I didn't expect that I need to go uphill every time I'm going out from the house. Nevertheless, it's a great location. You can reach the Grand Bazar, Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and TopKapi Palace by walking, approx. 20mins.

Nice apartment overall. Its located at the bottom of a hill so expect a hike whenever you want to go anywhere. There's a supermarket just down the road which stocks things you'll need on a daily basis which is very handy. The park across the road does get very loud and stays busy well after midnight so keep that in mind.

+ :
Bien situé, je n'ai pas eu du mal à visiter les lieux proches. 

- : 
* Tous les équipements n'y étaient pas (sèche cheveux, lave linge...)

* la porte d'entrée est juste au niveau de la porte d'entrée du bâtiment. On entend donc tous les gens qui passent avec le claquement de porte. Pas super la nuit. 

* wifi ne capte pas bien. 

* la lumière de salle de bain fonctionne avec un détecteur de mouvement qui ne capte pas si vous êtes dans la douche. Il faut donc utiliser le flash de son portable.
Good location

Fantastic little apartment, ideal for a weekend break in Istanbul. Located on a road with lots of good cheap street food, only ten minutes walk from the main tourist spots of Sultanahmet including the blue mosque and Hagia Sophia. Great road of restaurants just three minutes away with great atmosphere and decent prices - although everyone will try and lure you in! It's a very steep climb up a hill to public transport but not a problem if you enjoy a walk!

Apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Only problem is the noise. The doorbell is loud and people coming in and out kept us awake one night!
Ganz bequem und guter Lage. Jederzeit kann ich Empfehlen. Emre ist nette man und freundlich. Die Zimmer ist preiswert. Blaue Moschee nur 6-7 min zu fuss.

Appartement simple, des lits un frigo,
Les - :  pas toujours le nécessaire de cuisine, plaque vieille..pas de machine a laver, assez froid (pas de chauffage, la clim chauffe mal) fortes odeurs dans la salle de bain, et les draps sont pas changé de la semaine...les serviette retiré mais pas rajouter...

Les + : 
Bon emplacement loin du tumulte de la ville mais dans le centre historique de Sulthanamey.Emre est réactif,plein de petits boui boui autour, restaurants, ménage fait durant le séjour, et quartier calme !

Mr Emre was very helpful and friendly with us help us showing around especially being Turkish interpter when needed.
Highly recommended place to stay in Old Istanbul
Удобное расположение до основных достопримечательностей (пешая доступность). Оперативные ответы и помощь от хозяина квартиры.

L'appartement d'Emre est davantage une petite chambre d’hôtel où l'on a les équipements attendus sauf la machine à laver. L'appartement est globalement assez propre.
Il est très bien placé (à 10 min à pied de la mosquée bleue et de sainte Sophie) et dans un quartier authentique. Nous avons aussi apprécié qu'il y ait en face un supérette où nous avons pu faire des courses.
Emre est très réactif et très sympa. Nous recommandons cet appartement.

Great place to stay at! Few minutes from Sultanhamet and Kumkapi, nights are silent and days (till late) are really lively. There is plenty of supermarkets, food stores in the whereabouts, a hammam 50mt away and lots of shops all around. Didn't meet Emre at all (maybe because we were out all day) but got kind hospitality and everything we could need from his friend (a girl, I can't remember her name). Finally, I would recommend ***** at Emre's always!! *****

Unser Aufenthalt war super. Wir sind bis zur Yenikapi Metro Station vom Flughafen durchgefahren und sind dann mit Uber für 13 (2-3€) TL zur Unterkunft gefahren. Der Check In war super einfach, leider haben wir Emre an dem Tag nicht persönlich getroffen, aber seine Assistentin, die 24/7 im Haus ist, hat uns die Schlüssel überreicht. Unser Zimmer hat nach Zigaretten gerochen, da wir Nichtraucher sind und den Geruch nicht gewohnt sind, haben wir auf Anfrage von Emre sofort ein anderes Zimmer bekommen. Ein Pluspunkt. Die Lage war auch sehr gut, in 5-10 min waren wir an der blauen Moschee, Hagia Sophia und am großen Bazar.
Die Unterkunft an sich war sauber und der Service war auch gut.
Emre ist super nett und hilft sofort, wenn ihr Probleme oder Fragen habt!

Nur zu empfehlen. Gerne wieder!
Be ready with your water to drink on arrival
The apartment was as described and all went smoothly with the exception if some confusion at check-in which wasn't a massive problem. Otherwise a decent and good value place to stay for a few days.

I recommend a stay at Kadirga's.  We could not have asked for a better location!!!  It was so close to many of the main sites (we didn't use transportation around the city at all - walked everywhere).  There are a lot of small markets if you need to pick up food or other supplies.  There are also a ton of local restaurants and cafes.  We loved the location!  The apartment was well equipped and VERY clean.  The only thing that we would have liked different were doors/curtain on the shower or extra towels for the wet floor.  We did not meet the host at all, which would have been nice just to be able to thank him in person.  I would absolutely stay here again!

Нам было приятно остановиться в доме у Emre. Отличное расположение, все достопримечательности близко, район безопасный, хороший супермаркет напротив. В доме все работало исправно. Наша комната была как заявлено на фото.

No es un apartamento, es una habitación de hotel sin servicios de hotel. Hay una nevera, un microondas y un pequeño fogón, pero luego no te puedes sentar a tomar un café. Mi piso era el bajo y daba a un patio sucísimo lleno de porquerías. Durante el día se usaba como aparcamiento de coches y si abría la ventana se llenaba de humo la habitación. El apartamento tampoco estaba muy limpio.
Emre is a great host. He can help you with all your travel needs.
Logement bien situé pour visiter le vieil Istanbul. Mais la salle de bain est  en très mauvais état . Et on n'a rencontré personne...
Great location and Emre was a fantastic host. Gave us a lot of local tips and attended to our requests quickly

(-) Please be aware that you have to walk UPHILL for around 15 min from the location to Beyazit Station (T2)- main street to start visiting the attractions; the room and bathroom are quite cold since there is no sun beating over the place during the day,  there is mildew over the ceiling in the bathroom due to humidity.

(+) Good and quick communication with the host, fast check-in, room and bathroom were very clean, spacious room, nice park in front

We were disappointed when we first walked into the room because it's not nearly as nice as it appears in the photos. The WiFi was poor - simple browsing is a challenge. The washing machine was broken so we couldn't do laundry on site. Other than that it was a nice stay. Fairly good location. We feel like we overpaid for the place. I wouldn't want to pay more than 20euro/night for it. We spent a week here. In hindsight, we'd spend a few nights in this area and a few nights in Galata.

I stayed with mixed feelings after our stay. Our host seemed very nice and was helpful in what we asked for, a huge help was the fact that we could check in very early and also leave our luggage in the lobby after we checked out. What I didn't like however was that he was very slow in answering my messages, before and during the stay . The room looks much better in the photos than it really is. The furniture is quite old, worn out, the bed sheets were clean but had holes in them, mattresses were really dirty.. The bathroom looks unclean mainly because it is oldish as well and the worst thing was a very bad smell that we had during the whole stay and couldn't find where it came from. The location however was very nice i would say it is a nice neighbourhood and close to main attractions.
The kitchenware is all rusty and not neat. Not at all as described by the host.

Очень понравилось, бюджетный вариант, лучше намного чем хостел, хотя по ценам идентичны, чисто, тепло, удобная кровать.  Местоположение супер, единственное что долго искали адрес, так как Гугл карта показывала не верно, до метро 10 минут пешком, до трамвая 5 минут, вечером есть где погулять, тихий, не шумный район, с окна виден супермаркет, ночное заведение типа кафе, парк.
Рядом с домом аптека.
В комнате есть все удобства для готовки, глажки. 
Очень рада что гостили именно здесь.
Советую и Вам))

This place isn't as nice as it looks in the pictures. The assistant who was meant to let us in when we first arrived didn't answer the door when we rang the bell so we were stuck outside at night with our luggage wondering what to do, thankfully I connected to the wifi from the cafe over the road to contact him that we were there and it was sorted. The rest of the stay was average but it's good for the amount of money you pay.

clean place and safe, u need to prepare yourself for walking if u want to use public transportation.
if u have elderly ppl, make sure to get room in 1st level.
communication is quick, and this place closer to a lot of restaurants.
Location is good.

Our room was a bit different than the photos. It wasn't too bad but also not what I expected. Compared to photos the room is a bit less nice overall.

The location is okay. 5-10 minutes walking distance from Blue Mosque and tram line.

We didn't have any problems with amenities.

name: Stunning Tamarama 2BR apartment with ocean views
summary: If you like the ocean and to surf you won’t find a better place to spend Sydney this summer. With sweeping and uninterrupted views across MacKenzie’s Bay, Tamarama, Bronte and beyond our home is an ocean and surfing lover’s paradise. This 2-bedroom apartment is also very spacious with a large King room with sun room and a second double room with a separate fold-out single bed. When in the large open plan living and kitchen areas you feel like you can reach out and touch the ocean!
space: House setting: Welcome to the world famous Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Home to some of the city’s top restaurants, cafes, boutique shopping and a number of stunning beaches – including Bondi, Tamarama, Bronte and Coogee. Come and enjoy the best of what Sydney has to offer! Your home during your stay is our spacious and light filled 2-bedroom apartment with uninterrupted views over Mackenzie’s Bay, Tamarama, Bronte and beyond. Check the surf from the apartment before you decide which break to surf!  Kitchen and living areas: This really is the place to be in our home where you get to experience the ocean views as soon as you walk into this area. It is also the social hub of the home. The kitchen has all the modern equipment you would expect to find including a microwave, kettle, fridge/freezer, coffee machine and electric hob and oven.  The Living room has ample and comfortable seating and if you can take your eyes off the ocean views long enough then you can enjoy the large flat screen

With sweeping and uninterrupted views across MacKenzie’s Bay, Tamarama, Bronte and beyond our home is an ocean and surfing lover’s paradise. This 2-bedroom apartment is also very spacious with a large King room with sun room and a second double room with a separate fold-out single bed. When in the large open plan living and kitchen areas you feel like you can reach out and touch the ocean! House setting: Welcome to the world famous Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Home to some of the city’s top restaurants, cafes, boutique shopping and a number of stunning beaches – including Bondi, Tamarama, Bronte and Coogee. Come and enjoy the best of what Sydney has to offer! Your home during your stay is our spacious and light filled 2-bedroom apartment with uninterrupted views over Mackenzie’s Bay, Tamarama, Bronte and beyond. Check the surf from the apartment before you decide which break to surf!  Kitchen and
neighborhood_overview: In Tamarama you can experience the chilled and surfing vibe of this beachside suburb. Tamarama beach has its own café and free public BBQs to be enjoyed. If it’s boutique shopping, trendy cafés, restaurants and art galleries then head straight to Bondi’s Hall Street and Curlewis Street which offer everything that you might need. If you’re looking for food and can’t take yourself away from the beach then maybe drop into Icebergs, North Bondi RSL or the Bucket List to get a taste of the local dishes and a cold beverage while marveling at the stunning ocean views. If you want to explore the stunning beaches and coastline between Bondi and Coogee just continue south of Bondi and follow the path to the neighbouring beaches: Tamarama beach, affectionately known as Glamarama to the locals due to the beautiful and glamorous nature of many of it’s visitors, is a small and stunning beach just 10-minute walk from Bondi Beach (25 minutes using the coastal path).  Bronte beach, a further 5 to 10-mi
notes: An initial supply of fresh linen, bath towels and toiletries (shampoo, body wash and toilet paper) will be provided along with a fully equipped kitchen and washing machine.
transit: While you remain in Tamarama, Bondi and Bronte everything is within a short walking distance.  A 5 to 10-minute drive or 10-minute bus ride will take you to Bondi Junction, the closest shopping centre and transport hub for the City and other beaches.  A further 10-minute train ride will take you to Town Hall, the heart of the CDB, and another 10 minutes to Circular Quay where you’ll get to enjoy the sights of the Harbour Bridge and Opera House, The Rocks, and everything else that this wonderful city has to offer. All this from the closest bus stop only a 5-minute walk away on Dudley Street. All bus and driving times are subject to traffic flow and buses depart approximately every 10 minutes.
access: You will have complete access to the apartment during your stay.
interaction: While we are away we will have someone to meet you who will be available to you by phone/sms/email (whatever you prefer) for the duration of your stay. They will also meet you at the end of your stay to collect the keys.
house_rules: This is our home and we are delighted to share it with you. We hope we have provided everything which will make you feel at home. At the same time, we rely on the Airbnb principles of care and respect for the host’s home and hope you subscribe to the same.  To help with this our specific rules are as follows: 1.	I ask that you show courtesy and respect for our neighbours, especially when it comes to loud music and other noise. If there is a call-out or verified complaint, then the security deposit will be forfeited. 2.	You are responsible for all of your visitors. There is a strict no party policy. 3.	Professional Event bookings will be considered on a case by case request. 4.	No animals allowed. 5.	No smoking. 6.	Damages and breakages - in the case of unlikely damages please let us know ASAP so that we can discuss and agree how best to handle any instances. 7.	The person making the booking must be staying in our home. 8.	When not in our home, and on days of bad weather, please ensure

host.host_about:
Hi There,

I'm an outgoing guy in my mid 30s who seeks adventure, loves to see new places and meet people from all around the world.

I've lived in Australia and the UK and have travelled extensively through Asia and South America (for almost 18 months) which was simply incredible!

I'm a very happy, friendly and sociable guy who loves the outdoors, particularly surfing and the mountains, and meeting new people.

I look forward to meeting you.

Ben

reviews.comments:
Amazing location and view, we had to extend our stay as we couldn't part with the view and outdoor living area.
So close to have a swim or head to Bondi entertainment/shopping area.
I've never had a better place to sit and look at a view for hours each day. The best.

name: Breathtaking views of Golden Horn
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın: Pierre Loti.

name: Charming room  Diagonal wifi 100 Mb
summary: The room is perfect. Clean & comfortable & Charming & Quiet ... Has Tivo cable tv inside . Books,  a very strong Fan in summer. Bathroom is just beside  At night a dividing door closes and half the apartment is for you total privacy fridge included
space: Charming and warm room in the Eixample Esquerra next to Av.Diagonal.Close to ESADE Absolutely quiet, no traffic noise. With a very comfortable double bed for 2 people. The bathroom with ecological shower and hairdryer is just next to your room. The host provides towels, shampoo, and soap & bath gel. The apartment has WIFI 100 MB. Cable TV. Air conditioning and central heating. The hostess  prepare a breakfast consisting of: Coffee, tea or infusions. Bread. Crunchy toast. Muffins or croissants. Butter, Jam. (Not included in price) Very convenient! There is laundry service for a very reasonable price! The host lives in another part of the house and can guide you in everything you need during your stay in Barcelona. If you have to keep on top of business during your stay, office, Scan and other Secretarial Services are available. Street Parking or Underground Car Park is nearby.

Bathroom is just beside  At night a dividing door closes and half the apartment is for you total privacy fridge included Charming and warm room in the Eixample Esquerra next to Av.Diagonal.Close to ESADE Absolutely quiet, no traffic noise.
