neighborhood_overview: Located in the center of Eixample Esquerra, you can walk to all attractions.  Museums, Art Nouveau Houses, Gardens, Churches, Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera, Las Ramblas. There is also a bus stop right in the portal, including Night Bus. Metro Station H. Clinic (blue line) 2 stops to Sants Station (Airport train) The beaches are just few minutes by Bus; you have a line at 100m.
notes: The place has TiVo, cable tv inside the room Guests can enjoy some program or movie in your own language!
transit: Museums, Art Nouveau Houses, Gardens, Churches, Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera, Las Ramblas. There is also a bus stop right in the portal, including Night Bus. Metro Station H. Clinic (blue line) 2 stops to Sants Station (Airport train) The beaches are just few minutes by Bus; you have a line at 100m.
access: Guests have access to half of the house except livingroom, my bedroom and my office.
interaction: I love interacting with my guests at least once a day. especially to give any information they need
house_rules: I love nice people and polite. Pets no allowed. Definitely it is an apartment for  nonsmoker people

host.host_about:
My name is Ana, I live in Barcelona for 35 years, is my city.
I’m a holistic therapist &
naturalist intuitive healer-
The calm and tranquility is reflected in my home and my person.
I like to offer an atmosphere of harmony and happiness, as any kind of tip and help for finding out curious locations of the city ...
I have traveled the world over, love to travel. And I have lived in different countries.
Trying to learn the way of living of its people...I like to travel as much as I can :)
My interests are cinema,  and art. 
I love cooking, biking, and movies.
I speak English, Portuguese,Spanish and Italian and understand French.
I am respectful of the planet, nature and ecology.
I love recycling...

reviews.comments:
Staying at Ana's place was just a PERFECT experience!! It was my first AirBnB experience, but I was very happy that I found such a nice host like her. :) Since the moment I met her, her smile never left her face. :) She is very calm, kind, and very lovely. :) I stayed at a very pretty private room and everything was there, even TV and DVD Player. Also there was little air conditioner, so I could have cool nights in hot Barcelona. :) 
Ana is always helpful so whenever I asked for help, she always kindly helped me. :) She also speaks good English so there was no problem with communicating. :)
Her place is very close from a metro station and the area is very very safe area. Also it is very close from Sants which is like a central station of Barcelona, so when you go to other cities or airport, you can reach them easily and quick. :) The area has everything you need.. bakery, super markets(even 24 hours one), book shop, internet cafe, pharmacy, bars, restaurants, etc.. and also there was night bus line from Catalunya 1 block away from the house. So when there is no more metro, I could come home safely by night bus. :)
In a word, it was a very lucky and perfect choice staying at Ana's place. :) For me, it was more than just an accommodation because I met such a lovely and beautiful person as hostess and I know we will meet again and again as good friends in near future. :)
All the best to you, Ana! Miss you already!! :) 
Muchas gracias por todo, Ana! :)
Quite simple but great place for a very fair price. Has everything you need. Perfectly located and still very quiet. Ana was great and very friendly. Would go there anytime again.
l really enjoyed being with ana. she was a great, relaxed host. she was also wonderful in giving me all the information l needed to see all the cities sights.

Staying at Charming room was a really good experience. I was looking for a calm place where to stay while going to the university. Everything was great!!
Ana is a really kind person and will give you enough tips to go out the city.

Ana is a delight and her home is spotless and always clean.  It is in a wonderful part of town and you can get everywhere by metro, bus, or walking.  At night it is quiet and cool and the room with a comfortable bed is right next to the bathroom.  While you do share the bathroom with Ana you would never know she had been in it.  It is almost as if she cleans it EVERY time she uses it.

In the morning there is a big pot of coffee and some toast if you wish.  I never ate breakfast as it is not my thing but was always glad the coffee was ready when I woke up.

Anna was a welcoming and gracious host. My room was clean, comfortable, and roomy. Anna gave me plenty of privacy. She offered coffee, toast and jam for breakfasts, although I ended up buying food and making my own--she left me space in the fridge. 

Air conditioning took the edge off the heat; there was a fan in the bedroom and a small stereo as well as TV. I wasn't always comfortable in the Living Room as her bedroom and office were right off it, and she was often there, so I mostly kept to my room. Guests should note that while the room profile shows a washing machine, her notes say she will wash your clothes for 8 euros per load. 

The location was very good, just a couple blocks from the subway and within extended walking distance of several key sites. I was given keys so I could come and go as I pleased. I appreciated the quietness of the space. I would recommend this place to others.

Ana welcomes you to her lovely, impeccable home in a lovely neighborhood, very well situated for all means of public transportation.  She extends herself immediately and always, to attend to your comfort, as if in your own home, to feel at home. She can facilitate your being able to experience this slice of life in Barcelona and beyond, as you get to know her adopted city.  You will be hosted by a very lovely person, very personable, open, friendly and caring, who will try to help you find the Barcelona you are looking for.  I don't think you would find a better host anywhere, and she deserves the full trust she absolutely offers her guests from the first moment.

staying at chaming  room was a wonderful experience.The room was very clean y comfortable and the location was excellent.Ana is very kind,helpful .She is very pleasant to provide informations and suggestiones when  I stayed in Barcelona .Thank you .

Ana has a wonderful clean apartment in a beautiful neighbourhood in Barcelona. There are great places to eat and drink close by, some even on the same block.

Ana is a great host and is very helpful in answering any questions I had about the city. She had advice about transportation and things to see during my first visit to Barcelona.
Listing was as advertised, room pleasant and clean. Anna the landlady was very nice and accommodating and went out of her way and constantly kept the place clean. Location and building nice.

Ana is a wonderful host and her apartment is very clean, in a safe charming and quiet neighborhood, with excellent Wifi. Very close to the metro and buses, but an easy 20 minute walk to most of the touristy type things but a nice calm space to come home to after a day if sightseeing. The room and apartment has all you need, nearby are several restaurants and bakeries, with non-tourist prices (ie good pricing). Ana provided maps and tips on all things Barcelona and was very easy going and personable throughout my stay. 100% recommend.

Fantastic experience, clean and spacious room. 
Great location to visit the city. Ana Isabel was always kind and available 
Would definitely recommend!!!

Ana kindly welcomed me to her place and was knowledgable about the ins and outs of Barcelona. Her neighborhood is quiet and a ~15 minute walk from La Rambla. I felt safe walking around day or night. (I'm also male.) There is an elevator that goes to her floor & I was happy my rented bike fit inside that.

The room was as described - the bed was comfortable, the apartment quiet,  and I slept very well. I didn't spend much time hanging out during the day. The shower head had a little bit of trouble fitting in the holder but it was minor.

Localizado em um bairro tranquilo dentro de uma cidade cosmopolita como Barcelona, o charming room foi cenário de um período fantástico. Ana Isabel sempre simpática, sorridente e prestativa torna sua estadia ainda mais agradável.
Espero retornar...

Ha sido una experiencia d lo más positiva. La ubicación estupenda y Annais te lo facilita todo y te da toda la información que necesites. Me he encontrado muy a gusto,  como en mi propia casa. La habitación completa y la cama muy confortable pero además ella esta pendiente d cualquier cosa que pudieras necesitar. No tengo más que palabras d agradecimiento y desde que pueda pienso repetir.
Sitio muy bien situado, limpio y acogedor, Ana Isabel muy atenta y amable.

Ha sido una buena experiencia, el piso esta muy centrico en una zona tranquila.Ana ha tenido un trato excelente, dispuesta en todo momento a aclarar mis dudas y hacer de mi estancia acogedora. Realmente recomendable
Ana se ha portado muy bien, muy atenta y siempre ayudando en lo posible. El apartamento se encontraba muy limpio siempre y es muy cómodo

Ana Isabel is a kind hostess, she respects boundaries, was very helpful and welcoming too. You will not feel like a stranger in Barcelona if you decide to live with her. The room was nice and clean, the neighborhood was quite and people were always friendly everywhere I went.

Ana made me feel very welcome and was a nice host. The bedroom was clean and comfortable. The location was perfect for my needs - close to many restaurants and where I was working, and also near the main tourist spots.

Annais' apartment is nice, cozy and ideally located.

I got in Barcelona late at night and Annais was waiting for me, she gave me a quick and efficient tour of the apartment and of my room, explaining all the features and amenities available. 

Annais is a great host: very efficient, kind, understanding, helpful and discrete. 

I highly recommend this solution if you're looking to spend a few days in Barcelona!

I have spent 3 days & night at the Annais place. Everything was perfect. She very nice and always ready to assist you for all you need. Place to see or the way to go for some place, etc. She a very nice person and you feel like at home. It's very private too. I will return anytime. I recommend this place.
Thank you Annais to be your guest

Annais welcomed me with a little packet, telling me her house was my house. I really appreciated the little map she provides with information about tapas, grocery stores, and pharmacies on the block. She gave me very useful tips and ideas a couple of time I interacted with her during my stay. The flat/room are exactly as shown in the photos. I tend to be private person, so when I was siesting or having to work, I tended to stay in my room. When she says she will leave you alone, she means it:) She let me have my much-needed space without making me feel weird about it. I really like the location. It is within walking distance to tourist attraction and the tourist busses. Two busses (right in front of her building) take you to the Placa Catalunya (sp), which you can use to A) take the bus to the airport and B) to start your walk down Las Ramblas. Another couple of buses, about two  blocks away, go down Las Ramblas (from which you can turn off to Bari Gothic), one of those two going along the coast of La Barceloneta (sp). The Metro, which is two blocks away, is but 3 stops from La Sagrada Familia. I liked how I could get to everything but wasn't in a neighborhood of tourists (I do think I noticed other airbnb-ers in the barrio though!). The neighborhood was nondescript yet pleasant...

Me sentí como en mi casa. La habitación es muy cómoda y tiene muy buena energía el lugar. Annais es muy amable. Me ayudó mucho a ubicarme en la zona, me aconsejó y fue muy predispuesta a ayudarme con todo tipo de situaciones cotidianas de mi nueva vida en Barcelona.   La casa es muy limpia y te brinda mucha privacidad para leer o descansar. Todo muy lindo. La verdad no quería irme!

Annais es una persona muy amable y te sientes como en casa nada más llegar. Te ayuda mucho en cuestión de moverte  por la ciudad y conocer los lugares útiles cerca como supermercados, cajeros ...
En cuanto al piso, está en pleno centro en una zona muy tranquila pero con muchas tiendas, restaurantes... La habitación está genial.. una cama enorme, televisión por cable, WiFi, calefacción central... que más de puede pedir?  
En resumen, lo recomiendo plenamente

It was one amazing week, I passed one week for work and i sleep in Annais's house, she was very friendly with me, all the explication of the city and the room it's really cozy and hot, the bathroom it's perfectly working and biggest too, internet was super fast so i'm feel comfortable and i succede to working perfectly.

Thanks Again.
Grazie davvero è stata una fantastica settimana, dovevo lavorare e sono riuscito a farlo anche la sera quando avevo bisogno di internet (super veloce).
bagno grande, e comodo, stanza davvero molto accogliente tv via cavo armadio e comodino con una scrivania e uno specchio. La stanza era davvero calda. 

Grazie ancora.

Annais is a lovely lady and genial host. She knew that I wouldn't make it in to the city until 8PM and was patiently waiting for me at the front door when I got out of the elevator to welcome me in.

She then gave me a quick tour of the place and showed me my room and facilities she had set aside, and most importantly got me online as I needed to do some work!

As I went out to meet my colleagues that evening I arrived, she gave me great directions on where I needed to go and was even kind enough to work out the quickest route for my business meetings, because of the TMB strikes on the bus and metro on different days.

The house was always clean, I had a space in the fridge for my food and water, and the bathroom has a good shower with lots of hot water! Essential after a long day walking around!

The hall light or a night light was always on when I came home in the evening so I wasn't walking in to walls, and thoughtful things upon my return, like my towels hung up and a fresh water glass were replaced during my four day stay, even though she didn't have to.

I was there for work so I would leave in the morning and come home late at night. But on the occasions our paths crossed there was always a friendly Hola. I always felt welcome. Which makes me think I'd be happy to stay there for pleasure too!

Ana is a very nice person and everything was perfect. It was a lovely clean and central host and she always assist for every question you have. So I totaly recommend this place. I have spent 3 days & nights there. Thank you Ana to be your guest!

I had a really nice time at this place! The description was very accurate and the neighborhood was lovely. Annais is a lovely host, very attentive to details (keeping the light on the evening when I returned to the apartment, keeping the bathroom tidy,...) and made my stay as comfortable as possible. Thank you very much!

Yeah, it was quite nice during the four-nights's stay in Annais Lovely appartment. She said to me:"make yourself feel just like in your home." Also she gave me suggestion about the trip to the Tidabo, which is on the top of a hill, where you can see the panorama of BCN. And the Metro Station can be reached in 3 min. by foot. Fully recommended!
I needed a place to stay for a couple of nights in Barcelona and Annais's place was perfect. comfortable and convenient, and Annais is a very welcoming host - highly recommended!

My sister and I stayed at Annais' home for 3 nights. She's a wonderful hostess, very helpful especially with giving tips and directions on how to go around Barcelona. Her apartment is very nice and clean, making us feel like we're staying in our own home. Highly recommended!
Anna is an easygoing person, everything was fine. I recommend the room.
Tutto come preannunciato: Annais è un ottima "hospitalera", attenta ad ogni esigenza, disponibile per ogni necessità ma al tempo stesso discreta e riservata. Bella vacanza nella sua casa.

Great neighbourhood, good walk to the tourist spots (30-40 minutes stroll).  Annais was extremely kind enough to wash my clothes after being robbed of my belongings in Seville, I had minimal clothes to wear.  Over and above her host role.

Annaisはとても親切で気を配れる優しいﾎｽﾄでした｡周辺の地図やﾊｳｽﾙｰﾙをきちんと記載しているので､ﾎﾃﾙのようでした｡近くに地元民や観光客に人気のﾀﾊﾟｽﾊﾞｰがあり､本場の雰囲気を味わえﾗｯｷｰでした｡
ｽｰﾊﾟｰがいくつもあり､ｶﾌｪなどの食べ物も困りません｡
交通も目の前にｶﾀﾙｰﾆｬ行きのﾊﾞｽ､近くに5番ﾗｲﾝのﾒﾄﾛの駅があり便利でした｡
ﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅの地元の雰囲気を味わうには最適です｡
8月なので､ﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅは少し暑かったです｡

Staying with Annais was fantastic, the room was very clean, tidy and nicely furnished. Annais was a wonderful host, very friendly and helpful. All in all it is great value for money! I highly recommend staying here.

Annais a été une hôtesse absolument parfaite. Elle m'a accueillie à bras ouverts dès mon arrivée. Elle a été d'une grande générosité (je me suis faite voler mon portefeuille peu de temps après mon arrivée à Barcelone et n'ayant plus rien sur moi, je me aussi rendue directement chez elle, plusieurs heures avant l'heure du "check-in", et elle m'a tout de suite donné accès à ma chambre, en plus de me dépanner le temps de recevoir de nouvelles cartes). Heureusement qu'elle était là! Je me suis donc tout de suite sentie chez moi et en confiance. 

Tout en étant d'une grande discrétion, elle a été disponible tout au long de mon séjour. Elle a su me donner de bons conseils pour les visites, expositions et endroits de restaurations intéressants.

Et son appartement est très bien situé. De là, tout peut se faire à pied.

Une première expérience avec airbnb absolument parfaite! 

Un gros merci Annais!

Annais is a lovely and sweet person with alot of talents! Her home is very clean and the room is perfect for one person. I stayed at Annais for 2 weeks and it felt like home. Annais even took care of me when i got really sick :). Thank you for everything!! I highly recommend this charming room :).
Muito agradável, apartamento e localização ótimos...
Foi incrível! Tudo maravilhoso!

Annais ha sido súper amable y atenta en todo momento. He estado muy a gusto durante este mes, me ha recomendado sitios a donde ir y todo tipo de transporte para llegar a los lugares que quería visitar. Además la ubicación de la casa está céntrica y cerca de todo!! 
Muchas gracias por todo

Very nice room and good location.
It is close to the center and is comfortable to move around. wi-fi speed also very good extreamly good!!! most of all, host is so wonderful. :-) If I have a chance, I plan to stay here again

좋아요 너무 좋아요 깨끗하고 한국에서 느낄 수 있는 와이파이 속도 ㅜㅜ 역 근처에 있어서 다니기도 편하고 주변에 편의점이나 싼 레스토랑도 있고 돌아다니기 편해요 매우

Annais is a very professional woman. She was very helpful regarding any issue that came up(i.e. Booking a train to Paris online). I would definitely stay with Annais again if I ever returned to the beautiful City of Barcelona.
10/10 todo impecable!
Annais es una muy buena anfitriona. Tuve mucha privacidad. Me ayudó mucho en cuanto a como recorrer la ciudad y alrededores. Me sentí como en casa!
Annais is a very kind and helpful host. Her place is ideal for someone traveling solo. Centrally located, clean and well maintained. Would definitely come back!
Very central location, surronded by restaurants, supermarkets and public transport, making it very easy to roam around Barcelona. Overall rating: Great value-for-money.
Great location.

Wer eine saubere und günstige Unterkunft möchte und zudem gut zu Fuß ist, der ist hier gut aufgehoben. Ich zB bin von dort aus alles zu Fuß gegangen. Des Weiteren kann man in dieser Gegend super essen, da abseits von Touris! Also ich habe mich bei Annais sehr wohl gefühlt. Also, man kann gut von dort seine Routen starten und in umgrenzten Bäckereien (und was für tolle) coffee to Go mitnehmen und beim Nachhausegehen in schöne Tripvisor Tapas Restaurants gehen. Mir zB hat es gut getan Abends wieder in diese Wohngegend zu gehen und zwischen Enheimischen zu essen.

Me sentí como en casa. Annais es una persona muy amable y respetuosa.  
En todo momento estuvo dispuesta a ayudarme con cualquier cosa, al tanto de mis necesidades y de mi comodidad en la estadía.
El clima que se vive es muy tranquilo y cálido.
La recomiendo al %100

Annais ist sehr hilfsbereit, aufmerksam und freundlich.
Man kann die Küche mit benutzen. Ein Kühlschrank für Obst und Getränke und  eine Kaffeemaschine für Dolce Gusto Kapseln. Einmal die Woche wird das Zimmer (neue Bettbezüge) und Badezimmer (neue Handtücher) gründlich gereinigt. Die Unterkunft liegt nahe an der U-Bahn-Station. Man kann sehr viele Sehenswürdigkeiten von hieraus schnell erreichen wie zum Bspl. Sagrada Familia, Stadion Nou Camp, Barceloneta Beach usw.. Es gibt einen Supermarkt, Bäckereien, Bars und Restaurants auch mit einem Mittagsmenü in der nähe der Unterkunft. Das Haus verfügt über einen Pförtner im Eingangsbereich und Aufzug.

This time I was unlucky with my stay in Barcelona, as I got stuck in the anti-Spain-election-week. That's not Annais' foult, of course.
But because of the demonstrations I was forced to stay at "home" a whole day and work from there. Annais' flat is not made for that: the room is rather small and has not enough natural light. also its' only window heads into a tiny light shaft -  where mostly noise and smells from other kitchens is coming in. As I was not allowed to use the living room that day (because she is working there herself) it was rather inconvenient and dull.
Still Annais is a nice person - although I was disappointed when she immediately did raise the price of the room when I started to ask whether it was available.
The location is great, the room very clean and tidy. Also, Annais was very friendly and helpful with everything. I recommend staying here.
Annais place is really nice and cozy, hospitality is perfect, location is pretty much good if you love to walk its perfect it's close to lot of stuff and also quite at night...

Hospedar-me no apartamento da Annais foi uma ótima experiencia. Localização maravilhosa, muito conforto e limpeza. A Annais pode dar varias dicas sobre a cidade, burocracias, e muitas outras coisas. Vim para barcelona para viver por 6 meses e com certeza ter passado um mês em sua casa me ajudou muito para que eu conseguisse me adaptar a nova cidade. Além de excelente host é tambem uma pessoa muito boa, simpática e honesta.

I came to Barcelona for a two week rotation at the Hospital Clinic. Annais’ place was a perfect accommodation— clean, comfortable bed, and Welcoming host. Annais is respectful to your privacy. She allowed me to use the apartment like it was my home. I stored some grocery in the refrigerator and even did laundry twice. The neighborhood is wonderful with plenty of great cafes. Also an unbeatable cost per day. Thank you Annais for your hospitality!
Annais is a great host, and she gave wonderful tips about visiting the city, and the apartment is perfect to keep your privacy.
Annais es muy buena persona,y su piso es muy muy limpio,muy cerca al metro,todo muy bien,el piso es muy recomendado
Annais is a fantastic hostess and incredibly welcoming and friendly.

The room is great, I got super good sleep and the bathroom is right next to it so you’re basically in another part of the house. Annais is super nice, helpful and respectful so you’ll get a very private space. I definitely recommend.

There are many bars, restaurants and shops, and the location is very convenient and I enjoyed walking around neighborhoods. Annais is very neat and kept my privacy. I could stay comfortably. Thank you, Annais!

Anna's apartment was very well positioned in the city, with a metro just a couple blocks away. She was very friendly, communicated well and kept the place tidy. I used this as a home base to keep all of my belongings while I traveled throughout Spain and the Balearic Islands. The only downside is that even with the fan in the bedroom, it was sometimes unbearably hot in the summer evenings. All-in-all, it exceeded my expectations and was a great value for my needs. Thanks Anna!

Excellent place to stay if you want to both explore the city center and to relax at home. Amenities are clean and modern and the place is surrounded with great restaurants. Annais' place is also situated very near to many attractions (i.e. Plaza de Catalunya) and close to numerous transportation options. As a host,  Annais is extremely responsive and accommodating. Would definitely return again.
Well-located. Very close to Hospital Clinic Metro station. Supermarkets and pubs nearby. Super comfy bed!
I enjoyed staying here a lot! Really close to the metro station

Place was great! Clean and in a quiet and safe neighborhood. Less than 2 blocks away from both the hospital and the metro, making it really convenient. Annais also respects my privacy a lot and that’s a great plus point for me. She could also be counted on for some tips around the town and area :)

name: Large/comfy 1 bed apartment- 10 mins from beach
summary: My place is located just two blocks from Maroubra Junction where you’ll find a shopping centre with supermarkets, coffee shops and restaurants. Hit the surf at Maroubra Beach, just a 5-minute drive away and pick up coffee along vibrant McKeon Street. If you’re travelling with kids there is a playground and a skate park on the beachfront too that is sure to keep them entertained!
space: Large and spacious 1 bedroom apartment.  Queen size bed, double slide mirrored built in robe,  TV & foxtel.  Living space has a large 6 seater Lshape sofa, as well as 2 stools along the kitchen breakfast counter. Free Wifi, fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and large TV with Foxtel. Situated just moments to buzzing local cafes & eateries, nearby shopping complexes & parks as well as having buses to Coogee and Bondi beach, Sydney Airport & the CBD only 12-20 mins by car.

neighborhood_overview: Maroubra is a great community.  The airport is 15 minutes away. There's a Westfield shopping centre a 10 minute bus ride away (bus 400) and another Westfield 20 minutes away (same 400 but other direction - Bondi Junction). Maroubra Junction is 5 minutes away and has a Coles Supermarket, an Aldi as well as other takeaway, banking and specialty shops.
notes: Please be considerate of your neighbours, they are quite friendly and keep to themselves.  I have lived in this apartment for over 5 years so your respect and consideration would be appreciated.
transit: There is a bus stop right outside your door or uber/taxi always always readily available.
access: You'll have the entire apartment to yourself.
interaction: Will be available via email and via Air bnb
house_rules: Please leave house as you found it. Wash your dishes and leave the place tidy. Thank you

reviews.comments: The apartment is very nice with a very good space and in  amazing location near the supermarket and public transport. There are a lot of beaches near the apartment and is easy to go to the center of Sydney. I recommend it.

space: Very homey, and clean. It's how a typical Hong Kong apartment is like :) Great way to know the local life.

It's how a typical Hong Kong apartment is like :) Great way to know the local life. The entire apartment I have a day job, but I work relatively close to home. I can offer help by call or in person if needed. Star street is famous for many great restaurants in town. It's a quiet but safe neighbourhood. Great location near to Wan Chai and Admiralty MTR station. Closest parking will be inside Pacific Place 3.

reviews.comments: It's really a great and sweet house. Carmen is so nice lady. The last day we went out buying tickets and forgot checkout time. Carmen reminded us won't be worry and wait in patience.

It's very clear and quiet.

Very good

房主的房间非常的整洁,同时也非常的温馨 周边环境也很好｡
    房间地点离地铁站不远,步行5分钟即可到达｡离铜锣湾只要一个地铁站,也可以步行前往金紫荆广场｡
    房主很友好也很热情,向我们简单交代了一些注意事项,还提供了一些游览建议｡
    总之,这是一次非常好的住宿体验｡
Carmen’s apartment is cosy, clean and well located. Carmen did her best to help us every time we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Carmen is a nice and warm host. Her place is small but cosy and very convenient. The location is perfect to visit HK : both close to lively areas at night, and to nature paths for an early jogging.

The flat is cosy and very well located, and Carmen was really helpful throughout our stay! Just be aware that the apartment may not be suitable for 3 tall adults (as it was our case), as beds are very small.

There are 2 types of AirBnBs - one feels like a hotel and the other is someone's actual home. This is the latter - do not expect a hotel experience. Location is great (Star St in Wanchai has boutique shops & nice restaurants, you're less than 5 min walk from the MTR and less than 30 min walk to Central). Building is more modern than most in the area, with a doorman and elevator. Apartment has an open view (not easy to come by on HK island!) Carmen keeps her place tidy and well equipped with everything you need. Bed is short (as others have noted) and the sofa is small too. Bathroom is basic but shower has hot water and ok pressure. Kitchen is tiny but there is plenty of space in the fridge and a water boiler. Carmen is friendly and super responsive! Bottom line: Great for a couple of nights only.

I stayed with my parents and it was great to have a separated bedroom from them. The apartment was not huge because of HongKong's high population density, but it was simply decorated and comfortable enough!  Some of visitors were too tall for the bed but with my 155cm height, I had no problem sleeping on it.  Hot water from shower was abundant. The view of skyscrapers from windows was good. I could even partly see New Years fireworks from windows. 

Apartment concierges were at a ground floor 24 hours. They open the entrance door when you come home. Some of them can communicate in English. They are all kind and helpful.

Carmen was super kind and communicative host. Her indication was accurate and helpful. She kindly left an octopus card for visitors to charge and use. 

There is a washing machine in a listing but HongKong was too humid to dry laundry fast.  You can use a laundry shop next to the apartment. They wash and clean your laundry in a day.

The location was only a few minutes from a tram station. 
Walkable distance from Central and Causeway Bay. 

There are many towns in HongKong but I am totally satisfied with staying in Wanchai. 
Wanchai has modern skyscrapers, hipster attractions, and daily local markets and small restaurants.  St Francis street looked very sophisticated and I didn’t feel unsafe. In front of the apartment, there are rainbow stairs which looks like an Instagram shooting spot and a lot of foreign people were taking photos. If you are a vegetarian, I strongly recommend a restaurant “天然齋 Green Veggie” 15min from the apartment.

name: INSTAGRAM HOME *MTR*ELEMENT MALL*NEW TRAIN KOWLOON
summary: Fresh eyes on Kowloon and Upper House!! That is the place from where you want to explore an always exciting Hong Kong on Kowloon side. Elements Mall is just a 4 mins walk over the safe pedestrian bridge- always a glamorous distraction far away from home.   *Book 5 nights of stay and get 1 night FREE*   Promo period ends on December 2018
space: The family, your group of friends or couples who travel together will revel in this large three bedroom apartment with its sea views from the bedrooms, and in an apartment which boasts a 60 inch Samsung TV, a large dining table to enjoy dinner or breakfast, a fully equipped kitchen, well sized wardrobes in the bedrooms to enjoy privacy but there is much more to do than wonder and enjoy the apartment. Your host, a mother of two, is the very definition of a high-flier. She works for an international luxury homes property developer and travels around Europe and Asia while doing so. Take a seat at the dinner table in the separate corner of the living room, sprawl on the soft leather couch, or bring the groceries to light in the airy kitchen, equipped with all you could wish for. For American and European coffee lover -- you will even find a Nespresso Machine with a foam maker and capsules (besides a usual coffee machine) to start the day with your essential cup of coffee. In the master bed
