Take a seat at the dinner table in the separate corner of the living room,
neighborhood_overview: This enigmatic city of skyscrapers, ancient traditions and heavenly food will fascinate, whether it's your first visit or your 50th. Culture Beyond the glass and steel of Hong Kong’s commercial persona, the city also boasts a vibrant cultural scene that features the eclectic influences of its Chinese roots, colonial connections and a wondrous pool of homegrown talent. Here, you’re just as likely to find yourself applauding at Asia’s top film festival as joining in dawn taichi or reading the couplets of a local poet to the drumbeat of a dragon boat. Culture could also mean indie music under the stars, a classy art walk, your first Cantonese opera – not to mention the exhibitions and events staged year-round at the many museums and concert halls. Why I Love Hong Kong I love Hong Kong because it has a complexity that eludes definition, sometimes even by its own people. I can be soul-searching near the Chinese border, lunching with Sikhs at a Sikh temple, splurging on a set of kitchen kniv
notes: Please note that not every neighbor is happy about the New Sharing Economy. If we want them to understand the 21st century :-) we should respect normal house rules like: -no party after 10pm -be quiet in the staircase/hallway -don't ring at neighbours bell because you cannot find the key in your handbag -don't throw things out of the window, eg.  Although, the apartment is on a very high standard and equipped like a serviced apartment, I am still a private host but not a hotel with fully employed staff and a front desk. Me and my team are always happy to assist but can take time to follow your not so urgent request (like 1 more towel).  Well, in case that shiny Hotel style entrances and hallways are more important to you than an airbnb Hong Kong LOCAL apartment in a Hong Kong usual residential style apartment - you might want to look elsewhere. There is 24/7 video surveillance and the lifts are operating 24/7.  Just keep in mind it's NOT a new building but the building and environment
transit: HOW TO GET TO KOWLOON: By ferry The Kowloon waterfront at Tsim Sha Tsui Riding the Star Ferry from Central or Wan Chai ferry piers is considered a "must-do" for any traveller to Hong Kong. Not only is this the cheapest way to traverse the harbour, it's also the finest way to go sight-seeing, particularly at night, where you're surrounded by a wall of lights and skyscrapers on both sides. If you're feeling posh, you can pay fractionally more and travel as an upper-deck passenger. Alternatively, you can travel steerage and maybe get a glimpse into the noisy engine room. By train The Airport Express takes you to Kowloon MTR station in just 20 minutes. Most of Hong Kong's rail lines converge on Kowloon. If you are travelling from Hong Kong island, change at Admirality on the Island Line for the MTR to Tsim Sha Tsui from Hong Kong island. The MTR to Tsim Sha Tsui offers a faster service and is the most popular choice for commuters, so avoid Admiralty interchange during the rush hour (5 PM t
access: The entire apartment with all amenities is accessible for my guests. All closets are empty but full of hangers, you will find toiletries and hair dryers in the bathrooms. the kitchen is fully equipped with pots, pans, china, glasses and cutlery. Basics like tea, coffee, water, milk, and capsules for the Nespresso Machine are provided to make sure your arrival will be relaxed. Detergents for washing machine and dish washer are provided for a stay of 3 nights. My stand-by guest manager will happily provide more supplies on request for small additional costs.
interaction: I will respond to your questions within very short notice. My reservation team is online 24/7 and will always be able to assist in case I wouldn't be online  I am online while using the following tools: Airbnb thread, e-mail, phone or any mobile/computer Application such as Whats App, LINE, We Chat, Viber and etc.. Let me know your preferred communication tool.
house_rules: Please guys... no party without acknowledgment and confirmation, no smoking but only on the balcony/ garden, no drugs, eg. Besides the risk of losing your deposit (apartment gets checked after your check out) it would be sad to lose the apartment due to inappropriate behaviour. Again - please use your common sense. Although my apartment is well designed and complete - I want to set a clear expectation!    -streets in the area might be dirty -the area might be crowded -integrated into the residential building are shops and restaurants - complaints about smell of food in that building area wont be accepted. (my apartment is on the 4th floor and higher - you wont smell anything from a restaurant on ground floor).  - In HK its allowed to start refurbishments at any time without informing neighbors. Any noise complaints based on neighbours work in their apartment adjacent wont be accepted.)  - In case a lift would be out of order we cannot do more but informing and chasing the building mana

host.host_about: New mother of a healthy baby boy who loves to travel around the world. Been mostly to Asia and planning to venture to other places like London, Paris, and Rome.

reviews.comments: 出入方便,房东沟通无缝对接｡

This is a nice condo in Kawloon area. There are plenty of bars and restaurants walking distance and a Welcome supermarket open 24 hours, just one block away.
The unit is nicely decorated and Jessa Marie was very kind and helpful during the booking proccess. Mrs. Via, who welcomed us, was always available, as well.
The only  things we missed were some closets, because the bedrooms are tiny and there are not closets, although Via kindly brought us some hangers that we could hang on the wall hooks.
Also, the second bathroom has not a "real shower": there is a hand shower but no glass closure, which means that you are using all the toilette as a shower. If you are many guests, you can count only on one shower which can be a little insuficient.
All in all, we had a nice stay. Thank you Jessa Marie
房子的地理位置非常不错,离柯士甸地铁站很近,在文英街的文辉楼｡就在住宅区有一个点点心餐厅,里面的餐点非常棒!离廟街夜市也非常的近,去迪士尼,尖沙咀等都很方便!房屋的装修很现代,三个卧室两个卫生间一个厨房,一个大厅,住起来很舒适,特别适合家庭旅游租住｡房屋主人很热情,待人很热情,唯一遗憾的是不会中文,倒也问题不大!希望我的评论能为要租住这个房屋的游客有帮助,推荐入住!

convenient location. close to jordan mtr station, monkon station and tsim tsha tsui station. clean and quiet. especially latex mattress was good and comfortable.
very satisfied for everything. 
i will come again.
Beautiful place and good location. 100% recommended

My parents-in-law, husband and I had a wonderful time at the apartment. It was great to have the space to relax at home when it was raining and to have access to two bathrooms. The location is wonderful, with lots of great hole-in-the-wall restaurants nearby (which offer some relief from Hong Kong's crazy prices!). If you stay here, be sure to check out Dim Dim Sum and the Biang Biang noodles at Yau Yuen Siu Tsui (a michelin guide restaurant just across the street from the apartment)-- the best noodles I've ever eaten. 

The apartment is small but nicely furnished. Very clean. One thing to note is that the small kitchen has a stovetop and microwave, but no oven. Perfect for cooking a simple breakfast, but not really set up to cook an elaborate meal.

I'd definitely recommend this apartment as a great place to stay in Hong Kong, especially if you're looking for a less touristy location.

Spacious and extremely conveniently located. Had everything that I needed, comfortable begs and linens. During the typhoon we've had some issues with the toilets not flushing and the AC not working (most likely user error) and Jessa and her team were extremely prompt with responding and sending someone over. Issues were resolved within hours!! Fantastic place to stay
房东肯定是个很懂生活的人,房子装修的风格很美,厨房所需应有尽有,想得很周到,特别是床垫很舒服,非常适合一家人出行,服务很周到,房东也很耐心,很满意

It's a great experience living in Jessa's apartment in Hongkong and our family enjoyed a lot during the trip. The location is very convenient and close to the harbour city. The apartment is very clean and there's no problem in communicating with Jessa and her manager Kris. They are very warmhearted and polite. We had a good time in Jessa's apartment and wanna thank them again!
The owner is friendly and the booking process was so fast. I booked day -1 and yet she is okay with it. The place is clean and definetely will stay there when I get back!

It was really a pleasure having stayed at Jessa's apartment. Me and my family had a comfortable stay. Jesse and Kris have been very responsive to my concerns and made sure things were properly communicated. 

Special thanks to Kris who has been so accommodating and approachable.

Good points:
1) Apartment is conveniently located near MTR exit (less than 5-min walk)
2) A nearby supermarket to get your daily needs like water
3) A LOT of restaurants nearby including local eateries. There's even a Korean resto! (Seng Seng)
4) Strong water supply with instant hot water
5) Comfy beds and pillows
6) Well-equipped kitchen with a complete set of glassware
7) Umbrellas. It was raining on our 2nd day and the umbrellas came in handy.

Room for improvement:
1) Directions on how to get to the meeting place e.g. which exit to take from MTR exit as there were lots of exits
2) Standardised ON/OFF light switches
3) Working clock in at least one of the rooms, if not all

Thanks again Jessa and Kris! We would definitely recommend your apartment/s to our families and friends.

The apt is in the residental area but still near the metro station. There are many places for eating. The decoration and electronic appliance are convenient and comfortable. My cousin played PS3 everyday.  Enjoy the trip in HK very much.
位于庙街附近,出门非常方便,但是由于位于闹市区,周围的环境不是很好,是香港非常传统的住房｡房东布置的很漂亮,很用心,但希望卫生方面能再注意一点细节,例如厕所门口的地垫就不是很干净｡
We booked in at the last minute just before traveling, but Jessa was kind to give us a quick reply, so we were able to book in. The place and location was great! Thank you very much!

这间公寓很棒,无论是从前期沟通以及交通以及公寓环境来说,都比预设好一些｡交通很便利,乘坐机场快线到九龙,打个车就三十来块,所以非常ok｡环境也很好,虽然香港的大楼和电梯看着破旧(香港都这样几乎),但公寓里面很赞哦!!两个卫生间,三个房间,空间非常大!也很干净,厨房也很棒,但我们没机会用到,因为楼下很多很多吃的,点心店很多 哈哈哈!jessa是个非常nice的人,前期沟通回复很快,接待的经理kris也很不错,在指定地点等我们,也把公寓情况介绍很仔细｡总之体验不错哦,下次去人多的话还是会选择这里入住滴~

Jessa is very responsive and easy to work with! Our flight was delayed and we arrived rather late, but the apartment manager, Kris, kindly waited for us at the meeting point, which was quite easy to look up in the uber app. The location is great, very close to MTR. Because it is in a bustling area of the city, guests should have reasonable expectation for noise. We had a situation where our flight was very late in the evening of our checkout & another guest was coming so we couldn't leave our luggage. However, Jessa & Kris gave us a very smart recommendation to drop the luggage at the in city airport check-in, extremely convenient! Thank you Jessa and Kris!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Hong Kong logeant à l'appartement de Jessa dans le quartier de Kowloon. Ce dernier est idéalement placé (proche de 2 stations de métro, restaurants et commerçants à profusion autour de l'immeuble). L'appartement en lui-même est très fonctionnel, la literie en latex très confortable. 
Les points négatifs ont été l'absence de rideaux occultants dans les chambres (il fait jour vers 7h du matin). À cela s'est ajouté la présence d'un chantier au pied de l'immeuble, causant du bruit du lundi au samedi à partir de 8h du matin.
We spent a very nice time in Hong Kong sleeping in Jessa's flat in Kowloon. It is really well situated next to 2 tube stations, and restaurants and shops run all around the building. The flat in itself is really functional, the latex beds are very comfortable.
The only bad points were the lack of thick curtains in the bedrooms (sun rises à 7 o'clock in the morning). There were also a construction site next to the building, making noise starting at 8 o'clock in the morning, from mondays to saturdays.
房间干净整洁,设备齐全,地理位置优越,下楼就能吃到东西,离海港城比较近,步行过去就可以!

Jessa Marie is an amazing host! She was so helpful in so many ways to make our experience in Hong Kong the best it could be. She had someone meet us and run us through the whole apartment which was very helpful. The apartment is amazing and we are a family of five and we have plenty of rooms and bathrooms to accomodate us all. The apartment is very centrally located and there are so many great restaurants and things to do close by. There were lovely little touches in the apartment with snacks and flowers as well, and it was very clean and stylish. We would definitely stay here again and Jessa Marie made our stay fantastic.

Great apartment. It’s really big apartment for Hong Kong. Really good furniture and design. There are heaters in case it gets too cold. Because Hong Kong isn’t nice during winter.Good location. Mtr is near. Fresh market just round the corner.
I recommend the place.

这次是我们第一次到香港,尝试使用airbnb发现是一次很棒的体验｡Jessa的房子相比起中国内地的比较小,但是放在寸金寸土的香港来说就很大了,比一般的香港家庭的房子要大很多｡客厅和房间都很干净,厨房很多用具都很齐全,在厨房自己做饭没有问题｡插头很多,可以尽可能地给用电设备充电｡所在的街区离柯士甸地铁站很近,楼下有糖水铺烧烤铺,7-11和药店也有,早餐和夜宵是可以满足的,出行也十分方便｡房间里提供的Wi-Fi也很快｡美中不足的是浴室的水压不算很大,并且提供的被子便薄,搭配加热器使用在冬天大概需要穿保暖内衣加一两件衣服才能较好入睡｡房东一路上都很热情,guest manager也很热情,很耐心解答了一些问题,希望被子这样的小问题房东可以在之后解决一下,提供更好的体验｡
房間乾淨舒適､附近有非常多美食,房東也非常熱情,非常推薦｡
房间在香港来说已经是很大了,设施设备都很不错,干净整洁｡床睡得很舒服,比迪斯尼乐园酒店的床还舒服一些｡就是这是老房子,坐电梯的时候总是会有点惊吓...地理位置还算是很便利,离地铁站只有几百米｡总之,这是一次愉快的住宿体验｡谢谢Jessa Marie...
非常好的位置,购物和美食近在咫尺

This house is very good! quiet in the night,There are 5 minutes walk for The (Website hidden by Airbnb) very near.

house manager kris is so kindly.many restaurants on the 1floor

房子很好,走路去地铁站只要5分钟,很近,管家Kris人非常好｡房子1楼有很多饭店,晚上很安静｡
여럿이 가서 편하게 머물기 좋아요

I would say thank you to Jessa and Kris. Jessa is always give promote reply before our trip and give us corresponding info. And Kris is our guest manager, he is nice man and with patient~he bring us to the apartment and details introduce everything we need.
The Apartment is really great and convenient. There’s many restaurants downstairs and open till midnight. The location is nearly Austin station(walking 5 min.) Highly recommend
The house is very beautiful and quiet. The location is near metro station and easy to find. It is really worth to reside.
非常干净整洁,下次来还订这个!
一家人带孩子和两个老人出行,有3个卧室,完全够住｡再加上2个人也gou够了｡房间装修不错,干净,地理位置很好｡地铁站很近,转线方便,去哪里都方便｡楼下有很多吃的,美食一条街｡打车到维多利亚港30-40块｡非常建议人多去住｡
需要用英文沟通
Good location, friendly host and very quick respond time. Will rent from again.
公寓位置非常好,离九龙､佐敦站都很近,楼下小吃很多,煲仔饭和点点心很好吃,隆重推荐!管家Kris非常不错,安排的很好,设施交代的很清楚,最后离开的时候行李忘在公寓了,Kris马上安排司机送来,让我能及时赶上飞机,真的太贴心了!特别推荐这个公寓!
The house is very clean and beautiful.

The toilets were not working for a period of time, Jessa told me the building was doing the maintenance, both showers are  small I can understand, that’s Hong Kong, the 2nd shower the curtain keep getting on me when I was taking the shower, and when I turned I burned my back, my daughter was taking shower one time a lizard fell on her head she was screaming
This morning the shower was not working, I called the manager and followed the instructions the water was hot for a little while and turned to cold again, basically we had the cold shower this morning 
Besides that, the location is good, very convenient, lots of restaurants and shops around, Jessa was very good at replying emails, but I don’t think I’ll come back next time

My summary is this:
A very nice and well located Kowloon apartment, close to Austin Station,  clean, nice and well equipped. With the three bedrooms with double beds, two bathrooms (shower), a smart kitchen and a living-room with a sofa bed for two,  it was perfect for our family of six grown-ups. And we experienced a very nice and efficient conversation and fine service from Jessa Marie, Anwar (driver) and Kris (guest manager). 
It is near to subway, bus and railway, (and taxi) so public transport is easy and efficient. We bought Octopus cards for the public transport.
We found shops and restaurants around the corner and for products we looked for Tsim Sha Tsui nearby and a few subway stations away Mongkok with its open markets 
and focused shops. Like running shoes, clothes, photo equipments - whatever we looked for we found it. Then there is the Star Ferry or subway to Hongkong island, with shops, ware houses, Victoria Peak,  and a lot more to experience.
There are also a number of fine trekking paths on Hongkong island for example. We tried out the Dragon Back which is beautiful and somewhat demanding (if you are 80 like me).
In all, I can just highly recommend Jessa Marie's apartment! (And airbnb!)
And get some good walking shoes! Hongkong is worth it. I'd like to come back.
/Christer Ekman, Sweden

Great place! Lovely homey vibe, clean and easily accessible. Nearby has many great restaurants. If you are looking for “at home” feel in Hong Kong I think this is a great place to go for. Beds are comfortable enough and the water is HOT, which is good! Jessa, the owner, is very quick with replies and helpful informations.

처음이용해보는 에어비엔비라 걱정했지만 궁금한사항에 대해 호스트가 빠르게 답변해주었고 그에 신뢰감을 느꼈다.   숙소는 생각했던것보다 훨씬 깨끗했고 인테리어도 좋았다.  베개나 침구류도 마음에 들었고 주방엔 커피와  차 간단한 쿠키도 준비되어있어 마음껏 먹을수 있었다.  식기류도 분위기있고 준비해간 와인을 먹을때도 좋았다.
위치는 엘리먼츠몰과 연계된 구룡역에서 도보 15분정도 걸렸던 것 같고 마카오로 가는 페리터미널도 걸어서 15~20분 정도 걸렸던 같다.. 구룡역은 고속전철과도 연계되어  공항갈때도 편리하게 이용할수 있다.
홍콩이란 특성때문에 9명 전원이 사용하긴 다소 좁을수 있지만 그 인원에 대한 준비는 잘 되어있다.  우린 아주 만족스럽게 이용했고 누구에게라도 권하고 싶은 장소이다
참, 가능하면 체크인시간은 맞춰가면 좋을듯 하다...우리는 버스를 이용했는데 숙소를 못찾아  체크인시간 거의 2시간이 지나서  도착하는바람에  관리인(?)이 바깥에서 우릴 기다려주느라 넘 고생했다. 오랜시간 기다리면서 힘들었을텐데 짜증없이 친절히 대해줘서 구세주를 만난듯이 넘 고맙고 감사했다

Excellent and stylish interior design. Lots of eateries available throughout the day and night. The friendly security guard makes our day and provides good direction. Some nice parks around for morning walk and playground for kids to play

Great location if you want to stay in Kowloon, very close to Temple night market, MTR, and Kowloon CBD. Jessa & Kris are very quick in responding to your questions. The apartment is in good size, especially in Hong Kong. Rooms are clean and have most of everything.
Cool place! Nice and Modern internally. Good Location about 8 minutes walk from Elements and Kowloon station!

The location of the apartment is very good for shopping. The apartment is well equipped. The decoration is very new. Jessa was keep in touch with me around the vacation. Her manager- Kris was a professional resident manager. As the apartment near the road , and it was a little bit noisy at night, closing the window will be much quieter.

Beautiful home away from home with super soft bed and silky bed sheets, fully functional kitchen, ample entertainment (with PS and Apple TV). Kris was kind enough to introduce to us the gorgeous apartment thoroughly during our check in!

Great location with a few MTR within 10-15 mins walking distance. Although would recommend group with elderly to take 2 bus stops to Jorden station while  Kowloon station (with town check in) is accessible over the sky garden. Tons of awesome local food option just a few steps away from apartment (点点心!) 7 eleven and supermarket are also at the adjacent buildings

name: A lovely penthouse in the city center
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın: İspanya Konsolosluğu, Japonya Başkonsolosluğu, Metrocity, Kanyon AVM, SAFİR AVM, . Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: konum, manzara ve konfor. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar ve kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar için uygundur.
description: Mekanım şuraya yakın: İspanya Konsolosluğu, Japonya Başkonsolosluğu, Metrocity, Kanyon AVM, SAFİR AVM, . Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: konum, manzara ve konfor. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar ve kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar için uygundur. Evin her yerini kullanabilirler.
access: Evin her yerini kullanabilirler.
house_rules: No smoking inside, but in the balcony. Not available for a party or event. Guests wash dishes used by themselves. Bathroom towels belong to flat. No shoes in the apartment. Please make sure closing the main door while coming and going. I try to respect others and the environment Please try not to leave lights, electric appliances or water running unnecessarily. Thank you! Just keep in your mind it's a house not a hostel ;) If you have a question, a problem or an emergency, just contact me on the phone or email. I will respond as soon as possible. Welcome to İstanbul.

host.host_about:
I'm a designer. I'm living in 4.Levent which is known "business center" of Istanbul. I have a little penthouse where it's located in the middle of the tower blocks, the malls, subways and bus stops are within walking distance of my house. You can take a bus or subway easily where ever and when ever you want to go.
I try to make my life easier since the traffic is the biggest problem of Istanbul... I don't like the crowd and choas but I'm lucky to have the tiny lovely peaceful penthouse which has two rooms. I stay at the one of room. I sometimes spend time at outside because of working and hanging out. My guests can book up my room aswell if I don't sleep there.
I travel as much as possible. I really enjoy travelling and meeting new people&cultures. I love reading books, watching movies, learning and teaching, cooking and sharing, exploring, painting, walking and dancing like a crazy...
Something like that about me...
Hope to meet and host you with pleasure.

name: FloresRooms Mouzinho 2
summary: FloresRooms esta situado no coração da cidade do Porto. Na sua estadia pode desfrutar de um ambiente calmo e seguro, com todo o conforto. Tem disponível Internet  e TV , maquina de café , frigorífico, fogão, aquecimento central e microondas. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de a localização, as pessoas, o bairro, o ambiente e a zona exterior. O meu espaço é bom para casais e aventuras individuais.
space: FloresRooms é um apartamento renovado situado no coração do centro histórico do Porto. Este apartamento acomoda 2 pessoas. A cozinha esta equipada com máquina de café, micro-ondas, frigorífico, fogão e máquina de citrinos. Disponível também a tv e internet wireless. As roupas de cama, toalhas de banho e secador de cabelo são fornecidos por nós para que possa ter uma estadia tranquila. Nos dias mais frios tem sempre ao seu dispor aquecimento central, para que torne a sua estadia acolhedora.
description: FloresRooms esta situado no coração da cidade do Porto. Na sua estadia pode desfrutar de um ambiente calmo e seguro, com todo o conforto. Tem disponível Internet  e TV , maquina de café , frigorífico, fogão, aquecimento central e microondas. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de a localização, as pessoas, o bairro, o ambiente e a zona exterior. O meu espaço é bom para casais e aventuras individuais. FloresRooms é um apartamento renovado situado no coração do centro histórico do Porto. Este apartamento acomoda 2 pessoas. A cozinha esta equipada com máquina de café, micro-ondas, frigorífico, fogão e máquina de citrinos. Disponível também a tv e internet wireless. As roupas de cama, toalhas de banho e secador de cabelo são fornecidos por nós para que possa ter uma estadia tranquila. Nos dias mais frios tem sempre ao seu dispor aquecimento central, para que torne a sua estadia acolhedora. A sua chegada e durante a sua estadia estarei sempre disponível para o receber e dar-lhe algumas dicas
neighborhood_overview: A cidade do Porto está cheia de atrações turísticas. Mesmo pertinho temos a Estação de São Bento, a Igreja da Sé, a Praça da Liberdade, a Torre dos Clérigos, a Livraria Lello, o Museu da Fotografia, o Palácio da Bolsa, o Mercado do Bolhão, Rua Santa Catarina e sem esquecer a zona da Ribeira e muito mais… Do outro lado do rio, mas perto também, encontra o Cais de Gaia onde pode disfrutar de uma visita as caves do Vinho do Porto como também uma viagem de teleférico onde pode apreciar uma belíssima vista sobre a cidade do Porto. A 1 minuto do apartamento encontra agências de turismo, estação de metro, estação de comboio, praça de táxi, autocarros turísticos e tradicionais e parque de estacionamento. Se for apreciador de praia, a nossa cidade tem ótimos acessos às praias e á costa. Para uma saída noturna e sem complicações encontra a 5 minutos uma zona de bares e discotecas. E sem esquecer, esta zona esta privilegiada com variadíssimos restaurantes para que possa apreciar a fantástica comi
transit: Caso venha de avião tem sempre o metro ou táxi.  Se usar o metro , segue ate a  Estação da Trindade e ai tem de mudar de linha. Muda para a linha amarela sentido Santo Ovidio e sai em São Bento
interaction: A sua chegada e durante a sua estadia estarei sempre disponível para o receber e dar-lhe algumas dicas sobre a vida da cidade.
house_rules: Regras não há muitas, faça apenas como se fosse o seu lar.  Pedimos para que não fume dentro da casa.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
I loved the weekend in Porto and Andreia was very kind. The apartment is beautiful as  you see in the pics, excellent location and very close to the best restaurants and metro station. Walking distance to every important monuments.
5* and next visit i would stay here for sure!
Andreia was very kind and it was easy to communicate with her. The apartment was excellent with great location. We really enjoyed our stay there.
A Andreia foi muito prestavel, a casa estava muito limpa e corresponde exactamente as fotografias aqui colocadas. Experiência a repetir sem dúvida!
La casa es mucho más bonita que en las fotos y la ubicación excelente. Metro, tren, restaurantes, tiendas,... Todo al lado de casa. La limpieza y la atención son inmejorables.

Everything was perfect. The Location is more than perfect for anybody that wants to visit Porto. Also, the Metro and train Station are basically in front of the door. A very safe area in Porto. The apartment itself was very clean and had everything we needed. We felt like home right away. A very comfortable apartment and the view is amazing! What surprised me: it is very quiet at night and you don't get disturbed by the outside noise at all. 

Check-in and Check-out were very easy. Andreia is a very friendly host. We already booked Andreias apartment again for our next stay in Porto. Can't wait! 

German translation: 
Alles war perfekt. Das Apartment liegt super zentral und perfekt für jeden, der eine Städtereise nach Porto plant. Außerdem sind die Metro Station und der Bahnhof quasi vor der Tür. Ein sehr sicheres Viertel in Porto. Das Apartment selbst war sehr sauber und bot alles, was man benötigt. Wir haben uns sofort wie zu Hause gefühlt. Eine sehr gemütliche Wohnung und die Aussicht ist super. Zu meiner Überraschung stellte ich fest, dass die Wohnung sehr ruhig ist und man kaum Geräusche von draußen hört. 

Check-in und Check-out waren unkompliziert. Andreia ist eine sehr freundliche Gastgeberin. Wir haben für unsere nächste Porto Reise bereits erneut Andreias Apartment gebucht.

El apartamento precioso super limpio acogedor y céntrico!! Sin lugar a duda si volvemos repetiremos en el mismo..Andreia encantadora y en todo momento atenta de que todo estuviera bien..Te contesta los mensajes al momento..Todo de 10
Great location and caring host

Muy buen trato y amabilidad del anfitrión. La estancia muy buena, el apartamento se encuentra en una zona muy centrica lo que ayuda a hacer turismo y tener cerca restaurantes, tiendas y transporte, y la casa en muy buenas condiciones. Muy recomendable, y la ciudad preciosa.

They were already waiting for me when I arrived. So I could directly get into the appartement.
The location is on a main road but the bedroom is to the rear road and quiet. Very close to the train station so its easy to get there from the airport by train.

Ficamos na casa da Andreia durante tres noites e tudo se passou muito bem. A casa encontra-se numa localização ótima, muito central, estava muito limpa e tudo como nas fotos e na descrição.
Não encontramos Andreia pessoalmente mas ela sempre ficou à disposição da gente pelo telefone. Foi uma estadia muito boa. Recomendamos muito!
We had a great stay in Porto! Apartment had everything you need, small distance from restaurants, shops, and the river and Right near the train station! A little bit noisy at night though!
Días perfectos en pleno centro de Oporto, cercano a todos los sitios de interés. Apartamento muy nuevo y limpio. Si algún día volvemos a Oporto repetiremos. Gracias Andreia

Andreia ha sido super simpática y ha estado muy atenta con nosotros, ayudándonos en todo lo que hemos necesitado. El apartamento es muy acogedor y esta ubicado en el centro, a solo unos pasos del metro y con todo tipo de servicios cerca. Sin duda repetiríamos la experiencia!
This apartment just right near the Metro. You can go everywhere by walking distance. The house is lovely, clean and offers every everything you need. I will strongly recommend this house.
Highly recommend this place for everyone :). Nice, clean and cosy apartment in a very central place.
O apartamento estava limpo quando cheguei, com toalhas para todos os hospedes, roupas de cama limpas. Havia um papel com sugestão de restaurantes na cidade e turismo, muito interessante! Gostei muito

Un piso realmente destacable, con  inmejorable ubicación para conocer la ciudad, cerca de puntos de interés turístico, bares, supermercados, restaurantes,  y todo lo que se pueda necesitar.

Si eres vegetariano muy cerca tienes un restaurante realmente bueno con buffet y servicio de take away.

A pesar de estar en un lugar céntrico no se sienten ruidos molestos en la noche.  La calefacción funciona realmente bien!!! lo que le hace particularmente acogedor en inverno.

Es un piso al que de seguro volveremos!!

Muchas Gracias Andreia.

Andreia was very friendly and helpfull.

The apartment was beautiful and clean

The location was perfect for exploring the city

Andreia's place is a modern apartment, close to Sao Bento station (less than 1 min by walk). She provides towels, iron, hairdryer and the kitchen is well equipped too,  there isn't a pan though. If you go in winter time, the apartment has heating. It was a bit annoying because we didn't find out how to turn it off, but as it was very cold at night, it didn't really bother us. We didn't meet her but she provides you a paper with suggestions: bars, shops, restaurants, places to visit, also what you must try there. I highly recommend Andreia's place :)

Location is great, you can get almost anywhere within a 5 minute walk. Andreia was actually one of the most helpful guests I've ever had. The house was clean and tidy, and is not old fashioned. The Wi-if worked perfectly and I think I can say my stay couldn't have gone any better!
Well equipped flat in a great location to explore the city. The host was welcoming and helpful, especially when it came to restaurant recommendations.

Très bel appartement, quasiment neuf, très joliment meublé, très bien équipé  et d une très grande propreté. Parfaitement situé à 100 mètres environ de la gare de Sao Bento et du métro mais aussi des principaux sites à visiter, des rues commerçantes...
L accueil d Andreia a été très sympathique et elle nous a fournis une liste des commerces, des restaurants et des sites à visiter.
Appartement à recommander vivement pour un séjour dans cette superbe ville.

Tutto perfetto, Andreia è stata gentilissima, ci ha tenuto i bagagli sia prima del ceck-in che dopo il ceck out permettendoci di avere più tempo a disposizione per visitare Oporto. La casa è in una posizione perfetta tra la Ribeira e la zona dei locali. Consigliatissima.

Bel appartement refait à neuf et confortable, idéalement placé pour visiter Porto. Le métro se trouve à 1 minute à pied. L'accueil est chaleureux. Les propriétaires laissent à disposition une liste des choses à voir et des restaurants / bars. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
Appartement très bien rénové,  propre, confortable, situé à proximité d'absolument tout. Andreia très disponible, si besoin. J'y reviendrai sans hésiter.
Alles war super. Ich kann auf jeden Fall empfehlen. Die Wohnung und Badezimmer sauber, gemütlich.
Our stay in porto and in this appartement was absulutely amazing! Very clean and perfect place! Could not be better! Obigado
ADORAMOS TUDO. Apartamento excelente, A Andreia, A localização  conforto, A cidade, tudo é maravilhoso. Recomendamos com nota 10 com louvor
Чистые и очень приятные апартаменты в замечательном месте. Небольшая квартира со всем необходимым.
Muy buena localización para visitar la ciudad. Apartamento amplio y cómodo para dos personas. La anfitriona nos dejó una lista de restaurantes muy recomendables. Si hay oportunidad volveremos seguro.
El departamento es hermoso, y está ubicado cerca de todo. Me encantó

I had a vey nice stay in Andreia's flat. She has a high sense of hospitality. Her flat is very well-located at Sao Bento station: you can visit every area by walk. It is also really clean and well-designed. A flat to definitively recommend!
Piso céntrico, cómodo, limpio y súper útil. La anfitriona se merece un 10. Excelente calidad/ precio, volvería sin dudarlo a alquilarlo.

It was nice to stay at Andreia's place! It is really centrally located and super clean! It has a bathtub which is awesome and a big bed. Though it is really central you have to be prepared that it's not a super quiet place! Especially at night it got quite loud. Apart from that we can only recommend the place for your trip to Porto.
idéalement situé pour découvrir PORTO et ses quartiers

Sehr schönes, helles, hochwertig ausgestattetes Appartement mit idealer Lage im Herzen der Stadt mit Blick in die Fußgängerzone. Die helle Wohnung entspricht genau der Beschreibung, ist super sauber und mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht. Im Schlafzimmer gibt es sogar einen großen Kleiderschrank. Handtücher und Bettwäsche sind blütenweiß und appetitlich frisch.
Fast alle Sehenswürdigkeiten sind fußläufig zu erreichen. Das Appartement ist direkt an der lebhaften Fußgängerzone mit vielen Läden, Restaurants und Cafes und auch nur 1 Minute von der Metro und dem Bahnhof Sao Bento entfernt. Bei dieser Lage ist der Geräuschpegel leider auch nachts so hoch, dass man die Fenster zum Schlafen schließen muss. 
Vom Flughafen kann man mit der Metro (1x umsteigen) kostengünstig und schnell direkt bis vor die Haustüre fahren.
Schlüsselübergabe und Check-out waren völlig unkompliziert und schnell. 
DANKE, wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt.

Close from the trainstation and the subway this appartement is ideally located! The place is more than clean and beautiful, in a nice building in the old Porto, a little noise from outside (a lot of cafe/bars/restaurant) but that was not a problem for us. Andreia is a very good host and always available to answer to questions.
Très bel appartement, super propre et bien décoré. Idéalement situé dans la ville. Tout se fait à pied depuis celui-ci.

Best location in Porto, two steps from the train station! The apartment is impeccable and modern. Andreia was kind enough to help us arrange our arrival. Of course, being central, it can be noisy, so you might want to bring earplugs. I highly recommend it, and will certainly book it again if I go back to Porto.
Logement idéalement placé pour visiter à pied le centre ville, très propre et parfaitement décoré.

Quelques jours avant notre arrivée à Porto j'ai pris contact par mail avec Andreia pour préparer notre voyage, elle a répondu sitôt,toujours disponible. 
Une amie d'Andreia nous a accueilli avec plan et sites à visiter. L'appartement est conforme aux photos, mignon, propre et à proximité de tout. Seul bémol, le bruit la nuit mais cela ne nous a pas empêché de dormir. A recommander
Super easy check in, right in the centre (can be noisy, but comfy) . Andrea is lovely and very helpful and has great suggestions for where to go and eat

Le logement refait à neuf et de bon goût est en plein centre ville de Porto à côté de la gare Sao Bento, près du métro, proche d'un arrêt de bus, dans une rue très vivante avec beaucoup de commerces, mais qui peut avoir quelques désagréments si vous voulez un lieu calme
The apartment is so comfortable and well set up for a tourist. It is a huge bonues being so close to Sao Bento main station too.

Such a perfect stay! Many thanks to Andreia. Where to start with?! 
Getting to the property from the airport by public transport was easy, cheap and quick enough. Andreia was waiting for us in her lovely coffee shop and she accompanied us to the property. 
She was very attentive and even provide us with a super useful list of what to see and where to eat (please note about "francesinha"!!! Ñam ñam).
The property was more than perfect regarding location. We didn't need to walk more than 15min to the best spots in town.
Even tough we read some reviews about being noisy at night, we didn't find a problem with it; we had a really fun guy playing "street karaoke" just downstairs and we even joined him from the balcony.
We loved every part of our stay in Porto and Andreia's flat is a great find. We definitely recommend it to anyone visting the amazing city of Porto! 
Thanks Andreia
Ausgezeichnete Unterkunft an top Lage! Die Wohnung ist Sauber und super ausgerüstet. Die Übergabe lief ebenfalls ohne Probleme ab. Ich würde die Unterkunft auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen!

The apartment is fresh, light and modern. Despite not having aircon the hostess kindly provides a fan which works perfectly, was very welcoming and gave suggestions on where to eat/go. Perfect location, across from the train station in a lively local part of Porto; noise is not an issue when sleeping however. Would definitely recommend

Super séjour ! L'appartement en plein centre est idéal et nous a permis de découvrir Porto en détail avec les conseils d'Andreia ! :) 
Nous reviendrons ! 
France & Geoffroy
Parfait! Très bien situé et à proximité du métro, bus en bas qui permet un accès direct jusqu'à la plage la plus proche de Lisbonne
The location could not be better.  Central to the train station, bus stops, waterfront and all key neighbourhoods. The juliet balconies add beauty and breeze to the apartment. Highly recommend!
Amazingly central and a lovely space with all you need to escape the hustle and bustle of Sao Bento.

La ubicación es perfecta , en pleno centro neurálgico de la ciudad , solo decir q la hora de la siesta es imposible , siempre había músicos tocando en la calle . Andreia estupenda , atendió a todas mis preguntas y flexible en la hora  de entrada al apartamento , nos dejó entrar antes de la hora.
Luminoso, cuidado y limpio .

Die Wohnung ist wunderschön und sehr sauber. Sie liegt sehr zentral und somit perfekt für einen Städtetrip nach Porto. Andreia ist eine sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin, die uns zudem noch sehr gute Restauranttipps gegeben hat. Wir würden dieses Appartement jederzeit wieder buchen!
Perfect place for a great stay in Porto. The apartment is very nice and well located to visit all the main spots of the city. Andreia has been precise and punctual.

Appartemento situato nel centro di Porto dove si può fare tutto a piedi, posto pulito, un po' rumoroso (vicino a via pedonale +macchine). Soggiorno molto piacevole, Andreia è stata accogliente e disponibile. Grazie!
Nice flat! Very cozy and light apartments!
The place was the very best and the location was excellent for a perfect feeling of porto.

The apartment is in a good location, close to transport, restaurants and less than a 10 minute walk to the river. Being so central you can expect some noise from people on the streets below. The apartment was modern and had everything we needed. Thanks for a great stay in Porto!
Location location location ..... the apartment is identical as it has been described. Everything went smooth .thanks much Andreia

localização perfeita. perto de tudo. as acomodações sao excelentes apartamento confortável de facil uso. muito bom. pertissimo de restaurantes cafes. 8 minutos andando ate o Cais da Ribeira. pertodo metroe da estacao Sao Bento.
Fantastic central apartment. Great location close to station. Andreia is really helpful. Great suggestions for bars and food.

El apartamento muy limpio, muy céntrico y acogedor. Andreia siempre muy pendiente de todo lo que necesitáramos. La verdad que es nuestra primera vez con airbnb y perfecto sin duda cuando vuelva a Oporto escogeré este alojamiento.

the flat is just as described, and communication with Andreia has been very easy and friendly. She and her family are really helpful and it’s been a pleasure staying at their place. The streets are a bit noisy, it is a very lively neighbourhood, it did not bother me at all but it’s worth knowing. I would recommend this flat with no hesitation.

Super logement conforme aux photos. Situé en plein cœur de porto et à deux pas de la gare, idéal pour tout faire à pied. Le quartier est vivant et l appartement est équipé au moindre détail. Allez y les yeux fermés!
Es un gran lugar, cerca de todo. El departamento es muy cómodo y nos dieron buenos consejos para nuestra estancia. ¡Totalmente recomendado!

El apartamento de Andreia tiene una ubicación inmejorable, cerca de todos los puntos de interés. Quedamos con ella en una cafetería muy cercana donde ella trabaja por lo que el check in fue muy rápido y sencillo. Nos proporcionó una guía con información muy útil sobre puntos turísticos, restaurantes... 
El apartamento es muy bonito, dispone de todos los servicios necesarios y es  ideal para dos personas.
Great location and very comfortable clean flat! Enjoyed very much. Will definitely stay again next time visit Porto. Recommend
Great place, very nice location, thank you very much !!!

Very clean and well furnished and in a perfect location very near Sao Bento station. Andreia gave us a useful information sheet and good suggestions about what to see and where to eat. The family cafe nearby was great and we were given a discount. The only negative was it was a bit noisy at night and too hot to sleep with the windows shut.
Cuando vuelva a Oporto quiero volver a casa de Andreia! El apartamento  estupendo y en muy muy buena localización. Los dueños ayudan en todo lo que pueden y contestan muy rápido! AIR BnB de 10.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'appartement d'Andreia et son accueil.
Son emplacement idéal dans un quartier très vivant et central permet de visiter le Porto pittoresque à pied.
Très content de notre séjour, avec en plus le soleil au rendez vous. 
À réserver sans hésitation !
O apartamento é maravilhoso! Tem tudo que uma pessoa precisa, além de ser lindo. A localização então nem se fala: bem no centro do Porto. Tudo muito limpo, organizado, charmoso. Recomendo muito!

Andreia’s apartment is in an ideal location to explore Porto. The apartment is clean, modern and spacious for a couple. Communication leading up to and throughout our stay was fantastic. Would definitely recommend!

Excellent apartment. Very highly recommended. 
Great location, modern, exceptionally clean flat. Very well-equipped. Excellent host.

Andreia's place is fantastic for the price. It's a good size, has all the amenities you would need and is clean and well equipped. There is some noise but thats expected in such a central amazing location. If it's something that bothers you bring some earplugs (or end the night with a big glass of port!) for the price this place is an absolute steal. The apartment is in the best location in Porto. Everything is in walking distance. Thanks Andreia, we would love to come back soon!

Really enjoyed our stay in this lovely appartment in Porto. Location is great, located in the centre of porto near the river, shops and nice restaurants. Appartment looks like it is brand new. Would definitely recommend it to everyone.

Die Wohnung war super schön! Groß, hell, sauber und absolut zentral gelegen! Der Balkon ging in Richtung einer belebten Fußgängerzone, dennoch war es für uns nie zu laut. Auch Check-in und Check-out klappten super. :)

INMEJORABLE

El apartamento no podía ser mejor. Al lado de la estación de Sao Bento, muy cerca de comercios, a pocos minutos de la Catedral de Oporto, de la Ribeira... Absolutamente equipado, tiene de todo (horno, tostador, cafetera, menaje de cocina, secador de pelo... incluso Andreia tuvo el detalle de dejarnos café y té para nuestra estancia!). Además, para gente friolera como yo, el apartamento posee sistemas de calefacción que hacen que la casa esté calentita todo el tiempo. Muy limpio y cómodo, lo recomendamos 100%

Andreia es muy atenta y nos dejó una lista de recomendaciones tanto de lugares para visitar, como de ocio y restaurantes en Oporto. Sin duda, repetiremos la próxima vez con ella.

L'appartement est idéalement situé. Tout peux se faire à pieds. 
Propreté parfaite, très bien décoré. 

Nous avons passé un excellent week-end dans l'appartement d'Andreia.

Recomendo o apartamento da Andreia. Muita facilidade a tudo. Tanto a pé qto de comboios e metro
Tudo muito limpo e com muito capricho
Muito confortável, limpo, acolhedor e bem localizado!
a very nice place with good location, every local points are in walking distance. the host is very friendly and very helpful. totally recommend this place! we are very satisfied!
Great space, centrally located, quite a large 1 bedroom that seems recently updated

Leiligheten var utrolig fin med perfekt beliggenhet for å oppdage Porto og den anbefales på det sterkeste. Andreia var fleksibel på innsjekk og utsjekk, og vi kom til en skinnende ren leilighet med alle fasiliteter tilgjengelig :)
Apartamento muy cómodo y muy bien equipado con inmejorable ubicación. Merece realmente la pena alojarse aquí.

We have been at Andreia´s place for 4 days. I have to say that location in a 10 out of 10, as well as the cleanliness and attention to detail. The only issue to take in consideration, is the late check-in, that you must pay 15€ if you arrive later than the 21H. Other than that, 5*. Thanks for everything Andreia.
Un excellent séjour, au cœur de porto. L’appartement d’Andreia est vraiment idéalement placé!

Andreia’s place is very central, easily walkable to River area and Clerigos tower. Many restaurants within a few minutes walk and Sao Bento metro 100 yards or so. Apartment was very clean and tidy, nicely decorated. Kitchen area more than adequate. We had a great trip in this cosy apartment to the city of Porto :)

Appartement très propre, encore mieux que sur les photos. Dommage qu il soit extrêmement bruyant. Etant situé dans un quartier vivant, il y a du bruit en permanence. Contact sympa malgré la barrière de la langue.
Nice place good location would recommend to anyone

L'appartement d'Andreia est très bien situé pour découvrir Porto,  en haut d'une artère stratégique. A 2 min de la très belle gare de Sao Bento où prendre le métro pour venir/ partir à l'aéroport. Et à 7-8 min ( en descente) du magnifique port de Porto. 
Le centre historique de Porto se découvre à pied et les distances ne sont vraiment pas grandes, ce qui fait du logement d'Andréia, situé quasiment au milieu des trois quartiers les plus intéressants de la ville, un très bon pied à terre ! 
L'appartement est très propre, avec une très bonne literie et une salle de bain impeccable ! Un peu bruyant le matin, mais rien de terrible. 
Andreia est une hôtesse discrète mais cela nous convient parfaitement !
Simply PERFECT! Very clean, the best location ever, a homy atmosphere and a great bed!

Tivemos uma estadia muito agradável, gostámos muito! Excelente localização, boas áreas e decoração. As fotos correspondem a realidade. Apartamento ideal para duas pessoas A Andreia é super simpática e deu-nos algumas dicas sobre o que visitar e os melhores sítios para se comer la no Porto. Recomendo!

L'appartamento è in una zona centrale a due passi dalla cattedrale e dal fantastico ponte che porta verso la zona delle cantine di porto. Perfetto per due persone c'è tutto il necessario. La pulizia perfetta. Andreia ha risposto sempre e velocemente a tutte le richieste.
Amazing central located place. Clean and nice. We really enjoyed our stay in Porto. Everything is close to this apartment.

Appartement très bien situé, situation idéale pour visiter Porto. Propreté des lieux, tout confort. Nous avons bien apprécié. De plus, Andreia est réactive lors de nos échanges. Je conseille fortement ce logement.
Perfectly located apartment. Right across the street from Sao Bento train station and close to absolutely everything. The place was very clean and exceeded all of our expectations.

This is such a great apartment! Super central, spacious for two, so lovely to be in. Andreia let us check out later so we could leave our bags and was really helpful at check in. Would definitely return!

Andreia’s apartment is located in a very central position, close to the city center and to the city’s main attractions. It is also very cozy and perfect for a couple. Andreia promptly answered to all my questions, she was also available when I asked her to stay one night more (in the end not necessary) because my flight was cancelled.
Thank you, Andreia!

L’appartement est très agréable et très bien situé, proche de la gare et des bus touristiques , c’est parfait. De plus, il est bien équipé et vraiment très propre comme on peut le voir sur les photos. Il est effectivement un peu bruyant mais ce n’était vraiment pas un problème pour nous. Nous avons aussi découvert juste à côté un super petit resto Pestiqueira Voltaria , a tester !

This apartment was a joy to come back to at the end of the day- and even veg in for the whole day if you wanted to. For light or late sleepers there’s a bit of noise from outside but for us the quality and location of the apartment outweighed this! I would say if this is in your budget book book book :)

This is a great place in the perfect location!

Andreia's flat is the perfect place to explore Porto. The flat is clean, bright, comfortable, and in a fantastic location. Food, sights, and transportation (including the train station) are all within a block, and getting down to the waterfront, the famous churches, or even the spectacular Port houses across the river are all just a few minutes' walk away. And the best nata we had in Porto is literally directly across the street. (Yup, you don't have to go to Lisbon to get great nata!)

Andreia allowed us to check in after midnight (for a reasonable fee), and even left us a bottle of delicious Portuguese wine as a welcome gift.
El apartamento está genial equipado y en cuanto a la ubicación está en todo el centro, pilla tod cerca, nuestra estancia mejor imposible, si volvemos repetiremos en este apartamento :)

Wunderbare Wohnung in zentraler Lage mit einem schönen Balkon 
und sehr geräumig. 
São Bento Station, Kathedrale Sé sowie andere Sehenswürdigkeiten sind 10-15 Minuten zu Fuß.
Andreia wartete zur vereinbarten Zeit auf uns und half uns in allem, was sie konnte, sie hat uns eine Liste von Bars und Restaurants gegeben, die sehr nützlich war. Sehr empfehlenswerte location!

Logement pour deux idéalement situé pour visiter à pied le centre historique de Porto, à 50 mètres de la gare Sao Bento. Chambre donnant sur la Rua de Flores, rue piétonne, très vivante, bruyante en journée mais relativement calme la nuit, commerces et restaurants au pied de l’immeuble.
L’équipement du logement est neuf, standard et suffisant, bonne literie et propreté irréprochable.
Andreia est très sympathique et disponible; sa liste des lieux à visiter et des restaurants à ne (surtout) pas manquer et très utile.
Excellent rapport qualité/prix.
Nous recommandons fortement.
Amazing place. Highly recommend!
O apartamento é extremamente charmoso e muito bem localizado. Muito poucos metros do metrô e comboio. Excelente!

Andreia's apartment is located in a beautifully restored building in the centre of Porto,  situated between a pedestrian street , Rue das Flores and Rue das Mouzinho da Silva .  You can  see the Sao Bento station from your  window.   The location is excellent.   It is easy walking distance to most sights.  To access the apartment you must walk up 2 flights of stairs.  The apartment is spacious and beautifully decorated, perfect for a couple.   The host was very accommodating  with check-in and prompt to respond to messages.  I highly recommend .

L'appartamento è in una posizione eccezionale. Centrale ma silenziosissimo. Accogliente e completo di tutto. Andreaia è gentile e precisa e ci ha dato informazioni perfette.
Consiglierò a tutti gli amici questa sistemazione.
Grazie Andreia.
Comfortably space with lots of windows and light. Great location. We would recommend it to other travelers.

Sehr zentral gelegen und Bahnhaltestellen so gut wie direkt vor der Haustüre. Super saubere und schöne Wohnung. Einfache und schnelle Kommunikation mit der Gastgeberin. Jedoch durchaus massive Geräuschkulisse. Alles in allem hatten wir einen wirklich schönen Aufenthalt in Andreias Unterkunft.

Andreia is agreat host - professional and well organised to help guests enjoy their stay. Very modern and stylish apartment, bright and light. You couldn’t ask for a better location. It was a little noisy but that is the trade off for the location. Closing the shutters at night helps. Highly recommend.
Alloggio in posizione strategica e molto curato

This apartment is amazing, the location is exactly where you will want to stay in Porto. Right beside Sao Bento and right in front of a hip pedestrian street with lots of great shops and cafes. Andreia was always extremely quick (always within 30 mins) with responses and gave a number of suggestions for restaurants, attractions and shops to check out. We found the bed to be a bit hard, but that could be our personal preference.

Andreia é uma excelente anfitriã. Atenciosa, prestativa e gentil. Respondeu prontamente todas as mensagens, deu dicas dos pontos turísticos, restaurantes e serviços locais. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, limpo, ventilado e luminoso. Espero hospedar-me novamente no mesmo local quando voltar ao Porto.

El día que vuelva a Oporto, regresaré a este apartamento sin duda. Aunque la hora de entrada es a las 15:00, Andreia es muy flexible y se pone en contacto contigo para organizar la llegada. Además te da una lista con sugerencias para visitar,  hacer compras, comer y probar platos típicos de Oporto. Además es muy atenta, pues la ducha se estropeó y ese mismo día a las 2 horas de comunicárselo ya nos había instalado una nueva. Es inmejorable.

Andreia in a very friendly host and taking care of her guests. Check-in and out was done with ease, even though done by a family member, so we didn’t get to know Andreia in person. She provided us with plenty of information about the surrounding city. The apartment is very neat and chic and located in the centre of pretty much everything you’d like to see in Porto. Though it can get a bit loud in the adjacent streets, I’d definitely recommend this location for a city trip!
Thank you Andreia!

The apt is really well placed in centre town!
Just in front of train station and car parking.
Andreaia is really kind and she speaks a really good english (not so easy to find in Porto)
She gave us all infos to visit Porto!
The apt was really clean and with everything you need!
Just one point, there isn’t air conditioned and in the hot summer’ nights it’s a problem cause you can’t sleep with windows open... the street it’s too noisy!
At least...perfect experience!
Bel accueil. Bel endroit. Bien situé. Immaculé. Je recommande vivement!

I had a wonderful stay in Porto thanks to this flat!

The location is perfect, very close to the train station and right in between the Ribeira and Baixa. All interesting sites can be reached by foot in less than 10 min.

The flat is in very good condition and well equipped, with a nice little balcony on Rua da Flores.

Andreia was kind and very reactive!

I recommend without doubts!
Excelente ubicación, apartamento entero muy acogedor y agradable. Si vuelvo a Oporto espero poder repetir en este alojamiento

Un grand merci à Andreia qui est une hôte tout à fait disponible et dont l'accueil a été excellent. L'appartement quant à lui est idéalement situé au coeur de Porto, d'une grande propreté et d'un grand confort. Vivement recommandé !

포르투는 거의 언덕이라서 무거운 캐리어 끌고 다니기 쉬운 상벤투 역 근처로 했어요. 정말 상벤투역에서 1분거리예요 모든 중심가는 걸어서 5~10분 거리구요 지나가다가 숙소에서 쉬었다가 또 나가고 하기 정말 좋았어요. 집이 정말 깨끗합니다!! 중심지역이라 늦게 까지 시끄러운건 어쩔수 없는것 같아요. 호스트에게 엑스트라 타월 요구하니 바로 가져다 주셨구요. 덕분에 너무 좋은 여행이었어요!
good location. but too noisy because of the construction outside.
Céntrico y muy limpio

Highly recommend this place, it's a stones throw from Sao Bento station and only 10 mins walk to the river. The apartment was sparkling clean and very nicely furnished. Check in and communication both great. It was a bit noisy outside in the morning but not too bad considering how central the location is. I'd definitely stay here again
This is a lovely apartment that is very well appointed and stylish. The location is perfect to see this beautiful city. Very clean. Bed is overly firm. Great info sheet with tips and recommendations.
Great place and location! Wonderful host! Definately will return soon.

Amazing place! Andreia was amazing! Met us for check in and gave us a list of the best restaurants, shops, sights to see and a ton more! The place itself was a dream! Centrally located and walking distance to everything. Windows opening on both sides of the apartment to the beautiful streets of Porto! Great space and very clean! Would 100% stay again!

This is a great apartment, right in the middle of everything. The apartment was spotless! Communication was easy. Andreia was very responsive and patient as our arrival time changed a few times due to delays with the train. Great place - I highly recommend it!

A brilliant stay - super clean, fantastic location, great tips.

We were amazed and the value and hospitality. Thanks so much’

le meilleur emplacement pour visiter Le centre historique de Porto. À 10 min a pieds de cais ribiera. À côté du métro et de la gare Sao Bento. Le bus 500 t'amène dans le quartier Foz Douro et te ramène devant la porte. L'édifice est tranquille mais c'est un peu bruyant le soir. y tout ce qu'il faut sur place pour se cuisiner un bon repas. je vous le conseille.
Obrigado

Location couldnt be better. Literally steps from the main train station, as well as walking distance to shops, restaurants, wineries, markets and the waterfront. Andrei provided us with a list of recommendations while there and provided us with prompt answers with any of our questions/concerns. We would 100% recommend this Airbnb for absolutely anyone visiting Porto for the first time.
위치도 너무 좋았고 집도 깨끗하고 깔끔해서 너무 좋았습니다.

Andreia's apartment was perfect and made the stay in Porto better than we could expect. Andreia greeted us with a big smile and a desire to help. She explained to us about the apartment, Porto and everything we asked for. The location of the apartment is amazing, right in the center of town, close to everything. Bright apartment, well equipped and very homey. Andreia is a wonderful hostess, helping even things beyond. Highly recommend!!

This apartment is fantastic! It’s better than the photos make it look. We stayed here for 2 nights and highly recommend it. It is steps from the train station and walking distance to all the sights. It sits on the street with all the best restaurants. We also appreciated Andreia’s recommendations!

Amazing location, very nice place, great host.
To be recommended. The flat was as on the photos and spotless.
Thank you Andreia

Superbe logement pour découvrir la ville de Porto à pied, super localisation, l'appartement était impeccable et Andreia est très arrangeante ; petit plus, elle fournit une liste d'adresses à ne pas manquer... Bref, au top !

Andreia’s apartment is in a very good location. Near to The Most important monuments and attractions of Porto. Very clean and with all the necessaries confort, the aprtment is pretty new in an elegant building. Andreia was very kind and accepted to check-in us 1h and a half before. She left us a lot of informations and was very fast in her responses through the app. Definetly reccomended!!!

O apartamento é muito bem cuidado e limpo, muito caprichado na decoração proporcionando um ambiente acolhedor. O aquecimento foi essencial e funcionando sem problemas. Além destes destaques tem o contato imediato com a Andreia e Hugo para eventuais dúvidas e o lugar estratégico ao lado da estação São Bento. Altamente recomendado.
The space was great for a couple travelling and the location was excellent. Andreia left us some notes on Porto which was very helpful.

Andreia's space is great for a solo traveler or a couple. The location is excellent, very close to the train station, restaurants, and shops. The apartment itself was exceptionally clean. Wifi worked well, TV had several cable options to choose from,  bathroom was spacious, and there was plenty of hot water for showering. Andreia was easy to reach through the Airbnb app for communication leading up to our stay. If I can make two recommendations for the future, I would suggest making the bed a bit more comfortable, it felt like we were sleeping on a pull-out couch; which is fine for a few nights, but over time this may not be ideal for longer stays. Secondly, while we appreciated having the nice amenity to make coffee in the mornings with the espresso maker, we were only given a few 'pods' to make coffee, so we were not able to use this amenity for the duration of our stay. Other than that, this is a wonderful, convenient, and accessible apartment to stay in, and enjoy the city of Porto!
O apartamento é excelente e muito bem localizado! Fica próximo de atrações turísticas e de transporte público! Minha melhor hospedagem em Portugal.

Fantastic location less than a block from Sao Bento station. It was perfect for two people. Close to everything in Porto. Loved the balcony and windows on either end of the apartment. If you're a light sleeper, bring earplugs. Perfect place to stay when in Porto.
Buena ubicación, muy limpio y edifico renovado.

Unterkunft war größer als erwartet und geräumig, Angaben stimmen alle, Gastgeberin ist superschnell bei Rückfragen und sehr hilfsbereit; Lage top - direkt an der Metro, Bus und Bahn; man muss sich bewusst sein, dass man Innenstadtlage hat, weshalb es lauter ist, aber das steht auch so in der Beschreibung; aufgrund der Jahreszeit war es allerdings dafür recht ruhig; auf jeden Fall empfehlenswert!

A estadia foi óptima! O apartamento está extremamente bem localizado, sendo perto de tudo e é bastante acolhedor e confortável. A Andreia foi uma óptima anfitriã, ajudando sempre que necessário. Recomendo!

Such a nice position, despite the loud traffic we could sleep without any problem! The apartment is amazing, the city is amazing and Andreia is a very nice person! We didn’t meet her but her directions were on point!
O apartamento é bonito, novo, claro e confortável. A localização é perfeita para tudo que você quiser fazer no Porto. Recomendo!

Andreas Apt exceeded our expectations in every way. Great location in the center of Porto. The heat worked great... we were there over New Year...  Just a great place.
Lots of fresh towels.. super clean wow !!

El piso es exacto a cómo indica:limpio, cómodo, bonito y en el centro, se encuentra a un minuto andando de la estación de tren. 
Andreia es amable y atenta. Nos ayudó en todo lo que pudo.
Séjour très agréable.Super appartement. Je le recommande! Hyper bien situé. Rien à redire. Hôte très professionnelle
샹벤투역 나와서 진짜 바로 있어요 위치가 깡패에요...! 조금 일찍 체크인 하려고 하니 원래는 안되는 것 같았는데 어머니께 부탁드려서 해주시더라고용 글고 라디에이터 트는 방법 몰라서 밤에 연락하고 그랬는데 친절하게 답변 해주고 그래서 넘나 맘에드는 숙소였습니당 :) 숙소 바로 옆에 있는 음식점도 맛나서 두번이나 갔어요 !
It is a great place. Nice apartment in the city center but still quiet. Perfect for a couple. Super contact with the owner, Andreia is very helpful.
Apartamento muy céntrico y limpio, Andreia contestó todas nuestras dudas al momento y nuestra estancia fue muy agradable. Es más amplio de lo que parece en las fotos.

Amazing! Would definitely recommend this apartment to anybody visiting Porto who likes to be right at the heart of the action! Amazing location - we were able to walk to all of the major sight seeing destinations. Great value for money, and spotlessly clean!

name: İstanbul Taksim Tarihi binada oda
summary: Tugla duvarlı,sevimli sıcak bir oda,istiklal caddesine 100 mt..Tarihi sokakta tarihi binada manzaralı yatak odası.
description: Tugla duvarlı,sevimli sıcak bir oda,istiklal caddesine 100 mt..Tarihi sokakta tarihi binada manzaralı yatak odası.
