host.host_about: Kalıcı Makyaj uzmanı,Sanat dostu,neşeli ve eğlenceli..Misafirperver..

name: sunny 2 bedroom close to Bosphorus
summary: The apartment is located at the very best location in Arnavutköy, not so close to the noise on the seaside but a bit inside. The building has a terrace for many uses.
description: The apartment is located at the very best location in Arnavutköy, not so close to the noise on the seaside but a bit inside. The building has a terrace for many uses. They can access anywhere except my room when I'm in there doing private stuff. We'll be friends, housemates, you're not a customer. It's just that the place has an expense and a value so I should cover it, no?
access: They can access anywhere except my room when I'm in there doing private stuff.
interaction: We'll be friends, housemates, you're not a customer. It's just that the place has an expense and a value so I should cover it, no?
house_rules: There is a cat in the house. You aren't allowed to hurt it. And also, you need to be careful with the doors&windows, not letting the cat out.

host.host_about:
Başar Family

Gülder (mother): Owner of ARBA Food. Ltd. Co., Ankara. Graduate: Management, Middle East Technical University
Arda (son): Unemployed. Graduate: Civil Engineering, Boğaziçi University
Aras (son): Works at The Princeton Review, Ankara. Graduate: Civil Engineering, İstanbul Technical University-State University of New York
Fırat (father): Co-owner of ARBA Food Co. Ltd. Graduate: English Language and Literature, Hacettepe University


We have together and individually traveled to a lot of countries all around the world. We love interacting with locals for local foods, traditions, music etc. to further understand ourselves and import new meanings to our own lives, which, in turn, enriches everybody around us.

We have hosted wonderful people. None caused big issues, and none had issues with us. We are more prone to sharing experiences, rather than doing business, because, I guess we are early adopters of Airbnb. Our house is not like an hotel room. With us generally around, you will make the most out of the neighborhood, perhaps İstanbul and maybe even Turkey.

We are also very understanding guests with usually basic needs; but with the taste of certain sociocultural rules, mixed with a certain amount of humor. We basically expect what is written on your page to be correct; because then, we will be aware of the shortcomings as well, and act accordingly.

reviews.comments: The district was very calm, and there were two supermarkets within a minute of walking which can provide whatever you lack. Arda was very kind and helpful, and the house has everything you may need during your accomodation. My only concern was the cat, but she ignores you unless you call her :)
Tek kelimeyle mükemmel diyebilirim, evin toplu taşımaya ve sahile yakın oluşu çok büyük bir avantaj.
A silent room near the Bosphorus. Aras very helpful person. Thank you Aras.

name: Park slope,  floor through garden apartment
summary: We are one block away from beautiful prospect park and one block away from the 7th Avenue shopping district.  We have a newly renovated ground floor apartment with a lovely back yard.  There are brand new appliances, elegant high ceilings, and an open space layout.  It is a complete floor through apartment with a large living area that leads into an open kitchen.  We have a beautifully tiled walk in shower. The apartment opens up to an outdoor space with a beautiful garden
space: The space is an older limestone with high ceilings and lovely dimensions.  The space opens to the outdoors and in the spring/summer/fall is a wonderful place to have coffee/tea and/or grill out in the evenings.
description: We are one block away from beautiful prospect park and one block away from the 7th Avenue shopping district.  We have a newly renovated ground floor apartment with a lovely back yard.  There are brand new appliances, elegant high ceilings, and an open space layout.  It is a complete floor through apartment with a large living area that leads into an open kitchen.  We have a beautifully tiled walk in shower. The apartment opens up to an outdoor space with a beautiful garden The space is an older limestone with high ceilings and lovely dimensions.  The space opens to the outdoors and in the spring/summer/fall is a wonderful place to have coffee/tea and/or grill out in the evenings. guests have full use of the back yard. Park Slope is well known for its elegant brownstones and proximity to Prospect Park.  It is a lovely neighborhood with easy access into NY City.  Brooklyn has a great restaurant scene, tons of strollers, and a vibrant and active nightlife. We are close to the B, Q, 2, and
neighborhood_overview: Park Slope is well known for its elegant brownstones and proximity to Prospect Park.  It is a lovely neighborhood with easy access into NY City.  Brooklyn has a great restaurant scene, tons of strollers, and a vibrant and active nightlife.
transit: We are close to the B, Q, 2, and F trains.
access: guests have full use of the back yard.
house_rules: If you have a dog, we request that you not allow them in the backyard to prevent digging. Out of consideration for neighbors please be aware of barking.  We hope that you will take care of your dishes before leaving.  I am certain that the cleaning lady would be grateful.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am the owner of a fashion jewelry business based in NY city and Qingdao, China.  My husband works for the mayor of New York City.   We have 4 kids between us who are either in college or out of the house.  We love Brooklyn, and have both raised our kids in this lovely borough.  We have the best of all worlds in Brooklyn.  It’s a lovely neighbor right by prospect park but also very convenient to the city, where we both work.

reviews.comments:
I enjoyed this place. The backyard and beautiful bathroom are the highlights as well as the proximity to prospect park. This is a garden apartment, so it can get a bit dark at times, but the bedroom gets great light. The kitchen has great appliances, and is furnished with basic cooking utensils. I stayed here for a month and was pretty comfortable. 

Martha and her family were very helpful in making sure I had what I needed for a comfortable stay.

Martha's apartment is everything we could ask for.  We will have spent almost three weeks there, as she was graciously able to extend our stay another week while our own place was undergoing construction.  The place was recently and stylishly renovated.  It is quite large -- larger than most Brooklyn two-bedrooms, and has everything one might need for a short or long stay.  The appliances are of high quality, which is good for those like us who cook.  Indeed, everything in the apartment is well chosen -- Martha had a brand new large screen television installed the day we arrived.  She and Curtis could not be nicer or more accommodating.  We have felt very much at home, in our own neighborhood but only three blocks away.  As noted elsewhere, the bathroom and the backyard are quite special, but so is the rest.

We can only repeat what we said in the previous review, as this stay was an extension of the earlier one.  We stayed during construction to our own place, and are grateful to have been able to stay at such a great apartment close to our own.  Martha could not be a better or more accommodating host.  Highly recommended.

Often times people throw around the term "home away from home" when describing a "nice" place to stay.  But our stay at Martha's place was more than nice.  It truly was — and felt — like our home.  We renovated our apartment nearby and needed a place to stay with our dog and 3 year old son.  We are also a month away from giving birth to our second child, so comfort, safety, cleanliness, and familiarity were the most important to us.  Martha and her family made us feel welcome, as if we had been their neighbors for years, and anything we needed (which was very little) was attended to almost instantly.  It was exactly the experience we needed to help us through that very stressful time, and though we are grateful to almost be back to our house, I will honestly say we will miss staying here.  And we hope to run into Martha's family in the neighborhood while we are strolling about.  No doubt if I ever need a place to stay in Park Slope again, I will check this and rebook without hesitation.  In fact I may do it once in a while just to use the luxurious and refreshing shower, which was amazing!  Thank you Martha and family!

Great app
Great hosts.
We had wonderful time here

Martha's spacious apartment was perfect for our week in NYC.  We enjoyed exploring the quieter Park Slope neighborhood while being a short subway ride from Manhattan.  

Communication with Martha was easy and responsive, too.
Great location for accessing transit for touring New York city.  We felt very safe and comfortable in the neighborhood.  The apartment was nicely furnished and larger than we expected.

Martha's contemporary garden apartment in Park Slope is the perfect home away from home while visiting New York City. The appliances are stainless steel and bathroom looked like it had recently been renovated. She also had a large, flat screen tv, which many places in Park Slope did not offer. There was no way that I was going to stay in a place without a tv! But the icing on the cake was the washer and dryer that Martha also made available to guests. Really over the top, which I so appreciated! Martha's apartment has all of the comforts of home. Park Slope is a safe neighborhood which offers lots of restaurants and shops for visitors, in addition to beautiful Prospect Park, where people of all ages can enjoy being outdoors.  And it was close to the subway, which was so helpful as well. Martha's apartment is the perfect place to stay in New York City.

My husband and I stayed at Martha's beautiful apartment with our 9-month-old son, and our time there couldn't have been more comfortable. Martha was very welcoming, easy to get in touch with, and she responded to our questions right away. The apartment was impeccably clean and was very quiet. The back patio was the highlight for us, and we spent lots of time out there. There were many restaurants, coffee shops, markets, and home/clothing/gift shops nearby, as was Prospect Park. If we're ever back in Park Slope, we would love to stay here again!

Fantastic place -- very comfortable and even better than the pictures. We stayed while our daughter and family unpacked from a move to Brooklyn and babysat our 9 mo granddaughter many days. Very close to Prospect Park.  Martha the host was terrific.

Martha's home was sparkling clean and obviously fairly recently renovated.
Highlights were the shower and the kitchen.  The shower was a dream, the washing facilities top-notch and the kitchen well-stocked with utensils and gear.   
Special shout-out to the best salad spinner ever - I'm going to get one as soon as I get home!
Although we didn't spend much time there, the outdoor space is lovely and the front and back plantings were well thought-out.
One note - there is no microwave, so go old-school with your cooking and don't  stock up on microwave popcorn!

Martha's place is amazing!! The space is bigger and nicer than I expected it to be with a beautifully updated kitchen & bathroom (including an AMAZING shower) and an adorable private garden patio. The neighborhood was perfect for our family - tons of great restaurants and shops, beautiful brownstones, and only a five minute walk to Prospect Park. Martha and her family were so sweet and accommodating and responded immediately any time we had a question. I highly recommend Martha's place to anyone looking for a home away from home in New York City.

Martha's place is a gem in Brooklyn. What the photos make less obvious is that the place is very well appointed and equipped to be a real home, not just a vacation rental. That's what made the difference for our stay, plus Martha's great communication.

We had an amazing time here. The appartment looks exactly like in the pictures: modern, spacious and clean. It is a cosy and friendly neighbourhood, with shops, coffee bars and restaurants at walking distance. Metro lines within 20min walk.

Martha was a wonderful host, and we loved our stay in her place. We liked the excellent location, the pleasure of the backyard patio in the early evening, the splendidly silent dishwasher, the nifty shower in a cool bathroom, and the host's unobtrusive but effective care. Highly recommended, and we would enjoy coming back.

I hesitate to admit this since I want Martha's place to always be available for
my husband and I but in my opinion you won't find a better place to stay in Park Slope.  The location is perfect set between beautiful Prospect Park and 7th Avenue.  The apartment was immaculate with a comfy bed, amazing shower and a charming outdoor area.  It's everything you would need and want for your visit to Park Slope.
Martha's place was a perfect home away from home. It was clean and well maintained, and the space was nicely decorated, didn't feel cluttered, and had all the amenities one could want.

We loved our stay at Martha's place. The listing photos don't do it justice. It was much more than advertised. We liked the excellent location, the elbow room, the amazing shower, the comfortable beds, the quiet washer and dryer. The list for this renovated apartment could go on. We visited in November but wish it had been warmer to enjoy the enclosed backyard patio. We surprised our son - a new Brooklyn resident in a tiny apartment - by cooking Thanksgiving dinner at Martha's place. The full-size, well-appointed kitchen had everything needed to make it happen, and the apartment was big enough for our family and his friends. I highly recommend her place and plan to return soon.

Je recommande vivement cette hotesse et l'appartement qu'elle propose. Nous avons adoré notre sejour à Brooklyn : beaucoup plus calme que dans Manhattan mais très bien desservi par le métro. Commerces et restos bien sympas tous proches. Un bon pied à terre pour découvrir New York.
Wonderful stay! Beautiful place, with all the amenities you could need. My dog loved it, too. Thank you for everything, Martha!

We stayed in this apartment for an extended period while our home was being renovated and only wished that we had booked sooner so that we could have stayed longer! The location is perfect; near Prospect Park, the subways, and plenty of grocery and restaurant options. There is wonderful light in the space, a well-designed and stocked kitchen, easy washer/dryer set up, and spacious bathroom. We didn't get to enjoy the backyard during our stay but it was lovely to look at and have as a view upon waking up. Martha was very attentive to any questions that we had. We found that the few times we were driving in the area, it was easy to find parking; not an insignificant thing in Park Slope! We would absolutely stay here again and will be recommending the space to all visiting friends and family members.
Beautiful space with a very thoughtful and responsive host.
Wonderful!  Would definitely stay there again!
We had a great time, loved the neighborhood, and the space itself. It’s close to everything and an easy subway ride right into Manhattan.

Fantastic apartment in the best location in Brooklyn. Private entrance, complete kitchen, perfect bathroom and large rooms with access to garden. Martha responses quickly on any questions and is a very pleasant host.

Great location in Brooklyn. Close to Subway and Prospect Park. Plenty of restaurants and coffee shops nearby. 

Beds were comfortable and great appliances. Host was available when we needed but not intrusive. Would definitely stay here again.
Great place one of the best air bnb's I've seen in NYC . Huge for NYC standards and spotless.

This was our second stay with Martha and will return for 2 weeks later this summer.  The apartment is everything 
one would want or need for a perfect Park Slope stay.

Martha's apartment was truly a home away from home and a place where we could wind down after busy days sightseeing in Manhattan and Brooklyn. The apartment is bigger than it looks on the photos. It has a kitchen with all amenities, a great walk-in shower, a double bed with very comfortable matras and airco in every room which helped to cool us down when temperatures and humidity outside were very high. The satelite tv with Netflix was also a big bonus and we were able to find a channel that showed the worldcup  soccer matches. Check-in was very easy and when we had a small problem with the door the first evening, Cole replied promptly on our phone call and Martha followed up. 
The apartment is well located in Park Slope, about 10 min walk from 7. Avenue and Grand Army plaza subway lines which we used extensively. It is also close to restaurants, banks, coffee places and a supermarket on 7. Avenue. If our travels will bring us back to Brooklyn we would definitely hope to be able stay here again.

Martha's place was lovely, clean and spacious! My husband and I stayed with our 2 year old son and we had plenty of space and felt very comfortable there. The location was amazing -- close to lots of great spots in Park Slope and a short walk to two different subway stations. We felt right at home and would not hesitate to return the next time we are in NYC. Highly recommend!

This is a 5 star apartment in a 5 star neighborhood. Actually I wasn’t surprised with the apartment. The pictures Martha provides and the other reviews told me that it would be lovely.  I just really had no idea what to expect from Park Slope. Well, clearly there is  a reason why it is one of the most popular neighborhoods in New York. It’s charming, safe, friendly, and well served by local shops and restaurants. It’s also so well connected to Manhattan.  And prospect park is only a block away!!  Wow!  Our stay at Martha’s was an impeccable Airbnb experience.
This was our third stay and will be returning again in November.  Need I say more?

We had an amazing time staying at Martha's place these last 2 weeks. Location right off Prospect Park, close to the Q, B, 2, 3, F and G lines for easy access to all you need in the city.

Martha quickly responded to all inquiries before and during our stay.

We hope to be able to come back again soon!
Martha was a good host, responds quickly to any issues or questions you have.. the area is great, plenty of restaurants, easy to get to subway.

If you’re looking for a spacious apartment located close to beautiful Prospect Park you won’t find a better place.
This was our fourth stay and won’t be our last.

Martha’s place is lovely. The kitchen is well-equipped for take out or dining in. The mattress was very comfortable and the shower was great!  The outdoor garden was wonderful despite the cold weather.  Great location in Park Slope.
We enjoyed our stay very much. Lovely apartment in a wonderful location.

We stayed at Martha’s apartment for 5 weeks with our 2 year old and cat while our apartment was having some renovations. It was a great place to call “home” and had everything we really needed. The wide plank wood floors were beautiful, the bed was extremely comfortable, it was cozy and warm especially during frigid winter temps, and was in the perfect location. Would definitely recommend!!

name: Napili Ridge, Maui ~ J1 ~ Garden View
summary: Beautiful studio surrounded with lush landscaping close to Napili and Kapalua Bays. Air Conditioning portable style ~ Coin operated laundry facility on site ~ Pool ~ BBQ ~ Secure & Complimentary WiFi ~ Assigned Parking ~ Ground level unit with garden view ~  Ceiling fan ~ Room darkening curtains for a great nights sleep ~ * Click on the "See Photos" tab ~ lower left of the listing page *  Tax has been included in rate.  2 guests max   The responsible renter must beat least 21 years of age.
space: Our condo has all the amenities that you would love to find available for your use. Our space accommodates two on a queen size bed. The kitchen is fully equipped for your convenience. The BBQ area is available for outdoor cooking by the pool. Additional luxuries we provide: beach towels, hair care and body products, dish soap, paper towels, toilet paper and cleaning supplies. The condo is located on the mountainside of the lower road and you can walk or drive  to the beautiful Napili and Kapalua Bays.   Portable A/C and ceiling fan ~ There is a laundry facility on site with coin operated washers and dryers ~ Pool ~ BBQ ~ Assigned parking space ~ Lower level unit with garden view ~ WiFi is available with a secure log in  For guests departing on evening flights, when available, we can offer an extended check out time.  Our day use rate  is $75.00. This is a great way to get another full day out of your trip and have an opportunity to prepare for your flight home at a relaxed pace.  Pleas
description: Beautiful studio surrounded with lush landscaping close to Napili and Kapalua Bays. Air Conditioning portable style ~ Coin operated laundry facility on site ~ Pool ~ BBQ ~ Secure & Complimentary WiFi ~ Assigned Parking ~ Ground level unit with garden view ~  Ceiling fan ~ Room darkening curtains for a great nights sleep ~ * Click on the "See Photos" tab ~ lower left of the listing page *  Tax has been included in rate.  2 guests max   The responsible renter must beat least 21 years of age. Our condo has all the amenities that you would love to find available for your use. Our space accommodates two on a queen size bed. The kitchen is fully equipped for your convenience. The BBQ area is available for outdoor cooking by the pool. Additional luxuries we provide: beach towels, hair care and body products, dish soap, paper towels, toilet paper and cleaning supplies. The condo is located on the mountainside of the lower road and you can walk or drive  to the beautiful Napili and Kapalua Bays
neighborhood_overview: The condo is located on the mountainside of the lower road and is a short walk to the beautiful Napili and Kapalua Bays.  I would say, the walk will take you 5-10 minutes depending on your stride!  There are several access ways to the beach and they are easy to find. Napili plaza is located nearby where you will find several restaurants, a coffee shop, grocery store, pharmacy and a clothing boutique.  Another great  boutique is located at the Napili Kai resort. The Breezeway Boutique ~ where you will find sundries, logo wear, clothing and island inspired jewelry and gifts. Drive time to popular places to visit ~ Lahaina town: 20 minutes Honolua Bay: 13 minutes Ka'anapali: 10 minutes Kapalua Bay: 5 minutes Napili Bay: 3 minutes
notes: Napili Ridge is occupied primarily by owners or tenants that live here on a full time basis. Please be respectful of others and their quiet enjoyment. Quiet time is between 8 pm and 9 am. The property shall not be used to sleep more than the number of guests named on the reservation.  Maximum guests - 2.  Group gatherings and parties are not allowed.  Smoking, vaping and drug use is not permitted anywhere on the premises.
transit: You'll probably want to rent a car, but the Maui Bus has a pick up location at the end of the road and it can take you where ever you want to go for $4 round trip. Directions to Napili Ridge from the airport: Stay in the left land as it turns into Dairy Road / Hwy 380 towards Lahaina and drive approximately 30 miles. Turn left onto Highway 30 when Highway 380 ends, then proceed around south coast of Maui and through Lahaina. Turn left off of Highway 30 at Napilihau Street (Stoplight at Napili Plaza) Travel about .02 miles to stop sign and turn right onto Honoapiilani Road In about half a mile, turn right onto Hui F Road.  Pull into the second or upper parking lot to find your assigned space.
access: The entire condo is yours to enjoy! There is a key safe on the door and the access code will be emailed to you prior to your arrival.
interaction: Please contact Debra directly should you need any assistance during your stay.   Owners live on property.
house_rules: ~ USE - Use of the house is limited to the guests named on the reservation.  Maximum number of guests is 2.   ~  ACCIDENTS & SPILLS - Please wipe-up any spills right away so they do not stain the counter tops or flooring. If anything breaks or is broken, please let us know. If the home is left excessively dirty, additional fees for cleaning will apply. ~ DAMAGES - Guests are liable for any damage to the property and agrees to accept charges to the card on file should damage occur during occupancy. ~  NO SMOKING - Absolutely no smoking, vaping or drug use of any kind is allowed inside the house or on the property. If any evidence of smoking is found inside the house, additional fees will apply for deep cleaning.  ~ QUIET HOURS - Please be respectful of others. Quiet hours are from 8pm to 9am.  ~ CHECK-OUT - Check-out time is at 10 AM. If you’d like to request late check-out, we will do our best to accommodate you.  Additional fees apply. ~ MINIMUM RENTAL AGE - 21 years or older. No ille

reviews.comments:
This place is great. It's a small studio unit in a neighborhood/apartment complex like area. There is a washer dryer on property. It costs $1 to wash and about $1 to dry clothes. 

The kitchen is stocked with pots, pans, and dishes. The fridge worked great. A short drive away from Napili Plaza that has a grocery store, coffee shop, a good taco place, and a pharmacy. Also there is a shop there that has snorkel gear for rent. You will need this to swim with the sea turtles. 

The unit does not have air conditioning. I kept the sliding glass door open while I slept to keep the air circulating. Also the front door has a gate that you can lock while keeping the front door open. However some moths and the ocassional mosquito can get in. There is a screen on the sliding glass door in the back and a privacy shade that you can pull down. 

You can walk to the Napili bay beach from the condo, about 10 mins, it's better than trying to find parking. There is a weird beeping noise right outside the bathroom window. You can hear it very clearly from the bed at night. This was distracting sometimes as I am a writer so it was hard to focus. I did most of my writing at the coffee shop which as described does have Wi-Fi and is very good. 

There are two beach towels in the closet and a mini cooler for the beach. The condo unit is small, so there is no living space to hang out. But most of your day you will be out and about or at the beach all day. So you really only need this place for some cooking and sleeping. 

I did not use the TV. I turned it on once and couldn't figure out the cable so I didn't bother with it. The host is very helpful, just text if you need anything. 

There is a specific parking spot. Use the parking decal provided and stay in that spot. The trash is located at the entrance to the property. I did not check out the pool area as the beach was amazing and took up all my time. Also 5 mins away from Spa Montage. If you get a day pass for $55 you can hang out at the spa all day between the pool, hot tubs, and hydrocircuit.  It was a fun way for me to kill half a day and read in the relaxation lounge. 

From Lahaina harbor you can get day trips on a ferry over to lanai or Molokai islands as well. I heard the snorkeling at Kaanapali was a little clearer, but I noticed the currents were much stronger there. I prefer Napili bay. Give the shower pull thing a jiggle if it doesn't make the water go all the way up.
Clean, quiet, comfortable!!!

Debra's place is very clean, quiet, comfy, and easy to get were ever you want to go. She offers Wi-Fi and TV if you so need and just down the road within walking distance is the beach, many restaurant's, and even a bus if needed to get you around if you do not have a car. I spent 10 days here and walked to most everything. There is a market less than 10 minuets walking with everything you could need for a once in a lifetime vacation. Best I have ever stayed at and will be returning often.

Had an extremely pleasant stay at Napili ridge.
Debra was also always available to answer questions which we had.
The condo is a short walk to the beach (Napili) with great snorkeling visibility.
Ideally located if you wish to spread your beach time between Napili, Kanapali, and Kapalua.
Very walkable to Napili bay. Very close drive to honolua , kaanapali, kapalua, Lahaina. Parking was easy and close, laundry was inexpensive. Nice little place.
The studio at G1 was as clean as a whistle, recently remodeled  with new everything. Close to food shopping so you can prep a meal in an up to date kitchen.
Nice studio apt. Was great for my business travel
The location and parking spot was good for our stay on Maui. Close to the beach! They were currently updating the facade of the building while we were staying which was not ideal.
Wonderfully quiet neighborhood complex, located just blocks away from wonderful restaurants and amazing beaches!

Had an amazing time in Maui! Condo is walking distance to the beach, good restaurants, and a grocery store. The complex is quiet and felt safe. The kitchen has all the necessities. Bed comfortable, and the condo was very clean and simple. Pool is close by, everyone I ran into at the complex were friendly. 

This was my first experience using Airbnb. Debra was very helpful. She responds fast and is a fantastic host. Checking in, making sure everything is ok and provided me with clear instructions on how to get to the condo, how to get in, and where to park. I would highly recommend this place and will definitely come back and book this condo again!
Easy to get to and from beaches and restaurants. Was the perfect studio size for 2 people.
It's a lovely place, comfortable bed, and nice amenities. We had a nice, quiet stay and easy access to area. Thanks so much!
Great place to stay. You're walking distance from the beach. It's an oversized extra comfy studio with a modern feel. It really has everything you need.
We had a lovely stay at the apartment. Clean, comfortable and safe. The apartment is very close to Lahaina which offers restaurants, whale watching tours, and beautiful beaches. Enjoy!

Debra was a perfect host and very responsive. The room was clean and perfectly located in Napili. 5 min walk to Napili Beach (one of the best beaches on Maui with great snorkeling), 5 min walk to the best breakfast on the island, The Gazebo Restaurant (white chocolate macadamia nut pancakes with coconut syrup), and a 3 min drive to the best coffee shop on the island, The Coffee Store (get the iced blended coconut mocha). Lahaina is a 10 min drive and has all kinds of shops, restaurants, and tours. If you need good quality and well priced snorkeling/dive equipment, I recommend Boss Frog's right next to The Coffee Store in Napili. We had the best trip and a large part of that was due to Debra and her condo. We are already planning our trip next year!

Charming studio condo in Pilani with other permanent residents. Extremely clean and welcoming. Check in and parking is simple and straightforward, although the door to the condo doesn't have a number. 
We found our stay here to be pleasant. All amenities listed are included, but are bare bones (except the huge beach towels). The kitchen is nice to look at but is a little dysfunctional for cooking anything more than light meals (but who cooks on vacation in Maui anyway?) There are a handful of restaurants nearby and a great coffee house. 

If you're a light sleeper, bring earplugs. The birds start chirping early and the wind through the palm trees make it sound like it's raining outside.
Just a short walk or really short drive from several of the best beaches in the world! Always had plenty of places to park too. Debra is a great communicator and really makes things easy!

We loved our stay here at the studio condo in Napilli.  Roomy studio condo, clean and very well taken care of.   Napilli Bay is within a 5-minute walk from the property and has wonderful snorkeling. The birds will definitely wake you up in the am so if you want to sleep in earplugs are recommended.  The kitchen is spacious and great but dishes are a little difficult to wash in the little sink.  All in all, it was a great place to stay.  Debra was a wonderful host and very responsive.

This unit served as a great little hub for our 2 week vacation in Maui. It includes all the amenities you will need -- fast wifi, cable TV, full kitchen. It did take a couple of days to get used to living with no AC but there was always a nice breeze coming through the screen doors.  

Our favorite beach on the island was Napili Bay Beach, which is only a few minutes from the unit. Parking is available along the lower road if you get down there early enough. Kaanapali and Lahaina are only a short drive south. 

Debra was very hospitable and super responsive to any questions we had. She was also very accommodating with our early check in and late check out requests. I would not hesitate to recommend this unit and area to anyone. 

Thanks Debra!

Debra's apartment was exactly what I needed. I had booked other accommodation but had a creepy incident that caused me to leave abruptly. I was able to message and confirm booking with Debra all within an hour on a Saturday night which is amazing. THANK YOU DEBRA! 

The apartment was very clean and had good add-ons for going to the beach (cooler, beach towels, snorkel mask). 

My major feedback:

1. The apartment gets hot at night unless you're comfortable sleeping with the sliding door glass open. Coming from my creepy situation, I did not feel comfortable sleeping with it open and there are not other windows in the sleeping/common area. Debra mentions something along these lines in her posting so take that seriously. 

2. You can hear your neighbors. One neighbor was up at 5am and it sounded like they were literally on my patio. The other neighbor upstairs had a young baby that I heard crying. The apartment is also under the stairs so you can hear people walking up/down the stairs when it's extra quiet at night. I'll admit that I was a little harder to please than usual -- I was more jumpy to noises since my space had been violated at the other accommodation. Also, you're in Maui. If you're up at 5am it's not the worst thing in the world. 

3) I paid $200/night total w/ fees and it felt slightly overpriced. Small things that made me feel that way -- no dish towels (I think?),  a rusty shower head + dingy shower curtain, no place to leave wet things (you're warned that you'll be fined if you leave clutter or beach gear on the patio or walk way) All that said, perspective! We're in Maui and $200 night was some of the cheapest accommodation I could find. It's all relative. 

Overall, the place was safe, clean, and convent to driving Route 30 south/north to the other towns beyond Napili. There's a grocery store and some great happy hours nearby. Really grateful I had a roof over my head, a comfy bed to collapse into and a door that locked. Thank you Debra.
Great place to crash like a local, clean, cozy spot,  easy walking distance  to,  what is one of the best beaches on the West side of the island!

We very much enjoyed our stay at this condo.  Debra was great with communication for check-in.  The condo had pretty much everything we needed to cook and explore the area during our stay, including snorkel gear and beach towels.  Reasonably priced for the area and for a short walk to such a beautiful beach!  We would come back again in the future.
Very cute and conveniently located. Would definitely stay again.
Great place, comfy space at an affordable price. Close drive to everything on this side of the island.

Great location, central to all the best west Maui beaches. 5 minute walk to the scuba shop for suuuper cheap snorkel/SUP/scuba/surf rentals, then another 5 minutes to Napili Bay beach. Kapalua beach is just a little further up the coast and there are several AMAZING snorkeling beaches within a 20 minute drive. Super nice kitchen and good parking situation. I didn't sleep much here because it's pretty hot and stuffy - no way to get a cross breeze unless you open the sliding patio door and it's on the ground floor near the parking lot so I didn't feel safe doing that. Then again I'm a woman traveling alone so I'm extra cautious. Also the only places to get food nearby (including groceries) are pretty expensive.
Very nice place and central to our various destinations during our stay.

Debra's place is terrific and a great value for a Maui rental. It was super clean, had every kitchen item you'd need, a very short walk to the beach, and a short drive to great restaurants and a grocery store. 

We really enjoyed our time here.

For anybody that likes to cook on vacation, the kitchen was great! Lots of useful kitchen utensils and appliances. Also, Debra was great communicating with when some parking issues came up, but she handled it immediately.

Beautiful studio, ideal for couples travelling to Maui. Very well located not too far from grocery store, reataurants and the beach. The place very clean and has everything you need to cook! Would absolutely recommend this place.

Great location. Close to the beach. Well appointed kitchen. Like others have said: it gets hot at night. The sliding door must be left open to make it tolerable. We were awoken very early each morning by people using the community faucet outside the door.

Debra's place is located in a quiet refuge of one of the more popular parts of Maui. It's a very clean place with a nice kitchen and she even had snorkel gear in the closet! The bed is insanely comfortable and I wold love to stay there again the next time we're in town!

Studio was just as described and very comfortable. Location was conveniently located within walking distance of great snorkeling beaches. Any questions we had, Debra responded almost immediately -- great service!  I would recommend her condo!
all in all nice
Very clean and comfortable. We loved that she had extra beach towels and snorkeling gear.
This place is well located for many activities. Clean and modern...cant ask for more. Quiet neighbourhood. I would recommend to everyone
Great location, very spacious and the host responds promptly!
Debra was very responsive and informative. Instructions were clear.
很整洁,很好
Debra's place was very clean. She left very clear instructions which was nice.

Really cozy, affordable place to serve as a homebase for a trip to Maui. We were walking distance to seeing turtles snorkeling, and a $10 Uber from an awesome brew pub that we went to 3 times. The area was really quiet at night and didn't feel at all touristy.

Great place for couples traveling to Hawaii!  Amenities (grocery store, convenience store, McDonald's, beach) are all super close.  Room exactly as shown in pictures.  Located in a very quiet neighbourhood as well.
Great spot. Close to food and restaurants!

Debra’s place was everything we expected and more! You are within walking distance to 2 beaches and a few food options, so we actually didn’t drive our first day. The location is close to tourist sites on the north, plus lots of other beaches to the south. 

Kitchen is spacious, everything was very clean, bathroom had some toiletries, and we made good use of the noodles and beach towels. Neighborhood was very quiet and we slept soundly.

We loved our stay in Debra's condo. There were a few beautiful beaches in walking distance. Also a grocery store and a few restaurants in the area. The condo has everything you need to prepare your own meals. The reserved parking is right by the condo entrance which was great. We booked a couple tours which picked us up at the nearby napili shores resort, about a 5min walk away. We would stay here again. Great price, clean, unit has a smart tv, very close to beautiful beaches, comfy bed.  Quick drive to  touristy areas.
The apartment was clean and in a great location. I was sad I had to leave so soon! Thanks for great stay! I would recommend this air bnb to anyone!
Perfect home base for a great Maui experience.
Simple, clean and handy location! Exactly as described. It was perfect for the two of us - Debra is a great communicator and very helpful. Would recommend to anyone.

Great place to stay if you are looking for somewhere close to public access beaches, resorts, walking trails, and grocery stores. The condo itself was really clean and we felt really safe in the neighborhood. Definitely would stay again!

Debra and her husband were really friendly and we didn’t feel rushed to leave on our last day. Definitely recommend!
Very clean, comfortable, and relaxing. You feel welcome and at home.
Great stay within walking distance to Napili Beach! Nice & quiet complex. Loved waking up to the birds of paradise each morning!

Great little condo walking distance to the beach. Nice getaway for a great price!!!
I would do it again.
We really enjoyed our stay here - can't wait to come back again soon!

Loved my 2 week stay at Debra's place. It was the perfect space to unwind. Quiet, with lovely decor, generous & thoughtful amenities, very comfortable bed, all within walking distance to a beautiful beach and a couple of great restaurants.  Within 5-10 miles, you'll find some stunning coastal hikes and fabulous snorkeling areas. I would definitely stay again!
Realy nice places, clean, well located
Nice place, great Kitchen, can use the bus to nearby stores, Whalers Village and Lahaina town. Nice and quiet.
We had a wonderful time staying here. The location was great and it had everything we needed. Perfect place for a couple.

Perfect condo for our babymoon. We traveled all over Maui and felt this was a great base. Though it’s a 20 min drive at minimum if you want to explore outside of Kapalua/Napili, the drive goes by fast. Coming home to this area and the condo was great. We had no interaction with the host until we had an issue with WiFi, in which she responded within seconds. A sun blind was pulled down on our Lana’i which we assumed was her but was never notified so not sure. Nice people in the area. Great coffee shop and market nearby. Our favorite beach ended up being Kapalua bay which is a 20min walk from the condo. Best snorkeling! Would definitely come back again!

My Dad stayed at Debra's place while he helped remodel our condo in Napili Ridge, so we obviously love the location that Napili Ridge offers.  Debra's place is nice and quiet, but is close enough to Napili Plaza for good coffee, food, exercise and groceries.  Or if you're feeling like taking a drive to Lahaina, you have 1st rate shopping and dining experiences.  Debra's place is also just a short walk away from a great beach, Napili Bay, and some amazing snorkeling in Honokeana Cove.  You really can't beat the location of Debra's condo on Maui.  

Debra's place was also clean and well maintained.  Debra was also very easy to work with and very personable to make my Dad's stay very enjoyable.
We had an awesome stay at Debra’s condo. It was clean and had great amenities such as using the pool. We will definitely be back!

Wonderful location! Peaceful and quiet in the mornings and evenings. The grounds were having some major construction during our stay, but we dealt with that ok. It would have been nice to know this was happening in advance as there was a lot of noise during the day.
The condo was very nice, and roomy for a studio. We love Napili sunsets, just a short walk to the beach. Also great snorkeling nearby.

Maui is already an awesome place, but living here really gave me the local experience. I was far enough from major hotels to not feel overwhelmed and so close to amazing beautiful beaches that were inhabited by turtle and fish that always reminded me where I was. The place is very quaint and intimate. Is was really cleans when I arrived and included everything you would need for basic meals. I utilized most amenities in the kitchen. There is a large storage closet that you can store luggage and hang clothes in. She has an iron and ironing board and a few pool noodles stored there as well. There is a grocery store just right down the road and some cool places to eat. I advice renting a car if staying here if not just expect high Uber/Lyft prices but I’m sure that’s anywhere on the island. She stocks you up on the basics that you’ll need, garbage bags, plates, silverware, cooking essentials, etc.  Debra is amazing at communicating and responds so quickly! She also leaves so many resources for not only exploring the studio but exploring the island as well. I would definitely stay here again!

Debra’s place was cute and very clean. Cleanliness is my number one and I felt comfortable here. We had a wedding nearby, so the location worked well for us. Unfortunately, there aren’t many sidewalks around (not Debra’s fault!) so walking to beaches and restaurants can be challenging. If you have a car and you’re ok with driving, the location will not be an issue. It’s very close to the resort area, so lots of pretty beaches around. 
The lockbox was jammed upon check-in, but Debra responded immediately and we were let in. The prompt response was greatly appreciated!
The lack of air conditioning didn’t bother me - we kept the windows and screen door open and the breeze felt nice. 
The apartment complex was quiet and I felt very safe. 
Thanks, Debra!

I have to start by saying that Debra was a great host. She communicated quickly and was willing to help with issues. Unfortunately her apartment was not right for me and my husband. We found it to be extremely warm and difficult to sleep with the sliding door open since it is merely feet away from the complex walkway. There was a portable fan but it did not work and the overhead fan was not enough.  The apartment is also very bright at night which made sleeping extremely difficult. Overall, I would highly suggest renting from Debra as a host because she was kind and helpful, but this apartment was not right for us.

Gorgeous apartment!! Very clean and well kept - big kitchen great for cooking and a nice closet for storage. Was also nice to have a television with cable. The only areas for improvement are that the apartment does get hot given that there is no air conditioning, and check-out time is 10am which is a little early. Close enough to walk to beautiful Napili Bay and gets alot of sunlight!

Debra’s place is fine if you are going to be on the go and just sleeping there. If you plan to spend time cooking and hanging out, like when a hurricane blows through, you may want to pick something else. Debra was great an addressed any concerns we had but in the end we wouldn’t stay here again.
Sparkling clean, blissfully quiet and close to the beach!
Perfect place to stay in Lahaina! Close to everything, yet away from the “loudness” that is touristy Hawaii! Even had A/C despite reviews claiming it didn’t! Overall great experience!
Great place and super close to everything. Fast Wifi and cable was nice!
This condo was very convenient to West Maui beaches, the hosts were communicative, and we had cable TV for those rare rainy days. What more could you want in a vacation pad?
Great location for a very reasonable price! Short walk to 2 awesome beaches!!
Awesome place located close to everything!
Perfect place to stay for a low-key vacation. Great amenities, good location, and responsive hosts! Quick walk to the beach, restaurants, and close to a ton of phenomenal beaches and bays.
Short walk to an awesome beach! Maui is expensive this place comes in as a good choice if your budget conscious.

You will absolutely love this beautiful space! My mom and I loved it and am so blessed to have found it! Very clean, peaceful, centrally located and the most comfortable bed ever! Thank you for allowing us to stay in your little slice of heaven! We will book here in the future
Great experience staying at Daniel and Debra's place in Napili Ridge. Would stay here again!!!
A great place to rent! Very, very clean and close to some of the best snorkeling beaches. Very spacious kitchen and bedroom area. Located in a nice, quiet neighborhood. Thanks Debra and Daniel!
I’ll stay here again. This was just what my husband and I needed for our island getaway
We had a great stay at Daniel & Debra’s place. The check-in was easy and it was nice having an assigned parking stall. We’d definitely stay here again!
It’s a nice place
Nice appartement, really clean with all you need.  Really close to some beautifull beach !
Very convenient and comfortable. Close to the beaches, stores, restaurants, and perfect sunsets.
A very comfortable place in a quiet neighborhood with great amenities. Hosts are very quick to respond to any concerns or questions.

name: Leça da Palmeira- Cabo das Marés
summary: O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, e famílias (com crianças).
space: O meu apartamento tem uma vista extraordinária. Temos praia e piscina a 5 metros do apartamento. Pista para bicicleta, patins caminhadas. Pode desfrutar do mar pescando, mergulhando ou nadando e surfando. Se gosta de carros a 30 metros tem uma pista de Karting extraordinária. Se gosta de Gastronomia, pode experimentar excelentes restaurantes de peixe fresco a 10 metros do apartamento. Se pretende beber um copo, nada como ir ao Bar do Salão de chá da Boa Nova, excelente paisagem para um copo a dois ou um jantar romântico ( restaurante com estrela Michelim). Para quem gosta de música a 7 km tem a Casa da Música com uma excelente programação diária, alguma das quias gratuita, Museus...
description: O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, e famílias (com crianças). O meu apartamento tem uma vista extraordinária. Temos praia e piscina a 5 metros do apartamento. Pista para bicicleta, patins caminhadas. Pode desfrutar do mar pescando, mergulhando ou nadando e surfando. Se gosta de carros a 30 metros tem uma pista de Karting extraordinária. Se gosta de Gastronomia, pode experimentar excelentes restaurantes de peixe fresco a 10 metros do apartamento. Se pretende beber um copo, nada como ir ao Bar do Salão de chá da Boa Nova, excelente paisagem para um copo a dois ou um jantar romântico ( restaurante com estrela Michelim). Para quem gosta de música a 7 km tem a Casa da Música com uma excelente programação diária, alguma das quias gratuita, Museus... Tem acesso ao apartamento todo, com cerca de 140 metros quadrados. A vista magnifica sobre o azul do mar e do céu. O estacionamento pode ser dentro do condomínio ou na garagem. Gratuito.
neighborhood_overview: A vista magnifica sobre o azul do mar e do céu.
transit: O estacionamento pode ser dentro do condomínio ou na garagem. Gratuito.
access: Tem acesso ao apartamento todo, com cerca de 140 metros quadrados.

address.government_area: Perafita, Lavra e Santa Cruz do Bispo

name: Nice and furnished apartment on top of HK skyline
summary: Really nice, comfy and furnished apartment in HK. Beyond the fact that the flat gives an amazing view on the city's buildings, it's really convenient: You'll be next to Sai Yin Pun and Sheung Wan station (5min), close to the Macao Ferry Pier and the Central ferry Pier. The neighborhood is great, local and full of tasty restaurants and bars! This flat is perfect for couples with 1 bedroom, 1 fully furnished kitchen (with an oven) 1 bathroom, a cosy living room and 1 separate dining room.
space: This apartment has all the appliances and furniture you'll need for your stay: - 1 bedroom with clean sheets, AC, a big wardroom for your cloths and a great view. - The fully furnished kitchen comes with an oven, pans, plates, cups, bowl, cutleries, chopsticks, tea and coffee for breakfast.  - In the bathroom, you'll have hot water, shampoo, conditioner, shower gel and clean towels.  - A cosy living room with a very comfy sofa, a coffee table, chairs, a fridge and most of all: a stunning view (27th floor) on the city! - The separate dining room is very luminous, has a big table and 4 chairs to enjoy your meals. Did I mention great view?

neighborhood_overview: Sheung Wan and Sai Yin Pun areas have a lot of delicious restaurants, bars, many grocery sores, supermarkets, and 7eleven nearby (opened 7/24). 10 min walk from Central
transit: 5 min walk to Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan Metro Station. Access to many bus roads The tramway is right behind the building Many taxis are passing buy every day / night
interaction: Always available by Whastsapp / (Hidden by Airbnb) / email

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Very pleasant stay in a cozy apartment. It is located ~5 minutes from the metro. The neighborhood is also very quiet. The flat is not big but decorated nicely. I didn't meet Theo since he was traveling in France. His flat mate Edward is nice and helpful :-)
The host canceled this reservation 37 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

숙소는 사진이랑 똑같았음.
좋고 아늑하고 특히 호스트의 방은 야경이 죽였음 27층이라서
조금 놀랐던거는 화장실이랑 방을 제외한 모든 공간에서 신발을 신고 댕긴다는 거였음 ㅋㅋ
화장실이 조금 좁고 그거말고는 괜찮았음. 침대가 2명 자기에 적당하긴한데 그렇게 넓지는 않음.
10점만점에 7점정도
Nice location and cosy flat! Perfect for a couple !
Very good appartment with good location.

name: Bright large Williamsburg 1 bed apartment
summary: Spacious, tastefully furnished 1 bedroom  apartment in the most sought after area in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. 5 minute walk to subway stations (1 stop from Manhattan) , 15 minute walk to downtown Manhattan.  Close to top restaurants (Marlow & Sons, Diner), shopping and fun nightspots. Separate, quiet bedroom with fresh linen and plenty of rack space. Big granite kitchen and large outdoor balcony with lounge. Perfect for short or long stay travelers seeking a true New York & Brooklyn experience.
space: This large, bright and quiet apartment is stylishly decorated with vintage mid-century furniture, contemporary photographic artworks and lots of indoor plants. The spacious, sun-drenched bedroom has plenty of clothing rack space, hangers and extra fresh linens. There's also a fold out mattress for extra guests.  There's a large patio balcony with 5 seater sectional lounge, coffee table, chairs and benches. Perfect for outdoor entertaining. Open granite kitchen has gas stove top, dishwasher, full sized oven, stainless steel appliances and lots of pantry space for those that enjoy cooking in. Modern bathroom has plenty of amenities and full bathtub.  Guests have access to the laundry in the building with washer and dryer. Apartment has wifi and large living room with two full couches, flat screen TV with access to Apple TV and Netflix. Large dining room is perfect for dinners in or can double as an office for business travelers, it also includes a selection of art and photography books o
description: Spacious, tastefully furnished 1 bedroom  apartment in the most sought after area in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. 5 minute walk to subway stations (1 stop from Manhattan) , 15 minute walk to downtown Manhattan.  Close to top restaurants (Marlow & Sons, Diner), shopping and fun nightspots. Separate, quiet bedroom with fresh linen and plenty of rack space. Big granite kitchen and large outdoor balcony with lounge. Perfect for short or long stay travelers seeking a true New York & Brooklyn experience. This large, bright and quiet apartment is stylishly decorated with vintage mid-century furniture, contemporary photographic artworks and lots of indoor plants. The spacious, sun-drenched bedroom has plenty of clothing rack space, hangers and extra fresh linens. There's also a fold out mattress for extra guests.  There's a large patio balcony with 5 seater sectional lounge, coffee table, chairs and benches. Perfect for outdoor entertaining. Open granite kitchen has gas stove top, dishwasher, full
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in the culture hub of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. It's also a quick few minute travel into Manhattan across Williamsburg bridge and close to two main subway stations.  There's lots to check out including lauded restaurants such as Marlow & Sons, Diner, Motorinos Pizzeria (one of the best pizzas!), cosy bars like Donna and Maison Premier, awesome live music venues such as Williamsburg Hall of Music & Baby's Alright and clubs like Output.  Also the building is close to Bedford street where you'll find some of the best vintage stores and shopping in NYC, as well as multitude of art gallery discoveries. Two great supermarkets are conveniently located only a few blocks away. The cafe downstairs also does fantastic coffee and bagels.
transit: Close to L train on Bedford, JMZ train on Broadway and few minutes drive into the downtown Manhattan. Both subways is 1 stop from Manhattan!
interaction: Guests can call, text or email me and I will respond promptly. Happy to give tips on what to check out in the neighbourhood.
house_rules: Please leave the apartment in the same clean condition you found it.  Smoking is allowed only on the balcony.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Young creative professional residing in Brooklyn, New York. Born in Vietnam but grew up in Australia. Love traveling and meeting new people.

reviews.comments:
Paul was super attentive and very responsive with any communications or questions i had. He was flexible about check in and check out and also easy going about me extending my stay. He also left a laundry card for the buildings laundry for me to use, which was a big help and was very generous with his itunes account on the apple tv (there's no tv channels, but there is netflix and itunes) on which i downloaded an awful film!

The apartment itself was exactly as it appeared in the photos. Great vintage furniture, interesting plants, comfortable kitchen, nice lamps, lots of lovely bits and pieces. The living room is a little darker than you'd think maybe, especially in the morning when the bedroom gets flooded with light. Good for early risers!

The heaters worked well during the cold snap of my stay. They're a little noisy for night time maybe, but they definitely get the place warm when you need them to!  

Theres a couple of things to get the hang of in the bathroom and I did find that there was some noise from adjoining apartments at various times of the day and night. It was nothing especially outrageous, just dogs and music and coming and going. People living their lives in close proximity, but it seemed worthy of mention here. I guess its part of the exciting location which is great both for exploring Williamsburg itself and getting into manhattan. 

All in all I really enjoyed my first time staying in Williamsburg and found Paul to be an excellent host.

Paul's apartment looks exactly as the photos. Perhaps bigger! It has air conditioner and heat machines in all spaces. The kitchen is comfortable and has all the appliances needed. The apartment is full of light in all spaces, it has a comfortable living room and a great dinning table very useful for work too. Also has a balcony if you want to go out without leaving the apt. It is very well located in a great neighbourhood with a lot of restaurants and bars. The place is very quiet. It is only 2 blocks from Bedford's mainstream places and 3 blocks from the train that took us to Manhattan in 15 min. I definitely recommend Paul's apartment!

Nice very spacious place with a generous terrace in a great location.
Paul was easy to communicate with and his friend Tim greeted us at check in. Our stay was comfortable and getting to and from Manhattan was easy. Would recommend!
The apartment is beautiful and Paul could not have been more helpful and communicative. He went above and beyond to make sure we had a good stay!

We had a great time in Paul's apartment. Location and apartment are great. Just minutes from public transport and bars and restaurants.
He left us great recommendations for restaurants around and we really enjoyed them (one the best pizza places! yamm)

We would recommend this place and will stay there again once in Brooklyn.
Thank you Paul

Paul's apartment is very spacious and full of light with a large and well equipped kitchen and a clean and spacious bathroom. Paul was very easy to communicate with and check-in was smooth. He answered our questions during the week straight away. The bed was a little too soft for my liking and the air con can be a bit noisy from time to time. But overall, a very nice apartment in a good location. Recommended!
Place was great! Paul was great and always in contact when I needed him. Comfy bed. Big place for the price. Would stay again!

Nice apartment @ Williamsburg. Super location near subway, supermarket, pizzeria, shops,.... You can cook, do your laundry (second floor), Netflix, wifi,... Great neighbourhood. We also like his very sunny terrace (all day sun :-) ) Paul is always available if you have any questions.
We can recommend this place to everyone !! *****

Nothing but the best about this apartment and location. Spacious, comfortable, well equipped kitchen, nice bath and shower, comfortable and quiet bedroom. The location is just perfect: a 1 minute walk from the footpath entrance of the Williamsburg bridge leading straight into Manhattan, or a 2 minute walk from the Bedford Avenue area of Brooklyn with all the nice shops, bars and restaurants. The nearest underground and bus stops are just a few blocks down.  This is a perfect apartment to discover New York when you're planning to stay more than just a long weekend.

Paul’s place was very nice it is centrally located in Williamsburg right next to Bedford right next to Peter Lugar’s it was awesome we were a couple of blocks away from the train stations paul’s place is right next to the Williamsburg Bridge you can easily walk over to Manhattan if it’s something you want to do that was great we did a couple of times and the walk is not that bad it Was a really great place to stayWe had no problems In the neighborhood is very safe me and my wife will definitely make another trip to Williamsburg thank you Paul

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Williamsburg. Le quartier est calme, proche : du métro  (environ 7 mns à pied) et d'un supermarché ce qui est très pratique. La 1ère station à Manhattan est à 5mns  (ESSEX station). Paul est très réactif et sympathique. De belles vacances :)
The host canceled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is in a great location in Williamsburg. Really close to very nice bars and restaurants, really close to the walk across Williamsburg Bridge, and really close to the subway across to Manhattan. 

The apartment has a very nice vintagey vibe, and it’s so great to have the balcony to relax and be outside. 
It has everything you could need for a comfortable city break. 
My boyfriend and I had a great time in the area and would definitely come back!

Great location for exploring Bedford Ave and Williamsburg. Easy access to Manhattan riding the M or J train. The apartment size was great, and loved the vibe of the space. Overall we were very happy with our stay.
Espectacular zona y cordialidad de Paul. Siempre atento. Departamento cómodo y todo equipado. Cerca del metro y del puente de Williamsburg

Great, spacius apartment with a huge bakcony. Everything was nice and clean. 3:rd floor with elevator. 
Good location near shopping street, 7-8 min to subway station. Close to the Williamsburg bridge so you can go to Manhattan guite quick.
The bed was very comfortable and ok for a couple but not big enough for 2 friends. Paul provided an extra madrass and linen though so it worked out just fine!
Paul is a perfect host, always easy to get in contact with and very helpful and accommodated. 
We would ceternly come back!

Paul’s apartment is light, bright and spacious. The heating is very good. Shower and bathroom amenities very good.  The kitchen is functional and the oven and dishwasher work very well. The laundry is just downstairs and the washer and dryer are fast.  The location is very good. An easy walk to shops and transport. Paul is an obliging host who promptly responded to any of our questions.

name: 可愛いﾚﾝｶﾞの壁のお部屋/ Manhattan
summary: Central Parkから徒歩10分､高級住宅街のUpper EastやMetropolitan Museumに電車で15分ほど｡ ご近所に美味しいﾍﾞｰｶﾘｰ､ｶﾌｪ､ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰ｡ 最寄駅から徒歩5分で便利です｡ 8畳ほどの天井が高く､可愛い赤ﾚﾝｶﾞの壁のお部屋です｡
description: Central Parkから徒歩10分､高級住宅街のUpper EastやMetropolitan Museumに電車で15分ほど｡ ご近所に美味しいﾍﾞｰｶﾘｰ､ｶﾌｪ､ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰ｡ 最寄駅から徒歩5分で便利です｡ 8畳ほどの天井が高く､可愛い赤ﾚﾝｶﾞの壁のお部屋です｡ ｱｯﾄﾎｰﾑな雰囲気で､日本人のご家族が多く住んでいるｴﾘｱです｡最近はかわいいｶﾌｪも増え､人気のｴﾘｱになっています｡ 地下鉄の6番線110st駅から徒歩5分 1ﾌﾞﾛｯｸ先の2Aveからもﾊﾞｽが数本出ています｡ 2匹のｷｭｰﾄな小型犬がｷｯﾁﾝﾙｰﾑにいます｡早朝や夜は別室で眠っています｡ｱﾚﾙｷﾞｰがなく､ﾜﾝちゃん好きな人の方がｵｽｽﾒです｡
neighborhood_overview: ｱｯﾄﾎｰﾑな雰囲気で､日本人のご家族が多く住んでいるｴﾘｱです｡最近はかわいいｶﾌｪも増え､人気のｴﾘｱになっています｡
notes: 2匹のｷｭｰﾄな小型犬がｷｯﾁﾝﾙｰﾑにいます｡早朝や夜は別室で眠っています｡ｱﾚﾙｷﾞｰがなく､ﾜﾝちゃん好きな人の方がｵｽｽﾒです｡
transit: 地下鉄の6番線110st駅から徒歩5分 1ﾌﾞﾛｯｸ先の2Aveからもﾊﾞｽが数本出ています｡
house_rules: - ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑ､ｷｯﾁﾝを他3名のﾙｰﾑﾒｲﾄとｼｪｱして頂きます｡良識の範囲で綺麗に使用してください｡(ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑに落ちた髪をとって捨てる､ｺﾝﾛが汚れたら拭く､等)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm Ayami, Japanese woman who living in NY.

I am from Kobe city of Japan, and I study fashion thing in NY.
My hobby is traveling, french movies, and music(jazz, fusion).. I always love touching and exploring new culture and people. 
My character is talkative and funny, I think :) I love meeting new people always!

reviews.comments:
L’appartement était exactement comme décrit dans l'annonce. La chambre était propre et calme. Les propriétaires étaient très gentils et respectueux de notre intimité.
Le prix est raisonnable vu la proximité avec Central Park. De plus, il est très facile d'accès (métro et bus) et il y a de nombreux magasins autour. 
Nous avons passés de très bonnes vacances à New-York. Je recommande ce logement ! :)

name: Beautiful studio steps from the bay
summary: Great studio condo with tons of amenities, close to beaches, Bayfront, downtown Hilo, markets, and more! This condo feels like home in the tropics with a fully stocked kitchen, full size memory foam bed, full size sofa bed, outdoor dining and living space, a new pool, coin laundry facilities, and snorkel/beach gear for you to use. 5 min from Hilo airport, 95 min from Kona airport. Tons of parking available, and very walkable to many activities. Quiet and relaxing, with gorgeous scenery.
space: The space is a studio condo that we have converted to feel like a full living space. Breakfast table, 4-person dining table, swiveling TV, full size bed, outdoor couch, and plenty of closet space make this small space feel larger than it is! The grounds and surrounding area are tropical and gorgeous. A short walk to wailoa pond, coconut island, and bayfront Hilo would be a great start for anyone's trip.
description: Great studio condo with tons of amenities, close to beaches, Bayfront, downtown Hilo, markets, and more! This condo feels like home in the tropics with a fully stocked kitchen, full size memory foam bed, full size sofa bed, outdoor dining and living space, a new pool, coin laundry facilities, and snorkel/beach gear for you to use. 5 min from Hilo airport, 95 min from Kona airport. Tons of parking available, and very walkable to many activities. Quiet and relaxing, with gorgeous scenery. The space is a studio condo that we have converted to feel like a full living space. Breakfast table, 4-person dining table, swiveling TV, full size bed, outdoor couch, and plenty of closet space make this small space feel larger than it is! The grounds and surrounding area are tropical and gorgeous. A short walk to wailoa pond, coconut island, and bayfront Hilo would be a great start for anyone's trip. Guests will have access to the entire condo(except the cleaner's closet), the laundry facilities at t
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, location! The condo is located in tropical Hilo, steps from Wailoa Pond State Park, giving it a serene and beautiful atmosphere. Walkable to hilo's farmers market, bayfront, coconut island, kayaking, great restaurants, and so much more. A short drive to Carl Smith Beach Park (turtles are common there), Richardson Beach, Reed's Bay, Rainbow Falls, Banyan Drive, and more.
notes: The second bed is a fold out futon. We have sheets and a mattress pad to make it more comfortable, and it would easily fit two children or one adult.
transit: The condo is walkable to many things, but a rental car is always a good idea to make sure you see everything on the big island!
access: Guests will have access to the entire condo(except the cleaner's closet), the laundry facilities at the end of the hall, the pool and gazebo, all kitchen utensils and appliances(blender, microwave, rice cooker, and more included).
interaction: As little or as much as preferred. We leave plenty of information on things to do on the big island, but never hesitate to ask questions or for help planning activities. Whether you're looking for lava, clothing-optional beaches, vegan restaurants, the best seafood, etc. we can point you in the right direction.
house_rules: - Quiet time 10pm-8am -No Smoking inside -Pool is open 9am-7pm -Please be respectful of neighbors -No hanging towels or anything over the railing of the lanai

host.host_about:
I have been living in Hilo for three years and love all the adventure the Big Island has to offer. The ocean has become an integral part of my life. I love to share all the magical places this island has to offer as well as travel myself. I renovate houses and condos in Ohio and Hawaii and stay very active. 

I study astronomy and work in partnership with the local community to teach about the research being done at the observatories on Mauna Kea. I love the pursuit of knowledge. This one of the reason I love Hawaii. There are so many opportunities to explore and study here. 

I am open to all questions, so feel free to hit me up at any time!

Ich kann auch Deutsch.

reviews.comments: I loved staying at this adorable newly remodeled studio. Being walking distance to a natural food grocery and many other food options is fantastic. I took advantage of the fully stocked kitchen, and the relaxing pool. It was so nice to have my morning tea or evening cocktail on the cozy lanai while watching the amazing Hawaiian sky change colors. Jeff was great with communication from the start. Access was so easy with a lockbox on the door. I felt right at home as soon as I walked in with the cute modern furnishings. There was always a parking spot available, so you don't have to walk very far with your groceries. I would recommend this spot for anyone wanting to stay at an affordable/adorable place in Hilo.

Thank you for making your studio available on AirBnB. My girlfriend and I quickly fell in love with the amenities, location, and all the comforts that made it feel even more like home. We did not get much of a chance the stay and relax much due to a tightly packed schedule, but during the times we were there, we could not stop talking about the great little touches. Perfect location, perfect property, and easy check-in/check-out makes it easy to recommend the studio for couples and small families.

I stayed at this place for two nights. It looked much nicer in the inside than out. Probably the best condo there. It's small but big enough for two people. Clean and provided towels/toiletries/blankets. I let my buddy have the bed and I slept in on the couch. My only complaint is that there was someone that stayed a couple nights before we did, the extra comforter wasn't cleaned. It smelled like the last person who used it. However I'm sure sheets on the bed were clean. I would recommend this space to anyone, it's close to downtown Hilo and easy parking.
Nice quiet location, clean & well equipped. Good access to sightseeing in Hilo.

Jeffrey's apartment was a great little studio! Very clean and had everything we needed during our stay. The location was not too far from Downtown Hilo and the Hilo Airport, which provided easy access to what we had planned during our trip. We loved relaxing back porch which we were able to enjoy breakfast each morning as well! The only complaint we had was the upstairs neighbors (sounded like a family of elephants) that stomped around starting at 6am each morning. Other than that, the apartment was great!

The condo is a perfect little home away from home. Sitting on the lanai in the morning with my coffee was perfection and the kitchen had everything we needed so we didn't have to eat out every meal! Jeffrey is great with any and all questions! I hope to stay here again!!
This place had the most well equipped and stock kitchen of the four places we stayed in Hilo/Puna. Good Job Jeffrey!

Jeff and Alex's apartment is super close to the airport, convenient for me when needing to catch an early morning flight. I had a short stay, comfortable, and centrally located within Hilo. The apartment is small, but clean with kitchen and fridge for those that prefer to cook meals instead of eating out. Great for single travelers!

Jeffrey promptly replied my email before trip, told me everything around Hilo. The condo was close to farmer market and famous restaurant.

I was surprised to find a bottle of wine as greeting gift. Although I didn't meet Jeffrey in person, I deeply felt his hospitality.  Thank you for letting us stay.

The villa is just beside Hawaii state park, so surrounded by wild trees and flowers. Large pond is at back ground, so I enjoyed the appearance of waterfowls just like ducks, mandarin ducks, and NeNe:Hawaiian gooses. However It's not so far from downtown. I can walk to the famous cookie company: Big Island Candies about 7~8minutes. This villa must be so famous when built, appearance's maintenance is not perfect right now. But inside of the room is fashionable by owner's good sense, comfortable and clean. There are various numbers of spices, tea,coffee and beans at kitchen. I enjoyed breakfast at the terrace looking pool at downstairs. There isn't laundry inside of room, but they have laundry room in this villa.
ﾊﾜｲ州立公園の隣に位置し､ﾜｲﾙﾄﾞな木々に花々や池という多くの自然 に囲まれたｳﾞｨﾗ｡小鳥の歌に目覚め､多くの水鳥 ｱﾋﾙにｵｼﾄﾞﾘ そしてﾊﾜｲ州の鳥ﾈﾈ:ﾊﾜｲｱﾝｸﾞｰｽの姿も楽しめました｡それでいながらﾀﾞｳﾝﾀｳﾝにも遠くなく､有名なｸｯｷｰ店 Big Island Candiesには徒歩7~8分で行ける距離という便利さです
かつては鳴物入りで公開され､評判であったであろうｳﾞｨﾗは年月を経て外装はﾒﾝﾃﾅﾝｽが行き届かないですが､部屋は 簡素な家具ながらもｵｰﾅｰのｾﾝｽでお洒落で心地良く設えられてあります
ﾓﾉﾄｰﾝに纏められたｷｯﾁﾝには様々なｽﾊﾟｲｽやﾃｨｰ､ｺｰﾋｰ等が揃っており､ｳﾞｪｼﾞﾀﾘｱﾝ向けの豆類も幾種もｶﾞﾗｽ容器に入っていました
眼下にﾌﾟｰﾙを眺めるﾍﾞﾗﾝﾀﾞでの朝食を愉しみました
室内にはﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰが無く､建物内に共用ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰがあるそうです

The place is amazing! Just so close to the airport but you don't hear anything at all.  :) very comfy and cozy place, clean and very central. Jeffrey was very helpful ! I can definitely recommend to stay at his!

I had a great time in the Hilo area and the studio apartment of Jeffrey's was clean and organized, in a great location for everything and enough room for myself or myself and another  if I had a companion traveler. Thank you for a great place with great facilities in a great location!! ☺

Jeffrey was a great host! He was extremely quick to respond to messages. He rpovided very clear instructions for check-in and made the process quick and simple. His place is just as pictured and he provides the simple amenities that you would need when traveling. The location was also great and pretty central to all of Hilo. Thanks Jeffrey!
Great communication, clean place, good location. Just what we needed for a quick trip to Hilo!
We are grateful for the convenience and cleanliness of this accommodation. The condo is nicely decorated and neat. I liked the bamboo and tile flooring and enjoyed the rainfall shower head!

Jeffrey’s condo is really nice and well equiped. It is the perfect location to explore all attractions (vulvano, star gazing, beaches, ...).
Jeffrey is very responsive and always keen to make your stay a pleasant one. Thanks again!
Very private, comfortable bed, well decorated and well stocked with anything you could need. Close to town and Pancake House, walkable to some restaurants. We did not use the pool but it looked nice.
Jeffrey's flat is a perfect base for exploring Hilo. It's clean and well-equipped, and close to downtown, Lili'uokalani Gardens and some of the great eateries in town.
Check in process was very easy and the place was just as described. We had an amazing time exploring Hilo while staying at this Airbnb!
We really appreciate the possibility to check in earlier and the well equipped kitchen.
Good location. Cool little hidden bar in the back of the estate. Would stay again

Had a great stay at Jeffrey's centrally located apartment. While walkable to amenities, would suggest making use of the free parking and getting a rental car. Jeffrey is a great host and put together an informative welcome packet with tips and tricks. Would stay again for sure.
Great apartment, easy to get to, really fast Wifi. Thanks!
Fantastic to work with and loved the place, big pool.

Great location. Near everything we needed. Great walks to the lake and park.
Jeffrey and Alex are very accommodating and friendly. Very well appointed with kitchenette etc.
I loved Jeffrey's place. The full kitchen was awesome and the pond right behind the place was beautiful. It's so close to everything but still a quiet place.
We were told, by family,  not to swim in the pool by the park. there is not enough light in the unit when it is night.
A nice, comfortable spot to stay in Hilo. Loved the lanai (and lanai doors) and location close to the park. Even saw some nene in the parking lot!

My parents and I stayed at Jeffrey's place for 3 days. It was absolutely lovely. We loved everything, especially the kitchen! Location is perfect, only 5 min from the Hilo airport. Jeffrey is super easy to talk to, definitely a wonderful host.
Jeffrey's place was clean and would've been a perfect place for me.  Unfortunately I was unable to take advantage of his beautiful place.
Nice apartment well located, well equipped and very clean. Jeffrey is nice and helpful. The only bad points are the noisy neighbors ans the sofq which is not comfortable for sleeping.

Jeffrey's place is very well designed and decorated. The kitchen was well laid out and very functional given the studio size. The full-sized memory foam bed was pretty comfy (Ok for smaller sized couple like us, lol) and the rainfall showerhead was great. The wifi worked well and the apartment is close to sites like Carlsmith Beach and downtown Hilo. Jeffrey communicated clearly and provided a detailed and clear binder with house rules and lots of recommendations for things to do in the area. We found it very helpful. Check in was a breeze with the lock box near the door. There is ample parking.

I would mention to women traveling alone or parents with kids, we did have concerns with the condo complex itself. It is in the Waiakea Villas. The building exterior was a bit rough looking and the sound insulation was poor. Some of the tenants/guests acted in ways that made us uncomfortable. We didn't have anything bad happen to us, but as a Waiakea Villas tenant wrote in her review of the complex in 2016 on TripAdvisor, "It wouldn't be a bad idea to be a little careful around here."
Perfect place for the weekend
Comfy, cozy and quaint

This was a very clean and organised unit. It was a well thought out layout. Our family of 4 fit into the unit, with our 6 yr old twin daughters sleeping on the futon sofa bed. It was a very small bed so I am not sure if anyone larger than them would be able to share the sofa bed, I would say the second bed is more suited for a single person.
