The location of the unit within the complex meant we had a great view of the pool and it was a nice relaxing place to sit and enjoy dinner and a drink. We were not able to walk to local places from this unit (shops and restaurants), but we had a car so it was not a problem to drive to wherever we needed to go. Hilo is a great base to see this side of the island, including the Volcano National Park which is only an hour drive away. The compact kitchen area was perfect for our short trip, we were able to prepare simple meals using the additional spices  and condiments provided in the unit.
Thanks for allowing us to stay in your apartment.
Good Appartment.
Very comfortable and quaint space. Great location central to downtown Hilo.
This is a great value for the location and amenities. I'd book here again! Gracious host and lovely home.

Jeffrey's place is great! If you are looking for a place in Hilo close to all the hot spots Jeffrey's condo is the place to be! Very easy to get to. Close by to the markets. His kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to make a meal for yourself! That came in handy! He leaves a bottle of wine and everything you need to have a pleasant stay!

Jeffrey was such a gracious host!  He alway responded quickly and helped with any questions I had.  I was impressed with the little details like the sunscreen, bug spray and a first aid kit.  Although I don't drink wine, it was a very nice touch to see the bottle for the guests.  I really enjoyed staying at his place.  Great location and so clean.  An amazing value.

Jeffery was very nice to deal with. We had some tv issues and he took care of them in a very timely manner. Very nice clean apartment. Nice area to stay in. Wonderful vacation here in Hawaii. Tom and Carolyn from Minnesota

This was a very comfortable studio and quite spacious, so we never felt cramped. We spent a lot of time on the lanai, and the pool was delightful. The only negatives were the poor lighting, but that has been common on our trip, and the noisy neighbours upstairs, but they didn't keep it up late and so didn't interfere with our early nights.
Great place within proximity of great places to explore.

Jeffrey's place is quite central in Hilo - he leaves an excellent guide to area attractions, dining, and other things to do in the area. The unit is equipped with everything you need to cook, including a bottle of wine for the guests! The studio itself was quite large. 

As other guests have noted, the lighting it a bit dim in the evenings, and as the unit is located in a residential area, you will hear families using the pool area, and footsteps from the unit above both early and late in the day. 

Check in was a breeze, and Jeffrey was available to answer our questions and checked in on us during our stay. Thanks Jeffrey!
Very clean and convenient location with thoughtful touches. Guides for those visiting Hilo for the first time were a nice touch as well.

Great safe, secure location minutes from Downtown Hilo. Apartment has everything you could ask for (large kitchen, on-site laundry) and is very functional for a space of its size. Sadly we didn't get to use the pool as it rained for most of our stay, but the facilities looked good. Excellent manual of local attractions provided by the host (everyone should try out Miyo's Homestyle Japanese a few minutes away).

The location was really great easy to go everywhere. The studio was really nice to the only problem is that we heard a lot the upstairs neighbors and we got wakes up at 5 am when they loudly walk, but its the only thing that happen.

I had a great time here.  The apartment looked great, and had every cooking utensil imaginable.  The maps of local sights and eateries was fantastic for planning my day, and the location was great for seeing the sights around Hilo.
Jeffrey is a wonderful host. Great amenities and the perfect studio for two to three people. Easy access to the place and many things to explore nearby.

Jeffrey’s Place was great for people who want to explore the Hilo area. It’s super close to anything you need in town. I particularly enjoyed the waterfalls that are a 10-15 min drive from the place. 

The check in process and the communication was great. The place was clean. There’s some toiletries that were provided which was welcomed as well.
The place fits confortably no more than 2 adults or 2 adults and one child. The neighbour upstairs (who waked up at 5:20am the 2 mornings we were there) was a very heavy walker.

My sisters and I stayed here for one night. It is minutes away from the ITO airport, which was very convenient for us. It’s small, but cozy and perfect for 2-3 guests. It’s even a great spot to stay if you’re traveling alone. Jeffrey was very responsive, and check-in was a breeze. Sad we couldn’t stay longer.

Jeffery's place was great! We really enjoyed our stay. The apartment feels much like a small home equipped with everything you could possibly need. It is a short distance to downtown Hilo and right next to a scenic lake. I would definitely recommend staying here if you visit Hilo!
Very clean unit. Walking distance to town. Close to tide pool snorkeling.

Great room and location!! 
Stayed for 7 nights and it was a great place to call home base! Cozy apartment and about a 5 minute drive from anything you may want (airport, restaurants, grocery stores, farmers market, & beaches!)
Jeffrey was very prompt and friendly when responding to any questions we had. 
We loved it here and would recommend to anyone staying on the Hilo side of the Big Island!!
Easy access driving to downtown area and super easy access to the airport.
Lovely unit at a great location.  The unit is stocked with basic stuff you may need.  Great value.

Jeffrey's place is cute and convenient! Not only is it a great base for exploring the Hilo side of the island, it also has an awesome kitchen and a relaxing lanai. Jeffrey also answered all our questions right away- very quick and communicative. The upstairs neighbors are quite loud, which is no fault of Jeffrey's, but it's something to take into consideration if you're a very light sleeper. Otherwise, no complaints as we had an awesome stay here. Thank you!
Good location, near to beach and eastern island attractions. This condo is perfect for a couple and would be crowed for three.  Jeffery was quick to answer questions.

Based on the good reviews, we've booked to stay 10 nights in this condo. It is one room with a kitchen in the one corner and bed and couch on the other side. The kitchen is fully equipped with enough pots, pans, glasses, spices, teas etc. Convenient if you want to cook for yourself. There is a separate laundry room down the hallway where you can wash your laundry and dry it for $2 each (meaning a wash and a dry will cost $4). Enough washing liquid were left for our use during our stay. The bathroom is around the corner equipped with a shower in the bath, toilet and basin. Enough toilet paper for nearly our whole stay were left for us as well as shampoo etc. Before the bathroom is a small wardrobe where we could unpack some of our clothes. Conveniently an umbrella was also left in the condo, as we were unfortunate with the weather. Wifi was excellent and we could work on our cloud server without any hick-ups. 

The location is good, we love to walk so it was no problem for us to walk into the centre of town to the restaurants etc. Although I do think it might be too far for some people or if you travel with small children. There were also 3 restaurants a little bit closer where we enjoyed good food. More than enough parking space outside the condo. 

The only negative which happens to be a big negative for us. The upstairs neighbour and her grown up sons. We were staying for 10 nights and without an exception we were woken up each morning around 5:30am by their loud walking. After that they switched on the television, sometimes so loud we struggled to have a conversation on the balcony with each other. Not to mention them swearing, coughing, smoking weed and spitting over the balcony in our view. It really spoiled our stay. This normally continued until noon after which it quieted down. Perhaps if we have stayed a shorter period it wouldn't have affected us that much, but this was our dream holiday and last thing we needed on a daily basis.

Our booking was 90% based on the good reviews and some people did mention the noisy neighbours. Perhaps we just really had it unlucky, I don't know. In all honestly the owner did offer (after our stay) to refund some of the money. Unfortunately nothing can give us the time back we have lost or change our memories of our stay. 

I will recommend this condo for shorter stays to explore the Hilo area and volcanoes. After that move on and stay in different places around the island to make the most of your stay.
A really lovely apartment with friendly and helpful hosts. The apartment isn't in the nicest area of Hilo but is a good base.

Jeff was very responsive and check in was simple. His studio condo is great for 2 people and is a great value. Hilo doesn’t have many hotel options so Airbnb was the way to go and Jeff’s place is very central.
A cute little unit .only spent 2 nights here . It was 2xlean and tidy and jeremy was a great host .Always answered any messages quickly

Quiet, clean, cozy space perfect those looking for a place to lay their head after a day of sightseeing. Walkable to Banyan drive hotels and a short 5 minute drive to downtown Hilo. Jeffery was a easy to get in touch with and very helpful, especially when I needed assistance. Would recommend staying!
房东人非常的好,我算错时间提前一个小时到了,房东正在打扫卫生,让我们在阳台上坐着等,并且很快打扫完让我们提前入住了｡楼下有免费的停车场,不远处有星巴克,离机场也很近｡房间干净,设施齐全,性价比超高｡
This place is perfectly located, close to Merry Monarch and many other great places to visit in Hilo.  Really nice kitchen remodel.  Everything one could need.

The stay: 

Cleanliness:
- Could be better, dust and there was a big stain in the shower of what looks to be an old rusted mat in the shower.
- The carpet in the main room had a few stains on it
- Underneath the couch was a lot of dust and dirt
- The Carpet at the main door was very small, and is not ideal for drying shoes or having more than one.  So, if it's a rainy day be prepared for a very wet floor. 

Amenities:
- Has a stove, dishwasher, oven, nice shower and shower head, nice toilet amenities
- Wifi works well
- No Cable TV, just dvd player and apple tv but is a paid per movie/tv series basis
- pool access key which is nice
- Lanai / balcony has a very nice view of the pool and the back
- Only 1 toilet paper roll, i bought a lot to leave for the next guest as previous airbnb hosts leave at least 2 for the stay. 
- no water to drink, bought a case of local bottled water and left in the fridge for the next guest
- no paper towels, but 2 towels for me was provided. 
- No elevators, so prepare to go up a level/down a level (if carrying heavy luggage, be careful)

Overall experience: 
- Location is very good, as it is in the downtown core of Hilo
- Free Parking
- The host leaves a full guide of everything to do on the island and main attractions to see
- bed sheets and pillows were clean
- not as clean as the pictures described.

- I'd recommend the place if you're okay to clean up the place as you stay and not have high expectations of the cleanliness of the floor and shower. The location, wifi and recommendations by the host made the stay better.
Decent place, a little hard to find but was able to make it in. Place has swimming pool available. Jeffrey was out of reception so we tried our best to settle down and spend the night.

Jeffery was a great host! He is very prompt at responding to messages and leaves a nice welcoming condo to stay in. I appreciated how clean it was, and it was a nice touch having the fan and lights on for us for our arrival. It truly felt like a place with heart Which made us feel welcome and as if we had a piece of home with us on our travels.
The check in was easy. It's a great place! Perfect for spending time after a long day as well as just relaxing. Very clean and home like. Would definitely recommend to anyone staying in the area. :)

Spacious studio with well equipped kitchen facilities. Location is good providing you have a car - 5 minute drive to downtown or to the airport. Plenty of parking available. Close drive to supermarkets, cafe's and restaurants.
We were a little disappointed with the cleanliness of the apartment, could definitely benefit with a professional clean.

저희가 일찍 체크인 하는 바람에 숙소 정리가
안되어 있었어요. 이후에 직접 침대 커버와 베게커버, 수건을 가져다주었구요~
베개에서 조금 냄새가 나긴 했지만... 잘 잤습니다 ㅎㅎ 
식당에 요리 기구들이 많아서 잘 사용했어요
Location was convenient. TV was difficult to operate until we finally figured it out. In general, good place to stay.
I highly recommend renting from Jeffrey. He is extremely responsive and one of the kindest people I have encountered. The place was clean, cute and full of everything needed for the 6 night stay.
Bien situé, propre mais bruyant. Un peu plus d’informations mises à disposition sur les équipements seraient les bienvenues.
Good host
Cute little studio in a great location with a practically fully equipped kitchen, an Apple TV, lanai furnature, à sofa, and cute decor. Would recommend!
Jeffery's place was very clean, and had all the things we needed. We enjoyed our stay!

We loved staying at Jeffrey's! It's an adorable studio in a cute little community. There is pool access and laundry access, which were big for us. But, the best part of the whole place, is the bed and pillows. We LOVED how comfortable the bed and pillows were. Its not your typical cheap BnB mattress and linen set; we got excellent sleep on a quality mattress!

Jeffrey's place was a nice place to come back to recharge after a long day.  Host was very responsive and the condo unit was very clean and well kept.  It is VERY close to the airport and just a short 5 minute drive to downtown Hilo.   I would stay here again for sure the next time we return to Hilo!
Enjoyed the stay and was walking distance to downtown and not far from a  park with bridges and a harbor. Ideal place for 2 people .

Das Appartment war ordentlich und sauber, aber eben in dem landesüblichen Stil. Leider war der Ofen defekt, aber Jeffrey hat sofort versucht, das Problem zu beheben. Leider war es nicht möglich, mehr als einen Nachrichten- oder Sportsender abends/ nachts  zu sehen. Insgesamt war es aber ein gelungener Aufenthalt mit wunderbarem Frühstück auf dem Balkon!

We stayed here only for one night, but loved this cute studio. All the things you need to cook a yummy breakfast. The interior decor is very nice too. Best of all were Jeffrey’s lightning speed answers when we had questions about the laundry room in the early morning. Will stay here again if in Hilo!

Nice studio with the great location in Hilo. Communication with Jeffery was smooth and quick!

Thank you for hosting us!
What a super nice, clean, and welcoming place! Super prompt responses. Lovely studio apartment with everything you would need :)  residential, great pool... recommend it!

Super cute studio apartment that is well equipped with great amenities including a well stocked kitchen, AC and a pool.  Jeffrey was great to deal with and very accommodating. The suite is centrally located for easy access to downtown or highways.  Upstairs neighbours were noisy as other reviews mentioned but we were able to get a great sleep anyhow.
Great location as it is close to airport!

This nicely furnished studio is in an older complex that looks like it might be making a comeback. Good location and value. We had early morning stompers over us, but there's no control over that. The unit is well stocked and there are decent amenities on the property.
We stayed 3 nights un Jeffrey’s place. Very well located, not far from airport. Thanks for all

Great studio apartment with thoughtful finishing touches. Close to the local bench spots and airport. Noisy upstairs neighbors however this has been mentioned previously. Jeffrey was great to deal with. Would stay again.

Jeffreys Wohnung ist wie beschrieben. Es liegt sehr zentral und hat eine schnelle Anbindung an den Flughafen. Wir einen kurzen Aufenthalt, um die Vilkane zu erkunden, ist die Wohnung perfekt. Sie ist vollständig ausgestattet, geräumig und sauber. Die Nachbarn über der Wohnung sind - wie andere Bewertjngen es schon geschrieben haben - wirklich etwas lauter. Aber da wir nur zum Schlafen da waren, war es nicht so schlimm. Wir würden immer wieder Jeffrey wählen!
The condo is really close to Hilo down town. It is a good place for exploring the eastern part of big island. We only spent three nights and it was to short.
Good place

Wir durften in Jeffrey´s Studio für 4 Nächte übernachten. Entgegen der Angaben zum Check-In konnten wir mit vorheriger Rücksprache bereits früher einchecken. Das Studio liegt in der Nähe des Stadtzentrums von Hilo, welches man zu Fuß oder mit dem Auto gut erreichen kann, genauso liegt der Flughafen in guter Nähe (kein Fluglärm). Die Ausstattung des Studios ist sehr gut. Es fehlte an nichts, selbst gewisse Grundnahrungsmittel waren vorhanden und durften auch mitbenutzt werden. In allem würden wir jederzeit wieder bei Jeffrey´s Studio einchecken. Mahalo :)

Pros: Good location, relatively clean
Cons: VERY loud at night and early morning, underpowered air conditioner, unresponsive owner

We stayed for two nights, Saturday - Monday. The condo is in a good location, close to the airport and downtown. Area is nice, no safety/security issues. The condo bathroom was not the cleanest but the rest of the unit was very clean. The condo is on the second floor of a three-floor building that is made out of wood and is probably 20-30 years old. To say that this building is loud is an understatement. Read the other reviews here and you'll notice a theme that it can be very loud, particularly the upstairs neighbour. We were optimistic and positive when we got there, but it was the loudest condo we've ever rented. The upstairs neighbour was up at 5:30am on Sunday morning rearranging furniture and generally was extremely loud, although we weren't sure if the noise was the neighbour specifically or just the building's wooden construction and age. 

The television is pretty much worthless. No cable, no dvd's but if you bring your own there is a dvd player. The apple tv did not work when we were there and we called the owner (Jeffrey) four times over our two day stay with no response from him. In all fairness, we did not leave voicemail messages, but we did call multiple times over a 2-day period. The air conditioner was ridiculously underpowered and if you arrive on a warm day or in the summer it could be an issue. We got there at 7pm on an unusually warm/humid September day and the air conditioner is so small and underpowered that it took 6 hours to cool the unit down enough to sleep. Overall, I would say that the biggest disappointments were the completely unresponsive owner and the extent of the noise from the upstairs neighbour at late/early hours of the day. You get what you pay for, and we will definitely not be staying here again.
Nice studio! Very roomy and has everything you need. Also has a great lanai!!
Very good location and cute little space. I would recommend for anyone trying to get lots of things done in Hilo! It’s also very clean and has lots of amenities!

Die Unterkunft entspricht ziemlich genau den Angaben und Fotos aus der Beschreibung. Das zuvor in anderen Bewertungen beschriebene Lautstärkeproblem (sicherlich der Tatsache eines Holzhauses geschuldet) besteht weiterhin. Dafür kann Jeffrey aber nichts. Alles andere war bestens!
The apartment is spacious and clean, and it's close to everything!

The check in process was easy and the apartment was clean when we arrived. The space is small but the kitchen area was well stocked with all the essentials needed for cooking and eating. There is no real functional inside dining room table but there is a small foldout table for that purpose.  The bed is truly a full sized bed, which is small for 2 people. There is no dresser or chest to store clothing or place suitcases so we had to use the couch and floor. The free-standing closet outside the bathroom is small and did not have much space to put clothing. Jeffrey had the bathroom stocked with soap, shampoo and conditioner as well as plenty of clean towels.  There is wireless internet but we could not figure out how to work the television. The outside lanai is spacious and has a couch, coffee table and dining table, which we used rather than the indoor foldout table. The location seemed to be more in a residential area than an area for vacationers. It is not close to restaurants or grocery stores and it is not near the water.   It is a bit of a drive to get to any of the beach parks for swimming or snorkeling.
Nice location, not far from airport
Easy parking, convenient location, well put together studio, clean: just as described. Jeffrey was an impeccable host, would definitely stay at again if in Hilo!
Nice stay but the neighborhood looks a bit strange (lot of desolate cars).

Very clean and well appointed! Residential, chosen for a central location to all we would be doing. As others have mentioned it sounds like the upstairs neighbors are stomping, not the fault of the hosts-ear plugs did the trick for us-which I typically use when traveling. Lovely pool, closes at 7pm so missed using using it by the time we got settled. Laundry room close to unit. Lots of open parking. A\C did the trick. Neat place !

Perfect location!  Close to downtown Hilo and airport. Plenty of parking. Quiet  apt complex. Super easy check-in! Clean. Awesome travel tips...wish we stayed longer to check them out. Apt is cute and cozy. Def recommend!
Clean place, stylish, everything we needed for a comfortable stay, fast WIFI and apple TV, close by to restaurants and bars

Great stay. We had everything we needed for our stay. It worked for us (myself, wife and daughter) perfectly. The place comes with everything you need for your stay. Definitely would recommend it if you are visiting Hilo.
well put together living space. The complex is a bit past its heyday but still very interesting.

Pour : Bonne situation, relativement propre, quartier sûr et cuisine très équipée (avec tout ce qui est nécessaire pour cuisiner et un lave-vaisselle) !

Contre : Lit trop petit pour deux personnes, voisins très bruyants le matin et le soir, carcasses de voiture abandonnées sur le parking de la résidence donnant une atmosphère particulière, pas d'ascenseur pour monter les valises au deuxième étage et appartement relativement sombre après le couché du soleil.
很好的公寓,隔音差了点
Its dirty. Avoid if you can. The bed barely fits a person who is only 5' 7" and the bathroom and kitchen are the color of yellow.
Place was clean and modern. Jeffery was very responsive and accommodating.

Ein wirklich hübsches Apartment mit guter Atmosphäre und einer toll ausgestatteten Küche.
Die Wohnung wirkt heller und größer als auf den Bildern.
Das Highlight ist sicherlich auchder zum Pool ausgerichtete Balkon auf dem man hervorragend Frühstücken kann.
Das Preis- Leistungsverhältnis ist sehr gut und Jeffrey unkompliziert und locker was den Check- in und out betrifft.
Vielen lieben Dank dafür ;)

This place is a good location to everything. Downtown is like 5 min drive away and most trails are like 15 min car ride away. This studio has the full kitchen with refrigerator and stove. It came equipped with cooking utensils and knives. My complaint is that the knives are not sharp at all. The scissor was the best knife. I was here for a week and there wasn’t enough toilet paper in stock. This place is small and better suited for a single person or a couple who don’t mind noises. I understand that this is an apartment complex and it is inevitable that you will hear your neighbors since you share walls. However, The upstairs has a large dog that you can hear running around and loud neighbors who were arguing at 6am when I was trying to sleep. They are so loud and it’s non stop. The noise is at all hours and they make the walls shake so the picture frames move side ways. I contacted the host about it and he said it was a known issue and he would contact someone. Unfortunately, The noise only stopped for a few hours... also, the shower pressure sucks. If the upstairs neighbor didn’t wake me up so early everyday than I think I would enjoy my vacation/stay more.
Very responsive and very friendly

This is a residential complex and very loud at times. It sounded like a herd of elephants above us starting at 5 am. The place is very small but it was fine for me and my daughter. Other than the kitchen being fairly dirty and the complex itself being really loud it is a very good location.

We arrived late at night for our flight & a security guard was so nice to help us to find our building on the other side of the complex.  The condo was a good size with large, well equipped kitchen.  The kitchen had a good set of utensils and even a nice selection of food items.  The apartment was clean, well organized, and nicely decorated.  The bathroom was clean and also well stocked with towels and other items.  The living room area had a nice sofa, and on the deck was a comfortable love-seat and dining table.  We really liked the location and surroundings of this airbnb.  For example, we were happily awaken by bull frogs and birds in the morning & surprised to see friendly chicken & ducks around lagoon. The location of this airbnb is very convenient.  There are so many nice restaurants nearby ( we had a rental car) & a couple of great lunch takeout lined with locals. We walked around several nice state parks & local beaches just within 20min drive. We also enjoyed volcanic NP about an hour drive.  We felt safe in the area, and the people in the apartment complex were friendly.  For example, a neighbor was nice to make the change for us when we needed it to do laundry.  The only negative we experienced is that the  neighbor in the upstairs apartment were noisy.  Between 6  and 8 am, and again in the evening the neighbors made a lot of noise furiously stomping back and forth.  There also appeared to be a big dog that stomped around all day.   These negatives  were far outweighed by its positives.  In summary,  we had a great time stay at this apt as  different environment.

Jeffrey’s place is near everything. It’s a small studio but perfect for 2-3 people. The back deck was a great spot to hang out. The only complaint we have was from the morning. The neighbors above us sounded like they were tossing furniture around and the whole building was shaking (pretty sure it was dogs though). Overall I would recommend!
位置离希洛机场很近,周围绿化很好

This was a fabulous location and a fabulous apartment!  We enjoyed having a nice place that was within easy driving distance to shopping and restaurants but away from traffic and hustle bustle.  The dogs and chickens just added to the ambience!  Everything we needed immediately was available so we did not feel the need to rush out shopping after a long day of travel.

The location was superb definitely the right size for a party of 3, too busy to enjoy the pool but the balcony was great despite the dogs upstairs. No need for an alarm the kids(dogs) will wake you early enough.  I would definitely rent from Jeff again.  We found a quaint local restaurant “Ken’s House of Pancakes” super close to Jeff’s and a must to visit.
Great loxation, very close to airport and close to town. Fully stocked kitchen with some food available. Double bed in the main living quarters. [One big room], but very comfortable.

name: MTL DOWNTOWN STUDIO APT 6A
summary: My Studio apartments located at downtown Montreal. Parthenais & Sherbrooke Intersect. 24Hours Public transportation, at the corner & runs every 7 mins. There are two Metro lines, also in walking distance Frontenac and Sherbrooke, Green-Orange lines. Plateau, is one of the most trendy neighbourhood, only 700 m away, which you can find many bars, cafes, restaurants, shops and more.  A large grocery market in 5 mins walk. It’s safe and quite, yet you are in the centre of the city of Montreal.
space: All my studio apartments are situated in the same building. They come with, a comfy Queen size bed, Side table, Sofa, two chairs with a desk/table that designed to accommodate you, while you're on your computer or dine. 42" Smart tv or larger, Split AirConditioner ~ cools and heats, Central Heating system works also perfect! Microwave oven, Convection Oven, 2 burner glass Cooktop, Bar Fridge with a freezer 4cu, a set of cutlery, plates, pans glass, cups. Private bathroom with a bathtub and 24H hot water. High-speed wifi internet that covers every apartment. Coin laundry in the building. Free street parking and usually easy to find parking spot.
description: My Studio apartments located at downtown Montreal. Parthenais & Sherbrooke Intersect. 24Hours Public transportation, at the corner & runs every 7 mins. There are two Metro lines, also in walking distance Frontenac and Sherbrooke, Green-Orange lines. Plateau, is one of the most trendy neighbourhood, only 700 m away, which you can find many bars, cafes, restaurants, shops and more.  A large grocery market in 5 mins walk. It’s safe and quite, yet you are in the centre of the city of Montreal. All my studio apartments are situated in the same building. They come with, a comfy Queen size bed, Side table, Sofa, two chairs with a desk/table that designed to accommodate you, while you're on your computer or dine. 42" Smart tv or larger, Split AirConditioner ~ cools and heats, Central Heating system works also perfect! Microwave oven, Convection Oven, 2 burner glass Cooktop, Bar Fridge with a freezer 4cu, a set of cutlery, plates, pans glass, cups. Private bathroom with a bathtub and 24H hot wa
neighborhood_overview: We are located at east downtown Montreal, walking distance to the centre of the city about 20 mins, walk to The Gay Village 15 mins, Plateau 8 mins (this is the most trendy local Montrealers neighbourhood, you will experience true Montreal vibe here!.  La Fontaine Park 5 mins, Old city 30 mins, Unv of Montreal 20 mins, McGill Unv. 30 mins (Public bus frequent to McGill & core of Mtl. Metro/Green line 10min by walk, Orange line Metro station 20 mins. Many Restaurants and cafes in short walk.
notes: We are located off Sherbrooke and Parthenais, which is in the jurisdiction of Ville Marie, Montreal (Downtown Montreal). You can walk to many attractions from here or a short public transportation, which is available 24h at the door. The Plateau is 700 meters, The Gay Village about 12-15 mins walk, old city will take about 30-35 mins walk, UQAM about 20 mins by walk, McGill 30 mins by walk (also bus number #24 runs from our corner 24 hours and every 7 mins that goes direct to Mcgill, UQAM, Concordia Universities.
transit: 10 mins walk from Frontenac metro, 14 mins Papineau metro (Green lines) and 18 mins Sherbrooke metro (Orange Line) by walk. 2 Public buses runs from the our corner, #24 and #10. Bus 24 runs every 7 mins and 24H/7week. So, public transportation is very efficient here. Most attractions are in walking distance. We are located at Downtown Montreal and lower Plateau area.
access: Coin Laundry in the building. Free street parking available all around the neighbourhood. Recycle and Garbage bins are at front of the building and accessible anytime
interaction: It's your private apartment and I provide all check-in and out information in advance, however I tent to meet in person, while you are checking in.

host.host_about:
I immigrated to Canada in 2004. I have lived at downtown Toronto till 2015 then I have moved in to beautiful Montreal Downtown, now living and traveling back and forth to Montreal and Toronto. I would say, I have two home towns now : ). Running 1 bed& breakfast and an apartment suit, in Toronto and Apartment Suits in Montreal, both located in downtown. I provide clean, affordable and central located accommodation since 2008. I am also a traveler, therefore I do understand very well that traveller's  expectations...

I am very easy going and easy to approach and open minded person. 
I do believe and pursue universal values that speaks to every being with a respect, that's one of the reason that I am in love with Canada!

reviews.comments: Unal was very easy to get a hold of, and extremely helpful. He was very responsive and had an answer to every question we asked. The apartment was very nice, newly renovated, looks just like the pictures. I recommend staying there :)

I stayed here for 9 weeks. The apartment was clean and well stocked when I arrived. The internet and TV ( which has Netflix) were all very nice. The apartment is modern and well designed. I never had any issue with noisy neighbors or problems. A great spot for a longer term stay.
We like this clean and very functional apartment. It's basically but fully furnished. So we can take it easy here.

Unal's place was perfect for our six week stay in Montreal. The apartment was newly refurbished so everything was very clean and in great condition. Unal has created a very welcoming living space for guests and the fast internet connection and Netflix were a big bonus. The location was also great for exploring the city both on foot and by public transport. Communication with Unal was very clear and easy. He's a very friendly and welcoming guy so we felt at home right away, and if we had questions or needed anything he responded very quickly. We would definitely stay again and can recommend Unal's place to anyone visiting Montreal.

name: Luxurious oasis and family home in North Bondi
summary: Steps from North Bondi Beach, numerous cafes and the bondi markets. You’ll love my place because of its laidback feel and luxurious oasis with north facing garden and glass fronted pool. Three light filled levels with a free flowing living space.. My place is good for families, couples or groups of couples.
description: Steps from North Bondi Beach, numerous cafes and the bondi markets. You’ll love my place because of its laidback feel and luxurious oasis with north facing garden and glass fronted pool. Three light filled levels with a free flowing living space.. My place is good for families, couples or groups of couples.

host.host_about: Young professional

name: Loios Studio Apartment 3
summary: Located in a charming street that's part of UNESCO's Heritage Site, 3 minutes walking from the São Bento train station and very close to one of the most beautiful streets in Porto downtown, Rua das Flores. Loios apartment is on the third floor of a building from the 19th century which has been fully renewed.
space: The apartment has a comfortable double bed, all the decor is inspired by the design from the mid-century. The apartment has a small but well equipped kitchen with a microwave, a stove and a small fridge. The bathroom has a shower, a sink and a toilet. Also in the apartment you find a dining table and a comfortable armchair.
description: Located in a charming street that's part of UNESCO's Heritage Site, 3 minutes walking from the São Bento train station and very close to one of the most beautiful streets in Porto downtown, Rua das Flores. Loios apartment is on the third floor of a building from the 19th century which has been fully renewed. The apartment has a comfortable double bed, all the decor is inspired by the design from the mid-century. The apartment has a small but well equipped kitchen with a microwave, a stove and a small fridge. The bathroom has a shower, a sink and a toilet. Also in the apartment you find a dining table and a comfortable armchair. The guests can access the apartment through a common staircase by the entrance. We welcome every guest personally and we always have time to help you with some tips about the city. The neighborhood is part of UNESCO's Heritage Site, is very picturesque and typical, and has narrow streets up and down the river, providing the best treats for sightseeing. The studi
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is part of UNESCO's Heritage Site, is very picturesque and typical, and has narrow streets up and down the river, providing the best treats for sightseeing. The studios are located in a utterly quiet place, with no bars and a few small restaurants. However, the surrounding area is filled with great bars, restaurants or shops.
notes: The neighborhood is part of UNESCO's Heritage Site, very picturesque and typical, and has narrow streets up and down the river, providing the best treats for sightseeing. The studios are located in a utterly quiet place, with no bars and a few small restaurants. However, the surrounding area is filled with great bars, restaurants or shops.
transit: The apartment is about 3 minutes walking from metro and São Bento train station, that connects with the airport and to Campanhã train station. Taxis' point is just 2 min away, as well as the busy bus stops.
access: The guests can access the apartment through a common staircase by the entrance.
interaction: We welcome every guest personally and we always have time to help you with some tips about the city.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
El apartamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Todo precioso decorado, nuevo (fuimos sus primeros huéspedes) y con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en Oporto.

La ubicación es inmejorable, a un minuto andando de la Torre de los Clérigos y de la Estación de Sao Bento. 

Elói fue un anfitrión genial, adaptándose a nuestra hora de llegada y facilitándonos toda la información necesaria sobre Oporto! Repetiría sin duda!

It was very nice meeting with Eloí (Good Stay) !
We obviously shared the same interested for taste in art,design and architecture.He gave us some very useful and interesting tips on arrival to explore the city.
The fine designed apartment and it's central location was ideal to explore Porto at it's best ! we definitely recommend.

The apartment looks great, even better than the pictures to be honest. The location is great for discovering Porto, easy to access and in the middle of town. The only thing we had, was that the apartment was slightly cold and the shower as well. This could be very well due to the fact that it was very cold during our stay. I can't imagine that this otherwise would be a problem.

We had a great stay in this apartment! Communication was great with hosts and they were very helpful with recommendations. The apartment is beautiful and very new. Small but well equipped kitchen, and a great bathroom. The host also supplied us with an extra heater, and a cleaner came half way through our week long stay. Good central location, would recommend to anyone!

Very good and well furnished appartement. Clean place and perfect location (in between the DOuro and the night spots). Its walking distance to everything in the city! We definitly recommence this place!

Beautiful and charming studio located in the heart of the city. A perfect mix of modern and vintage, enriched by precious reproductions of ancient maps of the city hanging over the walls. You can see Elói's passion for good design in the care he put in every detail. Definitely want to return.
Nice place, nice location, nice people: everything was perfect

O espaço é exactamente como as fotos. Confortável, com bastante luz e com uma óptima decoração. Bastante central, conseguimos ir a pé para quase todo o lado e é bastante próximo de vários locais de interesse na cidade do Porto. Recomendo.

El apartamento estaba genial todo nuevo, acogedor y buena calefacción. Muy limpio, que es importante y en el centro de oporto, al lado de la torre de los clérigos. Hay muchos sitios para comer y cenar al lado y un supermercado en la puerta del edificio. Ha sido una estancia perfecta en el apartamento de joao y eloi, nos recomendaron muchos sitios para ver, comer y visitar. Sin duda no te pienses reservarlo. Genial!

We had a wonderful stay  in the appartment-its cozy, nicely furnished and very central. Bars,nice Restaurants,sights-everything around  the corner and still very quiet and good to sleep! Perfect! Portable wifi and very welcoming hosts, who received us after our flight was Late and we arrived an 00:30... would come again any Time!

Our stay at the apartment of Goodstay was beyond our expectations in the centre of the beautiful historical architecture, restaurants, riverside, all at walking distance. We had a warm welcome from Eloi who gave us a list of good tips and was very gentle and helpful. Also we used the bikes of their office to get to the beach. The apartment itself is perfect, just been renovated in detail and looks very good en cosy with a great view. Our holiday was perfect with a perfect host and perfect weather!
Très bon emplacement à proximité des boutiques, restau, bars et de tout ce qu'il y a à visiter. Très bon accueil !
Lovely flat in the centre of the old town! They were very accommodating and flexible with check in which was good as our flight was delayed and we arrived at 1am! Thanks for having us!

bel monolocale nuovo, arredato con gusto, in condominio interamente adibito ad accoglienza temporanea. Posizione centrale e comoda per i mezzi pubblici.
Ancora qualche dettaglio da risolvere, come ad esempio la mancanza di prese elettriche sufficienti per accendere contemporaneamente calorifero e abat-jour, e altri piccoli dettagli come la mancanza di spazi di appoggio in bagno.
per il resto soggiorno piacevole
Confortable, pratique et bien centré. Belle esthétique.
Great stay at the apartment, they were very accommodating with our check in and out times. Would definitely recommend!

This apartment was everything we could wish for our days in Porto: the best location, very close to the center town, quiet, clean and very comfortable. Good Sta were very good hosts: very nice and ready to help. I would definitely recommend this apartment to other guests.
Das Apartment ist superschön, wie beschrieben.alles sehr sauber und schön renoviert und gestaltet. Die Lage könnte nicht besser sein. wir würden es zu 100% empfehlen!!
Lovely
Klasse Appartement. Tolle Lage, gute Verkehrsanbindung. Für 2 Personen perfekt, um Porto zu erkunden.
Logement très bien situé

El piso está tal y cómo se describe, perfecto para una estancia en Oporto de unos días. Su ubicación en una pequeña calle, con vista a los techos le hace perfecto para visitar todos los sitios emblemáticos de la ciudad.
Host was vey kind and location is very good to go to hot place in Porto.

Beautiful apartment in excellent location for exploring the city centre, a few minutes walk from lots of great shops and restaurants. Eloi was helpful and quick to reply via What's App, and made our checkin very easy (despite the fact that we were 20 minutes late, really sorry about that!). Porto is an incredible city and I would happily recommend this apt for anyone looking to stay there!
Excelente localização, super prestativos no atendimento e ainda pudemos levar o roteador do apartamento pela cidade - uma mão na roda!

perfect stay in a perfect renewed accomodation under the roof of an old portuguese flat. very good located at sao bento trainstation. communication was as good as it can be - we also got very intersting hinds to visit. thanks eloi!
It was a really nice stay! Perfect location in the city centre. Elòis gave gave us good recommendations what to do and how get around in Porto. Thanks a lot!
todo perfecto excepto que el apartamento tiene un problema con los mosquitos, y bastante grave.

The location of the appartment is perfect. In the centre of Porto and just at few minutes walking to the most important monuments and points of interest in the city. The communication with the owners was incredibly easy, Joana was relly fast replying and answering our questions, Eloi got us inform of the situation of the appartment and João shown us the place and provided us a lot of useful information. They were very kind to us. The appartment has a lot of light and it's perfect for a couple, with all the needs covered and really near for supermarket, shops and metro and train station and really easy to reach from the airport.

The only bad things to say about the appartment was that it hasn't any elevator and it's a third floor. For the same reason it's a bit hot nowadays.

The location is the perk of this place. It's so close to the train station as well as so many great restaurants. You can walk almost anywhere from here. The space itself is tastefully decorated and clean and it was nice to stay in a historic building. I would agree with some other reviews of this host that say it is nice but 'no frills'. The basics were available but it was lacking in some of the extras that some b&b's provide: no dish towel or paper towel, few dishes, no cooking basics, no bath mat, only 1 extra roll of toilet paper, etc. Being 3rd floor, it's a lot of stairs to climb and gets very hot. The open windows meant a lot of bug bites as the mosquitoes were awful. Joana was excellent to offer suggestions of restaurants and help us store our luggage for the day we checked out. Overall, we enjoyed our stay in Porto but felt it important to mention a few of these things for future travellers to consider!

The apartment has a great location. It is a third floor, so be patient with the luggage. João was very helpful with the trollies and gave us very good indications of the city. It is the last floor so it is really hot, there is not air conditioning in place, we had to buy a fan, because sleeping with closed windows was mandatory because of mosquitos. The cleaning of the apartment was not as expected, floors with dust and dead mosquitos on the walls. 
It could be a great apartment for winter, but I would not recommend it for summer.
Really nice and warm appartment in heart of Porto town
Really nice location, close from the station Sao Bento. Enough space for 3 people. The portable Wifi is really nice as well ! We really enjoyed our holidays !!
Joli appartement correspondant bien aux photos. Il est très bien situé et calme. Bon accueil, et ils ont été arrangeant pour les bagages. Nous le recommandons

Joana gave us a warm welcome. She gave us a lot of tips for our stay in Porto (places to visit, restaurants,...). The appartment was just like in the pictures. There was only one unfortunate thing that bothered us; the freezer wouldn't close and leaked into the fridge. If this can be fixed, you have a great appartment in a perfect location to spend a holiday in wonderful Porto!
A perfect location. However the place does not have air condition and in our opinion a must for that location.  Especially noisey when you keep the windows open.
A good well located place to stay in Porto
Highly recommend! It's a beautiful apartment with a central location.

Beautiful studio, roomy and well appointed. Joana met us, carried a bag up and gave many useful tips about Porto, writing them on a map.  The location is a short distance to major pedestrian street.  Can walk to sites throughout, even across the river to Port houses.  Only drawback was noise from street, especially on Friday night.  A fan would help with cooling and street noise.

The place was exactly as we expected, and the reality totally matched the pictures. Perfect location, nice views, very well equipped and decorated, and the attention on the check in was perfect: We were recommended of many places to visit, eat and drink. We really wnjoyed our days in Porto thanks to the cozyness and perfect location of this place

The appartment is nice and cosy, well furnished and well decorated.
The location is perfect, in the city center near to everything in Porto. I recomand it
Die Lage war sehr gut! Man könnte alles gut erreichen. Das Apartment war sehr schön und es hat alles den Angaben entsprochen! Wir können es nur weiterempfehlen!
Great place, central easy to walk most places

Wir hatten tolle drei Tage in Porto – u. 
a. wegen dieser schönen Unterkunft! Da sie mitten im Zentrum lag, konnte man sich entspannt alles in Porto anschauen und sogar zwischendurch kurz zur Wohnung zurückkehren (um eine kleine Pause zu machen). 

Das Apartment ist – wie man den Fotos entnehmen kann – sehr cool und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Sie ist schön hell und es gibt einen kleinen Supermarkt genau gegenüber.

Wir wurden sehr nett an der Wohnung in Empfang genommen und haben alle möglichen Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt bekommen. Check-In und -Out waren jeweils super unkompliziert.

Petit appartement idéal pour une escapade à Porto ! Situé en vieille ville, il est proche de tout et tout est atteignable à pied. La communication était facile, notre hôte était à l'heure pour nous ouvrir, nous présenter l'appartement et nous a donné une carte de la ville en nous conseillant des bonnes adresses. 
En bref, logement parfait pour un couple, je recommande
Gut
Séjour très sympa dans l'appartement de Joana, conforme à la description, il a beaucoup de charme, proche du métro, des restau et de la ribeira

La localisation est idéale et les informations sur l'appartement nous ont beaucoup aidées. La propreté n'était pas parfaite et heureusement qu'il y avait un chauffage d'appoint car il faisait froid. Cela n'a aucunement gâcher notre séjour que nous avons apprécié, l'appartement est totalement conforme au descriptif

The apartement has a great Central location, there are many good restaurants, bars and also supermarkets in walking distance.
The hosts are amazing, they’re always replying in a few minutes and have great advices for Porto.
I can definetly recommend it for staying in Porto.
PERFECT!!!!!!
Loved everything about this place. It was perfect for a 10-day getaway and excellent value. The hosts were charming and very helpful.
Everything amazing, close to everything, reasonable price and amazing Communication with the manager !
Great location, wonderful appartment and very friendly hosts!
great location! appears just like the pictures.  Very comfortable and has everything you need.  The mobile wifi is a great bonus!

Très agréable séjour dans ce studio impeccable et particulièrement bien placé : central et cependant calme, hauteur appréciable. Joana a été très arrangeante pour les bagages, et réactive tout au long du séjour.

This is such a brilliant little flat. It’s incredibly central, there’s a little fruit and veg shop as well as a supermarket across the street and everything’s within walking distance. 

Joana was really easy to contact, friendly, helpful and had good restaurant recommendations. What more can you ask for??

Lovely quiet little appartement in a perfect localisation. We really enjoyed our stay. 

An excellent address that we strongly recommend!

Fantastic apartment in the centre of the city. Great location, close to all the perfect highlights of the city and hotspots. Fantastic restaurants, supermarket is a short walk away as is the river. You will not go wrong with the apartment. The hosts also kindly allowed us to have a late check out and also gave us fantastic tips on checking in on where to go and what to see in the area which is a great guide. We had one issue when we were in the room and a host accidentally opened the door without notice as he was about to check in another couple into our room by mistake (he apologised profusely after). Would have also been nice to have some more amenties like loo roll as there was only one roll! Other than that the apartment was great and would still highly recommend.
Super welcoming hosts, local tips, location, comfort. Always again! Thank you!

This place was super cute and in the perfect location. Communication and check in process all went as smooth as could be and I appreciated help with transportation directions and what to see in Porto. Highly recommend!
Apartamento ideal para pareja o grupos pequeños. Con mucho encanto y en una zona ideal para disfrutar y visitar Oporto. La atención y los consejos de Joana han sido ideales.

We had an awesome time in this amazing apartment. We arrived around 1.30 am, and luckily late check-in was not a problem for Joao. He welcomed us warmly and told us a lot of helpful tips about the city. 
All in all, I would definitely return.
Good location, good staff :)
Good place.

The flat is lovely, clean with very nice and stylish furnitures ! 
It's located in the center of the city so you can walk to a lot of places and in a very cute area with typical buildings etc. Many restaurants around too !

Joao was very kind to welcome us late in the evening and suggested us a lot of adresses to go. 

I recommend !

Très joli studio, décoré avec goût (contemporain et charme). Très propre et bien équipé.
Idéalement situé dans Porto: tout est accessible à pied. De nombreux café et restaurants sont à proximité,  et pourtant le logement est très calme.
Les hôtes sont disponibles,  très arrangeants et sympathiques. Ils nous ont procuré de bons conseils.
Nous recommandons ce logement.
Great location downtown, cute place, very helpful owners !!!

Joana was communicative and attentive (she gave great recommendations for restaurants and even carried bags up the stairs!). The apartment was centrally located, well appointed, clean and had a beautiful view. It even came with a mobile WiFi hotspot. We had a wonderful time in Porto and would stay in the apartment once more.

Beautiful funky loft  in a perfect location. Lovely view from the windows.
If you are not good with stairs then maybe not for you. We’re on the wrong side of 50  and found the stairs no problem. 
Great laundromat 1 minute away around the corner. Little supermarket opposite.   Right in the heart of everything and 1 min walk to Rua Flores , plenty of restaurants and comfortable stroll down to the port. The metro
5 mins away.

De locatie is erg centraal, wat ideaal is. Communicatie is snel en we konden onze koffers op het kantoor achterlaten gedurende de periode dat we niet in het appartement konden.
Wel is de straat wat gehorig, wifi niet heel snel en zijn er wat kleine mankementen in het appartement (lekkende kraan, douchekop kan niet aan de muur hangen).
Al met al een fijn appartement!

The appartment is perfectly located to explore Porto, though a bit noisy during the night. If you are not sensible for noises, this won‘t be a problem at all. The flat offers everything you need for a city trip to Porto:)

Die Lage des Apartments ist perfekt zentral gelegen.  Die Restaurant Empfehlungen der Gastgeberin haben uns sehr gefallen. Leider ist das Badezimmer etwas spartanisch und es fehlte eine Halterung für den Duschkopf. Das Bett könnte auch etwas breiter sein. Ansonsten war das Apartment wie beschrieben.
posizione molto buona, appartamento corrispondete alle foto.
nice and clean place in the middle of the centre of Porto. Good hosts, good service
Très bon accueil

Great place in the centre of town within walking distance of everything. 
Stylish apartment and a true Portuguese experience .

Great communication and recommendations
lovely compact flat - perfectly located in central Porto. Ideal base for our weekend getaway!

The place was beautiful and in a nice location. 
Only problem was the hot water is too hot. I burned myself while taking a shower by brushing against the metal surface of the faucet. It looks like a burn from a curling iron above my hip. We were careful not to burn ourselves on the water, but wasn’t expecting the metal surface in the shower to be so hot when the water was at a comfortable temperature. 

It can get warm in the summer, and opening the windows lets the bugs in.

Very charming place with cool character on the top floor of a walk up building.  I loved opening the windows and allowing in the refreshing evening air and hearing the chatter on the winding cobblestone streets below.  Great location close to tourist sites and good restaurants.  Highly recommended!
Super zentral  und schick
Super accueil , bonnes adresses, super conseils pour les endroits à visiter ! Appartement propre et idéalement situé dans Porto, je recommande fortement !

l'appartamento è così come appare in foto, molto vicino alle maggiori attrazioni della città. 
il check in è stato rapido e João ci ha dato tantissime informazioni per visitare Porto al meglio. Il soggiorno è stato però disturbato da mancanza di completa pulizia degli ambienti. Tutto perfetto, ma migliorerei questo punto.
Espaço muito agradável. Recomendo!

Wer möglichst zentral wohnen und diverse nützliche Gastgeber-Tipps haben will - direkt eingezeichnet auf dem Stadtplan, der ist hier genau richtig! Das Appartement ist super gut gelegen und die Tipps (von Bars über Restaurants und mehr) haben sich sehr gelohnt und uns unseren Aufenthalt/die Orientierung sehr erleichtert. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön, alles war wie beschrieben. Ein rundum gelungener Aufenthalt! Wir würden jederzeit wieder hier wohnen. 

Minimaler Kritikpunkt: bei offenem Fenster ist es schon etwas laut. Und: Liegt nicht an der Wohnung aber als kleine Warnung: Rüstet euch gegen Mücken! Wir wurden nachts ordentlich gestochen!
Clean and in a great location.

위치가 정말 좋았고 되게 깔끔했어요
에어컨이 없긴하지만 엄청 큰 서큘레이터도 잇어서 괜찮았어요 강이 안보여서 아쉬웟지만 가격대비 최고였어요.
Great location, friendly and easy to deal with host.
It is a lovely place to stay in a very special city. Communication with Host is great.

The flat is in the third floor of great located building. It doesn't have air condition so it's hard to sleep well when it's hot but at the same time if you open the window the noice from the city night life it's unbearable. Flat was quite clean and as on the pictures furnished with good taste.  There is good wi-fi and in general it has all you need for a short stay. We were there for a week and maybe that's why we could see more weak points. Contact with the owner was very good. All the info were clear. The shop is next to the apartment so you can buy everything at any moment.

We chose this place for our first visit in Porto. Everything was perfect, absolutely clean and when we entered the doors we directly felt at home. Joana was really friendly and helpful. Conversation was quick and easy. We hope to come back soon to your wonderful place.
Perfekte Lage und sehr netter Empfang mit tollen Reisetipps!

Great spacious apartment exactly as shown in the pictures. Hosts were quick to respond after a problem with the wi-fi which was resolved swiftly. Good central location however this also means it can be loud at night times which makes sleeping with windows open impossible. This is a problem as room gets extremely warm and the fan provided struggles to cool the room and is also very loud. There are lots of great restaurants and bars close by and host was helpful with recommendations when we arrived!
Great location in the historic centre -  a good starting point for exploring Porto. Several good recommendations from the host.

Precioso apartamento, muy tranquilo y al lado de todo. 
Muy amables los anfitriones.
Una belleza simple y acogedora.
Die Unterkunft ist sehr sauber und schön. Sie liegt sehr zentral in der Stadt.  Wir waren sehr zufrieden.
Hemos pasado unos días estupendos! Muchas gracias por vuestra hospitalidad y las recomendaciones, hemos disfrutado mucho de Oporto.  Un saludo

Very good host.
Location couldn't be better.
Very good tips and recommendations from the host regarding the city (restaurants, bars, sightseeing places, etc.)

Appartment/studio very well located, very nice place & surroundings, everything is very close walking. The supermarket just downstairs is very useful. Weak point : the bathroom (tiny sink and no water pressure). We had a nice stay there. Many thanks.
Nice apartment and perfect location

Nice and central place in Porto!
The apartment is nicely decorated and spacious - we found everything we needed and felt comfortable! 
The location is great, as everything‘s walkable and there‘s a good link to the airport and trainstation.
The weak point might be the bathroom, as the sink is small and the shower does leak a bit, but we found that managable and would recommend staying there anyway!

name: Aparthotel RioCentro, Globo/Projac, Arena Jeunesse
summary: Situado em frente ao PROJAC, estúdios de gravação da Rede Globo, a 3 minutos do RIOCENTRO, principal centro de convenções do RJ e a 10 minutos das mais belas praias de nossa cidade, Barra e Recreio dos Bandeirantes o nosso aparthotel conta com toda a infraestrutura para melhor recebê-los. Nas proximidades encontram-se ainda shopping centers e vários restaurantes. No local poderão curtir academia, piscina, sauna e estacionar com total segurança. Estação de BRT bem próxima.
space: O apartamento tem uma linda vista (indevassável) da piscina e foi projetado para que o hóspede tenha bastante conforto e sinta-se verdadeiramente em casa. Atende confortavelmente  a 3 pessoas. Possui um quarto com armários com cabides, com duas camas de solteiro que podem ficar juntas formando uma cama de casal e um colchão para ser colocado no chão. Possui ar condicionado em todos os ambientes. A sala com varanda possui um sofá muito confortável, com TV à cabo e internet wi-fi. A cozinha é em estilo americana toda equipada (microondas, liquidificador, sanduicheira elétrica, espremedor de laranja elétrico, geladeira, talheres, copos, pratos, xícaras, taças, etc.). Possui também secador de cabelo, ferro elétrico e tábua para passar roupa.

Possui ar condicionado em todos os ambientes. A sala com varanda possui um sofá muito confortável, com TV à cabo e internet wi-fi. A cozinha é em estilo americana toda eq
neighborhood_overview: O bairro é ótimo calmo, seguro e longe de favelas.
notes: Qualquer necessidade especial poderá ser analisada.
transit: A mobilidade é um dos pontos fortes de nosso imóvel com estação de BRT (bus rapid transit and system) inaugurado em 2012 que une de maneira exclusiva para os ônibus toda a cidade. Podem também usar UBER ou taxi.
access: A academia de ginástica, sauna e piscina ficam no andar térreo.
interaction: Nosso contato poderá ser feito através do site, por telefone ou (Hidden by Airbnb) .

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Essa foi nossa primeira experiência através do Airbnb e de verdade foi uma grata surpresa! Os donos do apartamento são pessoas incríveis, cuidaram de cada detalhe para nos proporcionar uma estadia maravilhosa! O apartamento é muito novo, muito confortável e aconchegante. Mais uma vez muito obrigado!

Excelente apartamento, exatamente como as (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, quando voltar pro Rio, irei me hospedar novamente no apartamento do Jorge. Não cheguei conhecê-lo pessoalmente, porem deu a nós todo o suporte que precisamos. Super indicado!
Muito Bom!

Excelente Anfitrião!
Super recomendo!
Ótimo! Super limpo, ótima localização e presteza em nos ajudar sempre! Sensacional!

Apartamento fantástico! Simplesmente esplêndido, um ótimo design, ambiente confortável, arejado, cômodos lindos, sensação de agrado em cada centímetro quadrado. Anfitriões extremamente proativos e ágeis em responder. O local é extremamente bem localizado e num ambiente muito tranquilo.

A localização é ótima e o apart é exatamente igual as fotos e muito limpo. O jorge precisa fazer uma alteração no colchão e verificar com o pessoal do aparthotel algumas questões sobre o wifi. No geral foi uma boa estadia.
O apartamento é realmente muito novo, bem decorado e muito confortável, super agradável. Foi uma  ótima experiência!
O apartamento é excelente.

Espaço muito novo bonito e aconchegante. Limpeza diária foi um diferencial. Ficaria hospedado novamente. A única observação é para quem vai à praia. Evitar horários de pico pois o trânsito fica bem carregado nos acessos ao local.
Jorge, Chris and Rodrigo have an awesome place with beautiful amenities. Will certainly stay there again, and soon! ❤️
O apart ficou próximo do local do Evento, que fomos! Tudo nos conformes! Amamos!
O apartamento é muito aconchegante, limpo, e cheiroso. Superou as nossas expectativas. Estão de parabéns. Super recomendamos!
Tudo maravilhoso! Superou todas minhas expectativas, adorei tudo! Espaço confortável, seguro, limpo e mega estiloso. Só coisas boas à dizer da acomodação e dos anfitriões!
Очень понравилось! Буду знать куда заселиться в следующий раз)
Ótimo espaço, limpo e novo.

ótimo apartamento! Recomendamos.
Se tivermos outro evento no RioCentro, alugaremos de novo!
Obrigada Jorge.
muito atencioso, tudo que mencionou foi cumprido, recomendo demais
Local novo, agradável, próximo ao Shopping Barra Metropolitanto (10min) e com boa infra estrutura. Recomendo a todos pelo excepcional custo benefício.
excelente atendimento. local super aconchegante. ótima experiência.
Jorge foi incrível, atencioso e muito carinhoso. Preocupou-se com os minimos detalhes. Foi incrivel. Voltaremos com certeza.
Super recomendo!!! Excelente
Espaço sensacional, extremamente limpo e organizado, recomendo bastante e retornando ao Rio pode ter certeza que é hospedagem certa.
The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 297 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Ótimo espaço e muito confortável.

So clean and nicely decorated! Location right next door to large and well stocked gas station convenience store with a 24 hr atm, 5 min walk from pharmacy, 10 mins from big nice supermarket! Pool is beautiful and not often crowded. The hosts are incredibly kind and gracious. One tip is the hotel wifi can be weak and spotty, especially in the bedroom, so while it's fine 90% of the time, make sure to have a data plan in case of emergencies! Not the host's fault but just something to be aware of.
Recomendo.

O apartamento é todo muito bem cuidado e aconchegante. Estava um calorzão no RJ mas o ar condicionado fez com que a gente nem percebesse isso. O hotel é incrível e tem uma piscina maravilhosa. Vivemos um fim de semana incrível que não seria possível sem o suporte do Jorge, que foi um ótimo anfitrião. Esperamos voltar em breve!

summary: Welcome to your home just in the heart of Istanbul... :)

Hot Water, Cold Water, TV, Internet, Bathroom Goods, Refrigirater, Air Condition, Hair Dryer and more... We have a office  our building and you can always find us there 24/7. We would really love to help you and also you can stop by anytime to drink some refreshments or even better, coffee!! Also, we can guide you through Istanbul and can answer all your questions. Taksim is a main transportation hub and a popular destination for both tourists and the native population of Istanbul. İstiklal Street (Independence Avenue), a long pedestrian shopping street, ends at this square, and a nostalgic tram runs from the square along the avenue, ending near the Tünel (1875) which is the world's second-oldest subway line after London's Unde
neighborhood_overview: Taksim is a main transportation hub and a popular destination for both tourists and the native population of Istanbul. İstiklal Street (Independence Avenue), a long pedestrian shopping street, ends at this square, and a nostalgic tram runs from the square along the avenue, ending near the Tünel (1875) which is the world's second-oldest subway line after London's Underground (1863). Surrounding Taksim Square are numerous travel agencies, hotels, restaurants, pubs, and international fast food chains.
transit: Taksim Metro Station provides easy access to many sites of the city such as shopping malls and the historic Sultanahmet area. The iconic Galata Tower is a 20-minute walk away. Ataturk Airport is within 12 miles of the property. Airport shuttle service can be provided at a charge. Distance to Historical Sites  • Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Blue Mosque – 15 min. 5,4 km  • Grand Bazaar – 15 min 5.4 km  • Dolmabahçe Palace – 5 min 1.8 km  • Galata Tower – 5 min. 1.8 km  • Pera – 5  • Spice Market – 10 min 4.6 km  • Istiklal Street – 3 min  • Nevizade Street – 3 min  • Galatasaray Bath –10 min  • St. Antoine Cathedral –5 min

name: Featured on TV - A Current Affair Come for a swim!
summary: My BnB was featured on the TV Show - ‘A Current Affair’ Channel 9.  I'm close to the Hill Song Church,  Parramatta, Norwest Business Park, Westmead/Blacktown hospitals. 30 min bus trip to the city  Nearby are 4 large shopping centres, Woolworths, Coles and Aldi.  I'm halfway between Sydney and the Blue Mountains, so a great place to be based. There's a separate entrance and your own private bathroom. Also free wifi.   I have an air conditioner/heater
space: Large area that sleeps up to 7 adults comfortably. Children are welcome too!! There is a lounge area with a TV. French doors leading out to a pergola area with tables and 10 chairs.  A small table and chairs inside for relaxing. There are two tall boys to store your clothes.  There is a hanging rack with coat hangers and a shoe rack below.  The bathroom/laundry is quiet large and is entered via a separate entrance off the garage.

notes: There is heaps of free unlimited parking on the street. No parties or events please. Noise must be reduced after 10pm. Please respect my family and neighbors. Smoking is not allowed indoors, but outside is fine. If you would like to have extra guests, prior permission is required.  Any extra guests staying overnight must pay the extra guest fee.  Flexible check in/ out is possible Please don't touch pool chemicals or equipment. Any damages must be paid for
