house_rules: - Laundry Facilities can only be used with the hosts permission - Children must be supervised at all times, especially when swimming or near the pool.  - Use the pool at your own risk - Please do not touch any pool equipment, pump or chemicals - Please be mindful of others and keep the noise down after 10 - Please don’t move any furniture

host.host_about: Happy go lucky person!

reviews.comments:
Awesome place! 
Host was very friendly, loved the room set up. 
Overall positive experience, would highly recommend
Nice home, great for solo travellers that need accommodation for areas on interest near by.
Nice place :)

We thoroughly enjoyed Sarah's accommodation.   We were made to feel very welcome.  The room was very clean, spacious and we enjoyed the doors opening out to the pool.  Was nice to be away from the busy city but only a 15min drive from restaurants and shopping in Parramatta.
Sarah was a great host. Very helpful and welcoming. The accommodation was neat and tidy and suited us perfectly for our short trip to Sydney.

Sarah family is very friendly and nice. We have dinner together and chat everything. It is nice to stay at her place as it is clean and tidy. Sarah even text me whether want to have some orange juice for my kids as the weather is very hot during our stay. Will definitely recommend staying at their place.
Quick reply from the host. Easy to communicates. A very nice place to stay for family or friends.
Good host, clean room, good value. But we encountered some dog barking issues whenever the host was not around.
Sarah is a fantastic host! Very helpful and friendly! The room was extremely clean. Highly recommended!

We were happy to stay here. Public transport is close. Sarah is very friendly and made us feel comfortable. If you want 5star it's not but if you are happy with 4+ you'll be fine. Location was great for us as it was close to public transport and close to drive to shopping centre. Bathroom off garage which is separate to the room but it was very clean. Parking on street in what seemed to be a very safe area we had no issues. Quiet residential area lots of trees and birds.
Lovely host & accommodation

My group of 5 guests had an enjoyable and comfortable time at Sarah's cozy home. It is conveniently located between nature to the east and landmarks to the west. We're also very appreciative that Sarah was willing to go out of her way to accommodate our living requirements
Sarah is lovely, but she hadn't attended to some very basic maintenance.
Perfect place for pet lovers and was really good place...
Sarah is a really nice host. Support our need such as cook tools and storage. We had a great experience in this house.

Big thanks to Sarah for her accomodation! We had a great time staying at her Airbnb. The place is in a nice peaceful area which is near the Norwest Business Park where you will find lots of shops and restaurants. It is also close to public transport. Sarah was very helpful with everything. Highly recommend this Airbnb to everyone!
A great place to stay the night. We were on our way from Victoria to Queensland, and Sarah's room was just right for our family. Lots of sleeping options and a great pool for the kids to splash in.
Perfect host! Lovely neighborhood
Great place! Clean, roomy and comfortable.
Nice place would go there again
Thanks Sarah! Super stay with my family! Pizzas were great yesterday evening so don't worry!!!
Lovely stay. Convenient and comfortable. Sarah's hospitality was friendly and helpful. Thank you.

Sarah was very lovely. Helpful and always easy to contact if needed. The place was clean and comfy. Location was perfect for when we visited my church at Hillsong -Hills campus. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend Sarah's place :)
The place was really clean and tidy. A microwave oven would be helpful. Sarah was a really nice and kind host.

Sarah was a very helpful host who was there when we needed her and who we otherwise didn't see. The room is nicely furnished and quite comfortable. The bathroom is shared with the host's laundry and has a separate entrance as stated in the description. The bed was good (soft) and there were basic kitchen amenities which was very handy. This was an excellent place to use as a base while visiting the area. Thank you for your hospitality.
It was wonderful stay...
all ok...only we need microwave

Sarah was flexible with the check-in and made things convenient for us. She ensured that we had privacy but also checked in when she could to make sure that all was good. No kitchen (as listed) but the mini fridge and kettle were helpful. Location was convenient with a few minutes walk from the bus stop. Our only surprise during the stay was the dog which was doing it's job loyally but got used to us pretty quickly

We had a great stay! Sarah is a really friendly host and was very willing to answer any queries we had. Room is very clean and has everything you need particularly if you just need a place to stay for just a few nights! Comfortable and felt private and quiet.
We had a great stay at Sarah's place. She was a very friendly host and the neighbourhood felt very safe and peaceful.
A quiet and spacious room. Thank you Sarah
Great place. Exactly as advertised.

the stay was okay with a great and friendly host.
it would be better if there is a heater in the room as it was freezing cold in the night. otherwise there was no any other problems.

Sarah's place was exactly as described. Bathroom is separate to main room as outlined in the description, which was fine apart from moving between the two areas in the cooler morning weather. 
Clean and all basics provided. Sarah was accommodating for check in/out times and attended to requests promptly.  We had a great stay!
Very quiet area, great for a short getaway to Sydney. Sarah is friendly and helpful.
Excellent stay. Perfect location, exceptional host and was the perfect stop over for u in Sydney. Thanks Sarah for being a great host.
Great cosy house to stay in! Sarah is really friendly too.

Sarah is a very warm and welcoming person, and the accommodation was very clean and comfortable. I highly recommend staying at Sarah's place if you want somewhere that is comfortable and a very gracious host.
Coral

Clean, quiet and comfortable space! Very nice neighborhood, exactly what my partner and I needed as we were working odd hours in the area. Sarah was very accommodating with check in/out times and very good with communication. Recommended!

This would be a great place to stay for a family in summer.
Sarah helped us to stay warm in winter with extra blankets and heaters.
Lovely host and great communication!

House suited my family
Perfectly as a base for hillsong
Conference.   Room was as described and access was great allowing us to move in and out as required.  
Sarah is friendly and very quick to respond to queries.
The place is perfect for us because it definitely accommodated more than 5 people. The place is clean and well presented. The neighbourhood is quiet too. Host Sarah responded to my enquiries.
Sarah is a great host with a very convenient place in a quiet neighbourhood.

Comfortable space and was accurate to the listing. We went during winter and it was quite cold, Sarah was very accommodating in providing us a heater and any other things we needed. Sarah is very easy to communicate with as well. 
You had to walk out through the veranda to get to the washroom, so it was a bit cold but I wouldn't see a problem with this during the warmer months. 

I would definitely recommend the stay for families who need somewhere comfortable and dependable!

Sarah was great host and was always reachable .her place is nicely located for  travelling around Sydney's  western suburbs .
The kids had a Funtime  with the cats and the outdoors.
Great space and great location for driving through Sydney.

A comfortable stay for our family of 4.  The lounges were well past their best, but the beds were warm & comfy and we all slept well.  Our girls loved spotting the cats walking around the yard & we loved how close the property was to the family we were visiting.  Easy access to major roads & conveniences, yet really quiet.  Great communication by Sarah, too.
Clean and comfortable.  Sarah was lovely.
Comfortable beds and linen. Relaxing neighborhood. Clean and well presented.

Sarah's place is very accurate to the listing, so it is very easy to understand what to expect. Everything was great, but best of all were the soft beds and cats roaming around! The only downside would be how cold it is during the night as the bathroom is located outside and next to a garage, but apart from that, wonderful stay when you're in Sydney.

Sarah is a great host and her place suited us very well, comfy beds, excellent shower and location, we were very happy with our stay. We liked it that much we have already booked our next weekend away at Sarah's.
Sarah was a very easy host to work with. Prompt communication. The house is clean but a little cosy.
Sarah was really nice and very accomodating. She greeted us as soon as we got to the place and gave us a quick tour . The place was really clean and quiet as well. Would recommend to other travelers.
Perfect location and very cosy place.

Such a lovely space! And such a great host! The beds were comfortable, the outdoor living space was convenient and the location was perfect! We had five people in the space and were very comfortable and well cared for! I highly recommend and look forward to visiting again myself!

Sarah is an excellent host and goes out of her way to ensure that you are comfortable and have everything that you need.
We will definitely stay again, thanks Sarah.

Sarah's place was perfect for my event & her hospitality was beyond lovely. The neighbour kept leaf blowing which made the pool dirty but without me even asking the entire household went to so much effort to clean it before my guests arrived for the event despite having a broken cleaner! It was so sweet. The only thing that was a little tricky is that I didn't realise the private space did not have a kitchen, and the door kept falling off it's hinges. Luckily Sarah let me do my cooking in her family space so all was well. An amazing happy go-lucky host who deserves more appreciation! thank you so much! I hope to stay again :)
Stunning place with a fantastic location, very friendly hosts and extremely well maintained house
Sarah was a very thoughtful and friendly host. Her place was perfect for us with 4 children and convenient to the Valentine Sports Park. Loved the pool! And a great outdoor area for eating.

If you would like to stay in a lovely  home in a quiet part of the city. But with excellent parking or public trasport with in easy reach. Giver Sarshs home a go. Hope to see you next time we need a p k ace to stay.

Much more than we expected, it was clean, tidy, and had everything we needed. The host was really kind and helpful, event after going trough any host's nightmare, a group of 20 year old that didn't leave on time and trashed the place. It doesn't have a kitchen, but you can easily prepare a meal, and eat at a 10 seat dinning table. We defenetly recommend to familys or any other kind of group! Thanks again
We loved staying at Sarah's place. It was everything we needed and perfect for the plans we had in the Hills district. Clean and tidy and Sarah is lovely and ready to help with anything we needed.

Nice place with lots of sleeping arrangements. Also big TV with Netflix and Xbox. Not having a sink in the main room can be a little inconvenient for cooking. Cats were a bonus too one of whom is friendly. Nice neighborhood convenient for Norwest Business Park.

Our host Sarah is very accommodative and hospital. A pity is that we happened to be there during a particular hot period, and there was no air con in the unit so could be a little stuffy. But other than this minor point, Sarah’s place has adequate provisions to make it a pleasant stay.

Great host but amenities are not good. Bathroom is not attached and not very convenient if a family is staying. Amenities need to be surely improved and the property is not so clean as shown in the pictures on AirBnB. It's a great location though.
Sarah was very accommodating and has a great place. She has thought of everything to make your stay comfortable.
Nice house

Convenient, reasonably priced unit. Nice host.

Sarah’s place is perfect everything described is correct.

The bathroom is next door to your room and all to yourself, the area is quiet and there are plenty of eateries nearby.

Sarah is the perfect host, really quick at answering emails, extremely friendly and welcoming, she made you feel at home.
Wonderful place to stay! Quiet, comfortable and clean facilities, friendly and helpful host, close to public transport and my partner and I would definitely come back, thank you so much

Nice and friendly host with quick response as she lives upstairs.

Lovely place to stay and such a lovely
Host also :)

Great value for money.   Was a great place for our family of 5 to stay for our trip.  Close to public transport to the City.  Our kids loved that there was a pool. Sarah was so friendly and really accommodating. The kids loved the pool and even though it was short we had the best time. Easy parking and a lovely street!
Clean, presentable, friendly, 5⭐️
Sarah was a wonderful host.
Amazing house..Very quite and peace and definitely relaxing place..Worth spending your money..Almost all the necessary stuff is 5mins close to you..Overall rating in one word would be "Phenomenal"
Excellent value for money .Sarah is a lovely host .We were made to feel very welcome
Nice quiet relaxing home

Our main destinations were Sydney CBD and blue mountain. We found Serah's place as an ideal convenient place in between.  We are a big family of four adults and three children and we still found enough space. Haven't got time to use the pool though. There is a big dining table in the back where we had nice family dinner. We used the washing machine and dryer too. 

Sarah is a wonderful host too. She replied to my SMS's in no time. Thanks for being so friendly Sarah

The accommodation was ideal for myself and my family. The pool was lovely and a great way to freshen up at the end of a long day. Sarah was a wonderful host, kept us informed throughout our stay and was available should she be needed. Thoroughly recommend.

Sarah was an amazing welcoming, supportive, understanding and culturally sensitive host. The place is exactly as described.

In spite of being quite far from the CBD, all the buses and expresses were less than 9 mns walking time. We could go everywhere in Sydney relying on the nearby public transportation network. We even didn’t need to hire a car as planned; due to the availability of all buses lines near Sarah’s place.

Sarah was reachable all the time, gave us a lot of tips about different things. My wife and I liked talking with her. She payed attention to the special things we needed as Muslims (We were surprised, she already aware of our religious needs!)

Sarah’s place is lovely and quiet while being located close to nearly anything you want to do while in Sydney.
This was our first Air BnB experience and we loved it, as did our three children. The space is as clean and comfortable and Sarah was a great host. Her knowledge and hospitality lifted our holiday to a whole new level of enjoyment.
Highly recommend!

Sarah was very lovely, welcoming and very accommodating. We had a great stay. The place was big and had what we needed. Quiet neighbourhood, close enough to great shopping! Thanks again Sarah. Highly recommend!
This is a great sized room with easy access for 2 gents sharing. It was light and airy and clean. Perfect for a few nights, with a welcoming host
Great place with plenty of privacy. Many fast food outlets close by and a short drive to shopping centres.
As first time Airbnb users we were pleasantly surprised. Sarah is very friendly and makes you feel welcome.
Great little place,  nice quite neighbourhood, a little out of the city so not too busy, clean and suited what we needed :)
Lovely place to stay as a group,clean and affordable and close to amenities.

Sarah made sure everything was ok for our three night stay.  The room has aircon for heating with two double beds, and one single (as a top bunk) in a single large room at ground level. Both Sarah and her place was absolutely brilliant. The accommodation was spotless, peaceful and everything written in the listing was there. Sarah herself was such a warm, generous and welcoming host, she responded very quickly and was always on hand if I need anything. Would definitely recommend it the place!
Sarah is very kind and (Website hidden by Airbnb) mum threw the screw of the mirror.But Sarah forgave us.There is just stinking when open the refrigerator.All others are good.

Sarah went above and beyond to ensure our stay was the best that it could be. Would definitely come back.
The room was nice, and bathroom.

Average.
Nice place
Great place to stay, would definitely go back. convenient location with everything you need
This was a great little spot to stay for what we needed. It was simple and clean and sarah was excellent to communicate with. She accommodated us for extra people which was great.

Good place to stay, I will return

Great value for place
Sarah was a lovely host and we had a great stay!
Thank you Sarah for your great hospitality and letting us stay at your place!!
The place was beautiful, spacious, and close to the venue. Sarah was also such a great host!
great price and location
Sarah was always kept in contact, which was great. House was spotless and pool was fantastic. Thank you
Description of the property was spot on, Sarah and her Family were great hosts, the pool was a bonus thoroughly enjoyed our 9 days there, highly recommended.
Great host clean and well equipped room.

I booked Sarah’s place very last minute and she responded immediately and let me know we could check in within the hour! Her place was spotless, the linens were great, and she supplied coffee and cream. We loved the location as it was central to everything but very quiet and peaceful. Sarah was helpful and kind.  We would definitely stay there again!!

We stayed with Sarah for 11 nights while in Sydney for a sporting tournament. The house is in a beautiful area close to where we needed to be everyday. Also close to shops, Food etc. Sarah is such a fantastic host who was always available if we needed anything and was always up for a chat. The room was nice and clean and the pool was the icing on the cake with most days being in the high 30’s low 40’s. We will book again next year and I can’t recommend her enough. Thanks Sarah for a fantastic stay.
good

Clean, friendly, great location, and great price

Fantastic place to stay would recommend to all will definitely stay here again when we next come back in June
It’s beautiful and so worth it
All good as advertised.

name: Modern 1BD in Leafy Cul-De-Sac
summary: Our newly renovated apartment is perfect for anyone looking for a quiet and relaxed vibe. We're an easy walk to Coogee Beach, Royal Randwick and The Spot for a delicious meal.  We're also 7kms from the city centre with a bus stop less than five minutes walk away.
space: Our newly renovated, one bedroom apartment is perfect for anyone looking for a relaxed city vibe. We're an easy walk to the beach, shops and parks and a quick bus ride to the city! The apartment is on a quiet and leafy cul-de-sac in a block of six.  Enjoy your summer afternoon on the balcony, having a glass of wine, surrounded by the beautiful trees within the cul-de-sac.   If you're looking for a quiet night in, you can choose any program on Netflix or play one of the fun board games available.
description: Our newly renovated apartment is perfect for anyone looking for a quiet and relaxed vibe. We're an easy walk to Coogee Beach, Royal Randwick and The Spot for a delicious meal. Enjoy your summer afternoon on the balcony, having a glass of wine, surrounded by the beautiful trees within the cul-de-sac.   If you're looking for a quiet night in, you can choose any program on Netflix or play one of the fun board games available. We have one bedroom with a queen size bed.  We have a washing machine, dishwasher, iron and ironing board available for use. We're just around the corner, so happy to help with any questions or provide any information you need. We're i
neighborhood_overview: We're in a great location for walking around and experiencing the area: Coogee: The beach Coastal Walk - must do The Pavilion - perfect for have a cocktail overlook on the beach Countless restaurants, cafes, ice cream shops Randwick Junction: Restaurants  Fitness First Clothes shops  Groceries (Coles & Woolworths) Harris Farm (fruit & veg) The Spot: Amazing restaurants Bars Randwick Ritz (cinema) We're also close to Centennial Park and other parks. Why not hire a bike for the day to have a ride around?
notes: As we're in a block of six, please be mindful of the other apartments!
transit: There are several bus stops less than five minutes walk from our apartment that have direct routes to the City and Bondi Junction. We're approximately 7kms south east of the city.  We're also about 7kms east of the airport (approx 15 mins - $35 in an Uber) There is an undercover parking space available and also free parking on the street. However there are so many great experiences within walking distance, you don't even need a car!
access: We have one bedroom with a queen size bed.  We have a washing machine, dishwasher, iron and ironing board available for use.
interaction: We're just around the corner, so happy to help with any questions or provide any information you need.
house_rules: Please no parties or smoking.

The ckichen was very well equipped, as well as all the house, the building has private garage which is perfect as we had a car and it is very difficult to park in the city center. The apartment is close to the city center, walking distance. Sonia was ver nice for us, we will definitely try to stay here again when we come back.

Very strange owner, firstly she gave keys from flat, but after via SMS asked send Passport foto, because her husband want it, in no, HE will visit us in night. Looks like ultimatum, because there was not  mention about providing ID in ad.

Arrive at evening, owner did gave a full address, did not open a garage, initially i have parked car at noisy street with out parking space, take keys and repark car.

Did't allow to drop the keys and leave the house without meeting owner. Why? no franсhise was taken. Why did she do it, I have not understand, she also was not able to explaine

A Sónia e o marido foram extremamente simpáticos com os meus convidados. 
Não tive qualquer dificuldade a comunicar com a Sónia e esperamos no futuro voltar a utilizar o seu apartamento.
Os anfitriões foram muito acolhedores e o apartamento era excelente.

Really nice appartment. Everything seams new and in good conditions. Sonja was extreamly fraindly and helpfull! Location is not far from the "touristic" city center and easily reachable by walking. We enjoyed our stay a lot!

The house is well located, walking distance from the city center. 
It is a modern, well decorated and spacious flat, with 2 bedrooms (1 suite/1 bedroom), a living room, kitchen, laundry and 1 WC. It´s very comfortable, with modern equipments, central heating and A/C, which was very useful, taking into account the time of the year.
Sónia let us drop our bags even before the check-in time.
We enjoyed our stay at Sonia's. The apartment is how it appears in the photos. It is a big 2 bedroom apartment and the fact it comes with a washer, dryer and private car park are excellent extras.
A great apartment, huge and very nice interior, fresh fruits, exactly as described and seen from the pictures. Definitely again!

Thanx to a a national strike in France of air traffic controllers, we arrived a bit late... :-/  But a kind Sonia was there to welcome us, and really thank you ! 
Her apartment, is absolutely like the photos, really, really nice !! We were in a quit place, few minutes walk from the historical center (15/20 minutes walk) and the great plus : a parking for the car. Again thank you Sonia our trip in Porto was great !
Excelente. Recomendo.

Sonia is a fantastic host, her apartment was amazing, exactly what the pictures represent. In walking distance to everything. Great little local bar up the road with great staff. All in all Porto is a great city. Would highly recommend

Very beautifully decorated apartment about 3 minute walk from subway, or 15-20 from historic area.  Secure car parking is a bonus!
There were two large rooms with extremely soft beds and really cool mechanical blackout blinds as well as sheers.
There is heat in all rooms (even the bathroom) and air conditioning in living room. All amenities were provided, including washer/dryer/2 coffee makers/ 2 sofas/2 bathrooms). Oddly, although there were 12 plates and 12 bowls, there were only 2 coffee mugs.
We had some issues with check-in and no hot water for first 48 hours, and Sonia communicated well and tried to resolve the issues as quickly as possible and even offered some compensation (and treats!) for our troubles, which was greatly appreciated.

Sónia is a great host! She always can help you fast with any questions. We lived here with our little daughter (4 years old) for a little bit more than a two weeks and it was great! Location is really central we used a metro just few times and yes metro station really close to apartment! The apartment itself is no comments! All you want to need to live here for a long time with family are included and interior design is stunning like in interior magazines :) and of course Porto! Porto became our number one city! Totally in love!
The house is beautiful, nice and cozy! Very quite neighbourhood but close to the city center 20' walking distance. It was perfect!
Вполне подходящая квартира со стиралкой и сушилкой. Раздельные комнаты, на каждую своя ванная. Метро рядом, улица не шумная
Highly recommanded host

Sonia met us at apartment as planned. So friendly and welcoming, and we appreciate her English!! This is a GREAT place to stay. Felt very safe, super clean and comfortable. Next time we would stay longer!

L'appartement de Sonia est très agréable et très propre. Il est décoré avec beaucoup de goût.  Les pièces sont spacieuses et modernes. L'appartement est situé près d'une station de métro ce qui permet de se déplacer facilement dans Porto.

Sonia, obrigada pela hospitalidade e gentileza. O apartamento é ótimo, limpo e com todos os acessórios para quem precisar cozinhar, metro perto e a facilidade de poder estacionar o automóvel na (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendaremos aos nossos amigos. Um beijo de todos.

Merci Sonia pour ton accueil et ta gentillesse.
Très très bel appartement spacieux, bien meuble et décoré avec goût. Situation interessante près du métro. Logement à recommander.
Sonia's appartment is really wonderful! It is very confortable and nice. Moreover, the metro is very close. We enjoyed a lot our stay in Porto! Thanks a lot Sonia for your nice welcome.

Mooi appartement op prima locatie in Porto. Het appartment is volledig en modern ingericht. Er zijn zelfs twee badkamers! 
Er is vlakbij een metrostation die je naar het centrum van de stad brengt.

The apartment is exactly as it looks! Beautiful! Very nicely decorated, very clean and convenient for all we wanted to do in Porto. Glad we stayed here. 

Sonia is lovely to interact with too, thanks sonia!

Hola, recomendamos el apto de Sonia, es precioso, decorado con muy buen gusto, con buena dotación y muy moderno, además Sonia es muy amable. Volveremos de nuevo y lo recomendaremos a nuestros amigos, vale la pena disfrutar más días a esta preciosa ciudad

The apartment is beautiful and has everything you need. The location is great, really quiet and short walk to the centre. Great secure parking. Would recommend the apartment 100%. Also Sónia is really lovely!
Sónia is a beautiful and nice host. She gave us some useful advices to travel. We met a tarffic jam and arrived very late. Thanks for Sónia's waiting and patient.
Óptima escolha para ficar no Porto. Apartamento reúne tudo o que há de bom

Apartamento excelente! tudo conforme descrito, fomos recebidos muito bem pela anfitriã. Tivemos apenas um problema com a garagem mais nada sério e irrelevante. Recomendo a estadia na morada da Sonia! foram dias incríveis e vamos repetir!
Excelente apartamento, tudo novo. Tudo bastante limpo. Localização boa e calmo ao redor. Anfitriã nota 10!
This house is gorgeous, we loved our stay! Perfect size for a party of 5, but can easily fit more! Will definitely recommend.
Superbe appartement , proche du métro et donc du centre , faisable à pied mais ca grimpe au retour! Merci pour l'accueil.

Beautifully presented apartment, everything we needed and more, good location a short walk from town. Sonia was a great host, was very flexible allowing for our late check in and delayed flight. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again if we were to come back!

Sónia’s apartment is fantastic. It is even more gorgeous than it looks in the pictures. It is located right in the centre of town, and there is a wonderful patisserie just a few blocks down. It is about a 20 minute walk to the historic centre of Porto, but there is a metro station one block away. Sónia’s apartment is a wonderful place to stay if you are in Porto.
Mooi appartement in hartje porto met een fijne binnen plaats om de auto te parkeren. Twee mooie badkamers.
Très bel appartement, bien situé. Pratique. Accueil chalereux

Wonderful stay. We really enjoyed our stay. Accommodations were wonderful, i.e., comfortable matresses, spacious quarters with washer dryer.  20 minutes walking from center of town.  Loved the beds, water pressure, two bathrooms, iron, and just great amenities. We would definitely stay there again. Loved Porto!

Apartamento magnífico, muy bien equipado, muy limpio y con buena comunicación para moverse por Porto. En cuanto a Sónia, magnifica anfitriona, muy amable y dispuesta a hacerte la estancia tan agradable como posible

A Sónia foi muito atenciosa ao nos receber. Nós preparou uma pequena recepção com pastéis de nata. Teve o cuidado de nos indicar os principais pontos turísticos da cidade. Além disso o apartamento é muito bonito, espaçoso e bem (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei a me hospedar neste apartamento!
El departamento está muy bonito! Muy cerca de una estación de metro y cerca del centro. Sonia fue muy amable. El departamento es más bonito que en las fotos, muy bien equipado y muy limpio.
This is a fine apt. It is in a residential area so a little way from the center but not an issue. Easy cab ride.
We enjoyed staying at this comfortable, nicely decorated, and clean apartment. Sonia was very helpful and attentive to our needs and questions.
Precioso apartamento, con todo lo necesario, cerca de la parada de metro. Tuvimos una estancia muy agradable

O apartamento da Sónia está muito bem decorado, com tudo o que precisamos e tem uma garagem a disposição.  O centro está mais o menos a 15 minutos a pé e a uma estação de metro a 5 min. Recomendo vivamente este alojamento!!

Wow.....  Amazing apartment, with all the necessary amenities and close to all attractions.  Well appointed for a small or large family.  Great for short or long stays. Garage/parking for the car was an added bonus!  I would highly recommend this apartment to any wanting a 5 star accommodation.

Great place to stay in Porto! The apartment was spacious, clean, and modern. We were all very comfortable here! Within walking distance of some cute cafes and the metro. Walk to center of Porto is all downhill and nice. Porto itself was gorgeous! Sonia was extremely flexible and a lovely host who provided lots of great recommendations for things to do. Definitely an awesome place to stay

El apartamento es exactamente como aparece en las foto. Muy bonito y arreglado. Tiene todos los electrodomésticos que puedas necesitar. Además cuenta con aparcamiento, es un gran alivio no tener que buscar donde aparcar.
IT was wonderful apartment. Everything as in the pictures. Sonia is very helpful. I really recommend these apartment.
Great location and views !
Piso tal como describe en las fotografías una ubicación muy buena para visitar el centro de oporto y muy limpio

Very nice, modern and clean apartment. Host was also very friendly and easy to communicate with. Location was a bit further from the old part of town that I thought, particularly on the way back if you are walking as it is quite a steep street!
Nice apartment. Very convinient to visit Oporto.

Beautiful apartment in Porto, exactly as pictured and described : great amenities, clean, nicely decorated. Free and secure parking place was a huge plus. Quick check-in, easy check out. A little away from the historic centre (20mn walk) but nothing really problematic :  a metro station is 2mn away and a cab ride takes less than 10mn.
Sonia is easy going, flexible and helpful. She answered all our questions / requests as much as she could and made the effort to speak English which was really appreciated. 
If you are looking for a quiet and homey place to stay in Porto, this is it (especially if you have a car)! 100% recommended.

Sónia es una excelente anfitriona.  Sostuvimos una muy buena comunicación previo al viaje y durante nuestra estadía.  Al llegar nos recibió muy gentilmente mostrándonos el apartamento y dándonos indicaciones sobre los lugares que no debíamos de perdernos en Porto.  Nos tenía una botella de Oporto y unos pastelitos típicos de la región. También nos envió información de restaurantes y paseos que nos fueron de gran utilidad.  
El apartamento es muy cómodo aun más bonito que como aparece en las fotos; es muy luminoso y con una excelente distribución.  Gran nitidez y limpieza.  El lugar donde está ubicado es muy seguro, el metro está muy cerca, así como la estación de taxis. Dispone de un parqueo muy amplio, lo cual fue de gran ayuda para dejar el vehículo. También cuenta con todos los servicios que se indican. Con gusto volvería a hospedarme con Sónia.
Muy bonito, cama muy cómoda. Corresponde y más a las fotos. Bien ubicado y el anfitrión fácil de localizar y dispuesto a solucionar cualquier inconveniente. Porto totalmente recomendable.
Sonias place is a wonderfull upmarket well appointed apartment with off street parking and an easy 15 min walk to the main tourist area.

Sonia's apartment is beautifully appointed, very modern with plenty of space.  Whilst it's a little ways out of town, there's plenty around (Bufete Fase is a few minutes away and did a great Francesinha).  We didn't use the metro, but it is very conveniently located near by.  One warning, if you park near by to orient yourself (this was just until we'd checked in), be warned that all on street parking is paid and heavily monitored.
Ficamos somente uma noite, o apartamento é incrível e os anfitriões foram compreensivos com horário e agilidade no check in!
Apartamento bem decorado! Limpo, amplo! Muito bom e confortável!

Sonia's apartment in Porto was modern, comfortable and very clean and exactly as we saw on the website.  The parking for our rental car was a huge bonus and a welcome relief as parking is not the easiest in Porto!  Thank you for your kind hospitality and welcome to your beautiful city.  We will come back again!

Beautiful apartment with parking a bonus , easy walk only a block to the metro.
Maps of the area and lots of nice details.

Nous avons vraiment apprécié notre séjour chez Sonia! L'appart était mieux que sur les photos. C'était super bien à l'intérieur, un vrai AirBNB comme on les aime  (où il a des instruments pour cuisiner, des gens ont laissé de l'huile, des épices, des choses de base pour cuisiner). Il y a un four, du lave-vaisselle, une laveuse, sécheuse (qui sont simples à faire fonctionner) et c'était assez grand. Il y a des rideaux métalliques qui se descendent avec un interrupteur et qui coupent complètement le soleil le matin. Un petit lit de bébé nous y attendait aussi pour notre bébé de 6 mois. C'était très bien décoré. Par contre, si vous avez de jeunes enfants qui aiment toucher à tout, faire bien attention à ranger les décorations pour éviter qu'ils ne les cassent! Il y a un stationnement privé pour l'appart en arrière. On est à côté d'un petit café qui fait des lattés incroyables pour 1 euro, sur le chemin du métro. Aussi, on est à 4 minutes à pied de l'épicerie (Pingo Doce). Seul petit accro, comme l'anglais n'est pas notre langue maternelle à toutes les 2, c'était parfois un peu difficile de se comprendre.

L'appartement est à proximité d'un métro. C'est possible de faire une épicerie à 2 rues du lieux. L'appartement est très fonctionnel pour 2 couples. Il y a un lieux privé pour le stationnement d'un véhicule.

Un piso genial e ideal para estar unos días en Oporto. Es tal como aparece en las fotos. El tener aparcamiento facilita muchísimo salir y entrar a cualquier hora si te llevas tu coche. Unos días geniales que nos supieron a poco. Si volvemos a Oporto repetiríamos.
Very spacious and well decorated apartment in good location (quite, residential). We had a great time in Porto.
Once the bathroom issues and air conditioning is fixed, this will be a lovely place to stay.
El apartamento es muy lindo y cómodo. Bien ubicado.

O espaço de Sónia no Porto é ótimo, muito bem localizado e muito agradável. A única ressalva é que existe um degrau para entrar no prédio e como eu viajei com uma pessoa que usa uma cadeira de rodas elétrica super pesada, tive problemas para acessar e sair do prédio. Fora isso tudo correu muito bem, tivemos um incidente de falta d'água que Sónia e seu marido resolveram muito rapidamente, ganhamos deliciosos pastéis de nata e várias dicas para aproveitar a cidade. 
O espaço estava muito limpo e organizado quando chegamos e fora o degrau, não tenho dúvidas que recomendaria para os amigos viajantes.
房东非常热情 房间相当舒适 交通很方便!
Tout était parfait. Nous recommandons cet appartement

This host and her family went out of their way to help us in our moment of need after we accidentally locked ourselves out of the apartment late at night. They fully deserve the Superhost status that they have. The apartment is also very nice, and the location is very convenient, only a 5-minute walk from the metro station. The bedrooms are away from the street and very quiet, and the beds are very comfortable. We slept soundly every night.

El apartamento es acorde a las fotografías publicadas.
Esta situado a 15min andando de la Plaza Libertad, y a 2 min de una estación de Metro.
Una cosa importante es que el apartamento incluye parking en el mismo edificio.

O apartamento é bem localizado, possui uma ótima estrutura, espaçoso, camas confortáveis, eletrodomésticos úteis, Wi-Fi excelente, estacionamento também execelente, o checkin e checkout super práticos. O aquecedor funciona bem e de forma automática. A única questão que não achei agradável foi a acústica das paredes, pois se ouve tudo o que é falado de um quarto para o outro, mesmo em tons baixos de voz.

Apartamento super organizado, limpo,  seguro e bem localizado.
Comunicação excelente.
Superou minhas expectativas
Bonne situation géographique, logement spacieux et agréable, propreté, linge de maison, parking privé idéal à Porto, metro à 200 m.

Sonia's place was clean and beautiful!  It was just up the road from everything you want to see in Porto.  You can walk to town or take an uber for just a few euro.  We only stayed 1 night but next time hope to stay 3 or 4.  Thank you, Sonia!

This was a great apartment for my family of 4 adults and 2 young children. The apartment was very modern, stylish and clean. Everything worked well - the toilets, showers and washing machine. We also found a great little restaurant which had amazing grilled seafood. I would recommend this to any family.

O apartamento é lindo, muito bem localizado, bem decorado. Apenas seria necessário mais utensílios de cozinha (panelas, travessas) para hóspedes que gostam de cozinhar em casa. Tivemos alguns problemas com aquecimento da casa e esperávamos um retorno mais ágil na solução dos mesmos. Talvez a época de réveillon tenha prejudicado a comunicação, mas isto foi um fato um pouco desconfortável. Do restante tudo ok.
Tout y est pour un confort maximal. Un emplacement parfait pour aller dans le centre en 20 minutes. Un confort au dessus de la moyenne. Un bel accueil malgré l'heure tardive de la part de Sonia.

La casa es perfecta muy cómoda bien decorada. Yo fui en coche y la verdad la casa esta muy bien ubicada para ir al centro y a la playa. La mañana cuando hay sol las habitación  se inundan de sol. Me hubiese gustado tener un canal de TV en Español o Frances. Sonia muy cariñosa y disponible. Repetiré otra vez.
Appartement impeccable, confortable, calme et lumineux. Situé à un quart d’heure à pied du centre. Manque un peu de vaisselle pour cuisiner pour 5 mais appartement très agréable et literie super.

Sónia é uma excelente anfitriã. A comunicação fluiu de forma rápida e aberta em todos os momentos. O apartamento está muito bem localizado, a decoração do local é fantástica, as camas são super confortáveis, a sala espaçosa, a cozinha equipada. A vaga para parqueamento é um plus. Sónia está sempre disponível para qualquer dúvida e para auxiliar na resolução de qualquer inconveniente. Altamente recomendável.

Sónia’s place is really clean and well furnished, very modern and comfortable. We had a really pleasant stay! The appartement is not very far from the major attractions via taxi or subway. We were also delighted by the tea and cookies she prepared for us. We had some problems with heat of water, but overall we didn’t have any other problem. Would highly recommend this place!

Het hippe appartement van Sonia zag er bovengemiddeld goed uit. Lekker veel handdoeken. Heerlijke badkamers, een en al luxe. In keuken ook alles wat je maar kan wensen van nespresso tot koffiezetter enz. Cv ook geen overbodige luxe in maart in Porto. Metro 500m lopen. En stad ook beloopbaar 15-20 minuten. Appartement is hip gemeubileerd. Alles zag er gewoon goed uit... Incl Sonia . Parkeren op eigen terrein achter een garagedeur. Dus auto staat ook veilig en van de straat. 5 slaapplaatsen. Sonia ook zeer behulpzaam en geeft tips conform je wens. Top ervaring.
Nice comfortable place.
Un piso precioso cerca del centro de Porto.

I stayed at Sónia's apartment with my boyfriend and friends and we very enjoyed the space and super comfortable beds. Everything was clean and in walking distance to the centre. Sónia was very flexible with our check-in time and also gave us some good tips for the city. We'd definitely recommend staying there as it also has a free and safe parking space, which was important for us with our rental car.

El apartamento de Sonia está muy bien ubicado cerca del centro de la ciudad. El piso cuenta con un estacionamiento privado y tiene muy buen gusto. Agradecemos mucho la hospitalidad brindada por Sonia que nos recibió con una taza de te y galletas, dándonos toda la información requerida de la ciudad. Esperamos regresar pronto

Superbe appartement, très propre et à la décoration soignée. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour en famille, tous le monde était satisfait. L’appartement n’étant pas loin du centre ville, tout peut se faire à pied et la place de parking est vraiment un plus.
Sonia nous a fournis des conseils pour se restaurer et est resté attentive le soir de notre arrivée afin d’être sûr que nous avions tout ce dont nous avions besoin.

Je recommande sans hésiter.
A lovely apartment with car parking. Close to the metro and walking distance to nightlife. Everything was very clean and modern - we had a very pleasant stay thank you.

Très bel appartement, bien décoré, avec une belle place de parking sécurisée. Il est situé à proximité du métro, ce qui est très pratique lorsqu'on voyage avec des enfants. Sonia nous a très bien accueillis avec un bouteille de Porto et des gâteaux typiquement portugais! Un tout petit bémol: la cuisine manque un peu d'équipements à mon goût (comme un grille-pain par exemple), mais rien de bien grave. A recommander sans hésiter.
Sonia was great and very responsive to any questions we had. She even let us check in early!
O apartamento de Sônia é perfeito, bem localizado e apresenta ótimas instalações. Recomendo!

Beautiful apartment, good location (easy walk downhill or subway ride back). Nice to have a safe place for the car. Grocery store nearby and great meal at Churrascuria Paradis around the corner. We found the beds pretty hard but that’s probably just us not being used to a platform bed. Good fit for four adults.

Very clean and modern apartment. Located   10 minute walk from town hall and another 10 minutes to the water front. My parents will be travelling to Portugal in the near future and I will definitely recommend this place. Thanks for the great stay!

El apartamento es muy amplio, luminoso y bien equipado. El vecindario es tranquilo y el apartamanto da hacia el interior resultando muy silencioso. Hay transportación pública frente al edificio y el metro se encuentra muy cerca; al centro de la ciudad se llega en 20 mimutos caminando. La anfitriona fue muy diligente y contestó rápidamente todas nuestras preguntas. Fue muy amable al llevarnos agua, té y galletitas para comenzar nuestra estadía. De volver a Oporto allí me quedaría nuevamente.
A casa da Sónia corresponde exactamente às fotografias (Website hidden by Airbnb) camas são muito confortáveis. Muito bem decorada e está bem localizada. Correu tudo muito bem.
Het appartement is groot en heeft twee badkamers. Handig als je met meerdere personen reist!
Lovely flat and Sonia is a great host. She was incredibly fast in her communication and made everything quick and easy for us. I highly recommend this place
Ruime en comfortabel appartement, zeer schoon en dichtbij Metrostation!
Nice apartment close to the City

Very stylish appartment located close to the city. 
Metro station on your doorstep, and super simple to get to São Bento.. Great base to visit Porto from..
Espaço muito confortável.
Nice apartment, good location, very clean. It is a beautiful city to visit.  Sonia was very helpful.

L’appartamento è bello, spazioso e luminoso. Eravamo in tre e avevamo molto spazio. Ottima la posizione, abbiamo sempre camminato per andare in centro (15/20 minuti) altrimenti la fermata della metro è a 2 minuti. Ottimo il parcheggio nel cortile della casa. La zona dove si trova non è bellissima, ma estremamente funzionale, ci sono ristoranti, bar, negozi. Noi ci siamo trovati molto bene e comunicare con la proprietaria è stato molto semplice e veloce.
appartement bien situé et très bien décoré ! On s'y sent très bien ! bravo !
Très bel appartement et bon accueil.  Si vous êtes en famille, une voiture est bien adaptée au déplacement dans le centre.

Wonderful apartment. Great location in a friendly and welcoming neighbourhood. Would highly recommend the restaurant Hortas and Pratos just down the road for a special meal. For a great grill would recommend Churrasqueira Paraiso

Great stay, everything like shown on the pictures/description, nice heartwarming welcome, great value.

I highly recommand :)

Magnifique appartement proche du métro et pas très loin du centre ville. 
Très bon accueil de Sonia qui est à l'écoute et à disposition si vous avez besoin de bonne adresse ou de renseignements spécifiques
Great place. Wonderful decor, very clean, well located, very comfortable. The hostess is responsive and nice.

Very clean, well located & secure apartment. We had a small issue with the air conditioning as currently air conditioning is only in the living area. The bedrooms were very warm at night. In saying that Sonia & Nuna were extremely helpful & supplied us with a portable air conditioning system at very short notice. It was greatly appreciated. We would definitely recommend this apartment for a short stay

My wife and I stayed for 3 weeks.  Although it is not "downtown" it is a block from the metro that gets you there in only a few minutes.  Uber works well in Porto and is inexpensive.  Ride to city center is 3 to 4 euros (1.20 on metro).  Quite neighborhood so you can open the big windows and let the sun and cool air in.  Grocery store nearby along with bakeries, butchers, fruit stands, wine shops, restaurants and bars.  Apartment is large, well equipped and stylish.  Kitchen is large and functional and there is a full size washer and dryer which is nice for long stays.  The building's common areas are well kept and clean too.  Off street private parking is also a nice luxury if you have rented a car.  All-in-all this is a great option for Porto.

Sonia saved my friends and I after our other Airbnb host cancelled a few hours before check-in. She was friendly and communicative, and her apartment was so, so lovely. The place was sparkling clean, it had very cool electronic window shades to block out the light, and was tastefully decorated. Thank you Sonia!

El apartamento es muy agradable y acogedor. Esta muy proximo al centro de oporto. Esta todo muy limpio. Sonia es una anfitriona muy atenta y agradable. Hemos estado muy agusto. Totalmente recomendable.
This is a beautiful, modern apartment, and we loved it. Wish I could have stayed longer. There was a dryer and washer, which was so convenient.
Lovely flat in convenient location with parking.

My sister and I have stayed in Sonia's apartment for 2 nights during our trip to Porto.
Below are the positive point about our stay as well as an issue that we have had.

The Positives:
1. Apartments is big and clean.
2. It is conveniently located, close to the Metro station an to the city center.
3. There is big, comfortable car parking on premises.
4. Sonia was very responsible when we had a small issue with the bathroom sinks. The issue was resolved very quickly.
5. Our flight from Porto was later in the evening and Sonia was very nice to let us check out of the apartment an hour later.

The checking-in issue:
We called Sonia a day before our arrival to Porto to let her know that we will be coming to the appointment late in the evening the next day and to get instructions on how to check-in.
Sonia asked us to call her 30 minutes before our arrival.
The next day we were driving from Lisbon to Porto. We called Sonia about 5 times between the hours of 7 and 10 pm and did get any response.
We checked an email in 7pm and found an email from Sonia sent from Airbnb at 18:34 where she was asking us to come to her house to pick up the apartment's keys. We sent her SMS, that we will do that and asked for her house's address. After that we did not get any response from Sonia until we actually arrived to the apartment at 10:15 pm. At that time Sonia called us and sent the address of her house.
It took us additional 1.5 hour to go there, meet Sonia, get all the instructions, drive back and finally get into the apartment.
This was rather unpleasant experience after 4 hours drive from Lisbon.
One more, hopfuly, temporary problem. Some distant neighbour started consruction at 9am both morning and woke me up. Earplugs were solution for it.
Still, overall, our stay in Sonia's apartment was pretty good and we enjoyed our time in Porto.
Well located apartment that is stylish, sparkling clean, and new.   We would definitely stay here again while visiting Porto.
This is a very beautiful place to stay. The apartment is spacious, clean, modern, nicely decorated. It's an ideal place to "come home to" after a busy day in the city. We loved it!
El apartamento está muy nuevo, bien equipado. Sabanas y toallas muy limpias. Hemos estado muy a gusto. El garaje muy práctico también.
O espaço possui otima localização e é bastante moderno e equipado. Infelizmente tivemos problema com o aquecimento e a limpeza deixou um pouco a desejar.
This is a great apartment with off street parking  it’s a bit of a walk to town but it’s all down hill and only cost 10 euro for a taxi home
A lovely apartment only slightly spoilt by Sonia failing to contact us when she was running late to meet us.

This is a nice apartment in a good location but was still our first disappointment with an airbnb.  
Check-in was the first problem. Two messages the day of check-in were unanswered, finally we phoned and were told we would be met at 4 p.m.  No-one came, so phoned again, and were told there in 5 minutes. Still no-one came but then an assistant called to say there in 5 minutes. It was much longer than that. We wound up waiting outside the door for almost an hour unable to go anywhere because we were supposedly going to be met right away. 
The second problem was when we were finally in it was obvious the place hadn't been cleaned since the last guests. Used towels were on the bathroom floor and beds had not been made; the cleaners arrived relatively quickly but this was still inconvenient.
On top of that were a number of smaller annoyances that added up. The assistant told us the heating radiators worked but they didn't. There were air conditioning units that we could use for heat but not in all rooms and they were hard to operate and to have even heat. The standing lamp shown in the living room photo in the ad was without a bulb and its broken cord was wrapped around it. The filter coffee maker was missing a carafe and the pods supplied didn't fit the other coffee maker which required a particular brand. There was not enough toilet paper supplied for four guests for three nights. The toilet paper and coffee pod issue was finally resolved just before the third night. The host also provided a few goodies at that time to try to make up for the issues. She assured us this didn't usually happen but we hope in future she will be more consistent with devoting attention to preparing the apartment for guests.
Todo muy bien y veraz

O apartamento é bem localizado, tem uma boa divisão de espaços, todos os equipamentos necessários, além de ser muito bem decorado.  Esperamos voltar e nos hospedar novamente nesse bonito apartamento. Obrigada!

O apartamento é excelente, muito confortável e amplo. Tem todos os utensílios e muitos itens de conforto, me senti em casa. A localização é boa, apesar de não ser central está a apenas alguns metros de uma estação de metrô que te leva para qualquer lugar do Porto. A vaga de garagem foi muito útil, é ampla e coube uma van grande que eu havia alugado.
Recomendo fortemente este apartamento e pretendo voltar a me hospedar nele no futuro

name: Cozy Room with perfect location
summary: My place is close to Jade Market, Yau Ma Tei Wholesale Fruit Market, Temple Street. You’ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
description: My place is close to Jade Market, Yau Ma Tei Wholesale Fruit Market, Temple Street. You’ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).

reviews.comments:
The description of host to reach receptionist was poor even if i tried to ask for it before reahed there. The room i booked was so small and abit bad smell. 

The location was good for the budget tourists.

This place is good location for food, shopping, as temple street is just nearby and there are Watson’s and 7-11 too. Yau Ma Tei mtr is not far as well. The place is really suitable for travelers with many luggages so keep that in mind. If you wish to feel like a hongkonger, you should give this place a try!

name: Cozy Unit 5min from airport!
summary: Enjoy your stay in a brand new bedroom. - Foxtel Platinum - Air con - Airport View - 55" 4K Smart TV - Brand new bed - Wi-Fi The unit is amazing, clean, stylish in a complex with heaps of facilities! - Woolworths - BWS - Restaurants - Train station
description: Enjoy your stay in a brand new bedroom. - Foxtel Platinum - Air con - Airport View - 55" 4K Smart TV - Brand new bed - Wi-Fi The unit is amazing, clean, stylish in a complex with heaps of facilities! - Woolworths - BWS - Restaurants - Train station You have everything you need around the complex 1min to Train Station
neighborhood_overview: You have everything you need around the complex
transit: 1min to Train Station
house_rules: The swipe card costs $150 if it gets lost. Please, look after it.

host.host_about: Friendly couple living in Sydney, like to enjoy the life traveling, making connections and hosting people from all around the world.

reviews.comments: He's so kind and helps us have a good time here. The room is clean and roommates are also friendly and helpful whatever you ask. I'm glad to stay here!
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is close to supermarket and food. Public Transport is around the corner 2mins to train station. 
The room is very well equipped and the house is amazing.

name: Apartmento Duplex Rua das Flores
summary: Este apartamento dúplex inclui um quarto com 1 cama de casal, um sofá-cama de casal na sala de estar e uma casa de banho privativa. A cozinha equipada permite aos hóspedes uma estadia auto-suficiente.
space: Os Charm Apartments estão localizados num edifício histórico no centro do Porto. O acesso Wi-Fi é gratuito. A propriedade está a 450 metros da Torre dos Clérigos e a uma caminhada de 5 minutos da Estação Ferroviária de São Bento. Cada apartamento foi completamente renovado e está equipado com aquecimento e insonorização. As casas de banho privativas têm uma banheira ou um chuveiro. Os apartamentos apresentam uma mistura de elementos modernos e antigos, como mobiliário simples, paredes em pedra exposta e vigas em madeira no tecto. Cada acomodação inclui ainda uma cozinha ou uma kitchenette, o que lhe permite confeccionar as suas próprias refeições. Além disso, poderá saborear gastronomia local nos restaurantes a cerca de 200 metros. A área da Ribeira, junto ao Rio Douro, encontra-se a 5 minutos a pé e está repleta de bares, onde poderá relaxar enquanto saboreia um copo de vinho. Ao atravessar a Ponte D. Luís I, é possível alcançar a outra margem do Rio Douro e visitar as Caves do Vinho
