notes: Taxa Municipal de turismo 2,00€ por pessoa/noite.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

name: Hale Ohia: Peaceful Escape Close to National Park
summary: Located on the sunny side of Volcano, the entrance to Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park is just 5 minutes away. This beautiful property, situated on a peaceful and quiet street in the desirable Volcano Golf & Country Club neighborhood, is delightfully private, surrounded on three sides with ohia and koa forest. Just 10 years old, this house features a fully equipped kitchen, full size washer/dryer, free WiFi, and cozy open concept living room/dining area with gas fireplace.
space: 3 bedroom, 2 bath private house features a spacious master bedroom suite and a large master bathroom with 2 sinks and large walk-in tiled shower. The guest bedrooms share a bath with shower. Enjoy the fireplace, the comfy couches, the privacy and garden views after a great day exploring the park... or sit on the cozy covered lanai and experience the secluded and peaceful yard and koa forest at the back of the property, as well as the many native birds who call the area their home. You are within walking distance of the 18 hole Volcano Golf Course as well as the Volcano Winery. The neighborhood has wide quiet paved streets that are ideal for walking, cycling, etc
description: Located on the sunny side of Volcano, the entrance to Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park is just 5 minutes away. This beautiful property, situated on a peaceful and quiet street in the desirable Volcano Golf & Country Club neighborhood, is delightfully private, surrounded on three sides with ohia and koa forest. Just 10 years old, this house features a fully equipped kitchen, full size washer/dryer, free WiFi, and cozy open concept living room/dining area with gas fireplace. 3 bedroom, 2 bath private house features a spacious master bedroom suite and a large master bathroom with 2 sinks and large walk-in tiled shower. The guest bedrooms share a bath with shower. Enjoy the fireplace, the comfy couches, the privacy and garden views after a great day exploring the park... or sit on the cozy covered lanai and experience the secluded and peaceful yard and koa forest at the back of the property, as well as the many native birds who call the area their home. You are within walking distance of th
neighborhood_overview: The Golf Course neighborhood is much sunnier than the other areas of Volcano and has nice paved, wide and quiet streets.
notes: We've set up the house as an ideal vacation rental. You'll find soap & shampoo in the bathrooms, condiments in the fridge, a fully stocked kitchen, washer/dryer, dishwasher, comfy beds and a wonderfully quiet property.
transit: You will need a car to get around.
interaction: We live 40 minutes away in Hilo and are accessible during your stay.
house_rules: Please respect our cleaning staff and their busy schedules and check-out on time (10am). Late check-outs will be subject to a $50 late check-out fee. Mahalo.

reviews.comments: If you are visiting the Volcanoes National Park with your family, this is a great house with a perfect location.  From the front porch to the Halema'uma'u overlook was just 7 minutes.  With the park open 24 hours, we'd jump in the car and go watch the rise and fall of the volcano lake anytime we felt the urge.  Late night viewing was the best...beautiful, so quiet we could hear the eruption and all to ourselves.

House was great! Everything was as described in the listing and Jeff was really easy to communicate with. It was in a cute remote area up the mountain, and very accessible to all of the cool activities in Volcano National Park. Thanks for a good stay!

Hale Ohia is an absolute gem.  Nestled on a cozy, private yet accessible lot in the Volcano Golf Estates--this house has everything you'd need for a cozy Volcano getaway.  The pictures really do not do this place justice.  The Master Bedroom is huge and lovely.  The gas fireplace was my favorite feature as I had thought I preferred wood-burning fireplaces...that is until Hale Ohia converted me to the ease and instant warmth of the gas fireplace!  We spent all three days exploring the Volcano National Park, discovered a charming restaurant in Volcano Village called Ohelo Cafe (5 stars on (Hidden by Airbnb) ), the fun Thai Food Truck at the Cooper Center and more!  The cleanliness of this house was outstanding and had all the creature comforts you can dream of.  Every morning we awoke to the sounds of native birds chirping and enjoyed the cool, brisk morning air during our morning walks.  I could go on and on and on...I loved this place that much!  Book this gem!

We really enjoyed our stay at Jeff's house. It was clean, spacious and well stocked with everything you could ever need. The neighborhood is very quiet and only 5 minutes away from the Volcano National Park.
Jeff was also very quick to respond to any of our questions, usually replying within minutes. I highly recommend.

The house is situated less than 5 minutes to the Volcano Park and the Volcano Village where you can get great food for lunch and dinner.  Our family (5 grown up) loves the backyard, very tranquil.  We were from Florida and spent 7 nights at Honolulu before flying to Hilo.  We spent two nights and extended a late checkout for the third day as we took the red-eye home.   We were so glad we paid a little more for the extension, as we can relax our last day of vacation and had a bite before heading to the airport.  The house is very clean, comfortable beds and well equipped, provided everything like a hotel plus more.  They even provided beach mats and cooler, barbecue grill and coal.  Coffee and tea are also available.  The full size washer and dryer is a bonus so we even can have clean laundry going home.  The owner Jeff is very responsive, every time I asked a questions, I pretty much got an answer within minutes.  Not sure how he did it as we have 6 hours different in our time zone.  Love this house and should we come back to Hilo, this is the house we want to rent again.....

This place is a tranquil retreat in volcano village. With just a few minutes to the national park the location was great if you are planning to explore there. Jeff had excellent communication and he was always quick to reply.

We loved our stay and wished we had stayed one more night. The beds are very comfortable. We were minutes away from Hawaii Volcano National Park and the town of Volcano. The surroundings are beautiful and peaceful, perfect for sleeping in. We were glad to have a washer and dryer after traveling for a week.

Great location only 5 minutes from the Volcano National Park and a local winery. 

Well equipped, quiet and very comfortable. 

Make sure you gas up and have groceries bought before you get there as it is a small community. 

It was beyond perfect for our family of 6.

This was a very good location if you are visiting the Volcano Park.  The interior was pristine and very comfortable.  The location was very quiet and the host was very helpful.  It was a great place to stay.

The house was a perfect place to stay in order to easily explore Volcano National Park. The location was very convenient, only a few minutes drive away from the gate. 

We loved the house with its well spaced out bedrooms. It was perfect for the two kids and two adults. The living room was very cozy with the fireplace there to warm up as it does cool down a little bit in the evenings. The house was a bit chilly so if you get cold easily you might want to bundle up and put an extra blanket on. (And there were extra blankets!)

The kitchen was incredibly well-equipped. We even brought things that we didn’t really need such as oil and salt and pepper and some basics for cooking. There were  even extra water bottles that we were able to borrow when we went hiking in the park. Everything was thought of. Definitely the perfect place to stay for those people who are spending time in the park and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was perfect for the kids and ourselves. 

The only drawback is that in Volcano Village there really isn’t much around. You need to make sure that you have purchased groceries before you arrive. We did our shopping in Kona and in a small town on our way to Volcano. If you are coming from Hilo you will want to do your groceries there before you get to Volcano.

I highly recommend this place. It was perfect!

Jeff's home was beautiful. Very relaxing, clean, amazing location. We had a blast and the only thing I'd change is that we stayed longer. This airBnB was great!!! We will be back. Jeff also gave us great pointers on the area and was very responsive. Can't wait till our next visit.

The house was exactly as pictured and in a fantastic location.  The host was very communicative and the instructions were great.  We found the house very comfortable and clean.  There was a slight musty odor since the climate is so humid.   This is a perfect place to stay while exploring Hilo and Volcano National Park.

This is a beautiful home! It's plenty spacious for any family or group of friends traveling to the Volcano area. It's located in such a peaceful/serene area and so easy to enjoy Volcano State Park to it's fullest. We had a wonderful stay and we would highly recommend this home!!
This home is in a nice quiet neighborhood very close to the National Park.  The host was very responsive and had lots of little amenities that make it feel like home.

Nice place to stay for family, clean, quiet and comfortable. Close by volcano national park, about 30 miles away from Punalu'u Beach and probably another 15 miles to Papakōlea Beach. If I will ever come back visit big island, will for sure stay here again. Thanks Jeff!

빅아일랜드를 돌아보기 위해 렌트카를 빌렸다면 볼케이노 지역의 숙소를 추천합니다. 한밤중에 볼수있는 대자연의 경관중 하나인 킬라우에아 화산의 화염을 보는것은 최고의 기억이 될 것이기 때문입니다. Jeff의 숙소는 화산공원과 매우 가까워 늦은시간 이동에 부담이 없고, 전형적인 미국 집의 편리함과 아늑함을 제공해 주어 여행객들에게 큰 만족감을 줄 것입니다. 적극 추천합니다.

The house was perfectly located for visiting the National Park. See the lava and the steam vents both during the day and at night - just a 5 minute drive. 
The house had everything we needed to make this our home base for a few days. We’ll be back.
Great location for seeing the Volcano National Park, black sand beach and turtles, walking distance to the winery! House had amenities for us to cook our own meals and be comfortable. Thanks!

Place was great! Clean, comfortable and in a beautiful area in Volcano. Took a morning walk and the homes in the area are so cute and the Volcano Winery is super close by! Perfect  lotion for visiting the National Park. Highly recommended.

Everything was just way better than expected. The house was beautiful and clean, rooms were spacious and nicely setup, and the trees and birds in the backyard were all simply awesome! 100% recommended!!

The house of Jeff is modern, spacious, functional.
Ideal for family or friends 
I recommend the place is very quiet

Great spot near Volcano National Park and the small town of Volcano. Easy to find and perfect place to hang out. It can get chillier in that altitude, so just use the space heaters if you're there during winter. Was a perfect place to spend a couple days to be closer to Hilo & the park. Awesome!

name: Coreto 179, MODERN FLAT IN CLASSY OLD BUILDING
summary: Cool and cozy apartment located in the Marquês, a quiet and central area.  Perfect for those wanting to know the busy city centre but still get a peace night’s sleep.Excellent location,10 min walking distance to the city centre.  The metro, on the other side of the street, will get you to the historic centre in 5 minutes. Buses depart from here for all parts of the city and there is also a taxi rank nearby. We simple decorated whith colour notes and we whope you can feel like home.
space: This apartment is housed in a centenary building, implanted around 1910. Although it has undergone a rehabilitation, we were careful to maintain its architectural characteristics, both in its structure as well as in the materials. We were very careful to keep the original wooden floors and stucco ceilings. The fusion of history with a more contemporary touch of decoration has resulted in this pleasant space that we would like to share with you. The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, oven, hob, coffee machine, toaster, washing machine and dryer and dishwasher. It offers free Wi-Fi, bath towels, sheets, shampoo and shower gel. The Coreto 179 also has the attention of having a baby bed with sheets and blankets and a stroller for your walks. I look forward to welcoming you and I hope I can provide you a great stay where we offer the best price-quality ratio! See you soon!
description: Cool and cozy apartment located in the Marquês, a quiet and central area.  Perfect for those wanting to know the busy city centre but still get a peace night’s sleep.Excellent location,10 min walking distance to the city centre.  The metro, on the other side of the street, will get you to the historic centre in 5 minutes. Buses depart from here for all parts of the city and there is also a taxi rank nearby. We simple decorated whith colour notes and we whope you can feel like home. This apartment is housed in a centenary building, implanted around 1910. Although it has undergone a rehabilitation, we were careful to maintain its architectural characteristics, both in its structure as well as in the materials. We were very careful to keep the original wooden floors and stucco ceilings. The fusion of history with a more contemporary touch of decoration has resulted in this pleasant space that we would like to share with you. The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, oven, hob, coffee ma
neighborhood_overview: The Coreto 179 is located in Porto in a very central area, very quiet and very picturesque. It is housed in a centenary building, dating from 1910. The square where it is situated has already visited the famous architect Marques da Silva, where Porto owes much of its drawings, his house-studio is on the opposite side of this apartment. The name of the apartment pays homage to the bandstand (coreto) that animates the square, dating from 1858. Only in this area have we found the curiosities of the city's history. If you leave from this house in 15min walk is in the historical center of the city or if you prefer to get there by metro in 5min. In the neighborhood you will find all kinds of essential services, supermarkets, coffee shops, pharmacies. The metro is at the door as well as several buses, to all points of the city, and taxis. Coreto 179 is 1.6 km from Porto Coliseum, 2 km from Casa de Musica, 2.1 km from Livello Lello, 2.7 km from Port Wine Cellars and 1.4 km from the Bolhão.
notes: Since 2015, Portugal has more strictly enforced a long-standing law, requiring that anyone offering paid accommodation to register the entry, exit and identification details of all non-Portuguese citizens using this accommodation. This law came into force in Portugal and most other EU countries at some point since the gradual implementation of the 1990 Schengen Agreement. The accommodation in the city of Porto is subject to the payment of a Municipal Tourist Tax of € 2 per night / per person up to a maximum of 7 consecutive nights (from the age of 13 inclusive). This value is not included in the reservation and will have to be paid in cash on the day of check-in. In the rate of cleaning subject to guests are included bed sheets set (for two) and another set in case the reservation is made for 3, a face towel and a bath per guest. In case of use in addition to these ceded guests are subject to an extra laundry fee of 25eur. The house is prepared with all the comfort for your stay. For c
transit: From the airport the best way to get there is by Metro. You must change in Trindade station to the Yellow line towards Hospital de São João and leave at Marquês station. The house is in front of the metro station.
house_rules: - terem o cuidado de fechar as janelas sempre que sairem.

host.host_about: Olá sou do Porto por opção e não por naturalidade! Os meus interesse estão sobretudo dirigidos para as artes, sejam elas de palco, plasticas ou street, gosto de viajar e de viver! Sou estudante em História da Arte, pela Faculdade de Letras da Universidade do Porto.

reviews.comments:
O coreto 179 foi uma agradável surpresa. Um apartamento super bem decorado, com atenção ao pormenor e com recheio da casa de alta qualidade.
O bairro onde está localizado é muito pitoresco e central, com uma estação de metro a dois minutos de distância a pé.
O que dizer da Lia e do André? Dois anfitriões fenomenais, muito atenciosos e disponíveis.
Uma experiência a repetir seguramente quando estiver de volta ao Porto.

Não há o que dizer, a não ser que é um lugar fantástico para se hospedar no Porto. Metro à porta. Ônibus à porta. Ou mesmo numa caminhada de 10 minutos descendo a Santa Catarina já se está no coração da cidade. Mercados, lojas, farmácias e uma praça charmosa completam a vizinhança, calma e silenciosa. Internamente tem tudo que é preciso para acomodar até 4 pessoas de forma confortável. Para finalizar, a proprietária é extremamente atenciosa e disponível. Super recomendo... Vou voltar.

El apartamento es simplemente espectacular mejor incluso que en las fotos. Estar fuera de la zona turística pero céntrico y perfectamente comunicado hacen que la ubicación sea perfecta ya que te hace sentir como un vecino de oporto más. El trato de Lia es formidable siempre atenta a cualquier necesidad y dispuesta a ayudar en todo, una verdadera amiga. Una opción excelente para vivir unos días es Oporto!

Tastefully refurbished flat in classy old building whith character. Placed in quiet square close to central Oporto.
Bus stops and tube station just opposite the front door.
Everything as stated. Even better than pictures. Spotless.
Heating a bit scarce for a big studio flat, but there were unusual cold days for Oporto mild climate. Perfect after the first day.
Supermarket very close.
Highly recommended

Great location right next to lively park; Close enough to walk to the town centre comfortably but far enough to have quiet nights in with the windows to the street open. Great cafes and restaurants close by and a grocery store if you want to try cooking yourself. The host was always helpful and very responsive.

Lia est super !!! À notre écoute, disponible, sympa, que du mieux !!! Appartement plus que convenable, si on veut être hors centre mais métro à 20 mètres, sur la place... je recommande pour ceux qui veulent un écrin tranquille... (les bus sont aux pieds de l'appartement mais avec le double vitrage, aucun souci !). Merci Lia, ton appart, c'est du top ! Raphaël.

Best place to stay in Porto. Close from everything (metro, bus stations, walking distance from
Downtown). We really love the experience. The appartement is brand new, well furnish and the hosts are simply awesome. 11 out of 10. We recommand the appartement for all travellers in Porto.

Everything was perfect. Lia is very kind and available for all the requests. The apartment is nice, fancy and clean. One of the best apartment until now ( and I have booked a lot)
5 ESTRELLAS
Very nice, cosy and well equiped flat. The place Marques is very charming and typical. The metro is just on the place and it's very easy to go to historical center. Lia is a great host, very kind.

Un alloggio con una posizione perfetta, con la fermata del metro e del bus sotto casa. Il centro si puo raggiungere anche a piedi in 15 min. La zona é fornita di qualsiasi comoditá di cui si possa aver bisogno. La casa é davvero pulitissima e non manca davvero di qualsiasi accessorio. L'accoglienza da parte della padrona di casa é stata molto calda e amichevole. Se dovessi averne nuovamente bisogno sicuramente tornerei ad alloggiare qui.

Lia's place is a charming apartment that they renovated beautifully themselves. It is set on the outside of a small park with wonderful trees and fountains. Very easy and affordable parking on the same block. Access to bus route right outside the door. This was a great location from which to explore the city on foot. Best of all, Lia is a fantastic host who gave us such a warm welcome on our honeymoon trip. She surprised us with flowers, champagne and fruit when we walked in the door. She is a very kind person and we highly recommend her apartment!

Lia has thought of every single detail at her place. Everything is in the right place and it feels like new. Her apartment has amazing detailed high ceilings. They have done a wonderful job with apartment restoration. She will go the extra mile to make sure you have the most pleasant stay. Highly recommend this place.
Très chaleureux accueil et appartement très bien installé.  Belle décoration et en très bon état.

Lia's place was perfect! It was very clean and had everything you would need.  Lia was super communicative and easy to deal with.  Lia has done an amazing job fitting out the place and we would definitely stay here again!

Staying at Lia's apartment was perfect, she provided everything we could have needed, was there to meet us when we arrived and left and was great at helping us with directions and recommendations on where to eat whilst we were there. Small details like this really made our trip! The place itself is a great size, looks onto a lovely square and is beautifully renovated. There is a metro stop right outside the apartment but it's only a 15-20 minute walk into town which we did most days. I'd highly recommend and we hope to stay in Lia's lovely apartment again soon :)
Un très joli appartement mais bruyant.
Lia's place was just as pictured - cute and had everything we needed during our stay in Porto. She was also extremely responsive and helpful with my queries - thanks Lia!

Great apartment. The host was brilliant , very friendly and was there to answer any questions. The apartment was clean and perfect for a couple , also very convenient for the city centre with a metro on your doorstep or walking in 15 mins. A great base to explore the beautiful city of Porto

The apartment is comfortable & stylish with tall windows looking out onto enormous leafy trees & park life in the square. Directly across from the Marquês metro & a taxi stand, so very convenient. The space is compact but with high ceilings & an airy feel & is very cleverly set up--Lia has thought of everything a traveler might need. She is warm & very helpful, got us some fruit for our arrival. A wonderful host.

Had a great experience at Lia's apartment! A small vibrant apartment with everything
You need . Lia was a very generous, helpful host and we cannot thankyou enough!

L'appartement typique de l'architecture portugaise est situé dans un bel ensemble d'immeuble, la proximité de la place Marques et de ses commerces concourt à un agréable séjour.
Tout le confort est présent et conforme aux photos publiées.

L'accès est facile au centre historique : descendre la rue Santa Catherina en bout de place (1.8km), pour les moins courageux la station de métro Marques est sur la place à deux pas et l'arrêt de bus à la porte de l'immeuble.

L'accueil est chaleureux, Lia a toujours été à notre écoute et nous avons apprécié sa gentillesse et son sourire.
Un véritable plaisir que nous recommandons

Es un espacio precioso en una zona muy tranquila y bonita. Muy bien comunicado con todos los medios de transporte (taxis, metro, autobuses) en la puerta de casa. Se puede ir paseando al centro histórico y una de las calles más comerciales de la ciudad, Sta Catalina, empieza en la misma plaza del apartamento. 
Lia y su familia son unas personas encantadoras que nos han hecho la estancia muy agradable. Volveremos Volveremos!
Lia is very nice and the appartement beautiful.

Lia place is lovely. You can see it's a labour of love. Every detail in the apartment is so well thought, maintaining the original features. 
The area is great with many shops and cafes around but also quiet in the evening with a short 15 min walk to the historic center. Last but definitely not least is the host; Lia is lovely and very attentive. Making sure we were well settled and had everything we needed. I'm glad we stayed here and I'm glad to have met Lia, experiences like this remind me why Airbnb is such a great community!

We had a wonderfull stay in Lia's Flat. Its a lovely place. We enjoyed very well. Lia is a very nice, helpfull and interesting person. She gave us many helpfull advices. In her flat we found all the things we need and something more.
Lia's place was lovely and exactly as described. Lia was very sweet and communicative and made everything extra special for me and my husband on our honeymoon.

We loved our stay at Lias place. She also arranged a pick up from the airport which made our arrival super easy and convenient. The apartment is very lovely & authentically renovated. You can see her eye for detail everywhere. We felt like we were staying at a friends apartment due to the warm welcome. It is around 30 minutes to walk to the city Center, but there is a bus stop right before the door and Uber is also a nice option in Porto.
We would definitely come back to Lia's place. :)
Cute apto

Lia's and André's flat is amazing, really beautifully furnished and has a great view on a park. It is small but contains everything you need e.g. for cooking. There were also supermarkets nearby. Lia and André welcomed us warmly and gave us tips where to go for eating, going out, etc... The flat was located near the subway station and it took only a few minutes to go to the center. Unfortunately, it was a bit loud sometimes because of the other people living in the house, but this is normal in a house with several apartments.
All in all, we were really recommend the flat.

Lia was a really fantastic and flexible host. The apartment is absolutely gorgeously decorated and presented with everything you need for a few days city break. We booked short notice and Ali's was very accommodating. Would personally highly recommend it. Brilliant transport connections too

La estancia en casa de Lia ha superado nuestras expectativas. 
El edificio está restaurado y tiene la arquitectura típica de Porto, es una gran oportunidad para conocer un edificio así por dentro. Además la reforma del interior del apartamento es increíble, con gran gusto y cuidado en cada detalle, todo nuevo y limpísimo. 
Nos ha sorprendido lo equipada q está la casa, no falta de nada, Lia es muy atenta, incluso teníamos un frutero con fruta fresca. 
La plaza en la que está situada cuenta con todo tipo de transportes que conectan con el centro (autobuses, metro y taxis). Y andando es un paseo de quince minutos hasta llegar a la zona de Bolhao. Existe un parking a la vuelta de la esquina donde el precio máximo por día es de 2,50€ y no hay trampa ni cartón, es totalmente seguro.
En la casa hay cafetera y en la misma plaza hay varias confiterías buenísimas para desayunar a precios muy baratos, nada que ver con las cafeterías del centro donde los precios son más altos.
Oporto nos ha enamorado así que esperamos no tardar mucho en volver.
Good location and clean room, but just the noise in the morning due to the buses

We have stayed at quite a number of Airbnb rentals and Lia was by far our favorite host. She was informative, communicative and provided a lovely space for us. The location is ideally situated on a park and a quick walk to many of the cities attractions. Highly recommended.

We loved this tasteful, well equipped flat. It is ideal for a couple. The city centre is a 20 minute walk or very easy metro ride away. The area immediately surrounding the flat has good bakeries, a supermarket and parking nearby, you have to go into town for restaurants (except Portucale, which was excellent, quite smart with a mostly Portuguese upmarket menu, and Portughandi - Indian if you haven't guessed!). Lia was a lovely person with lots of helpful tips for our stay.

Lia's apartment is beautiful and makes a perfect place to explore Porto from. It is very close to the Metro station or easy to walk into the city. The flat has everything you might need and Lia is so welcoming and friendly. We would definitely stay here again or recommend to other travellers.

Apartamento con mucho encanto, acorde a la publicidad. Muy bien comunicado y con una anfitriona encantadora preocupada por cualquier sugerencia o requerimiento que le pudiéramos hacer. Ideal para repetir y recomendar.

Lia’s apartment is the perfect place to stay in Porto. 

The apartment itself is beautiful. Very authentic, gorgeous ceiling, beautiful windows looking out onto a park. The area is also great. If you are driving, literally next door is a safe and easy to access parking lot, that is only 2.50 euro per day. Very easy to drive to so you don’t have to navigate through Porto in your car. 

The location is perfect. You are twenty minute walk from the Centre, so the neighborhood is peaceful, quiet and charming. You are also right at a metro stop if you want to get anywhere faster. Uber is also quite cheap in Porto. 

Lia herself, is lovely. She greeted us at the apartment with a big smile and hug. She leaves free coffee and water with some snacks for you. Very thoughtful and caring. Her restaurant recommendations are perfect. 

All in all can not recommend this place enough. Had a great time.
Lia is such a lovely host - we really enjoyed meeting her. The flat is beautiful - I'd highly recommend staying here.

Lia's apartment is just as it is described. It has everything you need for a stay in Porto. It was very tastefully decorated and spotlessly clean. It is next to a metro which makes travelling around the city very easy which together with secure Parking close by for €2.50 a day means you can forget your car for the whole of your trip. Lia was also an exceptionally nice and helpful host.

Great little flat in a very interesting and lively part of porto, access to the centre  opposite the flat, metro or bus, five minutes by metro or fifteen if you feel like walking. Lia and Andre great hosts and we thank them very much. Highly recommended for a couple
Lia is a good host! A nice qlean appartment with al the comfort you need.  and if you have a question, she is always there. thank you Lia!
Stunning place with a view to the park right next to a metro stop and Lia is super nice and friendly too! I'd definitely recommend to stay here for when you come to Porto!

La casa de Lia es muy acogedora, tanto, que te costará salir a descubrir Oporto.
Lia fue muy amable y atenta, nos explico todo como si estuviéramos en la escuela :)
La casa no está en todo el centro de oporto, pero muy cerca y tiene justo al lado la entrada al metro.
Recomendable 100%

Lia was such an amazing host! She provided us with great recommendations and her place is so beautiful. It is well equipped, decorated beautifully and in a great location. We loved our stay in Porto and hope to be back soon.

Lia est une hôte plus que super. Elle est très accueillante dès votre arrivée à l’appartmement, prête à vous donner toutes les explications nécessaires quant au logement et toutes les informations pratiques concernant la ville afin que votre séjour se passe le plus agréable possible.
Avant notre arrivée à Porto elle a toujours été très disponible à toutes questions éventuelles pour préparer notre arrivée et notre séjour dans la ville.
L’appartement est nickel, à l’image des photos reprises sur le site. Il est très propre, très bien décoré et très bien équipé (serviettes, accessoires, électroménager, café, thé, sel, poivre, ...). Il est également très bien desservi car juste en face d’une station de métro (en 3-4 arrêts vous êtes dans le centre de Porto) mais il est tout aussi facile de se rendre à pieds dans le centre de la ville et cela ne prends que 15-20 min. Aux alentours de l’appartement il y a de tout (boulangerie, pharmacie, petite restauration, supermaché).
Je recommande vivement l’appartement de Lia sans hésiter.

Etter 3 måneder på reise, med ymse erfaringer fra Air BnB—leiligheter, var Lias sted i Porto en drømmeleilighet; en kul beliggenhet i et nydelig herskapelig hus, like ved en trivelig park, omringet av mange små og koselige kafeer! Leiligheten var nyoppusset og skinnende ren, stilig innredet, med alt man kan drømme om  av fasiliteter. Vi reiser med en baby på 8 måneder og Lia hadde ordnet med babyseng, barnehåndduk, babystol og leker! Det var akkurat som å komme hjem! Hun svarte på alle henvendelser. Da vi kom hadde hun satt frem frukt til oss, og laget en liste over bra steder å spise og utforske. Anbefaler denne leiligheten på det aller sterkeste!

Lia’s place is the perfect place to stay in Porto! The apartment is beautiful, well styled and bright and airy with its high ceilings and shutters that open right on to a peaceful, green square. It’s  perfectly located too - if you’re ok with a few hills you can walk everywhere. Add to that Lia’s bright, welcoming hospitality, local knowledge, and little finishes touches laid out for your stay and you have yourself a wonderful and amazingly good value for money holiday! We loved it so much we’re already planning when we can come back! xx

We loved the space which is fresh and clean but also historic feeling.  Perfect for a couple.  Lia is super friendly and has thoughtfully provided all that you might need for a comfortable, homey stay in Porto.  The location is great - right across from a nice green space and close to everything there is to love about Porto without being right in the middle of it.  We enjoyed wandering the city by foot in every direction, but there is also easy access to bus and metro from the apartment.

Lia est une jeune femme très accueillante et disponible. Son appartement est parfait pour un couple, impeccablement équipé (Lia a pensé à tout, vraiment). Il a du charme et il est décoré avec goût. Sa situation géographique est excellente, avec le métro juste devant. Il se trouve sur une jolie  place, à 15 minutes à pied du centre de Porto. La literie est de bonne qualité. Bref je le recommande vivement.

We had a wonderful stay in Lia's apartement. At our arrival we were warmly welcomed by Lia and felt very comfortable from the beginning. The apartment is very clean, well equipped and nicely decorated.

Lia and André really made sure that we had a pleasant stay in Porto. Apart from the cozy and well-equipped apartment, they also gave us with helpful tips about where to go and what to do in the city. We felt very welcome and would surely book their apartment again!
Everything was perfect, the flat is beautiful with a great location to visit Porto! We could well rest with a nice view of the trees from Praça Marquês after a full day in the city.

Anfitriões muito simpáticos, caprichosos e atenciosos. O apto e muito bem decorado, aconchegante e a localização é excelente. Metro com elevador na praça bem em frente. Bons restaurantes e supermercado próximo.

The apartment was very easy to get to on arrival as it is located at a metro  station and only c. 45 minutes from the airport. The local area has lots of bakeries so fresh bread is available in the morning. A few restaurants nearby also allow for the convenience of eating near home if desired. The apartment is comfortable, modern and extremely clean with all modern amenities and conveniences available. About 20 minutes walk to town but not really an issue and being on the metro line was very handy especially arriving and departing. I would definitely recommend a stay here.
Simplesmente encantador o espaço de Lia. Desde o casarão antigo e belo, passando pela cuidadosa restauração

L’appartement de Lia a beaucoup de charme, confort et propreté irréprochables et très bien placé, au calme, sur une charmante place mais à côté du métro. Lia est absolument adorable, à l’écoute et aux petits soins pour votre arrivée (conseils, aide pour le taxi etc.) jusqu’au départ. Cela contribue à faire de votre séjour un moment très agréable. Si je reviens à Porto, j’y retourne les yeux fermés !

The place is beautifully located in front of Marques square, which also makes it very comfortable to take the bus (the station to go to downtown is there).
It's spotless clean, has everything we needed, was very cosy and Lia and her husband were great, very friendly, easy to communicate and quick to answer. Staying at their place made our trip to Porto a lovely experience.

This flat is ADORABLE. Very good location close to a metro and also walking distance to the center of Porto. Lia is a delightful host. The flat is perfect for a romantic getaway and has all the amenities you could ever need. We are already planning on returning, and recommending this flat to everyone we know!

The flat is really comfortable and exactly as you can see in the pictures. It is located in a beautiful and peaceful plaza where you can find both metro and bus stations which can take you to the city center in 10 minutes. Walking to the city center is also an option but coming back might be harder since it is up hill. My only recommendation to Lia is to upgrade the mattress and pillows since they were a bit uncomfortable. In general, highly recommended for couples!!

El lugar es mas lindo que en las fotos, se puede caminar a los sitios de interés o tienes en la plaza frente al departamento el metro y otros
Servicios públicos. Los anfitriones son muy amables, te dejan toda la información que necesitas y además tiene preparado el alojamiento con cosas básicas como café, te, agua, azúcar, frutas frescas y productos de limpieza. Hasta tuvieron el hermoso detalle de recibirme con flores por el día de la madre.
Recomendamos este alojamiento y volveríamos a alojarnos en una futura visita a Oporto.

Lia provides a great place to stay while visiting Porto. The apartment is clean, coffee, fruit and local information is provided. There are several local places where pastries can be purchased to start your day. A short walk gets you down to the heart of Porto. If walking isn't for you there is a Metro stop across the street.
Enjoy your Porto visit at Lia's !!
Un apartamento bien ubicado, limpio, agradable, calidad en cada detalle y la ayuda personal de Lia, nos quedamos muy contentos, saludos Lars

Lia is the most animated Airbnb host I’ve ever met! She was funny, informative, and helpful. Her place is located directly across the street from the metro station, a cafe, and 2 pastry shops. The loft is very spacious, well decorated, and has plenty of amenities. Lia even provides a dry erase board of restaurant recommendations and 2 metro passes. I highly recommend a stay at Lia’s place!

Lia was the perfect host. Her welcome set us up for a perfect stay in Porto.  We loved the apartment.  As the description says, classy. Not far from the centre and a great bakery and a great little coffee shop for breakfast on the corner of the square. Lia’s suggestions of where to eat well worth following. Thanks, Lia, for you welcome and thoughtfulness!

Lia's apartment is lovely and comfortable.  It is quite close to the metro station which makes it easy to get around.  The apartment overlooks a sweet park which is very soothing.  I really enjoyed my stay in Porto.

Porto is a wonderful city. Lia's apartment is a dream. Everything is available for a nice city trip.  The apartment is centrally located at a busy park and it is only a 15 minute walk to the city. We had a great time and recommend the apartment to others. Thanks for everything, Lia.

Lia’s flat was amazing! Super clean and stylish, it was lovely to come home to after a hard day of touring the city! The location is great, we tended to use the metro (right outside the flat) to get into town itself to save our feet for walking through the gorgeous streets and travelling over the water! The walk however is about 15 minutes into town, and perhaps a further 10 to Ribeira. When we arrived it was the São João Festival  and Lia helpfully equipped us with knowledge and a squeaky hammer which came in handy for bopping people on the head for good luck. We had a delightful stay and would absolutely love to come again! Thanks Lia!

Lia’s apartment is just as on the pictures, absolutely beautiful and perfectly furnished. You will find everything you need. Lia is wonderful and has loads of good tips for restaurants, cafes and what to do in Porto. The apartment is a bit outside but with the metro you will reach the city centre in just 5min. I would definitely stay there again! Thanks for your warm welcome.

Great location,  lovely place. Lia was extremely reactive and sweet. The neighbourhood has a lot of charm and tons of great places to have lunch or dinner. And the city center is a 20 minute walk away, super convenient.

Lia's place was amazing! Such a stylish and sweet flat, near to a bakery for breakfast. She had thought of everything and had left us lovely coffee and we were in need of nothing! The apartment is about a 20 minute downhill walk into Porto or 5-10 mins on the metro- we enjoyed the walk! Lia left some great recommendations of places to go and eat and visit. All in all a fantastic airbnb and one we would definitely stay in again. The experience was very easy and enjoyable! Thank you Lia

Lia’s place is absolutely fantastic and so is Lia!
The place is in a beautifull old building but has been redecorated with love. And that’s what you can feel there.
In front of the building there are a metro and a bus, which take you in just a few minutes to the centre of Porto.
Lia does everything to make your stay as nice as possible. She arranged a pick-up service from the AirPort with adorable Ricardo and she booked us a table at a nice Portugese restaurant.
When you consider going to Porto, Lia’s place is highly recommended

The flat is just beautiful ! There is absolutely nothing negative to say about our stay. There is everything you might need and even more. Lia and Andres were amazing hosts. We felt as if we were staying at friends’ house !! Not only do we recommend this flat, we would definitely stay there again.

Já é a segunda vez que fico em casa da Lia e a experiência não poderia ser melhor. A casa está localizada mesmo ao lado do metro e a decoração é fantástica. A atenção ao pormenor e à limpeza da casa são de se fazer notar. Faz-nos sentir em casa! Um sítio de referência quando à procura de alojamento no Porto!

Cet appartement est vraiment parfait en tout point. De son emplacement dans la ville aux équipement proposés, calme, propre et sublimé par son design moderne et authentique, nous ne pouvions attendre mieux en terme de prestations.
Lia met la barre très haute dans la qualité de son service, elle propose également des guides personnalisés de Porto pour transformer votre voyage en une véritable expérience. Nous n'avons passé que 3 jours à Porto mais son aide et ses conseils nous ont permis d'éviter des pièges à touristes et découvrir une autre facette de la ville en un temps record. Lia est réellement un hôte qui prend soin de ses locataires, elle a facilité nos heures de venues et de départ, nous a réservé une table pour diner le soir... Quoi dire de plus sinon que nous retournerons chez elle si nous devons revenir à Porto.  
Merci pour tout Lia, j'espère que l'on se reverra.

we had a wonderful time in Porto and a big part was the warm welcome by Lia. the apartment is beautiful and the location is really nice. The tips for places to go are really usefull and we would love to come back to Porto and stay at Lia's

Lia's place is tremendous. The location allows you to truly feel what it is like to be a local. The surrounding area is a hub of activity throughout the day and commuting is very easy. You can access any part of porto very easily from the location. For the interior, the apartment was modern with very stylish and personal features that made me feel at home. I would defiantly stay here the next time I am in Porto.
Lia’s place is gorgeous and set a little bit back from major tourist zone- feels like you’re staying with the locals. Lia gives great recommendations for things to do in the city!

Beautiful space, lovely (and quiet) location. Flat has everything you could hope to need, as well as tips on where to eat, drink etc... Lots of guidebooks too. Absolutely sparkling clean! All in all the perfect place for a city break.
Great, sunny stylish studio. Would stay there again!

Just as the pictures everything you need is there and the area is ideal for visiting Porto. Loved the bakery and square on the doorstep.  Would love just the two of us to go back sometime but we still had a great time with our daughter on the spare bed ! Thank you
Lovely host, well appointed accommodation, local residential area if you prefer away from usual tourists!! easy for metro and local buses

Lia and Andre were superior hosts! The apartment is beautiful, in a lovely part of town. Great location! Looking out to the park from our window was a nice added touch. Everything is close by, with the metro just steps away. We highly recommend this place to everyone!

Lia is definitely the top best host in airbnb. Really thoughtful and caring about her guests. The directions and communication are good. The flat is clean and comfortable. You can find all of thing you need in the flat.

We loved to stay in Porto in Lia’s house which makes our experience about Porto were full of ‘good memories’.

Lia made my stay in Porto so ready and comfortable. The place is centrally located, and a few feet from the metro. About a ten - fifteen minute walk to the square down Rua Santa Catarina. Lia was a very nice host , providing recommendations for area restaurants and adventures. I would stay here again and plan to do so in the near future!

Lia’s flat is really lovely and so much more than I expected.  The bed was so comfortable.  The location is perfect -quiet and a short walk to downtown or you can use the metro across the street.  Lia was also extremely responsive when I called with a couple of questions.  I would highly recommend you stay here!

The apartment is beautiful, and we had a lovely and relaxing stay. The location is fantastic, and Lia was a very kind and helpful host. She helped with where to park, where to eat, and everything in between, and was only a (Hidden by Airbnb) away. Thank you, Lia!

name: Stylish, central, bright, AC, Rambla Catalunya!
summary: Stylish two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment in the very central Eixample neighbourhood, ideal for exploring the city. Reception is open daily, 9am-10pm. Wi-Fi, satellite TV and all modern comforts. The apartment is full of natural light and has high ceilings, parquet flooring, air conditioning, & balconies looking out onto a lively street. The double glazing keeps it nice and quiet. There is a balcony with chairs and a little table. Large terrace in the building for all guests.
space: Two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment, ideal for a four-person group. One of the rooms has a queen-size bed and in the other there are two single beds. The living room is bright and spacious, with leather sofas and wooden flooring. This room includes a dining area, which is next to the well-equipped open kitchen.  This pretty apartment located on the lively Rambla de Catalunya in the Eixample neighbourhood, near many famous modernista (Catalan Art Nouveau) buildings and close to the charming and historically interesting area of Ciutat Vella. There is free Wi-Fi and TV with international channels. Fresh bed linen and towels are provided. The towels are changed every other day and the sheets every week. The reception desk is open daily from 9 am to 10 pm. Our friendly staff are on hand to make recommendations and help you with anything you might need. There is a large terrace in the building, next to the reception area, for all guests to use.
description: Stylish two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment in the very central Eixample neighbourhood, ideal for exploring the city. Reception is open daily, 9am-10pm. Wi-Fi, satellite TV and all modern comforts. The apartment is full of natural light and has high ceilings, parquet flooring, air conditioning, & balconies looking out onto a lively street. The double glazing keeps it nice and quiet. There is a balcony with chairs and a little table. Large terrace in the building for all guests. Two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment, ideal for a four-person group. One of the rooms has a queen-size bed and in the other there are two single beds. The living room is bright and spacious, with leather sofas and wooden flooring. This room includes a dining area, which is next to the well-equipped open kitchen.  This pretty apartment located on the lively Rambla de Catalunya in the Eixample neighbourhood, near many famous modernista (Catalan Art Nouveau) buildings and close to the charming and historically inter
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample is the Catalan Art Nouveau centre of the city. The area was built in the late 19th and early 20th century and the architecture of the neigbourhood is stunning, with some real gems to explore. A few steps from your apartment you’ll be able to feast your eyes on amazing buildings such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the lesser-known but stunning Casa Amatller. The area is one of the cultural and shopping heart of the city. You’ll find designer stores and high street brands next to all sorts of great restaurants and bars. A short walk (5 minutes) will get you to the bustling old city, where you’ll have another great selection of shops, markets, museums, art galleries, restaurants and bars to choose from. The area boasts great transport links and you’ll be able to get to all corners of the city in a few minutes by underground, overground, bus and taxi.
notes: City tax is not included (2,48€ per person per night) and is payable upon arrival. Touristic licence: HUTB-006014 S-11B
transit: Passeig de Gràcia: overground trains to Figueras, Girona, France, airport T2. Metro lines L2, L3 and L4. Plaça Catalunya: overground trains to Sitges and more. Buses: there are dozens of buses that stop nearby. You can easily get a bus from Plaça Catalunya to the beach, for example. Aerobus: the airport bus runs every few minutes throughout the day and leaves from Plaça Catalunya.
access: The reception desk is open daily from 9 pm to 10 pm. For arrivals later than 10 pm an automated check-in system is available. Check-in is from 2 pm. Check-out is by 11 AM. Lockers are available for earlier arrivals or later departures.
interaction: The reception desk is open daily from 9 am to 10 pm. Our friendly staff are on hand to make recommendations and help you with anything you might need. Outside these times a member of staff is always on call for any emergencies and you will have their direct line.

host.host_about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

reviews.comments: We would def come back! My girlfriends and I had a fantastic time, great flat, clean, perfect location!
Absolutely good value for money. Very comfortabel apartments at a central location. Could not find any better.
从马德里坐高铁到巴塞罗那,小火车一站就到了格兰西亚大街,出战对面就是巴特罗之家,3分钟到酒店,这里的BnB更像酒店式公寓,有前台,每天有打扫人员,非常干净,位置方便,周边还有网红餐厅有超市｡前台妹妹们都很热情有任何问题都愿意协助｡有电梯这点非常好｡我们住了四天,一切都比较满意,除了空调出风口有些轻微的声响｡窗户可以看到Tibidabo的圣心教堂｡总的来说是个吃喝玩乐都比较方便的地方｡

Beautiful modern apartment with everything you could need. Great view of a busy area but really good sound deadening windows block out the city noise extremely well when sleeping. Location was excellent for tourist activities.

We really had an awesome time in Barcelona and staying at this apartment was really nice, the balconies, nice updated spaces, the nice girls always ready to help, they were fantastic!!! Location was amazing. We will certainly stay here again.
Super appartement Et emplacement.Noys avons adoré
Very good! Met expectations!
Nice apartment in Barcelona, great location
Всем советую остановится в этих апартаментах. Очень удобное расположение , современный дизайн.

Absolutely beautiful place, very clean, modern and large. The reception staff were amazing going out of there way to show us places to go and see and giving us some local tips. You need any help or something is wrong with your room they are there to help 24/7. Definitely recommend this place to anyone travelling to Barcelona
Un peu d'Humidité dans l'appartement
Muy bien situado
Our vacation in Yaiza’s apartment was just lovely. Great location and great standings ! Will come back soon !

This apartment was in a great location, nearby many local attractions and restaurant. The apartment was very clean and the daily cleaning was nice to have as well. It was very spacious and each room had it's own small balcony.
Clean and comfortable, it's in a really great location. And everyone was very easy to communicate with.

When we arrived we were told that there was an issue with the apartment we rented so the receptionist took time to show us 3 different apartments and we picked one that was just as good as the original. The receptionists are all very nice and accommodating which is really important if there are any issues. One night we realized our WiFi wasn’t connecting to some devices for some reason and the receptionist came over to our place at 9:00 pm to help us figure it out. Excellent customer service!

The apartment itself is located in the perfect spot for easy access to everything. Lots of great restaurants and shopping and close to parking. Barcelona is an amazing city and although we were only there for 2 nights, we were able to see a ton of stuff.

Another perk is that the apartment had a washer and dryer, hot water (for more than just 1 shower), and an elevator. After traveling to a few other cities in Spain, these amenities became huge perks! Also, they stock the coffee machine and have water and milk in the fridge. There are also several coffee shops extremely close.

We absolutely loved our stay in Barcelona and will definitely be back!

What a perfect apartment, just in the middle of Barcelona! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! You can’t find a better place in Barcelona. Highly recommended! Will definitely book for the next Barcelona visit! Thank you. :)
Muy recomendable, muy limpio. Muy buen servicio
Nice option for who wants to stay very central and demands space. Definitely recommend!
great place and great location, thanks agaib
Excellent customer service. The place was exactly as advertised. Very clean and super spacious 2 bed apt with all the amenities. The location is superb! Highly recommend it.
The place is clean and beautiful. It located near restaurants, stores and entertaiment. the best location.
公寓的位置非常好,购物和去景点都非常方便,很多地方步行就可以到了,房间的设施也很齐全｡这间公寓还有专门的服务人员可以帮你解决问题｡唯一的问题是公寓的电梯非常小,以至于拿行李的时候很麻烦｡
Great location. We went all around Barcelona and this was a perfect central point. Beautiful apartment and very accommodating Reception and office area.
Todo perfecto
슬리퍼가 없는게 아쉬웠으나 좋았습니다

name: Central Terrace in the heart of Surry Hills
summary: Situated close to Crown St cafes and restaurants 7 minutes walk to Central Station and a short trip from the Sydney CBD , this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is suitable for families or a small group.
space: The very best thing about our home is that you can walk EVERYWHERE. You can walk to - Oxford Street in 10 minutes - Central Station in 10 minutes - The Art Gallery in 30 minutes - The middle of Sydney CBD in 25 minutes - The Harbour Bridge in 45 minutes - The Opera House (check out the amazing Opera Bar) in 35 minutes - Prince Alfred Park Pool in 10 minutes - The incredible Boy Charleton Harbour Pool in 30 minutes - Glebe in 30 minutes - Darlinghurst in 20 minutes
description: Situated close to Crown St cafes and restaurants 7 minutes walk to Central Station and a short trip from the Sydney CBD , this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is suitable for families or a small group. The very best thing about our home is that you can walk EVERYWHERE. You can walk to - Oxford Street in 10 minutes - Central Station in 10 minutes - The Art Gallery in 30 minutes - The middle of Sydney CBD in 25 minutes - The Harbour Bridge in 45 minutes - The Opera House (check out the amazing Opera Bar) in 35 minutes - Prince Alfred Park Pool in 10 minutes - The incredible Boy Charleton Harbour Pool in 30 minutes - Glebe in 30 minutes - Darlinghurst in 20 minutes This can be your fully furnished 3 bedroom home away from home.  The ground floor features include : Separate living and dining areas; full size modern kitchen with stone bench tops and a gas stove , washing machine and dryer.  Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms, the main with a queen size bed and built in wardrobes with ensuite; the fro
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is one of the most beautiful suburbs in Sydney.  You will love wandering the quiet streets lined with beautifully restored terraces, stopping only to shop, eat, drink or watch the eclectic personalities of Surry Hills parade past your front door.
transit: There is parking in our home for a tiny car only... HOWEVER, you won't need a car because you can walk to so many amazing places and if you need to go further than a walk you have multiple public transport options.  This is one of the most central locations in Sydney.
access: This can be your fully furnished 3 bedroom home away from home.  The ground floor features include : Separate living and dining areas; full size modern kitchen with stone bench tops and a gas stove , washing machine and dryer.  Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms, the main with a queen size bed and built in wardrobes with ensuite; the front bedroom with leafy street outlook has two single beds (set up for young children).  The house is in very good condition. Toys for kids. Back deck area with BBQ.

host.host_about: My name is Gabi, I live in Surry Hills

reviews.comments: Bronwyn met us at the time mutually agreed to show us around the house. she was really friendly. We were emailed a house manual which had details one would require. The neighbourhood was quiet and we enjoyed the proximity to city and the convenience to coffee shops and bars. Would definitely recommend this place to our friends.

name: One-Bedroom Brooklyn Brownstone
summary: This comfortable, light-filled and airy one-bedroom on a quiet, tree-lined block in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn is 2 blocks from the J & M trains at Gates Ave, a block or less from the b46 and b52 bus lines, has a deli on the corner less than half a block away, and is within walking distance from several coffee spots and shops.
description: This comfortable, light-filled and airy one-bedroom on a quiet, tree-lined block in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn is 2 blocks from the J & M trains at Gates Ave, a block or less from the b46 and b52 bus lines, has a deli on the corner less than half a block away, and is within walking distance from several coffee spots and shops. No outside visitors allowed. This apartment is my personal living space when I'm in New York, and I ask that guests respect the space.
notes: No outside visitors allowed. This apartment is my personal living space when I'm in New York, and I ask that guests respect the space.
house_rules: - In order to respect other neighbors in the building, please try to keep noise to a minimum after 10:30pm - No shoes on the carpet, please - No smoking - No outside guests

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Miriam's place was so awesome! I was in town for an event and her place was so convenient that I could walk to it! As a vegan I had no trouble finding suitable dining within walking distance and found it easy to get around and feel safe at night.  
The place is stylish, comfortable, and convenient. I'm a walker so I did not take the train but did see that there were a few stations within about a 10 min walk or less. 
Miriam was always available, helpful, and made my stay easy and enjoyable. I would definitely stay again and would recommend to anyone looking for a great stay in Brooklyn.

Although we didn't get meet her in person, Mariam was an amazing host. She was incredibly informative, detailed, and responded promptly. Her place was beautiful, cozy, and functional. All the basic necessities we needed were provided and made our stay a breeze. We'd definitely love to stay here again in the future.

Mariam was a great host and was easy to communicate with. Her apartment was much larger than expected and was easily accessible to the nearby subway and bus stations. I would definitely stay there again!

10/10 would stay again
Loved the decor and how close the place was to the J train
Thanks Mariam ❤️❤️❤️
Mariam’s place is the nicest Airbnb I’ve stayed at in New York and the price is very reasonable. Super stylish, has everything you need and a couple of minutes walk to the local metro station.
Dommage d’avoir rencontré autant de soucis sur notre séjour et il est certain que nous ne séjournerons plus chez Mariam.

Mariam is extremely kind and very quick in replying. I’ve moved in within less than 24h. 
The apartment is super nice. I’d say even better than on the photos. The entire place was clean and well equipped. Nothing was missing. I’ll definitely come back when I’m around again.

This place was delightful, completely and utterly delightful. If you have the chance to stay here, you should. The home itself was so comfortable and thoughtfully put together, and Miriam was so lovely. Could not recommend this place more, it's the nicest Airbnb I've stayed in.

We really enjoyed staying at Mariam's place. It was very nice and clean ( a bit cold though). The bed was the MOST COMFORTABLE. 
Also, location is great, near to the J subway station and bus stop. 
I would recommend this place to anyone. Thank You, Mariam!

Mariam was the best host we had a great time staying at her place. The apartment has a nice touch and style you feel just like home. If you are in town for a short time everything is nears I recommend this place totally. Thank you Mariam hope we see in Ecuador soon.
Good location, super easy check-in, quaint Brooklyn digs that felt cozy on a rainy afternoon we couldn’t be out and about in. A great experience  all thanks to Mariam.

Beautiful, bright apartment in an awesome neighborhood! Mariam's place was super clean, the neighborhood is really interesting, and it's super easy to get into Manhattan. Although I didn't get the chance to meet her personally, Mariam was a great host and gave thorough instructions on on how to get in and great recommendations on things to do in the area. Definitely recommend staying here if you get the chance!

Mariam’s place is  so cozy and thoughtful. Very spacious (surprisingly way bigger than we thought ); everything is there to feel comfort and have a great rest in the evening .Mattress is amazingly amazing  .. Mariam is sweet and caring . She was very kind and understanding letting us to check  out an hour later .. great experience overall

name: Beautiful Sydney Harbour Bridge & Opera House View
summary: Cool & comfortable newly renovated apartment overlooks cooper park with views across to the Sydney harbour bridge and opera house. There are two rooms available. First room comfortably fits 1 person however, can accommodate a couple. The second and largest room is the master bedroom and can accommodate a couple and small child if they had their own sleeping cot. Enjoy open plan living & spectacular views. Easy Access to Bondi beach- 5mins on a bus and easy access  to major train & bus
space: The view from my apartment is incredible. Local cafe life and proximity to the world famous Bondi beach are key highlights. we also, look across to the Harbour bridge and opera house and an urban jungle forest which houses small water streams, picnic areas and Sydney's best tennis courts in my opinion.

neighborhood_overview: Bellevue Hill is a prestigious neighbourhood housing some of the most expensive houses in Sydney. We are spoilt by our natural surrounds, with forests, bush walks , streams and the famous Bondi beaches . Great local restaurants and cafes . Local and international designer stores close by. With main Shopping centre 5mins drive , 15mins walk.
transit: Bus stop is directly out the front of our apartment. Major subway/ train line Bondi junction is a short walk. 10-15mins
interaction: I will always try to initially meet & greet my guest and show them around the apartment. I work fairly long working hours through the week so may see my guests only occasionally in the evenings. Also, could be away over the Christmas and NY period. However, available via phone.
house_rules: * Access: Since this is a share house with multiple occupants, we like to ensure everyone has their own space. We kindly ask guests to refrain from entering other people's rooms. We’ll ensure your space is likewise respected in return. * Access: Our view is cool. We know this, and would love nothing more than to hang out the window to gaze at it. But our neighbor that almost fell a few years ago may disagree. We know the council who issue fines definitely disagrees. Please help avoid problems for everybody and stay away from the window ledge.  * Age: Due to previous problems (and we’re sure this doesn’t relate to you…) we’ve needed to implement a minimum age requirement of 18+. Guests under the age of 18 are still entirely welcome – they will just need to be accompanied by parents or guardian. * Amenities: The easiest way to disrupt an enjoyable stay is a plumbing problem. To prevent this, we kindly ask you to please place things like sanity napkins in the sanitary bin we’ve provided i

host.host_location: Bellevue Hill, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
Hi I'm Nicole!!

Sydneysider born and bred. I love my City and like to take advantage of the great outdoors whenever possible. You'll find me most days out and about hiking, down the beach, taking in a new exhibition or dancing.   I cant live without music, good coffee, dancing and sunshine. I work in the events industry. Hosting is the best part of my job . I really love meeting new people and showing them my city!

reviews.comments: Nice, clean place. Nicole is great at communicating.  Central location

Nicole's place is a very nice apartment, with incredible view on harbour bridge and Opera House. 
It is modern and comfortable, easy to access Bondi Beach and downtown, bus stop just outside the house.
Nicole is a very nice and friendly host.
We spent a wonderful time there!

name: Charming, Quiet Lenox Hill Studio By Transportatio
summary: This charming cozy studio in the heart of Lenox Hill (East 70 & 3rd Ave) has a fireplace, hardwood floors, new kitchen (dishwasher/stove/large fridge) 2 large windows, bathroom with tub & more.  It's a 1/2 block from the new 2nd Ave subway for quick access (15 mins) to Midtown West, Times Square, Union Square, more.  It's 3 blocks from the 4/5/6 train. Very safe, quiet neighborhood: Pharmacy 1/2 block away, post office across street, restaurants, etc 2 flight walk up, window unit AC.
space: Place has a sense of character as it is within a very charming townhouse, with real brick walls and art deco, colorful decor and renovated kitchen and bathroom. People have asked - of course it is a private bathroom! (with tub)

Very walkable: restaurants (Italian, Japanese, Middle Eastern, deli, Indian, American, etc), shopping boutiques, grocery stores, outdoor cafes, gyms, Citibike, etc. 24 hour pharmacy 2 blocks away. 3+ other pharmacies in 3 block radius.  Apartment is walking distance to top hospitals including Memorial Sloan Kettering, Lenox Hill and Cornell Medical Center.  Subway a 1/2 block away will take you to Times Square in minutes! Few blocks from Central Park and East River. FDR drive easily accessible
notes: Well-behaved pets are welcome but will incur a slight additional fee.

Apartment is 1/2 block to bus, 1/2 block to new 2nd Ave subway (Q train) which provides access across town — in only a few minutes be in the West side. 3 short blocks to the 68th st subway (6 train).  Very walkable neighborhood.  There is a parking garage right next to the building.
access: The whole studio!
interaction: Very little if at all
house_rules: No smoking or drugs permitted.  Please use designated areas for storage and leave apt in the condition it was found.  Up to one service dog is permitted.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Work in tech.  Love to travel, plan events, workout and experience new things.  I play bridge and love the shows Billionaire, Silicon Valley & Odd Mom Out. I love trying exotic foods and trying new restaurants. Very familiar with New York City, happy to give recommendations for your visit.

reviews.comments: Emily's condo in UES was the perfect place from which to explore the city. There location is very convenient, with grocery stores and restaurants very close by. The subway is only a few blocks away, opening up the rest of the city. Overall, it was a great experience.
Thank you! Very attentive host, accommodated our every whim. Will stay again!
Amazing apartment, it’s closed to everything, definitely looking to comeback if it’s available! Emily was the best host ever!

Emily's place was great! Very well located on the Upper East Side, very close to 2 subway stations. Only a 2 floor walk-up, well heated (not too much, which is important!). Clean with all that I needed.

Emily herself was a great host. Even though we didn't get to meet, she provided all the important information before and during my stay. Check-in and check-out were flexible and easy which helped a lot too!

Thanks for a very great stay! I'll stay there again if her place is available the next time I'm in the city.
Great safe area.

name: Excellent studio in Barra da Tijuca
summary: Apartment / studio with living room, kitchen, bathroom, service area and balcony. The hostess will keep her room closed. The ambience is air conditioned, 26-inch TV and pay-TV, chest of drawers with 6 drawers, dining table with 4 chairs and high-speed wi-fi. Kitchen and laundry area with: refrigerator, stove, microwave, electric oven, blender, iron, washing machine and tank. Nearby places: beach (station 5), malls, cinemas, bars and restaurants.

Kitchen and laundry area with: refrigerator, stove, microwave, electric oven, blender, iron, washing machine and tank. Nearby places: beach (station 5), malls, cinemas, bars and restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: A Barra da Tijuca oferece opções para todos os públicos - e em qualquer hora do dia! Para curtir sombra e água fresca na Praia da Reserva ou uma tarde de compras no Barra Shopping. Distância dos aeroportos: Aeroporto Internacional do Galeão: 35 Km  Aeroporto Santos Dumont: 27 Km
notes: Feriados, Natal, Réveillon, Carnaval e eventos especiais valor a combinar.
transit: . Estação de metrô: linha 4 – Estação Jardim Oceânico. Ônibus (BRT), próximo ao condomínio (cerca de 500m) faz o percurso até o metrô em aproximadamente 3 min.  . Estações do BRT mais próximas: Bosque Marapendi e Paulo Malta Rezende. - Linhas de ônibus abundantes, você poderá se deslocar para qualquer local  de ônibus com muita facilidade.  . De ônibus para o Barra Shopping, Village Mall e Via Parque. . À pé para supermercado Extra, padarias, Shopping Downtown, Cittá América, Shopping Conviva.
access: A área comum do condomínio pode ser utilizada mesmo durante uma estada curta. (piscina, sauna, academia).
interaction: Estarei sempre a disposição para ajudá-lo. Qualquer necessidade ou dúvida entre em contato comigo.
house_rules: - Normas da casa:   - Solicitamos o respeito às normas do condomínio.  - Respeite o horário de silêncio após as 22 horas.  - Menores de 21 anos de idade deverão estar acompanhados de ambos os pais ou do responsável legalmente constituído. - Os hóspedes deverão fazer um cadastro no condomínio com as cópias dos documentos. Quando você fizer a reserva precisarei do nome completo e RG de cada hóspede para controle de entrada do condomínio. - Avisar horário do check- in e check-out.  - A cozinha pode ser usada para armazenar alimentos e preparo de refeições rápidas, tudo deve ser limpo após o uso. - Não será permitido receber visitas, salvo as acordadas com antecedência.   - Apagar sempre as luzes dos locais que não estiverem em uso.  - É terminantemente proibido se ausentar do apartamento e deixar o ar condicionado ligado.  - Respeitar o espaço e os pertences do anfitrião. Esperamos que os hóspedes cuidem do local como se sua casa fosse, sempre com educação e responsabilidade.   - Pessoas

host.host_location: Rio De Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Carla é uma pessoa incrível, animada e atenciosa.
Nos recepcionou extremamente bem e foi muito cortês durante toda o período.
Em relação ao local, o apartamento e condomínio são ótimos, bem equipados e bem localizados (Próximo a praia, restaurantes, bares, shoppings, etc.). Para ajudar no dia a dia, a Carla disponibiliza uma lista com várias dicas e locais da cidade e região para que seja possível aproveitar ao máximo.
Em um retorno ao Rio, será a primeira opção para me hospedar.

name: Lapa for your lifestyle.
summary: Charming apartment in Lapa, ideal for couples, decorated with style to make you feel good. With a beautiful view, comfortable, cozy and of course, secure building, close to all the best of Rio. Great location.
space: 1 room Apartment, kitchen and bathroom. Accommodates two people. Room with double/queen bed box, 32 ' LED TV with HD cable TV, free 10 Mb wi-fi, fan, air conditioning, colonial style wardrobe from minas, Bergere armchair. Hammock to lie back and relax. Kitchen equipped with fridge, cupboards, cooktop stove with 2 hobs, microwave, grill and kitchen utensils. Bathroom with electric shower and box. Secure building, with 24-hour concierge. Beautiful views of Lapa.
description: Charming apartment in Lapa, ideal for couples, decorated with style to make you feel good. With a beautiful view, comfortable, cozy and of course, secure building, close to all the best of Rio. Great location. 1 room Apartment, kitchen and bathroom. Accommodates two people. Room with double/queen bed box, 32 ' LED TV with HD cable TV, free 10 Mb wi-fi, fan, air conditioning, colonial style wardrobe from minas, Bergere armchair. Hammock to lie back and relax. Kitchen equipped with fridge, cupboards, cooktop stove with 2 hobs, microwave, grill and kitchen utensils. Bathroom with electric shower and box. Secure building, with 24-hour concierge. Beautiful views of Lapa. Excellent location, next to the metro stations stations Cinelândia, Carioca and also the bus to several neighborhoods like Flamengo, Copacana, Ipanema, Leblon, Jardim Botânico, etc. and to the main tourist attractions of the North , such as Corcovado, Sugarloaf, Maracanã, Santa Teresa, etc. Lapa is considered the home of bo
access: Excellent location, next to the metro stations stations Cinelândia, Carioca and also the bus to several neighborhoods like Flamengo, Copacana, Ipanema, Leblon, Jardim Botânico, etc. and to the main tourist attractions of the North , such as Corcovado, Sugarloaf, Maracanã, Santa Teresa, etc. Lapa is considered the home of bohemian Rio, with a rich architectural ensemble, home to the best bars, restaurants and nightclubs in the city, offering music for all tastes, as well as antique shops and traditional fair of Lavradio street. The neighborhood offers supermarkets, bakeries, coffee shops and banks.  Especially the Church of St. Anthony of the poor, which has been restored and has a nice shape, in addition to the houses of the street des Invalides.
interaction: It would be my pleasure to welcome you and I am available at any time, in order to provide assistance with your stay in Rio.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Resido no Rio há mais de 30 anos. Casado e pai de dois filhos jovens. Adoro viajar e conhecer novos lugares. Tenho prazer em receber e hospedar pessoas e compartilhar com elas as belezas da cidade maravilhosa. Agora, terei prazer também em recebê-los na encantadora cidade de Lisboa, Portugal.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: My partner Michele and I were thoroughly delighted with Alexandre's hospitality, generosity and love for his adopted city, Rio de Janeiro. We learned via the furnishings that he is originally a Mineiro. He helped us in simple and innumerable ways to make our stay easy, fruitful and bring Michele a newbie to Rio a sense of the soul of the city. The apartment was IDEAL for us. The location is central for walking, bus routes, a short distance from the Metro, or an ez spot to find cabs. It is nicely appointed. Has a lovely view. Comfy bed. A simple kitchen, which we used...and above all is in the center of Lapa, but high enough not to keep you 'in the bar' after you get home. Quiet, peaceful and safe. I look forward to my next trip in October to be able to return to Alexandre's lovely nest. Truly a great find in the middle of the city. Foi super gostoso. Quero/queremos voltar e voltar e...Ele é charmoso, humilde, e cheio com generosidade. Muito obrigado por todo Alexandre!

Very clean and nice apartment right on Lapa, close to the subway and many downtown attractions. Alexandre and his son were very nice and attentive. I highly recommend you to stay here!

Disfrute mucho mi estadía en el departamento de Alexandre, ya que el departamento es muy acogedor y tiene una ubicación muy céntrica. Alexandre y su hijo son personas muy agradables y educadas. Les recomiendo mucho quedarse aquí.
Great host, great apartment, great location! Highly recommended! Thanks for the great stay Alexandre!
O ponto é ótimo, o apartamento é muito bom e os anfitriões são simpáticos e prestativos. Uma ótima opção para quem quer desfrutar das atrações da Lapa. Recomendo a todos.

Como minha primeira experiência no airbnb só posso dizer uma coisa: Impecável!
O Alexandre é um amor de pessoa, super atencioso e prestativo.
O apartamento é muito confortável, dá vontade de passar mais tempo nele.
A localização é excelente. Você pode se locomover para qualquer lugar do Rio de Janeiro com muita facilidade.
Estamos encantados com o apartamento. Pretendemos retornar o mais breve possível.

If we had a single word to describe my experience with Alexandre and his son, Rafael, I would say: EXTRAORDINARY! We think we met one of the friendliest and most helpful persons in my life. Alexandre told us all the do's and dont's in Rio, then constantly wrote us every day to ask about our trip and to give us tips and weather info (it can be tricky in Rio in November). He even wrote me a couple of days after we left to tell me the the translation of the word 'goat' in Portuguese, as we read that a nearby restaurant had a goat dish, but didn't know how to ask for it.
