Now about the (Website hidden by Airbnb) a pretty roomy studio, featuring even a hammock (no balcony though, but no need actually). It's freshly redone with all that one needs for a short stay. The Lapa area is highly attractive by night, featuring many bars, live music pubs and street bistros (but tourists should be a little cautious). The apartment is withing walking distance to most of them and Arco da Lapa and the Cathedral. The metro is also pretty close, I'd say 15 mins walking. All in all, a great experience for us and thumbs up for the host.
Gostamos muito do espaço e da hospitalidade do anfitrião! Ótima localização e apartamento é muito bem cuidado. Recomendamos!

My husband discovered Airbnb by chance when we were planning our first trip to South America and staying at Alexandre's was our first experience with the site. It took a long time to make a decision with all the choices available, and I am thrilled that I made the one I did. Alexandre not only met our expectations, but he surpassed them. He went above and beyond to be sure that we had the best stay possible. His apartment was lovely and the neighborhood was great, but it was really his kindness and generosity that made it such a wonderful experience. 
The apartment is exactly as pictured and we felt perfectly safe walking around the neighborhood at all times of day and night. There are many very good restaurants nearby, but it was also convenient to use transportation to visit other parts of the city. 
Thank you so much for the wonderful experience!

Minha primeira experiência no airbnb foi fantástica. Alexandre é um anfitrião maravilhoso, muito atencioso e preocupado em atender bem e nos deixar a vontade. O apto é exatamente como  nas fotos acrescentando ainda que é limpo e cheiro. A localização na Lapa é perfeita, fica a poucos metros da movimentação, porém é super silencioso. Sem duvidas será minha primeira opção ao voltar pro Rio de Janeiro.

Alexandre's apartment is very comfortable and beautifully decorated.  It is in a very central location, within easy access to public transportation and within walking distance from Lapa, where you will find an exciting night life, full of bars, restaurants and music.

Alexandre is very easy to communicate with and was a very attentive host!  Definitely recommend his place.

Alexandre is an incredibly amazing host. He helps you wherever and whenever he can. He is generous, warm-hearted, welcoming and he knows everything about Rio. In a few words: he is an outstanding person! Our stay in his little but pretty, clean and quiet apartment was perfect. The location is good, as you have the nightlife in front of you and the bus-stop, where you can find the buses to explore more of Rio's beauty, is very close to the apartment. As you will live on the 10th floor you won't hear a lot of noise. You can find grocery stores and lots of bars very close. Don't hesitate to book one of Alexandre's accommodations (he has more than one apartment in the same building). You won't regret it. We even extended our stay for almost a week. Mais uma vez: obrigada por tudo Alexandre e até um dia destes!!

Alexandre é um anfitrião educado e amável. Deixou-me super a vontade, dando dicas de passeios legais na cidade maravilhosa. Além disso, o apartamento é bem localizado, fofo, aconchegante! Adorei! Voltarei mais vezes! Super recomendo!

Alexandre, nós adoramos a estadia. Obrigada por tudo, pelas gentilezas, pela preocupação em nos hospedar bem. Apartamento muito bom, como mostra as fotos. Confortável, arejado, limpo e bem decorado. Tem tudo que precisamos.
Prazer em conhecê-lo, com certeza indicamos e se voltarmos será um prazer hospedar-se novamente.
Rio de Janeiro é maravilhoso.
Abraços 
Fernanda e Ricardo.

Meu marido e eu fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Alexandre, que nos deu orientação turística, informações precisas e importantes sobre transporte, segurança e outros detalhes. O bairro pode parecer inseguro no início, principalmente quando o comércio fecha, mas não é, nos sentimos bem tranquilos ao caminhar pela vizinhança, mas é claro que em qualquer lugar estamos sujeitos a uma situação imprevista, então é bom ficar alerta. Se tivermos que voltar ao Rio com certeza nos lembraremos desta boa experiência. Obrigada Alexandre!

A minha hospedagem no apartamento do Alexandre foi ótimo!! O apartamento é exatamente como mostrado nas fotos, além de ficar de ficar dentro do bairro com uma noite boa, que é a Lapa.
O Alexandre é um excelente anfitrião e sempre esteve disponível para tirar minhas dúvidas, além de dar ótimas dicas (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficaria hospedada no apartamento novamente.

We stayed at Alex's apartment for a month during the World Cup. It was an excellent experience and we enjoyed our accommodation. Alex was friendly and helpful and the apartment was exactly as described. alex was very kind and picked us up and back from the airport and even had some food to welcome us with on our arrival. I would definitely recommend this accommodation to all!

Alexandre was a really helpfull person and very friendly. He give us all the informations we needed for Rio. Additionally some maps, etc. Only the elevator is a bit old :)
The apartment is simple but nice and really enough for 2 persons. The bath is also good and clean.
The area around the house (Lapa) is really really perfect!!! On weekend some good parties around, not directly in front of the house. And it's easy to catch a bus to the Copacabana or Ipanema.
Over all: Perfect place! Thanks...

The apartment was really comfortable, clean and perfect for a short stay in Rio. The location is very good. The area is safe and has a lot of options day and night. Moreover is well connected with Rio´s main spot. Some of them are at walk distance like Lapa's Arch, the Cathedral or Cinelandia area. 

The communication with Alexandre and his wife was fluid and we did not have any trouble at all. We would have liked to say goodbye and give our gratitude personally but we had to leave really early in the morning the last day.

I would for sure recommend this place and, if I come back, I´ll probably ask again for its availability.
Foi bem legal, tudo funcionando. Lugar otimo. Recomendo.
O Alexandre foi um excelente anfitrião! O apartamento é ótimo e com excelente localização. Voltaremos, com certeza.
Good location.  Nice and clean apartment. Nice host. Couldn't ask for more.

Ficamos hospedados uma semana no apartamento, achamos muito bom! localização boa, em ótimo estado fidedigno as fotos divulgadas. Infelizmente não tivemos o prazer de conhecer o anfitrião, mas sempre recebemos suas mensagens quando solicitado. Indicamos quem quer facilidade e praticidade em se hospedar no Rio.

We had an amazing time at Alexandre's. The location is near everything you could need, including easy access to busses going all over the city. Alexandre and his son even dropped us off at the airport at the end of our stay! Thank you Alexandre!!

Alexandre was very friendly and helpful. He was waiting for me at the apartment when I arrived and gave me some helpful tips about the area. The apartment was nice,  clean, and in a great location with lots of restaurants and bars nearby as well as easy access to public transportation.

Me hospedei pelo segunda vez com o Alexandre e mais uma vez tudo estava impecável. 
O apartamento arrumado, super organizado e prático. 
Além do anfitrião ter dado várias dicas e sempre está a disposição.
Sem dúvidas sempre será minha primeira opção quando for ao Rio de Janeiro.

We stay for 6 days at the appartement. Alexandre pick us up at the airport. The appartement was very clean and had every thing you need.  A good location and nearby the busstation to travel in Rio. Alexandre give us good information about Rio. We like it. We recomend every one.

Alexandra ha sido un excelente anfitrión llegamos a las 2 am y el nos estaba esperando en el apartamento. Se ocupó de nosotros siempre. El apartamento es muy lindo con una cama espectacular. Gracias por todo. Volveremos

Pobyt w mieszkaniu Alexander to był dla nas wspaniały czas. Alexander zaopiekowal się nami jak przyjaciółmi. Odebrał nas z lotniska. Zrobił zakupy na sniadanie. Razem ze swoją żoną zabrał nas na wspaniałą wycieczkę do Floresta Tijuca. Zabrał nas do nastpnego mieszkania w którym zamieszkaliśmy. Mieszkanie jest czyste, komfortowe, dobrze wyposażone. Czuliśmy się tutaj wyjątkowo dobrze. Polecamy to miejsce. Nikt nie będzie zawiedziony. Alexander jeszcze raz bardzo mocno dziękujemy za wszystko.

I recommend this place as cheap, convenient, and trouble free :)

Wifi was good for those quieter days /nights.

Easy location, taxis to most areas are cheap and easy as is the bus system (just use (Hidden by Airbnb) maps)

I was collected from the airport and clean sheets provided weekly (stayed in the apartment 4 weeks). 

Lapa is a busy place, you'll not struggle to enjoy yourselves. The apartment I stayed on was on the 10th floor and far enough away from the parties so they don't keep you awake when you want to sleep.

Enjoy.

We spent the most wonderful two weeks in Alexandre's apartment. It was perfect, clean, well-equipped in the heart of the district Lapa which we found the most authentic and charming district of Rio. There are beautiful old houses, nice bars and restaurants filled with great music and local people. Close to the apartment you can find really everything, supermarkets, bus stations, metro stations, restaurants, bars, e.g. there is the famous Casa de Cachaça, a tiny little bar where you can taste hundreds of the most delicious cachaça. We always took the metro to go to the beach and it was very easy and fast. The flat is close to the center, to the museums, it was really easy to reach everything. 
Alexandre was the most wonderful host. He was extremely helpful and kind, we could count on him all during our stay. He picked up us at the airport, gave a lot of advises. He showed us beautiful places not only in Rio but also in Recreio where we saw the amazing garden of Roberto Burle Marx. Thanks to him and his lovely family we could get a much deeper insight into the Brazilian culture and the city of Rio. We cannot be thankful enough to him. He became our friend and we very hope to see him again.

O apartamento do Alexandre é tudo o que o promete e muito mais. A localização é perfeita, num edifício com elevador e porteiro vinte e quatro horas. Do lado do edifício tem uma restaurante que serve um joelho de porco espetacular onde se pode tanto almoçar como jantar.

O apartamento está perto, também,  de supermercados e do comércio.  Caminhando cinco minutos se pode pegar os ônibus para se deslocar para qualquer ponto do Rio de Janeiro.

Para quem gosta de agito e diversão,  é só caminhar cinco minutos que se chega no coração da Lapa onde funcionam muitos bares, restaurantes e casas nocturnas. O bairro é seguro, nunca senti perigo caminhando nas ruas, nem de dia nem de noite. 

O apartamento é muito limpo. A cozinha está muito bem equipada com louça,  tallehres, panelas, fogão,  forno microondas e geladeira. O banheiro tem um chuveiro que funciona bem e é limpo.  Quando chegamos tinha toalhas de rosto e para o corpo esperando no banheiro. O quarto é bem aconchegante, com uma janela com uma vista muito bonita. A cama é confortável e com lençóis limpos. 

O Alexandre e sua esposa Vania foram muito atenciosos, casal nota 10.

O apartamento é super aconchegante e fiel as fotos. Já conhecia o bairro da Lapa e gosto dele por ser bem movimentado e de fácil acesso ao aeroporto Santos Dumont e com uma vida noturna agitada. Tivemos um atraso com o nosso voo que nos impediu de chegar ao apartamento no horário combinado, mas o Alexandre e sua esposa Vânia foram super compreensivos e nos aguardaram para nos receber. Recomendo a estadia!

O apto estava impecável, limpeza, roupas de cama, toalhas...
Além de super aconchegante.
Excelente custo/benefício. Localização muito boa na Lapa, em uma rua mais tranquila, andar alto com vista legal do centro da cidade.
O Alexandre cumpriu os horários de entrega das chaves.
Não tenho nada a reclamar, recomendo o apto do Alexandre e em uma próxima oportunidade eu optarei por me hospedar nele novamente.

I strongly recommend this accommodation because of its location, comfort, and dependability of the host, Alexandre.  My traveling partner and I enjoyed the convenience of having easy access to many historical sites (in Lapa, Centro, Santa Teresa), restaurants, and nightlife along with countless choices of public transport.  The apartment is well equipped  and maintained.  Moreover, the apartment building and the street of the studio's location is quiet despite its close proximity to Lapa's nightclubs.  Alexandre is a wonderful person; he is welcoming, personable, and reliable.  Should I return to Rio, I will definitely rebook this apartment.

A estadia foi ótima. Alexandre nos recebeu super bem, deu dicas, e estava a disposição para qualquer dúvida, além de que o apto é exatamente o que está nas fotos e nas descrições. 
Ficar na Lapa é show. Tudo perto, centro da cidade, supermercado, barzinhos, farmácia, padaria, ônibus na porta, metrô alguns minutos caminhando.
Adorei, e indico demais.

We had a lovely stay at Alexandre's apartment. He met us at the apartment when we came to Rio, even though we were delyed. Gave us good information about the city and was very helpful and available. Alexandre also gave us extraordinary service upon departure and we are very thankful. We will recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in Lapa, Rio de Janeiro.

O Alexandre é um ótimo anfitrião. Foi super prestativo em entregar as chaves, já que eu havia feito a reserva em cima da hora. Apartamento bem confortável, limpo e em uma ótima localização. Recomendo, podem ir sem medo ;)

Alexandre was the best host we ever had. He is regardful and solicitous. When we got at the apartment,
he already was there waiting for us. The apartment is clean and cosy. There are so many bars and clubs in Lapa. The nightlife in this neighborhood is amazing. If you stay here, you need go to Rio Scenarium. It's the best Samba club in Rio and very near to the apartment (8-10 min by walk). We'll definitely come back to Alexandre's apartment again.

Queria agradecer pela recepção do Alexandre, foi um anfitrião atencioso e preocupado com a nossa ótima estadia, o imóvel é exatamente o que está nas fotos e de excelente aconchego, fica perto dos bares da lapa, bom acesso para os metrôs, foi uma experiência incrível, muito obrigado Alexandre por ter superados as nossas expectativas. Até uma próxima! Grande abraço!!

Alexandre is a great host. The apartment is extremely clean, location is excellent - close to bus stops, and two subway stations, right at Lapa's heart. 
The apartment is very secure and the street is quite busy at night, so I didn't feel unsafe at all. 
Highly recommend Alexandre and his unit.

Je remercie Alexandre pour sa réception. Il est aimable et donne des conseils intéressants pour pouvoir visiter les plus beaux sites et monuments de la ville. L'appartement est simple et propre, fidèle aux photos visibles sur le site. Il est sûr et les gardiens comme certains voisins de l'immeuble se montrent attentionnés lorsqu'il s'agit de leur demander de l'aide ou des conseils de visite.
Le logement bénéficie d'une bonne localisation, à proximité des bars de Lapa, quartier assez actif, mais se situe également à proximité du métro. Tout s'est ainsi très bien passé pour ce séjour et j'espère qu'il en sera de même une prochaine fois !

Adoramos nossos dias no Rio! O apartamento é bem localizado, pertinho de tudo. Bem no centro da boemia! Muito bem equipado! Com tudo funcionando perfeitamente! O ap é exatamente como no anúncio! Alexandre foi bem atencioso e prestativo! Nosso contato foi fácil e funcionou super bem! Obrigada Alexandre!

Alexandre is an outstanding tenant, who assured our most pleasant stay in Rio by allowing us to use his appartment which is nice, clean and airconditioned. It is perfect for couples and locaties in the lovely neighbourhood Lapa which felt very safe, as there is 24/7 security. Alexandre readily provided Rio guidebooks and maps along with a guided tour drive to Ipanema and shuttle service to the airport. He was also available for any questions via w-app. Goes greatly recommended, we would be most glad to come back and stay at Alexandre's appartment again next time. Best, Gerben
Everything was as description, and the hospitality has been great. Alexandre was very helpful and the position of his flat is really good!

The apartment is perfectly located in Lapa, just off Mem da Sa in a very safe area. Lots of bars and music, and easy access to supermarkets etc. in a very friendly neighbourhood. It is self-contained and has a great view of the neighbourhood; being on the 10th floor means it is above the noise of Lapa. The doorman is very friendly too. Alexandre and his wife made us most welcome and were wonderful hosts, going far beyond the call of duty. Just book it - you will really like it. We found it perfect.

Foi Ótimoooo!!! Alexandre é super hospitaleiro. O apartamento é perfeito. Limpissimo, aconchegante... Super Bem localizado. Perto de varios restaurantes, supermercado e da vida noturna da lapa. Pertinho de santa tereza tb. Alugamos um carro e tem um estacionamento bem pertinho. Super indico. Ficaremos outras vezes. Obrigada Alexandre.
L'appartement était exactement comme sur les photos. Tout était parfait. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir!

Apartamento exatamente igual as fotos, muito organizado, seguro,  porteiros sempre a disposição, muito educados e simpáticos!! Perto de tudo e com muita facilidade para pegar ônibus, metro ou táxi! Os pontos comerciais que me lembro de imediato são, americanas express, subway, farmácias, restaurantes, lanchonetes, comércio em geral, emfim, a gente não fica na mão de jeito nenhum! Passei dias incríveis no Rio e recomendo a todos tanto o apartamento quanto a cidade que é super urbana e encantadora!!!

What I have to say about my experience in the apartment of Alexandre is: there is exactly like the photos. Very good place. Clean, safe and beyond that, Alexandre is a great gentleman, always reliable to help you. Thanks Alexandre.

Nice place. The area is a bit seedy at night. Lapa is a party area many great restaurants and bars. Its an old building so a couple of things went wrong. Alexandre tried to fix one thing but it was a holiday so he couldn't buy parts for the shower. The other was out of his hands. Again it is an older building. All in all most days it was fine.
Todo confortable y bien ubicado

Excelente!!! Recomendo, totalmente. Voltarei. Localização perfeita e segura, no meio da badalação. Alexandre e sua esposa são gentis e atenciosos. Não poderia ter ficado em local melhor, transporte público e taxi muito fácil, vários bares, padarias, café.

Great host.  Went above and beyond. 
Very clean apartment. Met and exceeded expectations.

I stayed in the apartment during the Olympics time in Rio for one month. This was one of the best home stay I have had. The location is good and very safe with security available round the clock. Lapa is a party hub and is the exact location for party lovers.The cinelandia and carioca metro subway stations are at walking distance. The room is same as it is shown on the photos.Alexandre is a lovely host and to start with he picked me up from the airport even though my flight was very delayed and arrived close to midnight. He even gave me local currency for immediate use till I could change my US dollars. He was always available on a mobile call and attended all the issues like shopping requirements. He also gave a lovely trip to the tijuca national forest in his car. He is like a loyal local guardian and extremely reliable. Though the location is close to all the party zone still you do not get any disturbance while in the apartment.  It is on the 10th floor. I enjoyed my stay and will definitely book the place again when I come back to Rio.

No coração da Lapa, perto dos bares e casas noturnas, mas sem barulheira! O ap está bem equipado, arejado e iluminado. Destaque para a cama super confortável. O Alexandre nos recebeu pessoalmente e foi super atencioso.
Good location, great host!
Muy recomendable. Excelente ubicación.
Ótimo apto! Fui bem recebida e tive uma estadia tranquila. Gostei e recomendo!
Ótima hospedagem, corresponde com as fotos. O Alexandre desde o início foi muito prestativo e receptivo, sempre dando todo suporte. Recomendo
Otimo o apartamento, perto de bares, lugares para comer, muito bem localizado. O apartamento é super confortável. E o bairro me pareceu tranquilo para ficar.

Recomento o apartamento, bem localizado, perto de tudo, super limpo, confortável, atendimento do Alexandre impecável, super atencioso e rápido. 
Foi ótima nossa estadia. Certamente retornaremos.
Anfitrião atencioso, lugar bem localizado, limpo e aconchegante. Superou as expectivas!!

Great Apartment in a very central location and great amenities. Definitely book if you're looking for something close to the nightlife in Lapa. Alexandre was the best host you could imagine, super accommodating and helpful! I'll definitely check out his other listings as well!

Alexandre é uma pessoa atenciosa e preocupado em ambientar o visitante na vizinhança. Prédio bem posicionado, com muita segurança e familiar. O apto é aconchegante com uma cozinha ampla e com condições de fazermos excelentes refeições. Andar alto e vista favorável. Obrigado Alexandre...

Tudo conforme anunciado. O Alexandre deu todo suporte no check-in e ficou disponível para ajudar por msg ou telefone caso fosse necessário. O apartamento é exatamente como anunciado. Obrigado Alexandre, voltaremos com certeza.

Excelente lugar, departamento muy acogedor, buena ubicación. Trasporte publico bastante fluido, con varios bares por alrededor, supermercados, zonas turísticas etc... espero volver al mismo lugar el día de mañana.
I stayed three nights at Alexandre's place in Lapa. Everything was great, it's a nice and cozy apartment, very centrally located in Lapa, recommended!
Excelente lugar perto de tudo.
O espaço é muito bom e limpo e o Alexandre é super atencioso. Eu recomendo. Não tive problema algum.

El alojamiento es muy bello. Cocina completa, refrigerador, cafetera, sky, wifi, toallas y sábanas, aire acondicionado, muebles muy bellos, muy privado, cerca de todo.  Alexander es un excelente anfitrión, nos dio toda la información turística y nos ayudó con todo lo que necesitamos, incluso se ofreció a llevarnos a un restaurante donde teníamos reservación. Sin duda nos volveríamos a hospedar aquí en nuestra siguiente visita a Río.
Would definitely recommend a stay in Alexandre's apartment! Great location and the apartment is very nice. Alexandre is a great host.

En primer lugar tuvimos un excelente recibimiento, Alexandre se tomó el tiempo de explicarnos en detalle cómo aprovechar el tiempo. Tenía mapas y guías que fueron muy útiles. La ubicación es centrica en Lapa pudiendo hacer a pie todo lo que deseabamos en esa zona, y cerca de metro, autobus, etc que facilitó poder ir con practicidad al maracaná, cristo, pan de azúcar, rodoviaria. El apartamento es tal cual se ve en fotos. No estuvimos mucho allí, pero fue ideal para cocinar. Los vecinos también han sido muy amables. Si bien puede parecer insegura la zona en ningun momento tuvimos ningun tipo problema.

Ambiente super confortável, bem localizado e aconchegante.
Eu e minha família adoramos muito e com certeza voltaremos.
Super recomendo.
A pessoa do Sr. Alexandre, super prestativo em todos os aspectos e bastante atencioso.
Obrigado Sr. Alexandre.
Ótima escolha. Anfitrião atencioso. Me senti muito confortável.

Even though my mother and I got to the apartment quite a lot earlier than agreed, Alexandre welcomed us warmly, told us about the Lapa area of the city and explained how we could get to specific locations, areas to avoid, etc.--an incredibly helpful local perspective on the city. The flat was very clean and comfortable for two and it was very close to the places we needed to be. A really great stay with a very friendly host!

Ótima estadia!!! Anfitrião super solicito e atencioso. As fotos dão noção do lugar e das comodidades do apartamento.
Recomendo.

Ótimo apartamento, muito aconchegante e perto de tudo, arcos da Lapa, escadaria selaron. Vários pontos de ônibus proximos, duas estações de metrô bem perto também. O Alexandre nos recepcionou muito bem, mostrando um mapa com tudo que poderíamos fazer no Rio. Apesar de ser no centro, o AP é bem silencioso a noite.
Muito bom mesmo, com certeza voltaremos com mais tempo.

O apê do Alexandre é maravilhoso! Super limpo, confortável, a cama é incrível... A localização é maravilhosa, não teria como ser melhor! Pertíssimo dos Arcos, na esquina com a rua mais movimentada da Lapa. Não tivemos nenhuma insegurança.

O Alexandre foi ótimo, e apesar de não o ver, ele se prontificou a ajudar-nos com qualquer coisa. 

Excelente!!!! Não poderia ser melhor! Recomendamos muito.

O espaço do Alexandre é excepcional! Fiquei aí com minha namorada por duas noites, é perto de tudo, no coração da Lapa. Sem contar que o apartamento é muito aconchegante e confortável, perto de tudo.
Indico para todos que estiverem procurando um lugar seguro. confortável e com um preço bacana!

O Alexandre nos recebeu muito bem, tirou nossas dúvidas, e esteve disponível quando precisamos. O apartamento é uma delícia! Muito bem decorado, arrumado e aconchegante, bem fiel as fotos. A localização é muito boa, principalmente pra quem gosta da vida noturna!
Alexandre é um ótimo anfitrião. O apartamento tem um custo-benefício excelente. Espero voltar.  Recomendo.

Tivemos uma ótima estadia! Alexandre é muito simpático e solicito e sempre preocupado com nossa comodidade. Sobre o espaço foi melhor que esperávamos. A Cama é supeer confortável e o ar condicionado funciona super bem, além de ser silencioso. Super indico para quem quer ficar bem localizado e estar bem instalado ao mesmo tempo!
Foi tudo ótimo.., apartamento muito aconchegante, tudo limpo e organizado., digno de 5 estrelas!
Excelente lugar para pasar unos hermosos días de descanso. Muchas gracias por todo!

Alexandre war durch und durch eine toller Gastgeberin! Sehr unkompliziert und hilfsbereit. Als wir Probleme mit dem WLAN hatten, ist er sofort gekommen und hat das Problem gelöst. 

Die Lage ist super, vor allem für Leute die abends gerne in einer Bar oder tanzen gehen wollen. Trotz einiger Obdachloser in der Gegend haben wir uns nie "unwohl" gefühlt! 

Wer jedoch nach Ruhe sucht, sollte lieber woanders hin! 

Alenxandre vielen Dank für deine GastFreundschaft.

Espaço muito aconchegante, muito limpo e confortável. Tem tudo o que é necessário para se hospedar com conforto. Próximo a estação do metrô, VLT e linhas de ônibus, Catedral Metropolitana, Arcos da Lapa e Escadaria Selarón. Além disso a flexibilidade no check-in/check-out fez toda a diferença.

Para quem gosta de passear, beber a noite e depois chegar em casa para uma boa noite de sono, este apartamento é ideal. Apesar do black out da cortina não filtrar completamente a luz do sol, o apartamento fica em andar alto e é muito silencioso e aconchegante. Super recomendado!

Eu recomendo o apartamento de Alexandre. Foi tudo otimo. Ele me recebeu e explicou tudo o que eu precisava saber do apartemento y do bairro.
Gostei muito do apartamento. Tem tudo o que se precisa para cozinhar. Obrigado por seu conselhos de que fazer perto.

El departamento es tal cuál se ve en las fotografías, bonito, cómodo y práctico! Muy bien ubicado!!! Si bien no pudimos tratar con Alexandre, pues estaba de viaje, el es muy organizado y dejó todo planeado para nosotros! Muy atento!!! Esperamos poder volver!!!!

Ficamos em duas pessoas por uma semana no espaço de Alexandre e adoramos o lugar! Bem arejado, silencioso, confortável, próximo de tudo o que acontece na Lapa, e com ótima localização para transporte público, para ir a pé a alguns lugares também, etc. Fomos recebidos pelo Roberto, amigo do Alexandre, e ele, tal como Alexandre, foi muito atencioso e solícito sempre e esbanjou simpatia. Agradecemos muito pelo cuidado e atenção, e quando voltarmos ao Rio com certeza procuraremos o Alexandre novamente!

Local muito bem localizado, limpo, jeitoso e próximo de tudo. Minha estadia foi ótima!
Agradeço imensamente ao Alexandre e ao amigo Roberto pela hospitalidade e simpatia!
Anfitrião atencioso e espaço muito aconchegante.

El alojamiento ha Sido muy bueno, tanto Alexandre como.su esposa contestaron todo rápido, la comunicación fue genial. El departamento es pequeño, ubicado en el corazón de Lapa, para los que gusten de diversión nocturna, es muy cerca de todos los bares. Volvería sin dudas.
Alexandre é carismático e atencioso!  O apto é limpo, bem localizado próximo da Lapa e fácil acesso!

Great little studio apartment. Very clean, well equipped, and Alexandre always responded quickly to our messages. He was happy for us to check in early, and check out a few hours after the agreed time - which was great for a late flight!

O apartamento foi perfeito, boa localização, limpeza impecável, todo mobiliado e com todos os utensílios que precisava. Realmente adorei a estadia no apartamento, foi perfeito. E o anfitrião Alexandre é muito atencioso e disposto a ajudar. Agradeço e Recomendo!

Seu Alexandre como sempre super atencioso, prestativo.
Mais uma vez nossa estadia foi confortável.
Retornaremos em breve.
Obrigado pela sua atenção.

Super indico! 
Localização perto de tudo!
Bairro super calmo, tem bastante policiamento.. fomos a vários pontos turísticos a pé, pela localização (perto). Ambiente Muito limpo e bem planejado.
Cama ultra confortável, banheiro excelente!
E falando do anfitrião, nossa!!!
Alexandre uma pessoa MARAVILHOSA, super atencioso, simpático, educado. O tempo todo pronto para nos atender!
Em fim, todos adjetivos são poucos para definir o quanto o local, anfitrião, são perfeitos!

O Alexandre é um ótimo anfitrião! Muito simpático, atencioso e se prontifica a atender às necessidades dos hóspedes. O lugar é muito charmoso, bastante confirtável e fica numa rua tranqüila..muito bem (Website hidden by Airbnb) voltarei com certeza em outra oportunidade.
Recomendo o espaço. Bem localizado e muito funcional.
Apartamento maravilhoso! Muito confortável e aconchegante. O bairro é incrível e próximo a tudo que precisávamos. O Alexandre foi super simpático e acolhedor, nos deu ótimas dicas!!

Foi muito agradável minha estadia no Rio, Alexandre foi um super anfitrião, recomendo e espero voltar mais vezes!
Obrigado Alexandre!
Hemos pasado dos semanas geniales en Rio. Alexandre es un anfitrión estupendo! Lo recomiendo!
Como a descrição
Ótimo apartamento e Alexandre super disponível ! Aluguei para um colega de trabalho que foi super bem recebido.
Esta increible el departamento, muy bien ubicado, limpio,  comodo, con todas las comodidades, lo recomiendo demasiado y Alexandre es un gran afitrion,  de los mejores con los que me he cruzado
bem esperem o melhor, Alexandre e Vânia sua esposa da o pessoas que gostam de pessoas,  esperem ser muito bem recebidos e acolhidos com amabilidade e respeito, super recomendo.
Hospedagem ótima, muito aconchegante, ótima localização, apartamento limpo e com tudo que precisamos, foi tudo ótimo, obrigada
Totalmente satisfeitos com o espaço,  localização  e dicas do anfitrião.

Alexandre's place was great! Comfortable studio with space for 2 people to work comfortably and fast wifi. Close to lots of bars, restaurants, and just a 10 minute walk to the metro. Would definitely recommend!
Excelente assim como o anúncio

es un lugar muy bien ubicado, tanque permite tomar transporte a distintos lugares de interés en Río. Cerca quedan tanto lugares para tomar cerveza, escuchar música, cómo para ir a mercar: todo a la palma de la mano.
Local super bem localizado , o apê é pequeno mas é aconchegante.  Tudo limpo e organizado. Recomendo.
O espaço do Alexandre é excelente para casais. A cama é extremamente confortável, os móveis com bastante estilo e um clima muito aconchegante. Tudo muito limpo e comunicação 100%. Recomendamos muito!
Excelente afitrião. Apartamento confortável, muito limpo e bem cuidado.
Muito bom! Recomendo!

conforme o anúncio!
Tudo certo!

Ótimo host! Ia chegar bem tarde no Rio, combinei com ele e foi super solícito. Depois consegui adiantar meu vôo. A comunicação foi muito rápida e, novamente, Alexandre foi super solícito. Foi tudo muito bom. Um ótimo lugar para quem está no Rio a trabalho.
Great location, very nice and clean flat, host hospitality and unique atmosphere of Lapa. If you want to get to know real Rio, this is the place!
Local com excelente custo-benefício, comunicação super fluida com host, local limpo e confortável! Adorei!

En espacio perfecto para parejas, muy buena ubicación, es muy central para conocer lugares emblemáticos de Rio, hay transporte cercano para moverse muy bien por la ciudad. Alexandre es muy amable, realmente se destaca por su hospitalidad!
Un genio Alexandre siempre disponible para evacuar dudas y el apto muy lindo y limpio
Lugar limpo, aconchegante e perto de tudo. Seu Alexandre nos recebeu muito bem. Super indico.
Espaço ótimo! Bem localizado, decorado e host muito simpático!

name: São Bento Studio
summary: O nosso estúdio fica bem no centro da cidade. A 50 passos da estação de metro e de comboios de São Bento, a 500m da Ribeira e do Rio e a uma distância caminhável da maioria das atrações do Porto. O apartamento é novo e cheio de todas as comodidades. If you need late check-in, please tell me, I charge 15€ after 20pm.
space: A localização torna este espaço muito interessante. Ao lado da estação de metro de São Bento e da estação de comboios com o mesmo nome. Pode caminhar-se até aos melhores lugares da cidade do Porto: Torre dos clérigos, livraria Lello, Ribeira, Sé ou Rua de Santa Catarina.
description: O nosso estúdio fica bem no centro da cidade. A 50 passos da estação de metro e de comboios de São Bento, a 500m da Ribeira e do Rio e a uma distância caminhável da maioria das atrações do Porto. O apartamento é novo e cheio de todas as comodidades. If you need late check-in, please tell me, I charge 15€ after 20pm. A localização torna este espaço muito interessante. Ao lado da estação de metro de São Bento e da estação de comboios com o mesmo nome. Pode caminhar-se até aos melhores lugares da cidade do Porto: Torre dos clérigos, livraria Lello, Ribeira, Sé ou Rua de Santa Catarina. We'll have acess to the entire apartment. My brother or i will be available when needed. Supermarket in Largo dos Lóios, 1 minute away; If you are using the extra bed, with extra linens provide, please be aware that it comes with a cost of 15€.
notes: If you are using the extra bed, with extra linens provide, please be aware that it comes with a cost of 15€.
transit: Supermarket in Largo dos Lóios, 1 minute away;
access: We'll have acess to the entire apartment.
interaction: My brother or i will be available when needed.
house_rules: We have a policy of being personally at each check-in explaining our passion for Porto. The time is from 3pm to 8pm. Before 3pm is subject to availability and costs € 15 (when available). After 8pm, we do late check-in and it also has a cost of € 15. Should you require service from the airport, please let us know so we can refer you to our partners.

host.host_about: Gosto de viajar e conhecer pessoas!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: It was a really nice apartment, near to the center and next to the Train Station, only 10 min walking to the Bar and Club Area. The apartment was so clean and comfortable. Lara is very friendly and kind. Me and my friends had a great time there. ☺️
Todo muy bien, ubicación inmejorable. Solo resaltar que el tamaño de la ducha es muy pequeño, es un poco complicado ducharse.
Very good attitude.Perfect location.I recommend the (Website hidden by Airbnb) and comfortable.Thank You Lara and Antonio

El apartamento estaba genial. Las fotos del anuncio se adecuan a la realidad. Muy céntrico, respecto a la ubicación inmejorable. 

No tuvimos ocasión de conocer a Lara, pero sí a su hermano. Son gente muy agradable.

Si volvemos a Oporto ya sabemos dónde alojarnos!

The studio is very confortable and clean , located in the very center ; close to the metro station , bus stops... , shops , restaurants and coffee shops ... 
The coffee and the porto wine was a very kind attention !
We really enjoyed the beautiful city of Porto !

Apparement très bien situé, en plein centre donc vivant la nuit, à proximité des transports en commun.
Accueil très sympathique et hôte réactif.
Douche un peu étroite . Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
Hyper centre, proche de la gare

L'appartement est idéalement située pour partir à la découverte de la magnifique ville de Porto. Le quartier est vivant et animé, proche de toutes commodités (bus, métro, gare, magasins, restaurants, monuments et autres sites touristiques). 
Le logement correspond parfaitement à la description, la salle d'eau est un peu petite mais très fonctionnelle. La cuisine est super bien équipée et la literie correcte.
Nous avons eu un très bon accueil avec quelques conseils dont la suggestion de visite du port de pêche de Matosinhos où nous avons dégusté des sardines grillées fraîchement pêchées pour la petite histoire.
Bref, un excellent rapport qualité prix, je recommande.
Lara and her brother were lovely hosts. The apartment is located right in the center of Porto. Many restaurants and bars are just a short walk.

Le logement de Lara est très bien situé, très central.
Il est très agréable, et bien équipé.

Amazing position, two steps from the metro station, really close to the river. 
Great hospitality, Lara's brother spend some time to propose us some of the best places in Porto.

Accueil par le frère de Lara: sourires, amabilité garantis et même petits conseils gastronomiques et touristiques fort appréciables!

Appartement très bien illustré par les photos de présentation dans un immeuble parfaitement restauré avec tres bon goût.
Troisième étage sans ascenseur.
Propreté irréprochable. 
Équipement électroménager :four, micro-onde, bouilloire, et cafetière à capsules "delta Q"...et même un lave-linge. 
Salle de bain pleine de charme. Seul le bac de douche n'atteint pas le même standing.
Chauffage d'appoint (bienvenu!) pour les périodes fraîches. 

Situation: à 30 m de la sortie de métro Sao Bento et à 100 m de la gare. 
Tous les monuments principaux dans un cercle de 10 minutes à pieds.
Et les petits restaurants tout autour!

Merci Lara!

What a beautiful apartment in such a prime location. Close to all amenities and main tourist sights 
Lara was an incredible host and was able to let us check in late due to our flight being in the evening. She was very responsive and easy to communicate with. She also went out of her way to give us great recommendations based on what we were interested in seeing

Lara is super easygoing. Therefore the check in was uncomplicated and even when there were issues with the fridge Lara reacted very fast and had it fixed an hour later. 
The apartment looks exactly like the photos. The bathroom is small and the shower is pretty tiny but for a couple of days it's perfectly fine. It's located way more central than we thought what was great! Best recommendation for a short trip to Porto.

Lara 's apartment was very cozy, clean and well furnished! We really enjoyed the long walks in the neighborhood, thus the apartment was really close to the main attractions on foot! Lara is very friendly and helped us a lot any time we contacted her! It was our pleasure to stay there and we highly recommend it!

Lara was a fantastic host. She greeted us before the specified time and had the place ready for us. Lara offered a few suggestions of things to do and gave us a complimentary drink upon arrival. 
We had a small issue with the plumbing which Lara fixed immediately. 
I would have no hesitation in recommending Lara's place to anyone. Brilliant!
wir hatten eine sehr gute zeit in laras wohnung. am anfang wurden wir herzlich empfangen und eingeführt. die wohnung liegt sehr zentral, perfekt für einen stadtaufenthalt.
Very nice apartment at a great location in Porto.
숙소에서 나무냄새 난다(나는 좋았다). 주인장이 영어를 아주 잘함... 커피머신은 캡슐도 주고 맛있다. 세탁기가 있는데 세제는 없음주의. 위치좋음. (Hidden by Airbnb) 을 깔면 의사소통에 도움이 될 것. 샤워부스는 너무 작다 바닥을 안적시기 어려움ㅠㅠ 전체적으로 생활기본소비재가 잘 갖춰져있다!!
le séjour chez Lara s'est très bien passé, nous avons été très bien accueilli et l'appartement est magnifique et super bien situé.
Centrally located. Close to major attractions. Easy access to airport by metro. Great restaurants and shops nearby. Lovely hostess! Comfortable bed and large apartment. Would definitely return!
Appartamento centralissimo, pulito e ben arredato. Lara ci ha dato tutte le informazioni utili per un soggiorno piacevole e, cosa non trascurabile, parla bene l'italiano!
Très bon logement ou il y a tout ce qu'il faut, bien placé a 2 pas de la gare et des commerces! Nous avons été très bien accueilli avec pleins de bons conseils pour visiter des endroits typiques!

Host was very welcoming, location cannot be better than any other place!!Sao bento station is one minute away. I have to say Wifi was very weak, but we are satisfied with all other facilities and happy with their thoughtfulness!
Abstenez-Vous si vous cherchez du calme. Appartement très bien placé mais bruyant. beaucoup de restauration autour. Au centre de toutes les visites. Hôtes charmants. Wifi faible.

Nice apartment in a great location with really nice and a helpful host! 
Every time again!
Lugar maravilhoso, próximo de tudo. Fomos muito bem recepcionados. Vale a pena se hospedar no Studio São Bento.

Very well located, even have a small supermarket at 3 minutes distance, feels like home. We were there during the most famous festival of Porto, it's a perfect place to see all attractions and at the same time to return home quickly.

Our stay at Lara's apartment was really good. The apartment is really central and we did lots of visits by foot. It is well equiped, except wifi which was low. 
We have had a great welcoming by Antonio (Lara's brother) who provided us with great tips about food and where to get the authentic dishes. Thank you again to both of you for the so nice time that we spent in Porto.

The location is very central and has everything you need for a trip to Porto. Just the loft bed isn't that comfortable and it is very noisy because the mainstreet is directly in front of the bedroom.
It is 2 minutes away from the Sao Bento train station. And just a 10 minutes walk to the other side of the river. So, perfect surrounding to explore this nice city.
The location was great! Was central to so many sites and was exactly what we were looking for.

Great apartment, well located near everything! Host was kind and made sure we had everything we needed. 

With no air conditionning, windows have to stay openned and it is very noisy with the street downstairs.

Cet appartement est super bien situé, certes bruyant mais une fois les volets fermés pour dormir nous n'avons pas été dérangé ni par le bruit ni par la lumière. Lara et Antonio sont de supers hôtes, réactifs au niveau des réponses. Seul petit bémol la douche qui est vraiment petite. Sinon il est placé à 5min à pieds du port, 1min de la bouche de métro, le quartier est vivant et nous avons tous fait à pieds, juste pour la plage il faut prendre le métro (30min). Je conseil vivement cet appartement ! :)

Emplacement idéal pour découvrir Porto. Grand studio, très propre. Nous avons été bien accueillis par Antonio avec des conseils de restaurants. 
Il faisait chaud, (normal pour un mois d'Août) mais un ventilateur était à disposition. Pour les sensibles au bruit, pensez aux bouchons d'oreilles. Super rapport qualité prix.

Le logement est au coeur du centre historique,dans la très chouette et animée rua das florès,à  30 sec de la gare sao bento et de la station de metro du même nom et à 10 min à pied du Douro. bref excellent emplacement pour explorer Porto ! Logement idéal pour un couple ! Attention 3 étages et pas d'ascenseur :)
Pour les sommeils légers comme moi prévoyez des boules Quies car bien que les fenêtres isolent du bruit on entend qd même les bruits des transports en commun la nuit!
Nous avons été accueillis par Antonio qui se tenait toujours disponible en cas de question !
We really enjoyed our stay in Lara's apartment. The apartment was clean and located centrally. Communication with Lara went very well.

What a great place! 
Based on the pictures and location the Studio was a great find. The apartment is gorgeous, comfortable, well-equipped and in a perfect location - just next to Sao Bento Metro Station in a lively, energetic and centrally located.
Lara- responded promptly to all my questions. 
You should not look past this apartment if you want to be in the center of everything in Porto - perfect!

Für uns war die Unterkunft bei Lara optimal. Schnell vom Bahnhof aus zu erreichen, zentral gelegen, sodass wie zu Fuß oder mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel alles bequem erreichen konnten. 
Kontaktaufnahme und Schlüsselübergabe haben reibungslos geklappt, wir wurden gut mit nützlichen Informationen für unseren Besuch in Porto versorgt und hatten das Gefühl, unsere Gastgeber jederzeit ansprechen zu können.
Insgesamt ein rundum angenehmer Aufenthalt.
Judith und Matthias

He estado alojado todo el mes de octubre. 
En general el piso está muy bien. Su punto fuerte es que está perfectamente ubicado en el centro, junto a la estación de tren, autobuses, metro... Los puntos de interés turístico se pueden visitar andando. El punto débil también es la ubicación: calle con tráfico, con bares y restaurantes (aunque con las ventanas cerradas no se oye mucho).
La atención de Lara y Antonio genial, siempre atentos y tratando de solventar cualquier incidencia. El wifi no funcionaba muy bien al principio, pero cambiaron la instalación y ahora va súper bien. A los 15 días enviaron a una persona para cambiar sábanas, toallas y limpió un poco todo el apartamento. Esto en otros sitios no lo hacen, así que es de agradecer mucho.
El piso es lo que se ve en las fotos, un espacio suficiente para vivir: sofá, cama, cocina, baño. La cama es cómoda, el sofá también, la cocina tiene un poco de todo. La ducha es verdad que es muy pequeña, pero no hay espacio para una ducha más grande; quizás se podría poner una mampara de vidrio en vez de una cortina que se pega al cuerpo.
Loved staying here, amazing place in an amazing location! The hosts were fantastic and gave us incredible recommendations! I will definitely be staying here again!
Great location! A noisy place in 3 floor, but worth the great location!host are nice

Apartamento com localização perfeita, tudo novinho e bastante confortável. Anfitriões muito atenciosos, nos dando diversas dicas da cidade, inclusive onde comer a melhor francesinha ;). Se procura um apartamento muito aconchegante e no melhor local da cidade do Porto, este é o lugar!

Our stay here was wonderful. Great location central to all of the major sites, right next to the train station, and near tons of restaurants/shops. Windows were very nice and blocked out all of the sound, bed was extremely comfortable, and apartment was clean. The hosts were very nice and gave us suggestions on authentic/non-touristy things to do/try which we loved. The only thing I wish was a little different was the hot water ran out very quickly while showering- so if you’re not the type of person who takes long showers this won’t be a problem for you. Would recommend
We would definitely stay here again, it was close to everything

Lara's place is beautiful. The location is amazing and close to all the main attractions by foot. You have easy transportation, stores and restaurants all in the same area. Porto is a beautiful city and people is very friendly and welcoming. Thank you Lara for such a great stay! I will certainly return! :) 
Best regards,
Vanessa.

Appartement hyper bien placé au cœur des quartiers touristiques. Très propre. À proximité de bons restaurants et pâtisseries. Rencontre avec notre hôte très sympathique, qui a pris le temps de nous indiquer les points d’interêt! On recommande!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto!  LARA était un excellent hôte…Cet appartement est vraiment "hyper-centre" L'appartement est comme montré, extrêmement propre . L'emplacement est super pour explorer Porto, nous avons passé un merveilleux moment!Nous recommandons vraiment
Good but a little small

The building is super cute, 2 minutes walking from the Sao Bento station where you can arrive by train. It is a very active and lively area, below are cafes, restaurants and street musicians. You can walk to the river in about 5-10 minutes. It’s definitely the place to stay if you want to be where it’s happening with travellers and tourists, you are very close to the beautiful bridges that cross to Gaia, where the port wine tasting takes place at the cavas, also the boat tours leave from there. There are plenty of bars and things open till late as well. It was a very comfortable apartment for a single person or couple, I loved it!! Thank you Lara and Antonio for the special attention and for the stay in Porto.

Lara was very responsive and easy to get a hold of. Check-in was easy even after we had a change in plans. The place is perfect and in the absolute best location. You truly get a feel for Porto. I would highly recommend and would stay here again for sure.
Studio très bien situé et très propre

Lara’s place is suuuper central and very close to all the cafes, restaurants, and nightlife you could want! She was very accommodating with a late check in and there were many thoughtful touches in the apartment. Highly recommend

Location wise you couldn’t ask for better than this apartment. The apartment itself is fantastic and spacious. They have a fridge, oven, microwave, kettle and espresso machine plus a large wardrobe (with the smallest ironing board you’ve ever seen) and a fan for when the room gets hot. Antonio was even kind enough to provide us with a yoga mat for the duration of our stay. His recommendations upon check-in were spot on. Heed  that man’s advice. 

With the balconette windows open it can be very noisy from the traffic but just bring earplugs and you’ll be fine. 

You won’t regret staying here - it seems a few minutes away from most of the stuff you want to do.

Siamo state accolte dal magnifico sorriso di Lara!!!
Appartamento pulito e ben arredato!!! Ottima posizione per girare il centro di Porto e anche per una veloce gita al mare!
Comodissimo dall'aeroporto!!! Consigliatissimo!!!

We had a great time at lara's place. The apartment is situated perfectly in the city center. From there you can easily reach the attractions of porto. Furthermore you can get to the Beach within 20 minutes by bus.

Laura ist super nett, hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend. Nachrichten hat Sie immer direkt beantwortet. Außerdem hatte Sie einige hilfreiche Ratschläge was Sehenswürdigkeiten und Essen angeht. 
Das Apartment war sauber und die Größe für 2 Personen völlig ausreichend. Einzig der nächtliche Lärm war störend.
Localizacao excelente
최고의 위치

We enjoyed staying very much. We had a great meal at Cantina 32 just down the Rua du Flores.

Perfect location with easy access to the Biaxa(central city), the Ribeira,(river front), the Gaia(port houses opposite the Ribeira), extremely convenient to San Bento station and public transportation, many fine restaurants nearby and night life.

Washing machine was a huge plus.

Pay attention to information listing indicating no lift( 3 floors up).

Thank you

Laras place had everything we needed and was in an excellent location in Porto. Good communication with the host. We would stay here again! Some things to note are 3 flights of steps and it can be noisy outside. There is also no air conditioning. These items didn't present us any issues, but something to be aware of for others.
Great place in the middle of everything.
Estudio muy céntrico con todas las comodidades.

name: Charmant Appartement grand et lumineux
summary: Le logement est situé à quelques minutes du marché Jean talon et à 10 minutes du métro Jean Talon ainsi que du métro Fabre, ligne bleue et ligne orange, situé dans un quartier familial, le repos est au rendez vous et la convivialité aussi.
space: Spacieux et confortable
description: Le logement est situé à quelques minutes du marché Jean talon et à 10 minutes du métro Jean Talon ainsi que du métro Fabre, ligne bleue et ligne orange, situé dans un quartier familial, le repos est au rendez vous et la convivialité aussi. Spacieux et confortable Vous avez accès à tout, laveuse, sécheuse, lave vaisselle, cuisine et salon! C'est un quartier très convivial et familial. Le célèbre et incontournable  marché Jean Talon est situé à 10 minutes à pied. C'est un quartier très agréable pour des randonnées à pied ou à vélo. 10 minutes du métro jean Talon et du métro Fabre. Pistes cyclables. Aéroport à 15 minutes en voiture.
neighborhood_overview: C'est un quartier très convivial et familial. Le célèbre et incontournable  marché Jean Talon est situé à 10 minutes à pied. C'est un quartier très agréable pour des randonnées à pied ou à vélo.
transit: 10 minutes du métro jean Talon et du métro Fabre. Pistes cyclables. Aéroport à 15 minutes en voiture.
access: Vous avez accès à tout, laveuse, sécheuse, lave vaisselle, cuisine et salon!

reviews.comments:
L'appartement d'Elise et Bernard est très bien placé, dans une rue calme et agréable. Il y a le marché Jean Talon pas très loin ainsi qu'une station de métro à quelques minutes. 
L'appartement est clair, propre et très bien équipé. La literie est fabuleuse. 
Elise et Bernard nous ont très bien accueilli et ils ont toujours été très disponibles. Je recommande ce logement sans hésitation.
Jouant avons adoré notre séjour chez Élise. L'appartement était extrêmement propre et l'emplacement est idéal.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Très bon emplacement ds quartier très agréable. Appt spacieux et parfaitement équipé. Très bon accueil chaleureux. Stationnement privé, un plus à Mtrl.
Une adresse à recommander.

The value of this booking was incredible. A lovely LARGE one-bedroom (by NYC standards!) walking distance from Metro and bike-share. Bernard the neighbor was extremely thoughtful and helpful as Elise was out of town and we couldn’t have asked for more!

name: Multi level 2 bedroom apartment in Rosebery
summary: Location location location! This modern two story apartment is only 10 minutes away from both the airport and the city! Rosebery is famous for its trendy restaurants and cafes which is right on your doorstep. Darling Harbour, The Rocks, Circular Quay, Bondi Beach and many other attractions are short distance away. An IGA supermarket, a liquor store and a service station among other essentials are located within the apartment complex for your convenience.
space: A two level apartment with the master bedroom + ensuite located on the top floor. The lower level contains the second bedroom and second bathroom, kitchen, living room with large balcony perfect for relaxing! We are also able to provide a queen air mattress in the living room. An internal laundry room with washer and dryer is available for your convenience.
description: Location location location! This modern two story apartment is only 10 minutes away from both the airport and the city! Rosebery is famous for its trendy restaurants and cafes which is right on your doorstep. Darling Harbour, The Rocks, Circular Quay, Bondi Beach and many other attractions are short distance away. An IGA supermarket, a liquor store and a service station among other essentials are located within the apartment complex for your convenience. A two level apartment with the master bedroom + ensuite located on the top floor. The lower level contains the second bedroom and second bathroom, kitchen, living room with large balcony perfect for relaxing! We are also able to provide a queen air mattress in the living room. An internal laundry room with washer and dryer is available for your convenience. The entire apartment is available to you along with the amazing pool. An underground car space is also available as street parking is limited to 2 hours. For your security, the entr
neighborhood_overview: Rosebery is fast becoming Sydney's new place to be. Young, vibrant & accessible you are located just moments from The Grounds of Alexandra, Eden, Nan's Place, Fratelli Fresh, Salt Meats Cheese, Danks Street, Surry Hills and Newtown.
notes: We are able to offer an air mattress if required which can accommodate an additional two guests.
transit: With the ED just around the corner you can pop into the CBD in under 8 mins, head to the Airport in under 10 mins or be at some of the world's finest beaches in under 15 mins. Green Square Station is just 8 mins walk away with trains 1 stop to central and there are a multitude of bus services to the CBD & beaches just 3 mins walk away.
access: The entire apartment is available to you along with the amazing pool. An underground car space is also available as street parking is limited to 2 hours. For your security, the entry to the complex and building is restricted by intercom access for non-residents.
interaction: We are available where required and will be more than happy to provide recommendations on restaurants/bars, sightseeing and any other information you may need.
house_rules: We would appreciate if the apartment was left in the same condition it was given to you in. We may charge an extra cleaning fee if the apartment is left untidy.

reviews.comments: Wonderful host Mohit is :) i would highly recommend him. You won't be disappointed and the apartment was very good :) looking forward to my next visit!
Everything was Great
The space is spacious and meticulously kept.  We have a very good time of staying here. Close to all the transports and city, I would recommend staying in the property.
comfortable place.

I reccommend this apartment. I stayed 27 days and had no problem. The host, Mohit and his girlfriend are really kind and warm hearted. safe area and easy access to city
I'll stay this apt. if I have one more chance to visit Sydney.
Clean place, pool, Mohit very helpful. Car spot, comfortable bed and couches

Mohit and his fiance were very gracious hosts. Phone number was provided for easy communication which was highly appreciated. We were a group of three ladies and were very comfortable in the apartment which was clean, modern, airy and close to public transport. And the extra bonus was the pool which we all enjoyed. Glad to recommend and would be most happy to return in the future. Thankyou Mohit.
What a lovely clean and comfortable place to stay while in Sydney. We were very happy staying in such a lovely place completed our grt weekend in Sydney.  See you next yr.
Super friendly and easygoing! Place was absolutely spotless and the apartment was lovely!

Mohit’s place is in a great location ! We stated there for 5 days and it was a very pleasant experience. Great two floor apartment with all the amenities included. Its in a very peaceful neighbourhood and a short drive to CBD and other areas. I highly recommend Mohit’s place !
Lovely apartment in a great location, perfect for a weekend break in Sydney. Communication with Mohit was easy, a highly recommended host!

The place is perfect and is accurately described. We were greeted by Mohit and his fiance upon arrived. They were lovely and welcoming when showing us the apartment and the surroundings. The apartment was clean, stylish and had everything you would need for a comfortable stay. We left a cardigan at the apartment and Mohit kindly offered to mail it back to us. I would highly recommend this place - great value for money!
Good communication

Mohit's place has a great location and the apartment could easily fit 7 of us in it with one person sleeping on the couch. If you rent a car, there's a free parking space at the apartment which is good as parking is really expensive in Sydney. With a car the apartment is about 10-15 mins away from town and it is also convenient to head to other tourist attractions. There's also a train station nearby if i'm not wrong. Mohit was really responsive to queries during the stay and they managed to arrange for a slightly earlier check-in as our flight was early. They met us for the check-in and explained everything about the apartment which was good. It was unfortunate that we met with bad weather during our trip but the apartment was great overall! I personally love the neighbourhood where i did outdoor night runs. On a side note, there's a few cafes and/or restaurants near the apartment too if you are looking for a quick fix ! 
Thanks for the apartment (:
Good access to downtown and airport! Nice apartment and pool. Very friendly hosts who met us on arrival.

The apartment was quite convenient (about 800m walk from nearest train station, and there are buses right at the door step) and communication from the host was timely. Would be much better if there was air-con or at least a fan on the top floor where the master bedroom was as the air-con from the lower floor does not travel upwards.
Had a great stay here. Close to city and had everything needed

Mohit was a wonderful host.  Met us personally to show us the place and give us the key.  Everything was great, and close to the airport which is what we were looking for.  A couple of good places to eat within walking distance was perfect for our one night stay.
Great location and lovely hosts.
Near to the airport and apartment is beautiful and clean.  My family enjoyed the stay.

Mohit is a great host, and has a lovely home. It's a nice well furnished 2 story apartment. He even had netflix which helped us while the time at home.
It's a suitable place for couple and families with grown up kids. Not too suitable with families with young kids as the train station was quite a distance away. With 2 young kids and my parents, it proved a bit of a challenge to walk to and fro everyday.
Mohit是个非常好沟通的房东,信息传递很及时｡公寓的位置离机场很近,到市中心也很方便｡房间整体舒适清洁,设施齐全,但床上用品略显破旧,被子的舒适度也不是很好｡

This is a wonderful, clean, centrally located apartment. My family and I landed in Sydney after 25 hours of travel, and our brief stay at Mohit's, made for the most convenient, restful transition. Six of us stayed here for 2 evenings, and we were quite comfortable.  Thank again!!

Mohit has a nice place. It was big enough to host the 7 of us. There were 4 adults and 3 children. We stayed for 4 nights and we did enjoy our stay. The place is very secured but I found having one key was problematic when you have 7 people stay in the apartment. Also, there is only one undercover parking spot and finding a parking around the area was very hard. There was also no iron in the apartment. Apart from that, the place is clean, is in a very good location, close to everything and close to the airport. It was what I expected!

A beautiful 2 level apartment that was clean and spacious, a perfect size for 6 guests. The kitchen is good which was well utilised on our stay. Great views. Host has great communication. We enjoyed our stay.

The apartment is excellent. Very confortable.
Bus stop just at the door. Very easy to reach most important places from there.
Mohit has been very kind with us.
We have been four nights and we can only say that everything has been excellent.
很不错的房间 很好的房东
Mohit was so accommodating and we had an excellent stay.
Mohit is a brilliant host,  recommended!

Great, affordable accomodation in prime location. Large home with everything you'd expect and more.
Would recommend highly.
Good location. Nice accommodation. Hosts were very nice. Would recommend.
Mohit and Priya were very good host. Priya met us at the allocated time and showed us around the house. The host were flexible and granted all our requests.
很靠近车站, 出central station也只需要10分钟的路程｡很适合一家大小居住, 朋友一起的也不错｡

This is a great apartment, not far from Sydney city.  It is easy to access via public transport.  There are lots of fabulous cafés and shops in the vicinity and if you're happy to walk in to the city, you'll pass many great places along the way. I'd be happy to recommend any stay in this property as the hosts were great and the experience was very easy and relaxed.
Mohit made communication so easy and we had no problem communicating with him. The place is lovely and the balcony is a fantastic place to chill with friends/family. Will definitely be back again!
Great location and accommodating hosts!
Mohit made communication so easy and we had no problem communicating with him. The place is lovely and the balcony is a fantastic place to chill with friends/family. Will definitely be back again!
Very responsive and caring host. Good location and nice amenities.
地理位置不错,离机场7分钟车程,离City15分钟车程,房东回复信息很及时,到达时会亲自迎接你,公寓还有免费停车位｡
Mohit is always easy to reach and helpful, the apartment is strategically located near supermarket and airport... The place is nice and cosy....
It is very suitable for family

We stayed here as a family of 5 and all was very good, spacious and comfortable. Communication was great and location excellent for a short stay as central enough and close to airport for an early morning flight. Mohit was very flexible as we added an extra day at the last minute and very accommodating re check in times. All in all a very enjoyable if short stay in Sydney. Thanks!
Great location to public transportation as well as local eateries.
Great clean and neat apartment in a security complex within walking distance to amazing restaurants and very quiet for being so close to the city and the airport
We loved our stay at Mohit and his fiancé's place.  The place was spotless, comfortable and well equipped.  Thanks both, we wouldn't hesitate to come back again!
Thanks Mohit - nice and convenient stay for us. I appreciate your communication and flexibility.

Mohit was a great host, very cooperative and easy to deal with. He was great in communication and quickly responded to any question or query before check in until check out. Location is great to any one interested in eastern suburbs or to be near the airport. No much attraction within walking distance for visitors or tourists. Although bus services and green square station is near by and can move you to the city or else where. Will defenetly recommend Mohit and his place.
great area close to heaps of selection! Mohit was very helpful and accommodating to our itinerary changes!
Great location!
its a nice place stay for short time, needs bit fixing.
Perfect location, just 15mins to Bondi, City or Airport. With car park is a plus!
A stylish modern apartment in a great location. The hosts were very pleasant and accommodating.
Awesome place!! very clean and tidy. Mohit is an awesome host!!

This place is very nice place to stay. We stayed here for two nights with 5 adults & one toddler. The hosts are very quick in communication which was very good. Only one small issue was WiFi which can be slow at times but I think that’s due to many devices using it at same time but that didn’t worry us much anyway. We loved our stay here.

Mohit and his fiancée, Priya were very friendly and welcoming. My relatives who stayed at their apartment to attend my daughter's wedding were very happy with everything. Although they couldn't find the password for the wifi but it didn't bother them because they were out most the time anyway. I could've contacted him and asked him about the password but I was so busy myself with my other relatives so I am very happy that my relatives were happy too. The location was very ideal for people who want to go sightseeing around the city area or to go to train station and bus stop. It's very closed to The Grounds of Alexandria where my daughter's wedding reception was. I can highly recommend their apartment and him and Priya who were very professional, friendly and approachable.

Mohit and Priya, thank you very much for being amazing hosts and kindness and everything.

I can only say nice things about the apartment and the hosts. It's very easy to communicate with them too.
房间很干净,地理位置交通便利,门口有超市,药店,生活很便利,房主也很友善,沟通无障碍

It's a very very good place. The location is so good closed to the airport and there is the IGA supermarket at the door of the apartment. Clean and tidy place. All required equipments are provided including cooking and coffee stuff.
Nice place, convenient to get bus or railway.    Mohit is very nice and helps us a lot.

Very nice place to stay with great equipment like comfy sofa and beds, large TV, climate control etc. It takes some time to the central (20-30min iirc) but otherwise the location is good with a shop close by and bus stations around the block. Late sleepers might get woken up early by the sun if you wake up easily. The welcome was lovely and otherwise the communication was great. We enjoyed the stay!

Mohit ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber, allerdings kamen Antworten auf Fragen zumeist mit einiger Verzögerung. Die Wohnung ist schön gelegen, zwischen Flughafen und Zentrum, so dass beide gut erreichbar waren. Die Wohnung selbst bietet viel Platz, erstreckt sich über 2 Etagen und ist schön und praktisch eingerichtet, mit eigenem Parkplatz. Leider waren die Bäder nicht top sauber. Dennoch empfehlenswert.

Mohit was great host. Excellant communication, great location, everything was good as described. Unfortunately dryer and dishwasher were broken at the same time and it couldnt be fixed during our stay. Other than that our stay was very pleasant and welcoming. I would definately recommend Mohit's place for sydney visit. Close to city and shopping places. Big Cheers to Mohit and his places. Best wishes
Very clean, good position and responses are swift. Very helpful host.

Mohit je odlican domacin, u vise navrata nas je telefonski kontaktirao i docekao u stanu. Stan je prostran, lijepo uređen. Lokacija je odlična između zračne luke i centra. Predlažem da osigura više ručnika, očistiti pecnicu te da nabavi ključeve za kupaonice. Ukupni dojam je vrlo dobar i uživali smo u boravku.

On this trip to Sydney we were travelling with 2 adults and four children aged between 1 to 16 years old. It’s hard to find affordable clean accommodation to suit our needs but Mohit’s apartment was great. We had plenty of space for everyone. The facilities are great and being so close to IGA supermarket was fantastic. Mohit was a wonderful host and responded quickly to our booking and checkin was easy and convenient. We’d highly recommend Mohit and look forward to staying at his apartment again in the future.

The landlord is very good, and then the house is very, very complete, and very clean. Well, we had a very nice few days' holiday here, and the landlord communicated with each other very promptly and had a very friendly reception. I would like to recommend it to others.
Mohit is a nice host. Nice place!
Great place for family staying. Host is helpful, and the location is awesome.
Great space, good size, nice and clean, quiet, good location, air con (needed during summer months).

Location is excellent, so close to Alexandria and the Inner West which we had come to visit. We stayed with four children who were aged five and under, and the place was well equipped to accommodate all of us (although we were out and about for most of the days). The apartment was very clean and had plenty of everything we needed. Parking spot, swimming pool, security and location make this a great option for a Sydney stay.

My husband and I stayed here with our 15-year-old while he competed at the Australian Junior Athletics Championships at Olympic Park and we had the BEST experience. Firstly, Mohit is an amazing host. He is approachable, helpful and his replies are super fast.
We found everything we usually look for in accommodation and more. Firstly, the security and private car park were unexpected and very reassuring. The apartment was spotlessly clean, spacious, comfortable and modern, and included a lot of personal touches. The beds were great and the couches are actually large enough to really relax in. The facilities are brilliant - laundry in the apartment, IGA downstairs, Coles Express and chemist across the road, and Dan Murphy's down the block. We were amazed at how quiet the apartment was considering its location, which was so important to us. It's close to the airport but there was no aircraft or traffic noise. Wonderful!
Thank you Mohit for a brilliant stay!
很好的房东
Great hosts and easy to communicate with. We had a great time in the Appartment. I would like to stay there again. I really can recommend this Appartment. Thanks for all.

Very nice place to stay with family. Felt like home environment, neat and clean. Good security system. Liked it very much and enjoyed our stay for 4 days. Very good communication with Mohit and his wife. They are really good and helpful. Definitely suggest you to stay there for holiday.

Mohit’s apartment is stylish, spacious and clean. He is approachable and replies fast. The location is perfect, there’s a grocery downstairs and it’s very accessible to bus stops which made our trip easier. The kitchen is complete with appliances and utensils. The only thing we noticed during our stay was whenever we enter the apartment, there’s an unfamiliar smell. I would recommend an aircon in the bedrooms since the living room is the only room that has an aircon especially during the summer days. All in all, our stay was great. And we will definitely recommend it to others.
Mohit's communication was excellent, a great location and good value for money.

Everything was perfect and also the host was really really nice
They had everything prepared. I recommend others this place :)

The apartment was just as it is advertised,great time,fantastic location and we highly recommend it.
We will definately use it again.
Thanks Mohit for being an excellent host.
Regards
Sam

Such a beautiful apartment, photos are the exact same. Mohit was very quick in responses and quick to accommodate my request! Such a great location and very stylish apartment, and also includes a parking space which is great! 5/5.
It’s really nice!
close to the airport. 10 mins walking to the closest train station. nice 2-floor apartment with all necessary infrastructure.

It was an absolutely great stay; Mohit was super quick to book us in which was a God send and really helpful in getting us settled in, answering our queries within minutes. Being close to public transport & in a quiet location it was perfect, the space was super nice and modern but above all clean and accurate to the photos. I couldn't recommend it more highly :)
The place was amazing with everything you could need for a weekend away! In a great location, the aircon and heating in each room was also so good especially in the winter. Thanks for a great stay.

Accomodation was a perfect spot to stay at and everything in the apartment was exceptional. Host made check-ins easy and provided the answers to all my questions. Overall, amazing accomodation to stay at!

Great apartment in a quiet complex. 

Mohit was a great host and very responsive to questions and assisting with check in and check out.

Would highly recommend and would stay again

Good location - easy distance between the airport and CBD.
The IGA store below was very helpful and the pool was a nice extra amenity in a wonderful stay.

I booked my friends in Mohit’s apartment and Mohit was a delight to deal with, he was responsive and allow us a very early checkin. The checkin and out process was seamless. Apartment is spacious and clean and great location. Highly recommended :) thank you so much, Mohit!

Great communication, and fast responses. Easy check in and out process and provided lots of helpful tips.

Thanks again for all your help and support. My family had a great time, and the location is perfect.

Thanks again!
The stay at Mohit's place was wonderful. The apartment was clean and beds were comfy. Communication with Mohit was great with prompt responses and detailed instructions.
Nice place, close to busses, trains, there is a pool, very nice when it is hot. Mohit is quick to answer
Great location, off street parking, large space. Recommend!
Very good communication with the host, house was sparkling clean and accurately listed. My whole family was very pleased!

The apartment is clean, well equipped, new, safe and quiet. It has an underground carpark. it's perfect for those have a good rest and visit the surroundings of Sydney. Very convenient: the supermarket is just at the corner of the street. there are many other shops around, even fashion/sport outlets not far away (130, Botany rd; NB sports). shopping center with Coles is 1 mile away. Overall, it was a great stay.
Mohit’s place was wonderful to stay at. Good location, spacious and clean. Mohit was very accessible and responded to queries very quickly. Would recommend for a group accommodation!

Muy lindo apartamento, muy completo con todo lo necesario.  Tiene una parada de ómnibus enfrente lo que permite una buena locomoción.  Muy cómodo que haya un supermercado debajo.
Muy agradable también la piscina, para refrescarse después de haber paseado por la ciudad todo el día.
Pasamos una semana espectacular en Sydney.
lokasi dan tempat yang menyenangkan
非常开心的一次住宿体验,我们一共两家人住到这里,8天的时间,设施设备非常齐全,卫生干净整洁｡位置也非常的便利(超市,机场,市中心购物都不远)｡孩子在这个城市读书,我想我们每次来都要住在这里｡
Great stay. last minute booking and was still well looked after. Great communication.
Great host & great location however, it wasn’t quite as clean as we had expected.
Great location and apartment. Has everything you need

Mohit is a very responsive host with great communication. The apartment is well located with a supermarket next door, buses on the door stop, 15 minutes from Green Square train station and nearby cafes/restaurants. Unfortunately the apartment is looking very tired and uncared for (photos are obviously from when the apartment and furnishings were still new).

name: Bronte Home, Fabulous Location
summary: My place is positioned opposite historical Bronte House & Bronte Park, you will enjoy an unique location 200 metres from Bronte surf, ocean baths and rock pool ( The Bogey Hole). The home boasts the perfect northerly aspect to capture sea breezes, ocean views & amazing sunrises.. My place is good for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids). Across the road is direct access to Bronte Park with children's play area or walk up the gully to discover the rock pool stream.
space: The home was restored 2 years ago and has 4 bedrooms on the 1st floor.All have elevated views over the treetops, 3 bedrooms with ocean views.There is a new bathroom. The ground floor comprises of dining/ family room with TV / Foxtel. Seperate comfy lounge room with TV. Office has double desks, Wifi. Powder room. Seperate laundry with Miele washer & dryer. Beautiful kitchen, Double Smeg oven with 6 burners/ additional teppanyaki burner & seperate grill. Miele dishwasher, large Fisher& Paykel fridge with water cooler/ ice maker. Butlers pantry, bar fridge , 2nd sink.
description: My place is positioned opposite historical Bronte House & Bronte Park, you will enjoy an unique location 200 metres from Bronte surf, ocean baths and rock pool ( The Bogey Hole).
