The home boasts the perfect northerly aspect to capture sea breezes, ocean views & amazing sunrises.. My place is good for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids). Across the road is direct access to Bronte Park with children's play area or walk up the gully to discover the rock pool stream. The home was restored 2 years ago and has 4 bedrooms on the 1st floor.All have elevated views over the treetops, 3 bedrooms with ocean views.There is a new bathroom. The ground floor comprises of dining/ family room with TV / Foxtel. Seperate comfy lounge room with TV. Office has double desks, Wifi. Powder room. Seperate laundry with Miele washer & dryer. Beautiful kitchen, Double Smeg oven with 6 burners/ additional teppanyaki burner & seperate grill. Miele dishwasher, large Fisher& Paykel fridge with water
neighborhood_overview: Beach, park, rock pool, ocean baths . Cafes, restaurants, bakery,pharmacy, bottle shop & general groceries.All great daytime areas. Night time quiet & very relaxing family friendly neighbourhood. Walk to local eateries or enjoy fish & chips on the beach around sunset.
notes: Bedroom 1. King bed Bedroom 2. King Singles x 2 Bedroom 3. Single x 1 Bedroom 4. King single x 1
transit: 250 metres to bus stop, this route accesses extensive shopping area of Bondi Junction with train connection to Sydney CBD. The route runs very frequently from the beach.
access: Proximity to the beach provides numerous cafes for breakfast, lunch or dinner.A short stroll to other local eateries such as Three Blue Ducks ,Wet Paint & others. You are a skip away from the famous Bronte Bondi coastal walk or head south along the coast to the spectacular boardwalk that transports you to Clovelly, Gordon's Bay & Coogee. The home has been recently restored & sits amongst magnificent trees which offer privacy and striking views from each window. One moment you can be on Bronte Beach with all the energy , excitement & colour the beach provides and quickly home, set in a private location. Our yard has 3 main terraces ,a grassed area with a small deck, a larger deck with built-in mosaic seat & BBQ and the top terrace with sandstone flagging , produce- garden along with a tiered timber seating bench.
interaction: you can contact me if you need any assistance or recommendations to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: - Please respect our our neighbours

host.host_about:
I like the beach, the mountains,my garden & my family.We all love sport ,travel & our friends.
I have a keen interest in art,architecture & design.We like exploring new places and taking long walks.

reviews.comments: We are an ex Bronte Beach family and so we know the area well. We were thrilled to find such a gorgeous place to stay in such a fabulous position - so close to the beach and cafes yet so quiet and peaceful. We’ll be back if we get a chance!

If we could give Catherine’s air bnb 100 out of 5 we would. She is a generous host with beautiful home.
We stayed as a family with 3 young children (5,3 & 1), grandparents & us the parents. The 4 bedrooms rooms are huge - so everyone has enough space. Everything in the home is perfect - high quality bedding, toiletries & pantry essentials. The home itself is beautiful. There is a stunning deck to sit out on to enjoy the view of the ocean. There is a grassed area for the kids to run. The home has multiple tvs with Netflix. Catherine is lovely sourcing toys & books for our children.
The location is literally 150m from Bronte beach. It is opposite the grounds of Bronte House - so you feel as though you are surrounded by greenery (not in hectic central Sydney). The playground is perfect for young children with plenty of shaded areas & in easy access of local take always for meals in the park (we had pizza & fish & chips most evenings in the park with the kids).
Accessing the city is easy with buses directly to Bondi junction then train to city.
If you are thinking of visiting hectic Sydney as a family - Catherine’s home makes it a relaxing, thoroughly enjoyable experience.
Thank you again. We will be back!

Location location location.  Close to the beach and cafes,  this was a great house for our family.  Very comfortable and clean, and communication with Catherine was so fast and easy.  Thanks for your hospitality!

name: Farm Fresh Bungalow
summary: My place is close to the beach, family-friendly activities, great views, and a short drive to art and culture, and restaurants and dining. You’ll love my place because of the views, the comfy bed, the kitchen, and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. We offer farm tours, and you'll even be treated with fresh fruit from our farm. If your priority an economical launchpad for your Hawaiian adventure, give us a shout.
space: This bungalow on a quaint farm has amazing landscapes
description: My place is close to the beach, family-friendly activities, great views, and a short drive to art and culture, and restaurants and dining. You’ll love my place because of the views, the comfy bed, the kitchen, and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. We offer farm tours, and you'll even be treated with fresh fruit from our farm. If your priority an economical launchpad for your Hawaiian adventure, give us a shout. This bungalow on a quaint farm has amazing landscapes We generally try to escort you in and show you around the farm.
interaction: We generally try to escort you in and show you around the farm.

reviews.comments: Such an excellent and unique space from which to base camp the North Shore.  Accurate description on Abnb.  The cottage has just what a solo traveler or couple could need.  Erik was great at communication even though he was off island - a rare occurrence for him. Highly recommend...
Great place to stay if your looking for peace and quiet.  Erik was a great host.

Beautiful, safe, private setting. Waking up to the sound of waves and hundreds of birds. GREAT place for the price, highly recommend for anyone who wants a real island feel. Owners are amazing and we couldn't have been happier with it.

Erik was a very friendly host. We felt welcome. He provided us with fresh fruit & was helpful suggesting restaurants/ spots to see. Bungalow was as described. The hot plate was a nice addition so that we were able to cook. Thanks Erik. Would recommend!
Erik was super flexible with us checking in late. The digs where exactly as advertised and waking up to the birds singing was fantastic.
Absolutely loved staying here, will definitely be back.

This spot is as listed, a little farm bungalow. You will have everything that you need, shower, sink, toilet, fridge and cooking utensils. The bungalow itself is literally on the farm, it is isolated and you will never be bothered. For the price, you won't find much better in the area. I would say it's akin to camping, so if you don't like that lifestyle, then check somewhere else out. I would say that it is a solid 4.5 stars, for what it is.

Make sure you read the ad.  If you do, and you are okay with everything you're going to do fine.


The space was as described.  We had slightly sketchy hot water.  We'd have to fiddle with the knobs to get hot water for a minute or so, then fiddle with the knobs again.  This was the only negative part about our stay.

The location was quiet from other people and cars.  It was accurately described.  We had water, electric, a mini fridge, and a cooking plate if we needed it.  There was just enough space for what we needed.  We did not use the wifi so unsure how it was.

We also arrived later and during a rain storm so it was hard to see where we were going and Erik came right away to get us with no hassle.  

Do not leave any food outside of the fridge though or you will get ants!  We realized that the first day and once we made sure to not leave anything out it was no issue at all.  No wrappers, candy, or food could be left out.  

This was a bargain for what we were looking for.  If you do not require all of the usual comforts of a hotel room, definitely give these guys a shot.  We did not get to spend any time talking to Erik as we were gone and busy.  What we learned during our tour was he was a friendly really mellow guy =)

We would definitely stay here again and will probably do so in the future.

The pretty little bungalow is perfect, it is well built with all amenities in a rural and safe environment. This is perfect for those who like to have privacy. It is well located for visiting the North Shore. In addition, it is close to a beautiful beach perfect for swimming and for watching turtles.
This place gave me many amazing experiences for me relax, comfortable and calm.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Erik's farm for two nights. If you want to see tons of stars, be close to a beach that extends as far as you can see, and wake up to the sounds of birds, and get away from noise of the city, this is the place. Erik was super cool - flexible about check-in, gave us some delicious fruit from the farm, and brought us to his family's Waialua Bakery. You absolutely have to go to the bakery.
Great place to stay, close to everything the North Shore has to offer! The bungalow is exactly as listed and Eric was super responsive. We would definitely stay there again!
Enjoyed our stay.

The bungalow ended up being a great value for the price we paid. Easy drive to anything we wanted to do on the North Shore. Erik also went a step above to provide a second bed option for our trip.

The bungalow was a little bit smaller than expected, so depending on your comfort level it may or may not be the best choice for you. We kind of considered it a little step above camping, so something to consider when booking. If you want a great financial option though, with comfy bed and easy distance to anything you ant to do.... it is a great choice!

A wonderful location nestled on a quiet farm. Erik was east to communicate with and his property was a short walk from the beach. Highly recommended for those looking for an inexpensive stay up on the north shore.

My boyfriend and I had one regret: we wish we stayed here for more than just a couple nights! The Farm Fresh Bungalow couldn't have been more perfect for two people. It was quiet and comfortable, and had everything we needed for a relaxing stay on the North Shore. You can walk to the beach, and restaurants and shops are just a 10-minute drive away. The star gazing was incredible at night, and we slept to the sound of the nearby ocean waves. Honestly, we were rarely there as we spent the majority of our day exploring. The roosters were a little noisy in the early morning, and the Wi-fi connection was extremely weak, but we didn't mind "unplugging" for a bit. We would absolutely recommend this place to family and friends who are looking for a real North Shore experience. Thank you, Erik!
Had an amazing stay on the farm, surrounded by beautiful views, beaches and hiking trails. Overall great host and would recommend staying at the farm fresh bungalow.
Awesome place, really gave us feeling on staying on the island! We really enjoyed our stay and Erik is awesome! Thank you!

We stayed 2 nights in the farm fresh bungalow! It was bigger than the we expected- quite quaint and adorable! It's very private and everything we needed for our time there. The roosters will have you up early- but it's all about the experience- and more time to enjoy the beautiful area!

My friend & I were looking for an affordable, low maintenance, and low-tech place on the North Shore & Erik's farm bungalow was perfect. It was a short walk to the beach, the surroundings were peaceful & serene. Erik was super accomodating & welcoming. He even took us out for a surf lesson.

What a cute little place! A small, gated bungalow that is perfect for 1 or 2 nature lovers and only a 15 minute walk to the world's most perfect beach. Erik was a great host and the property was clean and enjoyable!
Great place to stay. North shore is amazing

Everything was as described, just a little better. You're in a small bungalow within nature, so do not expect anything fancy. But we knew what we were up to and we really enjoyed it. Morning swims at the beach after a 7min walk, a fresh up in the outdoor shower and breakfast in the sun. Lovely! Near Hale'iwa, which is a lovely town and you could tour the island perfectly from that location. We would recommend it for a rustic and charming stay at the beautiful North Shore of O'ahu.

I stayed here with my boyfriend for 2 nights before we went camping for the rest of our trip. We absolutely loved it, such a cute clean little place and Erik is extremely helpful and ready to help if you need him for anything. There's a hot plate in the bungalow too with a pot which was unexpected so we got to eat real food for a few days which was really nice. Ceiling fan was also a bonus keeping us a perfect temperature at night. All in all this place was more than we expected and would 150% stay here again. 
Love love love <3
Alright and private. Don't plan on staying there during sun hours as too hot when the sun hits the cabin. Wifi not available unless you want over to walk over to the house near the road.

It's a cute and quaint place that had everything we needed! Beautiful views, great atmosphere and vibes from the host. Moderate walking distance to a beach and short drive to shops. We hope to come back to the bungalow soon!
My stay at Erik's place was great! Perfect for a solo getaway trip to Oahu.

The Farm Fresh Bungalow is perfect if you want to experience a Hawaiian "local" area. It is secluded from the thousands of tourists if Waikiki, yet close to so many incredible areas for surfing, hiking, snorkeling, and local food. The bungalow is small, but enough if you plan on being out all day like we were. Erik is extremely helpful, and is willing to give many recommendations, and tips for maximizing your trip, that said, he is not overbearing or too involved. Absolutely LOVED our stay, and would return again in a heartbeat. STAY HERE.
Place was small and cozy great for one person!
Super cute place. Absolutely loved it.
Walkable to beach. Similar to other reviewers, step up from camping, but has most everything you need for a comfortable stay.

Loved hearing all the birds. 
Short stroll to the water and great snorkeling swam with turtles everyday

The location is super the accommodations were beyond adequate, clean and very close to a private beach by foot. The neighborhood is very quiet and you can hear nature at all times. Being surrounded by all the fruit trees added to the charm of this place. Will definitely be going back soon!
Super chill, simple and quiet get away close to the beach. Will stay there again for sure.
It was a great get away!

The bungalow itself was fantastic.
Small for two people, but it and had everything you needed for a secluded getaway on north shore.
The outside shower was perfect for those late night chills with a beer looking out at the stars and moon. Felt like you where the only people on the property.
Didn't get to meet the host's, but going from what everyone else has said, they are amazing.
Thankyou!
we appreciated the quiet space, the mangoes and the warm nights at the farm fresh bungalow
Very quiet. Perfect for traveling light. Beautiful location. Friendly hosts and neighbors.

The bungalow is a great place to get away. I loved the outdoor shower and being in a grove of avocado trees. It is a bungalow, so make sure you expect an open air environment and being in sync with whatever the weather is that day. Erik was helpful and flexible.
Cute little bungalow walking distance from the most stunning beach and about a ten minute drive into town, loved the outdoor shower and the peace and quiet! Nice two night stay.
The bungalow is charming, cozy, and in a gorgeous setting. The local beach is quiet and lovely--just a quick walk and great for catching the sunset.

My boyfriend and I stayed in the farm fresh bungalow and it was honestly the best choice!!! Great little space, just enough room! It's in such a nice and quiet (and safe) neighborhood close to a beach and the north shore!!! Erik is an awesome host and made us feel so welcome, we can't wait to come back!

The cabin is basic and simple but yet functional, complete and built with taste.
Located In a magnificent orchard of avocados, mangoes, papayas, citrus and more. Beach is at less than 10 min walking.
A bit hot at day but we were to the beach at that time.
Great sky at night!
It was a nice little bungalow. Really had the nice Hawaiian experience and feel to it.

Lovely little spot on a sprawling farm with citrus and avocado trees. Erik was really polite and accommodating. Safe spot for your car and was great sitting out in the evenings looking at the stars. The place is pretty cool and loved the surf board shower!

The Farm Fresh Bungalow was a great place to stay for a visit to the north shore. The beach nearby was awesome - we saw some turtles in the surf and basically had the whole beach to ourselves. Definitely check out the bakery that the produce from the farm goes to. Excellent location to explore the North Shore!
Clean, cosy and calm. Loved the shower. The bed is comfortable too. Would definitely recommend it !
Great people. Great place. Lovely setting and warm hospitality.

We stayed at the bungalow for 6 days and enjoyed it very much being so close to the nature. It is the perfect choice if you want to slow down in your vacation and are not afraid of some bugs around and sometimes in the bungalow - which was no problem at all for us since this is also a part of nature ;)  the private outdoor shower was helping too to get the laid back vibe of Hawaii. We loved to have breakfast/dinner at sunrise and sunset at the outdoor table next to the avocado trees.
This place was great for my 2 nights in North Shore. Easy drive to anywhere in Haleiwa. Perfect place to stay if you want a place to sleep at night and spend your days exploring the island.

Beautiful spot! Comfortable bed, beautiful land, awesome outdoor shower. Really close to the beach and super convenient. Was exactly as advertised. The fan in the room with the windows open at night is heavenly! Enjoy it! Nice romantic feel, too.
This place was absolutely amazing. The outdoor shower was peaceful and the grounds were beautiful.

I loved this little farm hut, it has such a great vibe to it.  It was very comfortable and had everything you'd need in it.  Erik was very welcoming and happy to help with any questions and showing me around.  The outdoor shower was fabulous; I loved looking up at the stars, so much better than a conventional shower. The wifi wasn't working very well but Erik said this will be fixed in the next few days so probably won't be an issue going forward. Overall I'm very glad I chose to stay here - I highly recommend it!
Awesome little bungalow in the beautiful area which is the North Shore of Oahu.
You have everything you need. Nice and quiet place.

Really loved our stay in the Farm Fresh Bungalow. Cute little place with everything you need for a short stay in the North Shore. Wouldn't recommend staying here without a car as it is a pain to get around, but if you have a car it is super close to shops, beaches and cafes. Erik is a great host - highly recommend.
The place was little but it was perfect for the two of us and a good experience! Close to the beach and a lot of friendly faces!
First trip with Airbnb and thanks to Erik it won't be my last!
This place was amazing! A big thank you for Erik and his family for hosting us and for such great hospitality! We had the best time and can’t wait to come back someday!

Loved staying at the Farm Fresh Bungalow! The outdoor shower was so refreshing! Love being walking distance to the beach! Being surrounded by  beautiful citrus and avocado orchard was lovely! Thanks Erik!

Had a great time staying at the bungalow. It was cute and cozy, and perfect to be in the middle of a little farm, while being close to the beach. We also enjoyed Eric's informative tour of the farm...
Un joli petit bungalow avec tout ce qu'il faut ! Près de la plage, au milieu d'une plantation : vraiment frais !  Nous avons adoré, surtout la douche dehors. Erik était très sympathique.

We stayed at the Farm Fresh Bungalow at Erik’s farm. Located in the middle of avocado and citrus groves, the bungalow was quaint, cozy, and clean. We felt right at home, and were provided with a kitchen and basic supplies, fridge, towels, outdoor shower, and toilet. Overall a lovely time here at the bungalow!
If you are looking for a secluded place with a beautiful view this is the place to stay! The waves could be heard from a block away. I strongly recommend this place!!! :)

Erik's apartment is small but cozy. We enjoyed the outdoor shower, which I think is great! We did some nice, long hikes which are not too far from the apartment. Haleiwa is a lovely town to visit and once you're there, a visit to Waialua Bakery and Juice Bar is a must. Best Smoothies ever!
This place provided a quiet serene private backdrop on a beautiful avocado farm. My favorite part was the outdoor surfboard shower ✌
We had a wonderful vacation here and recommend this intrinsic abode to many.

This place is in an amazing location where all the beaches on the north shore are a short distance away. Things you will want to consider when staying here is to bring warm clothes as the blankets are very thin and it gets cold at night, bring your own toilet paper as there was one roll left for us but all in all it is a great little space with everything you need.
Great place to come back to after exploring all day. The farm is beautiful, and you’re surrounded by nature. Erik is very nice and willing to help in any way he can. 10/10 will be back.
We spent two nights on the farm in one of Erik’s cabins. Everything was exactly as shown- it was a clean comfy stay close to the beach.

Great location and a fun little place! If you’re looking for a resort stay on O’ahu — it’s not for you. We had many visiting creatures during our stay but it was a nice change to the craziness of the island. Just a walk away from a secluded stretch of North Shore beach and the fun surfer town of Haleiwa.
Perfect quiet getaway for two! Loved the outdoor shower and farm is so adorable. The beach is close and really secluded. Would stay again!
A beautiful location in the North Shore well situated only a few blocks from the beach and close to a number of fantastic restaurants.
This place was perfect for the two of us. Not touristy at all, a short walk to a quiet and local beach.

An alternative, affordable abode that gets you back in touch with circadian rhythms! Loved waking up at sunrise with the birds and escaping the packed beaches of Waikiki for the surrounding farms/orchards and more rugged North Shore beaches nearby. Erik’s place had everything we needed and was a close drive to some great coffee shops and restaurants. Checking in/out was also a breeze.

We had a great experience! The farm fresh bungalow was a wonderful way to spend time on the North Shore. We were able to bike into Haleiwa from the farm via the bike path and Erik gave us a great tour of the property.

We loved our stay! The farm was so peaceful. Erik gave us a tour of the farm and we sampled some fruit. We went to bed early because the roosters are up by 6am. We brought earplugs and they worked! The beach was the most beautiful I have ever seen! My daughter was fascinated with the outdoor shower. It was awesome! This AirBnb was perfect for our budget. Would stay here again.

Space: As described. Rustic and simple. You will love it, if you are a nature lover. Just enough bed/living space for 2 people. Western toilet inside the room (faces the bed) and a small kitchen area for fixing a quick meal (not for exhaustive cooking). Full size refrigerator to stock up on food (but no microwave, and the portable stove seemed really unused and unkempt). The outdoor shower was great, if you are alright with few bugs on the floor.
Location: Very close (10-20 mins by car) to almost all things in North Shore (Laniakea & Sunset beach, Kaena Point Trail, SkyDiving and Waimea Valley). The nearby town of Haleiwa has plenty of local food options. The place is on the farm and so is surrounded by avocado/citrus trees and an avid bird watcher will just love it.
Host: Never got to meet him as he was out travelling to mainland US. However was very accessible by phone if/when needed.

My friend and I had a great time staying in the Farm Fresh Bungalow! It was the perfect place to stay and it was just a short walk to a beautiful beach. I would definitely stay again and I would gladly recommend it to anyone.

A great relaxing spot for those who like something a little different. Had everything we needed including the coolest shower we've ever had.  We had the local beach to ourselves and it made a great base to explore the area. We hope to be back! Thanks Erik.
We loved our stay at the Farm Fresh Bungalow, great spot to explore the North Shore. Thanks Eric !

The farm fresh bungalow was so perfect. Outdoor shower and no bugs even flew by the light when I showered at night. We got a tour of his farm and he communicated quickly and made sure we were comfortable. Perfect for a couple stay.

This was the perfect place to relax on the already relaxing north shore. The space was exactly as Erik advertised, minimalist and natural, but was homely and comfortable. Only a ten minute walk to a cosy beach too! Erik is very friendly and responsive and willing to help with anything you needed. Visited his family's bakery in Haleiwa and had the best smoothie - highly recommend! Our only negative was that the windows do not have curtains, which meant we were up early most days, but all in all we were very happy with our stay.

Great location! Ask for a tour of the farm - Erik guided us and explained a lot about the different plants and trees. He is a great host. 
It's tiny but it has everything you need - except curtains. The bed is confortable. 
You have to be ready to share the space with the little geckos...

The farm was great! The open windows and fan were enough to keep us cool at night, and we woke up to birds chirping. The roosters are not very loud at all, so we did not find earplugs necessary. We loved the outdoor shower, too! The farm was also very close to some fun beaches, the Yoga Co Op, Cafe Haleiwa, and Beet Box Cafe. Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to stay away from tourists and explore the North Shore better!
It was super cute and cozy and just 5 minute walk to a quiet beautiful beach!
Die Lage ist super. Eine ruhige Oase im Norden. Erik ist ein super Gastgeber. Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

Great place to stay on north shore. I live in Honolulu but came up to escape for the weekend and loved being on the farm with my girlfriend. Super simple accommodations, but love the outdoor shower and proximity to secluded north shore beaches.

The Bungalow is a perfect getaway for a single traveler looking for a quiet and remote location to sleep for the night. The pictures and description are adequate enough so there were no surprises or disappointments. Erik was very helpful and quick to respond to my needs. Overall a fine place to escape from it all.

The bungalow was perfect for our stay while in Hawaii. We are very simple people so having a small space was great! The outdoor shower is nice especially after the beach (which is walking distance away)!  Host and hostesses were very friendly and the area truely made you feel like you were on an island paradise.

We loved our stay. The bungalow was as described, but with more charm than I expected. We highly recommend an outdoor shower once the sun has set, and a cup of coffee outside when the sun is rising! Beautiful grounds.
Rustic, private accommodations on a farm close to everything on the North Shore. Good value.
The bungalow is a bit rough, but you don't stay here for the room, You stay for the quiet secluded farm, the bright stars away from city light and the great host.

Eriks fresh farm bungalow was an amazing experience for my wife and I and exactly as described. Amazing hospitality and the really unique features like the outdoor shower made our stay perfect and super fun!
P.S definitely ask Erik for a tour of his family's farm because it is beautiful!

Small private place perfect for a couple that enjoys the outdoors. Everyday we awoke to birds chirping and beautiful views of mountains. Refrigerator, hot plate for cooking, a pot and small frying pan with some utensils for cooking and eating, sink, a decently comfy bed with clean linens, small coffee pot, outdoor shower which was super refreshing with great pressure and plenty of hot water, small table inside plus outside patio set and a picnic table for eating and relaxing. No AC but we found that the fan and open windows were plenty to keep cool during the nights ( stayed end of Sept) Beach access is not far from the farm nor are great hiking trails and town for shopping and eating. Erik gave us a farm tour along with some fresh fruits and avocado which were amazing. Make sure to stop into their bakery for wonderful sandwiches, smoothies and cookies also that they use their farm produce to make. If you like peacefulness and don't require high end amenities I highly recommend Erik's farm fresh bungalow. We would defiantly return for a stay!!!!
Excellent location.
Great little place to stay. Love the surfboard shower and outdoor seating area. Simple but had everything we needed. Quiet and clean.
Perfect for a single traveller wanting to explore the North Shore
Great peaceful place to stay! I wish we had more time there and could have toured the farm.

The best bungalow on the north shore.  This place was much more comfortable than other bungalows I stayed in.  The outdoor shower is awesome and the place stays pretty cool with all the windows.  And you’re close enough to haleiwa which has plenty of great restaurants.

We enjoyed our stay at Erik‘s Farm. The unit is exactly as shown on the pictures. Everything is super clean and the kitchenette has everything you wish for to prepare a small meal. The bed is comfy and we really liked the outdoor shower. The area is very quiet and the unit is settled between Avocado Trees.
Great place, awesome location. Fun, intimate, simple.
Erik’s bungalow is just as described. My husband and I stayed 6 nights and loved it! We would totally go back. Thanks for sharing your piece of paradise with us!
Eric's place is great! It's quite and cozy, and located on a beautiful farm. It's a short drive to the North Shore beaches, restaurants, and shops. We'll definitely book here again when we return!
Beautiful Farm Bungalow. a perfect getaway.
Really cozy, blocks to the beach
5 stars

Erik's place is a great location. 10 minute drive to everything you need including wonderful food, shops and the beach. Erik was very hospitable and the place itself was the perfect little oasis to end our trip on a peaceful note. We even did a tour of the farm. Highly recommend!
Small, simple, quiet, rad.
The space is exactly as described, and Erik was a great, responsive host. If you're  looking for this type of stay, then this is a fantastic place for it. Highly recommended!

name: Sunny Room in Glebe Townhouse
summary: Beautiful terrace house in secure complex. Fully furnished, with a large, sunny room including a queen bed, private balcony and en suite. If you have more than 2 guests, an air mattress can be set up to accomodate extra people upon request. Discounts available for families. Has a complete kitchen, lounge and dining area for you to use. En suite has bath, toilet and shower. Access to full size outdoor pool, kiddies pool, BBQ area and a gym included. Linen and towels provided.
space: Bedroom is upstairs and a large modern lounge, dining and kitchen downstairs. All fully furnished for your use. Access to large pool, BBQ area and indoor gym included in price. The bedroom has a near new queen sized bed. An air mattress can be set-up for extra guests if required.
description: Beautiful terrace house in secure complex. Fully furnished, with a large, sunny room including a queen bed, private balcony and en suite. If you have more than 2 guests, an air mattress can be set up to accomodate extra people upon request. Discounts available for families. Has a complete kitchen, lounge and dining area for you to use. En suite has bath, toilet and shower. Access to full size outdoor pool, kiddies pool, BBQ area and a gym included. Linen and towels provided. Bedroom is upstairs and a large modern lounge, dining and kitchen downstairs. All fully furnished for your use. Access to large pool, BBQ area and indoor gym included in price. The bedroom has a near new queen sized bed. An air mattress can be set-up for extra guests if required. You will have access to all areas of the house and amenities, excepting the other 2 bedrooms which will be occupied. You will also have access to a beautiful outdoor pool, BBQ area, private courtyard with garden and an indoor gym. Glebe is
neighborhood_overview: Glebe is full of unique bars, great restaurants and leafy parks. Its close to the city and public transport. The lane that the property is situated on is very quiet with little to no traffic.  There is a childrens playground 1 block up the lane.
notes: Full sized pool, including a kids pool area, BBQ area, indoor gym, private courtyard available to guests
transit: Sydney Airport - 9km away or 20mins by car depending on traffic.  Light Rail - Glebe Station is less than 1km or a 10 minute walk Darling Harbour - 3km away Sydney CBD - 3.5 km accessible by foot, busses, light rail  Sydney University and Broadway shopping - 1km away, easy walk. Blackwater Bay - 1km away to gorgeous park
access: You will have access to all areas of the house and amenities, excepting the other 2 bedrooms which will be occupied. You will also have access to a beautiful outdoor pool, BBQ area, private courtyard with garden and an indoor gym.
house_rules: - No parties or noise past 10pm during weekdays

host.host_about: I'm a software engineer who loves hiking and the outdoors. I'm originally from New Zealand and find myself heading back frequently to enjoy what the country has to offer.

name: Room - Bostancı Metro Station
summary: flat 4 minutes walking distance to Bostanci Metro Station In the room there is one bed, a table, a chair and curtains.  Kitchen and bathroom is renovated. Clean flat with laminated flooring Deposit  600 TRY.  No smokingNo pets. I am Orhun (27, male) , trainee lawyer
space: 4-5 minutes walking to Bostanci Metro Station Gate 3. 2 minutes walking to E-5 for buses, minibuses
description: flat 4 minutes walking distance to Bostanci Metro Station In the room there is one bed, a table, a chair and curtains.  Kitchen and bathroom is renovated. Clean flat with laminated flooring Deposit  600 TRY.  No smokingNo pets. I am Orhun (27, male) , trainee lawyer 4-5 minutes walking to Bostanci Metro Station Gate 3. 2 minutes walking to E-5 for buses, minibuses
house_rules: Respect to neighbours

host.host_about:
I am from Istanbul. Actually a lawyer. But for a few years working in the field of education. I am a trainer at non-formal education and experiential learning field working at an NGO based in Istanbul. YUVA association works with and for holistic education programs for youth and adults with fewer opportunuties. 

I like archeology, books of Pascal Bruckner, Khalil Cibran, Dostoyevski, trekking especially on Lycian Way..

name: Beautiful Apartment Sagrada Familia SPB332388
summary: My accommodation is good for couples, adventurers, business travelers, families (with children), large groups, and pets.
description: My accommodation is good for couples, adventurers, business travelers, families (with children), large groups, and pets.
house_rules: - Arrivals or check-ins are made from 4:00 pm to 8:00 pm, if an entry is needed in an hour outside this time, it can be done, after consulting. - Check-ins later than 20:00 will have an extra cost of € 30 and after 23:00 an extra cost of € 50, which will be paid upon arrival. - Upon arrival you have to pay the tourist tax of the city of Barcelona, € 2.25 per person per night. - Las entradas o check-ins se realizan de 16:00 a 20:00, si se necesita una entrada en una hora fuera de esta margen se puede realizar, previa consulta. - Las entradas más tarde de las 20:00 tendrán un coste extra de 30€ y las posteriores a las 23:00 un coste extra de 50€, que se tendrán que abonar a la llegada. - A la llegada hay que pagar la tasa turística de la ciudad de Barcelona, 2,25€ por persona y noche. - La casa se sitúa en una zona residencial, no está permitido el ruido a partir de las 22:00h.

host.host_about: Viajero apasionado por descubrir nuevas culturas y gentes. Enamorado de USA.

reviews.comments: Stunning apartment with great value for money. 5 stars.
Apartamento a 5 minutos del Metro de la Sagrada Familia, con supermercado justo debajo. Apartamento bien equipado, muy cómodo y con todo lo necesario. Estancia mu agradable.

Hem estat molt bé a l'apartament, si podem repetirem. La zona és ideal per conèixer Barcelona, i és a tocar de la Sagrada Família (es veu des d'una finestra!). Hi ha molts restaurants i botigues a prop, però és una zona (Website hidden by Airbnb) sense soroll nocturn. La decoració ambientada en Barcelona'92 i els detalls de Nadal han fet l'estada especial i única i ens han fet sentir com a casa! Els amfitrions han estat molt atents. S'agraeix molt que posen una dosi de detergent, rentaplats i rentavaixelles per passar el primer dia. Molt recomanable.

Hemos estado muy bien en el apartamento, si podemos repetiremos. La zona es ideal para conocer Barcelona, i está muy cerca de la Sagrada Família (se ve desde una ventana!). Hay muchos restaurantes y tiendas cerca, pero es una zona tranquila sin ruidos nocturnos. La decoración ambientada en Barcelona'92 i los detallitos han hecho que nos sintiésemos como en casa. Los anfitriones han sido muy atentos. Se agradece mucho que pongan una dosis de detergente, lavaplatos y lavadora para pasar el primer día. Muy recomendable!
Très bien nous ne pouvons que le conseiller très bien équipé proche de tous commerces parking à côté vraiment rien à redire
Appartement très agréable, bien situé, très propre, bien équipé. Très bon accueil. Parking proche mais un peu chèr (20€ par nuit). Parfait pour une famille de 4.

If you don't like the crowds, this was perfect for us, close by the Sagrada Familia" but nothing else. 
Metro is less than a minute away!!

Flat is comfy, clean modern and well equipped. Family owned and operated with many flats innBCN so they know what they are doing.

Wifi is crapy, vouldvus s bit of speed and capacity for maybe another 30€ a month

Otherwise is perfect. Would definetly come again
Ubicación, comodidad

Appartement très bien situé 
La vue sur la sagrada est un plus qui n'est pas communiqué sur rbnb 
Et les lieux sont propres et bien entretenu 
 Albert est sympathique et courtois

Apartman je dva bloka udaljen od Sagrada Familie i metroa, te su svi ostali dijelovi grada lako dostupni. Trgovine prehrambenih proizvoda su u blizini. Apartman je bio čist i ugodan za boravak. Domaćin je izuzetno dostupan i ljubazan.
El apartamento luce bien, acabado de remodelar. Pero tiene muchos detalles que faltan por mejorar y hace que la estadía no sea buena. Por ejemplo: Wifi Malísimo y limpieza pobre.
Very nice place, close to Sagrada Família. The apartment had the basic necessities and host was very helpful.

Gran anfitrión. Muy atento y amable, se ha interesado por nuestro bienestar y ha sido comprensivo en toda situación. El piso está bien ubicado y con muchos servicios disponibles (wifi, calefacción, utensilios de cocina, etc). Repetiríamos sin duda!

El apartamento está muy bien equipado y tiene una excelente ubicación: se encuentra a dos cuadras de la Sagrada Familia (se la puede ver desde el baño) y de la estación correspondiente de metro. Albert es un excelente anfitrión: nos proporcionó información muy útil y fue sumamente cordial. Muy recomendable!

Nos alojamos en uno de los departamentos de Albert, la zona es muy tranquila a metros de la sagrada familia y de la estación de metro. 
Fue una muy buena experiencia, el departamento es un poco pequeños (éramos 5) pero para una estadía de 4 días estuvo perfecto. Tanto Albert como le personal es muy atento, nos dejaron hacer el check in antes de la hora de entrada. 
Definitivamente volveríamos a quedarnos allí.

Logement fidèle aux photos propre, de bon goût et spacieux pour 3 personnes. Bon accueil. A côté de la sagrada familia donc du métro facile d'accès et des commerces. Un peu bruyant la nuit étant donné que les chambres donnent sur une rue passante. Nous avons passé un super sejour dans ce logement. Je recommande.
Is a very pretty house, i advise everyone to go there!

This was a great little apartment that was easily walkable to all the attractions we wanted to see. Albert was great at answering queries immediately and storing our bags after checkout. It would have had 5 stars if the building work had not woken us in the morning! Thank you
离圣家堂很近,交通方便,房子很干净很舒适｡

The place is as per the description, no fake picture with big angle as you see very often in Barcelone, fully equipped as per the description, nice to have towel and sheets for the bed, good communication with Albert team,  new flat , all new , good bed  even the sofa,  confortable for 6 persons, very near segregated familia . No crash accès as you can also discover when you rent in Barcelona , after the building street entrance, there is a lift , and go to third floor. Period.  
Wifi weak for a family , suggest you make same remark so it will be improved for our next time .. thanks for coopération !
Great stay! Small but fit 6 people comfortably.

Quedamos encantados con el lugar. Lo reservé para una familia amiga y se han sentido muy cómodos y a muy gusto. Muy buena atención, Albert ha estado ahí en todo momento cuando lo necesitamos. La ubicación es inmejorable. Volvería a reservarlo si tuviera la necesidad. No os arrepentiréis.

Albert no pudo presentarse a tiempo e hicimos el check-in con su hermana 45 minutos después de la hora acordada. Al llegar se nos cobró el impuesto turístico en efectivo, algo que no estaba reflejado en el anuncio y que asumimos incluido en el precio.
El piso estaba muy limpio y bien localizado, pero fue una lástima que no contara con jabón de manos, gel de ducha, jabón para fregar o detergente para el lavavajillas. Me hubiera gustado dejarlo tan limpio como lo encontré.
El agua caliente funciona muy bien y la ducha es muy cómoda. 
El piso en sí está bastante bien, aunque es más pequeño de lo que parece en las fotos. Además, las fotos 5 y 7 son de la misma habitación con las camas individuales juntas. No hay cama doble, sí sofá cama (bastante cómodo, como las 4 camas individuales). Las habitaciones cuentan con radiador, que funciona perfectamente.
Echamos en falta horno y tijeras en la cocina y tener más de un rollo de papel higiénico para 5 personas en las 2 noches que estuvimos. La vitrocerámica y el extractor funcinaron muy bien y había suficiente vajilla como para no necesitar fregar.
Finalmente, es un piso en el que se oye todo. Una vecina se quejó del ruido cuando solo teníamos encendida la tele a un volumen bastante normal. La tele, por cierto, tiene conexión HDMI.
En resumen, el piso está bien pero fallaron los detalles.
Super week-end appart nickel emplacement parfait c'est vraiment du sérieux

Très bon accueil d'Albert qui nous a aidé à nous repérer dans la ville et à gardé nos bagages les jours d'arrivée et de depart pour que nous profitions pleinement de notre séjour à Barcelone!
L'appartement est idéalement situé à proximité de la Sagrada familia et des transports en commun (métro, bus...); on y trouve une petite supérette ouverte jusque plus de 00h tous les jours, sans oublier les autres commerçants dans le quartier. Et dans l'appartement il y a tout ce qui faut pour cuisinier!
Le double vitrage garanti le calme dans l'appartement, et la clim doit être un vrai plus l'été!
Séjour parfait!

We stayed at Alberts apartment for 5 nights. We were a family of 5 and the apartment was a ok size for us. 
The apartment was clean, and Albert was open for questions about what we needed to know about the city when we arrived.

It is also close to the metro, and you can get around in the city quite easy!

Really recomend to stay here if you're on a quick trip to Barcelona.
Everything was good! Nothing went out of plan and we had good time!!
Awesome location, description is spot on. We had a great time!
Apartment really nice and everything accurate
Albert's apartment was phenomenal! Extremely clean, very centralized! Cannot wait to go back to Barca and staying at this place again :) I highly recommend!
Fantastic place and service!!! Highly recommended

Such a beautiful little apartment very nice. I loved it!  It was walkable to the subways that helped a lot. Maybe the only thing wrong was the wifi, it was extremely slow to be honest. But other then that I had an amazing stay with my family.

Very nice 2 bed room flat with an additional bedding in the living room. Location is just behind major tourist attractions 'Sagrada Famiglia', very easy to reach.. We stayed 3 nights, 4 adults and 1 child (4 year old).. enjoyed our stay at Alberts flat.. fully recommend for families with children.
Muy buena ubicación, limpieza y buen trato. Recomendable 100%
Excelente ubicacion , limpio y completo...
Great location for seeing the sights and Barcelona. Very tidy apartment that was comfortable for the four of us. Great communication with host. Highly recommend.
Die Unterkunft war wie beschrieben. Sehr modern, sauber und gepflegt. Immer wieder gern !

Good location. Basic but comfortable. When we arrived they unexpectedly charged us a "local tax" of 2 euros per day per person that was not explained in advance when we rented it. I talked to Airbnb and they told me that they are not supposed to do that.

Logement parfait pour 4 personne avec 2 chambres. Appartement impeccable et très bien équipé. Linge de toilette à disposition et d'excellente qualité c'est à signaler. Appartement vraiment idéalement situé, à la fois proche de la Sagrada mais un peu à l'écart quand même. Pratique : un supermarché au pied de l'immeuble ainsi qu'une boulangerie. Idéal pour un séjour à Barceone
很干净,位置也特别好,去哪里都方便,值得推荐

The apartment is an excellent value considering the price. For those wishing to be at Sagrada Familia area, the apartment is at an excellent location. 

Albert provides a professional service and all promised is delivered.
Very good apartment! Clean and great location and well equipped with utensils and appliances!

Albert's apartment was great for us. I traveled with my two boys (11 & 8) and my mom. It was very clean, safe and location was convient. I definetly recoment this place, we had a great time in Barcelona.  Thank you Albert and Raul.
LUGAR MUY CERCANO A LA SAGRADA FAMILIA.A LA LINEA DEL METRO Y EN EL PISO INFERIOR HAY UNA TIENDITA Y ENCUENTRAS DE TODO A MUY BUEN PRECIO.LO RECOMIENDO AMPLIAMENTE,MUCHAS GRACIAS.
The service is great. The location is good. The place is very clean and spacious for 4 people.
As advertised but I'm not crazy about the location.
A great stay! Clean, right near La Sagrada Familia, and very responsive hosts!
电梯不好,可能太久没维修了,一大早被困在电梯里,困在里面半个小时才救出来的｡其他环境电器都符合照片,不错

We had a great experience staying at Albert's apartment in Barcelona. The location was very convenient to the Familia Sagreda. The place was clean and well laid out. Our welcome with Paul was great, he was more than helpful. 
Parking was handy and very secure as arranged by Albert's Team. 
I would heartily recommend the accommodation for any visitor to Barcelona.

Ótimo apartamento, muito bem localizado, bem cuidado e tranquilo! Bonito e ótimo custo beneficio! 

Ótimo atendimento, atencioso e com boa comunicação. Há opção para deixar bagagem antes do check in e depois do check out. 

Recomendo!

This place is great. Beds are comfortable, and the apartment is very cozy. The check in was incredible, Albert welcomed us, and walked us through the place like a true professional. The apartment has everything we needed, on top of that, clean and within walking distance to the metro and the Sagrada Familia. Excellent place!
Un super accueil et un service irréprochable. Appartement idéalement situé près de la Sagrada Famiglia , au calme, grand et propre avec de nombreux commerces en bas de l'immeuble.

The apartment of Albert is perfect ! It's well located, practical, confortable and welcoming ! We really enjoyed our stay there and were very happy to be near the Sagrada Famiglia. It couldn't be better located :-) I highly recommend this apartment to travelers !

The apartement was very clean and the location was very great located. Albert and Paul were very kind and helpful. 
I can really recommend this apartement but it is rather suitable for groups or couples that don't feel disturbed during the night by other Airbnb guests in the hole building.

Great location to stay in. Takes 5 mins to walk to La Sagrada Familia which is one of the most beautiful landmarks in the world. Plenty of cafes and supermarkets around the area which makes getting food and groceries an ease. Highly recommend everyone to come here
Perfect ;) thank you

Nossa estadia foi ótima, Albert tem uma equipe local muito prestativa, a localização do apto é muito boa, mercado vizinho ao predio, metro e Sagrada Familia há  2 quarteirões, com certeza quando voltarmos a Barcelona ficaremos hospedados novamente em seu apto
El apartamento magnifico. Todo perfecto. Equipado y muy centrico. Recomendado 100%

The building has bad smells and poor sound insulation. we would choose another place next time we visit barcelona as the noise interfered with our peace and quiet to get a good night sleep and the bad smells is bad air quality which can lead to getting sick.
We like to be there.
Veracidad porque el apartamento es como se muestra en las fotos y excelente ubicación, cerca de todo.

Muito bom
Disponível sempre
Great apartment! Awesome location and nicely decorated, nothing left to be desired!

Magnifico piso super coqueto y muy bien ubicado. Alejado de los grandes alborotos del centro histórico de la ciudad, pero con todos los accesos cerca para visitar la ciudad en profundidad. 
La atención de Albert y su equipo, tanto en la recibida como en la posterior comunicación ha sido magnífica. Un placer que repetiremos. Muchas gracias.
Great little flat equal to an average hotel suite, amazing location & value. Also much spacier than it looks actually.

Albert's apartment was clean, stylish and in an excellent location. There were many restaurants and cafes nearby, as was the metro. He was very easy to get a hold of, and check in/out was very organized and straightforward. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone staying in Barcelona.

Excelente lugar con muy buena comunicación en todo momento , muy limpio y con todos los servicios necesarios para una agradable estancia . Manuel nos ayudo guardando nuestras maletas después del check out para poder continuar disfrutando Barcelona por unas horas antes de tomar el tren .
Thanks to Albert for hosting us in his apartment. Everything was very nice and clean and a good location close to Segrada Familia! A recommendable place to stay!
Excellent apartment, great location, well managed, clean and comfortable.

The perfect apartment in a quiet and safe area. Very clean and stylish. Easily accessible to Sangrada Familia and subway and bus routes. Grocery store is next door with food and alcohol. Many affordable restaurants around the block with souvenir shops and coffee shops too. 

The apartment has everything you need including good wifi. The kitchen has all your appliance and flatware and tableware and and it is super clean. Towels were provided and the room smelt clean and the beds were comfortable. We had no issues with our stay. I would highly recommend this location. 

Kam from Canada
Voor een vakantie in Barcelona de ideale plek, netjes onderhouden appartement.
Très bien situé  pour la visite de la sagrada familia. Pensez à réserver la visites des tours
Albert nous a bien accueilli. Il a été de bon conseil en ce qui concerne le choix des restaurants

Great place, great host.  Nicely equipped kitchen. Although many apartments advertise the famous Segrada Familia, here it is actially visible - from the bathroom window.  Be aware of the pricing.  The actual listed & booked price is only available for 4 hours, between 16 and 20h.  Then it tiers up with hefty increments depending on when you check in. 
Cat friendly!
Very Nice with everything you need inside ;)
Good

My stay in Barcelona was wonderful and Albert place was the cherry on top. It’s a wonderful apartment with great amenities,prime location and on a quite street. Coming back after a day out it was a great spot to just relax,watch tv and get my stuff ready for the next day.
Also super underrated because there’s a convenience store directly next door and,true to its name,convenient.
Buena ubicación en un piso moderno y accesible y muy bien comunicado. Albert responde a todo y muy rápido. Es un piso algo ruidoso, pero no más que la media en Barcelona.

Un bel appartement propre, très bien situé près de la Sagrada Familia et du métro. Accueil fait par une autre personne que Albert. Immeuble assez bruyant à cause des travaux qui s’y faisaient,  sinon très bon séjour. A l'arriver une taxe de séjour est demandé de 9 euros par personnes sans information sur le site.
Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour dans cet appartement. Il est très bien équipé, tout refait à neuf, très bien placé à coté du metro, petite épicerie en bas. Parfait

El departamento esta muy bien, tiene todo lo necesario, estuvimos con dos niños y la pasaron muy bien, es muy cómodo, muy limpio, con buen gusto, cerca de la sagrada familia. Es super recomendable, nos sentimos muy a gusto y nos atendieron muy bien.
Appartamento come in foto, pulizia e cordialità sono alla base

We had a great time and the place is central to everything ..restaurants, French bakery, cafe metro and Sagrada Familia. Albert was patient and kind enough to answer all our questions. It is a very safe  neighborhood..and very very clean

Maria
Great apartment in a great location!
There was a problem in the shower room but Albert gave a full effort to solve it. Really appreciate it and I would like to visit again.
comodo e centrale, completamente attrezzato

L’appartement est très bien situé  proche du métro Sagrada Familia.
Albert nous a très bien reçu et il est très flexible!
Un peu de bruit la nuit si la clientèle voisine est venue pour faire la fête mais nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
Très bon emplacement à 2 minutes du métro La Sagrada Familia. Très bon accueil, Albert est très chaleureux. Je vous recommande l’endroit.
Great location, beautiful clean house and lovely hospitality!
Buena localización
There is very good~ so big for four person~

Albert is a fantastic host, answers all my questions immediately even before our trip.  Check In was super easy too. 

Apartment is only a few minutes walk to Sagrada Familia, can even see a little bit of it from the bathroom window.  The Sagrada Familia Metro is also the closest Metro station. 

Many convenient stores, supermarkets, restaurants within walking distance, also a few places to get a local SIM card for your phone. 

Apartment is very comfortable with everything you need. Fits the three of us perfectly. The street view from the balcony is very cute and pretty.  

Overall we had a great stay and would recommend this place to other travelers.

Albert was an amazing host! The location is super, right next to Sagrada Familia and metro station, which was very convenient to get to the main sightseeings. The aprtment was clean, fully equipped, it was very bright, had windowds in each room. 
The host was very helpful, he gave us right directions and tips, was always available when needed. We really enjoyed our stay, and for the next time we will definatley stay in this apartment. Highly recommended!
Very nice clean place location is great. Highly recommended would definitely stay again.

L’appartement est bien placé, il n’est pas desservit par un ascenseur et la climatisation n’est disposée que dans le hall d’entrée. Les équipements sont en mauvais état ou cassés. Il manque le sel poivre et éléments de petit déjeuner. Il ne s’agit pas d’un appartement classique chez l’habitant mais d’une sorte d’auberge de jeunesse, je le déconseille aux familles cherchant une expérience familiale Barcelonnaise !
체크인 시간이 4시여서 걱정했지만 짐을 맡겨주어서 너무 감사했다. 위치는 좋았다. 집도 전체적으로 깔끔했다. 저녁을 만드는 도중에 정전이 됐다. 알버트는 전화를 통해 도와줬다. 에어비앤비 메세지로 사진도 주고 받았다. 결국 그는 공구를 들고 찾아왔다. 최선을 다해주는 모습에 감동받았다. 엘레베이터도 있어서 짐 옮기는데 수월했다.
great host, great location.

name: 獨立房間 位於市中心 private room in the city
summary: House with 3 bedrooms and one big living room in Kowloon, 5 mins walk from Sham Shui Po and Shek Kip mei MTR. The private room has a double queen size bed .You can enjoy the living area, kitchen and bathroom. Speaks great Eng, Mandarin & Caontonese. (one station apart from Kowloon Tong station where City university and Baptist University are located , 20mins walking distance from school) 距離石硤尾及深水埗地鐵站5分鐘 太子地鐵站7分鐘｡房內設施如圖 有冷氣 大櫃枱凳床枕頭 被,房內有窗.廳/廁/廚房共用.傢俬設備齊全. 距離九龍塘只一個站,經常接待城市大學及浸會大學交換生,走到學校大概需要20分鐘｡

house_rules: 1. 禁止吸煙 No smoking  2.熱水爐是儲水式, 不能長開, 用後請關上 The water heater cannot be turned on overnight, it will keep boiling water, thus, turn it off after use. 3. 請保持房間及客廳清潔, 用過之碗筷需即日自行清洗 Please keep all the places including your room and living room clean and tidy, and make sure the dishes are washed after cooking on the same day. 5. 房人將得到1條大門 1條鐵閘 及1條房鎖匙, 遺失需扣除$50 配匙費 1 main door key, 1 gate key and 1 private room key will be given at check in, $50 will be charged if lost. 6.洗髮後請必須將掉出來的頭髮拾起丟到垃圾桶或廁所,以免堵塞渠口 After washing hair, Please pick up your own hair and throw them in rubbish bin or toilet bowl, to avoid blocking the drain.

host.host_about:
Hi, this is Yi from Hong Kong, nice to meet you.

你好!我是來自香港的Yi .

address.street: 香港, 香港, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 真的很感谢,不能有话语来表达｡房东人很好东西丢了积极帮你一起解决问题

The host is very kind, nice and friendly. She help us a lot in the recomendations of places to visit. And let us feel like home! There is no wifi but she lend us a phone card to use (is better caiae you can use it outside).
The place is convenienced, is between two MTR just 5 to 10 min walk. And close to the 添好運點心 (it was so good)  The room is good, and bed confortable. The day we were staying was leaking water on the wall. The bethroom is small but it's okay.
Thank you for the great hoapitality!
地理位置不错,离地铁站近,是住宅区里,周边也很安静,房东人很好也很热情｡
Very helpful host, try to help you with everything. Good experience to stay here meet people and also a very local area to stay and know the other side of HK
房间该有的都有,离地铁近,周围大､小超市都有｡床超软好舒服~~~在香港能有这个价位的房间!太值得!顺便一说房东是个大美女,哈哈
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

房東姐姐超超超超超級漂亮超超超超級好的!位置很好離地鐵站很近五分鐘就可以走到｡去哪都很方便｡房間也很大床很軟｡雖然才住了幾天但是住這的這幾晚可以說是最難忘的記憶!和房東聊天超開心的!The host is s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) pretty and nice and friendly and helpful!  It's enjoyable staying there.
性价比超高,房东漂亮亲切热心,积极提供各种帮助,三天两夜的香港之旅有劳了,谢谢｡

I stayed four nights in Yi's apartment. The room and apartment are rather small but you get to stay in a regular HK apartment. The apartment could've been a bit cleaner but I enjoyed staying there. Yi gave me a sim card with unlimited data which was very practical. She also recommended me nice places to go to and was always helpful. The area is not touristy at all, it is a down to earth area with restaurants and markets where mainly locals go to.
Closed to shop, Easier to buy everything. Simple room for stays in HK. The room no drinking water is ready.
160多这个价位在这个地方也也没什么可挑剔的 交通很方便 巴士地铁都可以去很多地方 靠近鸭寮街那边东西很便宜 吃的还蛮多的｡房子有窗外面有山看着蛮舒服 床也舒服 如果有洁癖就自己带床单咯 总体房间没有那种香港小房的压迫感还很安静可以睡很香 推荐单身女生入住 她们都是友善的女生 房客cat很热心 非常感谢
房间很不错,很宽敞还能看见山｡地理位置很好楼下吃的用的都很容易买到~而且房东人也很好,香港玩的地方也蛮了解的｡总之很推荐啦~
房源在非常宜居的地段,步行五分鐘以內可到深水埗和石硤尾地鐵站,從而去香港各地都方便｡大廈周邊有各式價格公道的餐廳和7-11,萬寧,屈臣氏等連鎖超市以及診所｡室內生活用品俱全,Wi-Fi速度良好,臥室非常寬敞｡大美女房東非常周到友善,溝通效率十分高~
Nice host. The room is clean and tidy. It's a nice experience.
房东还是不错的人很好.性价比很高.附近吃饭.糖水.大型超市都有.公交车可以到达很多地方.地铁很近,不超过10分钟.唯一缺点就是空调太吵了哈哈,有洁癖的小伙伴可以自带床单.大楼很安全,保安很热情,这个价位住香港还是很划算的
房主很nice, 會提前聯繫安排入住事項｡房子近港鐵石硤尾站,附近有E21直達機場,交通很方便｡樓下有保安值班,房間配有獨立鑰匙,安全性不錯｡唯一不足的是浴室有些小,使用起來有些不方便｡不過總的來說性價比還蠻高的｡

第一次在香港住民宿,挺有趣的,有助于对香港生活更真实的体验｡
房子的住置好,去哪里都方便,周围各种服务又一应俱全,而且价格不贵｡
住宿的性价比高,在香港寸土寸金的情况下,这个价位已经算是很公道了,当然不要期望房间很大,事实上这是我住过的民宿中房间最小的一次了,但是香港就是如此｡
因为房主是女生,女性顾客更受欢迎｡所以,对于房主能接受男性顾客的我,还是要表示感谢｡
不算是独立房间,卫生间是和房东共用的~不过房东很好说话,所以没什么感到不适应的地方｡位置很好找,离地铁站不远,大厦晚上还会有门禁,挺安全的,可以放心入住｡
I had a really good stay here!  Vicky was very flexible and very good at communication. The price paid was a very good value.
这是我第一次住HK的BNB体验很好,很开心,感恩谢谢![玫瑰][爱心]

超棒的一次入住体验 隔壁房间是澳洲来的帅小哥 超nice 
Yi 人好好 会很亲切的告诉你要怎么去香港的一些地方去玩儿 会给你旅行建议 房子交通也很方便 靠近地铁站 去旺角五分钟步行 nice ~
房东是很美腻的小姐姐,大楼楼下的保安大叔很尽责,大厦很安全,巴士和MTR都很方便,因为是和小姐姐share客厅和卫生间,比较适合女生入住~
首先房东人美,沟通也没问题｡位置很好找用地图就可以找到｡大厦有保安人员看护很安全｡房间卫生算可以没什么觉得不舒服｡唯有不足就是共用洗手间和厨房卫生条件.......但一分钱一分价｡在香港寸土寸金的地方性价比还是不错的
是第二次来租了,体验依然非常好,房东姐姐和临时来帮手的她的朋友人都很好又热情~楼下走一两分钟就是添好运,400米就是地铁站,非常方便｡楼里面晚上有保安,女孩子来住都非常安全!
地點離地鐵及巴士站不遠,交通便利｡大廈有警衛伯伯,很熱情,天天跟我打招呼~房間舒適,衛浴雖然空間不大,但已經非常滿足了~漂亮的Yi也非常貼心熱情喔~
房东姐姐很漂亮,热情,性价比高,很棒的体验
巴士地铁都很方便,房主给的资讯也很充分,很经济｡有问题联系房主,非常Nice｡
房東姐姐人很好,很熱心!

I stayed at Vicky's place for a week, and her hospitality as a host was amazing, and she is very personable overall. From the very beginning, communication was always very quick and she gave clear instructions for check in – it is only a single bus ride and then a short walk to arrive from the airport. Before I arrived, I asked her about a sim card and she helped me buy one locally for much cheaper than the data cards you find at the airport for travellers. She showed me how to use the stuff around the house and also provided me with a bottle of water when I arrived. We had great conversations when we were around at the same time, she invited me to join her in some excursions since I said I didn't really have an itinerary in mind, and lent me an old phone to use for two days when mine unfortunately needed a repair. The location of the place is very convenient; it is within walking distance of the MTRs and lots of good food just out the door, and there are also very nice security guards in the lobby who helped me with my luggage and greeted me every time I came in and out. The apartment is a bit small, as is the norm for apartments in HK, but the room has more than sufficient space for 1-2 people, depending on how much luggage you have. My only note is that the place could have been cleaner overall, but I personally was not bothered during my stay.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
非常不錯了｡在香港這個位置,這個價格,挺好的｡

I enjoyed staying at this place and to see a different location in Hongkong. It is not very central, but it is easy to find public transport and it is still very lively. Great experience and I would definitaly come back.
听入住的同事说,房间很舒适､安静,入住很方便,就是离地铁站稍远了一点,大概有1公里的路程,主要因为我同事参展,走了一整天｡已经很累了,如果平时还是很近的,补充一下:房东的确是美女,下回一定要去住住
适合穷游,小姐姐很美
很高兴住在Yi的家里,很温馨,有家的感觉,Yi本人很好,对客人也很客气,很满意
I had great time on the stay with Yin. She was very nice and helpful from the beginning until the very end!

Yi (Vicky) is an air hostess and it shows! Apart from her stunning long legs and smile, she is really super friendly and makes you feel really at home and goes out of her way to make a pleasant stay. Probably the friendliest host I’ve ever had on Airbnb.

You can have a 'private room' in this price, that's the best part of it

Yi is nice and pretty, and easy to communicate
走过一条街可以坐巴士,折回去可以乘地铁,方便｡附近有好几家超级市场和街坊小菜贩,自己想动手煮点什么,很方便｡临街食肆林立,吃点饱肚子的很方便｡Yi的家里可以自己做饭,超棒的!!房间有个写字台,很好｡洗澡的时候要注意下面有一个水龙头,别磕到或者抬头时小心别撞到洗手盆｡
性价比高,位置靠近地铁站方便,遇到一起合租的室友,友好互相尊重｡
The place was a typical HK apartment as advertised.  Though we didn't interact too much outside of logistics, she was helpful getting settled and heading out
房东姐姐很好,第三次来住了,还给准备了水,很贴心!满分好评!

Yi's apartment is situated close to mtr Sham Shui Po and Shek Kip Mei in a more residential area of HK than where I stayed before  (around Hung Hom station). I liked the neighbourhood with fruit and vegetables markets nearby, the technical hardware market and a street full of clothes shops. It feels more authentic than the glamour and glitz of southern Kowloon. The apartment is as described by others and good value for money. Info on how to get there might have been a bit more detailed (e.g. exactly which metro exit - b1 or b2 - to take and how to find the entrance to the apartment complex (there are 2 entrances) and the keys), but overall I enjoyed my stay for 2 nights.

Yi is a great host, she's very friendly and is always available to give advice (when she's not flying) on places to go and visit. I stayed for more than a month and had no issues with other guests, in fact I made friends with a few of them.

My advice is, be very careful with locking doors. The bedroom doors only lock from the inside (using a button lock) and only unlock from the outside using a key. If you leave the key inside, you're buggered. Luckily, Yi has an extra key to help out in case that ever happens.

The room is large considering it is located in HK. 
The place is cost effective and convenient for me.
The host is very very busy at work but tried the best to respond to my requests. 
The building is old but in good operation and maintenance.
It was convenient to find some places to eat around, and the metro station and bus stops are not far away.

One disadvantage is that there is no washing machine (or I did not find it).

The place was in an old building nearby SSP metro station and surrounded by many bus stations so it's very convenient for Exploring the city. Also many local restaurants and some convenience stores literally just down stairs of the building so it's Really good for late night eating. 

Apart from that I had nice chatting with Yi and she was very friendly and willing to share her knowledge about how to get to the places and introduced me some nice spots nearby. I Would recommend this place for solo travellers and appreciated for the hospitality.
小姐姐人超好 超级漂亮!房间真的非常大了 双人床床软软的很舒服!睡得最舒服的一晚了!离地铁站也不远 楼下买喝的什么的也很方便!下次去还想住这~
房东描述和房源相符
交通方便 房東親切 價格也不貴
房东小姐人美心善,很热情,会帮忙解答任何疑问,性格开朗,重点是真的很漂亮,有港星的感觉,房间很温馨,在香港来说真的性价比很高,就是洗手间有点小,不过不太影响住宿体验,楼下保安叔叔也很和善,会微笑打招呼,有家的感觉｡
Five minutes walk to Shek Kip Mei MTR Station. Walking range to Sham Shui Po

Great place for a solo woman traveller. Felt very safe, as well as being such a fun area. Loads of shops around Sham Shui Po, and a Tim Ho Wan super near, which does probably the best dim sum in Hong Kong. Easy access to airport, and public transport in general. The mattress was very comfortable and the air con worked well. Hope to stay here again in future, for a longer period of time!
Five minutes to Shek Kip Mei MTR Station.
房子很好找,房东姐姐很友善热情,很好沟通,出入方便

Awesome stay and fantastic host. I stayed in the room for 2 months and really loved the flat and the location. You can really manage to experience a proper Hong Kong life together with an authentic and perfectly located district. The restaurants and markets in this area are extremely good. 

The flat is well protected by 24/7 security service with very friendly security guards. The host offers you a lot of private space by simultaneously providing you all information and great tips when needed. 

Thank you again for such an outstanding time!  Highly recommended!
推荐,很方便,房东也很好
Yi was an awesome host, very responsive, and great suggestions for scenic views.. Her place is a definite recommendation!

這算是家庭式的房間,對於來香港居住是很好的體驗,一層樓分成三個房間,浴室蠻小不過算是體驗香港人的生活吧!房間也不大,沒啥地方可以開行李箱｡有桌子方便工作｡
有對外窗非常的棒,附近有個國小早上聽到伊些聲音,整體算是非常安靜的住宅區｡
客廳的雜物也蠻多,如果能好好整理會更好一些｡

進出自由,很少碰到房東,住了三天,第三天晚上房東凌晨在客廳煮飯講電話,我淺眠就被吵醒只好起來抗議｡
房東很熱情迎接我,住宿位置離地鐵站很近,最重要的是床鋪很寬敞!體驗到香港道地居家風格,下次還會再來住~
地址很好找,楼下有个很明显的中央饭店标志,隔音效果不错,不会很吵,房间整洁,房东人很好,很好沟通｡下次来,还住这里

You have to know that this is a low budget place. You will have the minimum needed. Sleep/shower/toilet. The bathroom, especially the shower was not pratical at all, extremely small. Don’t expect cooking (anyway it’ better to enjoy street food). Overall it was acceptable for me. The location is good, close to the metro, in a popular district. Bakery right below. The place is safe.

先说优点:
1.位置还可以,可步行前往地铁站｡
2.房东回复很及时,指引到位,入住顺利｡
个人觉得不足之处:
1. 房间里面只有一双拖鞋,我们两人入住｡
2.房间里面没看到卫生纸｡
3.房间和卫生间比较小,不是特别整洁｡
4.没有找到毛巾,不过这点房东也没写,是我没注意到｡
可以改进的地方:房间没有转插头,需要自己带｡
平日里的这个价位,对于不介意环境凑合住一晚的来说,还是不错的｡
Yi had instructions written all around the house to make it easy to find/figure out everything. She made sure I was taken care of. Space is ok for a solo traveller for a cpl nights.
此次香港之行比较忙,没有见到Yi｡但是Yi想的非常周到,把详细路线､如何check in都解释给我｡非常感谢｡房间也很好,距离地铁站只有步行5分钟的距离｡
Cozy and decent place to stay for a few days. Laundry, convenience stores, and decent restaurants are nearby. House and room were average and typical of a HK living space. Nice stay
在香港来说 真的很难得 这个价钱
房东是一名空姐,虽然从土耳其回国,在香港经转,未能见房东一面,可能上夜班去了吧,但是还是挺周到贴心,提前为我准备一切
It is a Very comfortable room! the location is perfect for shopping and eating. The price of this room is really reasonable and suitable for all budget travelers. Yi is very nice!

Host is very kind of people, and quick response too, you can ask her anything that you confuse to. It’s not possible to find this price to stay in Hong Kong. With this price, everything is just okay for me. If you want everything to be as fine as you wish, go find a hotel.
位置很方便,条件虽一般但是绝对对得起这个价格
空间比较小,干净度不太够,但地理位置挺好的,离港铁很近,也比较好找,指示很清楚,沟通很顺畅
价格实惠｡

summary: The apartment "The Garden" is located in a residential district of the city. Its location allows guests traveling on foot to various points of interest such as Porto, Rua de Santa Catarina, Bolhão market, Oporto Coliseum ... and about 1.4km street of Paris Galleries and also the Tower of the Clerics. Porto airport is located about 11 Km from the apartment "The Garden". Nearby has restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and other convenience stores.
space: The apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 sofa bed (common area), for up to 6 guests. The kitchen is fully equipped (microwave, oven, dish. Coffee and coffee maker, refrigerator, etc.). The room is quite spacious, has dining area and balcony.

host.host_about: Sou de Penafiel, casada, mãe de 3 adolescentes, trabalho numa empresa familiar. Neste momento resolvi dedicar-me também a explorar e reabilitar imóveis pertença do meu marido.

reviews.comments:
Un muy lindo apartamento!
Helena es muy servicial y considerada. 
No nos faltó nada en en el apartamento. Muy limpio, cómodo y espacioso.
100% recomendado!!

A Helena foi muito amável em todos os momentos. A casa tem uma relação qualidade/preço incrível, é muito espaçosa e limpa. Éramos 6 pessoas na casa e não temos queixa absolutamente nenhuma. Está bem equipada com tudo o que é necessário para cozinhar, limpar e dormir com conforto. A localização é excelente, andámos a pé para os pontos de maior interesse (Aliados, Ribeira, etc.), sendo que o metro do Bolhão também é muito perto, permitindo assim que nos deslocassemos facilmente por toda a cidade. Recomendo a 100%.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Perfect home, amazing hospitality! Apartment is is perfect location and very clean and comfortable. Helena was so nice and patient to me and my family! Thank you!;)
Apartamento muito bom. Bem localizado, próximo à parte histórica, restaurante em frente e  supermercado próximo. O apartamento é superior as fotos apresentadas.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Hemos pasado un fin de semana genial en Oporto. La casa es grande, acogedora, está muy limpia y con todo lo necesario. El centro no está muy lejos, se puede llegar andando o en transporte público. Lo recomiendo 100%, esperamos poder repetir :)

name: Hunter Hales is the Perfect Getaway!  KALA Cottage
summary: *Please call us for the last minutes availability. (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  My place is close to public transport, parks, the airport, and the city center. You’ll love my place because of the people, the outdoors space, the ambiance, the light, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
space: You will feel so at home within the detailed cottage, equipped with everything one would possibly need while on vacation.  Including a full kitchen, full bathroom, charcoal BBQ and private parking area as well as a private washer/dryer for each hale, we also offer a maid service!   This is local Maui vacationing at it's best! There is a comfortable Queen bed accommodating 2 guests comfortably, Each cottage has an additional Kingsize Bed and pull out couch. The hale is to be rented to one group at a time. The shaded backyard is the perfect space to wind down in the light of the setting sun after a day full of Maui adventuring! The cottages are conveniently located within walking distance to the hub of our charming Haiku Town.  There are many restaurants and cafes within the small town center, including local fish Tacos, exquisite Japanese and Sushi, Indian, Thai,Mediterranean, Kombucha, Vegetarian, Vegan, Steaks, Pasta, Burgers and Local Grinds! With Haiku Market grocery store, open 7am

There is NO SMOKING inside the house, please dispose of your butts. Toilet rolls, paper towels, dish soap, trash bags and bath soap are supplied for you as a COMPLIMENTARY STARTER PACK. Once this runs out it is up to you to purchase your own for the remainder of your stay. Please supply your own LAUNDRY detergent. Please bag and tie all GARBAGE and place in the green bin located by the front gate. MAID SERVICE is available, please contact me to specify and schedule a convenient time for your cleaning. CHECK OUT IS AT 10AM on day of departure unless otherwise advised.

host.host_about: (Email hidden by Airbnb) I have lived in Haiku for 15 Years and would never want to leave. I'm a carpenter by trade and have a wood shop here in Haiku. I surf, windsurf and stand up paddle, being in the ocean has been a priority for me since I moved here from Canada in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments:
The house in Haiku is absolutely heavenly. It is a well equipped house on a small private road in the heart of Haiku ( which is now my favorite town in Maui). The beds were incredibly comfortable with really nice linens; perfect place to lay your head after a long day of exploring. A huge plus for us was that there was a washer and dryer in the house, because we packed lite and did a lot of hiking. As a result it was great to have fresh clean clothes. 
Another plus is that the house is in walking distance from several great restaurants, a grocery store and local shopping. 
Overall, a perfect place to book for your next trip to Maui.

Great location in Ha'iku, walking distance to a bunch of shops and restaurants, and excellent for exploring Upcountry Maui, the North Shore, and/or the Road to Hana. Mike was super-responsive and helpful, and although the place is in "central" Ha'iku it feels very secluded. Nice kitchen, and beautiful pineapple-themed furniture. Note: there is no A/C or heating so be prepared for somewhat more humid/cool conditions typical for this part of the island.
Beware of the roosters!  They were infinitely noisy and kept us from a restful vacation.  Very clean, neat and spacious cottage.  Easy in and out.
Super emplacement. Supermarché accessible à pied. Nombreux petits restaurant à côté. Proche de la route de Hana. Meilleur coin de l'île.

This place was fine but it was dirtier than we expected and although the location is very walkable the town is run down but does have a few restaurants, a grocery store and some food trucks. The overall geographical location is great though. This side of Maui is very fun green and wet.

There are a few pro's and con's to Mike's cottage...

Pro's:
- Great location in Haiku town (which is a good town to explore the island from). Walking distance to the main square, cafes and restaurants
- On-site parking
- Well equipped kitchen 
- Spacious cottage overall
- Mike is a good host. Although we didn't meet personally, Mike made sure we had everything we needed prior to arrival. 

Con's:
- Overall the cottage feels rundown and tired. It needs a bit of work. 
- Outside garden hasn't been maintained and it doesn't feel like a spot you want to hang out
- Veranda door doesn't lock (we were worried about leaving valuables in the house)
- Construction right next door starting at 7am, very noisy!

Our stay in Kala was not enjoyable. The rental is not currently maintained to the advertised standard, and seemingly small details were quite frustrating - Inside: the couch is ratty, the whole place needs more thorough cleaning, screens were broken, curtain rods fall down, etc. Outside: the yard was not maintained, the deck and outside furniture was quite dirty. On arrival I spent a substantial amount of time cleaning so we could feel a bit more comfortable. A few items just need to be replaced. Mike is aware that his place isn't currently up to par and we found it frustrating that he rented it to us knowing its condition. The neighbors are quite noisy. Additionally there was construction next door, and Mike also had three loads of soil dumped in the back yard during our stay. Communication was lacking. With some minor effort Mike could have the place back in good condition but given our experience, and preference for quiet surroundings, we will not be returning.
Location was good. Communication was ok. Unit cleanliness was not what I expected.

Nice and clean, roomy cottage. We stayed 1 week at the Kala cottage and had a great time. Kitchen is equipped with everything you need. Communication with the host was great and he is very responsive. There are restaurants and a local market in walking distance. Thank you!

The cottage is located in a great little town with beautiful landscaping and relaxing feel. We really enjoyed the nice large kitchen for cooking and the chickens were a hoot. It’s a great deal with lots of space and stocked with helpful items such as cooler and beach chairs. A much better island experience than my last visit to Maui when I stayed in more of the resort areas. The cottage felt very private and was conveniently located to several tasty restaurants and awesome markets. We would definently stay here again if lucky enough to visit Maui again.

Mike’s place was excellent. It was secluded, but still walking distance to restaurants and grocery stores. It was conveniently close to the highways, making it easy to travel to the larger towns. The house itself was clean and comfortable. Mike was a great host, very prompt in answering our questions and very helpful. Definitely recommend staying here!
One of the best value on the north shore of Maui
Close to market and restaurants. Two  queen size beds good for family. Affordable place in Maui.

First the pros - The location is great! I love Haiku. This place is walking distance to the best restaurants on the island. Maui Kombucha, The Greek Oven and Nuka can't be missed as well as yoga and fitness studios, massage, chiropractic, mountain biking rentals and shops.
