It's also a great location to get to all the less touristy and beautiful parts of the island. If I came back, this is the area I'd stay in again. Getting to the house is easy and check in was simple. The place itself is simple and small, but comfy enough for a family of 3 or 4. Loved the gas stove and great water pressure in the shower. Also great to have a washer and dryer to use on our longer stay. Also we didn't need it, but there is a baby crib there. It's also pretty quiet for an in-town location. As long as your neighbors in the hale next door are quiet, you should be fine. Ours were. 

The Cons and Neutrals -  The beds were hard and springy, making it difficult to sleep, especially with someone else in the bed. If you crash easy, this may not bother you. The place is a bit dusty, something that could be fixed immeditaly with a more comprehensive cleaning. We tend to cook in a lot with a kiddo, so the kitchen tools were lacking for us. The knives were too dull to use and the cookware was mostly scratched up teflon. We bought a good knife and cast iron pan at Target to use while we were there that fixed the problem for us and just paid to ship them home. There was only one beach towel (we left one, so now two) and no beach toys for kids, but you can buy some for cheap at the store. There is a cooler and two beach chairs at the house. 

For me, this would be a five star stay with better beds, new kitchen supplies and a good thorough cleaning.
too much or too litttle

After staying an a camper for five days in Paia, a tent for four days in Hana, this place was heaven for the final leg of our trip!  It is within walking distance to everything in Haiku if you want to chill and take it easy, and also not that long of a drive to any of the bigger resort towns if you want to head to Lahaina or Kiehei for the day.  Paia and Makawao are super nearby and both worth spending time in.  Would love to stay here again!
Very handy to downtown Haiku and the beginning of the Hana road. We ate at a couple of food trucks that were outstanding. All in all, perfect!
Best AirBnb we have ever stayed in- the location was absolutely perfect! The cottage was amazing- it exceeded the expectations we had. We will definitely be staying again on our next visit to Maui!

We really liked our stay here. The house is in a peaceful and quiet place with banana, ginger, papaya and coconut trees around.
The bathroom is great, the kitchen is well equipped, you can leave the doors open to cool the place down if needed and there is option to dine outside with birds singing around. Although we didn't use it, there is a BBQ outside and washing/drying.
The supermarket is 2 min walk away. There are restaurants, food trucks and yoga studio just few mins walk away. Paia , Mamas fishhouse, and beaches and the famous Hookipa lookout with turtles on the beach just 5-10 min drive away.
We really enjoyed our stay here. Everything was closeby - Hana,  you can drive to the airport in 20 mins, south of the island 40 mins and west of the island to Lahaina about an hour. The volcano national park is about 30 mins drive away.

Mike's place was amazing! It was so peaceful and serene with plenty of nearby restaraunts and shops. There were tons of geckos, several neighborhood chickens, and fruit trees on the property.  A perfect escape after leaving the noise of Honolulu.

The place was just what we needed.  I read other reviews about it being dirty, but that wasn't the case for us.  When I accidentally went to another island for the day with the house key, Mike had one brought over right away so the rest of our party wasn't locked out all day!

Hunter Hale was an incredible home for the week we spent in Maui. The lush setting made it such a magical place to stay. 

The home itself was perfectly equipped with anything we needed (dishes, pots & pans, utensils, coffee pot, toaster oven, microwave.. 4 beach towels, a small ice chest.) 

Super quiet area in upcountry Haiku. There is no air conditioning, but sufficient fans (ceiling and oscillating) to be very comfortable. There is a market and restaurant/food trucks across the street. The prices at the market are VERY high, suggest traveling approx 25 minutes to Kahului and hitting Target or Wal-Mart for groceries/necessities (as much as I LOVE supporting locals, we just couldn’t do it the entire trip). 
Thanks for the amazing place, Mike!
Awesome location in a cool little town with great proximity to beaches, airport and rest of the island. Will stay again!

Mike offers great care for the us, even prepare the a brand new rice cooker for us and all the kitchen facilities are new. The property is very close the haiku village center with resturants, shops and foodmarket, its so great! Its just a couple of mins drive from the famous surfers beach, its so good!We super love this great get away!
Cute house. Great location. Fair price.
Absolutely love this spot...close to haiku downtown and can easily ride to paia and hookipa! Perfect!
Lovely Cottage and great location!
We were here for our honeymoon and it was wonderfull, great privacy, close to everything

Mike was a phenomenal host. The cottage was in impeccable condition and spacious enough for 5 people to stay comfortably. Location is wonderful if you are keen on staying in Haiku. Would definitely come back!
The place was as described. Very quaint and next to adorable local businesses.

I really enjoyed Mike’s place. Haiku seems like a quiet town it once you walk around you find amazing shops and especially restaurants!!! They are literally a seconds walk away. The place is spacious and has well equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Easy directions and was greeted with a bottle of wine and a gift voucher.
Love this place. Got everything we need. Walkable to So many wonderful restaurants.

Thank you, Mike!
Highly recommended, we felt very comfortable.

This cottage is in a great location in Haiku just walking distance from a well-stocked grocery store and some wonderful restaurants. The house has a private yard with a distant view of the water -- great to hang out and barbecue fresh fish! We had no problem finding what we needed in the kitchen -- we actually cooked and ate in most nights! We appreciated having a cooler for the beach, too! Of the two beds, we found the king bed upstairs the most comfortable, and climbing the ladder to the loft was an experience! :) Mike's place is a great location for exploring the rest of Maui, whether it's the road to Hana or Haleakala or the beaches. We stayed a week and looked forward every day to returning to our home away from home!

We loved our stay! First time to Maui and I’m so happy we stayed away from the resorts/hotels. Centrally located so we were able to explore all sides of the island with a well planned itinerary! 

Located in the heart of Haiku, we walked everywhere and loved all the food (went to the sushi spot twice it was so good!) it’s also a 3 minute walk to the bike shop that takes you up the volcano to do the bike tour/ sunrise - an added bonus as we had to arrive at 3am! 

The place was super clean and had everything we needed. Mike responded quickly to any request/questions we had! 

Thank you!

Absolutely loved our stay at Hunter Hales! Location couldn’t be more perfect for our Maui itinerary. We were welcomed with a bottle of wine (which we sadly didn’t get to enjoy) and a gift certificate to the market nearby. 
Amazing eats literally around the corner! We walked to dinner most nights. NUKA for sushi and the Greek Food truck are a MUST! 
If you’re in the mood for a new swimsuit or date night dress or even aloha shirt or board shorts for the guys, the cutest shop, The Lucky Honey is also walking distance. 
The house was equipped with all the basic needs including a little cooler which was useful for our adventures. No complaints here! Just wish we could’ve stayed longer!
Mike's cottage was super cute and clean. Also he was very considerate and prepared everything for us. Nice experience!
Great stay! Great host!
Great spot right next to town! Very modern and equipped.  Yard is big and beautiful. We had a wonderful time here!

Das Haus ist super gelegen, damit man gemütlich die Insel erkunden kann.
Mike ist ein super Gastgeber und unser Aufenthalt war einfach perfekt.

Uns hat das Häuschen gefallen. Auch der Ort ist gut, mehr ein Dorf für Einheimische als Touristen, aber das hat auch seinen Reiz. Zudem ist alles wichtige in der Nähe. Das Haus vefügt über eine vollwertige Küche sowie allem notwendigen zum kochen. Das Bad ist sehr gross und praktisch. Das Schlafzimmer oben haben wir nicht gebraucht, da es dort sehr heiss war. Unten waren die Nächte aber angenehm, da es draussen abkühlte. Es ist alles sehr sauber, jedoch hatten wir 2 mal Ameisen, welche jedoch schnell „besiegt“ waren. Einfach kein Essen rumstehen lassen... ein Geheimtipp zum Schluss: Unbedingt das nahe gelegene Restaurant „Colleen‘s“ besuchen, wir hatten dort einmal Frühstück und einmal Dinner und es war super lecker! Auch wenn das Restaurant nicht sehr einladend wirkt...
Such a lovely place in Haiku! Really love the location and the amenities!
We had a wonderful stay at Kala cottage. Mike was a great in communication. The cottage is in a convenient location in Haiku, making it easy to walk to grocery & restaurants.

Schöne Unterkunft.  Sehr zentral, um den Norden Mauis zu bereisen. 
Ruhige, entspannte Lage mit dem Supermakrt und einigen Restaurants direkt vor der Tür!
We had a great stay at hunter hales. The grounds were beautiful and the location was in close proximity to everything.

Place was great with a nice back yard.  very convenient to grocery and eating places across the street.  Best was the day we took bike Maui up to see the sunrise on halelakela.  You have to be there at 3 am to get fitted and load up in shuttle.  Got up at 245 and walked across the street.  Nice!
Great space in a good location to explore Maui. Very close to local shops and easy to get to the main tourist attractions.

We loved our stay at Kala Hale Cottage in Haiku, HI. Mike's place was perfect for us. We booked a 10-day stay and wanted a place where we could cook meals and really live during our stay. The location is amazing! You can walk to the grocery store right across the street. Also in the same lot are several excellent food trucks - the Mediterranean was to die for! Mike provided everything we could need. A fabulous location near Paia and Makawao, and on the road to Hana. This cottage is on the North Shore of Maui and has a cooler climate than the south, although you will still have a bit of humidity and frequent, brief showers. Kala Cottage was just what we wanted in every respect.
Mike's place is great! We've stayed a few times now and we really like it. Perfect upcountry location in our opinion.

Great place in terms of value. We liked the location next to some local restaurants that we enjoyed. We were in the Kala cottage. The residents next door (not Mike’s property) were very loud and using vulgar language outside until late at night which we could hear. I don’t think there would have been anything Mike could have done about it and it was Thanksgiving so maybe the holiday made them louder than normal. Anyway, other than the neighbor noise, we were happy.

The KALA Cottage is a wonderful place to stay for those wanting to avoid the touristy areas of Maui.  We were there for nine days and enjoyed our stay. The location is walking distance to a general store, good local restaurants, and food trucks. It is also a great starting point for car trips to Hana, Haleakala, and beaches. Mike is a great host. Mahalo.

Mike’s place is clean and comfortable. The location in Haiku is great for exploring the northern area of Maui, and as a starting point to the road to Hana. We also enjoyed the proximity to a local market and Colleen’s restaurant, which we frequented a few times. Listened to the rain and coqui frogs as we fell asleep.

We liked the location on the much less touristy north of the island. It's also very convenient to have a grocery store across the street. You do need to drive 10 minutes to get to the shore and Paia, which we really liked to get coffee/brunch (check out Paia Bay Cafe!) and hang out at the beaches (big waves! If you want to swim, find the "baby beach" ;).

The cottage is nice. As other guests have noted, it was very clean (with the exception of some plates, which previous guests probably didn't wash properly). Somewhat annoying were the neighbors in the run-down house/backyard on the right side (not the other cottage). One night a woman was screaming at a dog, the other night a man was berating a woman (I've never heard anyone scream the f-word that many times). There was also a nearby alarm somewhere in the neighborhood that went off for like 10-20 seconds some of the nights (never figured out where it came from). Overall,  we enjoyed our stay but it was less idyllic than what we had hoped.
Conveniently located and very family friendly.

Wir wurden von Mike dem Gastgeber sehr freundlich, frühzeitig und ausführlich informiert. Er ist am zweiten Tag kurz persönlich vorbeigekommen, um sich zu vergewissern, dass alles in Ordnung ist. Wir haben das sehr geschätzt.

Das Cottage ist geräumig und verfügt über ein umfangreiches Kücheninventar. Auch Haarföhn und Frotteewäsche standen zur Verfügung. Die Schlafzimmer waren sauber, WC und Lavabo auch. 
Es gibt eine Waschmaschine und einen Tumbler, was für uns sehr praktisch war. 

Für uns Landeier war es in der Nacht jeweils wirklich schwierig Schlaf zu finden. Da die Fenster sehr durchlässig sind, hörten wir sämtliche Geräusche ziemlich laut. Einzelne Unsauberkeiten störten uns.(Duschvorhang, Küchenutensilien)

Den Garten und die Veranda konnten wir leider aufgrund des Wetters nicht gross nutzen. Es steht ein Grill zur Verfügung sowie ein Gartentisch mit Stühlen.

In der Nähe des Cottages gibt es tolle Strände, wir konnten sogar Schildkröten beim Sonnen am Strand beobachten. Tolles Erlebnis. 

Für 2 Personen ist das Cottage sehr teuer, ich würde es nur zu viert noch einmal besuchen.
awesome stay! we loved the location so much. we would definitely come back!

Location is awesome - Haiku is a hidden gem in Maui (along with everything in the upcountry.  We got to know the local shop owners (Colleens, Maui Kombucha, Nuka, food trucks) since we went there so often.  A big plus since we had a 6 month old.  The place itself is great for a small family or a couple, and good amenities.  But as others mentioned, there is noise next door (generator, dogs) that can sometimes dampen the charm - and there is definitely is charm.  Nothing the hosts can likely do about it.  We didn't plan on spending so much time indoors but the island faced a huge storm and lost power over the weekend - so we likely experienced it more than usual.  Thanks to Mike for being a great host.
Great place little place off the beaten path, close to everthing including the best shopping in Paia. Very open but cozy

name: Modern, Ambient 1-Bedroom Apartment
summary: This stylish apartment features on-street parking, a yard, and easy access to Manhattan. Our place is close to local and express public transport, public parks, an assortment of food establishments and convenience stores. You’ll love it for its location and stylish ambiance!  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids). The apartment occupies an entire floor of a two-family home. Your upstairs neighbors will be my lovely parents, a kind and helpful couple.
space: The chic design of this apartment will ensure your relaxing evenings at home; the plentiful natural lighting will motivate your mornings and brighten your days.  The living room features a pull-out couch that transforms into a full-sized bed that may comfortably fit one extra adult or two children.
description: This stylish apartment features on-street parking, a yard, and easy access to Manhattan. Our place is close to local and express public transport, public parks, an assortment of food establishments and convenience stores. You’ll love it for its location and stylish ambiance!  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids). The apartment occupies an entire floor of a two-family home. Your upstairs neighbors will be my lovely parents, a kind and helpful couple. The chic design of this apartment will ensure your relaxing evenings at home; the plentiful natural lighting will motivate your mornings and brighten your days.  The living room features a pull-out couch that transforms into a full-sized bed that may comfortably fit one extra adult or two children. The entire apartment is at your (responsible) disposal! The entrance that I pictured through the backyard is private and separate from the main entrance to my parents' home upstairs, so you won't have to worry
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is safe, centrally located, and home to a number of parks good for strolling or jogging.
notes: A pair of fluffy Pomeranians occupy the upstairs home with my parents; Meeko the little one doesn't make a peep, and Lola the big sister may often be heard amusing herself in the yard. If necessary, we can make arrangements to keep her in during your stay.
transit: - Our listing features *free* on-street parking and a driveway you could use. - Only a 40 minute drive from Newark or JFK airports.  - A three-minute walk to all bus stops - Including those departing to Manhattan.  - Within walking distance of the train, which takes you along Staten Island and to the famous Staten Island Ferry! The Ferry is one mode of getting to downtown Manhattan.
access: The entire apartment is at your (responsible) disposal! The entrance that I pictured through the backyard is private and separate from the main entrance to my parents' home upstairs, so you won't have to worry about disturbing anyone. ***Only guests registered on reservation will be permitted in the apartment.***
interaction: My parents occupy the top two floors of this home and will be regularly available should you need any additional assistance. My father is intimately familiar with the entirety of New York City - a great resource for tourists!  My parents also speak English, Ukrainian, and Russian. Depending on his availability, my father could also provide a private tour of the City for an additional charge.
house_rules: We also ask that paper waste not be thrown into the toilet due to sensitive plumbing.  We also ask that you please be mindful of your energy and water consumption and try to be environmentally friendly (i.e. do not leave lights on or water running while you are away and not using it).

host.host_about: Hey all! I'm a Princeton graduate student studying public policy and international relations. I'm an avid traveler originally from New York City.  I speak German, Russian and some Spanish, and currently work at the United Nations HQ.

reviews.comments: Nice clean place. I felt myself at home. Michella is helpful and flexible person.  Her parents  are super nice and always  available  for help.

This apartment was exactly as it appeared in the photos, I arrived late and the hosts were very understanding. They provided me with detailed directions from the airport, they were kind, polite and always available if I needed them.

j'ai beaucoup aimé  la maison,c’était vraiment si propre et bien organisée,tout ce qu'on avait besoin était la.
je recommande aux voyageur de louer la maison ca vaut bien la peinne.

The hosts were so friendly and incredibly helpful! Everything was so clean and comfortable. As for accessibility, the train ride wasn't too long, and it's always fun to take the ferry past the Statue of Liberty!

Great place, looked exactly like the pictures. The host was super friendly, and very helpful when it came to any questions. I asked to check in a couple hours early, and she was very welcoming. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and even came with basic kitchen items which was a nice surprise. The location is slightly far from the city, but super close to the train which takes you right to the ferry, the host was even nice enough to give me a ride to the train. There is also a CVS located directly behind the apartment which was very useful. I would highly recommend this listing to anyone, and plan on staying here again in the future. They also had an adorable gift basket waiting for me.

Our stay at Michella's was amazing! We were actually hosted by her lovely mother Ella who was nice enough to let us check in an hour early. They also welcomed us with a cute basket filled with complimentary fruits and treats. We were pleased to see that the place was stocked up with basic essentials which was great for us (cereal, milk, water, shower essentials etc). The bed was also VERY comfortable and relaxing. We will definitely stay there again if we're ever in that area :)

My stay was exceptional, the hime was exactly as shown in the picture. I booked it for my birthday weekend and when i arrived she had a came and balloon waiting for me. Pantry was supplied with basic breakfast item such as coffee, cereal for a quick bite before heading, a gorgeous little fruit bowl. Christmas is my favorite holiday and i loved walking into the side door not only to find the lights glistening on the home , but the warm well thought out christmas decor. I absolutely loved and enjoyed my stay. She is very helpful and quick to respond  I felt as if i was in my own home.

Michella and Ella were extremely helpful in guidance to public transportation, which was all we needed to get into Manhattan and other areas of NYC! The apartment stands out a lot, the moment we stepped in we were amazed and felt very comfortable, 10/10. Very clean apartment, and has EVERYTHING you would need, even kitchen wares and utensils. They even had milk, bread, fruits, cereal, coffee, etc. for us!
Great place to stay. Close to the local train station and buses. The place was warm, clean, and the shower had great pressure. Hope to stay here again!

What a wonderful experience! Michella, her sister Veronika and her parents are the most friendly, welcoming, helpful host. They reached key hospitality goals. They concerned if I stayed comfortable and offered assistance to roam around NYC. They made sure I didn't get lost in the city :)
This place is modern, warm and lovely. Pictures are really accurate. I highly recommend it!

I loved everything about Michella's place! The location is close to public transportation and her family was very helpful when I needed assistance. This was my first time staying at an Airbnb and I loved it!
Awesome place to stay such great hosts.
Thanks so much for your hospitality. The experience is most relaxing. Highly recommended for other travellers.
Great location with even better accommodations.
The best ever nothing else to say
This is a great place! Super close to public transportation and right behind a CVS. So convenient. Lovely, friendly, and very accommodating hosts! And their dogs are super cute!
Totally recommend this place to stay. The host was awesome and the place has an excellent location, accesible to everything. Definitely would stay again.
Love the place, super sweet & homely.

My girlfriend and I loved this place!  It was clean and nicely kept. Michella was very friendly. It was very easy to get from there to the (free) ferry into NYC! We had a great experience and highly recommend this place.

My mom and I stayed here for a girls getaway after a stressful semester in my nursing Masters program. This was just what we needed. We were greeted sweetly at our arrival, and the place was spotless and smelled wonderful (and we are picky)!! The bed was soooo comfy and the decor was in such good taste!! We loved the little snacks and having the essentials already in the fridge when we arrived! We enjoyed our breakfasts of toast, fresh fruit, and hot tea, and the ferry rides and early morning/late night walks through the cute neighborhoods were thoroughly enjoyed! Thanks for being such amazing hosts and for the great communication before, during, and after our stay!! HIGHLY recommend this place if you want a quiet cute place to rest away from the big city!! Would love to stay again!! (:

If you are looking for a friendly, welcoming environment look no further.  The apartment was the perfect location for home base after a day of adventuring in NYC.  Our host family was very gracious and helpful.  They get 5 stars all around!
This place was great! Very comfortable and a great location! Thank you so much!
Great place, awesome hosts!

Ella and her family are great people, fantastic hosts, their home is excellent. Close to public tranportation, you can get to Manhattan in 60 min. The house is exactly as on the pictures, clean, friendly, in a nice region of Staten Island. Highly recommended, we spent a wonderful week here. Ella, thanks a lot for all your great support and warm welcome, we will come back for sure:)
Great place to stay, hour away grom Manhattan. Great host and lovely neighborhood! Deffinetly recommend this to anyone who is on a holiday.

Our stay in Ellas apartment was perfect. The communication with Ella and her daughter (and also with the cute dogs) was very good. They helped us a lot with the transit to NYC and gave us tips regarding sightseeing and so on. On arriving, Veronika showed us the neighborhood and supported us with necessary and helpful information.
The apartment was very clean and there was nothing missing. The kitchen is fully equipped and the decoration is also very nice. We had enough towels and the bed was very comfortable.
The connections to Manhattan are very good. There is a bus which starts near the house (3 minutes footwalk) which goes directly through the city centre (approx. 1 hour). Another possibility is to get by train and ferry. Directly beside the house there is a CVS (supermarket).
All in all we had an memorable stay in the apartment, there was nothing missing. The fridge was equipped with eggs, milk and cheddar and so on. Everything for a little breakfast had been provided by Ella.
If we get the chance, we will stay again in Ellas apartment.

We stayed at Michella's place this weekend while we were in NYC for the 5 Boro Bike Tour. The 40 mile event finishes by crossing the Verrazano Bridge and crossing into Staten Island. The AirB&B was very convenient for this. Any one looking for a place next May should check this one out!

It was absolutely clean and very comfortable for our stay. It was a 5 minute walk to the trail station that takes you right into the ferry building for a quick trip on the ferry to be right in the city.

A modern, impeccably clean, comfortable apartment with it's own entrance. A full size refrigerator, gas stove, eye level 1000 watt microwave, cable tv, fully furnished with pots, pans, silverware, dishes, bowls etc. Shower has great water pressure.
Close to Express buses and the train. Fast trip into Manhattan or Brooklyn. 5 New York style pizzarias within a mile. World class Sushi nearby.
Ella, our host, was extremely helpful and nice. She made us feel at home. We will definitely stay here again.

Fab apartment in a great location for NYC.
Ella is a lovely lady, who supplies chocolate, cakes and other necessaries.
Ella and her family are warm, kind people and are great hosts.
The apartment is on the lower floor and is bright, airy and modern.
A great place to cook, eat and relax after a day out in the city - which is very accessible from the property.
It is very clean, tidy and user friendly. I would give the whole package a 10/10 and would like to visit again, if the opportunity arose.
This was my first Airbnb and I am so very impressed.

It's really a enjoyable place to live. Ella is really friendly and helped us to do a lot of things. She drove us to exchange money and caught the bus. It's always our memory to stay in NYC. Thanks a lot!

Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen. Das Apartment ist sehr schön und sauber. Es war alles vorhanden,  inklusive verschiedener Lebensmittel und Getränke. Wir haben uns äußerst wohlgefühlt. Ella war immer bemüht, uns zu helfen. 
Vielen Dank für Alles.
EXCELLENT COMFORTABLE CONVENIENT CLEANLINESS BEAUTIFUL!!!

Thank you Ella for being such wonderful accommodating host. Your place is very comfortable, clean, updated with style and welcoming. If you have the opportunity to stay at the cute AirBnB you will absolutely love it.

We spend wonderful time to Ella's home like we're at home! 
She welcome us at 11 PM so kindly and the fridge was full.
The appartment is very clean and well fournished to do some meals.
Nearby there is an express bus to Manhattan anytime.
Thanks so much Ella for your hospitality.
Yannick and Perrine

Would absolutely recomment this beautiful apartment to anyone stayin in NYC. It was perfect. We both enjoyed the stay and would definitely consider staying here again if we come back to NYC. Ella was so helpful and even went out of her way to show us around a few blocks and to a lovely park nearby. Also went and bought us bread and milk which was very thoughtful we must say! The apartment had everything from cereal to all cutlery aswel as shampoos and plenty of clean towels.

If you like to sleep without noises, lights, traffic sounds o parties near by, this is the best option if your are planning to spend some days in New York City, Manhattan. 

We arrived and there was food in the refrigerator that saved our life when we arrived at 2am after a long flight from Mexico, migration line and transportation from de airport. 

The space is really confortable and perfect to relax after a long day in the city. Near by the house is a pharmacy, a lot of good food places, the rail train that takes you to the ferry and than to the city. Plus a lot of buses to go to Manhattan. 

It is not so close to the city but the transportation is really safe and enjoyable. Plus, it's the perfect place if you are looking for a different kind of trip, one a bit more adventurous and free, not like checking in a hotel in Times Square, but really knowing you will be getting the rest you need to enjoy your vacation.

Ella and the family were awesome hosts and made us feel at home. 
We are so happy that we found this place, I totally recommend.

The apartment on Staten Island couldn't be nicer and the hosts are lovely too. The apartment is just as described with toiletries in the bathroom and bread, ham, preserves, water and butter in the fridge plus tea, coffee and milk. There is a fan and air conditioning in the bedroom and it's a very comfortable queen size bed. The apartment is immaculate and fresh. The hosts also have two adorable Pomeranian that my son loved and played with, which made us feel relaxed and at home.
A wonderful stay, thank you Ella, Michelle and Veronika xxx

Этот отдых для нас был самым лучшем в нашей жизни!!! Спасибо  огромное Элле,Мишель,Веронике и Виктору, это самые добрые и отзывчивые люди!!!!  Их прекрасные питомцы Лола и Микко !!! Они создали тепло и уют! В апартаментах есть все что нужно- от дизайна до техники , есть русское телевидение !!! Совсем не сложно добираться до Манхэттена! В округ все в шаговой доступности- магазины и рестораны!!! Так что если ещё кто-то раздумывает ехать или нет,то зря теряет время, ехать однозначно , лучше места нет на свете!!!! Ещё раз спасибо огромное за отдых!!!

Could not have hoped for a better first experience with Airbnb!
We received such a warm welcome from Michella, always ready to help, giving advices, and even offering snacks. Moreover, the flat was very clean and comfy, we really enjoyed our stay at her place and would happily consider coming back next time we'll be visiting the Big Apple - hopefully soon ;)

We loved staying in your beautiful appartment  it was clean and comfortable.
A great place to stay. You were very friendly en helpful, we want to thank you for that. 
You are a great host. We have had a wonderful time in New York.

This little apartment in Staten Island is great. Located walking distance to the buses and trains which in turn get you into Manhattan, from there the subway can get you the rest of the way if you wish to go further. Ella and her family were so welcoming. Ella went out of her way to show us around locally and point out the train station, bus stop and shops. We highly recommend, great location, great value, great hosts. Thanks again :)
This was my first Airbnb experience and I could not have been happier. Ella’s place was extremely clean and comfortable. She was very helpful and pleasant to deal with. 5 star host all the way!

Appartement très agréable, au calme, très bien équipé. Propreté irréprochable. 
Accueil très chaleureux de notre hôte, très attentionné. On recommande sans hésiter.
L'accueil était vraiment superbe, l'appartement était propre, confortable, dans un quartier tranquille. Vraiment très au-dessus de nos attentes!

Ella's home was perfect for my trip. The place was clean, quiet, and cozy with many amenities I needed. Ella and her mother always got back to me quickly when I was in need of anything. There is a CVS located very close and several resteraunts and delis/bakeries  also within walking distance. If I ever come back to Great Kills I would stay in Ellas home again.

Ella and Victor were the most gracious hosts. Their cozy place was exactly what we needed for our trip. It is very clean and all the thoughtful extras were appreciated. Perfect place for 2. We will stay again when in town!

Ella was a great host ..I had a lovely time everything was nice & clean.Ella was very polite & welcoming I came a stranger & believe I departed with knowing a friend ..The place was nice & clean I loved the attention to detail ..She made my daughters feel very special & they loved every bit of attention from her dogs. I would definitely stay here again when I visit..Ella was also accommodating considering last minute I brought both my young daughters instead of one; she also made sure I knew how to get around town & even offered to help with obtaining metro cards for us ..In all I enjoyed the apartment , the area & the host it was all perfect for A holiday get away

Michella is a great host. She goes over and above to make your stay good. Lovely apartment.  We would book here again and tell our friends. Although the apartment is a little away from the Staten Island Ferry it gives you time to relax away from the busy city. Transport is good and cheap or free .

What was special about this apartment? EVERYTHING! 
Ella and Victor are beautiful hosts - very considerate and caring. The apartment is stylish, clean and comfortable. The location, though away from Manhattan, is a haven to come home to at the end of the day.
There are foods in the fridge for breakfast, milk for the morning or evening cuppa, little treats in the cupboard - my list could go on but I think you get the general idea.
Would I recommend this haven to others? Yes! Will I be back? Yes, I hope so. If Lady Luck brings us back to New York - most definitely!

We loved our stay! The apartment was beautifully decorated and spotless. The refrigerator and kitchen were already stocked with all of the essentials!! The host was excellent, she even gave us a ride to the train station on our last day!

Hi Michella und Ella, uns hat der Aufenthalt sehr sehr gut gefallen. Ihr seid soooo liebe freundliche Menschen. :) tolle saubere Unterkunft. Die Unterkunft würden wir immer wieder buchen. Die ganze Familie ist super lieb und wir wurden sehr herzlich aufgenommen. Man hat sich gleich wie zuhause gefühlt. Wir vermissen euch jetzt schon :) 
Liebe Grüße Angela und Nicole ❤️
Absolutely beautiful!

Checkin was easy and the place was beautiful. There was an unavoidable issue with flooding of the apartment but Ella and Victor were phenomenal hosts. Despite having to move to another room on my last night, the whole experience was great.

Worst rental i have ever had.. barking dogs upstairs at night.. host harassed fiancé several times and told her she was watching cameras to see when she came and left the residence and was approached more than once and had to dispute charges and book a hotel for fiance.. NEVER BOOK WITH HER!!!

This is the perfect (Website hidden by Airbnb) was immaculate. The decor is modern and bright.  This was our first trip to the NY area and our first experience with an airbnb--It couldnt have been a better trip.  Ella is a special lady--it was my daughters birthday and she was welcomed with a beautiful rose and balloon.  If you are considering this property--there is NOTHING to consider!!!! We cannot wait to return.
Good access to public transportation, really nice grocery stores in the vicinity. The host was fantastic and helpful with any question that we had.

Ella and Victor are so lovely, and helpful they take care of you and make you feel at home. 
Their home is in a nice quiet area, that is right off a main road leading you everywhere, great bus routes to the city. 
The place was clean and stylish. Would definitely recommend.

Thank you so much. 
Five star stay!
Ella is an amazing host with a beautiful place, she truly went above and beyond my expectations and made my experience 100% better. If i ever happen to visit NY again I would love to stay at Ella’s.

Ella and viktor is very lovely 
Is great place The neighborhood is great everything is close, there is parking, and very comfortable
The house is very clean and tidy
Ella and Victor are amazing people 
We really enjoyed staying at her house

einen besseren Aufenthalt hätte man sich nicht wünschen können. die Wohnung ist Top. mega sauber. man fühlt sich direkt wie zu Hause. die Kommunikation hat vor der Anreise bereits super geklappt und vor Ort noch besser. sehr nette Leute und mega hilfsbereit. wir hoffen der Kontakt bleibt bestehen. vielen Dank noch mal für alles.
Great place and hospitality. The location was perfect!

This was the cleanest Airbnb i've ever seen. Ella and her husband were so helpful (so we found the best supermarket on staten island; (thank you! :-). They offered us watermelon on a hot day. ...nice conversations and funny dogs. Me and my family would stay there again.
A wonderful place, extremely clean and very welcoming host! I highly recommend!

Die Unterkunft war super. Sehr sauber, schön eingerichtet und es ist alles vorhanden was man in einer normalen Wohnung findet (incl. Duschbad ect., sollte man doch mal etwas vergessen). 
Manhattan kann man sehr gut mit dem Bus oder per Bahn (SIR) und Staten Ferry erreichen. Beides fährt halbstündlich. Dafür sollte man insgesamt eine gute Stunde einplanen.
Ella war super nett und sehr, sehr hilfsbereit. Es blieb kein Wunsch offen. 
Sehr praktisch war, dass gleich an der Wohnung ein CVS ist. Dort kann man alles für ein tolles Frühstück einkaufen. Danke liebe Ella für die tolle Zeit.
Amazing hospitality, invited us to her family BBQ the first night we got there, drove us to the train station if we needed etc. Truly an amazing host
Our stay here was great! We loved the modern space. It was clean and relaxing and the host was very welcoming and helpful. Would definitely stay here again!

Overall 10/10 experience, will stay here again the next time I visit NYC.

The apartment is clean, modern, and in a safe area. The hosts are very kind and helpful! 

The location is on Staten Island, about a 2 minute walk to bus stops leading to Manhattan/other parts of NYC, and about a 15 minute walk to the Staten Island Railway, which leads directly to a free 24/7 ferry between Staten and Manhattan. mass transit is much cheaper than taxis/ubers, so be sure to get a Metrocard for your trip. look into the price of a 7 day unlimited bus+subway pass, it is most likely the best option if you plan on taking the bus/train more than once a day.

The place is clean, comfortable, and fairly convenient. You do have to take a ~40 minute bus ride or a hour long rail+ferry ride to get to Manhattan, but I happily sat through the commute knowing that I saved a good chunk of money staying here, and that I was staying in comfort.

This was my first time using Airbnb and I am so happy with my stay at Ella’s. The apartment was clean and very modern. It felt like home which was great because sometimes I get home sick! Lol. Ella was very fast at responding to us when we had questions and she had awesome tips on places to go and how to get to the city. She was super sweet as well. When we come back to New York we will definitely be staying here again. Thank you again Ella!
Completamente recomendable! Lo paseos en Ferry, la vista, la seguridad y la comodidad son cosas que se valoran.

Впервые путешествовали в Америку и это был наипрекраснейший медовый месяц для нас без капли преувеличения. Хозяева отличные, отзывчивые и прекрасные люди! Всегда помогут и подскажут, если есть какие-то вопросы. Сами апартаменты отличные! Очень чисто, современный дизайн, даже все необходимые продукты были для завтраков! Для тех, кто очень сильно уделяет внимание удобству сна - матрас отличный и очень удобный, подушки имеются разной мягкости и величины (для вас точно найдётся из них самая удобная). Месторасположение - очень удобное. Рядом есть всё! В шаговой доступности автобус, поезд (чтоб добраться до Ferry до Манхеттена), магазины, рестораны, бары. Если кому-то приглянулись эти апартаменты - даже не раздумывайте! Смело едьте именно сюда! Были очень рады познакомиться с хозяевами! Впечатления от всего остались только самые лучшие! Спасибо большое!

Die Unterkunft ist top ausgestattet, es fehlt an nichts. In der Küche war auch alles vorhanden, was man zum Kochen und Frühstücken benötigt, inkl. Kaffee, Tee, Cornflakes, Chips etc. Der Kühlschrank war bei unserer Ankunft für das Frühstück gefüllt mit leckeren Sachen. Wir brauchten uns die erste Zeit nicht um einen Einkauf bemühen. Zudem befindet sich ein Supermarkt gleich in der Nähe. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Gastgeber sind super freundlich und hilfsbereit und geben gerne Tipps für Ausflüge. Das Auto kann man auch direkt in der Straße parken. Zu Fuß sind es ca. 10-15 Minuten zur Bahnstation wo der Zug zur Fähre nach Manhattan fährt. Der Zug ist bis zur Fähre umsonst. Dort muss man dann mit der Metrokarte in die Fähre einchecken. Bei uns hat die einfache Fahrt 2,75 Dollar gekostet. Dafür ist dann die nächste Fahrt mit der U-Bahn kostenfrei. Wir sind gerne mit dem Zug+Fähre gefahren und fanden es schön noch etwas von der Gegend zu sehen. Wir können die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen!

It was clean, plenty linens, she ad goodie like snacks, milk in the fridge, eggs, multi grain bread, cream cheese, coffee, tea, of course we eaten-out every night, a very good heater, it was nice and toasty specially for us coming from Florida. 
We will go back.

hay varios puntos a favor

1. limpieza, organización y elegante.

lo que no me agradó

1. La anfitriona se entró en el apartamento sin permiso y mi esposo y yo estábamos desnudos.  sólo para preguntar si deseábamos lavar ropa. entiendo que no fue la mejor manera aunque se disculpó pero luego no me sentía segura durante la estadía.
Oustanding hospitality and care. Beautiful family, great place to stay, perfect through and through!
Great space. Everything was as expected and Michelle was lovely to deal with. Very comfortable suite.
Always a pleasure staying here!

If you’re anything like me, you’ve gotten as far as reading this because you were drawn by how vibrant this location is. After spending 3 nights i can confidently tell you this apartment is full of character, depth, complexity and fun. It was as if I was living inside an oil painting. Every room felt like it had something refreshingly different to offer. I couldn’t help but appreciate the degree of comfort and creativity this place offered me as a guest.

Communication: 5/5
From basic inquiries on the AirBNB platform to the exchanges we had via texts. Responses were immediate.

Amenities: 5/5
There was nothing additional I could’ve thought to ask for outside what was already listed. Everything/Anything else was a pleasant surprise. 

Cleanliness: 5/5
No complaints. Not one. Because the designs, colors, shapes, etc. cause you to take in the atmosphere it’s quite easy to see if there were areas of concern. I couldn’t find one.

Location: 5/5
Dependent on what you’re looking for or where you’re trying to go, this may vary. For my girlfriend and I, It was perfect. Restaurants are in walking distance. Ubereats is always an option. CVS is literally a min away. It was ideal.

Host: I love Ella. 10/10
Be it today’s social climate where people’s sentiment toward one another appear to be easily swayed because of political views, sexual orientation, etc. or the simple fact that you never know who you’ll meet or how they’ll treat you. As a black couple, we couldn’t help but feel like Ella was an extension of our own family. She’s very charming.

Everything you see will make sense once you met the host… 
She’s a warm, beautiful soul. 
No need to hesitate.

Hands down the best Airbnb experience I’ve had to date. The apartment is clean and comfortable and had been decorated for the holidays. The neighborhood is quiet and safe but a short walk to stores and restaurants.  And Ella was the nicest host. She brought me honey and cough drops when I got sick, checked in on me regularly and even brought Christmas gifts for my daughter. My only complaint is that their place is so popular you have to book so far in advance. But the popularity is well earned. We will definitely be back!

I got to say, this AirBnB is excellent; clean, great smell, confortable, great decorations, nice space. It has absolutely everything you need. Really close to the subway, the transportation is extremely easy to go to the city. This was a unique experience, wish that we could have stayed more time in there. 

Thanks Ella, for always being there and do your best for us to have a confortable stay. Veronika, thanks for all your recommendations. Tom and Michelle, thanks for being so kind to us at the moment that we needed. They all make you feel like friends.

Hope to be back, and it was great to meet you all.

XOXO,

Abby and Mylon

name: oporto river view apartments
summary: O meu espaço é bom para casais e viajantes de negócios.
description: O meu espaço é bom para casais e viajantes de negócios.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

name: Bondi Beach Spacious Studio With Ocean View
summary: Embracing the idyllic oceanfront lifestyle in a superb location.  This stunning oversized 40 sq metre studio features sun-drenched open-plan living space with beautiful partial ocean and beach views. Enjoy the relaxing sound of the waves and watch the amazing sunrise from the apartment.
space: The apartment set back from the road on the eastern side of the landmark Bondi Pacific Tower, the studio captures superb partial views over the beach and ocean, and features convenient dual access with an alternative entry via Notts Avenue to the beach, to Famous Iceberg Pool, Iceberg Restaurant/Bar and the equally Famous Bondi to Coogee coastal walk. The building enviably positioned on the southern end of the golden stretch of Bondi Beach, it is just a leisurely stroll to the popular cosmopolitan strip of local shops, trendy restaurants, cafes. CBD bus transport almost at your door, buses running regularly to Bondi Junction train station, to City Circular Quay, to the Opera House. You can take the Ferry from Circular Quay around beautiful Sydney Harbour. The Features: • 1 x Bedroom • 1 x Bathroom • 1 min to Bondi Beach • Beautiful partial ocean and beach views  • Right next to Bondi famous  Iceberg pool, Iceberg Restaurant/Bar    Right next to famous Bondi Coogee coastal walk • Smart
description: Embracing the idyllic oceanfront lifestyle in a superb location.  This stunning oversized 40 sq metre studio features sun-drenched open-plan living space with beautiful partial ocean and beach views. Enjoy the relaxing sound of the waves and watch the amazing sunrise from the apartment. The apartment set back from the road on the eastern side of the landmark Bondi Pacific Tower, the studio captures superb partial views over the beach and ocean, and features convenient dual access with an alternative entry via Notts Avenue to the beach, to Famous Iceberg Pool, Iceberg Restaurant/Bar and the equally Famous Bondi to Coogee coastal walk. The building enviably positioned on the southern end of the golden stretch of Bondi Beach, it is just a leisurely stroll to the popular cosmopolitan strip of local shops, trendy restaurants, cafes. CBD bus transport almost at your door, buses running regularly to Bondi Junction train station, to City Circular Quay, to the Opera House. You can take the Ferr
neighborhood_overview: Worldly famous Bondi Beach offers a great choice of Hipsters cafes and restaurants, trendy boutiques and a super cool Sunday market. Walk down Campbell Parade to immerse yourself in the Bondi bubble. Get a take away coffee across the road at Bondi Massive, breakfast with a view at Trio Cafe, a healthy Middle Eastern pita bread for lunch at Sababbah and some tasty Asian Fusion tapas at China Diner (or an awesome homemade pasta at A Tavola). Finish up with an amazing 'Specials board' gelato at Messina or.. if you are young, free and fabulous, or want to mingle with the locals, grab a drink at Bondi Hardware or Cafe Bikini.
notes: Please get in touch in advance if you wish to book 1 security undercover parking space. due to availability. It costs an extra $25/day.
transit: Bus stop is located directly to the front right of the building. Jump on the 333, 380 or 381 to get to Westfield's Bondi Junction where you can find all the exclusive shops or Bondi Junction Train Station. The 333, 380 bus takes you to the City all the way to Circular Quay to the Opera House approximately 30-40 minutes  From Circular Quay you can catch the Ferry to Mosman, Balmoral Beach, Manly, Birkenhead Point  Sydney's largest outlet centre
access: Entire Apartment Common Internal Laundry Common Rooftop Terrace with spectacular Ocean and Beach view  WE PROVIDE Fresh quality bed linen, bath towels, hand towels, face wash towel and bath mat   Beach towels, 2  folding beach chair, and beach umbrella  We also provide Nescafe, selection of Teas, sugar, milk, biscuit, instant porridge, extra virgin olive oil, salt pepper, selection of spices Cleaning products, washing powder, fabric softener  Bathroom essentials including shampoo, conditioner, body wash, soap, body lotion, sunscreen, toilet paper, hair dryer
interaction: We will check you in and will be just a phone call away to help with anything you need throughout your stay. :)
house_rules: - No noise after 10pm. - No parties. - Small pets considered upon request.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I am a ex-Hospitality professional who now works in Real Estate. l love travel, movies, decoration and renovation. I recently started my Airbnb journey and stayed in some lovely homes in Europe. Had an amazing experience in Trieste and Budapest. I look forward to meeting guests from all over the world in Bondi Beach where I have a lovely holiday studio with amazing views.

reviews.comments: Great location, beautiful view.  A cozy place for a romantic getaway.

Excellent location, clean and fresh little studio apartment- perfect for a 1 or 2 person getaway. Had everything we needed. Anita was a great host and greeted me on arrival. 
Building currently under renovation- while there was scaffolding- it didn't block the view and lovely light in the apartment.

Amazing view, location & setup!

Perfect little beach getaway & so close to Bondi beach & restaurants. 
Would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Anita was an absolutely wonderful host, and her place is simply beautiful. She has really put some thought into making the place special for her Airbnb guests. Every day I was just delighted to wake up to the cool summer breeze and gorgeous ocean view. You can see a good part of the ocean straight out the window, and it's really nice to see the sun, surf, swimmers and surfers out there having fun. Icebergs is just a couple of steps away and there is the stunning Bondi to Bronte right outside. It would also be a good writers retreat - I finished a first draft of my PhD dissertation here! The apartment has everything you need for a perfect holiday, and lots of thoughtful little touches everywhere. This is absolutely up there with the best Airbnb experience I've ever had. I would recommend it to everyone. I will be coming back as soon as I can!
Clean studio with amazing view to Bondi beach.

Perfect place with stunning views. Lovely waking up to the waves every morning.
Will be back.

I had a great stay at Anita's flat. It was fully equipped and clean, even the shampoo and conditioner were provided in good quantities!  The location is perfect, the bus to the city stops right in front the building and its easy to walk everywhere in Bondi from here. 
Last but not least, Anita  remained available each time I needed it.

Anita's house is perfect for a lovely getaway at Bondi Beach.  It is opposite the beach with direct access to Icebergs and all that Bondi has to offer.  Quick walk to a local off leash dog park too!  The beach, bars and restaurants are all on your doorstep and the bus stops right out front!  Cannot be beaten for the location!  The place itself is a studio and perfect for a couple.  It is clean and very comfortable with a view of the ocean!  Perfect! Highly recommend!!!
Anita is great host. The building is under refurbishment so there is a lot of noise and ugly scaffolding infront of window so you won't get sea views.
Great location and Anita provides a well accommodated apartment with the little extras that were appreciated.
The apartment is situated in a great spot in the heart of Bondi. Anita was incredibly helpful and so accommodating throughout our stay.

Bondi Beach is must!! Anita's apartment is within a 2 minute walk distance to the beach. You can walk to all restaurants, bars and market. The train and bus to the apartment is very easy. The bus drops and picks up right in front of the apartment. The apartment is so cute we loved our stay!!

Anita's appartment is very clean, very well furnished with the eye for detail and peaceful. The partial view on bondi beach is a bit disappointing but since everything else is almost perfect, this view is definitively secondary. Would warmly recommend Anita's appartment

Great place to spend your vacations at Sydney!... even though is not close to the city center it has an excellent location, the bus stop is right outside the apartment and you can easily go to the downtown using the public transportation (very efficient by the way). You can enjoy amazing views of Bondi Beach which is just a block away and do some surfing while you are there... I highly recommend Anita and this beautiful and cozy apartment for your next holiday at Sydney :)
It's beautiful and comfortable, the location is suitable close to all the restaurants and shops

AMAZING, couldn't ask for a better place
1min from beach
Amazing view
Super sleek studio
Great kitchen & cooking facilities
Nice living area to hangout 
Extremely clean
Lovely toiletries (shampoo etc)
Secure parking
Great communication
Easy 24hr access & checkin 
Would recommend staying & I will definitely age my stay here again!
Thanks so much Anita, great apartment
Anita's place was great for a short business stay. Would absolutely book again.
Anita is an amazing, lovely host - very thoughtful and incredibly sweet! The apartment is immaculate with plenty of amenities. Great stay! Thanks Anita, hope to see you again soon.
Anita is a lovely person. The apartment is very homely.
Awesome location, 1 min walk to bondi and great restaurants! Best view of Bondi too

Highly recommend this unit!  GREAT location with amazing views of the beach!! Super close to the coastal walk which I highly recommend you do while staying here! Anita was a great host.  She met me prior to my check in time and allowed me to leave my luggage at the apartment while it was being cleaned.  She also allowed me to check in early after the unit was ready!  She walked me around the entire complex to show me all the amenities and how to navigate the area.   The unit was in great condition and was very well decorated.  I enjoyed waking up each morning to the lovely  view of the beach and ocean right from the bed. On my last day, Anita offered a late check out as the cleaning service was running behind which was greatly appreciated! Anita has great communication with her guests which was very helpful during my stay! Overall,  Anita is a really amazing host who was super accommodating!! Definitely don't miss out on this unit!

Anita’s place is exactly as the photos!! It is cute, stylish and a great space to relax in. The best part is you can look at the views of bondi from bed!! Anita went over and beyond with little finishing touches that we really appreciated. 
We would definitely stay again :)

Tout était parfait !

Si vous cherchez un super spot pour rester à Bondi, ne cherchez pas d'avantage, ici c'est le top.

Die Unterkunft war perfekt. Die Lage unschlagbar und wir hatten nicht mit so einer Ausstattung gerechnet. Deshalb haben wir einige Dinge mitgebracht, die wir aber nicht (Website hidden by Airbnb) war wirklich Alles da. Anita war die perfekte Gastgeberin, die sogar den Kuehlschrank etwas gefuellt hatte, da wir zu den Feiertagen ankamen. Es war sogar frisches Brot da. Den wagen konnten wir bequem unten in der Garage abstellen und mussten nur mit dem Aufzug in unsere Etage fahren. Die Aussicht vom Bett war ein Traum. Alles war sehr sauber und geschmackvoll modern eingerichtet. Das WLAN hat perfekt funktioniert und war schnell genug sogar fuer grosse Dateien. Wir kommen gerne bald wieder. Danke Anita.

Highly recommend, best place we’ve ever stayed! Perfect above and beyond in every way! Bed is sooo comfortable and quality bedding and towels are gorgeous. The view of Bondi Beach is terrific the bus stop is right outside with buses to Bondi Junction, Sydney, Watson’s Bay etc. What an absolutely amazing place the accommodation is immaculate a great layout and size, provision of absolutely EVERYTHING from WIFI, cotton buds, olive oil, milk to such perfect products, a seperate laundry room and even a lift to the car park for a short cut to walk to Tamarama beach (you must!) what an amazing location, we were so very sad to leave! Thank you!

A clean, cosy and stylish apartment, in an unbelievably good location - the perfect bondi stay. Anita is a great host, she is very accommodating in terms of checking in and out and gave us lots of really helpful tips about bondi and Sydney, as well as being very thoughtful and hospitable. Thanks again for everything!
Anita’s communication throughout the whole process was great. The place is also fantastic, we had a very enjoyable stay.

Beautiful studio nestled in the hills of famous Bondi Beach.. need I say more?

This is the perfect spot for a couple looking to get away yet still in the best location. The apartment has everything you need to live comfortably. It's clean, stylish with tasteful styling/furnishes, and has inspiring views. You'll be close to dozens of cafe's restaurants, shops, bars, and the beach. I was particularly taken back by the quality and quality of restaurants, the food here is amazing and the coffee is unbeatable.

Communication by the host is was great, check-in/out was a breeze with the host giving a personalized walk through of the location and amenities. I was even offering a late check-out without asking.

It's easy to say that I will be looking forward to staying here again in the near future. Enjoy!

Anita and her beautiful place at Bondi Beach were above and beyond what I was expecting.  She had lots of thoughtful touches in the apartment and was kept sparkling clean.  Anita was helpful on local attractions and the transit system and responded to any inquiries almost instantly.  WHAT A WONDERFUL PLACE TO STAY IN BONDI.  I will be back!!

We had a wonderful time in Bondi Beach at Anita’s apartment. It’s stylish with nice, small touches like coffee and everything you need. The location can’t be beat with amazing views of the beach. If you’re contemplating Bondi, look no further. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Great place, highly recommend

Great host! Place was very clean and perfect location for catching bus into Sydney which we did often.  And of course it was great to have a view and beautiful breezes. Grateful for the tips on eateries and Anita's quick responses.  Lovely stay!  Highly recommend.
Good location in Bondi. Right across the street from iceberg restaurant and spa. Convenient, clean and comfortable.

Anita was a great host and her place was very stylish and located right next to the beach and the bus stop with a beautiful view of Bondi Beach, and also with plenty of space - perfect for a couple. Anita was extremely thoughtful and even put some food in the fridge for us as we were arriving too late to make it out to eat or shopping. Thanks again!!

Anita was lovely and she really made every effort to provide everything and anything I needed for my stay. The place was lovely and the location was excellent! Maybe could have done with some blackout blinds but it was lovely to hear the sea every morning! Thanks Anita- great place xxx

Fantastic location with beautiful views. Beach and bars a short walk away and a bus stop right outside. The studio is clean and well equipped for all your needs and Anita was a perfect host. We look forward to staying a third time.
Loved this place. Very clean, fantastic view and as close to the beach as you can get!

Location and view can't be beat. It's across the street from Bondi beach, right next to all the restaurants and bars you could want. The view from the flat is amazing, and you can watch the sunrise from the unit. Despite being a studio, the flat felt much bigger. Check-in was easy, and it had everything you need for a great trip. Would love to stay here again!
The best location for morning ocean swims and the best hole-in-the-wall local coffee shop directory across the road. Clean, tidy, don’t expect fast internet but be wowed by the Bondi beach views.

Beautiful beachside studio with gorgeous views of Bondi beach.  Steps from icebergs, restaurants, bars, and waves!  Couldn’t have asked for a better stay and would definitely recommend it! Lots of thoughtful little touches by the host, including sunscreen and aloe for those who want to spend a lot of time at the beach!
Just be a where it will take you about 1 hr on the bus to get in to the Sydney Opera House
Fantastic host and apartment. Perfect location, easy walking to pretty much everything Bondi has to offer.
View of the beach. Right across from Icebergs. Sytlish. Clean. Well-priced. And a wonderful host with Anita. One of my favorite stays in Bondi. Planning to stay here again.

Anita was thoughtful and thorough during check-in to ensure I had everything I needed. The view is spectacular! I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to enjoy Bondi and everything it has to offer.

Whilst the flat is even more amazing than the photos portray, it was Anita's welcome, hospitality and attention to detail that really made my stay in Bondi exceptional. I would recommend to all my friends, there is literally everything you would ever need. And the view of the sea is outstanding.

The apartment is GREAT. It’s in a wonderful location, has an incredible view and is very cozy and inviting! It offers (Hidden by Airbnb) Chromecast, which is a nice feature. Public transportation is literally right outside the door. There a lots of eateries nearby and a coffee stand just across the street, along with a convenience store and pharmacy. The host, Anita, is awesome!! She is so nice and accommodating. She gave me lots of helpful tips and suggestions of places to go and how to get there, and she really thinks about the guests and their needs. I really enjoyed everything about my stay.

Best location in Bondi. Everything absolutely perfect so beautifully clean and beautifully appointed I really very am grateful to have stayed at Anita's place. She is an extremely courteous and hospital host. Highly recommended.
Great location, stunning views, lovely ambience and amenity.

Spectacular view of sunrise.......
Our stay in this Bondi apartment was just perfect. The location, the amenities, the attention to detail, how spotless it was and waking up to the amazing view every morning.....wow! This apartment certainly does not disappoint. We cannot wait to be back in Bondi & in this apartment. Thank you Anita for your hospitality. You were such a pleasure to deal with.

Our stay in Anita’s place was the highlight of our trip in Bondi. We were immediately taken away by Anita’s incredible hospitality and generous assistance getting us acquainted with the place as well as the local surroundings. 

We were instantly amazed by the ocean views seen from the kitchen window. Many of our mornings were spent waking to watch the sunrise over breakfast. The building is just a staircase away from the sand, couldn’t be more convenient. 

Our stay was made much more enjoyable having this place to call “home” during our time in Bondi, would highly recommend to anyone visiting Bondi!
Five star host offering a great apartment with amazing views. Thank you Anita!

Anita’s place is amazing. You have a great view of the beach and the sunrise from her view is to die for. Anita’s nice enough to walk you through and kind of break things down for you. What convenient stores are cheaper rather then you just walk into any store and spend a lot of money. If it’s your first time which it was for me. She is kind enough to give you a list of things you can check out while you are there staying at Bondi or Sydney in general. Overall you won’t be regretting anything staying at this location.
This is a terrific studio - clean, bright, well appointed and in in a wonderful location on Bondi Beach. Book now!

We could not have wanted anything more. The booking process and instructions were clear and any questions quickly answered from the start. The apartment is in an unbeatable location with views of Bondi Beach and an easy walk to everything. The apartment was spotlessly clean, modern, impeccably and tastefully presented and every possible amenity considered and provided. Anita was a pleasure to deal with and so accommodating to allow us to bring our dog. Honestly this has been the best air bnb experience we have ever had. Value for money in a prime location where we could bring both dog and a car made the trip a big highlight. Thanks Anita!
Anita’s place is fantastic and she puts so much attention to detail in everything! I look forward to returning again someday!
Very cute home to stay in, sparkling clean and a view that takes your breath away!
This place is great. The location is perfect and the views are incredible. Very cozy for a single traveler or a couple. I would definitely return again.

Anitas place was exceptional! Location was perfect and Anita's Hospitality and attention to detail was the best I have experienced so far using air bnb and I will definitely be booking this place again in a few months time. Anita showed me all around the local area to help me adjust to the area and helped me with any requests. this experience was 10/10 


Thank You Anita
Anita’s apartment was the perfect place to stay for a weekend in Bondi! Will definitely stay there again.

This is such a special place to stay!  Anita is beyond wonderful and was the perfect host for the perfect apartment in the perfect location.  Just beautiful.  We would return in a heart beat and will be making this gorgeous abode our second home next time we return to Sydney.  We love you Anita!

Anita’s beautiful apartment is perfect place to stay in Bondi. Location is perfect,  the apartment was spotless and everything was catered for. I can’t fault it. Anita communicates everything very clearly and it makes it so so easy.
A clean, smart and spacious apartment with view of the beach... watched the moon and sun rise from the bed! One minute to the bus stop and 4 minutes to the beach. Couldn’t have asked for more.

Anita is a lovely person.  She was very accommodating with check in and check out.  It's quite a challenge with long overseas flights that do not necessarily land or depart at convenient times.  Anita was quick to respond, very helpful in showing me around the neighborhood. The place is sparkling clean and has a brilliant view of the beach. Very comfortable and spacious study in an iconic location.  And a thoughtful host who will help you with anything you need!

Anita’s apartment is extremely tidy, it’s sparkling. I booked the apartment for my aunt and her son, they just love the sea view in the apartment. Anita is very nice and thoughtful, she shown us the facility of the room, given suggestions of good place nearby when we checked in, and prepared milk, cereal and biscuits for the guests. Thank you Anita! Definitely would come back again and highly recommended.

Excellent location right above icebergs and walking distance to everything in Bondi.  Good views, super clean with lots of little extras, quiet and comfortable. Anita is quick to respond to all communications. Wifi and Netflix available also.

I booked this apartment for my father when he came to visit, he had a great stay! The location is amazing! It is about as close as you can  get to the beach and Icebergs pool. Great cafe and a convince store right across the road, bus stop to the city right out front, and only minutes to the main shops/cafes of Bondi. Beautiful view too! The whole apartment was spotless and the bathtub was brand new. Anita is helpful and super fast with communication. She has stocked the apartment with tons of amenities from an umbrella, to a beach chair, to sunscreen to a sewing kit, she really has tried to think of everything you need. I highly recommend staying here!

Your hospitality to me and my wife make our stay in Australia something special to remember. We have stayed in everything from private island villas to 5 star Sydney hotels while in Australia and your apartment was our best pick by fare. (AC would have been nice, but who cares) We could not have asked for more from you or the accommodations. When we return to Bondi and we will! We will defiantly be staying with you again! 

If you stay will Anita you will not be disappointed, you will feel like a Rock Star!!!
I can't recommend Anita's studio enough. Perfect location, perfect host, perfect extra touches.
Great location and view.
Anita bent over backwards so that we could have an awesome stay, she was so helpful and welcoming in every possible way! Thank you!
Amazing location just above the icebergers - 2 minute walk to the pool and beach .  Views out over Bondi beach . Clean and nice apartment in an older style block .

Anita is a great host. Very friendly and welcoming and provided great recommendations. The apartment is beautiful and clean with toiletries provided. Right on Bondi Beach and surrounded by tons of shops.
Awesome little studio unit; location is terrific; sweet interior homely finishes; superb attention to detail; all topped by a very kind and thoughtful host. Will definitely come back

Anita was the best host we have experienced and the apartment is so incredibly ideal we'll be coming back many times each year. We cannot sing Anita's praises high enough. The location, space and cleanliness rivals 5 star hotels. Fantastic.

This  place is absolutely stunning.  Anita was such a brilliant host. She greeted me and gave me a tour around the apartment and building facilities which made me comfortable staying here. The apartment was very clean and has amazing views of the beach. Recommend this property for anyone wanting to be closer to the beach be it a holiday or even a staycation!

Anita, your hospitality and your apartment were beyond our expectations of what an Airbnb could be. Every day, we discovered new things tucked away in drawers that made our stay so easy and feel like a home away from home. Whether it was fresh water in the fridge when we arrived or the sun screen, goggles, moisturiser, short bread cookies, olive oil, instant cappuccino (and the list goes on...), we had more than we needed. 

Not to mention the view and the light. I'm not sure we can stay anywhere else in Bondi without thinking of your home. Thank you again for your warmth! We look forward to staying in your apartment again -- and recommending it to our friends.
A lovely place and location. The apartment is really great with a beautiful view. Anita as a host? Can’t think about a better one. She is so thoughtful and welcoming!

Anita was at the apartment to greet us upon arrival with a very warm welcome. She has thought of every detail and has everything you need for your stay! The location is perfect! Easy transport from CBD to Bondi and right across the road from the apartment. The view across Bondi is amazing and very convenient for the coastal walks. The apartment is spotlessly clean and comfortable. Anita is helpful providing a tour of the building and also giving valuable hints and tip for great coffee and breakfasts. We loved our stay in Bondi and if back will definitely be staying at Anita’s again. Highly recommended.
Highly recommend Anita's apartment. The location is amazing and the apartment has everything you need. Anita is such a great host also. We will be back for sure.

This is a lovely studio flat.  Anita was very helpful.  We did not meet as she was off on a weekend trip as well, but that did not stop her from answering questions and being helpful.  The studio is everything that it states on the advert.  I think Anita has taken pains to show the view is partially blocked by the wall in one of the pictures.  Although the main picture in the advert must have been taken from hanging out the side window.  

If you move you bed just right - you can sit on the bed and watch the beach (or move a chair to the right spot).  It is not a vista, but you do get a view of the beach.

One thing I missed is that there is no air con.  It does not state that there is air con, but I just assumed that there would be.  There is a powerful fan that we did not have to turn on higher than the first setting.

The TV reception was really bad.  I am sure that if Anita had been around, she would have been able to sort it out.  She said that it was not a problem in the past.  At her suggestion we used the casting function to the TV.  We tried that with both our phones and laptop.  The result was a lag in the picture to the sound.  We did advise Anita that it was not a huge issue, and it wasn't.  

The studio is really close to everything and the place is cosy but not cluttered.  The location is just perfect and Anita was very helpful and accommodating.  We had a great time and unreservedly recommend this place.  Thank you Anita
This was a lovely stay; nice flat. Great view to the sea. Impeccably clean. Great hosts, juts a few minutes from Iceberg's.
Modern spacious apartment in fantastic location with very easy access to transport to and from the city. Very welcoming and accommodating host - an overall great experience!

Our stay at Anita's home was perfect. Even though you are in the heart of Bondi it was a small escape that was made even cosier by all the thoughtful touches that Anita has invested into the space. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

Five star, book this wonderful apartment with confidence. Super host (Anita) who takes great pride in the property and service that she provides.  The apartment is modern, spotlessly clean and wonderfully located - everything in Bondi is no more than a 3 minute walk away. My wife and I had 7 wonderful trouble-free nights at this property and it will be our first choice when we return.

If this Airbnb is available, YOU HAVE TO BOOK IT! There are no words to describe how beautiful and close the beach this apt is. You honestly feel like royalty when you are here. The view is breathtaking- you see Bondi Beach from your bed. At night, you hear the waves crashing against the shore. Perfect location- close to the Bondi strip where all of the cute cafes, shops, restaurants are located. (Also, there is bus stop a block from the apt so you can get to Sydney Harbor/inner city  in 20 min for $3).  Anita does an amazing job at making you feel welcome and accommodated. This Airbnb is spotless, comfortable,  and I would stay here a million more times if I could.
Anita’s place is excellent. Great location with everything you need.

Anitas place is absolutely amazing the viewer spectacular spectacular the overall feel of the place is so lovely and Anita and her staff are so friendly and helpful if I ever return this would be where I would stay 
I recommend this space to everyone
absolutely wonderful place to relax

name: Private Studio closed to town w/ compact parking
summary: -My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families 2 adults (with 1 children) . It's too small for 3 adults. -It's a private apartment with a private garage and private entrance.  -6 mins drive to Ala Moana Center, 10 mins drive to Waikiki without traffic. -Price are included with 15% tax -Parking is on the 1st floor garage (for small car only)  and the studio is on 2nd floor. -Wifi and Netflix are available.
space: Our studio has a Simmons Queen bed and a full size sofa bed which can comfortably accommodate up to 1 small children.  Mid size kitchen equipped with new refrigerator , microwave, coffee maker.The bathroom is equipped with extra toiletries and 4 sets of towels (bath, hand) , and 2 beach towels.
description: -My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families 2 adults (with 1 children) . It's too small for 3 adults. -It's a private apartment with a private garage and private entrance.  -6 mins drive to Ala Moana Center, 10 mins drive to Waikiki without traffic. -Price are included with 15% tax -Parking is on the 1st floor garage (for small car only)  and the studio is on 2nd floor. -Wifi and Netflix are available. Our studio has a Simmons Queen bed and a full size sofa bed which can comfortably accommodate up to 1 small children.  Mid size kitchen equipped with new refrigerator , microwave, coffee maker.The bathroom is equipped with extra toiletries and 4 sets of towels (bath, hand) , and 2 beach towels. We used key-less lock, you can check in anytime after 3pm. You can enjoy your trip, have fun in the beach without worry about losing your door keys, combinations of the door lock will email and text to you in a few days before you arrived I'll do my best and I am always availab
neighborhood_overview: Its located at downtown Honolulu
notes: Coin washer and dryer are available on 1st floor garage
access: We used key-less lock, you can check in anytime after 3pm. You can enjoy your trip, have fun in the beach without worry about losing your door keys, combinations of the door lock will email and text to you in a few days before you arrived
interaction: I'll do my best and I am always available when my quests have requests.
house_rules: - Check-in 3 pm - Check-out 11 am -Quiet time is between 10:00 PM and 8:30 AM

host.host_about: I have 12 years of experience in the Honolulu Real Estate, and I want to help people enjoy Hawaii.
