reviews.comments: Easy comfortable stay close to down town. We appreciated having a full kitchen with the ability to make breakfast in the mornings; a washing machine and garage.  Made everything very convenient.  Neighbors are also friendly.
Good value and convenient location.

とても綺麗でいい部屋でした!
ｷｯﾁﾝが広くて使いやすかったです｡
また泊まりたいと思いました｡
ありがとう!
Amazing location and nice place
5 star!!! We like it very much, clean, easy find, they have everything we need, we stay 16 days, I am sure we will be back!!

하와이에서 호텔을 포함해 5군데의 숙소에 머물렀었는데, 이곳은 호텔들보다 더 기억에 남는곳입니다. 와이키키 중심가에선 살짝 거리가 있지만 차로 10-15분이면 움직일수 있어서 렌트를 한다면 전혀 문제가 없습니다. 오히려 한적한 위치여서, 사람많은곳에서 쇼핑을 하거나 놀다 들어왔을때 정말 내 집에 온것같은 편안함이 들었습니다. 그리고 주차비가 비싼 하와이에서 주차를 할수있는 공간이 주어진게 가장 큰 장점이었습니다. 그리고 넓직한 부엌이 참 마음에 들었습니다. 여행내내 비싸게 사먹기만 하다가 이곳에선 마트에서 장을 봐다가, 간단한 음식들을 해먹을수 있어서 너무 좋았습니다.
(24시간 월마트와 돈키호테가 근처에 있어서 새벽에 심심하면 자주 들렸습니다. 물론 차로 이동해야하구요)  프라이빗한 우리들만의 공간, 그리고 빠른 와이파이, 저렴한 가격에 세탁기를 돌릴수있고 건조기도 있어서 물놀이를 하고와서 다음숙소로 이동할때 축축한 빨래를 가지고 갈 필요가 없어서 여러번 이용을 했습니다. 여러가지 참 좋은 기억들로 머물다 갑니다. 감사합니다.

Overall:
Kai (and Tiffany) were very helpful and detailed in their listing. Would come again if I needed a place. Kai was very helpful when little things came up (dead garage battery in remote- he texted and gave replacement right away)

Pros: 
-clean & accurate descriptions
-Super close to highway/and located within 15-45 min of all attractions of Oahu
-Nice view of downtown from windows
-Perfect for couples, family of 3 (2 adults/1 child), family of 4 (2 adults and 2 small children) - 4 adults is 'do-able' (like we experienced) but not recommended per listing
-Communication prior & during stay was amazing. Kai was super nice and detailed in his instructions.

Cons:
-small/difficult parking. One can find it difficult if you have little/no experience backing into a tight space (not an issue for us but I can imagine others would)
-can be a little noisy (if all windows are open) since its near highway. Can't hear anything with windows shut :)
-Not much access to many cooking items (not an issue unless you plan to cook a lot)

Great for small families < 4, great value for location

Not recommended for those who enjoy cooking a lot. Could be a inconvenience if your backing up driving skills are poor

Mahalo
Clean, new studio apartment. Close to the highway but with windows closed we didn't hear it. We were a family of four and stayed comfortably for three nights.

Tiffany's spot was perfect for our Hawaiian vacation. The location was central and near to everything we wanted to see and do. The place itself was loaded with all the amenities one could ask for, including free parking (hard to find). I would definitely stay here again!

Kai was a wonderful host. He communicates quickly and with great detail. The room was perfect for my wife and I to stay in. There was one snag that was not his fault. There was state construction that cut the water from the house. He was very prompt and moved us to another location upon hearing this and partially refunded us. Can't say enough with the service that Kai provided. A+!

Staying at Tiffany and Kai's worked it great for us. It was near the downtown sites we wanted to see, many walkable. Their place is cozy and modern and their communication is great. The nice A/C and new windows help keep the freeway sounds in the background so sleeping was not a problem. Early in our trip we spent five nights at the zoo end of Waikiki and then three at this location. We wish had reversed that as we got tied of the bustle, of Waikiki. We highly recommend Tiffany and Kai's when you're in Honolulu!

Tiffany and Kai were amazing hosts. They were very responsive to us. They had very detailed check in notes as well as notes about the place which was very helpful. It was also great that Kai let us know that the cleaning was finished early so we would be able to check in early. The condo was very convenient for us especially with the included parking. It was more spacious than I assumed and worked perfectly for the 2 of us.  I'd definitely recommend it and would stay again the next time we're in hawaii.

Everything was perfect. The studio is very nice, the Kitchen has everything you need. We felt safe and with our rented car, the place was ideal to get to town or the highway. The communication with Tiffany was great and fast. Im telling you, we didn't want to leave our little Hawaiian Home. We recommand it without a Doubt. 
Tout était parfait. Le studio est tres beau, la cuisine à tout ce que nous avons besoin. On se sentait en sécurité et avec notre voiture louée, l'endroit est facile d'accès pour la ville ou l'autoroute. La communication avec Tiffany était rapide et efficace. Nous ne voulions plus quitter notre demeure Hawaïenne. Je vous recommande cet endroit très fortement.
Great place to stay.
The place was exactly like the pictures. Cozy space was comfortable for two. Kitchen was adequately stocked for a home cooked meal.

Place looks exactly as it does in the pictures. Super clean and the owners are very friendly and kept in communication with us if we needed anything! It's about a 15 minute walk to downtown to catch buses. Groceries are close by as well.

I loved my stay at this location. Check in and out was very easy, the area is quite, everything I needed was here. It was worth every penny and I will stay here again. It was a comfortable size for two adults and one toddler. I highly recommend others to stay at this location.

This is a great place away from all the tourist of Waikiki. It's very central and you can travel to any part of the island.   Kai was very responsive and the listing was exactly as stated. I would stay here again. Overall, I recommend this studio to anyone needing a place to stay in Honolulu.
The description for this place is accurate and the place is good for the price. I recommend it for a short stay.

Excellent accommodations. 
I highly recommend this studio.

Kai and Tiffany really exemplify a flawless Airbnb experience. The accommodations were great, a very comfortable and private space with lots of extras like provided beach towels! The location was great for accessing the highway and getting where we needed quickly, especially as the days grew long. It became a true oasis that offered a peaceful and relaxing end to each day. We are very grateful for finding this place on here, and would recommend to anyone. Cheers!

Great place for 2 people! Equipped with everything you need including plenty of basic toiletries. Clean and new! Not a big deal for us because we are good at reversing into a garage, but that is definitely a must if you want to have a car.  However, it's a great location, very central. Overall highly recommended.
Nice unit.
Central location to downtown Honolulu and freeways.

This place is small and intimate so it is perfect for a single or two people to stay. Not sure if I would recommend beyond two people.

 Not crazy about the parking situation as the requirement regarding how to park is stated after RSVP begins.

Nevertheless, the studio is in impeccably clean and modern and has everything we needed.

Kai and Tiffany were very responsive to any inquires we had. Their place was clean and comfortable. Great for a family of 3-4 (2 adults and 2 kids). 5-7 min drive to Waikiki. Gas station is conveniently around the corner and an exit away to a grocery store. You can slightly hear the freeway only if the AC unit was off. However, it didn't not bother my family at all. We were still able to sleep comfortably. Neighbors are quiet and nice. Highly recommend this unit especially if you want to get away from the Waikiki area. I really like that the unit is gated and also has security cameras. Will be definitely be back and stay at a larger one of their units. Mahalo!

We had a great stay with a good location. Communication and instructions were clear. Quick and easy to get to Waikiki beach area, and the perfect resting place (away from the crowds) after a long day of outing. Would definitely stay again with our next visit. Thanks Kai and Tiffany!

Jared and Carol
We would definite stay again. We enjoyed our time in Oahu and all concerns were dealt with fast. Very cute condo. Easy walking to bus station.

Great place to stay for a Honolulu visit. Was here on business so the location was ideal. The unit is clean, comfortable and well-equipped. Host communication was top-notch and check-in was a breeze. Comfortable bed. Safeway, Long's Drugs and even a nice gym are all nearby. Really enjoyed the stay.
The studio is lovely, comfortable and close to downtown Honolulu. This studio is also located in a very quiet neighborhood. 100% would stay again!

A very convenient place to stay, with access to stores, gas station, and the freeway. Tiffany and Kai were very kind and responsive, although we barely needed to contact them since the room was already very well equipped. Just be sure to polish up your car park backing up skills, the parking spot is a tight squeeze, but it did fit my Hyundai Santa Fe rental!

We came to Honolulu for a wedding up at Queen Emma Summer Palace and Tiffany and Kai's place was the perfect middle point between downtown Honolulu and Pali. The room was clean, cool, functional, approximately a mile and a half walk to downtown. Tiffany and Kai were quick to respond to my messages and even helped us check in early. Thank you Tiffany and Kai for being great hosts!
Very clean unit, efficient setup. Good location away from Waikiki. Gives a different perspective to Honolulu which we appreciated. 20 minute walk to Downtown and public transport.

The studio is a perfect launching sport to and around the island.  We even took the bus to Waikiki one day.   The bus stop is right near the house. Make sure that you are a (Email hidden by Airbnb) pact car is best. The stop is tight but my boyfriend was able to handle getting the car in safely.  I would have had a hard time but was expecting it because of other reviews.   Gated and safe community.  The air conditioning is a super nice thing to come home too.  Basic kitchen utensils and comfey bed.  Thabks again!!

Hosts were very prompt in responding to messages. The place was exactly as the pictures advertised and it was spotless. Only thing that surprised us was it’s location; being from a much smaller area, we were not used to all the traffic road noise. But the place was practically 15-20 minutes from anywhere we wanted to go in Honolulu, so it worked out for us.

Tiffany/Kai were great hosts. I never met them but the communication was excellent. The space is exactly as seen in the photos description. It was very clean, spacious, and comfortable. The garage space is small and recommend parking in the garage backwards so it is easier to drive back out. The location is prime, close to everything! On a side note, if you are a light sleeper its near the highway so you can hear some noise but it's not bad at all.

The apartment was very cute! A tad too small for my 6'4" boyfriend but we made it work. There were a few hiccups but Kai was very quick to respond and remedy the situations with out burdening our trip! Plenty of room to unpack for the week and feel comfortable rather than picking our day out of suitcases. Beautiful kitchen! The garage is a pretty tight fit but nothing unmanageable. Next to the highway but you hardly hear it! And makes it easy to get to places fast. Overall, I think it was a good fit for our first AirBnB. Thank you Kai & Tiffany!
Great place, clean. Great location.

Comfortable bed, smart TV, full-size kitchen, free and secure parking, in-unit AC - who could ask for anything more? Tiffany and Kai were super responsive hosts. This unit was perfect for our 10-day getaway for two adults.

We stayed three different Airbnb places for our 8days vacation, and this is thr best place among the three because it was the cleanest!  A bit far to walk to waikiki and malls, and this could be a downside for some people if they don’t want to pay for expensive parking near waikiki. However if you plan to spend more time visiting other parts of oahu, like us, then this is the place for you.
Parking is very small at this location so renting a small vehicle is a must!!!!!!

The unit was clean and tidy and everthing we needed were there.
Full sized kitchen was perfect but it was little bit hard eating without a  table for three of us.

Unfortunately we didn't have a chance to meet with Tiffany and Kai but they were great hosts.
조리시설이 잘 갖추어진 깨끗한 집입니다. 코인세탁기 사용에 대해 빠른 피드백과 쿼터동전을 제공해준 배려에 감동했어요. 도로가 옆이라 차 다니는 소리가 잘 들리긴 하지만 시끄러울 정도는 아닙니다. 다만 차고가 좁으니 작은 차를 빌릴 필요가 있습니다. 우리만의 공간처럼 느껴지는 숙소에서 잘 지냈습니다 :)

Kai & Tiffany are ‘super’ hosts!! They were super gracious & generous with their time & ensuring that we were well looked after as first timers to Hawai’i. The studio was just right for our long-stay, walking distance to downtown Honolulu. It’s well equipped with the necessities you need. Great kitchen! And, we felt secure & safe. Highly recommend accommodation in Honolulu!

Kai and Tiffany let us check in a few hours early which was great so we could drop off our luggage. Location was great if you don't mind noise! It was right by a freeway, but with the windows closed you can hardly hear anything. The parking spot was the best, always knowing you have somewhere to park! It was small, but not hard to get into. The water pressure in the shower wasn't the strongest, as the shower was pretty small. Good location to things we did, only a short 30 min drive to the best hikes and beaches! The space is very clean and organized, and exactly like the photos. Kai and Tiffany responded very quickly to my texts and were very friendly. I would definitely reccomend staying here if you want to be out of the hustle and bustle of Honolulu and tourists, but still close to things to do!

Tiffany's place was just as pictured! She was nice enough to include lots of items for our convenience, like beach mats and extra towels! As someone who lives on a quiet city street, I did not have any problems with road noise or the air conditioner, like other reviewers mentioned. It was a great base to explore the island. We would be happy to stay again!
It was just perfect!!, beat of the best!!
房子不大在高速边上,没办法开窗户,不然会很吵,房间打扫比较干净,房东提供的咖啡很好喝,楼下的洗衣机和烘干机是投币的,晚上10点回来想换点零钱真的好麻烦｡停车位不大,老司机也不可能一次停到位｡
O apartamento é muito bom! Realmente como nas fotos, espaço bom, próximo a tudo quem está de carro. Lugar calmo, tranquilo. A cozinha ajuda muito, bem equipada. Fiquei 5 dias e recomendo.

Very comfortable and clean. Kai & Tiffany were outstanding hosts and they provided me with everything I needed; the coin operated washer & dryer in the garage, the high speed wi-fi connection, Netflix/Amazon Prime were fantastic. And this was a perfect base to explore the island as a tourist with a small rental car; the garage was too tight for the mid-full sized cars but it was FREE and big enough for my cute little Mini Roadster. FYI, you have to walk up the stairs and carry the luggages to your room. It’s no big deal as long as you’re not disabled. Not far from the highways, airport, downtown, Ala Moana Shopping Centre and Waikiki. I would stay here again given the opportunities. Two thumbs up!
My fiancé and I had a wonderful time here! Although it was small, it was perfect for the two of us to have our own, private getaway. Overall, we loved this place and would recommend to all! :)
Good place to stay

Very centrally located - important to have a small car to back into the parking space under townhouse (no street parking).  Tiffany was very responsive and  sent detailed instructions about check in, which was super helpful.  I was even able to check in early.  Even though this townhouse sits right above the busy highway, the traffic noise is minimal inside.  I loved being able to do laundry on premises.  All in all, this was a gem of a find. Only downside, there is only a fan, no air conditioning. I highly recommend this lucky find.

Great spot, easy to get to everywhere. Immaculately clean. I love the Roku tv. As for parking, very secure, but I recommend getting a car smaller than a Toyota Corolla or Hyundai Sonata — these are a challenge to park without a backup camera.
Beautiful place. The location is pretty good, 5 minutes drive you can found anything do you want!
Good location, good instructions about everything, and nice people to deal with.

Nice place with great security! Parking is a pain, seeing as the slot of very tight. I would recommend parking on street, but be careful because it is very limited on selection and might have to walk a few blocks.
Place is clean, easy to find, instructions are detailed by the owner.. highly recommend this place!! :)

Excelente unicacion.
Limpio y comodo.
Internet wifi de alta velocidad y netflix.
La mesa para comer es demasiado pequeña.
Cerca de todos los
accesos y autopistas.
Cama cómoda.
El estacionamiento es pequeño pero a lo ancho, es largo. Entra bien un auto mediano (Ford Fiesta, Focus y mas pequeños).
Anfitriones super amables.


Mahalo

Kai and Tiffany's place is at an amazing location. The one bed one bath with a kitchen was great! Everything we needed was provided and more. It was a plus that there was a washer/dryer and the gate to the airbnb made it feel extra safe. Overall the experience was amazing!

Space was as described. The instructions provided prior to arrival were spot on and SO helpful. It helped reduced the anxiety and stress of not knowing where you’re going.  The place was clean, quiet, and exactly what we needed for two people.  The local coffee provided was also a great touch. Thank you for accommodating!

Just what we needed for our vacation. Pretty close to downtown Honolulu and close to the airport. The condo was neat, comfortable, and stylish. My only side note is that when they say "compact" parking think of a smart car or moped. We had to park on the street because we couldn't get our car in the port. Pretty minor issue considering the other wonderful things about our stay. Kai and Tiffany are excellent hosts.

Tiffany and Kai were the most responsive and caring hosts. The unit was just what we needed for our stay. 
The studio is just right for 2 persons. 
The parking works best of you use a compact/economy size vehicle.
This is a nice safe location of you'd like to be out of the Waikiki area, with easy access to the freeways.
The AC unit works well and is quiet, which in many other units, is not the situation.
We did catch a workout run right from the door of the unit, but just know you'll be running on slightly hilly roads for a few miles before reaching the beach.
Overall, yes, we'd stay there again.
Great place to stay. Close to stores and shopping mall. Close to freeway and little noisy when windows are open. Kai was so great communicating with us when there was any questions / issues.
This is a very convenient location if you need to access downtown Honolulu. Tiffany and Kai are amazing at communication and you will be in good hands!

Tiffany’s place is 15 min car ride to Waikiki and only a few min to downtown Honolulu, it had air conditioning which was really crucial and a cute kitchen next to the bedroom. It’s great for 2 people a very intimate stay. Shower is a little smaller than I thought but has great hot water, there’s many amenities that are useful for a longer stay as well, we stayed for a week. My boyfriend and I felt really safe because of the gated area of which you need a code to enter and also a code for the door, also its very quite and easy to fall asleep. Tiffany is really accommodating and responds very quickly when you need something. Would recommend the place! Mahalo

Tiffany and Kai's place was in the perfect spot to stay in Hawaii. Yes, it's next to the highway H1 but noise can easily be closed off by the windows. I like that it wasn't in a dense touristy place like Waikiki. It's also a super close drive to Manoa Falls if anyone is going there. The studio itself is very clean, comfortable, and stylish. I liked that there was kitchen that had the basic necessities if we wanted to cook. It definitely was the perfect place for two people. 

The only thing we were skeptical about at first was that there wasn't a garage door for the studio and sometimes the gate outside was left opened by others/neighbors. We rented a car which was why we were considered for any damages. However, it was a quiet area and the neighbors were nice. Didn't have any problems luckily. Definitely make sure you have a compact car!

We just concluded a fantastic stay here. The condo was incredibly clean. The condo was beautifully updated with gorgeous quartz counter tops & stainless steel appliances. The full size appliances was a great bonus. 

I’m originally from the island & came home for a family wedding. We needed a place to stay that was close enough to town for all the wedding activities.  It was a perfect place for my family of 3 (2 adults & a 6yo) to stay. It was close enough to downtown Honolulu & Waikiki AND Hawaii Kai, without being right in the city. It does overlook the freeway, but the windows are so wonderful that we hardly heard the noise. 

The condo was very clean & the pull out couch was perfect for our little guy. It would be a perfect place for a business traveler or a family like ours that really just needs a great place to sleep & eat an occasional meal. It does have a steep staircase, but Kai & Tiffany make every attempt to make it safe by having a gate at the top of the stairs - still some parents of real little ones may feel a bit uncomfortable with it. We had no issues at all. Also, definitely head the recommendation to rent the smallest car possible. It’s a very tight turn around & the garage is tiny. We had requested an economy size, but were give a Pathfinder. My husband is a firefighter & is quite experienced parking big rigs, but I didn’t dare try. 

If we ever find the need to rent another Airbnb while visiting my home town, we would not hesitate to stay here again.

Tiffany’s studio was very stylish & cute. It was such a great location. Tiffany & Kai were very quick to respond to any questions I had. The studio was clean, Ac was cold, Netflix always a good thing. I absolutely thought this place was so cute! Totally recommend !!!

Bonjour chers voyageurs, 

Vous avez loué une petite voiture et vous désirez visiter Honolulu et son centre-ville? Vous voulez un bon rapport/qualité/prix? Le studio de Tiffany saura vous plaire. Il est très propre et sécuritaire. Le studio est situé près de l'autoroute H1. Il y a donc le bruit des voitures qui pourrait déranger certaines personnes. Pour nous, cette proximité fut appréciée et a facilité les déplacements en voiture. 

Pierre et Natacha
Very clean and comfortable.
Bon rapport qualité prix. Le stricte nécessaire pour se faire à manger. Appart qui donne sur l’autoroute donc on garde les fenêtres bien fermées
Very responsive host, very friendly, and a great location that is close to everything.

Tiffany and hosts were very accommodating to us. They worked with us through the hurricane threat and on our checkout. 
The place was centrally located— great for getting around. 
All in all, we would be willing to stay here again.

Kai and Tiffany's place is very clean and located at good location. The gated community gave an extra feeling of security for long stay. We found everything from utensils to WiFi, which made our stay even more convenient.

This adorable little apartment was the perfect place to stay in Honolulu. It's beautiful, clean, and it has parking. The lovely Hawaiian style of the rooms set a good vibe. It is meticulously clean and looks newly built. Tiffany has considered everything: there is a coffee maker, filters, and coffee in the kitchen (which is really important after a long flight!) and other items too like an iron, wash towels, beach towels, shampoo, sun screen, that are super thoughtful. We found it helpful to close the bedroom door to keep the cool air from the mini-split upstairs. There is a coin-operated washer and dryer in the garage if you need them. The Ford Versa we rented from Budget was a little tight, but my husband is an expert 'backer-upper.'  I usually got out of the car before he put it in the garage. Though, we didn't need to drive everywhere.  Some of the great places we walked to are Foster Botanical Garden, Liliʻuokalani Botanical Garden, Honolulu Beer Works, and Aloha Brewing Company.  Overall, this is a great place to stay!

The place is perfect for my family of 3. Kai and Tiffany were very responsive  to messages and questions and they even sent some quarters and detergent for my usage. The apartment itself is perfectly located in a safe neighbourhood. Driving to downtown or Waikiki will take 10-15 minutes. Clean and comfortable, the noise from the highway is not a problem if you close all the windows. Self check-in and check-out were smooth. Do rent a small car as the garage is tight. Rented Nissan Note and my wife and daughter still have to get out of the car first before entering the garage. Highly recommended if you are visiting Honolulu.
Great, clean place with good access to the freeway and the city. Be sure you rent a small car for the parking space!

Check-in was very easy with the host's detailed instructions, which even included the parking process for the small garage space that they provided (back-in parking required).   The parking space was definitely a plus since it allowed us more freedom to drive around, rest, then go out again without having to worry about accumulating parking charges.  The studio was near all the areas we wanted to explore (Downtown/Waikiki/Ala Moana were a couple of miles away) and located near the main free/highways.  The interior was very clean, simple, and cozy, which fit our needs since a majority of our trip was spent out-and-about exploring Oahu.   The washer and dryer was also a great amenity since we had a week-long vacation (you would just need to go to the 7-11 down the street for detergent).  

Overall the studio was as described, the location was great, and the parking space definitely saved us time/stress/money.  I highly recommend this studio for the value it offers.

Great place to stay! had a pleasant view of the city and most importantly it was a very safe and secured parking spot. The place is pretty central for everything you need to do in Oahu. Close to Waikiki for shopping, eating and city life. But also close to the beautiful hikes around the island. I would suggest this to anyone whose coming to the island!
Great place.  I will stay here again.
Great space and perfect location!!

This place was easy to find, clean, and in a great location. Bathroom was a little tight. No issues with parking (we rented a midsize car). Kai was quick to respond to messages and seemed very friendly. They let us check out late, which we appreciated very much!
Cute little place perfect for a couple! The location is amazing!! Super easy to get to places. Especially great that it comes with a small garage space too.:) and it was super clean as well!!!
Great space. Very clean. Check in instructions were clear. The smaller your car the better, parking space is small.

Unfortunately on the last night of our week-long stay, items were stolen from our temporarily unlocked car while parked inside the residence (not to suggest the host is at fault).The gated area is shared with others and everyone has access. Others within the complex may forget to close it. *THIS HAPPENED MULTIPLE TIMES FOR US* This unit did not have a garage door because the opening is already too narrow (the other units all have garage doors). 

The studio itself was as expected. You get a place to sleep, a TV, a kitchen, a bathroom, a couch, and a coin operated washer/dryer. Kai was super responsive and helpful throughout the stay. The location is pretty close to everything, but the area is a little sketchy (as much as any big touristy city would be). Remember to be extra vigilant and exercise caution e.g. double check your locks, etc.

Tiffany’s place was centrally located, well maintained and had everything one needs when traveling abroad, it was a real treat to be able to return back each day to the comfort and coziness of the room. I would stay here again if the place was available. Added bonus was having Netflix and Amazon Prime available at the touch of a fingertip!

We had a great stay in this accommodation. The location is just great, you are very fast at the airport, on wakiki beach .... Also the equipment of the apartment convinced us, about coffee / shampoo .... 
In advance, we had already booked a small car, this fit very well in the garage. The packing went without problems.
We would stay here again.
Great experience! Comes with the small things that are necessary. Nice quiet area. Close to everything. Would stay again.

Everything is accurate as described. Place is very clean. Convenient check in and check out. Great location, very close to Waikiki, where many good restaurants and major shopping centers are located. Private parking lot, great for people who rent their own vehicle. Overall, awesome experience staying at Tiffanys place.

Kai and Tiffany did a great job of preparing for our stay! They communicated quickly and clearly, including pictures to find the condo and parking spot. The condo was clean and well-equipped, including standard kitchen/dining supplies. Photos are accurate and recent. Bed was comfortable, and Wi-Fi worked great. Washer/dryer are coin-operated in the garage. Being a studio, it was the perfect amount of space for the two of us. Three people would be a squeeze, and I definitely agree with them it's not a good idea to have more than 3 people. Note that the location directly adjacent to the H-1 highway means there is highway noise, so bring ear plugs if you're a light sleeper.
The instruction was very cleared, the location was super convenient and get around easily. The place was safe and cozy.

This is a great place if you are looking for something affordable with a convenient location. The highlight for us was the included parking space as we rented a car for our entire stay. They also had food storage containers and a lunch bag you could use which came in handy for us since we bought lunch items from Costco to cut down on daily costs during our trip. The only down sides were the shower and bed. The bed was on the soft side so I woke up with my back a little sore a few mornings. The shower head isn’t amazing and it’s hard to keep water from getting on the floor outside of the shower. Overall it was a great place to stay for the price and the parking was the cherry on top.

This was a great place to stay! It was close enough to the beach that we felt a little separated from the overpriced things on Waikiki. Tiffany was very responsive to questions and requests, she even provided a pack & play for our toddler! It is a bit small, so I couldn't see more than 2 adults staying there (kids don't take up as much space). The fact that there is free parking off the street is amazing. The parking spot is a tight turn, and we had a Ford Escape sized car, that's probably the max for the spot. It is close to the freeway so you can hear cars drive by, but it is more like white nose than annoying. It didn't prevent any of us from sleeping. I would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful time! Thank you for everything.

name: Lovely and quiet doble room in the center of BCN
summary: Lovely and quiet room in the center of Barcelona:  1 minute from Arco de triunfo & the Parc de la Ciutadella, 10 minutes walking from Plaza Catalunya and the historic center : el Gotico y El Born.  The sea is 25 minutes walking :)! We are young & open minded people who will make your stay as if you were at home and give you the best advice to enjoy Barcelona!  The room is ideal for couples, adventurers and business travellers the rent only give you access to the room and the bathroom
description: Lovely and quiet room in the center of Barcelona:  1 minute from Arco de triunfo & the Parc de la Ciutadella, 10 minutes walking from Plaza Catalunya and the historic center : el Gotico y El Born.  The sea is 25 minutes walking :)! We are young & open minded people who will make your stay as if you were at home and give you the best advice to enjoy Barcelona!  The room is ideal for couples, adventurers and business travellers the rent only give you access to the room and the bathroom The kitchen, the living room and the balcony are not available as we share the flat with other roommates. You will have the acces to the room and the bathroom.
access: The kitchen, the living room and the balcony are not available as we share the flat with other roommates. You will have the acces to the room and the bathroom.
house_rules: - - Respect of the conviviality rules are very important for us: - - - caring the house and the things used - - - caring the other people living in the flat and the neighbours, by moderating noise at night and in the morning

reviews.comments:
Hola, mi llegada estava perfecta y con Marina, aparece que estava en mi casa :) ! La cama esta muy limpia, también esta la casita. La cocina es grande y hay muchas plantas y buenas ondas en la casa! La área deste airbnb es muy central et muy cerca de las cosas que tienes que ver in Barcelona, 
Muchas Gracias para todo :D

La habitación está en un piso compartido muy bien situado, al lado del arco de Triomf, de la estación del norte, y a diez minutos andando de la Sagrada Familia. 
Lamentablemente no he podido conocer a Miriam, pero conocí a su hermana que también vive en el piso, y ella fue muy amable con nosotros, aconsejándonos buenos restaurantes en el barrio. Fue un real placer hablar con ellos :) Recomiendo esa habitación !

Marina and everybody, who lives in this flat, are very nice, helpful and friendly people. The address is great, just few minutes from Placa Catalunya, really good central position in nice neiborghood. Flat is simply furnished, but you have everything, what you need. There is five rooms, one of them is living room, other are sleeping rooms. Kitchen is also big enough. Everything is very clean.
Only one room small, not very nice room, badly described online. Great location, friendly host.

Marina and her house mates and sister were very welcoming and helpful! The room is small, but we didn't spend much time there as we were out sight seeing and enjoying the city. Great location! Would recommend this flat to anyone visiting Barcelona.

Had a great stay at Marina's. The room was nice and the bed was really comfortable. I wish I had been around longer to get to know her and her roommates, as they seemed like great people. Would highly recommend!!

If you want a room just for sleeping, it's ok. The room is very little and there isn't day light because it's in a courtyard. For french people, you will be (Website hidden by Airbnb) a quiete place and well placed in the city .
Nice stay in this shared apartment.  Easily found the place and warmly welcomed in, we settled into our cozy room, and good location to explore lots of central Barcelona and the beach :)
Good value for money. Marina was very nice and our contact was excellent. The appartement is well located.

Pros:
Friendly roommates
Good communication
Wifi and keys to apt provided
Maps and bus information provided in room.
Location 1 minute away from arc de triomphe, walking distance from las ramblas
Cons:
Informed two days prior to arrival that we are not allowed to access kitchen patio or living room. 
Not the cleanest, no fitted sheets provided. 
Small bedroom
No lock for the bedroom

We stayed at Marina's place where 4 other people live. We were out and about most of the time but having this place to rest was great. It was clean, close to transports, nice flatmate group, it was all perfect!!! Will definitely stay at her place again if needed!! 
Thank you girls ^^
Isabelle
Marina y sus compaňeros de piso son muy amables. Si venimos a Barcelona otra vez, sabemos donde alojarnos :) muchas gracias!

Estuvimos alojados durante una noche porque habíamos ido a un festival. El piso era muy cerca de la estación de nord y nos vino de perlas, para ir con un amigo o para pasar una noche de paso esta bien
Great location, great host.
Комната находится в центре, удобное расположение. Хозяин оперативно отвечал на Сообщения, заранее отдал  ключи , когда нам было необходимо
Excelente cuarto, a una cuadra de Arco de triunfo. Marina fue muy amable en todo momento y nos ayudo todo lo posible.
Muy agradable lugar!! Linda ubicación! Gente muy amable!
Excelente ubicación... cerca de todo. Limpio y ordenado... excelente trato y comunicación.
Great check in, polite host. Clean room etc. Would reccomend and realy close to sights with shops around too.

This is a great place to stay! Marina and her roommates were very kind and open, and at the same time you had enough privacy and could follow your own plan. The location is great, near metro and some breakfast places, and also the room itself is good! Quite big, with a bed, closet and small desk to work. Thanks for having me over :)
位于凯旋门,地铁附近,旁边有很大的中超,各种超市,饭店也很多,也很安全｡单独一间屋子,比较宽敞干净,适合旅游居住~屋子里还有其他几位居住的伙伴,他们都很友好,会帮忙解决问题,居住的很舒心,也很开心,值得选择｡

Excellent location to stay, city center is just walkway about 10 minutes, Marina is really nice host, everything is okay.
Thanks Marina
Regards Vishal
essential
Cuarto muy bien ubicado cerca de todo! Marina buena anfitriona aunque no coincidimos mucho todo estuvo perfecto.  Recomendadisimo.

시설이 어마어마어마하게 좋고 매우 깨끗합니다!! ㅋㅋㅋ
무조건 추천해요
Nice place to sleep and Nice People  it's near lot of monuments

Everything was according to description. There were no any problem with check-in and check-out and during my stay in Marina's place. Location was perfect for me because I ran half marathon of Barcelona and it took me 10 minutes to get to the start point.
Amazing location so close to metro!  Marina was great at welcoming us!

Comfortable, clean and check in was great, even accommodating me at a later time due to a delayed flight! Communication with the host is fantastic and the location (close to Arc de Triomf) is superb. Thank you!
Repetiré, m’ha agradat. Recomanable

The location is great, the flat mates of this shared apartment are nice but the apartment is everything but quiet. Price/value ratio is poor since you are not allowed to use living room and kitchen and the room is very small and simple.

Marina ist eine sehr nette Gastgeberin. Der Check in lief problemlos ab.
Die Unterkunft hat eine super Lage - zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ah und in 5 min ist der Busbahnhof Nord zu Fuß zu erreichen, von wo der Bus u.a. nach Girona abfährt.
Aus diesem Grund hatte ich meine Wahl getroffen.
Das Zimmer ist zweckmäßig eingerichtet und das Bett bequem, was für mich ausreichend war, da ich hier nur eine kurze Nacht verbracht habe.
Danke Marina!
Super leuke en handige locatie om Barcelona te bezoeken in een rustige buurt met een vriendelijke gastvrouw. Redelijk klein wel, maar perfect als gewoon ergens nodig hebt om te overnachten.
Good location for touring Barcelona
Justo lo que anuncia

Logement très bien situé et petite chambre privée. Logement bruyant en raisons de l’emplacement. Les personnes nous ont très bien accueillis et l’échange par message est rapide et simple. Ce logement est parfait pour une courte durée  seulement puisque l’accès à la cuisine est interdite et qu’il n’y a pas de Commodités dans la chambre.ex: frigo
Super Kommunikation und echt gastfreundlich.

Marina is easy to communicate with. She wasn’t home when I got in but her housemate was there to greet me and make me feel at home

Room is super well located to city centre and lots of transport options

Will study again next time I’m in Barcelona!

Es un apartamento muy bien ubicado, a una cuadra del Arco de Triunfo y a 10 min a pie de las Ramblas. 
La comunicación con los anfitriones fue buena y dentro de los aspectos positivos es que nos permitieron entrar al apto en una hora que no era la prevista. 
Por otro lado, el mismo no contaba con aire acondicionado ni ventilador en pleno verano y estaba un tanto desplolijo.

나와있는대로 주방과 냉장고 못써요 이점 유의하시고 가세요. 위치는 좋습니다. 그래도 집주인이나 룸메이트 남자는 친절해서 말 잘하면 세탁기와 냉장고는 쓸 수 있게 해줘요. 하지만 러시아 여자 룸메이트가 너무 불친절해요 웃으면서 불가능하다 말할 수 있는걸 인상 찌뿌리고 푸르르르 에우~~ 이러면서 심하게 까칠한 티 냅니다. 돈 내고 간거 임에도 눈치볼게 많아 너무 불편했습니다. 그 러시아 여자하나 때문에 기분이 잡쳐서 5일 일정 하루로 숙박 변경했습니다. 집주인이랑 남자 룸메이트의 친절 덕분에 5점 만점입니다!

On the good side the location and hospitality were great. On the bad side, the room was to hot to sleep in, and there is no fan or airconditioning. Furthermore, if you sleep with the window open there are a lot of noises from the neighbors.
We slept well, recommended area and a good spot close to transport!

La anfitriona nos facilitó la reserva, la llegada y la salida (dejar las maletas hasta que necesitamos, incluso usar la habitación). La habitación es como se ve en la foto. Ubicación muy cómoda, al lado de la estación del Nord
Good place to stay, close to all turistic places in Barcelona. Perfect for those, who need place just for oversleeping like us... bed and bathroom is everything what we needed
La ubicación excelente,muy amables ,me recibió y me dio las chico muy amable,llegué antes de la hora acordada ,me permito dejar la valija
Está bien ubicado, lo demás ya se lo he comentado a ella.
Room has obe window but it is too close to next building. So we did not really open it. It rarely see the light.

Marina was  very accurate and her description of the room and it was actually a little bit bigger than the picture as described.  It was nice to have the window as a means of ventilation, it does look into the space between two buildings but we were not expecting anything scenic in light of the previous reviews so it was no problem. 
 The communication process, as well as the check-in were smooth and easy. 

  Things I did not realize untill checking in are that I personally do better when traveling with the use of a fridge And kitchen accessibility. Marina has this in the listing, I just failed to see it untill I checked in. 

Even though it says no common area usage, Marina and her flat mates were all kind and had a few words of welcome whenever we passed in the hallways.

Overall a great stay, thanks Marina.

name: Spacious & Cozy Bushwick Walk-up 3mins from Train
summary: My place is a 4 minute walk to the metro, restaurants, bars, laundromat and convenience stores. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the comfy bed, and the rooftop view. My place is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: The guests are welcome to use the kitchen area in addition to things in the bathroom guests baskets. They also have access to the smart tv on the living room.
description: My place is a 4 minute walk to the metro, restaurants, bars, laundromat and convenience stores. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the comfy bed, and the rooftop view. My place is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. The guests are welcome to use the kitchen area in addition to things in the bathroom guests baskets. They also have access to the smart tv on the living room. You will have access to our kitchen area in addition to the living room with our smart tv. A plus will also include our rooftop access. Be sure to be careful. I am always available via text messages for any additional assistance and when available, can also assist throughout the day. Bushwick is an ever growing, diverse area with new things to do popping up all over this community. There are bars, restaurants, and coffee shops galore.  With the train just 4 mins away, there is a plethora to see all around the Brooklyn area including the busy and unique Williamsburg and Greenpoin
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick is an ever growing, diverse area with new things to do popping up all over this community. There are bars, restaurants, and coffee shops galore.  With the train just 4 mins away, there is a plethora to see all around the Brooklyn area including the busy and unique Williamsburg and Greenpoint areas. Aside from the other neighborhoods, Bushwick stands out because it remains refreshing yet intimate.
notes: Enjoy and don't be afraid to send me if any questions pop up!
transit: There is free parking right outside of the apartment in addition to 4 mins from the L train and about a 10 min walk to the J train.
access: You will have access to our kitchen area in addition to the living room with our smart tv. A plus will also include our rooftop access. Be sure to be careful.
interaction: I am always available via text messages for any additional assistance and when available, can also assist throughout the day.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi Fellow Airbnber's!
My name is Chérie C. Malone and I am a graduate from Bucknell University and stem from the Philadelphia area. Go Eagles!!! I reside in Brooklyn, an up and coming awesome part of New York City. 
I absolutely adore traveling the world and had the opportunity to study abroad in Germany for two non-consecutive years. I have also traveled to Spain, England, Scotland, Canada, France, and Denmark and plan on adding more places to that list in the near future. I am quite personable and love to meet new people and learn more about the world and those who live in it. I am an Actress but on occasion I work a plethora of odd jobs around the city.

reviews.comments: Good bed to sleep!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was a really good stay! Even if we didn't have the pleasure to meet her, she made everything to make our stay as confortable as possible and she always answered very quickly to our message! 
Nice appartment in a nice neighborhood !

My partner and I stayed with Cherie for 4 nights in September and enjoyed every minute of it. The apartment is comfortable,  secure and quiet and there a few corner shops and cafes nearby for any supplies you may need. The real jewel here is Cherie! She is warm,  generous and friendly and made our time there absolutely perfect.

Chérie was an amazing host, she was very responsive, friendly and approchoable. We were able to use everything in her kitchen, including the food. Her place was conveniently located next to the subway, laundromat and supermarket. It was a cozy appartement, plus she had Netflix available. Overall, it was a very good stay, I would definitely recommend her place to anyone!

Ho soggiornato da Cherie una settimana con la mia ragazza e siamo stati molto bene. Camera spaziosa e con tutti i comfort a nostra disposizione come (Website hidden by Airbnb) cucina soggiorno. Possibilità di accedere al terrazzo condominiale con una bella vista allo skyline di Ny. Posizione vicinissima alla metro e a negozi aperti anche di notte nella frizzante Bushwick. Consigliato, top ✌
Cherie's place was perfect for what I wanted: a nice clean place to come home too after going out on the town. The L train is only a block away so it's very easy to get wherever you need to go.
Cherie’s place was great! Super quiet location even though it’s right near the subway. Pictures are exactly what the apartment looks like! Great stay!
We're staying in Cherie's house for three days and I must say it was amazing! The flat is clean and comfi and Cherie is an amazing host/person. We felt there like at home! Highly recommended!

it's a very nice place, well located, near from two subway lines, less than half hour from Manhattan, good neighbourhood, walkable, with places to buy groceries, remarkable attention and hospitality from Cherie, absolutely recommended

Nous avons été ravis de notre accueil et de la gentillesse de nos hôtes ...Dommage que nous n'ayons pas pu plus discuter à cause de la barrière de la langue . Chérie et Mathias ont su se faire discrets , nous laisser toute notre autonomie  et quand il le fallait ils étaient toujours présents pour nous renseigner.
 Nous conseillons cette adresse aux autres , quartier calme , petits commerces et la station de métro à proximité .
It was really easy to stay in Brooklyn. My friends were satisfied too! It was a pleasure for everyone to talk gently. I'm really thank you!!
Great place and great host.
Cherie's place was really clean and comfortable. Close to the subway line. Would stay again.
Great location, easy to travel to all parts of the city :)
Warm and great host. Nice and clean room. 3 min walk to subway, supermarkets and laundry. Great coffee machine too, I get to brew coffee every morning for breakfast.

Great space, and just what we needed! We were looking for a conveniently located spot to spend new year's, and this was perfect! So close to the subway and some yummy restaurants. Our room was comfy and warm (even in the 10 degree chill outside!) The space was also easy to navigate around guests staying in the other bedrooms. Everything in the apartment was very organized and clearly labeled.
Best experience with airbnb in NYC. Quiet neighborhood, closer to the original Brooklyn, very convenient location right next to the L line. The apartment was clean and Chérie was a thoughtful host.

Chérie's place was great! It is literally one block from the L in a safe-feeling, quiet neighborhood. The room was very sunny and a great rate. Chérie's place has the perfect balance of feeling homey/comfortable yet a great getaway. Chérie also offers plenty of amenities for her guests. Loved it.

Chèrie was AMAZING! we went to Brooklyn to explore the city and left with a new friend. the apartment was very nice and clean, the bed was cozy, and the host was unbeatable. definitely our best airbnb experience!

Any questions you have she is more than happy answer. The apartment was always clean and quiet, as was the neighborhood. Great location for me to learn the subway system as the station is the next block over. Great great great first time experience!!

Incredibly cozy apartment in an authentic well connected neighborhood. Chérie and her amazing hospitality made us feel like  home right away. Also the most comfortable bed we‘ve seen in a while.
Thank you!!

[French will follow]
Staying with Chérie is a sure way to have fun in NYC. Not only the place is super cosy and you can enjoy a rooftop view of NYC (one of the bests you can have to enjoy some beers if you ask us!) but the location is great too (really close to the subway). For us, staying there also meant meeting a lovely person that made sure our stay went smoothly. If you want to have a blast in NYC it’s definitely the place to book!

Rester chez Chérie vous assurera tout le plaisir qui vous attends à NY. La place est non seulement super confortable et agréable mais la vue du toit de New York vaut le coup à elle seule! En plus, l’appartement est à deux pas du métro ce qui facilite l’accès à pas mal tout. Pour nous, rester chez Chérie nous a permis de rencontrer une personne formidable qui s’est assuré qu’on aille tout ce qui nous faut pour passer un séjour parfait. C’est la place où rester à New York!
Chérie is an amazing host and her home is incredibly comfortable and lovely! Highly recommend!!

What a great host! Cherie gave us our privacy but was so friendly and wonderful when we spoke. We came in at ridiculous hours at night, but she never complained! She was so accommodating with check-in. We didn't arrive til 2 am, but she had everything set up for us. The location is perfect - right next to the subway. Will definitely stay again.

First off, Chérie is AMAZING. I arrived 30 minutes early and I was able to check in! We had a queen sized bed that took up most of the room, but I didn’t mind I move around a lot and like to be sprawled out. I love that fact that the subway is less than 5 mins away and easy to get back into Manhattan. Keep in mind, try to pack light if possible because there’s no elevators, so everyday is leg day. Amazing hospitality and hope to come back to New York and stay here again!
Chérie’s place is great, so very convenient to two subway lines. She’s so personable and makes you feel right at home in a very large city. Definitely stay here!

We had a great time at Cherie’s place. The room was perfect and the bed comfy. The apartment is situated next to the L line that takes you straight to Manhattan. We loved the neighborhood and it’s cafes. Go to Manny’s for a good breakfast and don’t forget Father Knows Best!
This was a great state for  my sister and I. It was convenient to the metro link and a very affordable.

My stay was incredible. The area was safe and quiet. It was a reasonable distance from the city by subway. My room was charming, clean, and the bed was so comfortable. The room was adorable, like something from a movie. Made me feel right at home and gave me an itch to go back to visit New York very soon. You won’t be disappointed.
Cozy spot close to L line, awesome hosts!!
Keep the windows open it feels awesome and you wake up to the wonderful noise of bushwick. I loved this place I felt like home.

A great quiet place to stay in Bushwick - well located with 2 subway lines a stone's throw from the property - little things like shower gel for guests etc was also great! The bed was really comfy too!! Thanks Chèrie! :)

Chérie's previous glowing reviews still don't do her justice, she was the sweetest, most charming host and was welcoming, friendly and helpful way beyond our expectations! She recommended some fabulous things to do and eat, and we left feeling like we'd made a lovely friend too! Chérie, you're always welcome in England!

Chérie is a super host, so friendly,  helpful and pretty reactive to the message whenever we asked her something.
She leaves us space when she was in the apartment too and we could use Netflix in the living room.
The apartment is lovely. It was very very hot that week but she bought fans for us.

Regarding the location, she's 2min walk from a train station. 45min to go to Manhattan. It's totally ok !

I recommend her 100%

The place is nice, I’ll just suggest to have an AC in the room because just one night I couldn’t sleep and the room has windows plus fan but is not enough for summer time though. The room is small so don’t bring big luggage, talking about the bed one of them is not super comfortable but if you just arrive super tired you will be fine.The location is close to the subway the only thing I’ll recommend is not walk during the night and the Uber’s always said the neighborhood used to be super dangerous area but is getting better. I didn’t feel unsafe but you should take precautions. NY was an adventure :)
It’s conveniently located next to the subway and is in a quiet area. The room was very clean and nicely decorated and the bed was comfortable.

We really enjoyed our stay in NY ar Cherie’s place! Everything was perfect - very comfortable bed, subway station close to the apartment, safe neighbourhood! Cherie was super welcoming and always responds quickly. 
We were also able to leave our luggage in the apartament for a few hours after check out:)

We had a really good time in NYC and Cherie‘s place! Our room was clean and big enough for two of us. The subway is close to the Apartment and we felt really Safe in this area. Cherie also offered us to use goods of the Kitchen which was really Nice. Even though we just met us once in this week Cherie was really nice and offered us a lot of help! Thanks for having us as your guests :)
I would really recommend this place...pretty rooms, great rooftop view, close to subway station, nice hosts. We were very satisfied. thanks a lot.
You'll love it!
Really sweet hosts, I was sick and I asked her if she can warm the house she did it right after I really appreciated that !
Stayed at Cherie/Mathias' place for 4 nights. Very clean, comfortable, and conveniently located. Felt safe even late at night. Would not hesitate to stay there again.
great stay, nice hosts and near to the metro

Cherie's place is close to subway station. It's in a good neighborhood, walking distance to grocery markets , bars, coffee shops. Room is spacious , with everything you need. 
Cherie is great host, very friendly and always available to help .

No tengo palabras para describir lo cómodo que nos sentimos en el departamento de cherie, es genial ella como anfitriona, nos ayudo en todo y fue muy amable todo el tiempo! El departamento genial, y buen ubicado, anduve caminando hasta las 2 am de la mañana y nunca nada raro, la linea L de subte esta a una cuadra, es muy recomendable. Volveria en otra oportunidad

床鋪很舒適 房東很貼心~
靠近地鐵站 
周遭有超商 買一點小零食方便

Cherie was so kind and helpful. I really enjoyed spending 5 days at her apartment! The only “problem” was the distance between her neighborhood to Manhattan... So be prepared to a 20/25-minute subway ride.  
Thank you for everything, Cherie. I hope you come to Brazil sometime to visit us.

Cherie's Place is lovely, in a very nice and authentic neighbourhood.  She Is attentive and ready to help. Manhattan Is reachable in 25 minutes with L train.  I defintely reccommend her flat and suggest to Explore Bushwick and bejond, as New York Is not only Manhattan! Thank you Cherie!

cherie's space is cute and clean. it's literally right around the corner from the L train which is a blessing. the whole apartment smells like flowers. cherie herself is sweet and knowledgeable. this is the best air bnb I've ever stayed in. I felt perfectly accomadated and comfortable.

Chérie is a great host, she is such a friendly Girl, helping with everything you can imagine. Her Apartmemt is exactly as described, a cozy and beautiful place to stay. The Apartment is very close to a Subway Station wehre you can reach basically every Place in NYC very fast. Location is Great and in an uprising neighborhood. We would come again if we could!
Great place and great host. My friend and I had a good time.
Cherie Is very sweet and  very friendly. Her place is very clean. She provided spices and ingredients, so you can prepare breakfast. It’s value for the money. I’ll recommended her place to everyone.

Chérie é uma ótima anfitriam muito simpática e atenciosa.
O apartamento bem decorado e confortável. Boa localização, próximo a o  metro e um boa vizinhaça.

Chérie is a very nice host and very helpful.
The apartment is well decorated and comfortable. Good location close to the metro and a good neighborhood.

The appartment is really pretty, there's everything you'll need. Subway station (Wilson avenue) is actually 3min away (walking), and this is great ! You can have a drink and eat 500m away and you can buy some food and all 1 street away. The streets are quite calm and Manhattan is 23-25min away with L train.
Really we liked staying there 10 days, and we saw a lot in Buschwick AND Manhattan ! :)

Advice :
- Father knows best
- Virgil's real barbecue
- 42nd street
- And get a City Pass ;-)

L'appartement est très joli, il y a tout ce dont vous aurez besoin. La station de metro (Wilson avenue) est en effet à 3min à pied donc c'est super ! Vous pouvez aller boire un coup et manger un bout à 500m de là et vous pouvez faire des petites courses dans la rue d'à côté. Les rues sont plutôt calmes et Manhattan est à 23-25min avec le metro L.
Vraiment on a bien aimé rester pendant 10 jours, on a vu plein de choses, à Bushwick ET à Manhattan. :)

Conseil :
- Father knows best
- Virgil's real barbecue
- 42e rue
- Et achetez un City Pass ;-)
Excelente lugar precio-calidad. Lo recomiendo 100%

It’s was the perfect stay for a quick trip. She was an excellent host, keeping everything clean and being ready for anything if we needed her. I’d recommend anyone passing by New York to stay at her place if you want to be in Brooklyn as well!
Cherie's place offers the best accommodation at a fantastic price. Absolute delight only 45 mins into manhattan.

おしゃれなお部屋で､居心地が良いです｡
平日のみの運行ですが､L線の駅が近く､ﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝへのｱｸｾｽが良いです｡

My first trip to NYC and I really enjoyed my time out here. Cherie was a wonderful host and I am sure to book her again for my next trip here. There's lots of things to do, Manhattan was awesome. The location is convenient to get to anywhere you need.

name: Sweet two bedroom in Crown Heights Bk
summary: Clean and warmly decorated two bedroom on beautiful tree lined Eastern Parkway in Crown Heights. Fully furnished and equip with kitchenware, linens, streaming devices, toiletries, and closet space. Located in a renovated building with a shared front porch; one block from the 3 and 4 trains, appx 20 minute subway ride to lower Manhattan. Short walk to grocery stores, cafes, restaurants, Brooklyn Museum, Botanic Garden and Prospect Park. Parking may be available for an additional cost.
space: Cozy, clean, recently renovated two bedroom apartment in a well maintained multi-family house with a shared front porch facing lovely Eastern Parkway. Fully furnished and equip with kitchenware, linens, electronics, streaming devices, toiletries, and available closet space.  One bedroom has a full sized bed which comfortably sleeps two and the second bedroom has a day bed with a twin sized mattress. Air mattress potentially available upon request as well. Some children’s games and coloring books available.
description: Clean and warmly decorated two bedroom on beautiful tree lined Eastern Parkway in Crown Heights. access: The entire apartment will be yours!  That includes, living room, kitchen, bathroom, two bedrooms, and front porch.  Laundry service available upon request for a small additional fee. Parking potentially available on premises at an additional cost.
interaction: I will be reachable by cell and can come in person if needed.
house_rules: No cigarette smoking indoors.

This place is awesome! 
Maura was super helpful,inviting,and flexible. I will certainly be staying here again!
Great place and Maura was very responsive and a pleasure to work with.
Easy to find, convenient check-in, quick responses, and a super clean place! Thanks!

Mauras's place is an amazing spot in a wonderful area of Brooklyn. It's walking distance from two subway stations and many amazing shops and places to eat. The stations nearby give extremely easy access to and from the airports and Manhattan. Maura was an exceptional host and provided great amenities and communicated exceptionally well. Altogether it was an amazing stay and I would return in a heartbeat.
Un hogar !!

Maura's place was exactly what we were looking for. Cozy - home away from home. We traveled with our 6year old daughter so it was a great place for watching a movie after a long/cold day doing the touristy things. Close to the train. Close to our family. Liquor store and bodegas near by. Ideal for us. Beds were comfy. Wifi was strong. Neighbors were a little loud in the evening but nothing we weren't used to. Maura is a great host who responded to us quickly and checked in with us.

name: Sunny, family friendly 2 BR BONDI Apt
summary: Our sunny home is close to Bondi Bowling Club and a short stroll to cafes and the beach. Also very close to bus stops and not far from the Rose Bay Ferry wharf. You’ll love our place because of the cosiness, the location, the kitchen & the garden. Our place is good for couples and families (with kids), with lots of toys for little ones to play with.
space: We live in a quiet apartment block but we are so close to everything including some great playgrounds nearby and fun cafes and bars a stone's throw away. Also very close are the local shops for easy grocery shopping, as well as a bottle shop!
description: Our sunny home is close to Bondi Bowling Club and a short stroll to cafes and the beach. Also very close to bus stops and not far from the Rose Bay Ferry wharf. You’ll love our place because of the cosiness, the location, the kitchen & the garden. Our place is good for couples and families (with kids), with lots of toys for little ones to play with. We live in a quiet apartment block but we are so close to everything including some great playgrounds nearby and fun cafes and bars a stone's throw away. Also very close are the local shops for easy grocery shopping, as well as a bottle shop! The HUGE backyard is available. If you need any assistance during your stay we have lovely neighbours who would be happy to assist you. You'll love being so close to the beach but after a busy day in the sun, being able to retreat to our quiet home or to chill in the garden. Free street parking is available nearby. Otherwise, it's 5 minute's walk to buses taking you to Bondi Junction (for the nearest t
neighborhood_overview: You'll love being so close to the beach but after a busy day in the sun, being able to retreat to our quiet home or to chill in the garden.
notes: There's a big table umbrella in the shared laundry that you're welcome to use for shade in the garden.
transit: Free street parking is available nearby. Otherwise, it's 5 minute's walk to buses taking you to Bondi Junction (for the nearest train station), Rose Bay or Watson's Bay.
access: The HUGE backyard is available.
interaction: If you need any assistance during your stay we have lovely neighbours who would be happy to assist you.

host.host_about: Born and bred in Bondi - I love all that living in this area has to offer. Easy bike ride to the beach, a multitude of beautiful places to swim, lots of great food, travelllers and locals making Bondi the colourful place it is! I've surfed up and down the East coast, Samoa and Bali with my surf-mad husband. We'd love to travel the world surfing - and relaxing! Our home is really cosy and we're very friendly with our neighbours. Life motto - the only constant is change :D

reviews.comments: I stayed at this place for 7 days. The description on the website is accurate and the location is superb. The only criticism is because the property is the owners family residence there was virtually no space to unpack a suitcase so we ended up using the kitchen table. Otherwise I was quite pleased with the apartment.
Thanks! Great little spot!
The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

How to get The here

To get The my building from Ataturk Istanbul Airport

1- from ATATURK AIRPORT ( IST), you can take either a taxi (about € 15) or take the METRO transfer to the tram in ZEYTINBURNU station ( direction to KABATAS or EMINONU) and get off at Beyazıt tram stop.

2- I can arrange shuttle service for you, more comfortable than public transportation ,  20.00 EUR/ one way . Please note that the car can take up to 3 people
If sounds good for you, please send me your flight details with the airport details.Then I will send you confirmation.

To get The MY Building from Sabiha Gökcen Istanbul Airport ;

1- You can take a taxi from S.Airport to here and cost will be around 200.00 TL ( around 40 EUR /one way.)

2- To reach here from SABIHA GOKCEN AIRPORT (SAW); you can take the HAVATAS bus to TAKSIM. From TAKSIM,The easiest way is to taking a taxi ( 8 EUR app.) or take the FUNIKULER ( subway) to KABATAS, change to TRAM and get off at BEYAZIT tram stop. If you are 3 people, taking the taxi from TAKSIM costs the same amount by taking the public transportation.   

3- I can arrange shuttle service for you, more comfortable than public transportation ,  45 EUR/ one way . Please note that the car can take up to 3 people

If sounds good for you, please send me your flight details with the airport details.Then we will send you confirmation.

To reach the here from the Bus Terminal (Otogar), you can take the metro from the bus terminal to Aksaray, and transfer to the tram ( direction to KABATAS or EMINONU) and get off at BEYAZIT tram stop.

From the BEYAZIT tram station it is about 200 m walk. The tram service stops at midnight.

reviews.comments: La habitación es muy cómoda y limpia. El baño privado fundamental.

Alper es un excelente anfitrión! Su buena comunicación, los datos de cómo moverse por Estambul, lugares que visitar, dónde es más barato comprar o simplemente para terminar el día junto a una buena taza de té turco, se agradecen porque va más allá de Airbnb.
Respecto al lugar, excelente ubicación! Barrio muy movido por el comercio y cerca de muchas atracciones; la habitación está muy bien, en excelentes condiciones, todo muy limpio y tranquilo.
Más que recomendable!
Thank you to Alper for everythink. Good deal. Very punctual person

Alper is a wonderful host. I arrived early in the morning on the first day of Ramadan feast and he woke up early on his holidays to come meet me and help me get settled in to the city. The room has a private bathroom and is located very close to great attractions like Sultanahmet and the Grand Bazaar.
It was cool to live in Alper's place. It's near the all historical places and the host was friendly. Thanks 4 everthing.
Alper’s place is lovely. Central, easy to walk to anywhere in the heart of the city and close to public transportation. Alper was very kind and helpful. Highly recommended.
Alper is a really good host, he was really helpful. His apartment is in a very good place, close to everything that you need to see in Istanbul. We enjoyed our stay!

Had a nice stay at alpers place. He is a great host and was warm and welcoming. The room was quiet, Well  heated for the winter, and had some nice touches. It's an older building, but you can see that he is making updates to it everyday. My unit had nice new floors and an updated bathroom, but walls were a little old. Some paint chips in areas. Also no elevator, no problem for me, but might be for elderly. If you're looking for a palace, look else where. But if you need a quiet place to sleep that has clean bedding and a proper bathroom, then the value of this place is great. For the price it's a great deal. You'll be happy. Close to alot of main attractions, shopping area, and plenty of restaurants. Building has 5 units and his office. It's above a bunch of shoe stores.
Alper is very helpfull. We stayed 6 days in Istanbul. Nearless bazarr and  bleu mosck... convinience restaurant and others, thank you Alper, see you.

Nice place which is in very good location close to everything all museums , Hagia Sofia Palace ,Blue Mosque , Islamic Museum , Achaeological Museum , Grand Bazar ,Spice Bazar ,Tram station 2mn walk , few mnts to all varieties can of restaurants cafe shops and the price is very economic as well, the people are very helpful just ask especially Mr Alper

We had a terrific stay at Alper's appartment. The flat is very central and located within walking distance to blue mosque and aya soohia. Alper himself was very friendly and he offered tipps and help from throughout our stay. We will definetly comw back!

First  of all the location was so good . Accomadation place was clean and he helped us for find  place also biring our lagguage . Than he's personality was so kind and helpfull . I will chose the same host for my next visit .

excellent location, within walking distance to many of the main attractions in  Istanbul: Hagia Sophia 15 min, Blue Mosque 15 min, Grand Bazaar (5 minutes), Suleyman Palace 15 min, Topkapi 25 min; a couple of minutes to the tram station that gets you to Galata Bridge (10 min). Lots of assistance from Alper, the nicest Host ever. Dark room with no view on the 3rd floor.

You will never regret to stay at Alper Place. the room was so clean and quiet. and Alper was very very kind to us. He was sincerely helped me and my friend. With no hestitate he took our lugagges to the room and he can be 24 hours map for us, he tell all the way to the destination that we are going to go. It was my first time came to Turkey and he gave us a very good first impression of Turkish people. Very helpful. Definitely if i go back to Turkey i will stay at Alper place. Tesekkur Ederim Alper :)
Отличное расположение. Все рядом. В номере есть все необходимое и достаточное чтобы переночевать, принять душ. Горячая вода кстати только в душе.

Nice apartment and well located, near the Grand Bazar and just next to the tramway.
We had drops of water in the bathroom the first night and Alper found a solution to change our apartment the same day.
Place is clean. Near most of main places to visit.

We enjoyed our stay in Istanbul. The room was clean, the staff was very helpful and kind. The location is safe and close to the tram and main tourist attractions. For the price, it we couldn't have wished better! Thank you!

name: Made4U - Glória      NEW!!!
summary: The ideal apartment to visit the magnificent city of Porto and the northern region of Portugal, with family or with a couple of friends. Comfortable and spacious with contemporary decor, furniture and new and quality equipment.
space: New apartment in the ground floor of a fully refurbished and rebuilt centenary building, recovering its original facade and finishing, adding a contemporary comfort. Concluded in October'16, it is located in an extremely picturesque district of Porto city: Lapa! There you can easily live and share with Porto local people. Located in the city center with excellent access to the historic center, 400 meters from Faria Guimarães metro station and 10 minutes walk from the historic downtown Porto. It has fine finishes, including wood floors and window frames also in wood with double glass for perfect isolation from outside noises so you can have the perfect sleep.  It has one bedroom with a king size bed, fitted wardrobes, a private full bathroom and an outdoor cozy patio. The living room is equipped with a sofa-bed (double bed) served by a toilet service. It has also a fully equipped kitchenette. The bathrooms are equipped with toiletries (toilet paper, soap, shampoo and shower gel), bath a
description: The ideal apartment to visit the magnificent city of Porto and the northern region of Portugal, with family or with a couple of friends. Comfortable and spacious with contemporary decor, furniture and new and quality equipment. New apartment in the ground floor of a fully refurbished and rebuilt centenary building, recovering its original facade and finishing, adding a contemporary comfort. Concluded in October'16, it is located in an extremely picturesque district of Porto city: Lapa! There you can easily live and share with Porto local people. Located in the city center with excellent access to the historic center, 400 meters from Faria Guimarães metro station and 10 minutes walk from the historic downtown Porto. It has fine finishes, including wood floors and window frames also in wood with double glass for perfect isolation from outside noises so you can have the perfect sleep.  It has one bedroom with a king size bed, fitted wardrobes, a private full bathroom and an outdoor cozy p
neighborhood_overview: Glória street is just in the heart of Porto, an easy way to the historic center and a quick pedestrian access to all the attractions of Porto downtown (Douro River, Aliados Square, Clérigos Tower, ...). Its location also allows a quick access, by the subway or just walking, to Santa Catarina street and Boavista area, giving you the opportunity to know the lifestyle of Porto inhabitants. Nearby, you will find all the necessary amenities: supermarket, pharmacy, bakeries, restaurants and cafés… at night, you can walk around the city and its fun. Find Porto where, side by side, we have a secular history and an artistic legacy. Find the culture, the architecture (with a variety of museums), theaters, cinemas and the international music festivals. Learn the Porto wine history, its cellars and the Douro farms.
notes: Número de Registo (Alojamento Local): 34015/AL
transit: Within walking distance of the historic center, guests can easily explore the city by foot or by public transport, with metro, taxis and buses at your doorstep. North and the rest of the country are also accessible by bus and train stations, less than 10 minutes away. From the airport to get to the apartment just take the metro Line E (purple Line) and exit at Trindade station (a 15-minutes walk and you are in the apartment) or, alternatively, change at Trindade station to line D (yellow line) and exit at Faria Guimarães station (400m from the apartment entrance). Parking in Porto downtown is paid during the day, and there are parking spaces in a 2-minutes walk from the building. You can also find for a underground parking with an additional cost.
access: The airport is a short distance of 50 minutes by subway or 20 minutes by taxi.
interaction: It will be a pleasure to know our guests and we are always available to give some informations and suggestions of those places, typical restaurants and bars that only Porto native citizens know, making your stay memorable… feeling like at home!

host.host_about:
ENJOY PORTUGAL (Grupo Arrenda na Hora)) emerged in 2014 creating a new concept on rentals. 
We seek to implement a network of specialized stores in each area which should be considered by the market as the one-time place to handle rental issues.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The appartment is just perfect location to visit Porto and very comfortable ! The host was so helpfull and gave us many great suggestions. Thank you very much Joao!

We had a very nice stay at this appartement and absolutely loved it! It's fully renovated, very cosy, and clean,  of course there is everything we needed. The area of Lapa has a lot of charm, also it's easy to get to the metro and the city centre on foot. 
We arrived at late night but João was waiting for us near the metro station and welcoming us! We highly recommend this appartement to everybody and hope we come back one day. Muito obrigada!
Excellent séjour, appartement très beau et bien situé. Très bon accueil de la part de Joao

We loved everything about our stay at João's place. It is a welcoming and relaxing space with everything you might need. The neighborhood is within easy walking distance of the city center, nestled in a quiet little street at the top of a hill. João's personal recommendations came in quite handy a few times and we very much appreciated his warm and enthusiastic welcome. He was communicative and made himself available in case we needed anything. Highly recommended! We can't wait to go back to Porto and stay at João's place again!

Je recommande sans hésitation ! L'appartement est vraiment parfait et fonctionnel. L'emplacement et le quartier sont très typique et dépaysant tout en étant très proche du centre-ville (10 minutes à pied). Il est également proche de plusieurs supermarchés. 

Par ailleurs, l'appartement est décoré avec énormément de goût et l'équipement mis à disposition est de qualité. Tout est fournis pour passer des super vacances!

Nous avons été accueilli par Joao, il a vraiment pris le temps pour nous et nous a donner pleins de conseils sur la vie à Porto. 

Verdict : c'est un appartement parfait à reserver sans attendre!

We stayed here for 3 nights. Great appartment and located in the middle of authentic Porto. Everything is on walking distance. João is a wonderful host, very friendly and has great tips. We would definitely recommend it!
Un lugar perfecto, muy bien ubicado y súper bien equipado! João es un súper host!! Regraseremos pronto

Modern, clean and great Appartement. Personal and warm welcome with typical portuguese cake and informations about the must see places in Porto. The Appartement is 10min away from city center up the hill.  All in all well organized. Thank you for the nice stay

El apartamento está muy bien equipado y cuenta con todo lo que necesitas. A 15 minutos andando del centro, es una zona tranquila sin ningún ruido. Joao fue encantador, nos  recibió, estuvo atento durante nuestra estancia y nos informó sobre qué ver en Oporto. ¡Lo recomiendo!
