It was an awesome 18 days I spent at the apartment. Joao was very helpful and welcomed me with pastel de nata. :)
The house was clean and in a good condition. When I needed Joao's help he was always there right away and answered my questions or helped me. Thanks man, all the best to you in the future!

Die Wohnung hat unsere Erwartungen übertroffen, wir wurden herzlich empfangen.
Die Kommunikation im Vorfeld war Super, Joao ist stets hilfsbereit und steht mit Tips zur Stadt zur Seite.
Die Wohnung ist super ausgestattet und sehr sauber, die Angaben der Beschreibung stimmen absolut überein.
Die Lage der Wohnung ist ruhig und sicher, die Altstadt ist gut zu Fuß zu erreichen. 
Wir empfehlen die Wohnung definitiv weiter.

La experiencia ha sido increíble. El apartamento era muy cómodo y estaba muy limpio, en un barrio muy tranquilo y peculiar. João es un anfitrión estupendo muy amable y atento, pendiente en todo momento por si necesitabamos algo. Te da unos consejos de la ciudad y para comer muy recomendables. Hemos pasado unos días increíbles en Oporto y la verdad que esperamos repetir. Solo tengo palabras de agradecimiento para João

Notre séjour dans l'appartement situé dans un quartier très charmant, authentique et calme a été très agréable. La ville peut-être parfaitement découverte à pieds et les recommandations (sites à visiter, restos, etc.) ainsi que l'accueil très chaleureux de notre hôte ont fait que nous y avons passé des super vacances. Merci beaucoup!

The apartment is beautiful, clean, and very conveniently located about 15 minutes on foot from Aliados, where a number of free walking tours start. The apartment is a very short walk to the Lapa metro station, which is about 30 minutes away from the airport, though note that the airport metro is quite infrequent and can get very full, so factor in that wait time.

There are plenty of coffee shops, a bakery, and restaurants around to have a nice breakfast before you go out for a day of sight-seeing. And if you're late risers like us, you can't beat the €4.50 fixed price lunch you can get, for instance, at the restaurants on Rua do Paraiso nearby. Also, if you're feeling like a glass of wine or port or a cup of tea after a long day of walking and sight-seeing, we highly recommend a place called BUuh!, at Praça da República 164 (on the way home from city centre). Amazingly cozy atmosphere, with beautiful mid-20th century antique furniture, playing 60s and 70s rock music, and a wide selection of teas and pastries.

Our host, João, was very nice and communicative. Our flight landed late on Friday and he patiently waited for us to get to the flat and pick up our keys, with delicious natas and a lot of suggestions for sightseeing.
Hemos disfrutado mucho del apartamento. Estuvimos como en casa. No le falta detalle. Y Joao ha sido muy atento con nosotros. Gracias!

We were perfectly welcomed and hosted by João. This Lovely appartement, it's functional and so cosy and offers wonderful amenities. We had a great accommodation.  Hope to be back soon. Thanks again João!

Great place, located 10 minutes from the historic centre of Porto. The apartment is like on the picture. My friend and myself were hosted perfectly by Joao. The apartment has all you need to enjoy your stay there.
Excelente anfitrión y hermoso apartamento. Súper ubicado

Superbe appartement dans un quartier três charmant. João a été très prévenent et présent en nous donnant pleins d'indications et de conseils.
Je recommande!

The apartment was really clean and beautiful like on the pictures the flat is located in the district of Lapa ( really good location peaceful and at the same time really close to the center). Very short walk to go to the metro ( Faria Guimarães ) or 10/15 min walk to the center. We were perfectly welcomed and hosted by João. I highly recommend

The aparment is approximately 20-25 minutes walk away from the river and the city center. The connection to the public transportation is very good, the next two metro stations can be reached in 5 to 10 minutes walk. The apartment is bigger than expected from the pictures, and due to the thick stone walls it's always cool inside. However, for us it got a little too cold during the nights sometimes.
João was a great host and very flexible with the check-inn. He devoted some time to show us the most important attractions on a map and gave a lot of good recommendations for typical Portuguese food.
Overall, we really enjoyed our stay!

Gostámos imenso do João. Cumprimentou-nos com pastéis de nata e com um mapa do Porto. Depois de termos combinado os detalhes da nossa estadia (check-out, etc.), o João ainda teve tempo para nos dar informações úteis para os próximos dias. Explicou-nos qual a melhor cave de Vinho do Porto, os pontos mais interessantes da cidade, etc. Mesmo já conhecendo a cidade do Porto, aprendemos detalhes importantes e viemos a conhecer lugares que desconhecíamos anteriormente. Muito obrigado, João!     
O apartamento fica perto da estação Faria Guimarães. Mesmo havendo estações menos distantes, vale a pena ter em conta o aviso do João para sair em Faria Guimarães. :D Apesar de o apartamento não ficar muito longe do centro, é importante notar que demora mais ou menos 15 minutos para chegar a pé à Avenida dos Aliados e a outros sítios importantes da cidade. 
O apartamento é bastante giro e bem organizado (com uma decoração muita moderna). Não temos queixa de nada. Pois, encontrámos tudo aquilo que necessitávamos. Fica na zona histórica do bairro da Lapa que é uma zona muito tranquila e bonita com cafés e restaurantes tradicionais. Aconselhámos escolher este apartamento para uma estadia no Porto!

L'appartement est fidèle aux photos : sublime ! 
Il est situé dans une petite rue pavée, avec des stationnements tout proche et un magasin d'alimentation à 500m. Le logement est propre, et frais (en été c'est important), spacieux étau calme!  
Il faut par contre compter 20 min pour se rendre au cais de ribeira et plus de 30 au retour (car ca grimpe pas mal !) 
Joao nous a également très bien accueilli, nous a donné pleins d'informations et d'adresses ou manger. 
Séjour parfait a Porto !

Although we arrived half an hour late, João was waiting for us with a smile in the apartment. He welcomed us with two tasty "Pasteis de nata" and showed us the apartment, before giving us plenty of useful advice about the city, good restaurants, bakeries, cultural places and some authentic insider tips. The apartment was very clean, comfortable and fresh, although we could feel some humidity. The neighbourhood was very quiet and at night we could truly rest without any noise. The apartment is not far from the centre, from two metro stations and from a bakery, a supermarket and other commodities. We strongly recommend João and his accomodation!
Visit porto on 23-24 of June, Sao João fiesta is great !!!

Appartement très bien situé dans le quartier de Lapa à 10 minutes à pied du centre de Porto. Station de métro à proximité. Joao est convivial et accueillant, il parle un anglais parfait se se tient à la disposition de ses hôtes. Nous avons bcp apprécié qu'il prenne de nos nouvelles en cours de séjour pour s'assurer que tout se passait bien. Le logement est décoré avec goût, confortable et très propre. S'il devait y avoir une seule (petite) critique, c'est le manque d'isolation avec l'appartement du dessus... nous avons parfois été génés par le bruit des occupants peu discrets (français )
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement et cet hôte pour un week-end à Porto !
Super accueil

Everything about this space is beautiful! Very easy to navigate around the area. Close to shops and restaurants and an easy walk to tourist attractions. 

João was incredibly helpful with tips on where to go, what to enjoy and how to eat locally. We took all his suggestions and loved everything. He made us feel so welcomed!

Nous n'avons pas rencontré João, mais il était parfaitement réactif par message, et son collègue Pedro nous a accueilli et nous a bien renseigné sur la ville !
L'appartement est parfaitement situé, dans une rue calme et pittoresque ! La station de métro la plus proche n'est qu'à 3 min à pied et le centre historique  est accessible à pied en moins de 10 min.
Nous avons passé une petite semaine dans cet appartement, parfaitement équipé, un vrai bonheur ! C'est un petit havre de paix dans cette jolie ville !

Logement agréable, situé dans un quartier typique de Porto, très bien équipé pour la vie de tous les jours. 
Hôte disponible et sympathique. João a su mettre à notre disposition toutes sortes d'informations très utiles à notre séjour. 
Nous recommandons ce logement.
Joao is a great host. The apartment was clean and exactly as shown in pictures. Neighborhood is quiet. About a 15 min walk to the city center.

The apartment is centrally located and very well equipped. We just had all we need, and we were close to the metro and bus stops.
Joao gave us a warm welcome and has been very helpful throughout our stay. We can only be very positive with our stay and Joao's hospitality!
Perfect place to start exploring Porto!! Perfect host, very comfortable place and great location!

El apartamento está muy bien: tiene mucho encanto, 2 baños (1 aseo y otro con ducha muy cómoda). La cocina está completamente equipada y hay wifi. No vi lavadora, pero supongo que no es importante para una estancia corta. También tiene un patio interior con mesita y taburetes, que va bien para los fumadores. 
Está muy cerca de Trindade, la estación de metro que une todas las líneas. Además en Trindade hay taquillas para dejar las maletas a muy buen precio si se llega con antelación a la entrada al apartamento o si el vuelo de regreso es muy tarde (4,50€ por 12 horas).
Cerca del apartamento hay un supermercado que tiene de todo y farmacia y café para desayunar (aunque el piso ya está equipado con máquina de café para los más necesitados). 
João nos recibió puntual con una sorpresita y nos hizo recomendaciones de sitios que ver. Durante la estancia también nos contactó para saber si todo iba bien. Le preguntamos recomendaciones y estuvo atento, respondiendo casi al instante. 10 para João! ;) Muchas gracias!
PD: hay toallas, sábanas, cualquier cosa que no es necesario llevar en la maleta para 3 días...

Suberbe appartement sur les hauteures de Porto, dans les petites rues pavées.
Joao a été un hôte parfait.
Nous étions contraints d'arriver à 23h dans l'appartement, Joao nous a attendu en nous accueillant avec des petites patisseries locales. Il a pris le temps de nous présenter le quartier et la ville en nous conseillant plein de d'endroits sympathiques.

Very positive, sociable host. You can communicate with him as a friend, give answers to all the questions of interest. He helped with the parking, suggested where there is free parking nearby. I've always been in touch. Another gave a tip to several places of interest for visiting, as well as restaurants with local cuisine. The apartment is clean, all photos are correct.

João' place was fantastic - it was very clean, modern and exactly as pictured.

This is one of my favourite Air BnB's, I will definitely be back!
El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos. La estancia fue genial durante todos los días.

We had a lovely stay in the apartmnet which is very comfortable for 2 persons, spacious and equipped with everything you may need for a short stay. João was really helpful and explained us everyhting we had to know about Porto.
The location is a bit further away than we thought, but you are still able to reach everything by foot.

João is very uncomplicated und simpatico. You can ask him everything.
The apartment is very nice and stylish and a good location to explore Porto by foot. The communication is very good, he always remains reachable via his cell phone and gives valuable tips about supermarkets nearby, good restaurants,...

João's apartment is really lovely. We had a very comfortable stay. It is quiet overnight but only a short walk from the historic centre. There is a supermarket close by, in addition to a bakery, cafés and a metro stop on the airport line. The apartment was very clean and as seen in the photographs. João was there to meet us when we arrived and he left us some excellent recommendations for things to do and see while in Porto. We would highly recommend this apartment for a stay in Porto. Thank you!

El apartamento era tal cual se anunciaba. Tenía muchos detalles y todo estaba muy limpio. Cerca del centro lo que nos ha permitido recorrer los puntos más importantes de la ciudad a pie sin necesidad de coger coche. Hemos pasado un fin de semana muy agradable en Oporto. Para repetir.
Great place and perfect location to allow you to have a short walk and explore the streets on the way to the very centre of the city. Would definitely consider returning.

Un logement bien situé, cosy, propre et agréable. Mais surtout un hôte très sympathique, flexible sur l'heure d'arrivée et attentionné. Notre séjour chez Joao s'est très bien passé. Nous recommandons ce logement.

Wir (m22, w23) verbrachten im September 5 Nächte im Made4U Gloría. Die Anreise vom Flughafen gestaltete sich mit den öffentlichen Verlehrsmitteln als günstige (2,50 € p.P.) und unkomplizierte Lösung. Der Fußweg von der nächstgrößten Station (Trindade) beträgt ca. 10 min.  Als wir am Apartment ankamen, erwartete uns Joao bereits und erklärte uns alle relevanten Gegebenheiten äußerst freundlich. Darüber hinaus gab er uns erste Tipps zu Sehenswürdigkeiten und zur näheren Umgebung (Supermarkt etc.). Die Wohnung an sich ist komplett neu saniert und weist keine Gebrauchsspuren auf. Bei Ankunft war diese komplett gereinigt. Die Ausstattung der Küche ist äußerst umfangreich. Wir vermissten bei zweimaligem Kochen keinerlei Utensilien. Die unmittelbare Nachbarschaft bestand aus Wohngebäuden und war insgesamt sehr ruhig.  Allerdings muss gesagt werden, dass die Decke der Wohnung nicht gut schallgedämmt ist, sodass jeder Schritt oben, unten zu hören ist. Uns störte dieser Umstand jedoch nur geringfügig. Alles in allem waren wir sehr zufrieden mit dieser Unterkunft und können das Apartment wärmstens weiterempfehlen!

Petit appartement bien situé, il est possible de se rendre à pied partout depuis Le studio. Dans une rue typique de Porto et très calme. Le seul point négatif est l'isolation car on entend très bien les voisins... João est très gentil et serviable. Il nous a donné de très bons conseils concernant la ville. Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

When we arrived João was waiting for us and welcomed us with great enthusiasm. The apartment is great and just like described and pictures. It was very clean, the bed and the shower are great. 

Just down the street towards the city center there is a great little bakery called Celeste, it was cheap and they have a terrace in the back where we had breakfast every morning.

The location is good, it's a close enough to the city center.
Joao was very good host. He gave us very good tips for Porto. The appartment was perfect! We really enjoyed!

It’s a beautiful flat with high ceilings and everything you need. Joao was really easy to communicate with and gave us lots of tips for the city. It’s a bit of a walk to the city centre but the location is still great. Our only complaint is that the flat is quite damp and because you can’t keep the windows open when you go out (it’s a ground floor flat) you can definitely smell the damp when you come back. I’m quite sensitive to
damp & mold and got an allergic reaction from this. But apart from that the flat is very nice.

Nous sommes restés 3 jours à Porto chez Joao.Ce dernier est un hôte impeccable .L'appartement est bien situé,nous étions à 15 minutes du centre de Porto en marchant.C'est très propre et convivial.Pour ceux qui aime sentir la vie  d'un quartier c'est parfait.

Appartement magnifique avec une belle hauteur sous plafond et décoré avec goût. Bien situé, tout se fait à pied et des commerces se situent à proximités (boulangerie, supermarché, café ...). João nous a donné de bons conseils et des bons plans pour visiter Porto. Merci encore pour les petites spécialités du Portugal ! Si nous devons revenir à Porto, notre choix se portera dessus sans hésitation.

Joao, un hôte très sympathique, il nous a accueilli avec des pâtisseries locales et une bouteille d'eau. Il a pris le temps de nous donner pleins d'informations pour visiter Porto. Durant notre séjour, petit texto de sa part pour savoir si tout se passait bien. Appartement très agréable, propre et calme donnant sur une petite rue pavée à seulement 15 minutes à pied du centre ville. Vivement à recommander

Apartamento genial, limpio, cómodo, tal como se muestra en las fotos. Joao es un anfitrión fantástico, muy amable, nos dio mucha información sobre Porto cuando llegamos y buenas recomendaciones. Durante la estancia se preocupó de que todo fuera bien. Muy recomendable.
João nous a très bien accueilli, il sait mettre à l’aise et donner de bons conseils pour profiter un maximum du séjour! Très agréable et chaleureux! À recommander sans hésitation!

Nous venons de passer une petite semaine dans un appartement très moderne, très propre ; Joao nous attendait (petit problème pour trouver la rue Gloria) .. et nous a super bien accueilli ; Joao nous a montré sur la carte de Porto tous les endroits à visiter ; une spécialité de Porto nous attendait aussi ... Trop bon !!! Je vous conseiller ce petit endroit trop mignon 
à Porto pour passer quelques jours à Porto ;

João was a really great host. He welcomed us very hearty and made us fell home in the cosy appartment. From João we got all the necessary information we needed to get to know Porto. The communication was clear, friendly and always quick. Thank you so much for caring and letting us stay in the beautiful apparment Gloria.
Very nice and clean apartment at cool, local looking street. not big but very cozy :)

Excellent Airbnb magnifique appartement agréable à utiliser. Très calme. Joao nous a donné plein de conseils pour visiter Porto (super ville). Suffisamment proche du centre. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés.
La casa es perfecta, tiene de todo. Muy limpia y acogedora. Joao muy simpático y atento. Ubicación buena, cerca del centro, a 10 minutos andando. Lo recomendamos 100%

Bel endroit, décoration cosy, spacieux, bien fourni, propre. Accueil très chaleureux avec beaucoup d'informations données, très prévenant.
Les hics :
- reste un peu excentré des quais et de l'hypercentre (20 bonnes minutes à pieds, avec bonne montée au retour)
- surtout, appartement dont la température est gérée par domotique, avec impossibilité de contrôle par l'invité (un seul module de chauffage dans la chambre, qui illumine quand allumé la nuit et fait du bruit, pas de télécommande disponible, réglage de la température de façon automatique et non continue, ou choisie par le propriétaire à distance sans concertation). Donc lorsque nous sommes arrivés et que la température intérieure était de 17 degrés, nous avons dû appeler João (qui nous a accueilli mais n'est pas le propriétaire) pour qu'il demande au propriétaire d'allumer le chauffage, ce qui a mis du temps... Et celui ci s'allumait et s'éteignait par la suite de façon automatique... Bref, pas agréable de ne pas avoir le contrôle de la température de l'endroit que l'on loue...
- les propriétaires sont venus dans l'appartement pendant que nous n'y étions pas sans nous prévenir (pour rebrancher le wifi que nous avions coupé et voir pour le chauffage), pas très agréable non plus...
Bref, bel appartement mais séjour mitigé.

João und sein Apartment haben meine Erwartungen übertroffen! Er ist flexibel, sympathisch und vor allem hilfsbereit. Schon vor Anreise wurden wir mit Infomaterial versorgt und auch während unseres Aufenthaltes bot er sich als direkter Ansprechpartner an. Die Wohnung ist perfekt gelegen in einer schönen Gegend und von ihr aus sind zu Fuß alle sehenswerten Viertel erreichbar. Auch einen Supermarkt gibt es direkt um die Ecke. Sonst hält sie genau das was sie schon auf den Bildern verspricht. Die Ausstattung lässt keine Wünsche offen und man kann sich wirklich wohlfühlen. 
 Wir hatten auf jeden Fall eine tolle Zeit!
João was a wonderful host. He gave us some great tips the moment we arrived! Very responsive to communication.
Logement très bien situé et impeccablement tenu. Joao sait également très bien accueillir ses hôtes : petit attention à l'arrivée, bonnes adresses.

Recomendable. Zona tranquila con aparcamiento gratis en la calle de al lado. Se puede llegar caminando al centro. El apartamento está muy limpio y tiene todo lo necesario para que que te sientas como de casa. Es funcional y está decorado con buen gusto. Joao es un anfitrión muy atento.

Muchas gracias João porque estuvimos muy cómodas. El apartamento está muy cerca del centro de Oporto (10/15 minutos andando). João es un buen anfitrión y nos resolvió los problemas rápidamente. El vecindario es tranquilo, no tiene nada de ruido. Muy recomendable.

Joao estuvo muy atento desde el momento de la reserva, mandando con antelación recomendaciones para llegar, sitios que visitar y en los que comer, que nos fueron de mucha utilidad.
La casa estaba impecable y es muy agradable y silenciosa. Tiene todos los detalles necesarios y además te da la bienvenida con unos ricos pasteis de cortesía. Nos volveremos a hospedar aquí la próxima vez que vayamos a Oporto!

Logement conforme à la description et aux photos, bien aménagé et propre. Joao est très accueillant et nous a spontanément transmis de nombreuses informations. L'appartement était un peu froid à notre arrivé mais avec le chauffage/climatisation, la chambre se réchauffe rapidement. L'appartement est un peu en dehors du centre mais est facilement atteignable à pieds en 10-15minutes et des arrêts de métro sont à proximité. Séjour agréable, nous recommandons fortement cet appartement, merci!

Reservé este apartamento para 4 días para mis padres. Me comentaron que estuvieron muy a gusto. El apartamento está muy limpio, tiene todas las comodidades posibles y está genial ubicado. Ellos pasaron unos días muy cómodos en este apartamento. Además, el propietario Joao es un chico muy amable y estuvo siempre atento a las peticiones y dudas de mis padres. Lo recomiendo 100%.

Very awesome spot. João is very friendly and will tell you everything you need to know upon arrival. We arrived around 10:30PM and it was no problem. The place is very clean and has everything you will need. I recommend this to anyone that wants to live within the locals and walk down hill to the city centre.
Appartamento nuovo ,pulito e vicino alla vita notturna, Joao é stato gentilissimo e disponibile nel darci informazioni sulla città! Consigliato!

Wir hatten eine schöne Zeit in Porto, obwohl das Wetter im April nicht so mitgespielt hatte, wie erhofft. Joao hat uns sehr herzlich in der Unterkunft empfangen und uns mit vielen Tipps versorgt. Die Wohnung ist nicht weit vom Zentrum entfernt und hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Mit der Bahn kann man alles gut und auch günstig erreichen.

Eine schöne Wohnung in sehr guter Lage. Sehr gut ausgestattet, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Stadtzentrum waren fussläufig zu erreichen. Das einzige Manko war, dass die Wohnung sehr hellhörig war, also man hat jeden Schritt von den Nachbarn von oben gehört, aber wir waren den ganzen Tag unterwegs daher war das nicht so schlimm

Our stay in Porto would not have been the same if it weren't for Joao and this amazing place. Joao was there when we arrived which was awesome considering our email wasn't working properly. He was very attentive, showing us his recommendations for places to eat and shop and see. He helped us out with parking for the first night with or rental car and was quick to check in with us the day after check in to see how we were doing. He was genuine, professional and knowledgable about the area. He was very friendly and approachable which we love, especially travelling with a 6 month old. 
The place itself was very clean, well laid out, spacious and beautiful. The pictures truly don't do it enough justice. We enjoyed walking everywhere on our trip so location was perfect. It was close to many trendy places to eat and shop, about a 15-20 walk to the river. 
If we are lucky enough to come back to porto we will be reaching out to Joao again!
Thank you so much for such a fabulous stay!

The apartment is just as you can see in the pictures, perfect for a couple, and the location is very good (walking distance from the main attractions).
João was very helpful and thoughtful. Thanks a lot!

Wir haben die Wohnung geliebt. Sie ist noch größer als sie auf den Fotos erscheint. Super hell, schön eingerichtet und stylisch. Innerhalb von 10 Minuten ist man zu Fuß in der Innenstadt und kann damit alles zu Fuß erreichen. Wenn abends doch Mal die Beine müde sind kostet ein Taxi oder Uber auch weniger als 5€. João war ein toller Gastgeber, der uns viele Tipps gegeben hat. Absolut empfehlenswert!

The accommodation in Porto was very clean, cozy and beautiful. From the first moment on it felt like home. Jao was very welcoming and organized and recommended us places to visit. We loved this place and can definitely recommend it to everyone as it is very central and convenient. Thanks for everything, Jao!

Le logement est parfait, neuf et avec tout le nécessaire. Deco parfaite. Rien a redire. En revanche attention le logement est à 15-20mn à pied du centre. Mais cela ce fait facilement. Nous recommandons ce logement !!

Sitio muy bonito y acogedor. Una ubicacion excelente, cerca del centro y de facil acceso. Zona tranquila y silenciosa. Joao es un anfitrion excelente, grandes consejos y recomendaciones sobre la ciudad

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez João. L’appartement est situé un peu au nord du centre mais on y arrive très vite. João a été de très bon conseil et nous ne sommes pas déçu de l’appartement.

Porto war unser erstes Ziel auf unserer  Reise durch Portugal. Die Anbindung vom Flughafen zur  Wohnung ist dank der Metro sehr gut.  Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral. In der Nähe der Wohnung ist eine sehr leckere Bäckerei und ein gut ausgestatteter Supermarkt zu finden. João hat uns sehr freundlich in der Wohnung empfangen und erklärte uns alles sehr  ausführlich. Er gab uns sehr gute Tipps und erklärte uns die Stadt anhand eines Stadtplans. Zur Begrüßung schenkte uns João die bekannten Pateis de Nata, welche man unbedingt probieren sollte. Wir würden jederzeit wieder bei João übernachten. Die Wohnung ist super modern und sehr schön eingerichtet.
Beautiful Place, super nice host and one of Europe's absolute pearls... Hope to come back! Thank you João!

Cet appartement est vraiment agréable, bien décoré, dans un endroit très calme et typique : une petite ruelle pavée, habitée par de vrais locaux. Le quartier est à 10 minutes à pieds du centre, en hauteur de la ville, ce qui permet de profiter de la ville tout en logeant dans un quartier plus paisible et authentique. Les commerces à proximité sont fréquentés par les locaux, dont une excellente boulangerie située sur le chemin du centre-ville, parfait pour acheter le petit déjeuner en y allant. João est un hôte très accueillant qui a pris le temps de nous donner des conseils et nous a demandé deux fois si tout se passait bien pour nous pendant notre séjour de deux jours. Porto est une ville magnifique et ce logement est parfait pour la découvrir, je le recommande sans problème!

La estancia en el apartamento ha sido genial, el apartamento muy bonito, limpio y cerca del centro de Oporto, se puede ir andando. 
 João ha sido un encanto, nos dio toda la información que necesitábamos y fue muy amable con nosotros. Recomendáremos el sitio seguro.
Cozy, modern apartment with everything you need for a short stay. Our Host was very helpful. An easy walk into the city - we were very happy

We totally enjoyed our stay in Porto at João’s apartment. It’s exactly as pictured and he is a welcoming and helpful host. I feel like he goes above and beyond what is asked of him as a host as he waited for us to arrive (we were late because we got lost), gave us a tour, highlighted some main attractions, and welcomed us with traditional Portuguese pastries! He also made sure we were comfortable, especially since we are traveling with our 4 month old baby girl (we all shared the rather large bed and were quite fine). The apartment is close to all main attractions, all of which are within walking distance but far enough away that it’s fairly quiet at night. I definitely recommend his place!
Great place to stay during a trip to Porto. The apartment has everything you need and want and its closer to the city centre than you might think.
We hadden een erg goed verblijf bij João. De aankomst was erg attent met locale tips. Het appartement zelf is erg mooi en schoon, en heeft alles wat je nodig hebt. Een aanrader!

Um espaço excelente, exatamente o que vimos na fotos; o João nos recebeu muito bem com os tradicionais pastéis de nata, nos apresentou os ambientes e nos deu ótimas dicas de passeios pela cidade. Super recomendado.

We had a really nice stay in this Airbnb. Nice modern furniture and a clean appartment. Its a 20 min. walk to the center of Porto. The bedroom was a bit humid, but we heard the air conditioning can solve this problem. We also heard some noise (footsteps etc.) in the morning from the neighbors above our apartment. João is a really nice and good host!
The apartment was beautiful and Joao is an amazing host! He gave us great local tips making our stay in Porto unforgettable!

Very warm welcome, lovely flat, air conditioner worked well;) 
It was clean, 15min to walk to the center - Supermarket and bakery around the corner. 
We loved to spend our time there and next time in Porto, we would spend our time there again.
Apartamento ótimo em rua charmosa. Fora da confusão da área turística, mas da para visitar tudo a pé.
Todo perfecto.
Netjes en fijne gastheer!

The apartment was very cozy and Joao was a welcoming and helpful host.
 The only downside was the location, which happened to be a bit further from the city centre than expected.
João foi extremamente atencioso e prestativo. Nos recebeu e nos ajudou sempre que necessário. O apartamento é impecável e muito confortável. Perfeito para um casal.  Recomendo fortemente.

Hier hat alles gepasst. Ein modernes, schick eingerichtetes und sauberes Apartment, zentral gelegen (Metro in 5 Min und Bushaltestelle in die Stadt in 1 Min Fußweg entfernt), in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße ... dazu eine reibungslose und freundliche Kommunikation mit Joao, was will man mehr. Definitive Empfehlung wenn man ein paar Tage die schöne Stadt Porto entdecken möchte!

Notre séjour à porto a été fabuleux, l’appartement est très propre et conforme aux photos, sécuritaire, dans un quartier calme et à proximité de petits restos et épicerie! João a pris le temps de bien nous recevoir et de répondre à nos questions. L’appartement est parfait pour un couple, nous vous le recommandons!

Joao was always availble in case any problem and he was interesting about our stay in Oporto.
Very recomended because the situation in the city and the cleanness

Gostámos muito da estadia! O João recebeu-nos muito bem e recomendou-nos vários locais de interesse a visitar no Porto. O apartamento é igual às fotografias apresentadas no anúncio e tem ótimas condições.

Bel et authentique appartement dans un quartier typique portugais (conforme aux photos (Website hidden by Airbnb) entouré d'habitants chaleureux. Joao est formidable : super accueil et conseils sur (Website hidden by Airbnb) sait mettre à l'aise les voyageurs et s'assure de votre confort tout au long de votre séjour. Merci encore pour (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande les yeux fermés :)
Cet appartement est très propre, agréable et João un hôte exeptionnel ! Je recommande chaudement.

Exactly as advertised! João is an wonderful host and was so super helpful. He met us right on the clock and spent a good amount of time telling us about Porto, nearby areas, eateries,etc. Yes, we also got the welcome with the Portuguese custard tarts, and they are actually some of the better ones we have had in Portugal. The bed was super comfortable and the size of the shower was awesome - so spacious! Loved the cute little street on which the place was located. The grocery store is nearby. Easy to get to and from the Ribeira area (aside from all the hills). The only 2 things that could’ve been better is the wifi in the bedroom and the noise above us - from about 11PM there is a lot of stomping and while we stayed here there was hammering and drilling for 2 mornings on the row - but obviously this may not be the case when you stay here. Seriously though, this place is really great overall, and if we ever return to Porto again we will 100% consider staying here again!

O apartamento é uma graça e o João foi muito solicito, nos deu dicas sobre o local e todas as informações necessárias. 
Eu recomendo.
Très bonne réactivité aux messages, logement conforme au descriptif, accueil parfait et très bon conseil.  Merci Joao
João was outstanding giving clear and practical advices

The apartment was in a great location, on a very quiet residential street. Although the very occasional car came by, it was much more common to see people walking down the street. The neighbors were friendly when we ran into them on the street. It is worth a note that the neighbors upstairs have a small child who can be a bit noisy, but it wasn't an issue for us.

The apartment was within walking distance of most things and we walked downtown, to the water and a variety of neighborhoods without issue. There are plenty of local shops, a grocery and restaurants nearby (~10 minute walk).

João was a great host providing lots of local advice from places to eat to things to see. He spent time marking up a map for us with options. We enjoyed our stay and would certainly stay with João again.

João’s place is amazing for the price! You can stroll straight into the centre of Porto and even to the waterfront if you wish; if not, it’s incredibly close to the nearest Metro. João himself was a great host, offering us advice and being incredibly welcoming. The apartment itself is beautiful, ideally located and the bed is very comfortable. The only issue was the shower, which didn’t drain very effectively, and had to be managed to prevent overflowing into the bathroom. However, this wasn’t big enough of an issue to negate all of the positives of our stay! We couldn’t recommend João’s place any more for a couple looking to explore Porto!
Bon accueil dans un appartement qui offre tout le confort nécessaire à un excellent séjour
Appartement très beau et propre, bien situé. Je recommande
João was really sympathic and give us good recommandation in the city ! Everything was easy to go and leave the appartement. The appartement is in a pretty street not far from center! I recommande!
Alojamiento muy bien situado, en una zona muy tranquila. Apartamento bien equipado y limpio. Joao es muy hospitalario y te da información sobre qué visitar.
Location is good. Clean space with all you need for a citybreak. Value for money. Great host.
Lovely flat in a great location. Perfect for exploring beautiful Porto!

The apartment is nicely Decorated and João was so kind to give us recommendations on where to go around the area. The bed is huge and there is a small little balcony just next to the bed. Would be perfect for a sunny weather! Great apartment!

The place is located in a cute street very close to the subway and walking distance to the centre if downtown to tourist sights. The place is very quiet. João was very hospitable and kind welcoming us. A cool modern and clean place.
Buena situación del apartamento, a unos 15’ a pie de la plaza Aliada o Torre de Clérigos. El apartamento siendo muy sencillo tiene lo suficiente para estar cómodo allí. Para nosotros un 9 sobre 10
Excelente estadia. Espaço perfeito. Em relação a localização o melhor trajeto é pela Igreja da Lapa.
Fantastic host and a lovely apartment perfect for a stay in Porto.

name: Apt on Johnston - Holiday Room
summary: Private room located in Wan Chai. Private toilet, cooker, fridge. Wifi, Air-Con, full furnitures provided. Modern style, Well maintained, and Clean. 5min walk from the MTR.
description: Private room located in Wan Chai. Private toilet, cooker, fridge. Wifi, Air-Con, full furnitures provided. Modern style, Well maintained, and Clean. 5min walk from the MTR.

host.host_about: Your choice for urban staying

address.street: Wanchai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Carlos has been very helpful and have solved every small issue very fast.
The room is small but functional, even if you want more than just a sleeping place.
Remember to ask about the hot water, because the control is a little bit tricky (actually the shower is the only negative aspect of my experience there, because hot water heater is not good...)
Rooom is in a great location. Communication with the host were very clear. Would stay again

The place is great. It's a small room (hey! it's Hong Kong), but it has everything you need, comfy bed, small bathroom, burner to cook, so you can prepare your own meals, AC, small wardrobe, space for bags under the bed or table. Great location, 3-4 minute walk to Wan Chai metro, easy to commute pretty much anywhere in HK. Lots of stores and restaurants right outside the building.
Carlos is a great host, even though you might not see him much, he'll do everything to make you comfortable. Took care of all little details (adapter, bath towel, laundry advice etc.) and it's very easy to communicate with him. Highly recommend the place to stay, if you're not too picky about room space, but there's so much to do in HK, it's not worth sitting in the room. I spent here 20 days without any issues and will definitely come back if I'm in HK again.
Thank you!
Miko
Carlos was very helpful and the studio was exactly what I needed. Very easy!
Quite small but have everything one might need for a short trip. It was good staying there for a few nights
Everything was fine. Would definitely stay here again on my next trip to Hong Konga c
It's small but not by Hong Kong standards and has everything you need . With an electronic key pad pin - it made moving in easy. It's great if you are planning to only stay for a short time
The room is small but has everything necessary. Great location as well! The instructions  on how to find / use the room  were clear and useful. Recommended.
Great place, very convenient. Everything you need is nearby. Small room but has everything. Very nice host -  very helpfull, great in communicating. Really helpfull.

The apartment is very small, clean and has everything needed. Nice. And remember it is in Hong Kong's most convenient area. Carlos is a great host, very responsive and kind. The hot water shower needs a little trick to use, though, Carlos will teach you that.

Perfect location with everything just round the corner. 
Well maintained and feel secure.
easy to deal with the owner.
房間小但方便
You get what u pay for.  Great location but small, as are most places in Hong Kong.
很棒
房東人非常好,再我這次護照和錢都被扒手偷走時,給予我很多幫助,隨時回覆我問題,房間還可以煮東西,下次還要再來住
Good location for the transportation. Many different kind restaurants surrounding the place. It's convenient to go some sightseeing spots.

Thank you for helping to stay. I enjoyed staying very much.
Ag

This is a cozy bedroom with furnished amenities to satisfy most needs. I had an extended stay here for working in Hong Kong and the location was great. The host was pleasant and allowed me to move in earlier. The only thing is that if you need to collect mail, you have to let the host know in advance so he can open the mailbox for you and drop off any outstanding mail. Thanks for the accommodation!
If you want a cheap place in the heart of Wan Chai then it's really good value, secure, with wifi. Hot water is pretty good. AC is good.
It's a great place with all the required amenities and close to the Wan Chai MTR Station. Although the place is a bit too small but apt for a solo traveller.
A great valued, convenient, and sparkling clean apartment.
空调有点响

Wan chai is a great location to visit hong kong. The apartment is small but we'll setup and all functional with working wifi and locks for doors etc... bed is single, ac works fine. Good budget room for exploring the city.
性价比还是比较高的,房东沟通也比较流畅,谢谢｡
It s not an apartment but a small room whithout confort.
Very good,but the room is a little small for two people,

Thanks for accepting the late reservation. I have stayed for three nights there, the room is quite small for two people, but it's clean, quiet, and with nice location. Close to MTR & Dingding car station, also have lots of restaurants around. If you're looking for nice budget, it would be a good choice.

This is a fantastic place to stay, an excellent location in Hong Kong. Very comfortable and quiet. Close to restaurants, the subway & bus lines as well.

I totally recommend it!
介绍照片拍的都是局部,整体是一间空间不大但设施配套接近宾馆的房间｡位置离湾仔站地铁站不远,坐各种公交巴士都挺方便的,房东会英语粤语普通话,很客气｡但入住期间遭遇了热水器bug   ರ_ರ
没有拖鞋,没有地方挂衣服,遇到问题没有人及时沟通
位子很好,市場､藥局､會議中心都很近,非常方便,但是兩人住地點較小,其他都很好
Location great.
Close to public transport and attractions. Bathroom is a bit small. Owner was nice and provided us help.

Great place to stay in HK for several days, I liked the view, it's not that scenic, but you can see sky from the bed and have a view on a hill, while working. 

Location is awesome. 

Bathroom is very clean and nice, if you ask me.
Floors, bed, kitchen clean and nice.

The only thing that's waiting to be wiped is windows.

Thank you guys for nice stay. Recommend.
everything was fine
Great Location
位置在湾仔地铁站不远,房东很好,有什么问题都会回复你,就是2个人住有点挤,其他都不错
两点可以入住 结果到六点才来打扫卫生 住的两天都没有热水 来清洁的人把我们的东西扔了 跟房东说了也没有反馈了 有问题找房东 房东也不及时处理 信息不回

Fantastic stay! Initially had a problem getting in as the door lock had reset itself after the host had changed the batteries, but the host replied to my messages within the hour and came out straight away to sort. Very helpful!!! The room was great for a solo traveller, and I had no issues during my stay. Amazing location!!
Really well located, centrally near to everything

The room is small even for one person. There is a flight of steps before you can take a lift up to the 7th floor. The aircon is very noisy and I had to switch it off to sleep, but even with ear plugs I could still hear a dripping sound that kept me awake for 2 nights. There was no cup available and I had to drink out of a bowl. Was told to buy a cup myself, but I didn’t have time. The bed was comfortable. After two nights I requested to move to another room so that I can sleep. The other room was smaller but had no dripping sound. I slept better but if it was hot and I had to switch on the aircon, it makes a loud humming sound. This room is cleaner but the toilet light was not working. I had asked for it to be repaired, but they didn’t come for two days. This room had two cups and more facilities, with iron. But it was quite tiny, Hong Kong style. The shower heater was also better.
Good for it's price

Great location! The room was small but had all the necessary amenities for a short stay. Easy check-in with clear instructions. Also easy access to front gate and door with keypad. AC was a big bonus and kept the room well ventilated. Good value for price and would definitely stay again.
Perfect location, close to everything. But could be a bit cold at nights.

The room is a little bit too small for 2 person but has everything you need. Bed is comfortable and toilet is clean. The air-cond fan was making a loud dripping noise. Great location, about 5 minutes walk to 7-11, eateries and MTR station. Host was helpful and responsive. Overall, great value for money.

Highly recommended for solo and budget traveller.

Dislike:
1.The space is super narrow.especially the (Website hidden by Airbnb) you have a shower inside.your elbow will kick the wall.and the room is not enough to open the exoended bed.
2.the water heater can't be controled into  a corresponding temperature.
3.the landlord said that there're adopter  and charger ,but nothing 's in the room.
4.we can't connect the landlord at the first night so it takes us hours to find the place.
Like:
1.the price is cheap 
2.the facilities are clean.

Very small but AWESOME location. Convenient and close to everything. Just know it’s probably best for 1 person unless you don’t mind sleeping in a small bed together. Great host with timely and clear communication. Bring your own bath towel probably. Loved staying here!

Great place. Great location, great value. Has all necessary amenities. The space is of course on the smaller side, but I contend this adds to the cultural experience. The host was very responsive. Would stay here again in my next visit to Hong Kong if available.
房間兩人住略小,廁所也有點擠,不過交通非常方便,附近食物和商家很多,夜歸會覺得大門有點危險,但實際住過覺得大樓基本上很安全,早上也會有管理員,最重要的是,房主對問題的回覆很快,入住指示也很清楚!
또 이용했습니다. 저번에도 이야기했지만 한국의 고시원이랑 비슷하다고 보시면 됩니다. 단독방에 안에 화장실있고 요리에 필요한 각종 조리기구들 다 있어요. 와이파이, 에어콘 문제없이 잘 됩니다. 다른것보다도 집 주인이랑 같은 공간에 살지 않는게 좋은거 같아요. 괜히 신경쓰이잖아요. 다음에도 또 이용할 생각입니다.
This is a grest apartment in the middle of Wan Chai. The location is amazing and I'm surprised how much can fit in a small apartment. Great stay and awesome location.
Simple, functional place in a great part of HK!
I am not expected tiny room, I know HK apartments are so small compare with other country. but nice service. good internet and access to downtown
small but great

The Location is good, It is in Center so All is so close and so mucho Places around, so You Can Just Walk, look and Enjoy.
The Apartment is so Easy to Find and for This Price is a Good choice
Very convenient location, room is not big but just right for one person and one luggage. They have all the amenities which is very convenient.
Good place, clean and tidy. What you see is what you get!
Thx

ห้องพักย่อย ไม่มีล็อกจากด้านนอก
หากเข้าพักแล้ว ไม่สามารถเก็บของมีค่า ในห้องพักได้
คือ ห้องพัก ควรมีล็อกจากด้านนอก ของผู้เข้าพักแต่ละคน/ห้องย่อย แยกกัน
การใช้แค่ล็อก จากทางเข้าหลัก ที่เดียว
ไม่มีความปลอดภัย ทำให้การเข้าพัก มีความหวาดระแวง
และ มีความเสี่ยงที่จะเกิดเหตุไม่ปลอดภัยได้
The host canceled this reservation 70 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
what you see in photo is what you get, although description say the room is for 2 people, but it is only a single bed. But the build in toilet is nice to have, and the location is good.

入住時發生房間未清潔的狀況,雖然房東馬上就請人處理,但打掃阿姨一副不關她的事,不是她的問題的樣子…
廁所淋浴間有點小,排水溝推滿毛髮,淋浴的時候會積水
Great location, a bit small but perfect for one person at a great price
地點十分方便,餐飲/購物/交通各方面機能都很便利
probably the best you can get in Hong Kong for this price. Don't expect a special place
The accommodation is small but okay for a person travelling alone, very central and close to the subway, not very clean according to European standard, but overall I was satisfied
Great price with perfect location
房间一人居住还可以,2人住超级小,房间宽度无法伸开双臂,洗漱比较考验人,卫生一般,中国30元旅馆卫生级别,好在性价比高,2天不到四百元｡
體驗香港人的居住環境
Nice place for the price. Great location.

Small cozy space that represents the standard living situation of Hong Kong. Lots of pros, it’s close to the MTR, lots of good food options around the area and there’s a shopping center and bars a few minutes away. The only minor issue I have is with the windows as when the blinds are up, you feel like you have no privacy so I just left them closed the entire trip.

This is really awesome value in HK! The place is small, but with some smart choices includes everything you could need. The location is great, right in Wan Chai with tons of restaurants and everything just right in the neighborhood. The little room even has two windows and a nice view! I loved the shower and having a little private fridge was also very convenient. Perfect for one person, and I could see coming back with my husband as well, when all we really need is just a place to shower and sleep. Two people with big luggage would be a struggle though. Overall a perfect place to crash for the 2 nights I was in town!

Pretty good living experience here ,thanks a lot for all the help from dear host,  the apartment is in good location near Waichai MTR,   which is very convenient  with lots of restaurants and shopping malls nearby, but what needs to be done to get better is  air conditioner cause it is really noisy.

Convenient location. Had all the amenities necessary, but the hair dryer is a little weak so if you have longer hair it was take long to dry (you might want to bring your own). The hot water stopped after a couple minutes into the shower so I suggest quick showers. Check-in guideline is very specific and helpful. Having a private bathroom in the room was great. A roll of toilet paper was provided (on the desk), so that was great as well.
Cost effective

住宿地點非常方便,建議只能一人住不然會連走動的空間都沒有!
遇到最大的缺點就是住了5天每天都一樣熱水洗不到10分鐘就沒了,
在寒冷的冬天這是一種折磨!
棉被在寒冷了冬天也是非常的薄弱~

very convenient location and communication with host is quick and smooth. Room is a bit tight but good enough for one person, and probably the best value for both experience and cost that you can get in the Wan Chai area. if you like to explore local streets and get a taste of local lifestyle, this is an excellent choice.
Small place but amazing location
Accessible, near the train station.
wouldn't recommend for two. but the location and price are unbeatable.
Good location, fast communication with the host,small but its cheap so worth it.will stay again if available.thank u
The location is nice,it was easy to communicate with the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a small room but its cheap,so it’s worth it.willing to visit again if available.We extend for another 3days..

name: Walk to beach - Cottage close to Waikiki
summary: Beautiful remodeled spacious cottage style house. You can walk to Waikiki Beach, to the amazing Kapiolani Park, you can also go to The Zoo and the Aquarium walking. It has 3 bedrooms and  there are  2 queen beds, 2 single beds and  1 double bed.
space: Entire house with front garden and laundry area in the back of the house
description: Beautiful remodeled spacious cottage style house. You can walk to Waikiki Beach, to the amazing Kapiolani Park, you can also go to The Zoo and the Aquarium walking. It has 3 bedrooms and  there are  2 queen beds, 2 single beds and  1 double bed. Entire house with front garden and laundry area in the back of the house You can call or text me at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) What I love about this neighborhood is that is pretty melow and quiet, but if you walk about six blocks you find all the action in waikiki and of course I love the fact that is so close to the ocean and the beautiful Kapiolani Park and you can see people exercising, kids playing in the park, etc, it's really amazing, There is a bus stop one block away and you can also use the Trolley, which will take you around Waikiki. The trolley goes by the house and mentions the beautiful Plumeria tree that's in the house The third bedroom is small and sometimes some guest had experience some noise coming from the street. The house doesn
neighborhood_overview: What I love about this neighborhood is that is pretty melow and quiet, but if you walk about six blocks you find all the action in waikiki and of course I love the fact that is so close to the ocean and the beautiful Kapiolani Park and you can see people exercising, kids playing in the park, etc, it's really amazing,
notes: The third bedroom is small and sometimes some guest had experience some noise coming from the street. The house doesn’t have Air conditioning but it has ceiling fans in each room and living room and also has jalousie windows which allows greater airflow coming through, ideal and very common in Hawaii.
transit: There is a bus stop one block away and you can also use the Trolley, which will take you around Waikiki. The trolley goes by the house and mentions the beautiful Plumeria tree that's in the house
interaction: You can call or text me at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
house_rules: Be respectful with our neighbors and keep it relatively quiet after 10pm.

host.host_about: I love to host at AIRBNB. Everybody is so friendly and excellent guests!

reviews.comments:
I went to Oahu on a girls trip with 8 of my friends for my birthday. We wanted to find a place that was close enough to Waikiki to party in the bars, but easy access to the highways to explore the island and not have to pay for hotel parking overnight. This place met all of our wishes. There is plenty of street parking and the neighborhood feels safe enough. It's not the fanciest neighborhood, but we were very comfortable and felt like locals. The house was very clean and decorated well. The beds were comfortable, but more on the firm side, FYI. The kitchen had all the necessary tools and every appliance worked well. The bathroom was clean and the shower had strong water pressure. There is a washer and dryer that works well, but we only used it once since Marylu had left plenty of linens and towels for us. There is a large Safeway grocery store about a mile away, and a liquor store and gas station just a couple blocks down the street.

Marylu was very quick to respond to my emails and was very accommodating even though we didn't need anything else or have any complaints.  

We had an amazing time and a big reason was this cottage. If I ever visit Honolulu again, I would definitely stay here again!

Great house! It's about a 20-25 min walk to Waikiki Beach. Very well stocked with dishes, washer & dryer, etc. Lots of places to sleep and extra sofas. We fit 8 people in here comfortably with shared beds. Definitely recommended.

Marylu and her cottage were fantastic. Exactly what we needed for our trip. Never using airbnd before she was great.  Quick responses, and helpful.  The place was cute and a 15 min walk to the beach, not much further to downtown Waikiki.  All the food places around it were recommended to us by locals.  Nice neighborhood also.

I never met Marilu, but she was very kind and nice and very service minded via mail and text messages. 
The house was great for us, five people. There is just three bedrooms so if your are ten people it would be tight. But the washing machine and the kitchen was perfect and the small garden. 
. The cleaning was ok, but some dust here and there.  
The neighbour hood is so good, eat at Diamonnd head grill and est an acai bowl at Bogarts café for vreakfast. Its so good!

Absolutely perfect! Very helpful landlady, everything was very easy and we loved staying here. For a group of 5 of us there was more than enough space, and there were still spare beds! Great location too. Thank you so much for making this place so hospitable, definitely recommend it : )

Overall we had a very good experience. The cottage is your typical island style design and layout. It was clean, had all of the necessities and easy to find street parking. 

Location is great, close to Waikiki, diamond head, grocery store and shops. However, Campbell Avenue is a busy street and road noise can be pretty loud. Buses start early in the morning. The third bedroom is small compared to the other two however, you are only going to use it to sleep, you're in Hawaii after all. 

We had 3 couples in the place and never felt cramped. The kitchen came in handy as did the BBQ. All of us agreed we would certainly stay here again and Marylu was great to work with. She was prompt with responding to inquiries.

The cottage is lovely. It is a great place for a family or a group of friends. We were delighted to find all kind of treats in the kitchen and all needed for cooking. The sofas are comfortable and the hard wood floors beautiful. The walk to the beach is right past the zoo!

The house was perfect!  We fit a group of seven comfortably when we were in town for a friend's wedding.  The well-supplied kitchen meant we could save money by preparing several meals at the house.  But the house is also close to the beach (~20 min. walk) and several good places to eat, including the delicious Side Street Inn.  

I loved reading and barbecuing in the yard.  There were plenty of towels and beach supplies for everyone.  Besides the bathroom being a bit busy with seven people, it was very clean and the shower pressure and temperature level were great.  The welcome package was a nice touch.  

As others have mentioned, the only issue we had was with noise.  There's not much sound insulation between the house and the street or the neighboring houses.  I would suggest bringing earplugs if you're a light sleeper.  Also, the neighbors stopped by one night to ask that we keep the conversation down after 10 so that's good to keep in mind in advance.  

Also, a lot of the outlets are two-prong.  It could be useful to bring a 3-prong to 2-prong adapter.  

We'd all definitely stay again - thanks so much!
The house was better than expected! Very relaxful place, with a short walk to the main strip. Wish we could have stayed there longer.
Great beach house and close to everything! Marylu was responsive during the whole booking process and we would absolutely book with her again. House was clean and we had a great time!

My group and I were very please to stayed at Marylu's place. It honestly feels like home and Marylu makes you feel secure by responding quickly to your messages. Highly recommend this place to anybody planning on staying in waikiki.

The house was amazing!  Clean, spacious, and comfortable.  Marylu was very accommodating and flexible.  The yard was very nice to hang out in, and the location was excellent, much better than Waikiki.  Beautiful view of Diamond Head.  Beach supplies were even provided.  We had a large group and we all fit in comfortably, plenty of bedding, blankets and pillows.  Would highly recommend!

Marylu had a great place that I would definitely recommend. Check in and check out were smooth and no hassle. Marylu was a responsive host and moved our check in time up to accomodate our arrival time. The house is in a good location with the famous Ono's right down the street and Waikiki easily within reach.

Marylu is kind and her response is also very quick. She is flexible for various requests. About this listing, the contents of many feedbacks are right. A positive is access to Waikiki, Diamond head, Kahala, and H1 is very nice. The cost performance is also good. A negative is road noise, but  this house is recommended for a lengthier stay and for who is not so nervous.

The house was perfect for everything we needed. Close enough to walk to the beach and Waikiki, but far enough away to avoid all the hustle & bustle of the busy tourist area. Leonard's Malasadas, Zippy's, and Safeway are all in the neighborhood. The house is relatively close to the neighbors, and your windows will be open because of the heat so you have to be conscious to not be too loud at night. We had a little trouble getting a hold of Marylu at first, but that was due to her being out of the country. She was still able to connect with us to make sure we had the necessary check-in information. Overall, my friends and I had a great stay and I can't wait to come back!

We had an absolutely great stay at Marylu's cottage. It was so 'old Hawaii'...just what we love. The place is well-equipped with tons of towels, comfy beds and a fully-stocked kitchen...perfect for the omelets I made my family every morning. The street traffic can be a little loud, but no worries since the place is so comfortable. Oh, and the mango tree outside provided the perfect sweet treat! All in all, a wonderful stay. Thanks!

Host:
Marylu made this trip easy through her ease of communication leading to the trip and during. If I had any questions Marylu would respond quickly. She also made the check in and check out process easy.
Rental:
The location of the house is ideal for a visit to Honolulu. It is literally 8-10 mins away from everything you need; Waikiki beach, restaurants, Safeway, Starbucks and bars. We would take a cab to most of these places and the fare was always less than $10. the house has many beds. I think it can fit up to a group of 10 people. There is no A/C but the windows and ceiling fans through out made the house cooler. Marylu also provided extra towels and bed sheets which were very helpful. We were unable to get the washer machine to work and had to go to the laundry mat near by. Instructions on the machine would have helped. Also there is no microwave only a stove, coffee maker, fridge and dishwasher. A microwave would have definitely been used and appreciated.

Overall the experience was great and I would definitely stay at Marylu's house again.

3回目のﾊﾜｲで､ﾎﾃﾙ滞在に飽きだしていたのでこちらの宿を借りましたが､とても良かったです｡
目の前の通りは意外と車が通り､音はそれなりに気になりましたが､60歳の父は､自然の風が適度に入ってくるﾘﾋﾞﾝｸﾞで気持ち良さそうに昼寝していましたし､浮輪やｼｭﾉｰｹﾙやﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｰﾎﾞｰﾄﾞなども借りれて､息子もとても喜んでいました｡
徒歩5分位歩くと､有名なｶﾌｪやﾊﾝﾊﾞｰｶﾞｰｼｮｯﾌﾟ､軽食を買えるお店もあります｡また､近隣の家々も､ｵｰﾙﾄﾞﾊﾜｲ的な素敵な家が多く､歩いていてとても楽しかったです｡
海までは､子連れだと少し距離を感じたので､自転車か車があったらﾍﾞｽﾄかもしれません｡

This cute house was great for our group of 6! It had three bedrooms with about five beds and three couches that could also be used as beds. All in all, plenty of space! She was very responsive and the key exchange was a breeze. In addition, there were a lot of body boards and shower and beach towels that we used during our stay. Finally, the house was just a 12-15 min walk to the beach. 

Would stay again in the future!

We did not meet Marylu in person, but she responded to texts very quickly. The house was just what we had expected-- informal, island style bungalow, and the location was perfect for us. The house had everything we needed for our stay, from a reasonably outfitted kitchen to beach gear. Sleeping accommodations were adequate for our large, extended family and we managed with the single bathroom. The washer and dryer were much appreciated.
The host was very helpful, the house very cozy only problem is the washroom,(only 1) enough rm for 9 guests. Washer and dryer very handy.
The reservation was canceled 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The house is well located, between Diamond Head crater and Kapiolani park. The park and beach were close enough to walk several times, and there are good inexpensive places to eat a few blocks away. The night can be noisy, so bring earplugs if that bothers you, and the mornings can be bright, so bring a mask if that bothers you. We slept our family of seven easily, and cooked a lot while there with the available cookware.

The house was exactly as it was described. Right on Campbell and in the middle and short walk to the best Acai bowl place on the island, Diamond Head Cove Health Bar on Monsarrat or if you walked the other direction you could find yourself on Kapahulu where theres a Safeway and many other stores!

Actually this lovely home is great and our all the members, 8 adults are very satisfied and enjoyed the stay.

Before we arrived, we just a little bit worried about the size of house but it was spacious enough.

It is located only 10 minutes walking distance from the Waikiki beach.
There are the bunch of towels and surf boards and we went to beach everyday.

閑静な住宅街にある､緑に囲まれた素敵な一軒屋でした｡家から歩いて徒歩1~2分のところにﾊﾞｽ停があるので､ｱﾗﾓｱﾅｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞﾓｰﾙへ行く際に利用しました｡ﾜｲｷｷｴﾘｱまではﾊﾞｽでも移動できますし､のんびり歩いて20分程度で着くので､ｱｸｾｽがかなり良いです｡家の中も清潔でとても居心地が良かったです｡ﾄｲﾚとお風呂が一つになっている為､大人数での利用の際には少し大変かも?
また機会があれば､是非利用したいです｡
The place was great. The host was great. Everything made sense. Exactly as advertised. I recommend Marylu's place.

we had a lovely stay at marylu's cottage.  she thought of alot of extras to help make our 4 days there quite enjoyable.  our extended family of 9 found everything to be quite comfortable and accommodating.  it was a pleasure to walk in to a clean, neat place to stay.

I had overall a good experience at the house. Somethings were outdated but I enjoyed my stay with my family of 8 people.  Close to Waikiki.  Only downside is no air conditioning and one bathroom.   Tv didn't work that well either

うｰん､ﾚﾋﾞｭｰが素晴らしかったので利用したのですが､正直微妙でした…
ﾃﾚﾋﾞはつかないし､水道は壊れているし､ﾄｲﾚｯﾄﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰなどの消耗品のｽﾄｯｸがないし…
すべてﾎｽﾄさんに伝えたところ直したりｽﾍﾟｱを提供してもらえましたが､到着する前に準備していただきたかったです｡

Marylu's cottage is exactly as described. She is so welcoming and helped with check-in and some wifi issues. She even provided some delicious welcome favors to begin our stay ( the chocolates and coffee were amazing). The home is right on the busy street of Campbell and since there isn't any a/c, windows must be open for fresh air. There is a lot of street noise, but It is usually noisy anywhere in the hotel zones. Everything was walking distance Rainbow drive in, several stores and restaurants. We would park at the Honolulu Zoo and walk over to the beach from there every day. Wifi is available for those who need it. Make sure to go to Sweet E's for the best brunch as its close by to the home as well.

This cottage was perfect for our week-long stay in Honolulu!  Close to plenty of action without being immersed in the bustle. The house itself has three bedrooms and could easily sleep seven adults comfortably. We would stay here again next time!
It was super easy to deal with Marylu. The home was perfect and location even better. We will return :)

The host left some coffee and local snacks for us, which was really nice.  The house was very spacious and clean.  The furniture is a bit dated but comfortable.  

What takes a bit of getting use to is the noise.  Because there is no centralized air, most of the windows are open to circulate the air, which also brings in the noise from the busy street.
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Beautiful house, walking distance to the beach and plenty of beds! We had a few of us meeting in Hawaii for a wedding and this house suited us perfectly.
Comfortable accommodations and great location. Highly recommend.

We had a very enjoyable stay. Marylu was very responsive. There is quite a bit of road noise, as the house is on a main street. We recommend bringing earplugs if the sound cars and trucks at night will keep you awake. The house was large enough for 6 adults and a child. Very comfortable! Walking distance to the beach!

Great location with easy access to waikiki and the all around island. Marylu was very helpful answering all our questions. 
House was a little old however great to have separate living/ sleeping areas.We had a fantastic time.

We had a wonderful time during staying .
on first and 2nd day, we had difficulty to find a parking space by the house for my car , but later days are OK. The street traffic noise was loud, and need time to usd to it.

The location is good, especially if you have a car.
The house is basic but comfortable. Good if you are looking for a place for a small group
Felt like home, this place had everything you could think of. Super close to everything.

Great place, well-stocked kitchen, amazing location that is near everything. Comfortable beds, lots of towels, extra blankets. The ceiling fans and open windows did a great job of keeping us cool. It is in a residential neighborhood but the street is used often, especially early morning and late afternoon.
Very good location, although beds were quite uncomfortable. not really 3 bedrooms (1 room is very small converted from a laundry) you would struggle to sleep 8 here.
Very cosy and comfortable and in a good location we had a great time while staying at Marylu's.
D.C.

Big enough for a party of 5, despite a single bathroom. Quite well located with bus lines very close. Very quite in the evening and good communication with Marylu. The cleaning was not perfect (some dust ball behind doors).

Nice place and host, cool garden with bbq, very close to waikikibeach, but a very noisy street in the morning, no air conditioning and a big cockroach in the bathroom. The third room is very small we planed to sleep in it with two people but was forced to be 3 in the bigger room.

The location within 15 minutes easy walk to the beach was fantastic.
Similar easy walk to Safeway and local restaurants was handy.
The kitchen was well appointed.  Only disappointment was the traffic noise at night.

House had all amenities and great location but it's on a busy street so it's very noisy but that didn't bother us. The house has only ceiling fans and didn't realize weather was very humid so very uncomfortable to sleep in the rooms. There are no window AC or cooler in the house.
assolutamente raccomandabile

The house is well located and offers everything you need for a stay with a group. The only things that you should be prepared of is that the third room is only comfy for 1 person and that the street is very noise since thats a bus route. But if you have earplugs you can sleep there. Mahalo Marylu for everything :)
Great location for beach/hikes/Waikiki. Spacious common area. Would have been nice to have a/c, but not too bad with fans on. Great for a group trip.
最高の旅行になりました｡
Great location, close to beach and shopping.
Without air conditioning it is too hot to sleep.  It's almost a mile walk to the beach.

The house may be outdated and on a busy street but the location is ideal. Close to Waikiki Beach, freeway and groceries like Safeway and Walmart. If you plan on doing some cooking, check what's in the cupboards and refrigerator first because they're well stacked with spices and other items that are useful. The washer and dryer came in handy too.
It was a cozy, island style place.  It had most of the amenities you needed.  Would have been better if it had air conditioning but overall a nice place.
The location of the cottage is ideal if you want to go to Waikiki beach or even for a walk on Diamond Head. I recommend Marylu who is reactive and reliable.

The location is good, not far to walk to Waikiki beach area. The house is quite dated but had everything we needed. Marylu was great and left coffee and chocolates for when we arrived, communication was superfast.

電気が切れていたのが残念でした｡
立地条件は良かった｡
外でﾊﾞｰﾍﾞｷｭｰは狭くて暗いので､できませんでした｡
男同士なら､問題無く､快適なﾗｲﾌができると思います｡

立地条件は最高です｡
ただ､ﾘﾋﾞﾝｸﾞの電気が切れていて､ﾛｳｿｸで対応しました｡
冷蔵庫もあまり､冷えなかったです｡
清潔感はｲﾏｲﾁでした｡
男だけなら､気にならない程度だと思います｡
後､蚊が多い為､蚊取線香で対応しました｡
Great location.
The house is extremely dated, however, excellent communication and great location make it a good place to stay if you are looking for an affordable place within walking distance of downtown.
Good place

name: Sydney beachside apt
summary: Welcome to our stunning seaside location in Sydney! Beach, ocean pool, golf courses at doorstep.  On coastal walk to Maroubra, Coogee, Bondi Easy parking at gate.   Direct bus to Sydney  CBD & Opera House Beach pad get away or business stay, wifi, Netflix. Family and business friendly Not suitable for infants sorry
space: Fully self contained ocean front apartment with separate access, on the ground floor of large waterfront home.    Very comfortable with lovely views over the water from the terrace and sunroom.   Perfect spot to observe Sydneysiders enjoying the water and strolling past on coastal walks.  The apartment consists of: Full kitchen with dining table and chairs Living area with couches and TV Bathroom Main bedroom with 1 double bed and 1 single bed Sunroom/bedroom with comfortable sofa double bed Quality Egyptian cotton sheets and towels Outdoor Terrace Wifi and Netflix  Easy access to beach, ocean pool, golf course and local eateries
description: Welcome to our stunning seaside location in Sydney! Beach, ocean pool, golf courses at doorstep.  On coastal walk to Maroubra, Coogee, Bondi Easy parking at gate.   Direct bus to Sydney  CBD & Opera House Beach pad get away or business stay, wifi, Netflix. Family and business friendly Not suitable for infants sorry Fully self contained ocean front apartment with separate access, on the ground floor of large waterfront home.    Very comfortable with lovely views over the water from the terrace and sunroom.   Perfect spot to observe Sydneysiders enjoying the water and strolling past on coastal walks.  The apartment consists of: Full kitchen with dining table and chairs Living area with couches and TV Bathroom Main bedroom with 1 double bed and 1 single bed Sunroom/bedroom with comfortable sofa double bed Quality Egyptian cotton sheets and towels Outdoor Terrace Wifi and Netflix  Easy access to beach, ocean pool, golf course and local eateries We are happy to interact with our guests or o
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is lovely tranquil beachside suburb.  The beach is small and popular with families and not too crowded.  We are a short stroll to the the beach and ocean pool so it is easy to pop in for a swim at any time.   On coastal walk to Maroubra, Coogee & Bondi The Bay Window restaurant and The Beach Cafe is a a few minutes stroll away.    The local shopping centre is a 10 to 12 minute walk.  Here you will find  bakery, take away food shops, small supermarket, pharmacy, chemist, hairdresser, ice cream shop etc. Neighbourhood activites:  Swimming beach (short stroll) Swimming Ocean pool  (short stroll) Snorkelling  Scuba diving  Kayaking Fishing Golf Club (short stroll) Childrens playground (short stroll) Beach picnic area (short stroll) Coastal walks Nursing & Medical museum little Bay
transit: Sydney buses (399) stop right outside the house and will take you directly (with no transfers) to CBD, Opera House, nightlife spots and University of NSW.  (UNSW). There are also a number of additional buses travelling to the city and Central Station that run along, Anzac Parade, the main artery to our area.  These buses stop at the shopping centre which is a 10 to 12 minute walk from the apt.
interaction: We are happy to interact with our guests or offer any assistance you may need during your stay, but otherwise you will have complete privacy.
house_rules: Only checked in guests my stay overnight. As there is no cleaning fee please leave the place clean and tidy on your departure.

host.host_about:
Hi, We are Fred and Bernadette.   We love meeting new people, have traveled extensively, visited many different countries and are very interested in other cultures.  
We enjoy spending time with family and friends . I am into running marathons and Bernadette enjoys tennis, trail walking and is currently learning Italian. We enjoy good food,  music, theatre, walking, hiking - most things in life !

reviews.comments: Bernadette and Fred were excellent hosts - warm, friendly and welcoming. Correspondence before our visit was great and instructions to the property were clear. The property itself was perfect - we couldn't have asked for more. Our area and the communal areas were spotless and we felt very comfortable in Bernadette and Fred's home. The house is stunning and views are beautiful, and it worked so well with our own living room, bathroom, bedroom and separate entrance. We couldn't have asked for a better experience!

Bernadette and Fred are fantastic hosts! Warm and welcoming, we felt very comfortable in their home. 

The 1-bedroom level is beautiful, comfortable, and private. Communications with Bernadette were frequent and clear. She was very flexible and patient with our scheduling issues. 

Buses into the city are frequent but do check the return trip as we took a long time getting back due to bad planning. 

Overall, we had a lovely stay and wished we could have stayed longer. Bernadette and Fred are wonderful. And their dog, Bilbo is just pure love. 

I could write so much more to recommend this place but will leave some of the wonder of discovery to you when you book this place.

I had a great time staying at this beautiful house. 
Bernadette and Fred are very pleasant and hospitable people and couldn't have been more helpful and accomodating. 
Their house is lovely, comfortable and clean - 100% corresponds to the description.
To tell the truth, the reality was even better than expected: cozy bedroom, big living room, bathroom and separate entrance. 
Three words best suited to describe this accomodation: hospitable, comfortable, private.
I loved everything about it and will stay there whenever I go to Sydney.
Bernadette and Fred - Thank you very much.

It's really great! Thank you Bernadette, me and my mother had a good time in Sydney. The house is nice which has desperate living room and door for the guest. There is a nice cafe nearby. thanks again~

I Loved Bernadettes home. It is a stunning house in a beautiful location. The views are amazing and the room was top notch...a great bed, bathroom and sitting area. Bernadette and Fred were very welcoming and friendly
I really enjoyed my weekend in Malabar and will be back..

Our stay at Malabar was comfortable. Bernadette and
Fred welcomed us on the first night, and gave us the freedom to come and go as we pleased after that. The neighborhood was spectacular. We were a little surprised that there was no view of the coast from our rooms. All in all we had an enjoyable stay.

ich habe mit 2 freunden bei bernadette uebernachtet. die begruessung war sehr herzlich und wir haben uns gleich willkommen gefuehlt. unser appartement war sauber, grosszuegig und gemuetlich eingerichtet. die kueche durften wir mitbenutzen und der ausblick aus dem wohnzimmer ist atemberaubend! wir hatten einen seperaten eingang und auch die moeglichkeit unsere waesche zu waschen.
malabar ist eine ruhige wohngegend, aber der bus nach sydney faehrt direkt vor der tuer ab. 
bernadette und fred sind sehr nette gastgeber und wir wuerden sofort wiederkommen.

Bernadette was away when we stayed, but her husband Fred made us feel very welcome and was a great host (Bilbo their dog was also very friendly!). The house is beautiful, in a stunning location, clean and tidy, has everything you need including use of washer/ dryer. They also provided lots of useful information on Sydney and the surrounding area and were helpful in giving advice on how to get to places.

We stayed in a separate part of the house which had a bedroom, bathroom, and living room.  It was clean and tidy, very cosy, and comfortable.  There were magnificent views of the sea upstairs in the kitchen.  The hosts (Fred and Bernadette) were friendly and made us feel welcome.  We will definitely be coming back if we are in the area again!

Bernadette, Fred and Bilbo were great hosts, very welcoming and very helpful to try and make our stay as enjoyable as possible.  Malabar is quiet with almost a village atmosphere and the house is beautifully situated close to the beach, ocean pool, golf club and the beach cafe.  The accommodation was clean, comfortable and easy to access.  We very much enjoyed our stay and Bilbo (the dog) definitely won my daughter's hearts!  Thanks Bernadette and Fred!

The apartment was very roomy, great position and comfortable. The new kitchen makes it totally self contained and the sunroom was a delightful bedroom for our daughter.  Lovely decor throughout. Bernadette and Fred were so helpful and willing to please. Short drive to the airport was a bonus for us. Will definitely keep it mind for the future.

Bernadette made us feel extremely welcome. I especially appreciated that she had gone to the trouble of providing all public transport information, including a map of the nearest stops and timetables, also details of nearby eateries.  The apartment is lovely, clean, comfortable , had more than everything we needed and is in a very peaceful neighbourhood.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, would not hesitate to recommend to friends and family - fantastic as a base for exploring Sydney and for daytrips to Hunter Valley, Blue Mountains etc. but without the hussle bussle of the city.
