Fred was nice enough to give me a quick tour of the unit and was very friendly and helpful.  The apartment was nicely appointed, very spacious, very comfortable, and the kitchen is literally brand new.  There is a gorgeous sitting area in the front of the apartment with views of Long Bay that is drenched in morning sunlight.  

The bed and linens were all clean and very comfortable and generous amounts of soap and towels (as well as beach towels) were provided.  Malabar is a fantastic quiet community out of the hustle and bustle of Sydney that I spent the most time in and enjoyed the most.  I highly recommend checking out Little Bay as well as a fantastic swimming or snorkeling place.

Can't say enough good things about the hosts, property, or location.  Would stay again without reservation!

Fred met us upon arrival and explained everything we needed to know about the unit, which has everything we needed.  A plate of lovely homemade slice made by Bernadette was on the kitchen bench for us! The local area is quiet and beautiful, with the beach only across the road and a corner cafe a short walk away for coffee, breakfast or casual dinner.

My parants and i couldn't ask more for our pleasant stay in Bernadette's beautiful house.  This definitely will be our best memory of sydney. 

Everything was just perfect. From the welcoming cookie to farewell fruit salad ...Bernadette is so nice and that we do feel a bit sad we didn't have the chance to know her better. She provided more than we need , the kitchen is almost brand new ! We cooked and just felt we had a home in sydney ! 

The suit is so spacious and comfortable that i could stay for the whole day doing nothing. But sitting in my sun room watching the breath taking view from the window. We spent a lot of time on the beach and walked up to the golf club. We didn't swim but still there is a nice pool from where you can see far into the great ocean. There is even dive boat every friday for people to go diving !

It is close to everywhere. Less than 15 minutes drive to city and almost 1 hour drive to all the southern  attractions. Lots of stores ,restaurants nearby , can get coffee by 3 minutes walk ! 

We really had a good time especially this is our first time in australia. So lucky to have Bernadette hosted us. Will come back again for sure. 

Dear Bernadette , thank you again! Hope you enjoy your tennis and all the best to your family and bilboy !

Fantastic. The apartment was perfect, so glad we booked this apartment. Bernadette was warm and welcoming having everything set out for us. You can tell that care was taking to have everything clean and ready for our arrival. All the kitchen basics and bathroom essentials like shampoo were provided. Even an extra yummy treat on arrival.  Great relaxing location in a relaxed neighborhood. I'm sure we will be back
Very warm welcome. Property and location both excellent.
Although it was a short business trip, I couldn't have picked a better place. The house is great with every aspect. Very nice, quite neighborhood. Thanks Bernadette for your kindness and everything.

Excellent place in a beautiful area
We had a very nice stay and I highly recommend this house. Comfortable, clean and great if you are looking for privacy
Bernadette and Fred are very friendly hosts.
We'll be back.

The directions received to find the location and accessing the premises were very helpful and complete.
We were met with warm greetings by our host Bernadette upon our arrival.
The accommodation was very comfortable and clean with everything supplied that we needed for our stay.
Bernadette is a very accommodating and helpful host and helped making our stay very pleasant indeed.
The area was very quite  and the front room overlooked the water making the experience very peaceful.

Fred and Bernadette were excellent hosts, and made our week in Sydney much more enjoyable vs staying in a Hotel.  They were there if we needed anything, but also gave us our space.  The home is as advertised in their description.  Bus service just a few steps from your front door.  Strong WiFi signal.  

You will find that the bed isn't as comfortable as the one you may have at home, but we slept very well with the ocean breeze cooling the apartment.  

Laundry Room is around back of the Main House so be prepared to walk back and forth to manage your laundry.

Beach Cafe nearby is open everyday for Breakfast and Lunch but is only open for dinner on Friday and Saturday from 500-830.  Excellent food.

Groceries can best be found in Maroubra at Woolies or Coles.  There are also freshmarkets and meat shops there as well.  Great place to stock up if you are cooking for yourselves.

Bus Service.  The 399 is the main bus you will use for most trips you make.  End of the line is Circular Quay in the CBD with no transfers.  Recommend getting an Opal Card to make travel quicker and easier.   **TIP** You will need an Opal Card for each traveller, you cannot share them for multiple riders.

Airport Travel.  Take the 400 to Maroubra near PIcadilly Place and transfer to the 399 Little Bay.  $3.50 per person vs $40 taxi ride.

Beach Walks.  We took the walk from the apartment to Coogee, about 4 miles.  Beautiful walk, but the 1st 1/3 of the walk you are cutting across neighborhoods and parks as the boardwalk isn't complete to Malabar yet.  Bondi to Coogee was very easy to navigate.  You should do both!

Overall - We would highly recommend this location for Couples or a small familyon Holiday.  You will feel very "local" staying here, but the CBD and action of Sydney is only a 45 minute bus ride away with no transfers.

Thanks Fred and Bernadette for starting our Australian tour off with a bang!
Beautiful setting and very comfortable accommodation.  Right by the sea, very peaceful and yet right next to a bus stop that takes you to CIrcular Quay in around 30 minutes.  Lovely!

Bernadette has been a great host, even going the extra mile to purchase a hairdryer when we needed one. The house faces the beach and the sunrise from the beach is absolutely lovely. Would definitely recommend anyone to stay in this apartment.

Wir hatten eine  sehr schöne Zeit bei Bernadette und Fred. Sie sind sehr nett und hilfsbereit.

Die Wohnung hat eine schöne neue Küche und ein schickes Bad. Meerwasserpool und Strand sind direkt nebenan und die Innenstadt etwa 20 Minuten mit dem Auto - eine perfekte Kombination

We had such a lovely time at this super location right opposite the water. The unit is well-appointed, with quality furnishings & linen. It was nice to have a sweet home-baked slice on our arrival. Hope to be back again soon :-)
Great place, even better than before now it has a kitchen and extra room.  Bernadette, Fred and Bilbo were as helpful and friendly as ever.

We have just completed two weeks in Bernadette's wonderful property. We were made very welcome with home made slice, fresh flowers and a happy grin from Bilbo the dog!
The accommodation was first class - comfy bed, excellent shower and almost new kitchen. The location is also great with lovely views of the pretty bay from the secluded patio where we had breakfast or morning coffee on many mornings.
All in all, we would say this was one of the best Air B&B's we've used - and we've used it quite a bit both here and in Europe.
Highly recommended.

Bernadette's instructions on how to get there were easy to follow and accurate. We arrived to find chocolate slice on the kitchen table and juice in the fridge. The apartment was very well-appointed and suited our needs perfectly. The location was fantastic with views across Little Bay. We have 3 young boys who were itching to get down to the beach. Fortunately for us, even though nearly all of Sydney's beaches were closed the weekend we were there due to large swells, Malabar Beach was protected form the weather so we were still able to swim.  Malabar is a quiet suburb, away from the usual hubbub of Eastern Suburb beaches. We plan on returning soon for our next Sydney weekend.
We had an amazing time in Malabar. The appartment is fantastic and Bernadette and Fred are lovely people. They are very helpfull and they made us feel very welcome

My husband & I spent an enjoyable 4 nights recently at this property which is well presented & spacious with self catering facilities. Our lovely hostess Bernadette presented us with a plate of yummy chocolate slice, juice, milk & fresh flowers. Excellent location with great views of the water. A short walk to the rock pools, bus stop (bus goes to Circular Quay every 1/2 hr) & the Beach cafe which serves reasonably priced delicious meals!

We thoroughly enjoyed our restful stay in this Malabar beach apartment . Fred gave us lots of local knowledge and was really helpful.
We enjoyed breakfast at the local beach cafe, and swimming in the rock pool,literally across the road.
We arrived in the dark,from the airport, tired and disheveled , but were welcomed into this comfortable apartment with minimum of fuss, and awoke in the morning to a view of the sparkling ocean.
Thank you Fred and Bernadette for our 1st very positive introduction to AirBNB.
We had a great time staying at Bernadette's apartment, they were friendly and very generous. The view from apartment is just amazing, we definitely will stay again :)

We recently (April 2015) had an amazing time at Bernadette and Fred's place! All communication was prompt and clear and the apartment was well equipped with everything you could need and want. Location was brilliant - beach across the road and ocean pool, walks, cafes and restaurants within walking distance. We had a hire car but public transport stopped right outside and was easy to use for access to the city. Our girls (7yr, 11yrs) had a great time and want to always stay here (we have stayed in the city every other time in the past) but this was a lovely change of pace. Fred offered use of kayaks and was extremely hospitable with local knowledge and suggestions. Bernadette left fresh orange juice and chocolate slice when we arrived and cereal and tea/coffee for breakfast. Apartment has new kitchen and there was nothing extra we needed that was not provided.  Thank you so much for a brilliant stay - we will definitely stay again!!!

Bernie & Fred's home is stunning, immaculate,  with the ocean at their door step - you simply cannot ask for anything more accommodation wise.  We thought we knew Sydney pretty well but this area will become one of our favourite new spots.  My (then partner and now) wife Karen stayed here with her bridal party as we searched for accommodation that would allow us to be close to where we would marry the next day.  Fred greeted us warmly on arrival which included a lovely celebratory champagne bottle, a congratulations card, and the most yummy chocolate slices (that were demolished on sight!) - such a thoughtful touch and greatly appreciated.  The accommodation itself was even better than we'd hoped.  Immaculately furnished, clean to a tee, very spacious, with super comfy beds and living area - just what you want when you're   wanting to chillax inside and out.  This was our equal first airbnb experience (Karen stayed here and I was 5 minutes away in other accommodation), and this sets the highest bar for all future bookings.  Bernie was really easy to deal with during the booking experience and accommodating and flexible to any particular requests we put forward. Great hosts but even better people.  Really, everything you needed was there at your fingertips.  We are lucky to have this home captured as the backdrop for several of Karen's "getting prepped" professional photos for the hours leading to our wedding - immortalised forever.  Great value, simply couldn't fault it.  Thank you!!!

We were made to feel very welcome indeed. Bernadette and Fred provided just the right amount of contact.  The apartment was excellent, in a most wonderful situation, across the road from the Pacific! The bus stops virtually outside the property which is very convenient during the hours of 7am to 7pm and is a short walk afterwards.   It is close to a gold club (with a bistro) and close to the Beach Cafe.  Malabar beach is VERY unspoiled and pretty.

We were in the area to visit with our son and his family and will definitely return to this property if it is available, on a future visit to Australia.

Sensational!!!  Beautiful views and location, gorgeous apartment and fantastic hosts.  Was just the perfect location for our family weekend.  We all felt comfortable and really enjoyed ourselves.  We highly recommend this accommodation, you will not be disappointed:).

This apartment was very well equipped.  The hosts communicated well and we had a very accurate description of how to get there and what to do when we did.  Nice little welcome plate of biscuits and some fresh orange juice went down well after our journey.  Kitchen, washing machine, dryer, fridge, hot plate all as new and worked well.  Shower was brilliant.  We found that we didn't need to bring as many things as we did.  The location was great with a local café for your morning coffee less than 5 min walk, a park near by for the kids and a great view.  Took about 30 min by car to get to the city

We booked Fred & Bernadette's lovely apartment for my parents, who stayed one weekend in June. Because we live in the area, it was nice that they were so close to home, and experienced what Malabar-life is like. My mum even went swimming twice in the rock pool! The apartment was great - nicely furnished, in a scenic location and well-heated. They really enjoyed staying there. Breakfast items - tea, coffee, Milo, Vegemite, milk, orange juice and cereals were also provided. We will definitely book their place again if we ever need to!

Fred was a very nice man. He helped a lot while me and my family staying. Especially, their dog was so cute. The house was in a perfect condition as the picture. The view from the house is fabulous. We love to stay longer if we could.

So lovely to wake up to water views and a sense of space. Fred & Bernadette took the time to provide lots of little items that really made the accomodation feel like a mates home where you drop by - just bring your clothes and relax. 

Mum (77) found her bed so comfortable she slept through which she doesn't at home. Our hosts were very polite, always responsive in a timely way.

We wish we had more time to enjoy the place and the saltwater ocean pool across the road. Yes we would stay again and look forward to enjoying the delicious slice Bernadette took the time to bake and welcome us with. Thank you for a lovely first AirBnB experience.
Fred & Bernadette were very welcoming and helpful. It is in a good location with easy access to the city. With the bay and beach on your door step.

My family and I have enjoyed the house and amazing bay view very much. Fred & Bernadette are so friendly and nice. The house is ideal. We just felt like we are at home when we stayed in that cozy place. We wish we had more time to enjoy the lovely house and the water view.
Fred & Bernadette are great hosts. The size, location and range of facilities within their apartment exceeded our expectations. Would definately recommend staying here.

Lovely apartment, in a stunning seaside location. Home from home, with everything you need. Bernadette's home baked biscuit's on arrival! Fresh orange and complementary tea, coffee and breakfast cereal, little touches like this make such a difference! Fantastic little beach cafe minutes from apartment is a must! Great find and if we are lucky enough to visit Australia again would definately book in future as we ran out of time to see all that Sydney has to offer!!!

I loved my time here. Beautiful quiet area, and the place was lovely. Very clean, and nice homely touches. Bernadette had left some yummy homemade slice on the table for my arrival, which was just what I needed after the flight and drive! 
Great location, close to shops and cafes, yet secluded enough to feel very peaceful. They even helped me work out Netflix!
My wife and I loved this apartment. Very clean, with a lovely homely feel. Lots of little extras similar to a 5 star hotel. Quiet neighbourhood with great views. Would stay again.

Fantastic stay. Just like the pictures it was a beautiful apartment and location. Thanks Bernadette for the yummy home made biscuits on arrival with orange juice. Fred was a terrific host and I enjoyed my chat with him. A very wise man! Thank you both so much and can't wait to return. Loved the Beach cafe near by also.

This is really an Ideal home away from home. The apartment is just by the bay and offers great waterfront views. Fred and Benedette are amazing hosts, and in addition to providing excellent suggestions, provided a dossier  which had very useful tips on things to see how to get around. The house itself is a 2 bedroom apartment with the second bedroom facing the waterfront, and furnished with a pull out sofa bed. It's in pristine condition, exceptionally clean and very family-friendly. My two kids both under five years old slept all through the night so I know the were comfortable. Ideal location for a quiet stress free holiday.

Fred and Bernadette went out of their way to have the apartment ready early for us after the long flight from England with our two teenage children. There were thoughtful touches like cake, juice, coffee, cereal etc ready to help us settle in. We all felt very comfortable in this spacious homely apartment. Buses into the City were easy to use and close by. A quiet, pleasant neighbourhood in an amazing setting. The view of the bay and nearby golf course were outstanding. We only stayed three nights but would happily have stayed longer.

There are no difference between picture and real apartment.
It is beautiful apartment.
I really want to go again.
So nice to stay here! Beatiful sunshine beach! Quiet place, u just need to open door then u can enjoy so blue seaside! Will stay here next time! Thanks Fred and his wife!!!

The beachside apartment turned out to be a great choice for us. Bernadette and Fred were a delight to deal with. The apartment was lovely and beautifully sited next to the beach and brilliant for getting into Sydney as the bus stops literally outside the door. This gave us a great start to our Australian holiday and we would recommend it 100%. Thanks Bernadette and Fred!
The Worthington family, Harrogate UK.

On arrival we had a very warm welcome. We were shown around the accommodation which was of an exceptionally high standard. Our welcome pack included tea, coffee, milk and orange juice. 
Fantastic location, across the road from the bay. And a direct and regular bus route into circular quay. Would highly recommend staying with Fred and Bernadette and if we find ourselves back in Sydney in the future, we would definitely try and stay there again.
Our stay has been very memorable. The house was charming, clean and well equipped, with the beautiful beach at your doorstep. Fred and Bernadette were very warm and attended to our needs.

It was everything it promised.  Fred and Bernadette took the time to answer all my questions via email before our stay.  The kitchen was well equipped with basic condiments, milk. juice and homemade sweets.

Fred and Bernadette were very welcoming.  There were home baked goods for us on our arrival and a good stock of condiments in the pantry.  Everything was clean and well kept.  Someone was always available if I had questions.

This was the perfect location for a relaxed stay in Sydney; located right on  the water, and the local saltwater pool was gorgeous. The   picnic area at the beach includes a large covered play area for the kids and was the perfect back drop for a family catch up. And 10-15 minutes drive form everything in town. I loved it.  Fred and Bernadette provided a very welcoming and comfortable space; and have thought of every detail. It felt like a home away from home. Thank you. Kim.

Fred and Bernadette are a lovely couple and helpful in many ways.
The neighbourhood is quiet and is ideal for relaxation.
Its a very convenient place to stay to travel around Sydney.
Plus the beach view is a surplus!

They're really nice host. Fred welcome us into his apt when we arrive & help us out with the foldable sofa. It was pouring on that day so he lend us umbrellas as well. Apt was neat,tidy & clean. They have juice &water in the fridge as well as brownies as a welcome gesture. We enjoyed 2 days of stay there. They also have an awesome view of the sea just outside the house which we really like.  Would love to stay there again if I vist again. 

Thanks for having us Fred & Bernadette :)

We arrived early from interstate and the apartment was ready for us, Fred was on hand to explain everything and give us some tips on catching the bus.   The apartment was exactly as described and the location was fabulous.  The beach and sea pool were much utilised as the temperature climbed to 42 degrees, even beach towels were provided, in fact we had everything we needed for an enjoyable stay.  Although we travelled to Sydney to see the touristy sites, we found it hard to leave Malabar, the cafe a few minutes up the street and the golf club restaurant meant easy access to good quality meals and coffee.  A thoroughly enjoyable stay, thanks Fred and Bernadette

We were very warmly welcomed by Fred and Bernadette to their home in Malabar. The self contained apartment was beyond our expectations and our only regret is that we only stayed for 2 nights. 
Fred was very thorough in his explanation of all the amenities, both in the apartment and around the local area.
Bernadette made a lovely slice as a welcome which we enjoyed very much with a cuppa one afternoon. 
We stayed there to attend a wedding held locally and unfortunately didn't have enough time to fully enjoy the area, or even watch the tv!
The mattress was comfortable as were the pillows (very important points for me). 
A friendly cafe serving breakfast and lunch, and dinner on, I think, Friday and Saturday night, was just a short walk away, probably less than 5 minutes. Good menu and reasonably priced. 
We didn't get to swim in the bay and we didn't have any need for the children's playground but young families could really make good use of both.  
We had such a lovely stay and would definitely return, given the opportunity. 
Thank you very much Fred and Bernadette!

We had a lovely Stay!!! All comments, pictures etc. We're just right! This is the perfect place to stay. We found all we needed for the three off us. Fred and bernadette were really friendly and nice and we loved to be there. Also for citytrips as well as beach vacation perfect destination. U can't find better ( and as we are working in hotel we know what's good

We were really unlucky with the weather. 48 hrs of torrential rain. So it is a bit difficult to review the area as we just couldn't enjoy the beach or sea pool. 
However the property was lovely. Very clean and tidy. Very modern and all as you would want to find it 
Bernadette greeted us and showed us around.  Cookies resplendent on the table,  fresh orange juice in the fridge. 
Unless you have a car be prepared, as the nearest useful shop is a bus ride away. Central Sydney is about a 45 minute bus ride away but it doesn't feel that long. 
If the weather had been kinder I think this would have been a perfect place to explore Sydney from.
great house,clean,good location

Fred is very kind and warm
I love his house 
Everything was clean and tidy
The view from the small room was fantastic seeing the sea

Wonderful location and was exactly as described. Very homely and spacious after staying in 1 bedroom as we are travelling this was a luxury for us.
Beach across the road which is better than Bondi Beach. Thanks for your hospitality.

The apartment in Fred and Bernadettes home was wonderful - so clean and new. It was also a pleasure meeting them, they were very helpful and kind. As we didn't have a car, we found it a little difficult dining out, as on our last day, both the local cafe and golf club restaurants were closed (a Monday). There's a little cosy beach nearby and the views from the terrace were wonderful.

We absolutely loved Fred & Bernadette's place and I'm already planning to return soon! 
The unit is fully self contained, clean and has everything you need (including wifi, Netflix and coffee)!
Malabar is a lovely town with a nice quiet beach, great ocean pool, restaurant overlooking the water and a great beach cafe (which does fantastic pizza!).
I highly recommend this place, it's great. I'm looking forward to returning soon.
The beach nearby house is as exact as the description, no more than 1 minute to bus station. The hosts is quite warm, and I strongly recommend the house as your best choice in Sydney.

We were visiting our daughter in Sydney and we enjoyed our 16 day’s stay at Fred & Bernadette's place very much. The unit is fully self contained, clean and has everything you need (including wifi, Netflix and laundry possibilities). Malabar is a lovely town with a nice quiet beach, great ocean pool, restaurant overlooking the water (open from Wednesday till Sunday) and a beach cafe (open till 15.30 on Friday and Saturday till 20.30). The bus 399, takes 45 minutes to Central Quay, stops in front of the house and in the evening at a 2 minutes walk. For the bigger shopping centers, as detailed in the welcome book, you can better use a car, smaller shops are on a 10 to 15 minutes walk. Fred & Bernadette were very helpful, thanks for using the opal cards. I highly recommend this place.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Fred and Bernadette's home. Location was beautiful and a calm, quiet contrast to the hustle and bustle of the city.  
The apartment was spacious, well equiped and very comfortable. 
Would not hesitate to stay here again when we return to Sydney. 
Thank you :)

We had a really good experience at Fred's place, they are very responsible and always respond me quickly.  The place is beautiful and Everything was as described, we did snorkelling, swimming and fishing in front of their door.  Highly recommend it to traveller with their own motor vehicle.
Thanks for letting us stay at your wonderful apartment. It was even more beautiful than in your description and the pictures. What a perfect place to start our holiday.

My second stay at Fred & Bernadette's place was great! The morning sun & sound of the waves crashing is just divine. Once again the apartment was clean and there was even a birthday card with a present! I wish I could go back more often, highly recommended.
Such a gorgeous place ! The pictures do not to it justice - definitely recommend this place. Fred and Bernadette are such wonderful hosts !

Fred and Bernadette's home is a magnificent place to stay while visiting Australia. I highly recommend reading the welcome book upon as they have included a wealth of information inside. The views are spectacular and the apartment is clean and pleasant.  A bus pass is a definite must for easy travel into Sydney.

Myself and my Mum (82) and my Dad (83) stayed at Fred and Bernadette's for 2 nights.  Everything was exactly as we pictured.  Good communication before we arrived ensured smooth arrival.
Welcome Book was very helpful especially the bus timetable.  Perfect place to stay with the bus stop pretty much on the doorstep going into the city and circular quay.  Very peaceful place to stay.
The house is silent and comfortable.  The kitchen has all things we needed.  The location is also very good and it closed to the beach.
Nice n cosy house. Near to shops, near to city. Good stay!

We had a wonderful time at Fred's Place, the unit was exactly as shown in the pictures. It was very beautiful and clean, complete with all the amenities you need. The view from the unit are picture perfect, it has a private beach and walled pool. Going to the city was so easy and convenient by bus that stops just a few meters from the unit. I would definitely recommend this place.
The apt was wonderful, clean, quite, comfortable, convenient transportation with nice view. The apt was exactly how it looks from the pictures, very nice to stay there!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!  Fred and Bernadette's place was lovely and inviting.  Upon our arrival, Fred recieved us and showed us around the place.  The place was nicely furnished and information on the local sights were also neatly layed out for us.  The place overlooks the lovely Malabar Bay.  

I am confident that future guests will enjoy the place just like we did.

Thanks again Fred and Bernadette!

Beautiful and super clean place across the road from a beautiful park and beach. Fred and Bernadette are super helpful. Loved the welcome cake and juice upon arrival which was a really nice touch! Thank you for a lovely weekend stay.

Enjoyed the few days I spent at this property. Was not familiar with the Malabar area although I have lived in the Sydney eastern suburbs for many years. Quite a discovery! Being in Sydney but feeling like being on a weekend on the South Coast. Lovely. The apartment is very nice with all facilities and very comfortable. Very welcoming thoughtful attentions.

Lovely accommodation that I highly recommend. We were welcomed with fresh cooked banana bread and so many home comforts that made our stay just like a home from home. Fred and Bernadette put so much thought into everything they provide in this accommodation and it was lovely location with a great breakfast cafe just down the road :-)

Fred was a really helpful host. We came with our 11month old son, and he had a high chair and cot waiting for us. The place was spotless and a joy to come home to after a day in the city. Very accommodating and lovely people

Me and 2 other friends stayed at Fred & Bernadette's wonderful place. We could not have possibly asked for a better place to stay during our trip to Sydney. Fred/Bernadette provided us with a detailed book on how to get around, where to go for food, best spots in Sydney, and even nearby attractions. They made the arrival process very easy by providing us very good details on how to get to the house. 

The house itself had a 12/10 view! It really is spectacular to see the coast across the street when you wake up in the morning. The house had plenty of amenities and we did not want for anything. There is a bus that goes directly to Circular Quay in the middle of the CBD so that was very convenient. 

Altogether, this is the house to stay at if you go to Sydney!
Very friendly and helpful apartment really private and user friendly and exactly as advertised  a hidden gem ☀️

Fred & Bernadette's place is just magnificent....Style, ease of access, views and general surrounds were all top class.
Access to the city was also easy and although we had a rental car, one could use the bus which travels past the property.
Across the street was a wonderful view of the small bay at Malabar and golf courses withing a 3 min walk up the street.
The place was clean and had everything one would need for a lovely stay.
Would definitely recommend this property for families.
We would certainly love to stay there again.

The apartment is exactly as advertised and was everything we wanted while we were in Sydney attending a wedding. The apartment was clean, well stocked with consumables and was in a fantastic position on the foreshore of Malabar beach. Checking in and out was easy, parking outside was readily available and the views are spectacular. It was perfect for what we were after for our short stay in Sydney.

It was great time to stay in Fred & Bernadette places.
Most of all, house is located in near beach side and beach swimming pool. - This can explain about the best benefits for choosing this house!!
In addition, House is really clean, tidy and spacious.
It is easy to park the car near the house, so no need to worry about the car park.
Fred is a nice and kind host that you don't worry about asking him

It is a good experience to stay in this AirBnB in Syd

The apartment was exactly as described. It is quiet, comfortable and relaxing and right next to the sea and right on a direct bus route to the city.
Fred and Bernadette provided some nice basics - milk, juice and more on arrival and a very comprehensive guide to the area and the city.
We would definitely make a return visit.

A lovely apartment in a residential scenic area. Public transport was near and good during the daytime hours. It was very clean and well equipped with comfortable bed and sofa bed. The room at the front was a little noisy with comings and goings as we used this room with the sofa bed as a second bedroom but it was clean and comfortable. Great laundry facilities with soap powder and a drying area. Well equipped with everything we could possibly need and also little extras were included to make us feel at home. The hosts are very friendly and helpful people.
It was a great stay and everything was as described. We really enjoyed the place, the hosts were friendly and wonderful. Overall, it was great and we would recommend it!

We had a perfect stay in Malabar with Fred and Bernadette. It's a wonderful space with everything you need. We shall miss having our breakfast in the sunshine with such a great view of the ocean. We were visiting family and it was wonderful to be so near to the beach.

We had such a great stay here. The apartment is perfect for couples and small families. The view to the sea is gorgeous and the area is ideal if you want something authentic and truly local. The beach opposite is lovely and there is a great rock pool and local cafes. its an easy, direct bus into town. thanks so much Fred and Bernadette.
Excellent apartment with all the facilities a visitor would need. We had an excellent stay.

Fred and Bernadette's place was lovely, clean and had everything we needed for a great break in Sydney. They were quick to help and reply to messages. I would happily stay there again.

It's right on the coast, with a lovely view from the front and is only minutes walk away from the beach, playground and a lovely cafe.

They left us out a highchair, and camp cot, banana bread and fresh juice and milk in the fridge. There were towels for the beach and a few beach toys. What more could you want!

The apartment in underneath their house, with side private access. Although the front garden goes straight out onto the street (something that concerned me with small kids), there is actually a gate between your door and the street, so it's safe for kids to mill around out the front of the door whilst you get yourself sorted. The space felt very private and quiet.

A beautiful apartment. Spotlessly clean. Excellent host. Brilliant location. Would highly recommend staying here. My only negative would be no air con but apart from that it was one of the best places we have ever stayed in.

This lovely and warm house is excellent ... beachfront, warm home feel, bright, clean, public bus stop is just a minute away. 

The beach is a beautiful one with an ocean pool. So not only dip into it and kids may find it interesting as well.

Kitchen is fully equipped with everything a family may need. 

The host is a kind couple. We were welcome warmly and of course, hope that you are lucky enough like us with a banana cake treat !

- The beach view in front of the house is simply the best in town.
- Fred was a very nice and welcoming host.
- The house was in a perfect condition, plus it has a very homely feel.

Fred and Bernadette were perfect hosts, extremely friendly, warm hearted and interesting to talk to, we only wish we could have had the time to speak more. The apartment was very spacious and spotlessly clean on arrival and has absolutely everything you need for a home from home experience and more, which helps when travelling with small children. We could not have wanted a more perfect place to stay with our little boy and with such amazing views. This is by far the best airbnb we have ever stayed in over all our experiences throughout the world. Thank you.

It was an absolutely lovely stay with my family at Fred&Bernadette fantastic place. We were so lucky because we've booked at the same morning when we arrived and everything was just perfect even they had guests before.Location is fantastic the bus to the city in front of the door and the flat and Fred&Bernadette are just beautiful.A beach in front of the door what else do u need for an unforgettable stay in Sydney!! You can see the love to the details and will not regret to stay with them.Thanks for that and the tasty welcome gifts.
Stunning location, great hosts
Great apartment. Highly recommended.

Beautiful living room and kitchen, comfortable bedroom, cabinets and fridge prepared a lot food, you can cook youself, very convenient, very beautiful sea at the door, every afternoon with my girlfriend went to the beach walk. Fred&Bernadette very nice and friendly. Beautiful journey. We are very happy lived there.

Fred & Bernadette made us feel very welcome. 
The fridge was stocked with the basics and they left a banana loaf. After such a long trip a coffee and cake were much appreciated.
The apartment is very homely with everything you need.
We have never stayed somewhere with such a breath taking view, simply stunning.
It was free and no problem to park our hire car outside.
It's about an hour into the city on the bus. There are 2 stops very close by but you will need an Opal card to use these. 
East Gardens is the local shopping centre where you can stock up in Coles.
If we return to Sydney we would not hesitant to re-book this lovely apartment.
We had a great and very relaxing stay. The location is fantastic and it was great to look at the sea from the sofa in the sunroom!

Had a wonderful week staying in Fred and Bernadette's lovely apartment! Such a stunning location right across from the beach! Fred and Bernadette were wonderful hosts and the apartment had everything we needed! Would definitely recommend for a wonderful beach getaway!

Thanks to Bernadette and Fred our family reunion after more than a year was awesome. Because of the pleasant stay, we felt like at home. 
I can only highly recommend this place. 
Great place with a beautiful bay view.
Very nice place right in front of the beach.

Bernadette and Freds apartment is stylish and comfortable. 
We were welcomed with a fresh loaf Banana bread and a bottle of wine that set the scene for 10 great days of sunshine and relaxation. 
The apartment is directly across the rd from the beach ,with magnificent views. 
There is an easy walk to the corner cafe that serves great coffee and food., with a fabulous playground across the rd for children or big kids and a golf course at the other end of the rd that has magnificent views  up and down the coast. .
It has easy access into the city with a close bus stop so  we could enjoy the sights around Sydney and  then return to our haven. 
We will be  back ☺

Our stay was truly lovely! We were welcomed by freshly made banana bread and some groceries to get us started. The location is near the ocean, beach, rock pool and golf courses. Great with kids or if you want your peace :) Having a car is more comfortable but there is a bus too.
Fantastic relaxing, quiet location.
Fred and Bernadette were more than accommodating, absolutely beautiful apartment with amazing views!

I would highly recommend Fred and Bernadette's apartment, it is in a fantastic location with great views of the ocean and inlet. Lovely and clean with homemade treats and orange juice and milk in the fridge on arrivalwhich makes things that much more easier.
I was staying for work so i didnt get a chance to relax that much, but i would love to go back with my wife and take in all that Malaba has to offer.

Great location, nice and quiet with wonderful views.  Within walking distance of bus into City., a local cafe and we even had a swim in the  outdoor pool.  Warm, friendly hosts and lovely homely touches .. all you could need.
Très bon appartement, cadre idéal. Bernadette et Fred sont des personnes formidables
We had a great stay at Fred & bernadette lovely apartment. Would highly recommend. Cheers mark & dean

We spent almost 2 weeks at Bernadette and Fred's place with a 5 years old and without car, and really enjoyed those days. It was very convenient to go to the beach by foot and it was a good beach for a little one. Be aware that depending on weather conditions the beach can be quite dirty, but it is cleaned very regularly so we just had this once. It was easy to take the bus into town: it is not running very often (twice per hour) but it is just on the door step. Same to reach a small shopping center, 10-15 minutes away by bus (+ waiting time). With one change, you reach Maroubra or other beaches or a big shopping center. We cooked in the apartment, no problem for basics. The kitchen is quite new and has enough space. We appreciate the large fridge, freezer and dishwasher. The laundry is to be shared with the owner and you can usually dry the clothes in the sun. We appreciated the big shower, hot and stable temperature and the bathroom in general. The flat is airy even on hot days, except the main sleeping room. We did not need the provided fans. In the sun room you can let the door open and hear the waves at night (but then also a bit of traffic). The sun room couch bed is very soft (flabby?). For one person just ok. But I wouldn't want to share it. We appreciated the moskito nets everywhere. Kitchen and bath were very clean but the floors and shelves could have need a bit more care. Bernadette and Fred were welcoming and very reactive as we had a problem. It was a very nice, laid-back beach accommodation. With possibility to enjoy a few days in Sydney downtown. A good compromise with a child.

What a great place!
Wonderful location, perfect hosts and excellent facilities.
We received a warm welcome with fresh juice and milk in the fridge together with a delicious home made cake on arrival.
Would recommend to anyone looking for a lovely peaceful place which is within really easy access of the city and other areas of Sydney.
What a great place and a fantastic location!  The fresh banana bread was a great touch! Fred and Bernadette are amazing hosts!

This is as advertised, very clean, large, close to bus and with a lovely water view. I especially enjoyed swimming in the free, saltwater rock pool only two minutes away. I even ventured a swim across the bay and back on a calm water day. We both loved listening to the ocean waves for a week!Very quiet neighbourhood as well. Highly recommend this to others. Be advised, it is a 1 hour bus ride to Sydney CBD.
We loved the location of the property, right across the road from the ocean therefore a great view. Had a great week.

Fred and Bernadette's place was exactly as described.  It was clean and comfortable. We had a great stay.
They were excellent hosts, around when we needed them and giving us total privacy as well.  They gave us a very useful information pack on the surrounding area. We loved Malabar and its beach, but equally were able to get into central Sydney on the regular 399 bus whose stop was directly opposite.   We had a wonderful two weeks.
Great access to local facilities, comprehensive information provided by the hosts, local beach within 5 minutes walk.

This is simply the best airb&b in the locale. It has fantastic walks, restaurants, swimming and golf all nearby. The beach is right out front. Bernadette and Fred have prepared a  
very comprehensive guest book which answers nearly all questions you might have. The apartment has everything  most people would need, but we really appreciated the little extras, like Netflix- so we could keep up with our favourite shows while the rain teemed down outside. The bus to the city passes by right outside  the unit and there is easy street parking right out front. Negatives? None that we could think of. We wish Bernadette could control the weather!

Fred and Bernadette's home is beautifully located right on the Bay.  We enjoyed warm weather which made morning walks a delight. Unfortunately, we did not meed Bernadette, though Fred greeted us warmly and we very much appreciated the vase of flowers, chocolate and fresh juice.

The home itself was immaculate and I appreciated the quality linen and towels.

We were offered a later check out if we would like it, which was very much appreciated.

My Mum, sister and myself had a wonderful time in Sydney enjoying Vivid, the theatre and an NRL game,  It was an extra bonus to get a bus directly to Circular Quay on the doorstep.

I would definitely stay here again, thanks Fred and Bernadette for a terrific break.

Very kind hosts, very clean and comfortable appartment, calm, all facilities at hand. Super friendly family. Stunning views of the ocean and national park. Best place to enjoy Sydney from a quiet location.
Great place to stay with a homely feel.
Amazing spot for nice holiday with beautiful view and quiet area

Thanks Fred and Bernadette for a very pleasant and comfortable stay! 

The first time we entered the house, it was all OMG-the-house-is-amazing! The inside was 100% as described and pictured in the photos. And the view was so EXTRA! We managed to enjoy beautiful sunrises before we headed out. We definitely made the right choice staying there! 

Not just that, we were welcomed with a pack of Tim Tam, milk and fresh juice on our first day! Talking about the facilities and amenities in the house, they’re all complete. From the shampoos, body wash, to clean towels and hangers. From the variety of cookwares and to coffee powders and a box of teabags. 

Fred and Bernadette were very accommodating too. There was a day where we run out of body wash and told them about it and when we reached home at night, there’s a new one in front of the door. 

We were out of the house early in the morning and only be home at 9/10pm. Sadly we couldnt manage to meet Fred and Bernadette to say how thankful we were for a very nice stay in their Airbnb house. Luckily we bumbed into Fred after his morning jog right before we left to airport! He was curious of whether we enjoyed our stay and asked if there is anything that is lacking. Worry not, it was all perfect. 

Thanks Fred and Bernadette.
Perfect place to stay
a great experience
Wonderful stay in a beautiful location.  We will definitely be returning thank you Fred & Bernadette xx

Een prachtig gelegen appartement . Alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig. Mooi uitzicht.
Bus naar het centrum stopt voor de deur en gaat elk half uur. Reistijd is wel ongeveer 40 minuten.
Wij hebben het kustpad gewandeld van het appartement naar bondi beach. Prachtig!

Fred and Bernadette are very kind people, they made my check in easier even if I arrived earlier due to a flight change. The house has a marvellous view on the ocean, perfect and quiet location.  The house is well furnished and is very, very clean. Recomended!

A great little place and ideally located. Has everything you need and suited us brilliantly as a family of four adults. The city is about 30-40 minutes away by bus which between 7am and 7pm stops right outside the apartment. A welcome pack including fresh jam was very much appreciated. Fred and Bernadette respected our privacy but were there if needed. Thank you both.

Very nice appartment at Malabar beach! We loved our stay.  The appartment is tidy, spacious and had everything we need for a stay. Nice details our the flowers, wine and TimTams! Communication with Bernadette went very well. I recommend this great place!

Ideal for golfers and beach in walking distance. 
Did not have a car and used an opal card on the buses /trains  easy to get everywhere on them 
We are a retired couple over sixty.

We had a great time at Bernadette’s place! Such a beautiful location and amenities, and the extra treats were much appreciated and enjoyed. We actually live in Sydney but not near the beach, so we had a fabulous time exploring the beaches, rock pool, cafes/restaurants and walks, along with more breeze and less humidity than usual ☺️ Highly recommended.
Lovely apartment right opposite the sea . We really enjoyed the stay , thank you .
Stunning location . Lovely place

Beautiful beachside location. Really comfortable apartment. Very clean. 
Some lovely touches with a bottle of wine, orange juice, biscuits and basics in the cupboard. 
The apartment keeps cool without the need for air conditioning. 
Direct, punctual bus service into the city and links to elsewhere. 
Highly recommended.

name: Habitación doble en el centro
summary: We have a sunny room in our nice apartment in Plaza Tetuan, very close to Arco de Triunfo and Ciudadela Parc in Barcelona. You have a big beautiful wooded walk next to the flat. There are shops around and supermarkets (eco- bio, 24h, japanese...) and lots of restaurants of all kinds. The apartment has lots of light and cozy decoration. You will have the best access to public transport (underground, train and buses) which is just around the corner. You are more than welcome to be our guests.
space: the apartment is completely renovated keeping the vintage aesthetic of the building. All the floor is parquet and the rooms are exterior.  The apartment has lots of light and cozy decoration. The AC is in the living room and it refreshes all the areas but you also have  an extra 50W fan in the bedroom.
description: We have a sunny room in our nice apartment in Plaza Tetuan, very close to Arco de Triunfo and Ciudadela Parc in Barcelona. You have a big beautiful wooded walk next to the flat. There are shops around and supermarkets (eco- bio, 24h, japanese...) and lots of restaurants of all kinds. The apartment has lots of light and cozy decoration. You will have the best access to public transport (underground, train and buses) which is just around the corner. You are more than welcome to be our guests. the apartment is completely renovated keeping the vintage aesthetic of the building. All the floor is parquet and the rooms are exterior.  The apartment has lots of light and cozy decoration. The AC is in the living room and it refreshes all the areas but you also have  an extra 50W fan in the bedroom. We have been living in Barcelona for many years, so we can inform you of everything you need. You also have Wifi in the apartment so you can consult all your questions. We will do all our best trying
notes: The building  is very intimate, familiar and silent, so please, we ask that ONLY PEOPLE WHO WISH A QUIET AN RESPECTFUL STAY , contact us Thank you!
transit: You will have the best access to public transport (underground, train and buses) which is just around the corner.
access: We are a young couple living in the apartment, but we both are busy so we will not occupy the space during the day. Obviously you can enjoy all the common areas as if you were at home.  The apartment has wifi 50 mb, so it is perfect to work with the laptop or make (Hidden by Airbnb) calls.
interaction: We have been living in Barcelona for many years, so we can inform you of everything you need. You also have Wifi in the apartment so you can consult all your questions. We will do all our best trying to be at home for the check in, and help you with the baggage. We speak spanish, english, and french
house_rules: SMOKING IS ALLOWED IN THE BALCON BUT NOT INSIDE And please, do not make noise after 10 p.m.

reviews.comments: Hanna's place is lovely! Very stylish and so clean. We had enough privacy to feel at home. The place is very close to Plaça de Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. You can go easily on every tourist attractions.

Appartamento molto carino, pulito e confortevole. Posizione ottima, tranquilla e ben collegata con tutte le zone d'interesse della città (bus, metro, ma ci si può spostare benissimo anche a piedi). Proprietari gentilissimi e disponibili.
Ci siamo sentiti come a casa!

CONSIGLIATO! :)

name: Cozy In The Heart Of The Plateau
summary: Sunlight, Style and homely feeling in 2 rooms of my spacious  Plateau Apartment which can host up to 4 people! Just off Avenue Mont Royal you'll find the best Montreal has to offer only a Stone's Throw away and for everything else the subway around the corner!
space: ( PLEASE INTRODUCE YOURSELF PROPERLY WHEN SENDING US A REQUEST, WE ARE OPENING OUR HOME TO YOU AFTER-ALL)  Hi fellow Traveller, I love Airbnb myself and had such amazing experiences that now, since I have the luxury of a spare room, I would like to give back some of the loving! Im looking forward to host people who share the same Airbnb spirit of community and sharing. The room you’ll be staying in is beautiful and bright with lots of privacy and will accommodate all your needs while you're on the road. Its one of three Rooms in this typical Plateaux Apartment with wooden floor, tiny balcony and direct access to the Backyard. Your room will have a queen size bed and is actually the one who gets the most sunlight in the house.
description: Sunlight, Style and homely feeling in 2 rooms of my spacious  Plateau Apartment which can host up to 4 people! Just off Avenue Mont Royal you'll find the best Montreal has to offer only a Stone's Throw away and for everything else the subway around the corner! ( PLEASE INTRODUCE YOURSELF PROPERLY WHEN SENDING US A REQUEST, WE ARE OPENING OUR HOME TO YOU AFTER-ALL)  Hi fellow Traveller, I love Airbnb myself and had such amazing experiences that now, since I have the luxury of a spare room, I would like to give back some of the loving! Im looking forward to host people who share the same Airbnb spirit of community and sharing. The room you’ll be staying in is beautiful and bright with lots of privacy and will accommodate all your needs while you're on the road. Its one of three Rooms in this typical Plateaux Apartment with wooden floor, tiny balcony and direct access to the Backyard. Your room will have a queen size bed and is actually the one who gets the most sunlight in the house. The
neighborhood_overview: As for the area, you'll be spoiled as you'll find everything in walking distance, like: - for the morning's best bloody bakery ever "Kouign-Amann", a french bretonne style bakery with croissants and chocolatines to die for plus loads of other delicious pastries (1 min) - The toughest competition of coffee shops in whole Montreal among them "Khawa Cafe" with great coffee and amazing Couscous for lunch, "Le Couteau" where coffee is art or the super friendly window in the Wall "la distributrice"  - for healthy lunches and Lunch packs for the road there is nothing better than "trip de bouffe"  -for  the whole dose of Montreal we have "La Banquise" and "Schwart'z"  each 10 min by foot from our house -the beautiful Mont Royal Park with its iconic hill and great view over the whole city just 10 min from our doorstep if you want to feel out of town while you're actually right in the middle of it  -"JR Cyclery" is renting quality bikes for unbeatable 15 $ for 4 hours or 24 $ for 24 hours, Other
notes: Last but not least about me... I am a German Chef and I love my profession because it lets me combine my passion for food with my passion for travel and meeting new people. I love to discover new country's and like to let my mind be broadened by new people, new cultures  and new food! As already mentioned I really believe in the Values of Airbnb and the sharing economy. For this reason it is very important to me that people don't take my place simply as a cheap replacement for a hotel. People who stay with me are usually having a great time, not only cause the room is nicely decorated or the place is so central but because they find a personal note that they wouldn't find in a hotel. However this only works if people are open minded and don't take things for granted. For this Reason I will simply refuse any requests which carry no personal message or people who think they are dealing with representative of Hotels. ;) I can't wait to meet you and to share some stories and laughs! See yo
transit: Im on "Avenue Mont Royal" and "St Denis Street" 3 min off "Mont-Royal" Metro Station letting my area score 93 out of 100 points which makes my place a "Walkers Paradise" (check their site) So basicly you can do everything on foot from here and if ever you need it, the Metro is just 3 min down the street to jump on and there are a array of Bus stops to get you anywhere you desire in the quickest way.
access: The Bathroom, which you'll be sharing with me, comes fully equipped with Hair dryer, fresh towels and usually some soap and shampoo. My Kitchen replaces the Living Room, meaning it is here where all the social life takes place. In the Kitchen you will find a Nespresso machine and a milk frother for your Coffees in the morning! You'll have your own shelf in the fridge and the kitchen as well is free to your use. (just don't forget to wash up ;) ) Be assured that in the apartment you will find all basic appliances like wifi, washer. *Booking for 30 nights minimum*
interaction: I live in the apartment with my girlfriend and our beautiful cat. I have a pretty busy life, professionally and private, so usually you should have the place to yourself on most times of the day. However it is important to me to make myself available for my guests and I will always be very happy to advise you on how to hit the city according to your preferences ( also check out my guidebook on the bottom of the page). You also wouldn't be the first of my guests to be sharing laughs and good stories about travels, music and whatnot over a refreshing drink. ;)
house_rules: -There aren't many rules you have to follow in our place, follow your common sense, act not much different as if you would stay with a friend... -Be clean, be respectful! -Wash your dishes please! -I am happy to let you use the amenities in the house, please just ask for permission beforehand. -We are not a Hotel but people who seek good company from all over the world! Keep that in mind ;)

host.host_about:
I am a chef from Germany, obviously I love good food, music, fun people, travel, sports and adventure. I am looking forward to be hosting you or to be hosted by you!
See you soon

reviews.comments:
I was their first guest and I had a great time. Collin and Sandy are very welcoming and happy to help you to get around the city.
The room is more than what you need. The bed is big enough for two persons and you have space in the room to put all your luggage. Even although they say the room is in progress I think it is more than what you need for a few days.
The apartment is very clean and they allow you to use the kitchen to cook.
They both speak English and French,Collin is German and Sandy is really good in Spanish so the language should not be a problem.
The location is great, so overall it is a great place to spend a few days getting around Montreal

Hello !
Notre séjour chez Collin et Sandy c'est très bien passé. C'est un couple vraiment gentil, intéressant, respectueux en tout temps et ils ont des super conseils a donner !! L'appartement est trés propre, sympa, agréable et il l'ont bien aménagé ! De plus cet appart est vraiment très très TRÈS bien placé !!! 
Encore merci à eux !! À bientôt

un grand merci à Sandy et Collin pour leur accueil vraiment chaleureux.Chambre très confortable, Appartement superbement bien placé, au plateau, à 2 pas du parc Mont Royal et à une petite marche du centre. Nous avons pu visiter tout Montréal à pied.
Collin et Sandy on été tes hôtes très prévenants et plein de bons conseils.

My daughter and I had two great nights with Collin and Sandy. Their apartment is immaculate, bright and a perfectly located. So close to the subway and plenty of shops and parks right in the neighbourhood. The best part, though, was morning deliciousness at Kouing Amman.  Sandy and Collin were very good hosts. Welcome to Canada!

Me and my brother went to Montreal for three nights and stayed with Sandy and Collin and we enyojed out stay a lot! Their apartment is perfectly located, clean, beautiful, bright and cozy. Also, they are very nice hosts, easy to be with, friendly and helpful and even offered to take us with them for their sunday trip. Thanks to our hosts!
I highly recommend it!

My friend and I had a wonderful stay with Colin and Sandy. They were extremely nice and welcoming. We felt very comfortable. The bedroom was bright and quite spacious. The bed was comfortable too. Location was amazing! The metro was maybe a 5 minute walk. The main street was just around the corner to the apartment. We would most definitely stay here again! Thanks again Colin and Sandy!

Collin and Sandy are the perfect hosts! I can't stress enough how perfect the location really is. The place is clean, tidy, and comfortable. Above all — it's refreshing meeting smart, like-minded folks :) would love to stay at Collin & Sandy's next time I visit Montreal.

A pleasure to discover Montreal in those conditions.
Welcoming hosts, very pleasant apartment, very well maintained/ clean and great location.
The disposition of the room is top, allowing to keep our privacy.

Easy to communicate with Sandy and Collin. 
They reply quickly to any of your emails/ questions, they make you feel comfortable. 

An enjoyable experience in their apartment, even in a cold winter!

Thank you.

Collin and Sandy's place was lovely. The location is very accessible from Mont Royal Station. Most of the good and cheap eateries were around the corner. They were very hospitable and the room we stayed in was clean and cosy.

I had a great first experience of montreal thanks to Collin and Sandy. I booked the room last minute and they were very understanding. Their apartment is really cute, big, cosy and the room is super comfortable. They live in a great lively neighborhood, close to a convenient train station and tons of cool bars, restaurants, shops and cafés. They provide plenty of good advices and make you feel at home right away. If you're looking for an easy affordable and comfortable stay, look no more. This is the spot.
Collin and Sandy were great hosts, I would definitely recommend it for anyone who's visiting Montreal. Their place is very comfortable and well kept, and the location is superb.

Colin and Sandy's apartment was an absolutely perfect place for my boyfriend and I to spend a week in Montreal. The location could not be better-we were able to easily access everywhere we wanted to go. Most things were in walking distance. Colin and Sandy were great hosts as well, making us feel comfortable and welcome in there home, and giving us great advice on places to go to in the city. Thanks Colin and Sandy!
Everything is same to the pictures.

On s'est senti comme "à la maison" dans cet appartement tenu par un couple super gentil et plein de délicatesse. L'appartement et la chambre sont joliment décorés. Des grands volumes et du parquet. On a eu le coup de coeur pour le quartier. On est à deux pas du métro, de cafés, de restos.. bref adresse à ne pas manquer !

Un acceuil chaleureux et un jeune couple avenant et ouvert sont les caracteristiques de nos hotes Sandy et Colin . 
une chambre agréable et calme situé dans un quartier vivant et animé a deux pas d'une station de métro sont les atouts que nous avons spécialement apprécie lors de notre séjour .
nous recommandons vivement cette tres bonne adresse pour un séjour a MONTREAL au sien du PLATEAU a é pas d'une excellente patisserie et du parc du Mont Royal .
Merci Colin et Sandy pour avoir concouru a cet agréable séjour dans la métropole québécoise .
Isa et Philippe P

Really enjoyable weekend in Montreal. The apartment is in a fantastic location- on the doorstep of several good restaurants/ Mont Royal. Colin & Sandy were very friendly and gave some great restaurant/ brunch suggestions. Would definitely recommend to others.
L'appartement est confortable, de même que la chambre. Hôte agréable et disponible.

Nous avons séjourné chez Colin et Sandy fin avril et nous avons passé un super moment.
Nous n'avons eu l'occasion de rencontrer que Colin car Sandy était en voyage.
Colin est une personne ouverte, accueillante, gentille (et bricoleur ;) ) et avec qui il est très sympathique de discuter et passer du temps.
L'appartement est très bien situé, joliment décoré, et la chambre très agréable. 
Métro, parc Montroyal, petits restaurants, magasins et super boulangerie !! à proximité. 
Nous recommandons vivement un séjour chez eux et nous reviendrons sans hésiter.

We had a great stay in Montreal and at Colin & Sandy's place. The flat is well located, close to Subway and Bixi stations, and also to market places. 
We were also good welcome by Colin, and we felt like home for the 5 days we spent at his place.

Nous avons séjourné trois nuits chez Colin et Sandy, ce sont des hôtes très sympathiques, ils nous ont donné de nombreux conseils pour la visite de Montréal.
Notre séjour à été parfait, nous les remercions encore pour leur accueil.

The apartment is very conveniently located, just steps from the metro station and right in the center of the Plateau district. The place is very cute and clean. Sandy & Colin are very helpful and friendly but also great about respecting their guests' personal space.

Colin and Sandy's place was clean and had everything we needed. The location was incredibly convenient. There are a lot of great places to eat within steps of the apartment and they are about a 15 minute walk of two great parks. The metro station was really close, as well.
The place was just as described. Great location. Very good communication. Helpful restaurant recommendations. We enjoyed our stay very much.

Even though Colin & Sandy had different schedules than mine, they were super nice! The bedroom is really good and the neighborhood is the best. I couldn't think of a better place to stay, couple of blocks from the Mont-Royal Metro station, a block away from Bixi stations, really good restaurants and amazing croissants at Au Kouign-Amann.

Sandy and Collin's flat is located in central Montréal, few hundred meters away from station Mont Royal. The block is nice, a park is not far away as well as supermarket.
Flat description matches with pictures on airbnb, it is just bright, clean and cool.
Great places to get a beer or to eat will be adviced by Collin who has maybe thousands of good addresses for food (thanks again for Trip de Bouffe !).
We travelled with our little 14 months boy who faced jetlag and woke up every day at 5 AM. Nevertheless, Sandy and Collin remained very patient and we are very grateful for that.
To sum up: a good place to stay to visit Montréal.

A perfect spot to launch our Montreal exploration!  We parked the car at the neighboring pay lot, and didn't drive during our entire stay.  Colin is a very nice, quiet & accommodating host.  The room was lovely, a little warm on a couple of the hot nights, but otherwise very comfortable.  The neighborhood is very active, but the apartment is nicely located down a quiet side street.  

Note the apartment is on the second floor, which might be an issue for those with disabilities.

We look forward to returning!

Colin a été un super hôte: il nous attendait à notre arrivée, nous a fait visiter l'appartement et nous avait préparé des guides pour notre séjour à Montréal. L'appartement de Colin est situé dans un quartier au top, le plateau. A quelques minutes à pieds du Mont Réal et de la station de métro Mont Réal. Quartier branché et dynamique: restaurants, bars, boutiques...
This place is in an absolutely great location, and is a bright, airy room.  Colin was great, although we kept different schedules and rarely saw each other.  The room was clean and simple.

Colin was very accommodating  and responsive to our day-of request (we were on a long road trip, had a last minute change of plans, and ended up in Montreal).  After driving 13 hours we got in way late and arrived finding the room exactly as pictured, and everything fresh, tidy and clean. We awoke to find ourselves in the heart of Montreal, a half block to Mont Royal and a short walk to this lovely park.  We just stayed the day and another night, and didn't even really get a chance to meet Colin, but it was a perfect place for our short  stay.  The brochures and maps of Montreal in our bedroom was a nice touch!

The Collin Experience…. That’s how I describe my trip to Montreal. Collin made my friend and I feel like we were visiting a friend rather than staying with a stranger. He was very warm, welcoming and accommodating. The listing was more than described the view from the terrace made for a perfect place to just relax with a couple of the local IPAs from the area. The backyard has a quant little seating area where you can enjoy a private conversation in the morning with a cup of Espresso. Collin directed us in all the right directions for AMAZING food and places off the touristy path. Best trip to Montreal I’ve had and I think it will be returning once a year around the time same :) Thanks Collin for making me and my friend feel right at home in a new place.

It was my first experience with airbnb and it was a great one.
Sandy (who I met briefly) and Collin were very welcoming, and I felt like at some friend's place. Their appartment is no more no less as displayed on the pictures. 
While the flat is very close to a lively  avenue, I can confirm what i had read in a previous comment (I think ?) : it's very livable. You don't hear much noise. so the location is great too, in addition of being convenient for public transportation.
You can really have confidence in Collin's advices for places to eat : He knows ! 
The French bakery he would recommend you has delicious croissants (and the compliment comes from a Frenchman). Also I had my best dinner in Canada (meal and wines from Québec)  in a bistro he suggested to me, at the corner, 100m from  their place.
to conclude, I was very satisfied with my 4-day stay at their place.
Colin's place is awesome and the neighborhood fantastic. He's a cool guy and we had fun staying at his place. I can definitely recommend him as a perfect host.

The location is AMAZING! Not only because there's the best boulangerie in town but also because you are right in the heart of the Plateau, in the middle between the Mile End and Center/Vieux Montreal Neighborhoods. Colin was so nice, wanting to connect with us and get our feedback about the city and giving us some good tips. We felt like we were staying at a friend's house. He really makes you feel comfortable to you stay at his home.

I stayed at Collin's place for over two weeks during Quebec's glorious fall season, while on a sabbatical visit at Concordia University, and much enjoyed it - it's spacious and functional and in a very vibrant area full of quirky eateries, cafes and shops, and within walking distance of Mont Royal where i did some wonderful hikes amidst the turning foliage. Considering the night life in the neighbourhood, it's not a completely tranquil place - the bedroom faces a small residential street near the corner of one of the main drags (Avenue Mont-Royal) but you can still get a good night's rest if you're not hypersensitive to occasional outdoor acoustics. Both Collin and i had busy schedules, so we didn't coincide on a daily basis, but one night we shared a fantastic meal whose ingredients had been grown organically on urban rooftops in Montreal. Highly delicious + recommended!

Our host was very helpful and he answered my queries promptly.   We only met once and he was very friendly and made us feel welcome.
The room we had was as described and very clean as was the bathroom.
The apartment was a bit smaller than we had hoped but we made do as we weren't there very much ourselves.
The location is the most attractive feature being only 1 block from several main streets with loads of restaurants, bars and entertainment.

Colin est un hôte fort sympathique, ses conseils nous ont été utiles pour visiter MONTRÉAL en 3 jours et pour apprécier les bonnes tables.  La rue est calme, néanmoins proche d’un quartier animé, restaurants, bars, boutiques (dont la meilleure pâtisserie du pays) et  proche de la station de métro Mont Royal. 
On se sent comme à la maison, l’équipement est complet, le café pour le petit déjeuner est prévu . Chambre agréable, le parquet craque, c’est un peu gênant pour les déplacements nocturnes dans l’appartement mais il parait que c’est de coutume à Montréal.  
Notre séjour à été parfait, nous le remercions encore pour son accueil.

Didier, Françoise, Valentin, Camille

L'appartement est idéalement situé, au cœur du Plateau Mont Royal et tout près de la station de métro. Il est spacieux, lumineux et bien équipé. Colin et Mélissandre sont des hôtes chaleureux et très accueillants. J'ai passé un excellent séjour et j'y reviendrai assurément !

Nous avons eu un problème lors de la réservation et Collin a été très compréhensif et nous a donné des solutions qui nous ont satisfaites. L'appartement est très bien localisé, à quelque pas de Av mont-royal! Stationnement pour 10$ la nuit à 2 min de l'appartement. Nous avons adoré notre séjours à MTL. Merci pour tout.
Louis

My stay with Collin was very pleasant - he was home to greet me upon my arrival to the flat (which is beautiful) and was very accommodating when a third joined our party on short notice. The room was clean, comfortable, and warm - I would definitely stay here again in the future!

si vous voulez être hébergé par un célibataire décontracté, qui réussit à être disponible sans être trop présent, alors allez chez Colin !
appart bien placé proche station Mont Royal - attention je crois qu'il y a une erreur sur la geolocalisation - 
confort assuré, malgré les -40°C de février
tres bon séjour en ce qui nous concerne

Colin est un hôte très agréable et disponible,
l'appartement est idéalement situé proche du metro et de tous commerces et restaurants, il est tel que décrit dans l'annonce.
Merci encore pour cette formidable expérience.

Colin was an amazing, friendly host! He really did the best to make me feel welcome in Montreal, and truly embodies what AirBnB is about—meeting cool, friendly people from all around the world. :) Be sure to check out the recommendations for food and drink in his guidebook as well, all of which were delicious and very reasonably priced.

The room was just as pictured, and very bright and nice during the day. The location is also wonderful. The apartment is right in the centre of Le Plateau, and only a couple of minutes away from the nearest subway station.

Colin was a great host and we really felt welcomed to stay at his place. The appartment and the neighbourhood are lovely. There are plenty of small cafes and reasonable priced restaurants near Colin's place. We stayed only couple of days during a weekend but a good location made it easy to see all the places we had planned to see.

Colin est un hôte très attentioné. Il a pris soin de s'assurer que mon séjour se passait bien. il prend également plaisir à échanger avec ses visteurs autour d'un repas. La literie était propre et les lieux communs également. La localisation est parfaite, à 3 min à pied du métro Mont-Royal.

The apartment was clean and Collin provided towels, guide books/maps and our own shelf in the refrigerator.  We hardly used the fridge space cause we were out and about the whole trip.  For that same reason, we didn't talk to Collin much although he seemed like a great guy and gentleman. Reach for the stars!  Thanks Collin our experience was excellent!

Collin et sa copine ont été très accueillant et agréable. L'appartement est très sympathique avec une décoration agréable et des aménagements prévus pour les visiteurs très pratiques. Idéalement placé, juste à côté d'une grande avenue avec beaucoup de commerces et à 3 min à pied du métro. Nous ne sommes pas resté longtemps à Montréal mais nous avons grandement apprécié notre séjour.
Terrific guy, great host and a beautiful apartment. Can't recommend Collins place enough and in a very cool neighborhood to boot.

Colin was a wonderful host, he really know what he's doing! Everything is his house is guest-proof! We didn't see each other much he made sure we had everything we needed.
The area is really great, very alive in the evening but not noisy at all. 
Great place to go to!

The apartment is very well located. It is right at the center of the vibrant Plateau Mont-Royal. It is well kept and clean. Although we did not see much Colin during our two nights stay, he was always responsive to our questions and our arrival went very well.

The location is just perfect. Take a couple steps out of Colin's apt and you will find yourself in the best, happening, fun neighborhood of Montreal. Endless brunch spots, bars, used book stores, people watching. But... that's not everything. You've got to chat with this guy! He's awesome, easy going, and he will make you feel at home. I wish I was staying longer so we could hang out more. I will definitely visit again!!

We had an amazing time staying at Collin's apartment. The location can't be beat, it's a clean spacious place and he was very hospitable. His guide for the neighborhood was amazing too, it made our couple of days so easy, everything he suggested was fantastic.
Colin est un hôte vraiment très sympa et accueillant. Son appartement est très bien situé, à 2 pas de Mont-Royal et du métro, tout correspond à la description, et j'y retournerai avec plaisir!!

Colin's Apartment was great and the location too! The beds were really comfortable! Colin was a great host always available for questions and he really made my first Airbnb experience being pleasant. I would stay here again next time I am in MTL! 
Cheers
Nous avons passé un très beau séjour dans ce superbe appartement idéalement situé au cœur du plateau. Merci à Colin pour son accueil chaleureux et ses conseils précieux!
Colin made us feel very welcome and comfortable in his home. The listing was accurate - close proximity to the metro, restaurants, and Mont Royal & Saint Laurent.

Nous avons passé 6 jours sympathiques en compagnie de Colin et Melissandre, très accueillants. L'appartement est très bien situé, au cœur du Plateau. Il faut écouter les conseils "Resto du coin" de nos hôtes. Pour une première expérience Airbnb, on est très contents !

We visited Montreal for Jazz festival and stayed in Collin's apartment for three  nights. Collin's apartment in perfect location! We walked almost everywhere. There is a Bixi bike station very close to his apartment and you can find these stations in every two blocks. We felt very comfortable in his apartment, and spent great time in the neighborhood!

Collin is a great host! Staying with him is a lot of fun, he can show you a lot of interesting places, he takes care of you and is always trying to make you feel as comfortable as possible. Last but not least, his flat is in the best location to explore the city. There's nothing bad to say here!

Un appartement très agréable et parfaitement situé pour profiter de Montréal et un hôte attentif et prévenant, qui nous a permis de faire le check-in et le check-out à notre convenance. Je recommande vivement!
Un lieu d'accueil situé idéalement au coeur de la ville et de son animation. Un hôte à la fois discret et disponible. Bref une base idéale pour découvrir Montréal
