Collin est un hôte génial, plein de bons conseils et de bonnes adresses, il a sut faire en sorte qu'on se sente comme à la maison alors qu'on était chez lui, des petites restos entre nous histoire de nous expliquer son parcours et de faire connaissance, invité chez ses amis, une experience inoubliable. 

La chambre est comme décrite, et l'appartement est typique de Montreal dans un des quartier les plus branchés !!

Merci pour tout !!

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in Collin's Wohnung (die wirklich perfekt im Ausgeh- und Szeneviertel liegt) und er hat uns viele gute Tipps zum Einkaufen und zu Restaurants in Montreal gegeben. Vielen Dank!

The place was great, and it was close to some really sweet bars and restaurants. Colin was really helpful providing us with excellent places to eat and go out. We didn't have much of a plan coming to Montreal and he was quick to fill us with ideas! His place is cozy so it can feel a little cramped with more than 3 people. The only area to hangout is the kitchen or the bedroom but if you plan on just using the  apartment as a place to crash then its great! Overall Colin made the experience very nice and I  recommend others booking their stay here as long as they are cat friendly!

Thanks to Collin's advices the trip to Montreal was amazing.

His appartement is right next to some bars and restaurants, so you can go everywhere by foot.

I would definitely go there again!

Thank you again for hosting!
Great experience!房东推荐的餐厅都很棒,不错的体验~房间感觉明亮~特别舍不得他们家的猫咪Chipie~

I've had a great time at Colin's apartment. The place is close to so many restaurants, bars and 24/h quick markets, so you basically can do everything by foot, also, there's a subway station a few blocks away from it, so it's easy to get there and move around town. The bedroom is exactly the way pictured. Also, Colin's girlfriend was very friendly and welcoming and she gave me precious tips on where to go eat and have some fun around Montreal! I recommend staying there! :)

Colin and Melissandre were very kind guests. The arrival process was extremely easy, even though I got there when they weren't home. They were both super welcoming and able to chat restaurant recommendations as well as tour guide tips. They are fun if you like video games, Netflix or comic books and I feel anyone would feel at home in their place.

My friends and I visited Montreal for a weekend and stayed at Colin's apartment. We arrived slightly early and he was very accommodating and kind to us. Though there may be a larger age gap between us, Colin is young at heart and knows how to have a good time. He made some nice recommendations for bars that my friends and I visited. 
He also has a cat and we would have played with her all day! If you're privileged to have the room pictured on the listing, you will have the pleasure of being able to play with her every time you open your door :). The apartment was as beautiful as expected, and I couldn't have enjoyed it any more.

Fue una muy buena y agradable experiencia. El departamento es totalmente igual al de las fotos, muy acogedor y cómodo. Colín y Melissandre excelentes anfitriones, nos dieron excelentes consejos de buenos lugares para comer, nos guiaron sobre la red del Metro y sobre todo de los mejores lugares para la compra de ropa de invierno! El departamento está Muy bien ubicado, el barrio tranquilo y seguro, el Metro se encuentra a unas cuantas cuadras del departamento así como el autobús, su ubicación es muy accesible. Muy recomendable la guía que hizo Colín para conocer los mejores lugares!

I really appreciate Mel and Colin's openness with me. The food and kitchen were lovely and delicious. Their apartment's location was awesome, surrounding by the best bakery, cheese cakes and other cuisine. They are truly open minded and brilliant people who know how to enjoy life. Definitely recommended! You will gain more than just one tour. I thought I dislike Montreal but then I'm loving it. :D
Super logement très bien placé au coeur du plateau Mont Royal. Colin et Mélissandre sont très accueillants. La chambre est spacieuse, calme et confortable.

A big thank you to Colin and Melissandre. They are perfect hosts !
The appartement is super well located, very near from Mont Royal and the mile end district. 
The room is also very nice : super lighty, lovely decorated, calm.
Bref, I feel very good at  their place :-)

Totally recommended :-)
Awesome location. Hosts were ready and willing to help with any advice. As is typical in Canada, there's no a/c but hosts were ready with fan. I would stay here again.

Si vous êtes accueillis par Colin, chance vous sera offerte de rencontrer un couple très sympathique et ouvert à l'échange. La chambre est telle que le suggère la photographie proposée, agréable et confortable. L'emplacement est idoine pour vivre le dynamisme d'une ville de Montréal où il fait bon vivre. Situés à quelques minutes à pieds de la station "Mont-Royal", elle-même positionnée à une station de "Berri-UQAM", centre synergique de la ville, vous serez à même de rapidement vous déplacer. En finalité, le logement comme la ville, devrait vous ravir.

Collin and Mel were such friendly And attentive hosts!!
Before my arrival he texted me to explain how to get the keys but when I arrived Mel was there and gave me some nice tips about the area.
Despite the short time In Montreal, I had a great time In their room! It was clean as well as the washroom and It has the best location!! I highly recommend their room!!
Thank you guys for receiving me!!
I hope to see you soon!!
Best wishes,
Isis.

I had an excellent stay in this flat: a cosy room, clean, fast WIFI and everything else that you need when travelling. Last but not least: the neighbourhood offers cool coffeshops, restaurants, metro and a beautiful area for running  (Montroyal is close).

Colin's place was fantastic, he and Mel were great hosts, super polite and fun to talk to, had great tips on where to go and how to navigate. Place was accesible and clean, the apartment is in a great location, lots of cool places on a walkable distance, and only 15 minutes by tube to Montreal's downtown. 100% would recommend.

Très bon séjour chez Colin et Mélissandre ! Très bel appartement et très propre ! Proche de toutes commodités à Montréal, très bon emplacement. 
Merci pour tout !!

This place was amazing. Hosts were friends and full of advice and information.

The guidebook Colin provided was absolutely perfect, it helped us decide on all our meals.

The location as prime, walking distance to the metro and right in the heart of downtown. A person really doesn't need a car.

As a "virgin" Airbnb-er this trip and experience has made me a believer in the whole process! Colin and Mel were beyond amazing and accommodating. I felt like I was staying with friends rather than strangers. They are both beyond friendly and helpful in making your way around the city :) The flat is in a beautiful area of the city, surrounded by cafes and boutiques. All the rest of the hustle and bustle is within walking distance or biking distance, as I opted for. There is a bixi bike stand just around the corner from Colin's place and this made it super convenient to come and go. The room and bathroom were clean!! This was a huge test for me...and I was grateful for the cleanliness factor. The apartment was hot while I was there (outside temp of +37 with the humidity) but there is a fan in the room which allowed me to sleep well at night.  I suggest ear plugs if you are a light sleeper, I go everywhere with mine, but I know I would have struggled with the outdoor traffic and creeky floors if I didn't have them :)

I couldn't have asked for a better experience, thanks you guys!

It was a great experience to stay with Colin and Mel.
Everything went smoothly and everything was very relaxed.
Colin and Mel were always very friendly and helpful, though unfortunately I did not have the chance to get to know them properly, since I was always busy myself and spend most of the time outside the apartment.
Furthermore, I have to point out that the location of the apartment is very nice. The next Metro station is less than 5 minutes walking distance and you can reach virtually any place in the city within less than 30 minutes.
I would recommend this place to anyone, who wants to stay in Montreal.

Colin and Mel were excellent hosts and the this place was a really great value! The location is perfect and close to many shops and eateries as well as centrally located for many Montreal attractions. The flat is exactly how it is described in the post and their cat, Chipie is adorable and very friendly. When we arrived, Colin drew us a map of some great local spots to check out in the area and made us feel very welcome. I would definitely recommend staying here.

The stay at Colon's apartment was wonderful. He was always very quick to answer my questions and provided all the info that we need for our arrival. We stayed there for 3 nights and felt very comfortable there. The place itself is beautiful, lots of light and very nicely decorated. The bed was very comfy and the room more than big enough for two. The bathroom was very big and with a window. The apartment's location is great. Just off Mont Royal with lots of places to eat and shop and the metro is just a few blocks down. 
Colin and his girlfriend were extremely welcoming and helpful throughout our stay. They provided us with an extra duvet on very short notice and even though we didn't see them a lot due to their busy schedule they were always open to a little chat and asked how our day way and if there was anything we needed.
This place is really awesome and I highly recommend it to anyone who visits Montreal.
В целом, всё хорошо. Очень доброжелательные ребята, всегда готовы что-то подсказать, помочь. Дали прекрасные рекомендации мест, где можно поесть.

Colin and Mel were a great host, very friendly, welcoming, helpful. The place was great and location was awesome. Restaurants, shops, clubs, bar, pubs, cafe, metro station... everything is there. If I have to live in Montreal I would find a place in this area!!

I was so lucky that as a foreinger moving to Montreal I came to Collin andMel´s home. Not only is a beautiful place, located in one of the most beautiful neightbouthoods in Montreal, but really, both of them were like angels to me. They helped me with everithing I needed and even introduced their friends too me. You can trust them 100 %, i defitily recomend this airbnb place. Thanks Mel and Collin.

Colin was a great host! He was easy to reach and gave us useful parking tips and dining suggestions. The apartment is very clean, quiet, and perfect for couples.  The location is great as well - we were steps away from bars and restaurants. Highly recommend!
Amazing location, friendly hosts, cute kitty :)

Colin and Mel were very nice. They were great at offering suggestions for things to do and places to eat/drink, and really friendly people! The apartment was clean, comfortable and in a great neighborhood that Colin accurately described as the "Brooklyn of Montreal." Lots of great food and drinks and close to the Metro for a quick trip to other neighborhoods. I would definitely stay here again!

Colin, Mel and their sweet cat Chipie (probably didn't spell that right) were great hosts, very friendly and hospitable. The flat is exactly as described "The Heart of Le Plateau". It is within steps of cafes and restaurants and a few blocks from the Metro, making it extremely easy to get around Montreal. The neighborhood is awesome and I felt safe at all times. I would definitely recommend staying with this awesome couple.

My dad and I had a great stay at Colin and Mel's place. The appartment is bright and welcoming, and the room is more than big enough! The apartment itself is ideally located in a lively neighbourhood and only a couple blocks from the subway. Getting to and from the Grand Prix couldn't have been easier. Communication with Colin and Mel was great, though we only saw Colin briefly on our first night. They have also created a really helpful guide of the area on Airbnb, which you should definitely consult. Would recommend!
Colin's place was very walkable, cozy. Colin couldn't have been a nicer host, I would recommend his place to anyone looking for a nice weekend in Montreal.

Eine Wohnung an perfekter Lage! Sehr nahe bei der Metro und viele tolle Kaffees und Läden in der Nachbarschaft. Mel und Collin sind sehr nett. Möchte man etwas anschauen oder Essen gehen haben sie immer einen Tipp. Die Katze ist einfach nur zuckersüss :)

We stayed here for 4 nights and we really enjoyed it! Cozy, bright room. Great fan in the room. Very homey. 2 blocks from a metro stop that takes you directly to old Montreal. 15 minute walk to Mt. Royal and Le Plateau. PERFECT location. Tons of yummy restaurants and coffee within blocks. Very kind and friendly hosts, extremely gracious. And Chipie is the best cat ever! So fluffy and friendly and loved to be pet :)

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Montréal. L'appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier animé, parfait pour découvrir la ville!
La chambre est conforme aux photos, confortable. Collin a été très accueillant et nous a donné plein de bons plans pour découvrir la ville! Je conseille ce logement!!

Excellent accueil et très comfortable! Très bien placé dans une rue calme qui est proche de la rue Mont-Royal ou il y a plein de choses à faire. 
Un grand merci!
Collin is a great host.  He is very friendly and makes you feel like home.  Location of Collin's place is one of the bests in town.
Muy bello lugar, céntrico de metro, restaurantes y bares, el vecindario muy acogedor para caminar... coincide el lugar con las fotos, Colin y Mel buenas personas.

My stay at Collin and Mels apartment was more than great. They were always very nice to me and we’re always there to help or to just have a pleasant conversation. I felt very comfortable living there and it is perfectly located especially to get the real plateau vibe but also to move quickly to other places in the city. 
I will definitely come back and I can only recommend this place to others.
Very nice place. Highly recommend who will come to Montreal!

Collin and Mel's place is located close to a lot of great food spots and cute stores in the Mont Royal neighborhood. They were very quick to respond to my questions and they're very friendly! Their space is a short walk from the Mont Royal metro station, making it easy to get places in Montreal. Thank you very much for a wonderful stay (wish it was longer)!

This was our first time using airbnb - and Collin and Mel ensured that it will be the first of many! Collin was very prompt with messages even before we booked. When we got in, both him and lovely Mel was there to check us in. They are such warm and wonderful people - they helped us with our bags (even though they didn't have to!), gave us so many incredible local tips (Collin is a chef, both he and Mel love cooking, so these guys know the real deal when it comes to food) and let us use their kitchen to make chai and generously told us we could use their Nespresso coffees and teas. The photos of the room and space on airbnb are accurate - it's nice and cozy, faces a relatively quiet street so you have peace at night, but best of all, it's in a fantastic neighborhood. We loved that it's close to the metro, steps away from one of the best bakeries and excellent restaurants...just a fabulous way to soak Montreal in.

This being our first time, my husband was super nervous about "staying in someone's home." But it really felt so much more personal than being in a hotel, especially with their gorgeous "cloud-like" cat Chippie! We walked away making friends, these are people we'd love to spend time with over drinks (and we did!). Couldn't have asked for more. Thank you Mel and Collin, you guys made our stay in Montreal super special.

Really great location close to lots of shops and restaurants, but the apartment is still quiet so you can get a good rest. Mel was a wonderful host who offered helpful tips for getting around. I recommend staying here if you're looking to experience the best of the hip side of Montreal!

The space is very close to everything, the neighbourhood is fantastic with an incredible bakery little minutes away. Metro is only 5 minutes away so definitely a great location. Collin and Mel were very nice. The only downside is probably just the fact that the walls are very thin. My friend end up feeling really sick from something she had so the walls were thin that the whole apartment could hear that she was unwell. But other than that, the space was incredible and the location was great. A really solid choice for discovering the real Montreal.

Ce logement est parfait pour visiter Montréal ! L'accueil a été adorable, l'appartement et la chambre sont propres et jolis en plus d'être très bien situé. J'ai adoré mon séjour, je m'y suis sentie comme à la maison !

Nous sommes restés deux jours chez Mélissandre et Colin ca a été parfait, le logement est super bien situé près du métro mont Royal, le quartier est parfait et la chambre super, ils sont très accueillant, la communication avant l’entrée dans le logement au top, on recommande vraiment,encore merci.

Supers Hôtes !! De supers bon plans donnés. L’appartement est dans l’hyper centre de Mont Royal. Le métro et la rue St Denis a 2 minutes à pied. La chambre est grande et lumineuse. Un grand lit très confortable. 
Je conseille les yeux fermés le bien de Collin et Melissandre !
Très bonne situation du logement. Excellent accueil et bonne convivialité.  Bon confort général.

J'ai passé un très bon séjour chez Collin et Mélissandre! Ce sont des hôtes très accueillants, toujours prêts à vous mettre à l'aise et à partager leur connaissance de Montréal, notamment via des recommandations qui sont très utiles quand on arrive à Montréal sans connaitre la ville! 
La chambre est très agréable et fidèle à la description. La localisation de l'appartement est vraiment idéale : à deux pas du boul. St Laurent et de la rue St Denis et du métro Mont Royal. Il y a pleins de petits commerces de proximité  à côté de l'appartement : supermarché, boulangerie, pharmacie... 
En définitive, je ne saurais que vous recommander de séjourner chez eux, vous serez très bien accueillis !!

Collin’s place is in an amazing location! The neighborhood is fantastic with plenty of amazing bars and restaurants. They are just a few blocks away from the Metro station which allowed us to get everywhere we wanted to go in the city easily. Collin and Melisandre were great hosts, very responsive when we had questions and even more flexible when we needed options. Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely recommend.

Collin and Mel were awesome hosts. Their place is in a great location and we had a great time hanging out with them. They offered all kinds of recommendations for food and drink in the area. We would definitely stay with them again.
excellent location, host extremely nice, good communication, safe, with a cute cat, fair price

We offer a home so you can be in Barcelona at the time you decide to come and enjoy our fantastic city. We are a family enterprise with long experience in the rent of housings.

You can trust us. We know what you want!!

reviews.comments: Excelente Ubicación
Beautiful apartment in an excellent location. I hope to come back some time.

name: Private Room With Patio In Queens
summary: This is a private room in a very nice and very safe neighborhood in Woodside Queens, theres a bus stop across the street (runs every 10 minutes) to the train station (3-4 minutes) and there's an express train ride to midtown manhattan in the rush hours(15 minutes)
space: The bedroom has a full size bed with mattress on a sturdy wooden frame and is quite comfy for two people. Fully stocked with bed linens, towels, soap, shampoo, etc.  The apartment is located walking distance to the New York subway and LIRR train station. There is also a bus stop in front of the building for a quick ride to the subway/train station.
description: This is a private room in a very nice and very safe neighborhood in Woodside Queens, theres a bus stop across the street (runs every 10 minutes) to the train station (3-4 minutes) and there's an express train ride to midtown manhattan in the rush hours(15 minutes) The bedroom has a full size bed with mattress on a sturdy wooden frame and is quite comfy for two people. Fully stocked with bed linens, towels, soap, shampoo, etc.  The apartment is located walking distance to the New York subway and LIRR train station. There is also a bus stop in front of the building for a quick ride to the subway/train station. You will have access to the kitchen which is fully equipped. Cleaning is extremely important after using the kitchen. There is also a living room facing the street that you can use. There is WiFi access in the entire apartment. The check in and check out time are flexible. You have your own key. Come and go as you please. Make sure to keep it as quiet as possible if you arrive late
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very quiet, clean and safe. Parking spaces are always available on the street. There is a short walk to many local restaurants, coffee shops.
notes: The apartment is also shared with other visitors from Airbnb only. Feel free to interact with the others and have a good time.
transit: The Q18 bus line stops in front of the building. The subway and train station is walking distance from the building. (the first time seems a little far but then you will realize is close). The subway runs 24 hours and the Long Island Rail Road has its own schedule.
access: You will have access to the kitchen which is fully equipped. Cleaning is extremely important after using the kitchen. There is also a living room facing the street that you can use. There is WiFi access in the entire apartment. The check in and check out time are flexible. You have your own key. Come and go as you please. Make sure to keep it as quiet as possible if you arrive late. NO GUESTS
interaction: I will be present at the time of your arrival and departure. If I am available I can even pick you up from any of the nearby airports, La Guardia, JFK or Newark, for an extra charge. If you are at the train station we can coordinate a pick up at no charge. I am always around if you need anything. If I'm not in the apartment, you can always contact me on the phone.
house_rules: I am looking for a respectful and friendly renter who is appreciative that I am opening up my personal space. No loud music,no smoking in the apartment only outside, no pets, report any damages, and report any problems or issues to me no matter how small they are. No visitors into the apartment and/or bedroom, I keep the place clean and expect you do your best to keep it that way. The kitchen can be used any time but it must be cleaned after using it.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hey!

reviews.comments: Macit is a PERFECT host :) - he was very caring, communicative, nice and friendly. He was waiting for us in front of the house, helped with our luggage, and he explained us the fastest way how to get to Manhattan (it´s about 15mins to Penn Station - really great allocation of the flat). The room is nice and cozy, looks exactly like on the photo. The flat in general was spacious and clean with big kitchen and friendly (Hidden by Airbnb) . Bus stop is right in front of the house, 7/11 about 5mins walking. Highly reccomend !!! :)))

The apartment unit is cozy, the location is pretty convenient. I like the neighborhood.
The bedroom is clean with closet, small table, and mirror.
We had full access to the kitchen and can store our food in the fridge as well.
The patio and backyard is pretty awesome, me and my boyfriend LOVE it!
I recommend this place for other traveler.

Macit was a friendly and responsible host. He responded quickly and was there to greet us on time. He even went out of he way to lend us an iron and drive us to the train station! We had a wedding in Manhattan and were looking for reasonable accommodations nearby. Macit's place worked out perfectly. It was clean, comfortable and about 30 minutes by train into midtown for the wedding. If you are looking for a base camp to explore the city, consider staying with Macit.
Macit was very accomodating and helpful with our stay great pace and good facilities

The house and room were great. Everything was clean, and the bed was comfortable. We did not have a lot of contact with Ramza & Macit, but they made sure we had access to whatever we needed. 
Location is good if you are looking for something that takes you away from the crowded and hectic areas of NY.

Thank you very much Ramza & Macit Okumus. The room was very pure, the bathtub also was pure, kitchen at your order. To the subway by bus of 3 minutes, to Manhattan 30 minutes. The only thing - you don't bring home pork. Owners Muslims, we didn't know about it, us didn't warn. Generally very much I recommend.

Really good host for reasonable price! Subway - about 15 min walk, so about 45 min from Manhattan. Generally place is quite and green, there is a big supermarket near. Ramza & Macit are very friendly and helpful guys. Strongly recommend this place!
Ramza and Macit were very polite hosts. The house was clean and very nice. 10-15 minute walk from the subway, but lovely neighbourhood.
The experience was very good, Ramza and Macit are very nice persons, we have a good time in their place.
Good location with great host. Macit & Ramza cared everything i wanted. I would definitely recommend this place with no hesitation
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was a great place to stay. My sister and I were very busy most of the time so we were only there to sleep but it was a great place for that, I would recommend bringing a fan it really helped in the room.
They checked in mid stay to see if there was anything they could do to help or if we needed anything.
They are very nice people.
We didn't see the hosts often but when we asked them a question we received an answer promptly. The area felt very safe and the bus across the street was very useful to getting to the subway station.

It was a really nice stay. The room is big enough and we enjoyed the terrasse and the back yard. The neighboorhood is super nice, cute and peacefull, the line 7 is convenient and we were in Manhattan in less than 20 minutes.
Also, Ramza and Macit are good hosts, they welcomed us, allowed us to leave our suitcase after we checked out, until we got to the airport and they called a cab for us to get there. We recommend Ramza and Macit for your future nights in Queens!

They didn't reply to my emails on the week running up to our stay and I had to contact Airbnb to prompt them to respond. 
To be honest I did not feel welcome on the first night as I rang to prior to arrving and he was mumbling on the phone, then when we arrived just showed us the room and we hardly saw them again. 
The bathroom tap leaked, the room was so hot- no fan was supplied, room had not been cleaned and I was woken on morning by one of them asking to let the new arriving guest in and wake up his Girlfriend. 
We left more like a burden than welcomed guested (this is going compared to our other experience with Airbnb.) 
If your are looking for somewhere to just sleep I don't see a problem with staying with these guys but we thought it was over priced for the service we received.

We really enjoyed the neighborhood around Woodside metro station and all, and the house was located in a quiet area. As for the apartment, people should know that there's no doorbell for it. In our case, even though we had arranged with them to arrive in the morning at a set hour, we had to wait a long time (1hr) for them to wake up (and answer the phone, txt). They didn't seem prepared for us.

Ramza seemed like a nice person, but apparently she didn't have time to clean up after the previous guests prior to our arrival: the bathroom (+leaking hot water) and our bedroom were dirty, and there was even broken glass on the living room's floor all week long.

Still, we enjoyed relaxing in the backyard late in the evening. We would recommend this place if you're looking mainly for a modest place to sleep, but a better deal should be available for a comparable price.

We stayed like 8days at their place, it looked better on the pictures, the kitchen is old and dirty, the microwave was very dirty inside, the floor was dirty in ou room, the water was dropping from the shower's tap but hardly, there was no soap in the bathroom they put dish washer soap in the holder. We had to put the toilet paper out from the drawer nobody changed the trash can in the bath room during the 8 days, our room was next to the owners room and many times they arrived home late and they were loud. Beside these thing we did not talk to much but they were nice and if we ask something they were helpful, the took us to the subway station because we had too mich luggages, we did not get that room what we paid for, i do not recommend this place

Ramza and Macit where the perfect hosts! Very friendly and helpful! They picked my girlfriend and I up from the station and also took us back there when our stayed ended. Was perfect because we had a lot of stuff and was raining.
I would highly recommend for anyone looking to stay in Queens.
Its a short walk (5-10minutes) from the 7 train which goes directly to Manhattan in a nice neighbourhood close to some small shops and takeout places.
The room and house were clean and everything was as described in their description.

The hosts of this place were extremely welcoming and they always asked for any assistance that they could give to me! They have heating, wifi, Netflix, everything you could ask for. Great people and great location

Nous sommes arrivés en retard dans la soirée à New-York. Macit et Ramza très gentillement, sont venus nous chercher à la station de métro de Woodside. 

Bonne localisation et rapport qualité prix intéressant même si propreté parfois un peu négligée.

Our plane had a huge delay, which caused in some troubles when arriving. The airbnb map showed another location than Macit was really located, the given address is correct. We saw Macit only for a few minutes to talk about the relevant things.
The room was as expected, but the window and the shower was leaking which has been little uncomfortable.
It takes half an hour to get downtown by metro. The location is perfect for LaGuardia Airport.

Neighborhood was quite and there was good connection to bus which led you to train station and from there you could go anywhere you´d like.
Macit was waiting for us when we came to apartment and showed us everything we needed.
Household isnt very good equipped but for shorter time it is enough. 
Anyway Macit thank you for accommodating us!!

Macit was nice, helpful, and welcoming.  The bed though was very soft and uncomfortable.  The sheets and pillow cases were of that cheap, unbreathable polyster, so they felt kind of gross/uncomfortable to sleep in.  The pillows were also super soft - woke up with a stiff neck every morning.  

The apartment is nice and clean.  There are ants but not too crazy though.  No hand soap in the bathroom.  Subway is about a 10-15 minute walk, really not bad at all.  Neighbourhood is very residential. Parking was easy to find on the same street.

En vacance à New-York en mai. le logement etait bien equipé. il est à 15 min de la station de metro qui mène directement à Times square. Le logement est proche des commerces tout en étant au calme. Le reveil avec les oiseaux est agreable. Nous avons rencontré des gens qui sont très sympa et accueillant. Un agréable séjour et de très bonne rencontre.

Amazing stay and great location!  Apartment and room looks same like in pictures and the bed was really comfty:) Check-in and check-out was for us really important and they have largely accommodated us. I highly recommened it.

La habitacion y el resto del apartamento son tal cual salen en el anuncio, todo correcto. 
Vimos al anfitrion solo el primer dia y el último, pienso que es muy bueno, porque te da sensacion d libertad y confianza
El barrio es muy tranquilo y del apartamento a la parada de metro hay 15-20 min andando y luego unos 25 min en metro hasta Times Square
Es una buena opcion si quieres estar muchos días en NYC, o si quieres ahorrar mucho dinero en estancia
Pero debe mejorar la limpieza del cuarto de baño

Die Unterkunft war für einen Urlaub in New York okay, alles schnell erreichbar mit Bus und Bahn. Allerdings waren Bad und Küche nicht besonders sauber. Die Zimmergrösse war soweit für zwei Personen in Ordnung. Leider ging unsere Klimaanlage nicht, was im Hochsommer sehr unangenehm ist. Auch war es durch die Flugzeuge sehr laut. 

Haben unsere Gastgeber nie gesehen, weshalb wir uns bei Fragen an andere Airbnb Gäste wenden mussten.

Im Großen und ganzen - eine gute Wohnung wenn man keine hohen Ansprüche hat.
En general todo estuvo bien menos por la limpieza en algunas ocasiones de la cocina y el baño.

Ótimo custo x Benefício,  local muito seguro e próximo de bares e restaurantes. Eu gastava cerca de 15 minutos andando até a linha 7 do metrô e mais 20 minutos de metro eu já estava no centro de Manhattan.
O único inconveniente da estadia era o vizinho do andar de cima, como a casa tem muita madeira, eu ouvia ele andando no andar de cima a madrugada inteira, mas nada que um protetor de ouvido não resolva.
Voltarei com certeza!
Amazing place to stay. Clean, Quite, Great Location

The room was exactly as pictured and described, Macit was a great host, flexible with the check in and check out times. The entire apartment was exceptionally clean and very well kept. Overall a great experience!
noting it was great:)

name: A lovely unique space in the heart of Brooklyn
summary: Our lovely  cozy room  is comfortable for two  and gives you a feeling of home away from home. It is 10mins walk from the Brooklyn museum, 18 min by train to JFK airport and 20 minutes by train to Time square Manhattan. Access to WIFI and a lovely Victorian kitchen. It's very close to down town Brooklyn a restaurant and pub hub in New York.  The train station is 5 minute walk.
space: It is very accessible to public transportation. 5mins walk to the subway. A supermarket is 2 blocks away.  The room is equipped with TV  and  a full  size bed that 2 people can comfortably sleep in. A portable fridge with a complementary bottle of wine.

host.host_about: Am a chef and also run an Abnb

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
segun had a clean place and great amenities in the room, just like a hotel, the neighborhood is a bit noisy though it was over the weekend...not his fault ;-)..i would def. stay there again!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Segun was wonderful and accommodating during our unusually long layover in New York for our honeymoon. Would definitely stay here again! Transportation was easy too!

Segun is a great host and is very helpful: we stayed in touch before our arrival, he helped us with explaining how to get to his flat. His flat is very nice and clean, our room was close to bathroom and kitchen so we felt during our stay as we had our own private flat :) It was very clean and comfortable! The most important thing: atmosphere in the  flat during our stay was very friendly :) Thank you very much and I can fully recommend everyone to choose Segun's flat!
My friend and I had a great time in Segun'a house! He was welcoming and very kind! The place was really clean! Thank you so much! We hope to come back soon and we'll definitely recommend your place.
Segun and Jospeh were a very nice guys. They made sure we were okay and nothing was missing or bothering us. It was a very nice stay. I really do recomend you to visit them and enjoy New York.

L'appartement de Segun et Anton est situé à Brooklyn dans un quartier calme et familial. Il est proche d'une station de métro (5 min à pied) qui vous emmènera au Brooklyn bridge en 20 minutes. 
La communication avec Anton et Segun se fait très facilement.
La chambre est équipée d'un lit double, d'un petit frigo et une télé.
Des petites attentions avaient été préparées pour notre arrivée : petite bouteille d'eau au frais, dentifrice et brosse à dent dispo et gel douche !!
Bref nous vous le recommandons.
A very pleasant experience! Very clean and comfortable.

We really enjoyed staying at Segun's place. The room is comfy and the bathroom is clean. The location is close to the metro and is very accessible to Manhattan and other tourist spots. Segun and Anton are super friendly and very welcoming, they made us comfortable staying at their place. We recommend it!
We feel really comfortable. It is really near of the blue line of the metro. I recommend it!

This room is very clean and cozy! It definitely values its cost. Segun is good host I had good time staying in his apartment. Everything is very clean and in good condition. Subway is in walkable distance. The room is the same as it is described in the profile.
If you searching something not expensive, but good - this is the best offer. 100% recommend to stay there!
L'accueil est chaleureux, très attentionné, l'appartement est très propre et bien arrangé. Je vous le recommande

name: Bright 1 Room Appt near Manly Beach
summary: Our place is close to Manly Beach (5 min walk) Manly Ferry (10 min walk). You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the beachy vibe, the light and easy access to the ocean and all of what Manly has to offer. My place is good for couples and includes an office.
space: This  1920's heritage apartment has bright white walls with dark timber floor. Natural light fills in from the morning rise with sea-breezes to cool you off in the afternoon.
description: Our place is close to Manly Beach (5 min walk) Manly Ferry (10 min walk). You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the beachy vibe, the light and easy access to the ocean and all of what Manly has to offer. My place is good for couples and includes an office. This  1920's heritage apartment has bright white walls with dark timber floor. Natural light fills in from the morning rise with sea-breezes to cool you off in the afternoon. There is dual access, from the front door and the back door (via the courtyard) There is x1 street parking permit avail, there is all day parking avail within a few mins walk. We are about a 10 min walk from the Manly Ferry and the bus terminal.
transit: We are about a 10 min walk from the Manly Ferry and the bus terminal.
access: There is dual access, from the front door and the back door (via the courtyard) There is x1 street parking permit avail, there is all day parking avail within a few mins walk.
house_rules: - Guests to be mindful of noise for our neighbours in the evening. - Limited to a total of 2 guests per night only

reviews.comments:
A great and private place close to everything you need for a relaxing stay in beautiful Manley 
Extremely welcoming and helpful with local tips.

Central place in Manly, close to the Main Beach and Manly Wharf although if you are arriving with luggage I wouldn't recommend walking from the Wharf as home is situated on a large hill.  Worth it to take a taxi even if it is less than 5 mins drive.  Home is clean and compact with good wifi and although we didn't use it, parking pass is available.  Couch and bed comfortable, bathroom clean.  Priced for the high season but a much better option than a hotel in the area.  Overall, I would recommend this home.

name: Apart-Hotel moderno e espaçoso com serviços
summary: Apartamento amplo e moderno com diferentes ambientes para o conforto dos hospedes.  Serviço de Arrumação diária; wi-fi e tv a cabo. Ambientes climatizados. Você também poderá usufruir de toda a infra-estrutura do condomínio que dispõe de piscina, saunas seca e a vapor, academia, restaurante e vaga em garagem coberta. Localizado no coração de botafogo, próximo ao metro, supermercados, bares e restaurantes. Ainda assim o ambiente é bem silencioso.
space: O conforto de um lar com serviços de hotel.  Mesa para estudo/trabalho; Areá de Cinema com sofá/chaise; Mesa de jantar. Cozinha e área de serviço equipadas; Suíte confortável com varanda com vista para o Cristo. Recepção 24 horas, piscina, saunas seca e a vapor, hidromassagem, academia, restaurante e vaga em garagem coberta.

A todos os comodos do apartamento, internet e tv a cabo inclusos e a todos as áreas de lazer do hotel (piscinas, saunas e academia) Museus, cinemas de arte, o mar, o céu e o Pão de Açúcar são os grandes destaques nesse bair
neighborhood_overview: Museus, cinemas de arte, o mar, o céu e o Pão de Açúcar são os grandes destaques nesse bairro no sul do Rio Com uma localização estratégica, perto do centro da cidade e também diversas opções turística, Botafogo tem vistas maravilhosas para a Baia de Guanabara e para o Pão de Açúcar. O bairro é palcos das famílias genuinamente cariocas que vivem ali. Os cinemas mais cults da cidade ficam no bairro, que além de tudo oferece as opções noturnas mais alternativas da cidade. A diversidade e qualidade dos restaurantes não poderiam deixar de ser pontuados também.
notes: Facilidade de locomoção! O apartamento fica somente a 4 quadras do metro.
transit: O metro é o mais recomendável para evitar o trânsito caótico da cidade .  Optar por ônibus é outra boa opção, já que o ponto fica praticamente na mesma quadra  do prédio. Escolhendo taxi, o serviço do hotel pode chama-lo para você.  Entre os transportes privados contratados por aplicativo, que atendem a região estão: 99, Uber e Cabify  Caso esteja de carro, 1 vaga em garagem coberta está incluso na sua hospedagem. Para mais carros, o local conta com garagem paga a parte.
access: A todos os comodos do apartamento, internet e tv a cabo inclusos e a todos as áreas de lazer do hotel (piscinas, saunas e academia)
house_rules: Evitar muito barulho a noite para não incomodar a vizinhança, que é bem amigável.

Sou do RJ, adoro viajar e me aventurar pelo mundo.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Everything in Felipe's apartment was as described and worked very well for our family of 3 adults. Alex (Felipe's sister) is close by and was helpful with a number of questions and just a good resource. The Hotel Mercure staff could not have been more accommodating. The Botofogo neighborhood is central to many things in Rio and getting around by walking, bus, taxi or metro were all easy ad pretty inexpensive. I would recommend this property to anyone.

Felipe boa recebeu super bem, foi super atencioso, nos ajudou com dicas de onde passarmos o reveillon quando pedi sua ajuda. Sempre disponível. O flat é incrível, o local é super silencioso , perto de tudo. 
Super recomendo.
Obrigada pela sua atenção Felipe, eu e o Michael adoramos ficar estes dias lá.
Felipe's apartment was really nice, bright and cozy. The two balconies were perfect for a moonlight rest in the hammock. I felt really home there.

name: Bushwick Chill Spot (Luxury Rental)
summary: 1/2 Block from the J, Z, M Myrtle Subway Station. Close to many restaurants and nightlife.  Bushwick is an up and coming trending area of Brooklyn, NY.  This rental in particular is special.  This is a comfy queen sized bed. This rental also has a private backyard.
space: The location of the space is what makes this rental great.  It's perfect for a business trip or holiday.  You can experience all of NYC and then come to relax in your private backyard.  Light up the fire pit and BBQ. Washer/Dryer in apartment.
description: 1/2 Block from the J, Z, M Myrtle Subway Station. Close to many restaurants and nightlife.  Bushwick is an up and coming trending area of Brooklyn, NY.  This rental in particular is special.  This is a comfy queen sized bed. This rental also has a private backyard. The location of the space is what makes this rental great.  It's perfect for a business trip or holiday.  You can experience all of NYC and then come to relax in your private backyard.  Light up the fire pit and BBQ. Washer/Dryer in apartment. You can use the whole apartment.  Even the backyard.  Washer and dryer in apartment for your use as well. I'm available for guests with what ever they may need.  I live there myself and use the house as a home.  Which mean I will have people come over to hang out on the weekends.  I would say we have a family aspect here.  You are always able to participate or not. B 1/2 block from JZM Myrtle/Broadway Station.  That means 20 minutes to Manhattan.  Easy from airports as well. I only hav
neighborhood_overview: B
notes: I only have 1 rental at a time.
transit: 1/2 block from JZM Myrtle/Broadway Station.  That means 20 minutes to Manhattan.  Easy from airports as well.
access: You can use the whole apartment.  Even the backyard.  Washer and dryer in apartment for your use as well.
interaction: I'm available for guests with what ever they may need.  I live there myself and use the house as a home.  Which mean I will have people come over to hang out on the weekends.  I would say we have a family aspect here.  You are always able to participate or not.
house_rules: No eating in the bedroom. Clean up after yourself. 420 friendly. Parties are available upon approval of the host. Weekdays noise will be held to a minimum at 11 pm. Absolute quiet in vestibule so not to disturb other families. The house must be kept neat and food garbage free. Cigarette smoking in the back yard only.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I’m A New Yorker born and raised.  I’ve lived at the beach, in the mountains and the city.  Manhattan professional General Contractor for 20 years.  Im easy going and love to have a good time.  I hope you treat my rental as your home while you are here.  Expressing myself through martial arts and my lifestyle.  I follow a code of honor and integrity.  We will get along.

reviews.comments: AMAZING! Quite possibly the loveliest place we have ever stayed. Absolutely beautiful apartment. Thank you Jed!

Great, location, great apartment and an amazingly nice host! 
Jed was liberal, flexible and he even took us out to one of the local bars and introduced us to his awesome New Yorker friends! 
I highly recommend a stay in this classy Bushwick location :)
Love trude, Norway.

Jed was by far one the best Airbnb host I have ever stayed with.

He not only has an exceptional home, he is an exceptional host. Everything from location to the amenities was excellent. He also provided a great selection of selection of great entertainment for us to get into. From bars, live venues, markets, and restaurant. They were all good spots. The man knows his shit!! 

I would easily recommend staying here for any person that wants that Bushwick experience
Had an amazing stay! Apartment was clean and cozy! Jed is a great host! Absolutely enjoyed it:

This was such an amazing place. It's open and very cozy. The two bathrooms make it amazing to where you don't have to wait. The backyard is super cool, large with some patio furniture,
grate sun for the summer, I with it was warmer so I could have chilled out there more often. 

Jed is amazing. He's super chill and kind, great for asking any questions about the area. The train is like 2 blocks away at the most. Theres so many cute bars and coffee shops and even grocery stores if your staying for a while.

I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to come experience the cute area of Bushwick. I had a blast! I know you will to!
Jed is such an amazing host. Very clean and lively! He made us feel welcome and at home. His home is so comfortable and relaxing!! Thank you Jed!
We enjoyed the place very much, would come back there again when visiting NY. Thanks Jed!
For me, this selection was all about location. It was close to family and very convenient to the subway.
Jed's place is pleasant and in a really nice neighborhood! He was very friendly, and I had a great time at my stay.

All as described. Easy to meet, clean and great shower. One of my favorite parts of bk.

Recommend

Superb. What was provided went beyond what I had initially thought. Very accessible to Manhattan and Queens - additionally, the pictures here do not do it justice how excellent Jed's place is. Frankly, I left feeling invigorated and inspired. Jed has an affable demeanor that made us feel very welcomed, and I would easily without hesitation recommend this to anyone wanting to visit New York. Thank you Jed!
Jed place was just as we expected it to be. Everything was clean and in order. Anything you could need was super close, especially the metro. Would definitely stay here again.

Jed's home is a rare jewel! The decor of the apartment was absolutely phenomenal, I can't express that enough. Looks like a model home. The bed was very comfortable and the entire home was clean and refreshing. We left feeling rejuvenated and optimistic. The location is half a block from the train, very convenient. Jed was friendly and nice, but very strict. 
I would recommend his place to friends and other AirBnb users.

Bel appartement, propre et situé à proximité du métro qui vous emmène directement à Manhattan ! Nous avons beaucoup visité la ville et n'avons vu Jed qu'à notre arrivée mais il a été très accueillant et gentil.

Nice place ! Very clean, comfortable, and Jed was really nice.
I recommend it !!

Our stay at Jed's place was absolutely perfect. He is such a great host - very communicative and welcoming - and his place is a cosy home away from home. The house itself is absolutely beautiful and very well located, about 30 seconds walk from the subway station. We would absolutely recommend Jed's spot to everyone and hope to stay there again in future.

Jed's place is cool, clean, conveniently located and perfect for anyone looking to stay in Brooklyn. 

Jed is kind, a good communicator and a top notch host.

We stayed with Jed for 10 nights, it was absolutely perfect. He was friendly and welcoming from before we even arrived, and his apartment is immaculate. I felt like I was in a hotel! The bed is big and comfy and Jed provided us with towels and wardrobe space and access to all the amenities, which are all brand new. Jed even invited us to a BBQ in his big garden and we met some of his friends which was really fun!

We were right next to the metro stop so it was really easy to get around, and the neighbourhood of Bushwick is really cool. We had a great time exploring the street art, cafes and vintage boutiques. There are a couple of supermarkets and different food places really close to Jed's place, so it was easy to get some food to fuel up for the day. It's only 4 stops to get to downtown Manhattan and we took an unlimited rail pass so it was pretty cheap and easy to get to the centre of the city. 

We had a great time staying with Jed, we felt totally at home and it was a great base for our trip. 100% recommended! Thanks a lot Jed! :)

Jed was very professional and his place is great! Very well appointed room and bathroom (you can tell he's thought through this), all very clean. I didn't use the backyard (!) but could see myself having a great time back there if I had.

Jed's place is fantastic, its in a great neighborhood, close to trains, near great food and nightlife. Jed's also a really wonderful host - I felt completely at home and welcomed. The room and apartment are very comfortable. Next time I am in NYC, I will definitely be checking here first to see if it is available.

Jed has an amazing space and he is a really nice guy, too.  The apartment is very airy for New York (high ceilings and good room sizes) and there is even a small back yard.  Bedroom, bathroom(s), the floors, everything was very clean.  The bed was comfortable.  The art made me feel good too.

The location is good.  It is less than a block from the J/M trains and the B54 bus which we took for a short ride to Dough Brooklyn (look it up!).  A few really good bar/restaurants in the area.  The corner bodega has a good selection.

We have been to New York a dozen times with AirBnb and we highly recommend Jed.

Jed's place is awesome and so is he as a roommate  
I had total privacy but when I needed something Jed was there before I could even ask. Excellent host. House has everything you need and steps away from anything you'd need at the stores. Jed knows the definition of hospitality and excels at it. never really saw him that much but he responded to my texts instantly. When I did see him it was a pleasure to chat. Yes I would stay at Jed's again clean, modern appliances (w/d, nice kitchen, great wifi). I think I read a review about Jed having strict rules? Haha I don't think you can say having to lock the door when you leave is being strict. More like have the run of the house but be respectful for the safety of the house. Isn't that the way it should be? Ok so the bad... the tacos he made for me could of had more spice..haha thanks Jed sorry I love the heat

My stay at Jed's for a few weeks went very well. The place was clean, quiet and had everything that I needed. The neighborhood is safe though not exactly the fanciest area of Brooklyn. The main street is less than a block away with an overhead subway gives you an older NY gritty feel, but it's very convenient for shopping and quick subways into Manhattan.  The apartment was comfortable and had a door to a back area where you could sit outside. I made myself at home, and Jed was a pleasure.

We zijn hier een week verbleven. Voor ons verblijf in New York was het perfect: schoon en mooi afgewerkt, dicht bij de metro naar Manhattan en een paar leuke restaurantjes in de buurt. Omdat we veel in de stad waren hebben we Jed niet veel gezien, hij en zijn vriendin Cecilia waren aardig wanneer we ze spraken en hebben alles goed geregeld.
L'appartement est propre et bien situé. Il permet de visiter Brooklyn et notamment Buschwick à pied et d'accéder à Manhattan très rapidement en métro. Nos hôtes ont été agréables.

kind of amazing to be able to stay in what really feels like a home in new york. a yard, big bathroom, generous kitchen [with great appliances] ... and all this with a chill, helpful host. plus... right by the subway to get everywhere. sweet spot for a sweet price.

I would recommend his place to anyone. Jed invited us to stay for dinner the first evening and introduced us to his friend. Plus, He gave us many advices ! 
The flat is very nice, and there is a yard ! Many shops to buy food next to the flat and metro very close.
Jed is very friendly and accommodating. The place is conveniently close to a subway station, and very clean. I would definitely come back!

Jed's place is awesome for young people wanting to explore Brooklyn and NYC in general, the subway station is right around the corner. The place is very convenient, the bed is comfortable and there are two bathrooms. Jed was very welcoming and easy going about everything! However, if you've never been to New York, the neighborhood can be seen as kinda sketchy. For us it was not a problem at all and we didn't have any trouble

Great place in a great location with a great host! This place is a little gem hidden 100m from the subway in the heart of Bushwick. Clean, spacious, quiet (rare in NYC) and on top of that with a cool backyard in which to chill. Best of all Jed was extremely helpful and accommodating when it came to checking in and out. Thx so much. Highly recommended and looking forward to a return.

Jed is a gracious host and the apartment is as it appears in the photos. Clean, with comfy bed, and nice kitchen. The neighborhood is not gentrified so you have an inner city, somewhat rough commercial strip near the subway. It felt unsafe at first (quite a few people suffering from addictions) but we had no problems at all. Fairly quick subway ride into lower Manhattan. Some loud banging, clanging neighborhood noises in the morning on two occasions. Jed was very hospitable and kind enough to stay up late for us as our flight into NYC was delayed. Super-nice chap!
really nice place, conveniently located close to a Metro line and shops and restaurant on Brooklyn's Broadway. Cool hosts. Good vibes.

Right off of the JMZ Myrtle stop, walking distance to a few coffee shops & bars, a little further to bougie Bushwick, Jed's place was super clean and convenient. And communication with Jed was awesome. We already knew the area and stayed with him for a month while apartment-hunting. We ended up signing a lease right in the neighborhood. There's a garden out back for warmer months too.

Jed’s place is very spacious for NYC. The bathroom is large with a beautifully tiled shower. We had no issues with bathrooms, as he has a full bath as well as a half bath. The apartment is about 35 minutes from midtown, for those looking to travel to that area of town. The subway is easy to navigate - so no worries there. The bed is extremely comfortable and the closet in the designated bedroom is spacious. I would recommend Jed’s place to anyone who is looking for a nice, spacious place outside the city.

Jed was awesome from start to finish! He communicated right away and assisted us with our trip. He made check in super easy and was a friendly lad through and through. His home is super close to the subway, places to eat and a grocery store. What I likeed the most about his home was the art and the cleanliness....10 stars, the room, the house and the bathroom. Muy importante! Thanks for everything, Jed!
Jed's place is very stylish and chill. His apartment is in a hip neighborhood with lots to do. The man himself is a great host!
Jed was a gracious host with an awesome home in a great location in Brooklyn!

I definitely recommend Jed's home if you're looking for a great location and super welcoming host in NYC.  The area is so convenient and you are half a block away from the metro.  A good amount of grocery stores and bars/restaurants for you to check out too.  As they say, NYC is a city that doesn't sleep. Jed let me know he has friends over on weekends so be prepared as Jed will show you all the great local spots and you'll be able to also meet his friends!  A true Brooklyn home :)
Would stay here again! Jed is a great host and made our stay very convenient. His place is really clean and nice looking.
Great place with great local bars

Jed is killing it over here with this Air B n B. He rescued my partner and I from a Air B n B nightmare at the last minute and was so accommodating. The place is gorgeous, sparkling clean,  and well-decorated with thoughtful touches (the towels are huge and fluffy). He definitely isn't kidding when he forewarns his guests that on Friday and Saturday nights the party is popping off in the living room. We didn't mind at all and either slept right through it or joined in on the fun! Jed is a superhost for sure: fast response times, super friendly but gives privacy, and is happy to give you hot neighborhood tips. The location is spectacular, you could throw a rock and hit the JMZ. Perfect for tourists who want a taste of Brooklyn, but do want to go to Manhattan a lot to do touristy things. I would highly recommend staying at Jed's to any young person looking to have a good time and meet some cool people.

Jed's place is awesome! This is a gem to find and the best host I've had! I highly recommend staying here. He even cooked one night and it was amazing, his friends are good people, and the backyard was a great addition. You won't regret booking!

I booked Jed’s place last minute and Jed was super easy to communicate with and made everything a breeze. The house is spacious and very clean, the room has everything you need and the bed is comfy. There’s a big backyard you can chill in too. Jed was a great host, very friendly and instantly made me feel at home. I love the area, it is always lively and it is close to lots of good bars, good food, and the metro station is right there. Overall a winner :)
Very nice space and friendly host. Clean as a whistle

Jed is one of a kind!! We use airbnb for a while now and we have never met someone so nice and atemptive like him!

If you choose him, it’ll be great!! 

He helped us a lot since the first contact. Gave us the directions from the airport to his house and really were a great friend and room mate for the almost one month that we’ve been in New York.

We hope that someday we get back and stay with him again! 

Thanks for everything, Jed!!! You’re the best!!!!

☺️

Appreciate the easy going stay at Jed’s. No complaints! Would stay again for sure. Killer time!!! Cool back yard to chill out and hang out with the fireflies. Hop on the train in no time. Lots of good food and drinks around as well. You won’t regret staying at Jed’s, he’s the beezkneez!
Jed is very accommodating and nice.

This airbnb is the best we ever had, if you want to discover the Brooklyn life go there ! This place is very clean and very well decorated.
Mark is a super host, so friendly and available. We have such good time here we will never forget!
Jed was a super host. He was very accommodating. We would definitely stay with him again.

Não poderíamos escolher um lugar melhor para nos hospedar em NY. 
Jed foi muito atencioso e gentil.
Ademais, sua casa é muito confortável e adoramos o estilo dela.
A localização da casa é excelente, próxima de restaurantes e mercados, além de ser próxima a uma estação do metrô que facilita a locomoção para diversos lugares de NY.
Great apartment with washer dryer in unit. Super close to JMZ trains. Jed’s been a great host. Would definitely recommend him to future guests.

Jed is definitely a Super Host. Super hospitable, down to earth, and space was far better than what I expected. Bed is very comfy, the whole place feels like home. Loved relaxing in the backyard, and he supplied every amenity you could ever want. Bottom line: you will wish you lived here! I will definitely make excuses to travel to NYC just to stay here in the near future...best place & best host!

The stay in the house of Jed was disappointing, although the house is beautiful and is located a step away from the metro Myrtle Av and has all the amenities, the house only has a bathroom with shower, which contradicts the notice that shows a private bathroom . Additionally the last three nights were completely disastrous, the host arrived two days in a row at 4 am with a lot of people to continue the party until dawn, obviously the noise of the people talking and the music did not let us sleep, the last night It was not better either because he stayed until 2 in the morning walking, cooking and slaming doors, which also did not let us sleep. Even though he knew that we should wake up very early to take our flight back. Probably Jed is a nice guy as the other qualifications say, but he lacks consideration for the rest and comfort of his guests. I do not recommend it

Emplacement parfait pour visiter Manhattan. Appartement très beau avec parking gratuit dans la rue et les environs. Jed a été très accueillant et avait une grande attention pour notre confort.  Merci et si je reviens à NYC, c'est à cet appartement que je penserai en premier.

Jed's place is the perfect place to stay when visiting NYC. Right next to the subway and close to all the trendy locations. As for the home itself; it was beautifully decorated, had high ceilings and a cozy bed, and was so spotless I was able to walk around without socks on. I even had the pleasure to speaking with Jed who is extremely down to earth. He also respected our privacy throughout the entire stay. Highly recommended!
Expect great communication and cleanliness. A nice spot in the Bushwhck area. Just make sure that's where you want be. Can be a bit loud at night but nothing too bad.

Jed être très accueillant. Son appartement est très confortable avec un petit extérieur très sympa. Il est idéalement situé dans Brooklyn, 3 min à pied du métro. Jed est très arrangeant. Nous recommandons vivement.
Jed’s house was amazing. cool art everywhere, super close to tons of fun stuff and good food and the subway, and it was stocked with all the necessities that we needed. Such a good time! Thanks Jed!

An exceptional host and an amazing place! 2min walk of the subway (line M and J) that takes you to Manhattan in less than 15min. I had never seen such a clean and beautiful apartment. Jed is also very nice and reactive guy. I highly recommend and probably go back there when possible!!!

After trying a few places around Manhattan and Brooklyn, we decided to come back to Jed's place and to stay there for the last 2 months of our trip. Jed is one of the best hosts I met on Airbnb. If you plan to visit NYC or to stay there for a much longer time, I really recommend you his place. The apartment is great, the neighborhood is great and the subway is at 3 minutes walk (then 10/15 minutes to Manhattan).

Jed’s place is comfortable and fun. He is a gracious, thoughtful, and kind host that really goes the extra mile to make sure that his guests have everything they need. We had a great time and thanks to Jed we got to see parts of the city that we wouldn’t have found on our own. It felt more like staying at a friend’s house than an AirBNB.

Jed's place is super convenient to the J,M and Z lines. Easy walk to grab coffee and food and we lucked out on street parking across the street (look for signs for street cleaning days). Inside the place is spacious, clean and stylish. Fresh linen, towels, soap and bathroom amenities for days :) This spot is more than just a place to lay your head. Thanks Jed!

name: Light Drenched and Private Cabin
summary: Our cabin is spacious and light drenched. It offers a queen size bed, built in, small kitchenette (w/ bar fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster), bathroom, study area, air con, internet and a smart tv (w/netflix).  It has bamboo floors, a timber deck, fly screens and a lovely little garden. There is easy access down a shared driveway to come and go as you please.  We have 2 young children and 2 cats. The cats are not allowed in cabin.
space: A new building, with an abundance of natural light, which maintains the character of the main 1920's house. The cabin looks out on to garden with flowering plants including a magnolia, camellia and star jasmine.  There is also a little herb garden that our two year old son likes to tend to (i.e., pull off unripe fruit/veggies and do a runner!).   Also, has all mod cons including internet TV, netflix and air conditioning.
description: Our cabin is spacious and light drenched. It offers a queen size bed, built in, small kitchenette (w/ bar fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster), bathroom, study area, air con, internet and a smart tv (w/netflix).  It has bamboo floors, a timber deck, fly screens and a lovely little garden. There is easy access down a shared driveway to come and go as you please.  We have 2 young children and 2 cats. The cats are not allowed in cabin. A new building, with an abundance of natural light, which maintains the character of the main 1920's house. The cabin looks out on to garden with flowering plants including a magnolia, camellia and star jasmine.  There is also a little herb garden that our two year old son likes to tend to (i.e., pull off unripe fruit/veggies and do a runner!).   Also, has all mod cons including internet TV, netflix and air conditioning. The cabin is accessed via a shared driveway with an electric gate.  You will have your own gate key to come and go as you please.  Guests h
neighborhood_overview: Petersham is a great place to live.  It is littered with good cafes (some of the best are less than 500 meters and is known for it's Portuguese chicken and tarts (the best ones from Sweet Belem.)   There are several good pubs / bars in the area within walking distance including the Oxford Hotel, the West Village and the Public House.   A few minutes walk away on the main road is Archella Fresh (run by Frank and his wife Rebecca) who have great fresh produce and a wonderful range of fine foods.  There is also a range of parks in the neighbourhood.  The Cabin is also close to several of Petersham’s popular venues including Petersham town hall and the Petersham tafe.
notes: Being in the inner west of Sydney, there is air traffic noise but this stops at 10pm and doesn't occur before 6am.  We have two ragdoll cats which occasionally hang out in the backyard. We also have two small children, a boy aged 4 and a girl who is 2.5 going on 13.
transit: The Cabin is close to several modes of public transport allowing guests to easily access the city and other major destinations.   Petersham train station is a 5-7 minute walk away. It is 2 stations from Newtown and only 10 mins, or five stops, to the city.  Petersham station is also on the inner west train line that accesses the Olympic Park precinct and Homebush.  The light rail is a 10 - 15 minutes walk away in Lewisham and provides convenient access to Star City, Paddy's markets, China Town and the Fish Markets.  Buses to UTS and Sydney University depart 500 meters from the Cabin (the stop is conveniently located in front of the nearest coffee shop!).    The airport is 20 - 30 mins from Petersham by taxi or uber, or you can catch the train with one change at Central Station.
access: The cabin is accessed via a shared driveway with an electric gate.  You will have your own gate key to come and go as you please.  Guests have access to a small timber deck where they can have breakfast and read the morning paper.  Guests are also welcome to use the shared backyard.
interaction: We are in and out throughout the day so will be available and happy to help if you have any questions at all
house_rules: Just to treat the cabin as if it was your own. We have 2 small children therefore it is not a place to party. The cabin is strictly no smoking inside.

reviews.comments: it's really great place for staying in Sydney

What a gem!! Perfect accommodation for our weekend in Sydney. Cabin was spotlessly clean and Steven and his little family made us feel very welcome. Location perfect, within walking distance from great cafes and the train station.

Steven was a great host! Communication with him was very easy and friendly. Check in and check out was simple and the place was easy to find. The cabin itself is located behind property and was really cosy and very clean. It is obvious they put in a lot of effort to build such a beautiful cabin. Travelling around was easy as there are lots of cafes/stores in the area and a train station within walking distance. Cannot wait to stay here again!
Comfortable and clean cabin - convenient location for my weekend in the area.
A great little home, has everything you need for a short stay. Steve was very polite and hospitable. Would highly recommend!

The airBNB place was a great find. It was really clean, comfortable, quiet & very convenient for the training location (Addison Street Community Centre). Steve, the host, knew the local area well and recommended a number of shops/cafes in the area.

Steven's place is a lovely quiet cabin for any kind of traveller. It was incredibly clean, well quipped and so comfortable. The whole process was so easy and our stay was wonderful. Steven was very helpful and I would recommend his cabin to everyone.

This was the perfect place to stay for us. It was close to public transport for business purposes and close to shops, restaurants, and parks for our little one.
Steven and his family were extremely welcoming and helpful.
The cabin was beautiful. Clean and light. The air con was a bonus as it was quite warm in Sydney at the time of our stay. They provided a porta cot for our baby which was an added bonus.
It was very quiet and peaceful. 
Steven and his family kept to themselves, but were lovely to talk to on the odd occasion we bumped into them on the way out the door.
We would highly recommend this place to stay. Thanks for having us guys

I couldn't recommend staying at this cabin enough.  It was beautiful and clean.  It's close to public transport and places to eat, but most importantly, the hosts, Steven and Peta were friendly and helpful.  Communication prior to arriving was clear and accurate.  They ensured our stay was comfortable, but also went out of their way with little extras things such as turning the aircon on before we arrived so our cabin was cool when Sydney was in the midst of a heat wave.  
Great hosts, and a great place.
Ideal cabin for our stay, minutes to trains, grocery and laundry. Lovely hosts

If I could rate this property six stars I would! Steven is obviously very proud of his property - the cabin is perfectly presented, immaculate, modern, practical and quiet. Restaurants, cafes and public transport are very close by. Hoping to make this my regular stay in Sydney.

Great accommodation and lovely hosts. Beautifully appointed and immaculately finished, this cabin was in the perfect location for our holiday. Easy walking distance to transport, shops, pubs, restaurants and our Australian family. Thanks so much, Moira and Graeme.
We had an absolutely delightful stay; so much better than staying in a hotel or B &B. Highly recommended.

This is a great private space. The room is all you need for a short time away.  The bathroom is lovely with a great rain shower head.  There is wardrobe and small fridge and microwave. Is place is short walk to the train station which is only a few stops away from central or the bay. There are also lots of pubs and cafes in walking distance.

Pack ear plugs if you are a light sleeper because there are planes in this area and maybe a eye mask of you don't want wake us to the sun. 

Totally I will stay again they next time I am in Sydney.
A great little cabin. Very convenient to shops and train, and hosts are very welcoming.

Me and my mum stayed in the cabin for a few days and we absolutely loved it. It's close to the train station and the train only takes ten minutes to the city center. The cabin was very clean and beautiful. Steven and Peta were nice and helpful hosts with two lovely children. 

Thank you Steven, Peta, Max and Zara, we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend this cabin to everyone who visits Sydney for a few days and wants to stay close to the center. 

Best regards,
Maja and Katja
We were delighted with the property. It is very clean and private  and has all the amenities one would desire. Communications from Steven was excellent. We would happily return.

Steven and his family offered a perfect personable getaway in a great location close to Sydney. We loved this little cabin and would definitely stay again, also Steven and his family were extremely friendly and helpful.
Clean, modern studio, with some little extras that make a difference. Convenient location to public transport.
This is a great place, very new and clean, easy street parking and level easy walk to restaurants ect. I have not stayed in this location before but thought it was great.
Great location and easy check in, host is near by if needed, private access, would stay again when in Sydney.

Great location, close to the station. Very cosy, clean and has everything you need. We loved our stay and will be back. Netflix's and wifi was a bonus, so was the shampoo/conditioner and soap. So many awesome cafes for breaky and also dinner places. We loved the Indian and the famous Portuguese chicken. The room was very bright in the morning, and the planes were loud but that didn't bother us at all.  Highly recommend this gorgeous cabin.

Great place, great location. Perfect for a weekend in Sydney and a bonus with easy on street parking. Short walk to cafes and restaurants. Host was lovely and great communication. Will definitely book again.
As good as it looks.
This cabin was beautiful and exactly as described. We found the hosts welcoming and the neighbourhood perfect for visiting family living in the inner north.
Lovely cabin in a great location. Very clean and private.

This beautiful cabin is perfectly located, within walking distance to shops & restaurants. I loved the overall design, far superior to the local hotel. All my needs were met with a lovely space to relax after my work.
Great place to stay in Sydney. Clean, comfortable, great location and friendly and prompt help from Steven.
Really lovely friendly guy. Great lil place to stay.
Steven has 2 lovely cats. :)

Steven has made a great little cabin with a lot of care and extra expense to give it valuable finishing touches.  It is great value and Steven was kind, helpful and easy to deal with.  

For those unfamiliar with the area it might help to know the aircraft noise is enough to wake you up (from 6am) and takes some getting used to, the proximity to family and neighbour activities also means quietude may be elusive. It's a medium density neighborhood where backyard and rear-of-house activities spill into several properties.  There is also no possibility of excluding the morning light with the un-blinded high window. 

Overall, this listing has a lot to offer,  especially if you're not planning a sleep-in.
Steven was extremely helpful and communicative. The space was lovely, with everything you could want for a short stay. Fantastic location and easy to come and go as you pleased.

Steven's cottage is divine, beautiful fittings throughout the cottage with a beautiful cosy feel, the cottage has it own private entrance and space. Steven and his wife are very friendly approachable people. Highly recommend staying here for a lovely stress free stay.

Very nice cottage out the back of a quiet street location in an otherwise busy neighbourhood, very easy to get to local cafes and restaurants and nestled right between Stanmore and Petersham train stations for easy public transport access, great value! :)
Steven is a very nice guy. The house is clean and comfortable, and near Petersham Station.

Such a lovely space that felt very cosy and private. Location is amazing as there are a couple cafes to choose from and a train station 5 min walk away. Steven and his family are beautiful and were very easy to get along with. They keep everything in perfect condition.
Very cute tiny home! Close to train station and great little neighbourhood with great portugese chicken and thai food!

Steven's place it utterly gorgeous. It is fantastic for a stay in Sydney and in a beautiful suburb close to lovely eateries. Steven and his family are friendly and helpful and we will definitely be returning!

Wir haben, zusammen mit unserer vierjährigen Tochter, 4 angenehme Nächte in Peta und Steven's Gartenhütte verbracht. Obschon der von Steven erwähnte Fluglärm gewöhnungsbedürftig war, haben wir uns gut erholt. Von Petersham aus konnten wir Sydney wunderbar erkunden. Peta und Steven waren tolle Gastgeber und waren jederzeit für uns erreichbar. Und das, obwohl sie beruflich und mit zwei kleinen Kindern gerade viel zu tun haben. Wir haben uns willkommen gefühlt und hatten dennoch ein angenehmes Maß an Privatsphäre. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen.

My little boy(14mths) and I  had a long stay in Steven's cabin, for almost three weeks while my partner was in hospital recovering from surgery.
We found Steven and Peta to be very kind and generous hosts during this stressful period, of which we will always be very grateful.
