The lawn and garden in front of the cabin are perfect for little kids, and there were  playgrounds within walking distance. Numerous good and affordable restaurants and cafes very close by(5 mins walk/pram ride) and I was always able to find street parking. Highly recommend and we'll be back when next in Sydney.

Great location (close to shops & public transport), super comfy with air-con, smart TV and a kitchen. Steven is super friendly & easy to get hold of via Airbnb/on the phone. Would definitely come back!
Steven’s place is lovely - a really well designed space with great facilities in a good location.

I loved my time at Steven's place. Close to everything, neat, clean with little touches of luxury (can't compete with a waterfall shower head) - this is the AirBnB pick for you if you're searching for a slice of home in the big city. Steven is extremely welcoming and friendly, and if you're not familiar with the area, he'll soon fill your head with all sorts of inside tips and places to eat. Don't miss out on this Petersham paradise.

What I loved: 
*The freedom to come and go as I pleased with ease via the side gate.
*The bed was super comfortable. 
The villa is an ideal space for writers, professionals or anyone looking to get away on their own. Works for couples too. 
*The proximity to some of my old-school favourites, including Daisy's Milkbar.
Steven couple is a very friendly, beautiful and clean house, is highly recommended to everyone, I hope there is a chance to return here.
Great place to stay.  Fantastic location near transport and good coffee/Portuguese chicken places.
it was a wonderful private cabin. love the environment!

A great little place in a great location. Didn’t see the hosts much as was out exploring all day, but they were most helpful on check in and through email. The welcome from the cats was an added bonus. I would say that if the plane noise would really be an issue for you, this isn’t ideal, but thanks to the accurate description we went into this well aware of it and it wasn’t bothersome. 

Overall, a great stay in a lovely cabin in a very convenient location.

Stevens cabin is spotlessly clean, feels very secure and safe as it can only be approached through electric gates. 
Train station is 5 mins away. And there are good restaurants just round the corner
A lovely clean and comfortable cabin in a safe and convenient location.

We had a really lovely weekend stay in Steven's delightful cabin in Petersham and we enjoyed all the sites and sounds of the wondrful Sydney suburb. We hope to stay again next time we visit! Thank you Steven.
Tops! Stayed at Stevens with 2 y/o daughter and it was super convenient clean and comfy. Steven was friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!!
Very clean. Comfortable lounge. Great bed. Soaking shower. Nice little desk looking out the window.

Lovely, airy, clean, modern and comfortable space. Steven and Peta were great hosts, very responsive when we had questions and extremely pleasant to chat with.  They gave great tips on the neighborhood cafes and restaurants and there are several nearby that were our favorites. Highly recommended!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Steven's place. It was clean, airy and sunny with beautiful decor and a very comfortable bed. Our hosts were delightful. Two things to note, parking can be a bit tricky (though we succeeded each time) and the street is under the flight path so you might have a 6.00 am wakeup call that makes you want to duck. We are used to Sydney flight traffic control so we will be going back for another stay.

Nice little place, very comfy bed and good shower.  Good job there's air con as it would be very hot without it! Short walk to Petersham station, the Oxford tavern, Nowa cafe which is excellent.  My only complaint would be the triangular window lets in quite a lot of light in the morning and it woke me up! Other than that it's a nice little place.
Steven’s little cottage is a total gem! I’ve stayed in many Airbnbs but this is possibly the best. Clean, stylish, well equipped, great linen, brilliant location, secure. I’ll be back for sure.

Steven is an excellent host, very friendly and supportive. Location is very clean, full of light, simple and nicely equipped, for both, work and relaxation. Unless bothered by some transient airplanes flying over Petersham, which you can get used easily, then the place is also very quiet.

Faultless! This peaceful bungalow is exceptional value with everything you'd need during a busy visit to Sydney. It's in such a great location, too. Steven and Peta were easy to communicate with. Thanks for having us!
We really enjoyed our stay in the cabin in lovely Petersham.

Very private location and walking distance to train.  Few stops to the city.  Gorgeous cottage, two beautiful fluffy cats to meet you each morning and one huge goldfish in the pond on the front verandah.  So quiet and clean.  Will be returning.
Great place, lovely hosts and close to Petersham station.

The cabin is very comfortable, quiet, clean and beautifully furnished.  Location was perfect for us and we will definitely be staying again.  The communication with our host was prompt & friendly.  We appreciated having a TV also!

I stayed at Stevens place for a few days whilst in Sydney for business. It was lovely and clean, stylish with homely touches. It’s in great location, only a 5 minute walk to the train station and shopping strip. Steven is very friendly and I highly recommend  his place to anyone visiting the area

We really enjoyed staying in Steven and Peta's back garden cabin. Beautifully clean, light and had all the essentials. We came with our two young children, and our hosts gave us various options (we settled on a queen sized mattress on the floor for both of them). It was perfectly adequate for four, and for one or two people it would be positively spacious.  Petersham is just a short metro ride from the centre of Sydney, and the cabin is just round the corner from a lovely parade of shops and restaurants, so you will never be stuck for something to eat or drink.
We keep returning to this Airbnb as it offers every comfort we may need and is in a very convenient location.  It has all the amenities you require and is in a quiet and safe area.

Our stay at Steven and Peta's place was perfect.  We loved the area for its great cafes and Portugese flavour, its proximity to the train line and central Sydney, historic and beautiful buildings etc.  The unit is quaint and very comfortable, nice and clean.  Beautiful towels too, and very charming hosts.
We really enjoyed our stay at Steven and Peta's place.  A very well equipped cabin with a very comfy bed.  It's located in a quiet side street but in walking distance to buses and trainline.
Steven's place was excellent - exactly as described, great location, close to public transit, clean, and just wonderful. Would definitely stay there again!

Steven and Peta’s AirBnB is a gorgeous example of inner city life in Sydney. The area is full of great restaurants and cafes, shady tree-lined streets, and friendly locals. The cabin itself is a cosy, immaculately clean, comfortable and thoughtfully appointed. We also had the pleasure of meeting Steven. A truly great stay - would recommend without hesitation.
Stevens cabin is stunning and filled with light so you will have a cheerful relaxing experience. Definitely recommend it!

This is a wonderful space very well
Appointed easy access comfy bed and great shower and private 
Clean and tidy
Steven is a very amicable host 
There is cool vegan  cafe Nowa in walking distance from Steven and Petas place
Highly recommended

We have stayed several times at this Airbnb and will continue to in the future.  It is modern, comfortable, quiet, private and is in the perfect location for us.  Steven always answers us promptly and helps with anything we might need.  We have free parking on the street.  We were also delighted to be able to use Netflix.

Steven and his family were so accommodating and made us feel so welcome. We had an amazing stay in their cabin! Everything about the place was perfect, from the location, the space, the view, and all the amenities included. It was overall a very laid back and relaxing experience. Highly recommend, and hope to be back again one day soon!
This is the third time I have stayed in Steven's cabin. It is very comfortable and in a convenient location.

The cabin was lovely & clean, well set out and yes - light drenched. Location was ideal - there was no problem with parking and we found some lovely cafes down the road. Check-in and out was easy & we thoroughly enjoyed our 2 night stay.

Lovely, thoughtful hosts who went out of their way to help us with recommendations for our child-related queries. They even left us a bottle of bubbly to see us into the new year. Very kind indeed. A gorgeous, well-designed cottage  that makes you feel like you're in the countryside despite being close to the city.

Steven & Peta have a very comfortable, private, secure and modern unit at the back of their property.  We have enjoyed many visits over the past years.  They are friendly hosts who respond to any requests immediately.  The location is perfect - walking distance to Petersham train station, bus stops and the town centre including restaurants and shops.  It is quiet, has a TV, reverse cycle aircon, a lounge, iron and a kitchenette - everything you need for a comfortable stay.  We wouldn't hesitate to recommend their place.
Great value, very clean, nice and quiet, friendly host, private entrance, and it has everything you need for a few nights in Sydney.
I really enjoyed my stay at Stevens place. I'll be back again soon. Thanks again.
A beautiful studio to stay in, the place was super clean and had everything we needed. Steven was quick to respond to messages and the checkin process was very easy. Would absolutely stay here again!

name: Modern, Quiet Semi stroll to Manly Beach
summary: Our home is just a short walk away from all that Manly has to offer including the beach, shops, restaurants and Manly Ferry. We have a 2 bedroom semi which is ideal for families, with a cot and plenty of private space to play and relax. There is a spacious deck outside with a BBQ area and a green lawn for the kids to run around and play.
space: Guests are able to use the whole property including the spacious outdoor deck, BBQ area and outdoor garden.
description: Our home is just a short walk away from all that Manly has to offer including the beach, shops, restaurants and Manly Ferry. We have a 2 bedroom semi which is ideal for families, with a cot and plenty of private space to play and relax. There is a spacious deck outside with a BBQ area and a green lawn for the kids to run around and play. Guests are able to use the whole property including the spacious outdoor deck, BBQ area and outdoor garden. Our place is close to Manly Beach, shops, restaurants, cafes, bars and parks. It is very quiet and spacious. Our house is only a short walk to the beach, restaurants and shops of Manly. Parking on the street is very easy and a parking pass is included in your stay. The Hop, Skip and Jump stops at the end of the street which is a free shuttle bus that takes you directly to the Corso and ferry. The ferry can take you into the city, eastern suburbs or Taronga Zoo.
neighborhood_overview: Our place is close to Manly Beach, shops, restaurants, cafes, bars and parks. It is very quiet and spacious.
transit: Our house is only a short walk to the beach, restaurants and shops of Manly. Parking on the street is very easy and a parking pass is included in your stay. The Hop, Skip and Jump stops at the end of the street which is a free shuttle bus that takes you directly to the Corso and ferry. The ferry can take you into the city, eastern suburbs or Taronga Zoo.
house_rules: - Strict no party policy and NO SMOKING.

reviews.comments: great place that is clean and quiet. owners were very helpful and I would recommend this property to anyone.

Great, very kid friendly (lots of toys and space to play), lovely decorated home! It’s not super close to the beach, especially with a stroller it’s a bit of a hike up the hill, but not too bad. Kids absolutely loved it and didn’t want to leave!
Really nice oasis in Manly with all the necessary amenities. Lauren was lightning fast in replying to any questions. Can highly recommend and when we are back we will try to stay here again!
Amzing house and really easy to communicate with host! Definitely recommend this place to stay in Manly!

name: Appart. Zen au coeur de Montréal
summary: Longs séjours uniquement
space: Appartement de 2 chambres entièrement rénové en 2013. Agréable terrasse donnant sur la ruelle. Air climatisé. De nombreux commerces, restaurants et bars à proximité. Localisation idéale pour parcourir Montréal à pied ou en transports en commun.
description: Longs séjours uniquement Appartement de 2 chambres entièrement rénové en 2013. Agréable terrasse donnant sur la ruelle. Air climatisé. De nombreux commerces, restaurants et bars à proximité. Localisation idéale pour parcourir Montréal à pied ou en transports en commun. Proche de la gare routière (bus interurbains et navette aéroport) A 5 minutes de marche du métro Berri-Uqam Stationnement dans la rue Rue résidentielle tranquille dans un quartier animé et idéalement localisé. A proximité (5 à 10 minutes à pied) - Métro Ligne Orange - Station Berri-Uqam - Métro Ligne Verte - Station Berri-Uqam ou Beaudry - Bus Ligne 125 - Arrêt sur rue Ontario - Bus Ligne 14 - Arrêt sur rue Amherst - Bus Ligne 24 - Arrêt sur rue Sherbrooke - Bus 747 (Navette aéroport) - Gare routière, rue de Berri
neighborhood_overview: Rue résidentielle tranquille dans un quartier animé et idéalement localisé.
transit: A proximité (5 à 10 minutes à pied) - Métro Ligne Orange - Station Berri-Uqam - Métro Ligne Verte - Station Berri-Uqam ou Beaudry - Bus Ligne 125 - Arrêt sur rue Ontario - Bus Ligne 14 - Arrêt sur rue Amherst - Bus Ligne 24 - Arrêt sur rue Sherbrooke - Bus 747 (Navette aéroport) - Gare routière, rue de Berri
access: Proche de la gare routière (bus interurbains et navette aéroport) A 5 minutes de marche du métro Berri-Uqam Stationnement dans la rue
house_rules: Le logement est non-fumeur. Il est toutefois possible de fumer à l'extérieur sur la terrasse. Merci de respecter le voisinage et de limiter les nuisances sonores avant 7h00 et après 22h00.

host.host_about: Voyages, design, art de vivre, convivialité

reviews.comments:
Super séjour chez Barbara , appartement charmant parfaitement équipé et très bien situé 
Notre pied a terre à Montréal !!
The reservation was canceled 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
You deserve nothing less than the highest rating. Great location, very nice host. Barbara made sure our stay was fantastic.

Appartement très confortable avec 2 vraies chambres et de grands placards. Très bien équipé avec en particulier lave linge et sèche linge. La décoration moderne est très sympa.
L'appartement est situé dans une rue calme à proximité immédiate de la station de métro Berri, nœud du réseau de métro de Montréal, de la gare des bus où arrive le bus de l'aéroport, de commerces et de restaurants.
Aucun problème dans l'appartement.
Une excellente adresse.
Appartement très bien situé; agréable à vivre; propriétaire très sympathique et pleine de bons conseils... ++++

Beautifull apartment that is just renovated. It's a peaceful environment to live in near the metro station Berri Uqam. Perfect place to stay when you are visiting Montreal. The owner of the apartment is very nice.

Après 7h de vol, le temps de récupérer les bagages, prendre la voiture de location nous avons été accueilli par Barbara. 
Appart très sympa, très bien équipe, quartier dynamique et facilement accessible.
Une place pour garer sa voiture, enfin bon.... Rien à redire... Seulement parfait.
Nous nous sommes senti comme chez nous!

This apartment was perfect for our vacation in Montreal. Minutes away from food and entertainment. We were able to walk everywhere from here. The apartment was flawless, exactly what the pictures show. Barbara was an excellent host. She left all the information we needed on the table and was available to help us by phone and email when we had questions. I would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting the area!

L appartement de Barbara est juste parfait ! L emplacement est idéal à qq pas de sainte catherine et du Parc Lafontaine. Il est très bien équipé, la déco est géniale, très propre et moderne. Barbara est une hôtesse très agréable ! Nous sommes ravies et nous reviendrons sans doute !

Mes parents on beaucoup aimé l'appartement. Il est vrm comme dans les photos.... proche de metros, épicerie, pharmacie, plein de restos... super confortable et agréable! Barbara est aussi super! Merci pour tout Barbara! Et à la prochaine!

Beau séjour de quatre mois dans l'appartement. Il est idéalement bien situé et entouré de gentils voisins. Un petit bémol pour la cuisine sombre et sans fenêtre, surtout que j'aime passer du temps en cuisine. Sinon, je fus agrément surprise de voir deux balcons, même si le deuxième est petit, on y a passer du temps. Le salon est lumineux et la douche est parfaite ! Encore merci à Barbara :)
Our stay in barbara's app was excellent. i would really recommend this place. It is close to every tourist attraction in montreal. Just a perfect get a way place to dicover montreal.

This place is very clean, nicely equipped, and well located and seems nicer than the photos! The directions for access were very clear. I would definitely recommend this accommodation for anyone visiting Montreal.

Très bel appartement, meublé avec goût, très fonctionnel et bien situé au centre du village. Accès metro à 5 min.
Barbara a été très gentille avec nous et très réactive à nos questions et en ça a contribué à la qualité de notre séjour. Nous recommandons vivement cette location.

Appartement très propre, fonctionnel, et très bien situé ! 
Juste un petit manque pour la télé ou il n'y a pas de câble.

Nous vous recommandons vivement ce très chouette appartement!nous y avons passé dix jours et tout était parfait. Situé à proximité de métros,proche de la gare des bus, spacieux,très propre et tout équipé! Les conseils de notre hôte sur les activités et restaurants étaient également super! Un endroit idéal pour votre séjour à deux ou à quatre!
L'appartement est super, bien situé, bien équipé. Communication très simple et très facile avec Barbara.

L'appartement est très agréable, il est parfaitement équipé, bien distribué et situé dans un quartier agréable, bien achalandé et central.
Barbara l'a aménagé de façon à ce que l'on se sente "chez soi" et c'est très plaisant. Par ailleurs, c'est un appartement très calme, c'est appréciable en Centre Ville.
Nous le recommandons pour un séjour, court ou long, pour 4 personnes.
Elle reste très disponible pour les éventuels renseignements et dépannages.

Tout s'est très bien passé. L'appartement est parfaitement situé, dans un quartier plutôt calme, et à distance de marche du centre et de toutes les commodités. 
Merci !

L'appartement est vraiment très bien, à tout point de vue! Emplacement idéal très central, on peut faire plein de choses à pied, et à 5mn du métro. Et dans une rue très calme, c'est bien appréciable! Très bien équipé en cuisine, ainsi que pour la literie et le linge de maison, les petits accessoires! Nous avons appréciè la clim quand il fait chaud! Chambres de belle dimension.
Superbe la grande terrasse à l'arrière!
Merci Barbara!

Grande facilité pour récupérer les clefs, accueil très chaleureux de Barbara en personne. Appartement situé à quelques minutes à pieds de la rue Sainte Catherine mais dans une rue calme. Superbe cuisine avec beaucoup de produits d'entretien et de nourriture. Très belle salle de bain avec beaucoup de produits de toilette. Literie de bonne qualité. Barbara a gentiment accepté que nous soyons 5 les 2 derniers jours de notre séjour. Nous avons passé une semaine formidable en famille. Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Barbara. L'appartement est idéalement situé, à 5 min à pied du Métro Berri, qui permet de prendre l'ensemble des lignes de Montréal. Il est situé dans une petite rue très peu passante. Barbara est facilement disponible pour nous indiquer les bonnes adresses du secteur. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement.

Appartement très agréable, bien placé. Pour une première expérience, cela nous a plu.
Super quartier avec beaucoup d'animations et des gens très sympathiques.

Le logement parfaitement décrit, très convenable et confortable dans un quartier très vivant et bien placé.
Cuisine très bien équipée avec du bon matériel.
Lits très confortables.
Jolie terrasse dont nous avons profité vu la clémence du temps.
Deuxième fois que j'ai la chance de pouvoir loger dans cet appartement, super bien équipé et très agréable; et qui plus est pas mal situé du tout à deux pas du village et de l'Uqàm...

We stayed at Barbara's apartment for nearly 2 months. It's was everything we could have needed and more. Really clean, comfortable, well-equipped and Barbara was always on hand if we needed anything. We had a great time staying here and would recommend it to anybody.
Logement hyper bien équipé, fonctionnel, très bien situé adapté à une famille (un couple et deux enfants)

Barbara's place was fantastic. Great value for sure. The place is quite big, and has everything one could need, including two beds! The neighbourhood is quiet, and close to interesting shops, groceries, and public transit. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Barbara's listing to others who are interested.

Barbara is a super Host, she had plenty of nice tips about the city. Her appartment was great, with a fantastic terrasse for evening drinks ;) we were with a little baby and Barbara even provided a high chair for us. Highly recommended!

Die Unterkunft hat eine super Lage, man ist innerhalb von wenigen Minuten bei jeder Metro Linie. Barbara ist super freundlich und hat uns jede Möglichkeit der Anreise gegeben, weil sie den Schlüssel für uns deponiert hatte. Die Wohnung ist toll eingerichtet und verfügt sogar über einen eigenen Parkplatz. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt, würden jederzeit wiederkommen und die Wohnung ohne Einschränkungen weiter empfehlen! Danke Barbara!
Super appart, super hôte, super communication, tout est simple avec Barbara! Merci!

Appartement génial. 
Il a tout ce qu’il faut. 
Je le conseil vraiment, il est moderne avec 2 belle chambre. Cuisine tout équipée et la salle de bain énorme.
Il est proche des transports en commun à 5min à pied et surtout proche du centre.
Très très bon séjour.

Barbara’s place was the perfect place to stay. Convenient and clean and felt like home! Barbara was always super helpful and quick to reply. I stayed here for five months and loved everything about it, especially the location. Walking distance from everywhere and steps from the subway.  Would recommend anybody to stay at Barbara’s anytime! Thank you for making me feel at home in Montreal.

La situation de l'appartement est exceptionnelle. Il offre toutes les commodités nécessaires à un long séjour. Nous avons aussi bien profité de la terrasse à toute heure de la journée. Ce fut un plaisir d'être reçu par Barbara. Merci encore
L'appartement est très agréable, bien équipé et bien situé. Nous avons apprécié la gentillesse de Barbara. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir.

name: Bright and quiet room with private bathroom
summary: My place is in the most charming location in NYC, next to trendy coffee-shops, restaurants, boutiques, galleries and bars. Subway is only 1 block away. Room has a private bathroom, oversized windows, it’s spacious and quiet. Great living space with dining and relaxing area, elevator, dishwasher, washer, dryer in the building and beautifully set up common rooftop with the view of the city. Perfect for couples or singles, I’ll give plenty of tips what to do, where to eat or drink in the area.
space: Feel free to use dining and living area, rooftop, washer dryer in the building. Elevator building, so don’t worry about carrying your heavy suitcases up the stairs. Fast wifi.
description: My place is in the most charming location in NYC, next to trendy coffee-shops, restaurants, boutiques, galleries and bars. Subway is only 1 block away. Room has a private bathroom, oversized windows, it’s spacious and quiet. Great living space with dining and relaxing area, elevator, dishwasher, washer, dryer in the building and beautifully set up common rooftop with the view of the city. Perfect for couples or singles, I’ll give plenty of tips what to do, where to eat or drink in the area. Feel free to use dining and living area, rooftop, washer dryer in the building. Elevator building, so don’t worry about carrying your heavy suitcases up the stairs. Fast wifi. Living and dining space, kitchen, washer dryer in the building, rooftop. Free coffee and tea available anytime. I'm not at home much, but will give the best tips about the area and getting around. Lower East Side is full of best coffee-shops, restaurants, galleries, boutiques and bars. Soho, Little Italy, Nolita, East Village
neighborhood_overview: Lower East Side is full of best coffee-shops, restaurants, galleries, boutiques and bars. Soho, Little Italy, Nolita, East Village and Chinatown is walking distance away. Very charming and safe area. Some of my favourite places around is Dudleys, Dimes, Kiki's, Metrograph, Bario Chino, An Choi, The Fat Radish, Forgetmenot and Bar Belly. Great coffeeshop across the street. Market every Saturday round the corner with vintage and new designer clothing and food vendors.
notes: Dimmers in the room, as well as room darkening blackout curtains. :) Little park nearby. Also gym and yoga studio.
transit: Subway is only 1 block away, City Bike station round the corner too.
access: Living and dining space, kitchen, washer dryer in the building, rooftop. Free coffee and tea available anytime.
interaction: I'm not at home much, but will give the best tips about the area and getting around.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Lithuanian in Nyc

reviews.comments: Beautiful and very comfortable place. Bright at day and very quiet at night. I was happy about the elevator and not having to carry my heavy suitcase up. I loved the neighbourhood and restaurants around. I went to check out the views on the rooftop too. Only met Nora very briefly, but she seemed very sweet.
great area full of awesome restaurants and cafes! very close to subway and so great with elevator access

This area is not to far from the subway and it is a very quiet neighborhood. Nora is absolutely amazing as well. She is so friendly and will make sure your trip is enjoyable as possible. 10/10 would recommend!

Her place is nice to stay when you travel NYC. I've been 2 different airbnb places in NYC, but her place was the best. Safe enterance, close to subway, warm and cozy room. I'll definately recommend her place if have any chance :)
Muy bueno el edificio y el departamento! Muy buena la ubicación respecto del metro...muy recomendable!

Very cozy, very close to the subway, and near a staggering amount of tasty restaurants. I stayed here for two weeks, and I really enjoyed it. Nora's place is in a great area of the city, and definitely worth looking into if you're wanting to stay in this area.
Beautiful apartment located in a cool area close to many restaurants and touristic places. Highly recommended!

convenient for explore downtown Manhattan, and the apartment has a elevator that make our life easier lol. However, the hair dryer that provided is a European plug- which we didn't have an adapter and there isn't any socket that fit, weird and inconvenient especially when girls have to dry their hair in winter.

Appartement très chaleureux chez Nora. Aucun regret. Il y a deux chambres, parfois Nora est là, parfois en voyage. Nous avons eu une autre chambre quelle celle en photo mais très chaleureuse aussi et nous avons pu rencontrer une super globe-trotteuse à l'occasion de notre voyage. L'appartement est très bien situé, calme et chaleureux. Le roof top est très agréable. Nous recommandons!

Very cozy apartment at Nora. No regrets. There are two rooms, sometimes Nora is there, sometimes traveling. We had a different room than the one in picture but very warm too. We met a super globe-trotting on the occasion of our trip. The apartment is in a great location, quiet and cozy. The roof top is very nice. We recommend!
The place is really clean and warm during the winter. We love how it is close to many tourist attractions that you can visit in NY. Great Chinese food and bars within walking distance.
We find the place nice, convenient and safe. Consider the value of money, I will recommend Nora's place.

Great apartment in a super good location. The lower east is the coolest in NYC (I think). The apartment is near bars, restaurants, brookleen and etc. 
Come!

Nora is an awesome host and her apartment is beautiful.
Great neighborhood, building , apartment and room. The guest bedroom was comfortable and quiet. The bathroom was spotless.

El departamento de Nora es el mejor, muy bien ubicado cerca de una estacion del metro, muy limpio y comodo su apartamento y sobretodo ella muy atenta con cualquier duda estaba al pendiente y siempre nos recomendo muy buenos lugares

This is definetely worth it. The appartment is really bright and really clean. The street is quiet. Everything You need is near by. And the views from the rooftop are amazing. Nora is calm and helpful person. Just perfect.
Pretty decent location.  Not great if you're looking for privacy.  Nora is a very lovely and helpful person, though.
the best location in town

It was our fist time using airbnb and hence my first comments. 
The location is good for exploring Manhattan and NYC, close to two different subway lines,  Some restaurants, bars, shops close by as well as Chinatown and little Italy with its restaurants.
The apartment is located on a small road, so no traffic noise a.s.o.
We stayed abt 10 days, and we have not seen Nora at all. However communication via email etc was good and prompt. The apartment consists of two rooms and a living room, both rooms are being rented out. Fotos show the larger room, ours was about 2/3 of the size for the same price and a bit small for two adults with two suitcases.
The appartment was clean, however a weekly cleaning of the bathroom would be nice, especially if the apartment is completely rented out. Some cutlery and more plates etc would be great as it is quite limited.
For people staying longer, a TV migth be useful, but you may also watch tv via wlan, which is available.
Overall we would come back.
Lovely apartment.  Nora was so easy to deal with - very accommodating.
Great location and a private room that's good if you don't plan to spend much time at the house.
Perfect location for stay some days close to mid-Manhattan and Brooklyn. Nora is a very nice hostess.
Tolle Lage, sehr kleines Zimmer.

Cozy, convenient, clean, and safe location nestled in the LES. Nora was extremely communicative and helped us with any requests! The apartment was clean and neat with functional AC which helped during our stay in the summer!

The location is an 8 minute walk to Grand central station, 20 mins to Brooklyn Bridge, and is in a convenient location if you want to be nestled near Little Italy, CHina Town, and all the other good eats in Eastern Manhattan. The only downside was that the elevator didn't work for 2 of the days we were there, but the flight of stairs going up to the 5th floor isn't that much so it wasn't too much of an issue.
Clean, secure apartment on a quiet street but within easy walking distance a variety of restaurants/bars. A lovely place to rest after exploring the city. Roof deck is shared and has great views.
This was a great base for our New York adventure. Close to the subway, Chinatown, Soho and Little Italy. The aircon was a must for the hot NY summer. Nora responded to all messages very quickly.

It was really good to stay. Clean room with the fine A/C. Well organized kitchen and bathroom. Good location to visit both Brooklyn and Manhattan.   And good host. But the room is not locked. So if you specially care about the privacy, you should consider once again. Other things are really great. Thanks Nora.

Nora's place has a great location! 
It's within walking distance to various restaurants and shops, bars and subway station! 
The apartment was clean and spacious and our room had its own air condition, which was great for the hot summer days. 
Nora is really kind and helps you out if you need anything. 
We would definitely recommend it!
Fantastic place to stay, would recommend to anyone trying to be in the heart of NYC

Emplacement parfait, Nora aide pour la découverte de la ville. J'ai eu quelques problèmes pour accéder au logement, problème réglé au bout d'une heure. Pour la sortie, j'ai eu la possibilité de laisser les bagages jusqu'à 16h. 
Quelques conseils s'imposent:
Un léger ménage pendant le séjour de plus d'une semaine est bienvenu. Je n'ai pas réussi à trouver un aspirateur pour faire moi même. 
La  vaisselle pour manger sur place. Manque des assiettes, couverts, verres etc...
Oreillers trop petits.
En conclusion , très bon emplacement, assez calme. Manque d'intimité et de propreté au niveau du logement à mon goût, la chambre sur la photo ne correspondait aux attentes. Choisir plutôt logement complet pour ceux qui souhaitent plus d'intimité.

I spent wonderful days in NYC bei Nora's department. She was always reachable and ready to help when I needed and the department's atmosphere is very peaceful just how I wanted! Everything was very clean and the bed was the best, super comfy!! Air conditioning in my room worked perfectly!
Nora was a great host. And the LES was a great place to stay. Lively and hip. I'd stay there again.

The room at Nora's place has the morning sun and was big enough for me. The location on the Lower East Side is great. There's also access to two rooftop terraces with great views of the city. The room was clean and I had a great time there with Nora as a great host.
Nothing to say - everything was perfect. Fast respond, clean and nice place and a nice area for shopping, going out.
Great space! The room was incredibly clean, shared bathroom and kitchen were immaculate, and the air conditioning was a lifesaver.

Nora is an amazing Host. We always keep in touch and she was so quicky to answer me.
Her house in an amazing area , I loved it. I felt home.
Apartment is cute, confortable and absolutely you have to visit buildind roof top.
I recomend to other guests. Don't lose the possibility to stay to Nora's house :))))

Centrally located in the lower east side. Within walking distance to some of our favorite coffee shops, donut shops, and delis. Easy to get to any of the bridges on the southern tip of Manhattan. Nora also had some great local suggestions like cafe grumpy and ludlow coffee supply. We absolutely love taking advance of the shared rooftop patio and even met some nice residents. Would highly recommend. We will be back.
Great place,  fairly convenient key pickup and location.  Street parking pretty easy to find.

The location of the flat is very good, there are a lot of bars and restaurants in walking distance, the Lower East Side is an area I can really recommend!
The room seemed smaller than on the pictures shown, the roof top terrace is great and also the fact that there is a lift was a big comfort after a day in New York. Nora is a very placid and quiet host, we felt comfortable using the kitchen and the sofa also when she was in. She also gave us good tips for breakfast.
Public transport is close. The cleanness of the bathroom and kitchen was ok, and one towel for one week was just about enough, we could have done with a change (then again we did not ask for it).
The location  was very good and the subway was near. Nora was nice and kind person. We liked Nora´s place very much.
Nice place. Very convenient to commute around town. :)

Nora`s apartment is a wonderful cosy place, exactly as described. Located near the nicest restaurants/bars. Very clean and quiet, check in easy, communication perfect. Nora is a great host! Highly recommended!!!
This flat is in a good area of Manhattan.

Nice location, two bedroom, may be other guests?  She may not be around, but great on email.  Easy to get around town from multi nearby train stations. Don't expect super clean, not in NYC for this price and location.
Hi ha dues habitacions per llogar; una doble molt gran i l’altre és molt més petita i la calefacció fa molt soroll. Però en les fotografies de l’anunci només surt l’habitació gran.

Apartamento confortável e bem localizado, com excelente acesso ao metrô o que facilita muito a locomoção por toda Manhattan. Encontramos Nora apenas no nosso último dia, mas ela foi muito gentil e atenciosa.

Nora’s place was quiet & clean. The location was great for hitting the main tourist spots—we never traveled more than 20 minutes to get where we were going. Her apartment is near some delicious and famous eats (Katz’s, The Black Tap, The Meatball Shop, Dirty French, and Dudley’s were some personal faves). The room was big enough for two of us but a bit of a tight squeeze which we expected considering we were in New York. If we came back for a weekend we would definitely stay here again
Noras place was lovely and perfect for couples. A bit far from the most common NY attractions but close to public transport so it wasnt a big issue. Recommended :)

Nora was really fast to respond to messages and her places was absolutely amazing. It was really clean and very organized, and the location was also very convenient. The price was great for how convenient it was to get anywhere. I would definitely stay with Nora again if I were to go back to new New York.

Nora’s place was small, quiet, and just what we needed. She kept to herself and was extremely polite. Room did get a little warm, but we just cracked open the window. We had a great stay and if we’re ever back in NYC we would love to stay with Nora again.
这个房子很整洁,使用也很防备｡离地铁站走路不超过10分钟｡所在地区也比较安全,离唐人街近,有很多好处的｡Nora是个很安静的人,对附近很熟悉｡推荐｡

Just what I needed. A simple, clean and quiet place to rest. My plans changed last minute and Nora was very accommodating. I am so glad that her place was available and in the city, close to tons of great restaurants and fun bars.

We didn’t have a great experience here. The room was small and comfortable, but the hospitality was sub-par. The host had strict check-in and out times between 4p and 11am, when the key was actually in a drop box waiting. We weren’t told where to find the key, and had to message multiple times, and then finally call to get those instructions.  She said she sent me a message, but on my end I did not receive anything. When we came back after midnight from seeing a show, the host forgot we were there and locked us out with the indoor chain lock. We stood outside banging on the door and ringing the doorbell until she opened it and said she “forgot.” There wasn’t much said after that except for a goodbye in the morning. The room was fine for the cost and the bed was nice, but it wasn’t welcoming and ended up creating more headache. Would not return.

Such a lovely little apartment and Nora was such a friendly host! She made us feel welcome from when we arrived and nothing was ever too much of a bother :) Her apartment is in such a lovely area of New York and we definitely look forward to returning! Xx
Sharp spot. Nora was super cool, easy going, and flexible.
El alojamiento se encuentra en una ubicación inmejorable, prácticamente no tuvimos que usar el subte. Nora es una mujer muy agradable y tranquila. Muy recomendable su alojamiento!!

La ubicación del departamento es muy buena. Tanto la calefacción como el agua caliente funcionaban muy bien. La cama cómoda aunque el espacio un poco reducido en el cuarto. Nora siempre fue muy amable y dio consejos de lugares para comer y hacer compras. Buena relación precio-calidad.
Check in to Nora’s place was very smooth. The room itself was very clean. Conveniently located. Recommend!

Nice place, window looking onto a lovely street and very comfortable beds. Nora always gave us good advice and information on the restaurants and places around. It was a pleasure to stay at her place!
Muy lindo departamento, nos encanto vivir ahi. Mercaditos cerca y varios lugares accesibles: soho, chinatown, metro
Ótimo apartamento, a localização é perto de comércio, metrô, bares e restaurantes. Muito bom
Rooftop views were really nice. Quiet stay. Lots of fun & food nearby. We are vegan and had many options.

Nora’s apartment was in a perfect location with some really cool bars and restaurants nearby! Nora was very friendly and flexible, allowing us to drop our bags off before the check in time. Great value for money and great spot to explore NYC!
We had a very nice staying at Nora’s place. Very good location, nice appartment and a super friendly Nora! We highly recommend this! :)
Everything was excellent! Thank you Nora!
Nora’s place was the perfect place for my husband & I to spend the night in the city. Affordable, bright, quiet and Nora was very friendly and helpful.
The place nice, quiet, easy to move around.

Nora’s home was clean and cute. She provided helpful tips on places to visit which I appreciated. The bed was also comfy which I loved! One thing definitely worth checking out is the rooftop view which was absolutely breathtaking. This home is definitely a gem in LES.

Convenient location, many subway stations, restaurants and other shops at your doorstep. Both Wall Street and Brooklyn Bridge are within walking distance.
The flat is fairly new and well equipped, also has a rooftop with a nice view over the city.
Nora was a great and helpful host, we had a wonderful time and would stay at her place again.
This was a great place! Checking in and out was a breeze and the location was convenient.
Everything was great at Nora’s place, very clean, quiet, and the neighborhood is quite colourfull. All in all a great experience :)
Nora's place is great. The room and private bathroom are nice. Super comfy bed. Great neighborhood. Loved the rooftop views.

Pretty much everything went as we expected and there were no surprises which is a good thing
The house is very well renovated and decorated. AC works great. Overall the place was clean and tidy. 
The immediate blocks surrounding the house belong to Chinatown and lower east village which is not the nicest part of the town, but it's secure. It's also close to little Italy and SOHO which are good for shopping, eating, taking photos, etc.
Thanks Nora for hosting us :)

This was our first Airbnb experience and it was great! Loved the rooftop experience and there was a lot to do near by or a subway ride away! Nora was available and offered help or advise! Very happy with our stay!

Thank you, Nora for opening your fabulous apartment to us while we traveled through. The room was clean, thoughtful, and very private as we never actually met. The rooftop was an amazing little area as well! 100 stars for this little gem!
Nice place and Nora made it very easy. Thank you so much.
Attentive  host, responds quickly, cute apartment, lovely rooftop patio, good suggestions. Nora is a very lovely person.
I had a lovely stay in Nora's place. It's a great apartment for exploring the city. My favorite part was the rooftop. It offers a magnificent view over the city.

Très bonne localisation, beaucoup de petits commerces et restaurants, situé dans chinatown. Nora est très gentille et très agréable, nous recommandons ce lieu. Néanmoins nous n'avons pas utilisé les parties communes juste la chambre avec une salle de bain privée.

My stay at Nora's place, I will break it down to pros and cons.
Pros:
- the location is close to great restaurant, subway station, and 20 min. from the major attractions.

Cons:
- not all of the rooms have a queen beds, depending on the room you get (it was not communicated at the time of my booking)
- private rooms don't have locks
- cleanliness
I would confirm all of the above mention details during you booking.
Great location, Nora is very helpful.  Place is clean and bright, just as advertised.  We'd stay again!
no frills room/bath in a great location, we did not use the roof top as we were too busy exploring the city the 2 days/nights we were there

Location of the apartment is amazing. It's next to so many cool spots and it's a walkable distance to Wall Street. Best thing is, there are so many authentic and cheap Chinese diners just around the corner.
Bedroom is a little bit small for 2 persons, but since we spent most of the time in the city, so it was quite ok.  
I will definitely recommend this place.
Thank you very much Nora :)

A well situated and very clean appartment in the lower east side. We enjoyed the good public transport nearby (subway F and SBS-Bus No 15), so we arrived all major sights within 20 min. Nora is a very welcoming host. Although we did not meet in person, all communication went perfect, quick and accurate via Airbnb-Mails. Very helpful was for us that Nora prepared a list with good possibilities to go out in the quarter. All in all we  enjoyed completly our 11 nights stay there.

Nora was kind and communicative, but the apartment was in not-the-nicest area, a lot of the house was not quite clean (kind of grimy), and the bed felt like a layer of foam over plywood.  We definitely felt safe inside the house, but it was quite an unpleasant stay.

Nora‘s apartment is located in NYC‘s South-East in Manhattan/Chinatown. There are two very close Metro stations: East Broadway and Delancey Station/Essex Street. Both stations offer a great connection to every desired destination. 
It also only takes 5 to 10 minutes by foot to get a great view of the Manhattan Bridge, East River and Brooklyn’s coast. 
We arrived on JFK airport which is approximately 90 minutes away. Nora provided us prior to our arrival with a helpful description of how we could get to her apartment.
The first nights, we shared the apartment with another guest who we only met at one short time. 
There is a separate bath room which can only be entered from the rented room and therefore is used privately.
The living room and kitchen can be shared by all guests.
We were very happy to have found such a lovely apartment where we could stay during our time in New York.
Me and girlfriend stayed at Nora’s for 8 days and she has always been available to help us. Her apartment is in an amazing area with great bars, restaurants, and rooftops. I highly reccomend it!
위치가 너무 위험한곳이라고 하더라구요 .. 그리고 숙소도 쾌쾌한 냄새도 나고 뭔가 별로여서 저는 그냥 돈버렸다는 셈 치고 그냥 안머무를꺼라고 이야기하고 새로 숙소잡아서 숙박했습니다.

Beautiful apartment in a hoppin place. Easy access to metro and dozens of local food places. Felt like a foodie area and also wasn’t super expensive compared to other areas. Bed was comfy, air conditioner functioned great as a heater and cooler for the room. Great local pro tips and very responsive host. She gave a lot of space so you almost felt like you loved there on your own. We would love to stay here again in the future.
Great place in the lower east side. Will definitely return in the future. Perfect for a few nights in the city.
El espacio es exactamente como en las fotografias. A una cuadra del metro. Buena ubicacion, excelente descanso. Todo bien

Nora's house is very comfortable, well located and has an unbeatable price-quality. The neighborhood have near many services and transportation. On our last day, she let us leave our baggage at her house until we had to go to the airport. I highly recommend it to everyone without a doubt. Thank you Nora!
Nora’s apartment is in a very accessible area close to China town and Little Italy. Nora is very respectful of your space and quick to help with any enquiries.

This room was great for a couple days in the city! The only downside was the location, but there were many subway stations in the area. The room itself was bright and quiet and the private bathroom was great!
Very nice and spacious apartment in a great location. Most importantly a superb host who is kind, helpful and always quick to respond
Nora's place was great for my business trip to NYC! Quaint, stylish, with all the accouterments you'll need for a short trip. Would definitely recommend!

10일 정도 여자 혼자 여행을 하면서 그닥  숙소 주변에서 위험을 느끼지 않았습니다. 지하철도 도보 5분 거리에 2노선이 있어 편리했어요! 세탁실은 지하에 마련되어 있었고 냄비,후라이팬을 사용해서 밥을 해먹기 좋았습니다 ㅎㅎ 욕실의 물은 조금 기다려야 떠듯한 물이 나오구요 수압은 약한 편이에요. 저는 Nora와 함께 숙소를 쉐어하는 줄 알았지만, 다른 게스트와 숙소를 쉐어했어요! 서로 배려를 해주는 게스트를 만나서 불편함이 전혀 없었습니다 ㅎㅎ (만약 그게 아니라면 실례되는 일이 있을수도 있겠지요) 아무쪼록 만족스러웠어요!

Let me start by saying we stayed here for one night after our one month trip to the US therefore had limited time to communicate with Nora and time to explore the rest of the area. Nora was very nice in our communication and gave us her contact details to contact her at any time.

When I look at booking airbnb or any kind of place to stay, I would like to read reviews that are honest and useful and therefore intend to do the same for others. 

The location of the apartment is good, close to a subway and surrounded by nice places to eat, conveince stores and feels like a safe neigbourhood. Wifi works fine. 

The bathroom has a shower and is not the one shown, at the current time, on the photos. The shower and bathroom floor was very dirty in my opinion (e.g. greasy, mouldy) and compared to any other any air bnb we have stayed at. Especially when you look at paying a cleaning fee.

The bed is not very comfortable, and I dont think I would be able to stay there for more than one night. The door handles' latch does not work and for that reason also not the door lock. 

In my opinion, this was fine for one night however taking into consideration that you have to pay for a service and cleaning fee, its cheaper to stay for more than one night. If the cleanliness and door handle is fixed, I would say that its fine to stay here.

Amazing apartment - Nora is super nice and helps where she can! 
Perfect place for visiting both downtown and uptown. 
Very comfortable bed! 
Really nothing bad to say
Nice place

name: Casa de Relaxo ..Pakalolo vibes
summary: Once you get your car our home is 15 minutes away. We are at a very comfortable elevation of 1500 feet in the neighborhood of Kalaoa Apu'a'a. We do all we can to make you part of our Hawaiian Ohana during your visit to the Big Island. We are 20 minutes from one of the best beaches in Hawaii, a beautiful place to begin or end each day. Everything you'll need to make your trip better is located nearby. And always 420 friendly.. ALOHA
space: All common areas are shared in our home. You have private parking. The bedroom comes with your own bathroom. There is a dining area on the main floor out on the lanai and a kitchen that you are welcome to use. We only ask that you always clean up after yourselves. I have lots of vinyl and a great turntable for your enjoyment...and we are 420 friendly to make you feel at home if you’d like.
description: Once you get your car our home is 15 minutes away. We are at a very comfortable elevation of 1500 feet in the neighborhood of Kalaoa Apu'a'a. We do all we can to make you part of our Hawaiian Ohana during your visit to the Big Island. We are 20 minutes from one of the best beaches in Hawaii, a beautiful place to begin or end each day. Everything you'll need to make your trip better is located nearby. And always 420 friendly.. ALOHA All common areas are shared in our home. You have private parking. The bedroom comes with your own bathroom. There is a dining area on the main floor out on the lanai and a kitchen that you are welcome to use. We only ask that you always clean up after yourselves. I have lots of vinyl and a great turntable for your enjoyment...and we are 420 friendly to make you feel at home if you’d like. There is a washer and dryer that you can use, we ask $5 a load. I will always be around should you have any questions. It's a great close knit, quiet neighborhood.. but we
neighborhood_overview: It's a great close knit, quiet neighborhood.. but we can always enjoy a good evening on the lanai without bothering anyone..
notes: I am a medical marijuana card holder, 420 friendly home.. we even carry a line of 420 apparel for a more unique souvenir to take home.
transit: It's best to have a rental car when exploring on this island. There is a twice a day Hele On bus that leaves from Matsuyamas Store (walking distance) . If you need to be picked up or dropped I can do so at a nominal fee, advance notice is always appreciated.
access: There is a washer and dryer that you can use, we ask $5 a load.
interaction: I will always be around should you have any questions.
house_rules: - We are 420 friendly but No cigarette smoking, please.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I came to Hawai'i to get away from my busy life. This was hands down THE BEST place I could have stayed!!! The host Stephen was available and very helpful! He know this island very well and even sent me off on some wonderful day trips. He handed me a book and explained how to get places and I always found my destinations easily! The home feels warm and inviting and quiet. He has a great set of old records and it was so nice to listen to some of them while I fixed food or just sat journalling. I was able to buy all the food I needed for the week at Costco (they have the best (Website hidden by Airbnb) BRING A COSTCO CARD!) I feel like Stephen is a good friend now and I plan to come back regularly for visits. The bed was comfortable. Shampoo and soap were provided. You'll feel comfortable spending time in the rest of the house not just your room. Stephen is a very happy and laid back host. Very generous and knowledgeable!  He even washed some of my dishes for me.  This place will make you fall in love with the Big Island!!! Thanks Stephen! You made my trip amazing!!!

My wife and me were for three nigths at Steve´s house, and it was the best Airbnb experience we have ever had. The house is very pleasant and hospitable, even more than it looks in the pictures. Our bedroom was spacious and clean, and we had a private bathroom. The best place in the house is the wide covered deck, perfect for enjoying the hawaiian sunset.
Furthermore, Steve is a really charming guy. He spent a long time telling us the best places for visiting in Big Island, and he did everything to make us feel at home.
If we ever go back to Hawaii, we´ll undoubtelly stay in Steve´s house.
Great location sitting high above Kona and a short drive to an awesome secluded beach(Makalawena). As a longtime resident Stephen offered some great tips for whale watching and good beaches.

Stephen is the ideal host! Everything about staying at his place was awesome! The aloha attitude is alive and well at la casa de Relaxo. Stephen really adds to the experience & made our trip as great as it could be! Forget the tourist attractions, he'll tell you where the locals go! He knows so much about the island & has so many adventures lined up, he truly enhanced our unforgettable Hawaiian vacation!

I'm a seasoned traveler and I loved shearing Steve's lovely house for about a week, great view, convenient location and clean, you will share everything beside your bedroom and private bath with Steve , Cindy and other guests also some times massage are performed for some other clients, Steve is one of a kind and goes out of his way to please you, pictures don't justify the beauty of his house .

this place was amazing, after being at the beach all day it was so comfortable being here just feeling like it was my own house i felt so comfortable. i would and will definitely be coming back to this house. the view is amazing and these people here are really nice and amazing too. Everything was clean and I had no problems what so ever.

Stephen has a really beautiful house with great woodwork and some fab pieces of unusual, hand-made furniture.  And good art, there's some good art too.  The kitchen is very nice and you can use it, so you don't have to go out for coffee in the morning.  The room I stayed in was clean, private, and comfortable and it has an en suite bathroom.  Oh, one thing: there's no full length mirror so if you're going somewhere, you won't know what you look like, so I'd advise checking your outfit carefully before you leave on your trip.  Or I guess you could just not stress about it, that would be an option too.   There's a private entrance to the room so if you come in late (or whatever) you don't have to go through the house, and there's dedicated parking right next to the room's door, so you don't have to worry about whether you're parked in someone's space.  You're not.  Except that I accidentally ran over a tool box that was sitting in the driveway one day, since I'm short and couldn't see over the Jeep's dash, so that's something to be aware of.   I saw some gorgeous wild turkeys in the area and a lot of very cute wild chickens.  I tried feeding the chickens but they were supremely disinterested in me and my stupid food, so don't bother wasting your bread on them, they think you're an asshole.  Or maybe it was just me.   Let's see, what else... Stephen and his friend Kate were super helpful, providing me with driving information and hints about cool places to go, and without Stephen's advice I probably would have wasted time trying to go places (such as forest refuges) that are accessible only on certain, very limited days.   So if anyone has read this far and they're thinking of visiting a forest refuge during their stay, I'd advise you to check the schedule right now, before you leave, so you can plan accordingly.   So this has become a little verbose, but in closing let me just add that I had a very nice stay at Stephen's and I felt like I got a very good deal for the price.  I

Being at Steve's house upgrade our Hawaii trip from 8 to 10000. His home is amazing: comfy, quiet, gorgeous, chill... PERFECT! Great vibes and energy!
So when the place is perfect, the host is perfect. Steve gave us a lot of local tips of everything: places for have lunch or dinner, markets, hiking trails, beaches, interesting places to go....we discovered the real soul of the island because of him.
I would stay in his place every single time I'd back to Big Island. Recommended 200%
Stephens place, so beautiful, hospitality first class, secluded location.

Best place in the world.
Steve is very modest, his house is much better than in pictures. Christina is very gentle and kind woman. Really I want to go back again. Many thanks. God bless!!!
great place to stay.

With no time to research I booked in under a minute the day of. And was I lucky! First off Kate got right back to me to confirm. There we're hurdles to overcome and they eased me into my room where I slept off my jet lag. Such a convenient arrangement with the driveway next to the room's private entrance. Like so many other reviewers I too had a great experience of generosity and good conversation; swapping stories, cracking jokes. I felt at ease almost immediately; welcomed and included. Stephen was also very helpful with travel tips as were his housemates. I will be going back most definitely.
 Though the property is about 15 minutes high above town it does get you away from all the touristy stuff with the added bonus of a deck with  sweeping  views.  Tip: There is a way up from the airport you can take that bypasses the constant traffic on the highway.
Cosy basement bedroom! Great location and wonderful view! Stephen is a very warm host and will show you anything you need to know around the island!

Aloha air b 'n b ohana (family). We had an amazing time visiting Big Island and staying at Casa Relaxo. Stephen was a great host who showed us much aloha and hospitality. This was our first air b n b stay and it was absolutely great! We highly recommend Casa Relaxo as a home away from home when you're visiting the Big Island. The accommodations are clean and nice and Stephen's home is comfortable and spacious with a fabulous view off the upstairs lanai. Whether you're an mmj patient or not, this is absolutely the perfect place to stay when you're on the Big Island! Mahalo Stephen!!!!
Steve and his home were welcoming and hospitable. The sunset view was incredible and the home was a chill place to relax in the evenings. I had a great stay and would love to visit again.
Super host, very informative, very clean and well organized. Location is good too, close to airport, close to town. Amazing view from the huge balcony.
This place is awesome, the views, the people. Brilliant

"Casa de Relaxo" definitely lives up to its name. The peaceful neighbourhood, amazing views, and invaluable hospitality made our stay in Kona very worthwhile. Stephen and Katie were awesome hosts who provided great tips on places to visit, and they made it easy for us to feel at home. By staying at their place, you'll benefit from being close to the airport, gas stations, restaurants, and most importantly, stunning beaches! We highly recommend "Casa de Relaxo" to travellers seeking an authentic aloha-vibe on the Big Island!

If I could rate my overall stay a 10 out of 5 stars, I would. Stephen is so friendly, funny, knowledgeable and personable. Everything was perfect about staying here, he made us feel so welcome and at home everyday. Mahalo, Stephen!

Steve was so warm and hospitable. He truly opened up his home to us and made us feel like we were old friends. Steve’s place was a perfect first stop on our Hawaiian adventure! Mahalo Steve and mahalo Kate! It was absolutely wonderful to meet both of you!

Steve's house was super nice. We felt Steve's  aloha from the time we pulled into the driveway! The bedroom we stayed in was very nice and comfortable. Our private bathroom was perfect and very clean. Steve recommend some amazing places for us to visit, he has a vast amount of knowledge about the island. We will definitely be going back to Casa De Relxo.
I didn't get to meet Steve unfortunately, since he was away on vacation himself, but those who were managing things in his absence were great.  The place is beautiful, welcoming, clean, and chill.

Aloha Stephen and Kate, 
‘Casa de Relaxo’ is one of the best Airbnb experiences we ever had. We got to know so much about beautiful Big Island from you, we gonna cherish it for rest of our lives.

Thank you so much for all the suggestions to see beautiful places, eat and hangout. It felt like we really belonged here! Loved the warmth and the love you gave us. 

We are taking back some memories with us, thank you for all the endless conversations, haha. Loved getting to know a bit of your life here in Island.

We wish all the best, health, happiness and Joy! 

Love and cheers,
Satish and Manisha

Mahalo and Namastey!! :-)

We highly recommend this place!

Stephen was an incredible host, and has a beautiful home in a great location.  Stephen was incredibly helpful with providing tips for places to visit and directed to me to local places I wouldn't have found in a tour book.  I thoroughly enjoyed spending my new years here, and hope to visit again in the near future.
Its a great place. Nevertheless, there is no public transportation. Therefore you need to be moved by the host and it is expensive.

Stephen & Katy's place is a true gem and is exactly as described in the listing.  A really beautiful house in a truly beautiful setting in the mountains overlooking the Pacific. I was greeted by both Stephen and Katy along with the cat who is very affectionate   Stephen gave some great local tips on sightseeing and was a great host to my nephew who was staying there.  Highly recommended!!! Will absolutely book again when visiting the Big Island.
It was our third stay in 2 years!! We Love Stephen & the Casa de Relaxo! Amazing sunsets from the Lanai! Great local tips & conversations with Stephen! 420 love all around! We’ll be back!

This was a great place to stay! We felt a part of the family immediately and enjoyed every interaction we had with Steve and his friends. The room was spacious and had great closet space. The bed was very comfortable. The sheets and towels were deluxe and so were the pillows. The location of the house was convenient to nearly anything in the Kona area. We felt totally at home here. Do not hesitate to book here!

Steve's place was great! We stayed there right when we got into town for two nights, and had easy access in and out. Steve is super laidback and always had friends around, too, so it would have been easy to socialize if we had wanted to. Lots of free guidebooks to page through and a comfy bed and room. Steve's house is very nice, but this isn't a fancy place to stay, which was perfect for us: outside of the more touristy areas and very affordable for Kona. Would totally stay there again!

Steve and Kate were great hosts. Right away we got great friendly vibes from them and their roommates staying there too. The room is a great size and the bed is comfortable. Leaving the windows open listening to the sounds of the night was such a great way to sleep and be awoken each morning. The house is beautifully made, wood everywhere, they have 100s of records for listening and a comfortable sectional that face toward a beautiful ocean view. They have a massive lanai that is great for having all your meals or just your morning coffee. 

Steve made great recommendations of places to go and things to do from the Kona area. He supplied us with a Hawaii revealed travel book and set us up for a whole day of activities. Kua Bay is a really nice beach area close by. It's a great starting point to make the drive to Mauna Kea observatory, although the road to the summit was closed for our stay due to snow/ice, we enjoyed the sunset from a peak near the visitor centre. 

Would love to go back and visit Steve and Kate again.
Highly recommended!  Steve was very accommodating with our late arrival.  The atmosphere was great and the view from the back deck was incredible!  Thank you!

We stayed at the casa de relaxo for two nights, and it more than lived up to its name. Steven was available to answer our questions, but generally kept to himself. He loaned us his snorkel gear and a boogie board, and gave us some good tips on local beaches and restaurants. We had a great stay!
Steve and Kate were awesome! Very nice and friendly. They offered great suggestions about where to go to enjoy our stay. Loved the amenities!

Steve was the best. Super helpful and nice even though we showed up hours late in the pouring rain he stayed up and made us hot tea. Great location super close to the airport and the beaches, close enough we had time to go to kuo beqch one past time before our flights. Amazing view, sitting out at sunset eating dinner was surreal! 

And he gave us great tips of where to go and what to do, only bad part was we didnt have enough time to do everything.
We really enjoyed our stay! Stephen gave us some great advice on what to do and where to eat. Kate was also a wonderful host!

Great place to stay. Very welcoming house. House is really neat and clean. Loads of space. We had a car so distance wasn’t an issue but would recommend having a car as it is a 15-20mins drive outside of town.
Great view, great tips on things to do on the island!
Katy and Poul, thank you very much for your personal and family hospitality. We felt at home and enjoyed very much being with you. You are special people.

Steve真的是个非常好非常好的房东,真的不知道怎么用言语来形容,因为之前不愉快的经历,对BNB上租房子还是心有余悸,加上天数不短｡从到Steven家开始,他就非常热情的接待了我们,告诉我们每一样东西的摆放位置,告诉我们如何去当地的景点,甚至陪我们去Costco采购｡给我们的房间买了底垫,准备了垃圾桶,还有很多很多,他真的是非常热心的好人,给我的度假生活带来了很多的便利,也真的让我享受到了家的感觉!我非常感谢他,是他让我在异国他乡的日子过得很轻松,我一定会把这个房子推荐给别人~祝Steven天天开心!

name: Unique Design, Awesome view , Prime Location
summary: My place located in high rise building right near Ala Moana Mall, Hawaii Conference Center, next to famous Waikiki beach and Hilton Village Plaza. This Beautiful home for people who want to escape everyday busy life and dive into paradise of Hawaii. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids). It has fast Wi-Fi, Cable TV, Air Conditioner. Laundry is in the building
space: Newly remodeled, added handmade Hawaiian Style furniture, you will love  atmosphere, Location, Places to go out and of-course the beach, incredibly beautiful.
