house_rules: - Smoking is allowed on the Balcony - Quiet hours are from 11PM to 8AM - Charge for the lost key/key-fob is 150$

host.host_about: Hey,  welcome to my beautiful home, I put a lot of effort in making its looks beautiful like you see on the pictures. Please treat my place as your home.

reviews.comments: We are so thankful that Oleksandr was able to book us at short notice at such a reasonable rate.  Our son was in the hospital there, and we needed a quick local place to stay so we could wait out his diagnosis and bring him home.  The condo is close to many restaurants and the beach. We appreciated how central it was to where we had to be.
Just what I needed: close to conference centre, calm. Precise indications for self checking.
Pretty great location right on Ala Moana Blvd. Short walk to the beach, or to the malls.

Oleksandr's place was exactly as it was represented. In a perfect location for navigating around town and near many different parking options if you have a car or very walkable if you don't. The place was very secure and no issues with any of the neighbors as was a very quiet area. would very much consider this location again when i return next time!

Cet appartement est très propre, bien localisé pour être au calme tout en étant proche de Waikiki et des commerces. 
Studio idéal pour récuperer des longues journées, literie très bonne.

Location was great- close to the beach, 15 min walk to downtown where the shops and restaurants are. The place isn't luxurious, but it is great bang for your buck. Fridge, huge TV, and aircon were the big perks for us. Check in/out was seamless. You can't park in the building from 7AM-4PM, so we ended up parking at the coffee house next door, which charges $27 for 24 hour parking. All in all, we had a great time!
The place is good and close to Waikiki beach. The only thing is the kitchen is small and without stoves. Other parts are pretty good.
Great value! Good location, would definitely recommend. Oleksandr was very nice and responsive over messages.

Cozy, tidy place. Great if you're out all day and just need a relaxing place to spend the night. Olek kept in communication, even though he wasn't physically there. All of us had a great time in Honolulu. Mahalo, Olek!

We enjoyed our stay at Oleksandr's apartment. It was close to a bunch of places to eat and about a 5-10min walk to the beach. The big TV was nice and it was also great to have a fridge for food. Ala Mona Shopping Center and Royal Hawaiian Center are both within walking distance.

My biggest complaint was that there is only one key and elevator fob; meaning that whenever my partner had to go to work I had to get up to let him out, and make sure I was available when he needed to get back in. You can't even go down the elevator without it. 

Also due to circumstances outside Oleksandr's control the sink was clogged when we arrived. We had two different people come and look at it over a two day period. It was inconvenient because we wanted to be in the room while someone was there. While out to eat one evening the plumber did show up without our knowledge, which we had hoped to have some notice before anyone came.

Great owner great room condition great location
Oleksandr was always quick responser. It was really helpful. The place was clean and cozy. The public parking right beside the place was $18 for 24hours. It takes 15min by walk to the beach.

Oleksandr was a gracious and attentive host. His condo was cozy, clean and well appointed. He was kind enough to accommodate me with a last minute booking. The location is excellent and the place met all my expectations.
Very good location, appartment tiny and a bit noisy but ok for few days . Not really possible to cook cause no kitchen just a microwave but it was ok for breakfast.

Oleksandr communicated the location, checkin and checkout very well. The unit was exactly as pictured. It was perfect for conference attendance at HCC. The room was clean, the unit stayed cool during the day, and was a convenient location. The only thing that might improve it is if there were two keys (instead of 1). However, it really wasn't a big deal to share a key amongst our group. It was the perfect apartment for our trip's needs. :) Thank you Oleksandr.

We are locals here in Hawai'i and enjoy staycationing. This apartment was just right for us mostly because of the PRICE! You will not find a deal like this anywhere on Oahu. The apartment was clean and well stocked. Very accurate. Great location. Anywhere in Waikiki is going to be impossible to find cheap parking. You can park in the building over night for $20 but have to be out by 7 am, or you can park in the coffee house parking garage and that's $15 over night. But honestly this place was a really good deal so I didn't mind paying the parking fees. AC, TV, WIFI, shower, lanai, check in, check out, SO GREAT, SO EASY and SO simple and the second I booked, Oleksandr communicated on everything we needed to know. I have stayed at probably five places on Oahu with Airbnb and this is the first time every instruction and detail was 100% right and everything went smooth. We had zero problems. For those of you visiting our island, don't spend big bucks on a super fancy tropical ocean front hotel room. You're coming here to explore Hawaii not look at the water from your window. Just get somewhere to sleep and spend your days enjoying our island. Trust me, you will save HUGE! The food is already expensive enough, you don't need to pay $300+ a night to sleep somewhere in the exact same area as this perfect little inexpensive condo. Mahalo nui loa Oleksandr for allowing us to stay in your condo! 
Aloha!
Great price for location ! No one bothered us and easy access to shopping
Great stay. Check in and check out were very easy. Close to all the things Waikiki have to offer. Highly recommend.

Great place for the price, walking distance to beach, restaurants and shops. I stayed with 3 people and could tell you its a bit cramped but we didn't go to Hawaii to stay indoors. The main issue here is the parking set up, you are basically on your own and will have to pay overnight parking.
가격대비 훌륭한 콘도였습니다. 집 주소는 인온더파크로 검색하시면 찾기 더 쉬우시고, 하와이에서 이 가성비로 이정도 깔끔한 룸 찾기 어려우실 것 같습니다. 와이키키해변까지 정말로 도보 5분거리에 있고, 치즈인더버거나 abc마트, 구피까페등 유명식당, 기념품샵과 가깝습니다.
Oleksandr is a great host and very helpful. I really appreciated all the help he did for us :)

You will be pleasantly surprised; the location is close to everything. Restaurants, bars and the beach.
If you have a car, park in the back 24 hour parking for 18 dollars it's across from the ABC store, drive up into the parking lot, it's the best price around; they close the gate at 11 pm and open at 6 am. The stairs take you out to the apparentment building area.

The location is nice.
It is easy to find the keybox.
Thank you!
Nice room, easy check in, good location. Close to the Honolulu CBD and Department of Transport building.
This was a convenient place to stay at :) just to echo what others have said, there is overnight parking at the coffee shop garage on the corner. $15 from 8pm to 8am.
Centrally located in Waikiki. Very clean. Max was communicative and kind.

Max's apartment is in a great location right in the heart of Waikiki. It's clean and comfortable and very quite (being on the 9th floor) away from busy roads. Max was super helpful and always contactable in the lead up to and during my stay. Thanks Max!

The place is in a good location close to restaurants, bars, and walking distance to the beach. I needed a place to stay last minute and Max's place was available and the value seemed worth it. Check in and check out was extremely easy. There wasn't any soap provided so make sure you bring your own. At night, I went to the restroom to find a roach in the shower and two in the bathroom sink. For that reason, I would not recommend staying here, which is surprising based on the reviews.
Awesome place for the price. A lovely walk to the beach. Close to shopping and restaurants. Max was a wonderful host. I would definitely stay there again.
Very convenient, clean and comfortable.
Room was as expected.  We had a rental car and parked in the building for $20/night.  You could park from 4 pm to 7 am.
The location is very well situated near a nice beach for swimming and newr Hilton hotel (place for conferences).

Max's apartment, while very basic, is comfortable, well-located, and quiet. The beds are clean and comfortable, and the kitchen is stocked with plates, bowls, cutlery, and a full-sized fridge. Basics such as bath towels and bed linens, but be aware that you must bring your own tissues, shampoo/body soap, coat/clothes hangers, and beach towels. The air-con is very helpful, especially in summer! The building has excellent washing machines and dryers, but make sure you have your own laundry liquid (not powder!) and a credit card to swipe in order to use them. The apartment is an easy 10-minute walk from the lagoon, and an easy 20-25 minute walk to Waikiki Beach. It's also close to many bus stops that take you further afield to places such as Diamondhead, Ala Moana Mall, downtown Honolulu, etc. Max provides clear instructions so check-in procedures are very easy, but only one key and elevator card is provided, which can sometimes be inconvenient if you and your travel buddy leave and enter the apartment at different times (but not a problem if you're going to stick together). The wifi is strong, and Max is quick to reply to messages. All in all, a great apartment if you want to enjoy a comfortable holiday in Honolulu!

The apartment has a nice location and the windows overlook the inner yard, so it's very calm at night. And in general it's very close to the beaches, but it's around 20mins by foot away from the more vivid area with bars and restaurants. The size of the room is really small and there is no wardrobe for clothes, only a couple of shelves. It's fine for a budget staying, but the main issue was that, although the apartment has two beds for two people, there is only one key available! And you cannot even enter the building without the key. For us it created significant difficulties, because we didn't have mobile internet, so we couldn't split even for, literally, a minute.

What an amazing stay. 
Good price great location.
What a cozy little place to stay in Honolulu! Just what we wanted-we loved it!
Hospitality level is POOR! Place has roaches, broken doors, the balcony door locks you out, the front door doesn't close unless you slam it shut. Place is a dump.
Great little spot close to everything.  Love the big ass TV!  I would come back again!  Thank you Max!

This place is great for a couple people.  It is small but clean and had free internet.  We were able to park in the garage below the condo for$20 a night.  You have to have the car moved by 7am though.
Great place to stay. Reasonable price for what you get. Awesome cafe nearby called the Hiking Hawaii Cafe.
Apartment smelt, difficult for the renter to find the keys to the place (Easy for the renter - no work), no parking. Roaches.
Perfect for if you're wanting to stay in town
This is a nice apt in a great location.  Easy walk to the convention center, Ala Moana Center, restaurants, and Waikiki.  We Ubered from the airport, and then didn't need a car again for anything.
Great location with wifi and a huge TV. The price is reasonable for what you get.
This place was as described. Perfect for two people, great location, walking distance to the beach and one of the main streets where all the shops and restaurants are. I would book it again.
No frills place in a fantastic location.
perfect and the landlord is very nice
Great place!

毎日ｺﾞｷﾌﾞﾘが出ました､､､
そして1日だけWiFiが使えなかった｡
ﾊﾝｶﾞｰﾗｯｸがあればより良い!
立地は静かで最高です!

Great location. Decent price. Max made it very easy for us. But the room needs a little pest (Website hidden by Airbnb) were found multiple times during our stay. I think it’s cause the building is just old but hopefully that issue can be fixed. Other than that the ac works great and the tv was huge!

Great location is all the room has. It is heart of waikiki. A lot of restaurants,coffee shops 7/24 hours open.. But there is a parking problem in waikiki. It is really hard to find a parking place for free. Ok,there is public parking but it's too expensive. If you have a car,it means; you are going to spend a lot of money.
Towels,sheets,pillows and bedclothes smell like dirty. 
Too much noise like somebody listening music after midnight. We wake up beacuse of this for a couple time.
Max is ok but about replying our massages like he doesnt want to write a massage... 
This room is ok for good location but you shouldnt have any other expectations..

This place is exactly as advertised. It’s a small little apartment with the basic amenities and is located in a relatively prime location. It is within walking distance to all of the main attractions and shops in Waikiki. If you’re looking for basic but comfortable this place to stay this is what it offers. Parking around here is difficult unless you’re willing to pay $20 for overnight parking in the parking garage underneath. Max is Prompt and easy to communicate with.
Nice clean room in really good location. I would appreciate better equipment in kitchen. But still really highly  recommended.
위치가 너무 맘에 들었음
Decent
Great location, came with snorkel gear and towels, all for an affordable price!

This place is very well located and you can get parking very nearby at the Canterbury Place Apartments parking garage on Ena Rd. After 5pm is only $10 to 7am and $18 for 24 hours. I don't think you can find a better deal. It's a short walk to everything (food, beach, shopping, etc). The apartment is on the 9th floor with a decent view of some other buildings and a chill patio where you can see some of the mountains in the distance. There was plenty of room for the 3 of us and were able to quickly feel right at home. If you're looking for a place to store your stuff and relax/sleep, then this is perfect. If you expect luxury or would consider yourself picky, then you probably won't like the place. For the price, it was an INCREDIBLE value compared to everything else that was available during our trip. I saved easily $600 over a week by staying here, and we LOVED it. Thanks Max!

Great, little place that is about a 20 minute walk from the mall and other popular attractions. Max was very easy to contact and made his instructions very easy to follow. Just be aware that there is not on site parking, only street or in the public parking around the corner. Either way, would totally come back and stay at Max's place again!

Pros: Location, quick walk to Hilton Hawaiian Village and dining nearby; very easy check-in/out 

Cons: A little bit older building and unit/furnishings; at times cramped for 3 adults

Bottom line: economy option that works great for what you need, just don’t have unreasonable expectations

Had a great stay! Needed to check in late, but instructions were easy to follow and had no problems getting in. Room was comfortable with a nice lanai to sit outside. You will need to remember to bring some amenities on your own like shampoo, but this is to be expected because it is not a hotel. Location was convenient to get around Waikiki and surrounding areas.
The place was nice, had a blast it was in a good spot close to Waikiki beach.
위치 좋아요. 요리는 불가능합니다.
Great location that’s close to Waikiki beaches.

This was a great place for someone on a short trip that only needs a place to get ready and to sleep. About 2 blocks from the nearest beach and centered to everything you want to see. I recommend Max's place.
Fin beliggenhed og dårlig udsigt og meget larm fra området og aircondition
This place is exactly like the description. It was prefect for 2 of us staying for a quick weekend trip.

The place was livable but not comfortable. Max left towels and some snorkeling gear which is very thoughtful. The beds are comfortably and he has a power strip on the nightstand so you have easy access to charging. The whole floor had an extremely bad odor like cigarettes and pee, it was not pleasant walking too and from the elevator. The bathroom had an odor that constantly smelled like someone had pooped. The sliding glass door to the balcony is broken. Overall it was a fine place to sleep at but we tried to spend as little time as possible in the actual room
Great location! It was a little small for three people, but if you're pretty much just looking for a place to sleep, this will be a good fit for you.

This was a great place to stay. Within walking distance of the beach and all it’s amenities. Starbucks less than a block away. I would not rent a car if you stay here. There is no onsite parking. Honolulu is very expensive for parking. There are shuttles and buses that can take you anywhere.
Good location, within walking distance of Waikiki. The room is rather minimalist with basic amenities.

PROS- Cercanía a Waikiki, buena ubicación; visores y sombrilla para usar en la playa.

CONS- El lugar es muy pequeño, faltaban utensilios para cocinar, no cuenta más que con un fregadero y algunos vasos, platos y cubiertos, estaba algo sucio y había cabellos en los muebles, el general el edificio es viejo, no hay lugar para estacionarse cerca que no sea de pago.
Apartamento muy cómodo, baño, toallas y sábanas muy limpias y tv enorme. Muy céntrico con suoermercados al lado y la parada del bus muy cerca!

Ok room with good beds. Small kitchen, bathroom and lanai. Big fridge. I loved to drink my morning- and afternoontea at the lanai. The room was clean. Good location. We recomed the Blue sky thai massasge  nearby! My daughters and I loved it before a long flight home!

Small room in a great location. Affordable, but not particularly clean. The place felt very grungy (we didn’t even want to use their linen, so we went to Walmart and bought new for $13.00). There were garbage bags filled with garbage under my bed, which was, needless to say, disgusting. I told the host about it...

The building security personal were particularly rude. Building is older. Halls, not our room though, smelled like pot. 

Host was very accommodating and communicative. 

We did enjoy our stay.
Well located, check in and out easy.
this location was phenomenal.

This place was clean. It had everything you need for a short stay and the beds were comfortable too. You can reach every spot easily from where it’s located. 
I would stay again.

The place is awesome because of this location and value. Because of that I saved a lot of time and money. From the place I could walk just a few steps to Hilton Waikiki village, which is full of bars, restaurants, shops and to the beach. There are a lot of activities on the beach, surfing, volleyball, and even a small marina. The place is nice, clean,  and has everything to stay there, full-size bathroom, cable TV and a small kitchen, so I made there my breakfast absolutely comfortable. 
Thank you guys so much! Hopefully I will back soon! Mahalo!
The location is AMAZING!!! The room is clean and had the basics of what you need. We would be happy to stay there again!
The location of the house is good. But some facilities are too old and need to be updated.

It's a smaller apartment, the door to the patio was a big hassle as it was broken but over all if your just looking for a place to sleep & spend little time this isn't bad. The owner was very responsive and understandable. It was expensive for what the room was but the location of it is nice as it is not to far from everything in waikiki.

와이키키해변에서 놀꺼라면 위치 좋아요
드라이기 있어요
주차장은 제공되지 않아요. 에이러와이 대로에 무료로 주차 할 수 있어서 활용했습니다.
수건은 처음에 1인당 한개 주고요 교환해주지 않아요
주방은 전자레인지는 있지만 취사는 불가능합니다
힐튼호텔 와이키키 해변 등에 걸어다닐 수 있을만한 좋은 위치에 있습니다. 내부에서 요리는 불가능 하지만 전자레인지를 이용하거나 물을 데울수는 있습니다. 다만 내부 주차장은 이용 불가능하니 차량 랜트 할 경우 참고 바랍니다~ 가격대 성능비 만족입니다!
Great place to lay your head. Not a huge space. But you don’t want to spend a bunch of time in a room when your in Hawaii. Giant tub, two beds and a very clean pool location
il manque une plaque de cuisson et une cafetière
Great, thanks.

name: Hale Honulei
summary: 2 Bed/2 full Bath brand new home with Dual Master Bedrooms is just steps from the short Beach Access Path. Dual A/C, gated parking, outdoor lanai, granite counters, full size kitchen and washer/dryer. Residential area with genuine local character.
space: This newly constructed 1050 sqft home  is a great location as it sits across the street from an access path to the Sandy Beach.  You will be able enjoy the sound of the waves from the rocking chairs on the front lanai and be ready to grab your gear and walk across the street to the beach. If you need to run back to the house you're super close by. The house is comfortable with A/C throughout, and all brand new construction with the many benefits that affords.  The design of this floor-plan is the Dual Master Bedroom concept. Both bedrooms are the same sq.ft. size and both have their private bathroom en-suite, one bedroom at the front of the house has a King size bed and the one toward the back of the house has Queen size bed and a private entrance to the outside of the home for your ease in coming and going. It accommodates up to 4 people comfortably and is best suited for 2 couples, however 5th/6th guests would do fine with the Memoryfoam pull out twin bed and/or couch in the living r
description: 2 Bed/2 full Bath brand new home with Dual Master Bedrooms is just steps from the short Beach Access Path. Dual A/C, gated parking, outdoor lanai, granite counters, full size kitchen and washer/dryer. Residential area with genuine local character. This newly constructed 1050 sqft home  is a great location as it sits across the street from an access path to the Sandy Beach.  You will be able enjoy the sound of the waves from the rocking chairs on the front lanai and be ready to grab your gear and walk across the street to the beach. If you need to run back to the house you're super close by. The house is comfortable with A/C throughout, and all brand new construction with the many benefits that affords.  The design of this floor-plan is the Dual Master Bedroom concept. Both bedrooms are the same sq.ft. size and both have their private bathroom en-suite, one bedroom at the front of the house has a King size bed and the one toward the back of the house has Queen size bed and a private ent
neighborhood_overview: It's a small neighborhood, not a tourist area. This is an old fashioned family area with respectful residents... it is a blending of the old and the new, both the family generations and their homes. This is most definitely a small vintage town feel in a residential area of Oahu with local flair. There is a strong cohesiveness and lively sense of longevity. It's common to see neighbors visit in the yards and help one another with whatever is going on and everyone has a friendly word to say or at least a smile and wave. You will also commonly see fishermen all along the beach, as well as outrigger canoe rowers practicing when in season. This area has many popular activities including fishing, surfing, boogie boarding and snorkeling. You will see all these happening daily along with local families coming and going for their daily routines. It's definitely authentic residential Hawaii.
notes: Please tell us a little about you with your inquiry and what brings you to visit the islands. Helps us get to know you a little as well:) Sales Tax (4.712%) and TA Tax (9.25%) are included in the price. The security deposit is not charged in advance at the time of booking, and will never be charged to you unless a claim for damage is made upon departure. You may notice slight pricing differences due to holiday periods or short term discounts offered. Please check the calendar for daily rates. An interesting piece of local history= the original home on this property was the very first on this street way back in the late 30's....We have just updated it to current standards.  To give you a little history of this particular vintage area called Ewa Beach Road... it was originally developed in the 1930's for summer homes at Oceanfront for the upper class of Honolulu and the command class of the military with Property Lots which are typically 50' wide and 200-300' deep creating privacy and so
transit: A car would be the most convenient way to utilize this vacation house due to the residential neighborhood setting. There are bus lines close by but the routes are very limited getting to the sightseeing areas of the island. It is very centrally located to all the best amenities as you can see by looking at our location on the map. There are no grocery stores or shops within walking distance, but there is a small convenience store about a block down the street.
access: Guests may come and go at their leisure knowing they have private gated parking and a fully complete home for their comforts while vacationing. Washer and Dryer provided.
interaction: This home is styled as a duplex with the "Hale Honulei" unit in the front and a long term rental unit in the back. I have a delightful military couple as long term tenants who sometimes help as additional property managers. My guests who stay at "Hale Honulei" will be sharing the entrance gate and driveway with them but otherwise are completely independent of one another. Washer/Dryer and BBQ are not shared. They will respect your privacy.

host.host_about: My husband and I have been together for 26 yrs. We came to visit Hawaii over 20yrs ago, fell in love with the islands, sold everything we had and moved! The thought was if we fail, no harm done! I feel blessed every day to call Hawaii home. Although I do miss my family on the mainland, I (we) have our other half with us here, Mother and Father in law moved here 12+ yrs  and my Brother and sister in law just 2+ years ago! Being able to get together every Sunday to cook and enjoy each other is something I don’t take for granted.  Love the ocean, with my favorite past time now which is stand up paddle boarding. I was a Dental Assistant for a total of 18 yrs, then quit to help my husband run his construction company. Never did I think I would be doing a bnb, (always have done long term) but oh how I enjoy it!! Love people and enjoy them seeing the islands for their first time or coming back for more to do something they missed or needs repeating...never can one see it all. I hope you will come and enjoy our little slice of Hawaii here on the west side of the island.

reviews.comments: This place is truly serene. If you are trying to capture the true Hawaiian essence then this is the place. The neighbors were extremely friendly and the ambiance is surreal. I will definitely be back. Mahalo

We loved the feel of this neighborhood,  it didn't feel touristy, but made you feel like you are living in Hawaii.  The beach was great for morning coffee and sunrises.  Our hosts help us find things geared to our interests and were always responsive to our questions.

The house is all newly done, very clean and nicely decorated. The beach is more for boogie boarding, with rocks and coral to be aware of. Great location to explore the island from--If you can avoid rush hour traffic. Beds were very comfortable!!
Anyone would love to stay here. Michele thought of every detail and the home is spotless. Great access to the beach with all the beach stuff you need.
Very accommodating
Loved all of the swimming and snorkeling gear provided by Michele. Very relaxing place to stay. Nice and spacious.

We loved the house which was better in person than in the photos.  Michele, the host, was very accommodating and helpful.  The house was centrally located for exploring O'ahu.  It took less than an hour to go anywhere on the island.  There were several stores and restaurants within 2 to 6 miles with plenty of parking unlike being downtown Honolulu or Waikiki.  We explored Honolulu, Waikiki, Hanauma Bay, the western side of the island,  the north shore, the eastern side, Pearl Harbor, and other parts of the island and was able to return to the house and relax.  It was a great trip.

We enjoyed staying at Michele's place at Ewa Beach.  We had spent time in Honolulu and were looking for something a little quieter on the west side of Oahu.  Michele's place fit the bill.  It was in a quiet neighborhood with very convenient beach access.  There was safe off street parking for two cars.  Michele was very thoughtful in providing a well equipped kitchen and welcoming drinks and snacks as well as soaps, shampoos, toilet paper, food wrap, etc to get you started before going to the store.  The beds were very comfortable.  Michele also supplied coolers, beach chairs, beach towels, snorkels, boogie boards, and beach shoes to protect your feet from the coral.  We couldn't have asked for a better set up.  Thanks for sharing your place with us.
Clean, well decorated home away from home! Walking distance to the beach! Quiet residential area. Driving distance to shops and sights!
Beautiful cozy place close to the beach. The ocean breeze is wonderful and if you need it colder there is AC.

Right from the start Michele makes you feel like your a part of her family. The house is in a neighborhood that is quiet & friendly. The beach is also quiet. We went out every morning to enjoy the waves, water (although you need to be mindful or the coral) and general peacefulness of the ocean. Very, very relaxing. The house has everything you need to enjoy yourself its just like home. The only thing that I can even think would be negative would be the rooster that lives on the street really can't be used as an alarm clock for the sunrise (think he sleeps in on weekends LOL). It is away from the hustle & bustle of the city but it is so nice to start & end your day as if your in your own home.
好房子,我很喜欢
Great place, close to the beach.

Location was great for seeing the whole island.  Location is an older residential neighborhood.  It is close to the beach but be very careful about the coral if you want to get in at the beach close to where the walkway to the beach ends.  Michele mentioned that swimming was better further down the beach toward the public park.  We were very busy going other places so did not have time to try that.  Michele had a book with ideas of what to do while we were there.  We tried out 3 of the eating ideas she recommended and they were great.  (Eating at the close by country club was a hidden gem.) Also, she suggested some specific places to be sure to see for various part of the island.  We followed a lot of her recommendations and she was available for our questions.
Very nice 2+2 house across the street from beach. Well maintained, gated and clean. Owner is very nice and easy to work with and location can not be beat. Well worth the price.

Michele set the bar high for our first Airbnb experience.  Her thoughtfulness and preparedness helped our family celebrate some important milestones she in our lives.  She made all aspects of the process exceptionally easy.  Your guidebook and extra amenities that help us enjoy the beach and our first morning was a beautiful gesture that eased us into the relaxation of your place! The property is a treasure on the island!  Mahalo, Michele!

Michele was great! She made us feel welcome and the check in and check out  process was easy. Her unit was clean and updated. One of the nicer places on the street. She provided everything you could possibly need from the kitchen to bathroom supplies and even beach and snorkeling gear. The location was great too. Literally a two minute walk to the beach in a quiet neighborhood. We even met a few of the neighbors who were very nice people.
This is a great place to stay if you want to see a great beach and all the amenities you will need for your stay.

This is a cozy little two bed two bath unit.  It's newly renovated, clean and comfortable.

We were out and about most of the day, but our evenings were quiet and peaceful there.  

The hostess, Michelle, is very friendly, hospitable and welcomed us upon arrival.
Great spot off the beaten path. Amazing location just off the beach. It's about 30-45 min ride into Waikiki and lots of traffic, but if you're looking for the local feel, this is totally it.

The first day of our Hawaii vacation was saved by our Airbnb hosts. Our arrival was delayed nine hours (Delta, and they charged us $500 on top. And lost our golf clubs). The rental car agency was closed. We arrived, finally, well into the night, to our Ewa Beach vacation home to find hosts patiently waiting, fresh baked cookies, fresh cut fruit, and lots of smiles. Thank you so much! Easy recommend.

Really enjoyed Michele's place. She thought of everything to help her guests feel at home. And her place looked just as clean and orderly as in the pictures posted online... didn't disappoint. A nice, cozy home away from home. :-)

What a delightful stay! Michele is a great host. She went out of her way to make us feel welcomed and cared for. She gave great recommendations and suggestions. The location of the home is centrally located to many sites. I highly  recommend Ewa Beach!
The house was lovely, clean, spacious and just what we wanted. it was also about 50 metres from the beautiful beach! Our host was great too! Couldn't have been any better. Thanks a lot!

This place was in a great location. Easy access to freeways, Pearl Harbor and the beach. The home was immaculate and fully stocked with beach stuff (towels, snorkeling gear, coolers and chairs etc). The beds were comfy and bathrooms roomy. AC units were silent and worked really well. Michele met us for check in and offered tips on places to eat and was really welcoming. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely come back. Mahalo!!!

If you’re thinking about booking this place —DO IT!

It was the perfect home base for our week long Oahu getaway. Michelle was out of town when we arrived but Amy met us at the house to give us the lowdown when we first arrived. She was very informative and made check in easy. We were in awe at the beauty of the house that the pictures absolutely don’t do justice. The short walk to the beach was an added bonus.

Inside the house was everything we could think of. Snorkel gear, towels, sarongs, we were in a wedding while we were there and the steam cleaner was our saving grace and came in such handy!! We never would have thought there would be one on hand. They definitely thought of it all when it came to this house.

The beds were the most comfy thing you can imagine. At night we would rush home to jump in bed. We stayed at Aulani one night because that’s where the wedding we were in was and we all collectively agreed we preferred the beds at our beach home over the ones at Aulani.

Location is perfect. 20 mins to Aulani, 30 mins from Honolulu, and not far from just about anything else you’d like.

We will never forget our time we spent in Ewa Beach and can’t wait to come back and stay there again!

Hale Honulei was the perfect place for our family to stay while on O’ahu for 5 days. Michele and her husband were wonderful hosts and very helpful with our questions and concerns. Updated accommodations, well stocked kitchen, only 1 block off Ewa Beach with easy access to shopping and sightseeing attractions. We would highly recommend this Airbnb rental.

quiet location ,blocks from a very nice beach ,so easy to get to other tourist spots ,lots of shopping and resteraunts in the area. Michele has everything in the house that you can possibly need to make your stay very pleasant.
A great home to stay in Michele was a terrific host!  I would stay there again.

We spent 5 days in Michele's place and enjoyed the stay very much!

Michele is super nice and welcoming; she prepared an easy instruction about self check-in, a good pack of Hawaiian snacks and drinks and coffee <3 She is quick in response and helpful providing local information for tours and daily runs (yes! running as a local is fun).

The place is clean and has everything -- living room, TV, kitchen, washer/dryer. They provide gears for beach activities too.

The location is off Waikiki and requires some driving from and to the Honolulu airport, especially when there's traffic (40-50 in rush hours unfortunately). However the neighborhood is quiet and relaxing. The Ewa Beach is < 50 feet away and you can enjoy the sunrise, sunset, and the Honolulu skyline, a luxury gift!

I'd definitely recommend the place for people who love tranquility; I'd come back to stay for next trips too.

Perfect house if you are looking to stay in the Ewa Beach area. Plenty of room in the front yard for the kids to play. Walkable to the beach. Rooms were clean and spacious. The host also provided us with beach mats, beach towels etc. We loved staying here and will probably stay again.
Very nice place to stay.   Clean, comfortable and tastefully decorated.
Michele's place was located minutes to the beach and had everything we needed. She was a great host and super responsive in making sure we were enjoying our stay. I would definitely book here again.
Great value and place walking distance to the beach in the quiet town of ewa beach.  Michelle is very responsive to questions.

We loved Michele’s place! It was the perfect location and space for a couple relaxing days after a crazy, active vacation. Local neighborhood, out of the hub-bub of Waikiki, yet close enough if you want a dose of the city. Super close and easy access to the beach. 

The house was very clean, organized and had all you may need as far as beach supplies, shampoo, soap and such. 

Michele was a joy to work with - friendly, quick to respond and accommodating to our needs when she could. 

Thank you, Michele, for a wonderful place.

If you are looking for a great place to stay near the water in Ewa Beach you will not go wrong with this rental.  The little extras that Michelle includes are not found in other rentals. Michelle’s rental is very clean.

We love Ewa Beach!  Our 3rd stay here (first at this house though) and it never disappoints. The beach is only a quick 1 minute walk through a public path, where we watched the sun rise every morning with our coffee, and sun set every evening. We only saw a couple of people on the beach each time (mostly for the sun rises) so it's a pleasant contrast to the busy beaches elsewhere. We only had to walk a little ways down the beach to find a sandy entrance to the water (a lot of that area close to the path has coral) where we spent a lot of time snorkeling & exploring.  
The house is very equipped, with all the dishes & appliances you need, and we even had homemade banana nut bread & fresh fruit waiting for us when we arrived. The beds were extremely comfortable, and even our party of 5 stayed comfortably in there. The ottoman pulls out into a bed, which our friend slept comfortably on the entire week. 
Also, there are a couple snorkels, boogie boards, grass mats, coolers, chairs, etc. Seriously, you really have everything you need. 
Overall a great stay & we wouldn't hesitate to book this place again.  Michele was an extremely friendly host & has an amazingly stocked house for all your needs! Thank you again!

We had such a great stay with Michele . Such a relaxing place and very quick drive to Ko Olina lagoons which was perfect for my small keiki . We will definitely be back ! 
Aloha
Nice cozy place for couples and families, very clean and good equipped. Great host, beautiful place. Thanks!

Michelle's rental is a great 2 bedroom home.   The beds are comfortable with roomy attached bathrooms.   While the location is several miles west of Pearl Harbor and Honolulu, access to everything is easy.  The location is quite and has easy access to the beach.
This private house was in a great location for the beach as well as road access. Clean, comfortable but the amazing number of little details made this place fantastic. Michelle is a great hostess

Michele was a fantastic host! She met us upon arrival to the home and was very welcoming and helpful. This lovely two bedroom home was comfy, cute and had all the necessities we needed and more! As mentioned in Michele’s post, the beach is close by! Walking distance - it literally took us a minute to get there. For our second time in Oahu - my boyfriend, friends and I had a blast! We definitely hope this home will be available next year when we return! 

Thanks again for your hospitality!

The neighborhood is, at first sight, questionable; however, the home is behind an electronic gate and very secure. The neighborhood turned out to be quiet and welcoming. Michele's home is sparkling clean and the décor is tasteful. The kitchen is well stocked.
Nice place and great location.

Michele was an amazing hostess. Even though we had a late evening arrival, she was available to meet us at the vacation home. She made sure we settled in the beach house and gave us a little tour of the place.

Not one detail was overlooked. The beach house had beach towels, beach chairs, water shoes, snorkels, fins, (Hidden by Airbnb) s, lots of tour guides to choose from, and even umbrellas in case it rained. 

We particularly enjoyed the darling porch with cushioned rocking chairs for winding down in the warm evening air.

The beds were super comfortable and each bedroom had its own ensuite bathroom with mini split air conditioning which kept the house nice & cool while we were there. 

Overall we had a wonderful stay at Michele’s beach house and would stay again.

Thank you Michele!

This house is nicely done. Perfect for two couples. The beds were comfortable. It is well maintained and clean. It is a gated property. AC in both bedrooms. It was well stocked too. Michele was a great host and responded to any questions we had. Would definitely recommend this home.

Michele’s home was great!  It was clean, well equipped, one block to the beach, with many golf courses to choose from within five miles.
Restaurants, shops, and supermarkets were five minutes away. 
Great place to stay. We highly recommend it.
Preston and Joanne

If you are looking for a quiet place to stay for a base for exploring Oahu ,this is the place to chose. It is-well laid out and supplied with all the essentials.
Michele is a super host that adds a lot of little extras to the house that makes your stay memorable. She will pass on many tips and information about attractions and must sees and do on the island.
Not let the the off the beaten path neighbourhood fool you it is a gem among the pebbles.

We really enjoyed our stay un Ewa Beach. Michele was a great host, with direct contact and taking care of us before our arrival. She gave us a delicious homemade banana bread as a wellcome gift, and made us feel as at home. The house was much better than in pictures, very clean and comfortable, with all the amenities. We trully recommend Michele's place!
The stay was wonderful. Very nice people and comfortable home.
We had an amazing time here and would come back again. The space was just as described and Michele and Amy provided everything we needed for our trip. So much better than a hotel!

Best Airbnb ever! This place has it all; close to the beach, great amentities, personal touches throughout the home, and the most comfortable king bed ever. There was cold water/beverages  and snacks awaiting our arrival, snorkel gear, boogie boards, towels, and a sparkling clean house. I couldn’t have asked for more and our family of four had a fabulous time! Mahalo Michele!

Michele’s place was everything we were looking for and more. The house itself was beautiful, perfectly clean, and conveniently located on the island of Oahu. She was an incredibly gracious host, and was easily reachable and responded quickly whenever we had even the simplest question. She also made us feel right at home when she made a welcome board with our names and some pineapple as a gift! Her house is equipped with everything you could need during your exploration of Oahu, from snorkels to beach chairs, boogie boards, coolers, and more. If I️ was returning to Oahu, Michele’s house would be my first choice.
Literally walked across the street and my feet were in the sand!  Great front porch, with a terrific breeze. A great stay!

This beautiful home was well suited for our family of 3. We had family visit as well. Your home was in a very  good location for our stay . Just steps away from the beach. Not crowded. Access to all stores & destinations was great.

The house was super clean and exactly how it was pictured.  Such a perfect space for our family of four!  Beautifully decorated and very spacious.   House was fully stocked and made it so much easier for us to start our vacation right away instead of spending a ton of time shopping. Loved having such a private lot!
Clean, updated, private without the hustle and bustle and crowds of Waikiki. Easy enough drive to popular sightseeing spots and the host is very welcoming and responsive!

Michele’s home had everything we could have imagined.  It was in a great location to all parts of the island.  The beach was just like having our own private beach!  We enjoyed our mornings there!  All the extras were appreciated including beach chairs, towels, snorkel gear!!!  The home was spotless and welcoming!  
I am known to be pretty picky with places to stay and my expectations were exceeded!  We would highly recommend Michele as a host and her amazing home!!  Mahalo Michele, we hope to come back to Hawaii someday!

Best place to stay quietly apart from loud Waikiki and also perfect for two couples. Each room is very clean and equipped  with A/C and bathroom. Good for cooking. Absolutely best house for the money.

The whole place is so nice! I have been traveled all over the world. I can say this place is even better than some five star hotel! I will highly recommend all of you who travel to Honolulu to stay here! Thanks again Michele!
Clean, comfortable and cozy little house. Great communication with the host. Many extras that made it feel like home!

This accommodation was perfect for our family of four, especially with two bathrooms, and the well-stocked kitchen was a real bonus!   The house was very clean, comfortable and had everything we needed for our stay.  We would recommend a rental car, and we were provided with great off-street parking for it.  Michele is a great communicator and we were very happy with how quickly she responded and attended to anything we needed.  We also appreciated the book of tips - places to go, places to eat etc which were really helpful as it was our first time in Hawaii :)
Michele’s home was adequately filled with everything you needed and more. The home accommodated my family of 3 and my parents very well.  Definitely a place we would stay again when visiting Oahu.
Nice place for a nice getaway
It was wonderful!

Michele's property is very well appointed and convenient to public beach (with residences along the coast on Ewa Beach).  Lots of extras provided to facilitate families and kids in particular, like coolers, chairs for beach, snorkel gear including fins, etc.  We enjoyed our stay and Michele was available and offered to help in any way to make our visit special.  Kudos to you Michele; bravo.  Thanks

From reading the reviews and seeing the pictures I was already expecting a lot. However, our stay was even better than expected. Michele was very quick to answer any questions we had. The place was in a great location in Ewa Beach, and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay again and highly recommend it to anyone considering it.

We had an incredible stay!! From the moment we arrived our expectations were exceeded! The bread Michele baked for us was delicious and we felt so welcome in her home! We settled in very quickly as the house is in a quiet residential street. The beds were so incredible comfortable....I don't think I've ever slept that well outside of my own home! The kitchen was well equipped and the fridge had tons of space. The bedrooms had A/C which was one of the most needed amenities coming from the mainland! ;) The on-site residents were quiet and kept to themselves, but when we did meet, were super friendly! The beach access is very close and convenient and all the beach toys/chairs were available to use. I loved especially the little things in the home that made our stay extra special and easy like the coolers for food, beach towels, DVDs, loads of extra bath towels, and a little note on the chalk board welcoming us! We have no negative things to say about Michele's place and would love to come stay again one day! Mahalo!
Had a great time. Everything was as described. Great hosts.

Our group of 3 absolutely loved our stay at Michele's. The place is so clean, has great amenities and a huge bonus the bed was so comfortable (I slept on the queen).  Michele has EVERYTHING you need for a beach day, we even tried her boogie boards. The location was great for us, about a 30-40 min drive to our favorite beach Kailua Beach Park. Eva beach across the street had some of the best sunsets/ moon rises I've ever experienced. 100% would stay here again.

This place was just perfect. Literally 1 block from the beach . The home was super clean with all the creature comforts. We even found things that we didn’t expect.and, when I asked about a blender, she made one available. 

Super clean. Super comfy. AC in both bedrooms and it coed the home. There were snorkels, gina, bath and beach towels. 

This was just plain lovely.

Great place! Close to the beach. Beach was a little rocky but a short walk from the beach path was a place that was not so rocky. I felt very safe the whole time there. The neighbors were all very sweet. Michele was an awesome host! I definitely recommend to anyone!

Michele was an outstanding host.  Very quick responses/great communication and very clean and stylish home.  She provided us with homemade banana bread and there was a lot of attention paid to details to ensure our stay was as comfortable as possible.  She even provided us with a beach umbrella after we were unable to find one to rent or buy.  We had a wonderful stay.

You will NOT be disappointed in this choice for the Ewa Beach area on Oahu!! The house has EVERYTHING you will need .... just fill in with your specific groceries .... and walk to the beach or head out on the road!!

Great, centrally located, comfortable little house.  It had all the amenities we needed and Michele was very receptive to communication!  Please be warned, if you want to be steps from the downtown action, this is not the place for you.  However, if you want a quiet, relaxing neighborhood 30 minutes from ANYWHERE in Oahu,  this is perfect!  Steps from the beach for those sunrises/sunsets was a wonderful bonus.  Thank you so much Michele!!
The place was sparkling clean, had everything we needed and more. Having the uncrowded beach across the street was awesome. Nice to have air conditioning too. It was perfect!

We loved staying in Ewa Beach, away from the bustle of Honolulu and Waikiki and just walking distance from the beautiful shoreline. We are so grateful for Michele’s greeting and having every amenity available - coffee, creamer, tons of kitchen extras and even water shoes for the rocky bits of the beach. There are boogie boards and a few puzzles which thrilled our boys age 2 & 4. We had an amazing time! The beds were super comfortable - better than any other place we’ve stayed!

Michele will meet you at the front gate of house and give you a tour of living space, and all accommodations. Michele will make you fill very welcomed and show you around neighborhood.!! We all stated we would recommend staying at Michele's place again.!!

Michele's home was amazing! Definitely large enough for our group of 5 (2 couples and 1 single) and extremely well stocked with anything that we could possibly need to cook or store. She also had an array of beach toys that we enjoyed taking out and using. Michele even made us delicious banana bread one of the days that we were there. Yum! Our group cannot wait to come back to Hawaii and visit Michele again, she was a great host.

Wonderful location less than a block from beautiful Ewa Beach where you can watch both sunrises and sunsets!  Home made banana bread, snacks and drinks we so thoughtful!  Great selection of beach gear in wonderful condition. Comfy and spacious for our family of three with everything you need. Lots of towels for all - both bath and beach. Games too. Thanks for a wonderful stay Michele!!

Very nice house in a not at all touristy party of the island.  The owner is friendly and responsive.  The space is very good for families and the owner had preceded lots of nice beach amenities: beach towels, water shoes, biggie board, snorkels and beach chairs.  I would recommend this as a good base for exploring the West side of the island.
You can ex

Michele is a great host, she met us at the property and was very helpful with local information on places to eat and things to do/see.  The home had a  lot of little extra touches for guests.  We made use of the drying rack and even borrowed a pair of water shoes for a stroll on the beach.  There were snacks/treats in the kitchen as well as great coffee/tea set up, some condiments, etc.  When my nail polish got chipped I took a look for polish remover and was surprised to find it available.  There were plenty of towels/washcloths for the bathrooms and having a washing machine/dryer was very helpful to us.  Michele was very personable and eager to make our stay comfortable.  She is a very gracious host and the home is lovely, spacious and well appointed.  The neighborhood homes are not all consistently maintained and some are a bit run down and need some TLC,  but we felt safe and comfortable here and would recommend this place to anyone.
Excellence... that’s what you will experience when you stay at Michele’s place!!
We spent great time in your house.
It’s a great place in an amazing location. Easy to travel from. The locals are amazing and friendly and the beach is beautiful! We look forward to returning!
This was a great place to stay on Oahu.  It is super clean and Michele is a wonderful host!  We had everything we needed during our stay!

와이키키에서 좀 떨어진 지역이지만 렌트카를 이용한다면 충분히 가능한 곳입니다. 우선 동네가 조용하고 정말 현지인들이 어떤 곳에서 생활하는지 알 수 있고, 조용란 바닷가가 바로 앞에 있어서 물놀이하기도 좋아요. 호스트는 매우 친절하고 궁금한게
있을 때 바로바로 알려주고, 추천 식당은 다 성공적이었어요. 저희 가족 모두 만족스러워했습니다.

Right from the get go Michele was an amazing host, we got in very late and she was very helpful with the check-in anyway. She even left us some fresh banana bread for us to have at our arrival! The beach across the road was awesome to have and all the extras to be used were great.
The only down side was the neighbor’s dog who likes to bark through the night. It is nothing Michele can control and it wasn’t every single night, but for a light sleeper like me  it was a bit annoying.
But on that note everything else was over and beyond what anyone could ask.

We wanted a place away from the tourist areas and this definitely fit the bill—not an ABC store for miles. Michele’s home offered the right amount of comfort and amenities. Super clean. Loved the lanai for morning coffee and pau hana drinks. It’s just a 30-yard jog to the beach. Note that her home is in a humble working-class community. On the street you will pass the random appliance on the side of the road and hear a barking dog or a motorcycle or two. But it’s very quiet and chill, you get the real deal Hawai’i. Thanks Michele!

I booked Michele's place for my parents & another couple traveling with them.  It would be my parents first Airbnb experience so I wanted to make sure it was a great one.  From the first time I messaged Michele all the way until check in when she greeted them with kindness (and banana bread), I knew my parents would be taken care of.  They said the house was filled with everything they needed.  The street felt safe and they talked to a lot of the "locals" that lived there.  The walkway to the beach was just a house or so over which they thought was nice.  Overall it was a great experience for my parents & their friends and I was happy that I chose Michele's place to send them to!

This home was amazing. It’s a very clean and beautiful place to stay and walking distance to the beach. The location was great and walking distance to the beach. Michele made it very easy to check in and out and offers all the amenities of home. What a gem of a place. You won’t go wrong with this place!
Very clean great location! Michele is great to work with.

What a clean and comfortable home base. I've never stayed in a rental that had so many things available for your use. If you have it at your house, chances are it's here. Close to everything, you won't be disappointed here. Great for two couples. Each has a great ensuite, with comfy space to share.

10/10 will stay again! This is the perfect beach house. Walking distance to a locally owned corner store that serves hot homemade food fresh daily and a 3min drive to a locals beach. Michele is a great host! She's prompt to communicate, and keeps her home perfectly stocked for guests! There are 10+ beach towels, snorkeling gear, chairs, body board, sunscreen, you name it, already at the home. Can't wait until my next trip

name: Kona by the Sea
summary: My place is close to the ocean, 1st floor ocean front condo. You’ll love my place because of the views and proximity to restaurants and shopping. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: Other Things to note: HAWAII STATE TAX WILL BE ADDED TO THE DAY RATE and sent to you in a special offer. Incorporated in the cleaning fee is our  Elite Service Fee ($125 flat fee - properties with a starting nightly rate of $249 or less $195 flat fee - properties with a starting nightly rate of $250 to $749 $295 flat fee - properties with a starting nightly rate of $750 or greater). All resort fees are not included in this rental charge.
description: My place is close to the ocean, 1st floor ocean front condo. You’ll love my place because of the views and proximity to restaurants and shopping. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Other Things to note: HAWAII STATE TAX WILL BE ADDED TO THE DAY RATE and sent to you in a special offer. All resort fees are not included in this rental charge.
house_rules: TV: To Turn on the TV press:     TV- Power and then Cable- Power  Kitchen: There are instruction manuals for the appliances located in the storage room by the washer and dryer. The water purifier “PUR” will work in the down position and will swivel up and off for regular use. Do NOT purify HOT water, it will ruin the filter! When the “PUR” window shows all white, it needs a new filter.  Please be sure to close side windows if it may rain. The rain will not come in from the lanai, unless it is a major storm. A/C – Fans- Lights: Please turn off the fans and lights when you leave for an extended period and when you depart the island.  AC control is in the hallway by the Livingroom. Please maintain 75 -80 degrees F when in use. When in use, units should be set as follows:  AC- ON or COOL, Fan- AUTO (Please be mindful of electric use- Hawaii has the highest electric rates in the country. Lights off, AC only as needed, keep sliding doors and windows closed when AC is on, Hand wash small load

host.host_about:
Elite Pacific Properties is the leading luxury real estate brokerage and vacation rental firm in Hawaii, with over 100 agents statewide offering everything from luxury residential property sales to multi-unit projects/developer sales, to luxury vacation rentals. Elite Pacific Properties was founded in 2005 and is the only luxury real estate firm with staffed offices on each of Oahu, Maui, Kauai, and the Big Island.

Elite Pacific Properties is a member of Who’s Who In Luxury Real Estate, an exclusive organization of the top luxury brokers in the world; has been named to Inc. Magazine’s prestigious national  “Inc. 5000” list for both 2013 and 2014; and been ranked by Pacific Business News as the 9th fastest growing company in Hawaii on its 2014 Fastest 50 list.

Our Vacation Rental Division reflects our high standards of excellence. With over 70 professionally managed luxury homes available for vacation rentals throughout Hawaii, we are committed to making sure that our vacation clients experience the very best in quality, delivery and outstanding service.

Active Member of:
- (VRMA) Vacation Rental Managers Association
- (NAR) National Association of Realtors
- (HAR) Hawaii Association of Realtors
- (HBR) Honolulu Board of Realtors

name: Spacious modern studio with amazing views
summary: With stunning views overlooking Randwick Racecourse, this brand new, fully furnished studio apartment merges style with practicality. Sydney's CBD, FOX Studios, Surry Hills, Centennial Park, airport and Sydney's famous, eastern suburbs' beaches including Bondi are all under 15 minutes drive. With underground secure parking and close public transport your new home away from home will provide a hub from which to see the best Sydney has to offer. When possible I allow for early/late check in/out.
space: The apartment is completely furnished including a 50inch 4k, UHD SMART TV with streaming services Netflix and Stan. Ample built in storage space and floor to ceiling glass doors make for a light filled and spacious environment, elegantly complimented by Scandinavian furniture. The designer bathroom is modern, practical and chic. The kitchen is complete with all the amenities you expect to find in a modern kitchen and it's ergonomical use of space allows for maximum efficiency without feeling constrained.  Apartment also includes:  -Washer & Dryer -Aircon & ceiling fan -Secure underground parking -Wooden Floorboards -Spare linens -four seater dining table
description: With stunning views overlooking Randwick Racecourse, this brand new, fully furnished studio apartment merges style with practicality. Sydney's CBD, FOX Studios, Surry Hills, Centennial Park, airport and Sydney's famous, eastern suburbs' beaches including Bondi are all under 15 minutes drive. With underground secure parking and close public transport your new home away from home will provide a hub from which to see the best Sydney has to offer. When possible I allow for early/late check in/out. The apartment is completely furnished including a 50inch 4k, UHD SMART TV with streaming services Netflix and Stan. Ample built in storage space and floor to ceiling glass doors make for a light filled and spacious environment, elegantly complimented by Scandinavian furniture. The designer bathroom is modern, practical and chic. The kitchen is complete with all the amenities you expect to find in a modern kitchen and it's ergonomical use of space allows for maximum efficiency without feeling cons
notes: Horses train every morning from 3am to 10am. The best time is while the sun is rising over the racetrack. Kensington is in the middle of some of Sydney's best suburbs. This not only makes transportation easy, but provides an abundance of good choices when ordering ubereats. Upcoming race days: December 16th - Inglis Villiers Stakes Day December 26th - International Passport Race Day December 30th - Randwick Race Day January 1st - Randwick Race Day January 13th - Randwick Race Day
transit: Bus stop within 200 meters provide direct transport to Coogee, Bondi, Entertainment district, airport and city. Get to the heart of the CBD in less than 15 minutes.
access: All bed linen, bath towels, washers and soaps are supplied. Tea, coffee, organic milk, are also provided. 50" UHD Smart TV on swing bracket allows for viewing from the couch, bed, or balcony. Tv also includes Streaming services Stan & Netflix.
interaction: I always try to meet guests personally at the property for key hand over and a brief introduction. I can also assist with luggage if guests are arriving by train or bus.

reviews.comments: Great location, great studio and unique atmosphere with views over the horse race track! I would definitely stay there again. Oliver is a great guy and it was a breeze to communicate with him! I had an awesome stay!

Had a lovely stay with my girlfriend. The view off the balcony was absolutely amazing, felt like a 5 star hotel. Oliver was very accommodating and gave us some handy tips for things to do in the area - thanks so much for such a great stay!

This was my first airbnb and I can hardly put this property into words. The place was clean and comfortable and the view from the balcony was amazing. Waking up in the morning and hearing the horses clip clopping around Randwick racecourse was special and unique. Oliver was super accomodating and he was a great host. I was only there for a night but will definitely stay again!

Your search is over. Amazing central location, close to everything.  Modern, clean space. Well equipped kitchen. The host is easily available and really knowledgeable about the area. Highly recommend.
Second stay with Oliver. Can't recommend his place enough. Close to everything!

Lovely modern place in a perfect location for the Racecourse, had everything we needed, and everything was pretty much brand new. Oliver was really helpful, whole apartment was spotless, wish we could've stayed longer!
Great place, really spacious and amazing views of the Randwick Race course.
Really good staying in Oliver's apartment. Nice view and quiet. Close to public transportation. Would love to stay next time!

Oliver is a great host and we find his place suitably located for our purpose i.e. very near UNSW. His studio is also very clean and adequately equipped. He even provided drinks, a fruit basket, ice cream etc! Thanks Oliver. We will certainly be back.
Oliver was a great host and made our stay extremely easy. The apartment is clean and cool set-up with the TV. View from the balcony is fantastic.

This is a very nice clean studio, if like Horse Riding this is your spot, the place is very clean in safe neighborhood, Oliver was very helpful with the check in process, and there many good stuff such as coffee, beer, oatmeal, butter, cleaning stuff, dish washer, washing machine, drying machine etc.. It was A+ stay keep up the good work guys thanks for everything

Oliver has been absolutely awesome. Communication is so easy. The apartment is clean and neat. Travelled for work so bus to CBD is only 17mins away. Everything you need is all there. Even Netflix to relax after a busy day at work. Would definitely will come back to stay when I am back. Thank you Oliver!

This is my 2nd time stayed there, and this apt is still amazingly wonderful. The view is really good, nice ambiance, clean and quiet. It's really family friendly.

The host also very kind, they prepared everything nicely before we came to the apt. They really cooperative and helpful.

Last time i came, they even put welcoming fresh fruits & milk.

Definitely will be back there again when i come to Syd!

This is our second time in 3 months that we are back to this place. That tells a lot of my preference for this airbnb. We love the location - near shops and restaurants and especially its proximity to UNSW where my son is now studying. It is clean and well equipped. To top it all, Oliver is a great host being very flexible and responsive. I would highly recommend his place to everyone.

Nice place with a fantastic view of the race track 
Clean and cozy

Beautiful and modern furnished apartment with a great Location.
Communication with Oliver was very good and easy.

Olivers place is absolutely beautiful! 
It has a stunning view over the racecourse, so it's a very quiet and peaceful part of Sydney. The apartment was so clean with a very elegant and sophisicted style, I felt so comfortable and right at home. The location is perfect for getting around anywhere in Sydney, close public transport and only a 10 minute drive to city, double bay, Alexandria- it's perfect! 
I will definitely be staying again! 
Thanks Oliver :)
You just need to bring your shirt and all set!

My husband and I stayed here for a week. The place is great, it had everything we needed.

We checked in on a Saturday (race day) and got to watch some of the horses race by from the balcony...with a glass of wine! I also enjoyed watching the horses being trained/walked early in the mornings. 

The TV was huge and we enjoyed watching Netflix/Stan. Having WiFi was also a bonus.

We would definitely recommend friends/family to stay here. We would stay again.

Thanks Oliver!
Olivers place is great very quite peaceful areas in Sydney eastern suburbs beautiful new apartment with views of the racecourse Oliver is a great host easy to communicate with for check in and out

Oliver's place is in a really unique location.  When it said trackside at Randwick I didn't really expect that I would be able to sit on the lovely balcony watching the horse train in the morning, like I was in a track side grandstand but that is exactly what happened! It is spacious for a studio, thoughtfully furnished and beautifully clean.  I really enjoyed my stay.

This apartment presented just as anticipated. Terrific location quiet, relaxing, light comfortable and sunny. We only ate in for breakfast but having breakfast on the balcony in the sun with the horses training and the picturesque Randwick Racecourse on your door step was quite special. Oliver was very welcoming and leaving a bowl of fresh fruit on the dining table was a very nice touch. Highly recommend this property
Oliver's place is spot on.  It's easy to see why he receives such great reviews. Would recommend & will stay with Oliver again for sure.
Great stay here. Really excellent wifi, better than anywhere else in the country. Close to the bus stop, comfortable bed, nice tv with Netflix! Would stay again.
This place is amazing. Lovely location, place/furnishing looks just as great as the pictures. Extremely safe area as well. Oliver was a great host with quick responses!

My daughter and I had a wonderful stay at Oliver's place at 'The Stables'.  It is new, fresh, comfortable with everything you need and a beautiful balcony opening up to the breeze. We really enjoyed the view overlooking the racecourse, and loved watching the horses getting walked past the apartment. We needed to stay close to the Prince of Wales hospital and I particularly liked that there was a secure car parking space for our car.

Lovely spacious studio with lots of natural light and very modern! Close to bus stops which go to CBD/beaches etc. everything you could need in the apartment and great view right onto the racecourse, would highly recommend Oliver’s place to anyone, he was very helpful & efficient with any questions we had!

Oliver’s apartment is conveniently located and has good quality equipment. He is also very responsive. However it appears that he has not paid attention to the cleanliness aspect and we found the place to be quite unclean with used unwashed bed sheets and covers and smelly towels. The supplies were also running low and we had to replenish them (though he did reimburse us). The trash can had something sticky and gooey in it so we just used trash bags without the dustbin. The tea supplies were past expiry date. All in all an unpleasant experience - wouldn’t go there again. Oliver says his cleaners let him down! Anyway, he refunded the cleaning fees, but frankly I expected a clean place to begin with with a so called “5 Star” host. Spoiled our trip. Never again!

Great view of the racecourse and a good place to be away on business. Everything needed to cook a meal was there plus a stash of various sauces, herbs and spices. Mostly very quiet, but expect to hear the clip clop of horses passing by the window in the early morning.
This is a great place to stay and will make you feel to stay longer.  Nice place and amenities, close to everywhere.
Great place, convenient to the bus into town. Appreciated the condiments etc. Would stay again.

For my three day work stint at the UNSW this was a perfect base.  Clean, quiet and comfortable.  I liked the minimalist yet stylish decor.  The shower was great, and the kitchen had everything I needed and more.  Oliver is a lovely host.  
I needed his help with a couple of things and he was responsive and considerate.  An enjoyable stay.
Oliver was very helpful and responded to messages timely. The place was clean and has great amenities I needed, close to Unsw and nice restaurants in the area. Highly recommended

The apartment is exceptionally clean, comfortable and perfectly presented. Oliver is extremely hospitable and lightning fast with communication and thoughtfulness. He went above and beyond letting me drop off some luggage early. Easy check-in/ out and perfectly located for quietness, yet close to anything you need. Everything was much better than expected, don't hesitate to book this place because I will next time I have the opportunity. The view of the race track while having coffee each morning was pretty cool too!

Oliver's apartment is in a great location. 100m walk if you need to catch public transport or comes with a dedicated underground car spot if you  it.

Well fitted out with everything that I needed for my stay. Clean, fast wifi, netflix, comfy bed, view over Randwick racetrack, good cooking facilities and bathroom.

Oliver was quick to respond to any communication. Thanks Oliver for the stay.

Great modern design interior and located right in front of the horse racetrack. Those traveling with a car will greatly appreciate the free underground private parking space available. Will definitely stay here again!

Oliver’s place is exactly as described but better. Great location for local food and parks and great access to public transport to the city. Highly recommend and will be looking to stay again on my next business trip.

A great modern spacious apartment in a secure apartment complex. Perfect for what I needed. Has a laundry & full kitchen & basic kitchen essentials which was great for the meals I cooked. Also excellent public transport options only a few minutes walk away. Fantastic to have a secure car park if you do have a vehicle. The bed was also super comfy.

Oliver was great to deal with always replying straight away.

My only negative would be that it can be a little noisy. You can hear the lift which is just outside, the family with kids next door & the horses training in the morning. I am however a very light sleeper so may not be an issue for others & despite this I had a great stay & would recommend highly.
I highly recommend this place. Just as described. My girfriend and i had a awesome time here.

This apartment was in an excellent location for what we needed. The space was stylish, modern and clean. I loved the attention to detail, including chemical free soaps, shampoos etc. Communication was easy and Oliver was a great host. Thank you!

My wife and I loved Oliver's studio! Very clean and modern with beautiful views of Royal Randwick Racecourse. You get to see the trainers take their gorgeous horses for their afternoon stroll as you relax out on the balcony overlooking a plant nursery and the racetrack. The amenities were great and Oliver was very quick to respond to any enquiries. The studio is located in very close proximity to a lot of great restaurants. We were very happy with our stay.

Oliver's place is really lovely in views of location, amenities, convenience, and enjoying horse races during the three Saturday evening was an extra! The place is much more beautiful than that described in the photos.
Great host and relaxing place makes you  keep coming back.  This is my second time booking with Oliver n still feel home as last time
房间不错,很安全｡厨房设施齐全｡
Great location, awesome space with secure parking, close to food outlets with best view of Randwick Racetrack thanks Oliver
Reliable guy with a great place. I recommend Oliver as a  host!

Oliver’s place is great. Perfect location with lovely view of race track. Oliver has prompt response with easy check in and check out. Lovely apartment. Next door neighbours and kids slightly noisy and apartment is next to elevator so there is a little bit of noise at night time. Nothing to deter you from booking this great space! Thanks for the stay.

name: Luxurious 4 to 5 Room The Rocks Large House Sydney
summary: Walk 5 minutes to the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Barangaroo Reserve, The Rocks and view the Opera House at Circular Quay. It is right in the centre of Sydney. Stay at the heart of Sydney's famous old town - The Rocks. Enjoy the beautiful c1800's Victorian architecture while in creature comforts of the newly renovations and furnished with beautiful modern fittings home.
space: Free Unlimited WIFI - 4 bedroom 2 bathroom well designed self contained home. Essentials including Sydney map, toiletries, coffee, tea and treats will be waiting for you to help you get settled. Street parking permits available at a daily rate of $45 per car. I only have a handful and need to know if you require this once you book to hold them for you. Fully equipped kitchen with oven, gas stove, microwave, toaster, fridge, rice cooker, pots, plates, glasses and cutlery. A washing machine also available for you to use. There are 3 bedrooms with plush queen beds and portable airconditioning/heater. 4th room has a double bed. All mattress beds have electric blankets in Winter. The living room has a single sofa bed that can be closed off into a 5th room. For guests who want to sleep on the sofa beds, we will provide bedding and linen in a basket for you so you can enjoy the use of the lounge during the day. Portable cot and high chair can be provided for babies.
description: Walk 5 minutes to the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Barangaroo Reserve, The Rocks and view the Opera House at Circular Quay. It is right in the centre of Sydney. Stay at the heart of Sydney's famous old town - The Rocks. Enjoy the beautiful c1800's Victorian architecture while in creature comforts of the newly renovations and furnished with beautiful modern fittings home. Free Unlimited WIFI - 4 bedroom 2 bathroom well designed self contained home. Essentials including Sydney map, toiletries, coffee, tea and treats will be waiting for you to help you get settled. Street parking permits available at a daily rate of $45 per car. I only have a handful and need to know if you require this once you book to hold them for you. Fully equipped kitchen with oven, gas stove, microwave, toaster, fridge, rice cooker, pots, plates, glasses and cutlery. A washing machine also available for you to use. There are 3 bedrooms with plush queen beds and portable airconditioning/heater. 4th room has a double bed.
neighborhood_overview: Sydney Opera House, Sydney Harbour Bridge, Barangaroo. You name it. All major icons are just a small stroll away. You cannot get any place more central or convenient than this! :)
notes: You cannot get any place more central or convenient than this! :)
transit: This is the best location in Sydney for any visitor. 1 block away - Be stunned by the massive Sydney Harbour Bridge and Observatory Hill. 1 minutes walk - Get a taxi outside the door. Taxis regularly drive on this street in this famous area of Sydney. 2 minutes walk - Restaurant area, Lord Nelson Pub and convenient store to pickup your Opal travel card. 3 minutes walk - The Rocks Markets held every weekend. 5 minutes walk - Best day spa in Sydney is 1 block away at the Langham hotel. 5 minutes walk - See Sydney Opera House from Circular Quay 6 minutes walk - All major public transport in Circular Quay. Train station, ferry stop, bus and taxi ranks
