access: You will have the entire house to yourself.
interaction: My husband and I live a few minutes away and will come by Monday to take the bins out and Tuesday to take them in. We also need to drop off fresh linen into the linen cabinet the day before or on the morning of your check-out. We are happy to answer any questions while we are there. I am contactable via mobile and Airbnb messenger all day if you require assistance and can help provide suggestions on things you must do and famous local places to eat.
house_rules: - No loud noise after 10pm as a respect to other neighbours sleeping - Strictly no parties - Maximum of 8 people in property at any time, including visitors - If above rules are broken, you will be evicted immediately at your expense and security deposit charged. - The oldest person staying must be over 28 years old and digital photo ID will need to be provided to Suzanna within 24 hours after booking - If you need to smoke, please do so outside - Clean used kitchen utensils before leaving - Wipe kitchen down after use and do not leave food or crumbs around to prevent attracting insects. - Street parking permits available at a daily rate of $45 per car - No flushing wet wipes or anything other than toilet paper in the toilet. - Switch off airconditioning & heaters when leaving the house. - Remove shoes inside property property. - Don't hang out right outside the house chatting as it disturbs the neighbours. If you are waiting, please wait inside. - Damages must be advised within 4 hour

host.host_about:
I am privileged to have grown up in Sydney with it's unconditionally generous people, crisp clean air, beautiful harbours, quality produce and delicious fusions of the most amazing cuisines from around the world.
Living in the city is super convenient as I practically walk everywhere.
I love travelling the world so I know how travelers feel when they arrive from a long trip. That's why I create them a welcome pack of essentials in the apartment to help them relax and get started on their amazing Sydney adventure.

address.street: Council of the City of Sydney, NSW, Australia

reviews.comments: Suzanna was lightning fast at responding and a delight to deal with. The place is very clean, new and close walking distance to the sights of Sydney. Best Airbnb place I've stayed at.

Everything was amazing, couldn't have a more accommodating host. So clean, plenty of room for everyone, gorgeous home. Centrally located, so close the the Sydney Harbour Bridge, the Rocks and Circular Quay. Amazing restaurants at the wharf. We're already working out when to book a return trip!
An amazing location, a charming, clean and spacious home! Thank you Suzanna for a great stay :)

If you want a central bolt hole in Sydney it couldn't get better than this. We didn't catch a taxi all week because it is so central, yet quiet too.
Upmarket accommodation which suits families.
Suzanna is a great host if you need tips or advice while you are staying.

Great location in a quiet area. House was very clean. Perfect for a group of people.
Would definitely stay there again. The communication from the host Suzanna was excellent.
Lovely large bedrooms. Kitchen is well appointed. Bathroom is lovely and modern. Very clean and tidy

We had the best, most positive experience  Suzanna went above and beyond expectation and was an absolute pleasure to communicate with, kept us permanently updated and was an absolutely pleasure. Can't recommend it highly enough ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Suzanna and her husband were incredible helpful for all aspects of our stay.  Her unit is in the Rocks which makes it incredibly convenient to restaurants, Circular Quay, the Bridge and all else that Sydney offers.  The unit is newly remodeled and extremely clean.  Check in and check out was a breeze.
Excellent location, great house and fabulous hosts. Cant wait to come back.
Really good and beautiful place. We had a good time here.
Excellent location, within walking distance of all central attractions. Very easy check in/out with clean well equipped accomodation
Suzanna give us some great tips about local attractions and bars and she's very hospitality. Great experience. Thanks
Awesome house and location, will definitely stay again

Location is perfect for getting around circular quay, the rocks, barangaroo and darling harbour. We walked everywhere with no problems. 
Only couple of negatives are the steepness of the stairs. They were pretty steep and scary for a toddler. 
One of the pullout sofas is in a room accessed through one of the bedrooms. 
Being an old building we had a few issues with having heating on and boiling kettles etc at the same time. 
And the welcome pack wasn't exactly as shown in pics. 
Communication with Suzanna was great though. And she managed to sort any problems quite promptly. 
Property was very clean. 
Would definitely recommend it to others. But maybe not for families with toddlers.
Great stay in a great home. Would recommend!
Great location within walking distance to circular quay which is very handy! Great communication with Suzanna, she was very helpful and efficient with checking in etc and suggestions for the area!
Good location.

Suzanna's beautiful house is in the perfect location with easy access to all the major sites of Sydney. She was a fabulous host sending through many recommendations of places to visit, eat & drink. I will definitely return!

The house was in a perfect location, super close, and walkable to everything. Suzanna was really nice and easy to work with. She gave us a lot of helpful local suggestions and let us check in really early. The house was really clean and all the bathrooms have been remodeled. It's an older home that has very steep stairs and some creaky doors but overall a great place for a large group!

Amazing location.  You can walk anywhere including a great little pub on the corner.  This intriguing old terrace house has new kitchen and bathrooms and is very comfortable for a short stay.  Beware a 10 am checkout.

Very good location, just a few minutes walk to the Harbour Bridge, The Rocks, as well as view of the Sydney Opera House. Suzanna was also lightning fast in replying, and is very patient and helpful with all my queries. We had a very pleasant stay in the clean house. Check-in was also a breeze with the hosts contacting us to make sure we had no issues, and they were also flexible when we requested for late check-out.

Our stay in Sydney was great, and Suzanna's place is very conveniently located, with quick access to all of the major sites, dining and transportation. Check-in and check-out was a breeze and we had no issues during our stay. As a frequent user of vacation rentals... the only additional info I feel I need pass on to others is to elaborate on some apartment details. This place is ideal for 3 couples and one single, due to the bedding arrangements. The sofa bed is not the typical foldout, it is small, hard and really not usable. Air conditioning is achieved through 2 portable units and is not installed or ducted, so it is not possible to cool the entire house, just a couple of rooms.

Suzanna was very responsive, the terrace’s location is very convenient to the city, close to some great pubs. The house was very clean and accommodated 7 adults and a toddler, will definitely consider rebooking.
Great host and very accurate description!
Great location, very central. Suzanna was fantastic at giving us some great local knowledge and was very helpful.

The location for this property is ideal for enjoying many of Sydney's popular attractions.   You can easily walk to the harbor bridge, opera house, and circular quay.  The Rocks area where the unit is located has a vibrant community and lots of cute shops, cafes, and restaurants.  

This property would be well suited for a group of adults who are comfortable sharing space.  Two of the bedrooms must access their room by walking through an adjoining bedroom.   The common sitting area and the upstairs bath are quite small.   The bedrooms are all a nice size as is the dining area, kitchen, and downstairs bath.

Suzanna was very kind and responsive to all of our inquiries and booking was easy.  We required an early check-in and it was not a problem.  Check out was also very easy.

Awesome location and very easy to check in and deal with. 

Great hosts
Beautiful house in an amazing location just minutes from the rocks. Great host - easy, quick communication and lots of great tips. Highly recommend

The location can't be beaten. Close to everything. Suzanna is fabulous to deal with and very helpful. I would reiterate the point about the stairs being very steep and perhaps unsuitable for very young children or people with mobility issues. Other than that, I would highly recommend!
地点和房东都很好,步行可以到很多著名景点,乳歌剧院和海港大桥,能煮食,购物也很方便,适合一家人居住｡
You can’t get a better located house for 8 people! Lovely!

name: What a place in Barcelona in the center
summary: Cozy apartment of 50m2 located in the heart of the Gothic quarter in a pedestrian zone. It has a strategic position for its proximity to the beach of Barceloneta and the Borne where you can find the famous church of Santa Maria del Mar, the Cathedral, the Picasso Museum. The neighborhood allows you to enjoy the street performers, the terraces, the bars and allows you to walk on foot through the little streets that are a treasure trove of fashion and history or by bike. Recently refurnished.
space: Public transport:Metro L-4 Jaume. Close to the beach and the nice born and gotic area.
description: Cozy apartment of 50m2 located in the heart of the Gothic quarter in a pedestrian zone. It has a strategic position for its proximity to the beach of Barceloneta and the Borne where you can find the famous church of Santa Maria del Mar, the Cathedral, the Picasso Museum. The neighborhood allows you to enjoy the street performers, the terraces, the bars and allows you to walk on foot through the little streets that are a treasure trove of fashion and history or by bike. Recently refurnished. Public transport:Metro L-4 Jaume. Close to the beach and the nice born and gotic area. All the apartment
neighborhood_overview: El apartamento se encuentra en el corazón del barrio gótico en una zona peatonal. Tiene una posición estratégica para su cercanía a la playa de la Barceloneta y del Borne donde se pueden encontrar la famosa iglesia de Santa Maria del Mar, la Catedral, El museo Picasso y el paseo del Portal del Ángel en el cual os podéis dedicar a una tarde de shopping. El barrio permite disfrutar de espectáculos de los actores callejeros, de las terrazas, de los bares y os permite ir paseando a pies o en bici.
transit: A pies o en bici
access: All the apartment
interaction: Estaré disponible por incidencia con el piso. Vivo muy cerca y puedo dar ayudary dar consejos en que visitar.

host.host_about: Hola somos Marcella y Fabrizio y desde 10 años vivimos en Barcelona.

reviews.comments:
I had a great time at Marcella's apartment. She and her husband were very helpful and courteous.
The apartment is located at the edge of the beautiful Gotic district. The place is just perfect to discover Barcelona by foot. There are many stores and restaurants where you can enjoy your stay in Barcelona.
The apartment was clean and accurately described. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona.

I recomend to rent this apartment. Excellent location, everything is close - museums, theaters, port, beach, restaurants, etc. Interesting apartment design, good equipment. At night, sometimes noisy, but it costs the center of the city with a large number of tourists. Someone might like this. Overall, the impressions are good.
Stay very good, good location, near the beach .. the house has everything you need! And the hosts are very helpful and attentive, I just have to thank them.

This apartment is absolutely fantastic!  I stayed here for a month and simply didn't want to leave.  

The location is perfect.  It's essentially on the border of El Gotico, El Born, and Barceloneta.  It's within walking distance of the beach, Las Ramblas, Placa de Catalunya, and (if you're active like me) Placa d'Espanya.  The metro station is close as is a bus stop with a bus that takes you to, among other important places, Camp Nou.  It's also within walking distance of literally hundreds of bars, restaurants, and bakeries.  The neighborhood is safe, and, if you're a runner, you'll be able to run along the beach within a mile of leaving the front door.

The apartment itself is clean and comfortable.  The wifi is solid.  The TV also has a radio option, which is nice if you just want some background noise.  The washing machine, stove, and dishwasher work without any problems.  There is also an oven, but I never used it.

Marcella is amazing!  She worked with me on check-in which made it easy and seamless, and she was flexible with check-out.  She was very responsive with any questions that I had.

This apartment truly gives you the "living in Barcelona" experience.  I love it so much that I wanted to stay here when I return next month, but it's already booked.  So, do yourself a favor and rent this apartment while it's still available!
A nice place on good location: within a walking distance of good restaurants, shops and the beach. Exactly as in pictures. Smooth check-in and check-out. Marcella and Fabrizio are good hosts.

Marcella y Fabricio son unos anfitriones muy atentos y encantadores. 
Mi estancia en su alojamiento durante todo un mes ha sido inmejorable, he dormido de maravilla, cosa que era muy importante para mí porque vine por trabajo y el buen descanso era primordial. El apartamento es precioso, he disfrutado de vivir en él, además está decorado con mucho gusto, las vigas de madera  y la piedra vista de los muros originales que conservan algunas paredes  le dan mucho carácter y calidez. 
La localización es ideal, está a dos pasos de los barcos, el Maremagnum y no mucho más lejos con un paseín se llega a la playa. Por otro lado las callecitas del gótico son encantadoras y están llenas de restaurantes y bares atractivos.
Pues lo dicho, un gusto!, cien por cien recomendable. Si vuelvo a Barcelona sin duda repito!

Una experiencia genial! El departamento es muy lindo y la ubicación es inmejorable! Lo único para mejorar un poco la comunicación que en algunas ocasiones se dificultó ponernos en contacto pero fuera de ello la estadía fue genial! Volvería a elegirlo para ir de nuevo a barcelona!

Apartamento bien ubicado en barrio histórico con ambiente tranquilo y todos los servicios en las proximidades. Dispone de un agil transporte público a dos pasos. El piso es cómodo y elegante -igual que en la foto-, con todo lo necesario para una estancia larga.  Buena relación calidad-precio. Propietarios atentos y dispuestos a colaborar con tus necesidades de viaje. Lo recomendamos sinceramente; si tuviésemos que volver, repetiríamos sin duda. Que no lo deje escapar quien piense venir a Barcelona.

We stayed at Marcella Y Fabrizio's place as we moved to Barcelona.
The place is nice, and located right the hearth of the Barrio Gotico.
Every site in the centre is within walking distance, included the main beach of Barcelona (about 10 minutes). Also very close to two tube lines (5-10 mins).
The place is perfect for a couple, and there is everything you need to cook (pans, plates, glasses, cutlery..), and relax (a nice teli and a sofa)
Marcella Y Fabrizio are amazing host, they helped us with the courier as we were waiting from many boxes to be delivered. And they have been very responsive to any need/question during the entire stay.
Good experience, we highly recommend this place

If you want to be in the middle of everything, then this is the perfect apartment.  It was very comfortable, clean and  I highly recommend staying here.   Marcella  and her husband are wonderful hosts.

L'appartement de Marcella et Fabrizio est super: il est propre assez spacieux, placé au centre et il est proche de tout. J'ai été agréablement surprise par la gentillesse de Fabrizio et par sa politesse. N'hésitez pas à louer chez eux et je recommande vivement l'appartement; si jamais de reviendrai à Barcelone je louerais chez eux; merci Marcella et Fabricio

Great location. In Gotic bordering Born and Barceloneta. Central to so many areas to explore, it will take you a month! Which is how long I rented this apartment. Host was very responsive and accommodating. The bed was very comfortable and I slept great. Not too much noise from the street either, and if you close the windows it's pretty much silent. Great spot.

We stayed in the apartment for two months and it was great! The location is the best. It’s in the corner of gotic towards El Born and Barceloneta. We walked everywhere and did not need to buy a Metro card during our stay. The apartment has everything you need for living, for example kitchen supplies and washing machine. Marcella and Fabrizio have been great hosts. Mostly we had contact with Fabrizio and he is very helpful and easy to reach. Would absolutely recomend to stay here if you’re visiting this amazing city.
Perfect location, clean and comfortable! I stayed at Marcella and Fabrizio's place for a month and felt like home. Highly recommended.

This apartment is in a wonderful location!  We really enjoyed being right in the Gothic neighborhood.  The apartment is attractively historic looking with stone walls and ceiling.  The bedroom is away from the windows so it is quiet enough to sleep, though in the historic quarters there is always noise.
The hosts were very helpful and responsive when we had concerns about arriving during demonstrations, though they were not able to correct the problem with the TV while we were there.  I'm sure they will replace it shortly.
The apartment has great wifi - we never had a single problem.  It also has great storage which was nice since we were there for a long time.
I would recommend this apartment for people who don't really plan to cook - while there are plenty of dishes, the kitchen is not really well equipped for cooking.

All in all we had a very nice stay and think this apartment is a good value.

name: LAPA, FOR LEISURE OR BUSINESS
summary: Renewed apartment in Lapa, bright, spacious, cozy and comfortable, in a quiet and safe building, Close to what is best in Rio de Janeiro. Perfect for those who come to Rio on holiday or to work. Great location.
space: Bedroom with two single beds, TV, air conditioning, ceiling fan and wi-fi. Equipped kitchen with fridge, stove, microwave, coffee machine and grill. Bathroom with electric shower. Safe building, with 24-hour concierge.
description: Renewed apartment in Lapa, bright, spacious, cozy and comfortable, in a quiet and safe building, Close to what is best in Rio de Janeiro. Perfect for those who come to Rio on holiday or to work. Great location. Bedroom with two single beds, TV, air conditioning, ceiling fan and wi-fi. Equipped kitchen with fridge, stove, microwave, coffee machine and grill. Bathroom with electric shower. Safe building, with 24-hour concierge. It would be my pleasure to receive you and I'll be available at any time in order to provide you a great stay in Rio. Lapa is considered to be the place where the bohemian lifestyle was born. With wonderful architecture, it is where the best bars, restaurants and nightclubs in town are located, with music for all tastes, as well as antique shops and the traditional Lavradio Street Fair. The neighborhood offers grocery stores, bakeries, coffee shops, drugstores, Hospitals, banks, parking lots and gyms.  Close to Carioca and Cinelândia subway stations, Sambódromo, M
neighborhood_overview: Lapa is considered to be the place where the bohemian lifestyle was born. With wonderful architecture, it is where the best bars, restaurants and nightclubs in town are located, with music for all tastes, as well as antique shops and the traditional Lavradio Street Fair. The neighborhood offers grocery stores, bakeries, coffee shops, drugstores, Hospitals, banks, parking lots and gyms.  Close to Carioca and Cinelândia subway stations, Sambódromo, Metropolitan Cathedral, Caixa Econômica Federal, Banco do Brasil, BNDES and Petrobras.
transit: Bus to various neighborhood such as: Flamengo, Botafogo, Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon and many neighborhoods in the North Zone, and to the main tourist attractions such as Corcovado, Sugar Loaf Mountain, Botanical Garden, Santa Teresa, etc. Close to Santos Dumont Airport.
interaction: It would be my pleasure to receive you and I'll be available at any time in order to provide you a great stay in Rio.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Resido no Rio há mais de 30 anos. Casado e pai de dois filhos jovens. Adoro viajar e conhecer novos lugares. Tenho prazer em receber e hospedar pessoas e compartilhar com elas as belezas da cidade maravilhosa. Agora, terei prazer também em recebê-los na encantadora cidade de Lisboa, Portugal.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Ótimo anfitrião e muito atencioso. Apartamento bem localizado para quem quer um local próximo ao centro do Rio. Bem conservado e completo para uma estadia confortável.

Alexandre es un excelente anfitrión, una persona muy gentil, sus sugerencias oportunas y valiosas, gracias a ellas la estadía en Rio de Janeiro fue un placer para nosotras.
El alojamiento cumplió  y supero totalmente las expectativas, el vecindario fue precioso, el más completo en entretenimiento para nosotras, cercano y fácil para trasladarse a otras localidades, ¡recomendado completamente!

Minha estada em Rio de Janeiro foi ótima!!! O apartamento do Alexandre é excelente, limpeza impecável, ar condicionado e ventilador bons, internet rápida, banheiro e chuveiro ótimos, cozinha muito bem equipada, localização perfeita, com metro e ponto de ônibus perto entre outras qualidades. Não deixando de esquecer, é claro, a recepção do Alexandre, que é uma pessoa super atencioso e educado. Valeu, voltarei mais vezes...

Apesar de não conhecer o anfitrião pessoalmente, todos que me receberam, foram muito gentis! Mas também em todos os contatos, o Alexandre respondeu prontamente a qualquer dúvida. Gostei do local, limpo e organizado. Exatamente como nas fotos. No meu caso que era para estudos foi ótimo!

Our host Alexandre was exceptionally helpful and a very nice man. When we had difficulty finding a laundrette he offered to wash our clothes which was extremely generous. The apartment was bright, clean and comfortable and in a great part of Rio. The apartment was very well priced especially as we were staying during the World Cup. I would have no hesitation in recommending the apartment and Alexandre.

Alexandre was waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived, and was very helpful and had all the information we needed about Rio. The apartment was very clean and very nice remodeled, and he had some refreshments ready for us. The location at 1st doesn't look great, since it's not close to the beaches; but it turns out that all the night life of Lapa is 3 blocks away; so if you like to enjoy the bars and live samba music, it's greatly located. The only deceiving part is that the apartment is located in an old building and street; this being said, it's secure and once you are in the apartment, you forget all about it and you think you are in a really nice building.

My husband and I stayed at Alexandre's apartment for 4nights during the worldcup period 2014. It is clean and centrally located(close to bus station, supermarket, bars and restaurants; walking distance to metro) in a safe neighborhood. Neighbors are nice and there's a security guard in the building. We had safety concerns before our trip but we totally feel like home after the 1st day. Alexandre is a trustworthy and very friendly host. We enjoyed the quarterfinal match and found no difficulties to travel around w/ metro and taxi during our stay. Alexandre, thank you so much and we look forward to meet you in San Francisco. :)  Hugs and kisses.

The accommodation was good, functional, perfect to experience the real Lapa, which is to my opinion one of the best neighborhoods in Rio.
Nearby the accommodation you have lots of bus stops, so you can reach potentially any place in Rio from there.
No words can explain how Alexandre makes you feel welcomed. He is a great host and you can always rely on him.
I would give more than 5 if was possible.

It was amazing time in amazing place! When we arranging our trip we looking for place near the Sambodrom (cause it was main target of our trip) so we fortunatelly choose this appartment. But it was more than we   (Website hidden by Airbnb) day street, where this appartment is become to market with fresh fruits, another day there was a lot of bars, next day we can dance with a lot of people right here under the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was awesome amd maybe like fairy (Website hidden by Airbnb) lost but not least I want to say...if you looking for fun and arrange your trip by yourself, this appartment is best  choice) You can walk by foot around Lapa and it is 10 minutes far from Sambodrom, or you can go by bus to every sightseen you want directly cause here 3 bus station near the appartment. Wish you be here and falling love with Rio as we did....

O contato com o anfitrião foi muito positiva. Tudo estava conforme o combinado. Qualquer dúvida que tínhamos eles estavam prontos a ajudar e resolver qualquer imprevisto. Recomendamos e agradecemos pela hospedagem tranquila e aconchegante.

A recepção foi ótima. O apartamento é lindo, superconfortável, bem equipado. O prédio é tranquilo, bem localizado, perto de tudo, muitas linhas de ônibus passam ali perto.
A estadia foi excelente.

Passei 12 dias no apartamento do Alexandre e tudo correu muito bem. Estava a trabalho e a localização é ótima, tem tudo muito perto, mercados, farmácias, banco, lavanderias, pontos de ônibus, uma barraca de frutas 24 horas bem em frente e até uma feira livre aos sábados. O apartamento é bem ventilado e tem uma janela enorme que dá pra rua, e é bastante claro. Cozinha bem equipada, liquidificador, panelas, fogão, microondas, cafeteira e demais utensílios. A geladeira funciona super bem também. O prédio é antigo mas tudo funciona, com as devidas precauções não se tem problema nenhum. Sempre que necessário consegui contatar o Alexandre mas quase não nos encontramos pois nossos horários de trabalho não permitiram, de qualquer forma ele sempre se manteve disponível pra qualquer eventualidade. Voltarei com certeza.

A recepção foi ótima! O Sr. Alexandre foi muito prestativo, nos deu um guia que facilitou muito nossos dias no Rio. O apartamento é excelente, bem arejado, tudo bem limpinho, a cozinha tem tudo que precisa. A localização é ótima! Supermercado, farmácia, barraca de frutas, banco e sem contar a vida noturna da Lapa que é muito boa! Passamos ótimos dias no Rio! Recomendo!

Ficamos 10 dias no apartamento de Alexandre. O predio tem seguranca as 24 hs. O apartamento é como aparece nas fotos, bonito, limpo e bem confortavel.
Alexandre sempre nos ajudou pra fazer nossas ferias ainda melhores, brindando informacoes e ajuda quando (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza alugaria denovo o apartamento porque foi uma otima experienca.

O Alexandre foi pontual na entrega do apartamento. É importante mencionar que o apartamento está totalmente reformado e tem tudo nas redondezas. O moradores e funcionários do prédio são amáveis. Eu definitivamente recomendo a locação deste apartamento.

Nos gustó mucho la recepción de Alexandre. Fue muy atento al recogernos del aeropuerto, e incluso no tuvo problema en recogernos al día siguiente de lo que habíamos acordado, ya que perdimos el vuelo de conexión. Al llegar al departamento nos dio material que nos sirvió mucho (mapas, libros informativos, etc) y nos dio algunas recomendaciones. Tengan mucho cuidado en Rio, es una ciudad muy peligrosa, a mi me robaron mi celular en Copacabana mientras esperábamos el Año Nuevo.
Gracias Alexandre por tus atenciones!!!

Hice una reserva de última hora y Alexandre me fue a encontrar inmediatamente para la entrega de llaves, además de esto me espero mucho tiempo porque me perdí camino al departamento, Alexandre es un 7, demasiado amable y muy atento! El departamento es igual a las fotos, muy bien cuidado. Recomiendo hospedarse con Alexandre!

Alexandre was a very friendly person. He helps you even after your stay in his appartment. I was there for 2 days in the appartment and i forgot my keys and wallet there, he even took his time to make a rendez-vous to bring me my wallet and keys that's how good he is (and how sloppy i am) xD.

The appartment is a very beatiful appartment in a very beatiful artistic environment. The appartment is just like in the pictures. he even brings you welcome cookies.
Ótimo apartamento, ótima localização. Super recomendo.
Small nicely apartment ideal for a short stay. Alexander was very well accomodate and he was very available. I recommend.

I just finished a 6-7 week stay in one of Alexandre's apartments and it was beyond what I had expected. His hospitality was second to none. The apartment was exactly as advertised and perfect for my long stay. The neighborhood is very close to everything with 2 supermarkets within 200m from the apartment. He made sure I always had everything I needed and even went above and beyond several times to make my stay truly a great experience. I would recommend him to anyone staying in Rio with 100% enthusiasm. I plan on renting from him again on my next stay in Rio de Janeiro. This is 5 stars without a doubt.

The description of the apartment was very accurate, in fact I thought it was larger than I had expected from the photographs. Alexandre showed us around and gave us good tips for our stay. Myself and my niece felt safe in the apartment and we had no problems at all in the 2 weeks we were there For the Olympics. Although the surrounding area may look a bit dodgy at first glance , you are really experiencing living in an apartment in Rio .The security personnel in the apartment block were always present and we really enjoyed our stay. If you are a light sleeper or get annoyed with street noise then take ear plugs as Rio never stops!! We walked around the area and took buses and metro very easily to other areas . In the evening, returning from the Olympic events we left the Metro at Carioca and it was always easy to hail a yellow cab outside on Rua da Republique Chile.
Wifi was good and reliable.
Thanks for a great stay!

Parabéns ao Alexandre! Foi muito prestativo. Só tive problema com o forno do fogão, que não funcionava, mas foi prontamente consertado. O apto é perto de mercado, comércio em geral, farmácia etc. Como bônus, ainda tem um uma feira sábado de manhã para comprar várias frutas e vegetais.
Fomos muito bem recebidos, o local é muito bem localizado pra quem pretende estar próximo de tudo. Tudo foi ótimo e dentro do esperado.
O Sr. Alexandre foi muito atencioso e prestativo, mantém o apartamento em ótimas condições de moradia, vou indicá-lo sempre que puder.

Alex siempre estuvo disponible para ayudarnos, no solo en el recibimiento a un horario muy temprano, sino después por (Hidden by Airbnb) , consultando varias cosas. 
El departamento es impecable, muy equipado, y en una zona inmejorable por la cercanía al metro durante el día y los bares durante la noche. Quedamos muy contentos.
Todo excelente!
Alexandre was very friendly and helpful. He stored our luggage while we were outside of Rio. Also he was extremly flexible when we changed our checkout date. He is a great host!
Ótimo apartamento, ótimo anfitrião. Tudo conforme descrito!! Foi uma excelente passagem pelo Rio! Recomendo!
Ótimo apto, a localização é boa, próximo do metrô, assim como mercado e principais acessos do RJ
Tive uma estadia maravilhosa nesse apartamento, muito bem localizado perto da vida noturna, varias padarias, lanchonetes, restaurantes e mercado ao lado. Além de ser de fácil acesso.

A acomodação do Sr. Alexandre ofereceu para mim e meu filho o melhor conforto que poderíamos esperar. Ventilador, ar condicionado, funcionando perfeitamente. Tudo que se precisa quando chega da rua cansado querendo um bom banho e uma boa cama. A limpeza estava perfeita. A localização é ótima para quem escolheu o Centro do Rio para se hospedar. Para qualquer lado que saia a pé, pode-se encontrar todo o tipo de comércio, desde restaurantes, padarias, farmácias até supermercados. A Lapa está próxima numa caminhada de alguns poucos minutos. Também a linha do VLT, quando quiser descansar as pernas. E não poderia deixar de comentar na recepção na chegada pelo próprio Sr. Alexandre que nos recebeu como um bom anfitrião. Muito obrigado, Alexandre. Um grande abraço!
I would stay there again the place is cozy and bright, clean. And also is central. I felt home really like the apart and Alexandre was very helpful.
Central, bonito departamento, acogedor y muy limpio
Alexandre é um ótimo anfitrião. O apartamento é muito bem localizado. Próximo a muitas opções de lazer e ao aeroporto Santos Dumont. Recomendo.
Ótimo lugar! O Alexandre é muito solícito. O apartamento é super limpo e fica próximo à farmácia, supermercado, noite da Lapa, uns 15 minutos do metrô. Recomendo a todos!

We really enjoyed our stay in Rio!!
Although Alexandre was not there at that time, he made sure a very nice and amiable friend of his welcomed us and was there for Check In and (very flexible!) Check Out. Thank you!!
The building feels safe with its own guard and you can reach other parts of town by bus, uber or taxi.

On a passé une semaine dans ce logement. Il est conforme aux photos. Très bien situé dans Lapa à 15 min de marche des bars, restaurants, transports (bus et metro) et de certains lieux touristiques comme les Arches et la favela Santa Teresa. Propre et dans bâtiment sécurisé avec un gardien de jour comme de nuit. Alexandre nous a très bien accueillis et a pris le temps de nous donner des conseils.

Мне очень понравилась квартира у Александра! она была очень чистый светлый, в Европейском стиле. там был кондиционер и отдельный вентилятор на потолке который тоже прекрасного охлаждал. маленькая кухня со столовой. небольшое пространство но оказалось удобным. Большой холодильник. чистая ванная, чистые полотенца. утюг зонтики. удобное расположение район Лапа. очень дружелюбный хозяин, приятное общение на английском языке. Нам всё очень понравилось! спасибо большое Александр! мы приедем к вам вновь!
Alexandre foi um ótimo host. O apto é muito legal e com ótima localização!

Alexandre é excelente anfitrião, nos recebeu muito bem e foi bastante atencioso durante toda a estadia, sempre disponível. O espaço é bastante acochegante e exatamente como descrito. A localização é maravilhosa, rua e proximidades  com movimentação praticamente 24h  e ônibus na rua ao lado, a poucos passos. Além disso é próximo da Lapa, onde tem a saída de passeios para Arraial, Búzios, Angra e Petrópolis, da para ir/voltar caminhando tranquilamente. Em suma, foi tudo perfeito. Recomendo a estadia.

name: Anthurium Alii Gardens Rainforest, Volcano
summary: Park is open! Welcome to this Hawaiian paradise in the middle of a magical rainforest near Volcano Village, one mile away from the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park ! This is the place you have dreamed of among the Ohia Lehua trees and the hapu'u giant ferns. In an ambiance of another age, Anthurium Alii Gardens offers you all the comfort you need for your vacations.
space: The third bedroom is in a separate smaller building and will be accessible on demand for reservations with 3 or more guests :) IN VOLCANO, 5 MINUTES FROM PARK ENTRANCE (not in Mountain View) Delightful : Hot tub in the heart of the rainforest ! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
description: Park is open! Welcome to this Hawaiian paradise in the middle of a magical rainforest near Volcano Village, one mile away from the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park ! This is the place you have dreamed of among the Ohia Lehua trees and the hapu'u giant ferns. In an ambiance of another age, Anthurium Alii Gardens offers you all the comfort you need for your vacations. The third bedroom is in a separate smaller building and will be accessible on demand for reservations with 3 or more guests :) IN VOLCANO, 5 MINUTES FROM PARK ENTRANCE (not in Mountain View) Delightful : Hot tub in the heart of the rainforest ! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). The full house is rented to our guests, up to 6. The whole property is yours to enjoy during your stay! :) Via Airbnb, email, text or phone. In the midst of the rainforest, surrounded by fern trees and ohia lehua often blooming trees, white and red anthuriums, roses, hibiscus and more. You can
neighborhood_overview: In the midst of the rainforest, surrounded by fern trees and ohia lehua often blooming trees, white and red anthuriums, roses, hibiscus and more. You can enjoy the outdoor from our beautiful concrete deck in the backyard or from the house, through the numerous French doors :) 5 minutes from Volcano village and same distance from the main national park entrance!
notes: The third bedroom is separate, located  about 30 feet away from the main house.
transit: Car mostly.
access: The full house is rented to our guests, up to 6. The whole property is yours to enjoy during your stay! :)
interaction: Via Airbnb, email, text or phone.
house_rules: (We suggest printing this document as well) The Anthurium Alii Gardens' Bible and Rental Agreement ALOHA and WELCOME to our home. We hope you enjoy your stay in this beautiful home away from home. Because it is our home, and our furniture, we do have some rules we would like to share with you. We are very happy to have you here. Thank you and Mahalo! Marie and Alain. (Owners) General House Rules: Thank you for taking your shoes off This is a smoke-free house, thank you. No extra guests may be allowed unless paid for or discussed with us through the reservation site. No parties or events, please. This a finely furnished and decorated house. A home away from home. Please be respectful of your surroundings. All basic supplies and more are provided for the comfort of your stay (bathroom tissue, facial tissue, soaps, dish soap and detergents...) Please be mindful of the environment and use with moderation. We provide a certain amount of wood for the fireplace during your stay. This wood wil

reviews.comments: Great location in the rainforest, was raining while we were there but the cottage was so cozy and had a great fireplace. The bathrooms were very nice and the beds were comfortable. It is an old home however so be prepared for a little dust and a slight cabin smell. Very relaxing, secluded, and romantic!
This place is so beautiful, peaceful, & clean! We will recommend to everyone.

Beautifully appointed home with very interesting details and furnishings.  Very private with a beautiful back yard and big outdoor hot tub.  4 minute drive to the volcanoes national park entrance- which is of course the main event in Volcano.  But when you're not out exploring the live volcano, this house is the perfect, cozy place to retreat to.  Relax in front of the wood burning fireplace, or gaze at the stars from the hot tub, or just sit on the wrap-around porch and enjoy the view of the rainforest.  Our 1 and 3 year old daughters also loved their stay here at this beautiful, unique home!

This house is a health hazard and the owner is unreasonable. My husband and I arrived to the beautiful property after a long day of touring. We were overwhelmed by the odor of old fireplace and mildew, so severe that we needed to leave after 10-15 minutes and notified the owner that we would not be staying there. The furniture and bedding were faded and dusty. My allergies and asthma were so aggravated that I required medical attention upon return to Oahu. We (luckily) were able to secure lodging at a nearby B and B recommended by the state park. The innkeeper stayed late and accepted cash because the credit machine was down for the night. We did not request a full refund of $258, but did ask that "Roxanne" reimburse us for the other lodging ($120). She continued to bombard me with messages, claiming to not receive photos that I sent multiple times. Then requested an invoice from the other B and B (which we had no reason to have as it was impeccable and we paid cash ). We still have  not received the partial refund, and likely won't after posting this review. Very poor customer service and I hope she uses the $258 to purchase a deep cleaning and dehumidifier. Save your money and stay at the state park or volcano inn.
The Anthurium Alii Gardens Rainforest Volcano Cottage is a great place to stay!  The house is cozy, clean and comfortable.  The hot tub is amazing and the gardens are beautiful.  Highly recommended.
Roxane's place is fabulous, I wish we'd booked a second night. The house is unique and beautiful, an oasis in the rainforest.

Very well furnished and comfortable.  Beautiful location that feels secluded but is conveniently located for touring the park.  It was perfect to have a glass of wine in the relaxing hot tub at the end of the day.  Very friendly and accommodating host.  We will definitely stay here again if we can get back to the islands and we highly recommend it to others.

Yes! We stayed a week at this beautiful home and loved every minute. The pictures do not do justice to the great natural beauty all around and the impeccable period furnishings and decorations (lots of wood, wicker, and brass, giving a feeling of great luxury). An exceptionally comfy king bed. We enjoyed the hot tub and the fireplace and, especially, proximity to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, which provided hikes enough for more than the time we had. A near drive to Mauna Kea for stargazing and Mauna Loa for hiking, plus just 20 miles or so from Hilo. There's lots of rain, but how else would the green be so green and the birds so happy? Note that it is a short drive (8 minutes or so) to small groceries and cafes, and the property, while having other residences in the area, is quite secluded-feeling, especially at night. We brought groceries and toiletries (not really provided) with us from the Kona side. Highly recommend this memorable spot!
Beautiful place! We loved the green everywhere. The hot tub was also a nice touch and great to come home to after a long day of sight seeing.
What a beautiful place to stay. I love the decor and all of the windows! It is a wonderful place for a retreat. Thanks again, Roxane!

What a magical place to stay.  The cottage was charming and the beds were very comfortable.  The garden was like paradise, rain or shine.  Sitting on the back lanai with a cup of coffee was an ideal way to start the day.  We did plenty of exploring, but I would have been content to sit on the lanai all day looking out at the spectacular garden, watching the trees move in the breeze, and reading.
Roxane's home is amazing and very convenient to the National Park. The home and the grounds are beautiful. Roxane was very helpful both through email and cell phone calls. My wife and I loved it!

We couldn't be more pleased romantic for us with plenty of room for a family Ior another couple. decorated with finesse and  Beauty the grounds  are glorious,  filled with anthuriums,  beautiful Hawaiian ferns and foliage.  Hot tub    made for luxurious relaxation.   We will be back
Wonderfully secluded cottage in fern tree clearing, almost magical.

Roxane offered an amazing space in volcanos beautiful ohia rainforest with exceptional customer service. The anthurium, ginger and ohia landscaping rich with song birds and nature surrounding the house was lush, peaceful and mesmerizing. The house was clean, stocked with everything we needed and furnished very will with neat furniture and accessories. My favorite part about the place was how much glass doors there were that we could leave open when it was raining and let in natural light. Can’t wait to stay here again!
My family loved the serenity of this place.  What a nice getaway from all the hustle and bustle of the holidays.  Thank you so much to Roxane for being a great host.

This house was clean and beautiful and just as pictured.  The gardens surrounding the house were just gorgeous.  Two things to note about this place.  It has three bedrooms, each with their own bath.  Two of the bedrooms are in the main house, one of the bedrooms is in a detached structure.  Perfect if you want a lot of privacy.  The next thing to note is that it can get quite cold at this elevation  (3500 feet).  The only heat is from small space heaters in the bedrooms, and a fireplace in the living room, which is pretty smoky.  So bring warm clothes and your fire building skills!
Wonderful rainforest paradise.  Eclectic Hawaiian home full of character and unique furnishings.  Super comfortable beds and plenty of space.  The garden is beyond breathtaking.

This house was just as advertised and very comfortable. We especially enjoyed the back yard—with tropical vegetation and ever-signing birds—and the hot tub kept at a perfect temperature. The house was comfortable and well furnished and the location is so convenient to the national park.

Roxane’s jungle home was a wonderful place to stay while visiting volcanoes national park. 

The home was better than advertised. Spacious, well decorated, in a lush and quiet jungle setting. The beds were comfortable and each bedroom had an adjoining bathroom with jacuzzi tub. The hot tub was a great place to relax after a days hiking.  The Jagger museum, with its view of the caldera, was a ten minute drive from her property. Roxane responded quickly to last minute questions and requests. 

Our only regret was that our activities left little time for sitting on the porch to enjoy her beautiful property. We would definitely recommend others to stay in her jungle home!
Unbelievable home! Very accurate to the listing. I would highly recommend the home to travelers in volcano. I guarantee you will not find a more spectacular place!
Perfect family get together

The house is like a log cabin in the middle of the woods.  You are surrounded by tree ferns and anthuriums.  It’s very peaceful and quiet.  A great place to relax after hiking in the volcano national park.  Every bathroom has a jacuzzi tub, and there is also a large hot tub outside.  The host was great.  Roxane is very quick to respond to any messages.  If you use the third bedroom, it’s attached to the carport.  You have to go outside and walk about 20 feet to the entrance.   It’s great for some privacy if you have adult guests, but you might not want to sleep young kids there alone.

We had a great stay at Roxane’s place. Great location & back away from
Noise. It  allowed you to feel like you were in the Rainforest or Jungle even more. Hot tub was amazing & the star gazing out in the open was fantastic. House felt very homie & fireplace was a plus.  Lots of amenities to offer. Def Recommend checking it out. Thanks Roxane.

Loved staying here! Third bedroom felt like our own private bungalow. Enjoyed the fireplace, comfy couches and big dining table. The hot tub was luxurious after long days exploring. Hosts communication was always immediate and positive. It does get cool at night, each room is provided with a portable heater. The flowers in each room topped off a great visit.

We were unfortunately sick when we stayed a the lovely Anthirium Cottage, or was it fortunate? Both my husband and I needed plenty of rest and down time, as we worked our way through an illness, but staying at Anthirium Alii Gardens was a wonderful retreat and respite from the rest of the world, its like everything else melted away. Once we realized that the adventures we had planned trekking around Volcano were not to be had, and that we would spend our time simply soaking in the healing, green space that we were in, our whole outlook changed. From our time at Anthirum Alii Gardens.. Aloha! Waking up here in Volcano National Park, surrounded by the rainforest to start my 55th year off is truly amazing. I am surrounded by this green, healing light of the forest and the sound of the tropical birds and rain on the tin roof, there is not another soul to be seen or heard. The forest is so deep here; its layers repeat with Fiddlehead Ferns, ‘ōhi‘a Trees, and Anthirums until your eye can't distinguish anymore. Our drive around the remote and windy south point of Hawaii yesterday brought us to this wonderful spot, The Anthirium Alii Gardens, in Volcano. As we entered the home from the private driveway, just a short distance from the crater, we were stunned and breathless seeing the surroundings we would get to enjoy. We spent our mornings eating Macadamia Nut Cookies and drinking Coffee in front of the fire, or in the vast hot tub, or sitting on the veranda overlooking the garden. We listened to the continuing lull of the rain and birds, a little bit of heaven in this most remote part of the earth, for sure. I was taking in the last of the days light overlooking the expansive rainforest garden while sitting on the veranda of this magical sanctuary when I finished writing this... I am enjoying the seranade of all the birds, the comfortable coolness of the humid rainforest air. There is not an unlikeable sound to be heard; no cars, horns, chainsaws, dogs or people barking...pure unadulterated blissful peace. No light (Website hidden by Airbnb) all. I look forward to once again sleeping amidst all of this tranquilty, waking in the morning to the birdsong and lush greenery, making a nice strong cup of coffee in the morning to enjoy out on the veranda in my PJ's. I highly recommend this peaceful place if you ever come to Volcano National Park, its big enough for six people, has a wonderful, large hot tub surrounded by the forest, plenty of seating and cooking utensils, a wonderful fireplace that we shared our meal in front of. Its a place to connect and restore. You will feel as though you are in your own private Polynesia. Maybe if you are lucky, as I was, you will get a visit from the Pheasants in the morning while you enjoy the quiet of the forest and the simplicity of...
Loved the place, beautiful & thoughtful touches!
The yard and house are gorgeous.  Beds comfy and fireplace was awesome.

We had a great time at Roxanne’s. Check in was easy and it was clean and welcoming upon arrival. Her spot is very private. We really enjoyed her beautiful yard and garden. I would certainly stay here again and recommend this spot.
We loved the house and grounds and would highly recommend this house.
Great place for a peaceful escape!  Very close to the national park and the place is just like how it's advertised.  Thumbs up!

We stayed in the main cottage, which is beautifully furnished and decorated.  The grounds are also spectacular.  The house is cool but humid, but that was not unexpected given the location in the midst of a rainforest.  The only time we minded the humidity is when we had trouble getting our fire started due to the moist wood (even after bringing it inside to try to dry it out).  The outdoor hot tub is spacious, stayed hot, and had powerful jets.  There were thoughtful touches left to welcome us- including a coffee/tea bar with Kona coffee, and large jugs of filtered water in the fridge.   The place was exactly what we were looking for, and we were sad to leave!

With an incredible location just outside the park, this cottage served us well. We enjoyed the porch, the beautiful yard, the peaceful neighborhood, and the free coffee provided. Beds are very comfortable, the hot tub is a fabulous 104 degrees, and there are plenty of towels. Bring bug spray during the shoulder seasons when mosquitoes can be annoying (there aren't screens on the doors either and very few windows). It is a little dusty/musty so if you have allergies, you might want to know that.

This home has great location for those wanting to visit Volcanoes National Park. But the best part is the home itself, smack in the middle of a rainforest jungle. One morning we looked out on the grass and there was a flock of pheasants! The home looks like the set of a 1930’s movie, with gorgeous wooden furniture, old books and many thoughtful decorating touches. It is romantic in a vintage way. In fact, I would love the exact living room in my own house! More importantly, Roxanne is a wonderful owner who kept in touch with us throughout the drama surrounding the recent volcano activity, which is too far away to affect conditions at this rental. She kept in contact with us every couple of days, calming our somewhat unfounded concerns, and offering many helpful suggestions. We enjoyed our stay and experience very much!

There is a lot to like about the Volcano house, particularly the beautiful yard and the hot tub. The house is nicely decorated but it is also very dark inside and it didn't help that a number of light bulbs were burned out. 

Given VNP's extended closure there are very limited options for dining and activities, with Hilo being the closest place for groceries. My wife and son were particularly unnerved with the repeated earthquakes that we felt at the house due to the ongoing eruptions. We have never felt earthquakes before and it was kind of alarming. 

The house could use some work. The outside of the house is covered in cobwebs and the deck on one side of the house is unusable. Also, the third bedroom is in another building next door which may not be convenient if you have younger children. 

We would have been far better off staying in Hilo which is where we ended up spending most of our time.

Roxanne's place is beautiful, relaxing, and comfortable. We had a fantastic time. Plenty of room for four adults in the main house. Kitchen was fully stocked and even had a salad spinner! Roxanne sent us regular updates and tips prior to our stay. We found plenty to do even with the park closed. She was always quick to respond to any questions. We enjoyed the hot tub after long days hiking and seeing the sights. The house is easy to get to but very private and secluded. You are in the middle of the rainforest, surrounded by nature and bright stars on a clear night. One of the best Airbnb places we have ever stayed at!

The house is very close to Volcano national park. It has a nice yard and a hot tub. Roxane is great at communication. The house was dirty though. The linens etc were not clean. I would not stay again.

This is a really unique property to stay. Has the feeling of a well-loved family cottage, yet filled with an eclectic mix of furniture and artworks. The gardens are a lush backdrop of green. We visited while the National park was closed due to volcanic activity, but this did not deter us from staying, as for us, it was the coolest part! 

We experienced the earth shifting and shaking, at times it was like standing on a wobble board, which was quite incredible - The ground vibrations felt in the area are from the caldera collapsing. It did take us a day to get used, as at first we didn't fully understand what the shaking was all about. However, if you get chance to chat with one of the rangers set up in three locations near the park (one was in the Volcano art center during our stay) they explained exactly what was happening with the volcano, so from there we just enjoyed the ride experiencing Mother Nature at work! 

The hot tub is also lovely and on a clear night, the stars are beautiful to enjoy. If you are lucky enough to be there on a Sunday, take a stroll over to the farmers market. It starts at 6 am and most goodies are gone in the first hour, so get up early!!! We didn't get there till after 8, but it was still a nice stroll and very local experience.

What a lovely surprise! A peaceful retreat with an old world feel.  We had booked way in advance with the plan to visit Volcanoes National Park.  Well, Kilauea had other ideas... Nonetheless, the experience was great. We visited the black sand beach at Punalu'u (with many, many sea turtles) and the outstanding botanical garden just north of Hilo.  In between, we enjoyed the cool, lush surroundings back at the house.

On a practical note, the house is well away from the active eruption zone and not in the path for vog or ash.  There is essentially no discernable effect at the house from Kilauea except that every once in a while there is a bit of vibration if there is some slumping over at the Kilauea crater.
We loved staying at this house in thr jungle thst offered s comfortable and lush homebase for adventure!
So very warm and inviting.  The decor is utterly charming.

Lovely relaxing location very close to shops and volcano national park.
Great living area, fireplace, spacious lawn out the back and outdoor spa.
3rd bedroom and bathroom were separate to main house so may not be suitable for families.
Great stay!

What a beautiful and unique place! The house is gorgeously furnished and clean. We loved relaxing in the jungle hot tub and warming up by the fireplace, and enjoyed the close proximity to Volcanoes NP!

Roxane's place was out-of-this-world magical! The Airbnb itself was clean, cozy, spacious, and came with a lot of really nice touches. The side yard garden was to die for! Roxane was also super sweet and responsive! I definitely recommend her place.

name: Eyüp'de teraslı ve garajlı konak...
Whale Beach Sensation
summary: A superb modern 6 bedroom home spanning three levels with fabulous ocean views. Seven minutes walk to the beach and perfectly positioned in a quiet street.
space: This stunning 6 bedroom home is beautifully renovated and perfectly positioned to capture light and spectacular ocean views.  There's ample space with three lounge areas, an out door grassed area and a kids lounge with games. The layout is over three levels. Level 1 is the entrance with modern gourmet kitchen, dining table for ten and lounge area with glass doors opening onto the large balcony.  On this level there are 2 bedrooms, the master suite with spectacular views and two bathrooms.  Two further bedrooms and bathrooms are on the next level up as well as another lounge room and another balcony. The bottom ground floor has a kids lounge area with toys and television and another bathroom, plus two rooms with 4 bunk beds! The ground floor lounge opens onto a grassy area. The interior design is modern with excellent finishes. The house is perfect for families with so much space on each level. Spectacular views of Whale Beach. 7 min walk to beach or 5 mins walk to The Boat Shed cafe.

This stunning 6 bedroom home is beautifully renovated and perfectly positioned to capture light and spectacular ocean views.  There's ample space with three lounge areas, an out door grassed area and a kids lounge with games. The layout is over three levels. Level 1 is the entrance with modern gourmet kitchen, dining table for ten and lounge area with glass doors opening onto the large balcony.  On this level there are 2 bedrooms, the master suite with spectacular views and two bathrooms.  Two further bedrooms and bathrooms are on the next level up as well as another lounge room and another balcony. The bottom ground floor has a kids lounge area with toys and television and another bathroom, plus two rooms with 4 bunk beds! The ground floor lounge opens onto a grassy area. neighborhood_overview: Whale Beach is next to Palm Beach and is an exclusive Sydney beach side destination.
notes: Cost $1,800 per night, 4 nights minimum 18 Dec to mid of Jan $2,250 per night, 7 nights minimum 15 Nov to 17 Dec $2,250 per night Mid Jan to end of Feb $2,250 per night. Available for one night bookings at $2,750 plus $500 cleaning Bond $5000 cleaning $500
transit: A car is needed.

name: Breathtaking view a walk away from sydney CBD
summary: The apartment is yours pretty much all day as my partner and I are workaholics. You are welcome to use everything you can see in the pictures. Our place is close to the CBD, kings cross, Elizabeth bay, Potts point, Edgecliff, Double bay, Rose bay and slightly further to Bondi beach (15 minutes). You'll love our place because of the neighborhood, comfy bed, the cosines, and the freedom to leave and come back whenever you please.  You'll feel at home from the moment you walk into our apartment.
space: We have a PS3 which you have full access to. We have several dvd's you can watch anytime at your leisure.
description: The apartment is yours pretty much all day as my partner and I are workaholics. You are welcome to use everything you can see in the pictures. Our place is close to the CBD, kings cross, Elizabeth bay, Potts point, Edgecliff, Double bay, Rose bay and slightly further to Bondi beach (15 minutes). You'll love our place because of the neighborhood, comfy bed, the cosines, and the freedom to leave and come back whenever you please.  You'll feel at home from the moment you walk into our apartment. We have a PS3 which you have full access to. We have several dvd's you can watch anytime at your leisure. My partner and I don't cook too often, however cooking facilities are free to use if you wish to go shopping and cook. My partner and I are available for assistance, however we will give you space to do what so ever you please. Its a 10mins walk to Edgecliff train station or kings cross train station which will take you anywhere in Sydney. Alternatively, there are buses across the street that
notes: I'm going away for a short period of time and would like to host a room to someone for a minimum of 1 week from Monday 12th March till the start of April 2018.  I am willing to negotiate a special over through Airbnb. But this offer is only for individuals whom are looking for a room for a minimum of 1 week. Please contact me if you are interested.   Thank you.
transit: Its a 10mins walk to Edgecliff train station or kings cross train station which will take you anywhere in Sydney. Alternatively, there are buses across the street that go from Watsons bay to the City.
access: My partner and I don't cook too often, however cooking facilities are free to use if you wish to go shopping and cook.
interaction: My partner and I are available for assistance, however we will give you space to do what so ever you please.
house_rules: - No loud music on weekday nights  - Clean up after yourself (kitchen, lounge room, laundry, bathroom, bedroom)  - Reduced TV volume after 9pm (particularly on weekdays) - No access to garage - Must find a comfortable compromise sharing the tv and lounge room - PLEASE REMOVE YOUR SHOES  while you walk through the house, we've got carpet. Gum or dirt on the carpet will coost you a fee

host.host_about:
Hi my name is Terry. I live in Sydney with my very loving and caring boyfriend.  I recently opened an Airbnb account because i found out from a lot of people its a very cheap way to get accommodation and get to met really nice people around the world. 

We have a very cozy clean empty  room in our apartment which we would love to use to host people wanting a place to stay. Anyone that stays with us will find that we are very clean, easy to talk to and  genuinely helpful.
 
On the other hand, anyone one that is fortunate enough to host us will find that we are both very easy going happy couple. We love cultural cuisines and exploring.

reviews.comments: Terry was an awesome host, always making sure we're feeling comfortoable. The appartment is very nice and has everything you need and an amazing view. We had a great stay!

Terry's place has a beautiful view of the city and was easy to get to and from throughout the day. It was a bit difficult for Uber drivers to find us, but using the hotel across the street as a pick-up spot fixed that problem easily!

I'd be very happy to recommend Terry and Craig to potential guests.  The apartment is spacious, full of light and air and very well located in the midst of all that the eastern suburbs have to offer.  The hosts are very welcoming and keen to make your stay relaxed and fun.

This was my very first Airbnb stay and Terry has made it such a pleasant experience. Our flight were delayed on the runway the night before and we had no means to inform her know in advance but luckily she was willing to wait for us during the pickup. She also took us around the area just to show us where's what and how to get things. Terry is very easy to contact and she always reply messages very quickly. We had an unfortunate family emergency during the trip and she was being very nice, helpful, and understanding. Her place was also the best! Very clean, great view from the room, bus stop just opposite the building and city center is literally within walking distance (we did actually walk and enjoy the view along the way!).

Terry was incredibly friendly and very kindly picked us up and dropped us off at the airport. The apartment was on the 10th floor, so the view of Sydney was beautiful. There was a shopping mall and a park within walking distance, and so was Sydney tower. Almost everything about our stay was perfect, except the air con wasn't too good so it was quite hot, and the road outside was very noisy. We would definitely stay here again though.
Terry's place was a great base for our time in Sydney, it's a 10min walk to Kings Cross station. Terry was a fantastic host and made us feel very comfortable.

We really liked staying at Terry's place. It is very close to the bus and a few minutes more to Kings Cross. Though you are very much in the city, there is a big park just across the street with lots of green space and room for a long seaside walk. From the balcony one evening we saw a flying fox in the trees... did not expect that!
Terry is a great host and I would recommend taking her up on her airport pick-up offer. It's a fair deal.

This home stay ticked all the boxes for us. Terry was very helpful and friendly. Arrangements were easy to make before our visit. She met us at the airport and took us back two days later in her car for a small charge. This was very convenient for us. The apartment is spacious and well appointed. It is in a very good location and convenient for the city. Lots of good places to eat within walking distance.

The hosts were great. They made sure we were comfortable. Terry was there at the airport to pick us up and on our way she even gave a quick orientation of nearest train station, restaurants and convenience stores that helped us a lot throughout our stay. The room and bath room were very neat and clean. They had even kept basic toiletaries. We were free to use the kitchen and walk into the house at anytime. Bus stops and train stations are walking distance which is a big plus point. And, not to forget the beautiful view from their house that Yiu cab wake up to. I would rate 5/5 in all aspects. Highly recommended
Very nice place. Clean and comfortable. Terry, the host, was great, very friendly and helpful. The place is very convenience to travel by bus to center of town. Strongly recommend.

Terry was fantastic,  she picked us up from the airport and was very warm and honest.  She helped us with directions around sydney and what buses / where to visit.  The apartment was great, lovely view of rushcutters bay and the boats.  Right near a park and a short walk up a hill to kings cross where everything was available,  shopping, trains etc. Withing walking distance to city. Bus just as easy.  Apartment fully fitted out with cozy and soft bed, relatively noisy due to a busy road but bearable.  Terry and Craig were busy so we didn't see them allot but fantastic hosts. Would stay again and recommend. 
Thanks Terry and Craig.
It was nice place and near the city. The room I was very clean . Terry is very nice host.

Terry's house is very nice. The best part is the kitchen. It's very tidy and full of different cooking tools and spices. And there were a teddy bear sitting on our bed to welcome us. It's really surprise us. We have a really nice time here.Thanks Terry.
Nice apartment to stay for a few nights. own bathroom and plenty of room with amazing views. Terry was great. Very easy to be picked up from the airport and dropped back. Would stay again.

房东人非常热情!很健谈,就是我们自己英语单词量有限,所以能聊的不多……但是房东真的非常热络,性格开放的小伙伴一定聊得来!房子出行挺方便的,离CBD什么的还是挺近,在厨房就可以看看一个海港,风景真的很棒!不过房子临街,晚上还是挺吵的,对隔音要求高的感觉会……失眠……然后厕所没有通风设施?(肉眼看着有很厚的灰然后找不到按钮),我们是秋冬来的,不知道夏天有没有影响……最后房东人很好,订她的优步接送机很方便!
Great location. Nice stay.
We had a great stay with Terry. Beautiful house, location and view. I would highly recommend.
Terry is a super host and my stay was nothing short of comfortable and pleasant. I would definitely recommend staying at Terry's. Thanks Terry for a wonderful stay.

Great location, cafes and bars and stores nearby. 
Spacious room. 
Lovely host, always helpful and super polite!
Highly recommended!!!
Great hostess ! We stayed here during 1 week and everything was amazing with an incredible view on Rushcutters bay!! I recommend!
Terry was an incredible host! She offered to pick us up and take us back to the airport. She gave us some great tips on where to go in Sydney and made sure we were well accommodated during our stay!

Staying with Terry was really quite nice. I stayed 12 days and I highly recommend it. The location is really nice. There's a park nearby and it isn't hard to get to any places. The building is a high rise apartment and the view is really nice - as is the comfortable bed and bathroom to yourself. Terry is flexible with check-ins and helped me with my luggage. I loved it!

Great location, very clean and easy to communicate. The view is wobderful. Public transport is easy and cheap. Had a lovely time meeting Terry and would recommend. Thanks for your patience with flight cancellations and delays!

Terry was a lovely host and her flat is in a great location with all the amenities you need. She's incredibly friendly and it was lovely to spend some time with her in the evenings watching movies. The traffic can be a bit loud but earplugs sorted that, and her boyfriend was pretty loud the last night with his mates waking me up and keeping me awake in the middle of the night, but Terry was very apologetic for this so shouldn't happen again! Apart from the last night it was a great stay with a lovely host.

Terry was an excellent host, friendly and helpful to the maximum. She made sure i knew where to go. Comfy as bed, large room and generous in opening up her home. Great location and views to the bay. Would go back again for sure. Thank you! Jane

We had a great stay at Terry's in Sydney. The place was neat and clean in a well maintained apartment building. 
The location was also easily identifiable and close too to train stations.
Check in was smooth even though Terry was out on work. We had everything we needed right from bathroom amenities and a comfortable night stay.
Note for future travelers - make sure the right Vibe hotel ( Rushcutters bay) is entered in address as there are a couple of Vibe hotels in Sydney
It is a clean, quiet place and also has a beautiful view. Terry is a super nice host, and I really enjoyed staying there.

Had a great stay here!  The views from the apartment are wonderful, and the location is great- very close to Kings Cross station. The room is clean, the bed is comfortable and it was nice to have the bathroom to myself. Highly recommend!
Wonderful views from a great location for seeing Sydney. Thanks for the use of your facilities and your advice about getting around.
Ich hatte eine feste Buchung diese wurde aber am Abend vorher grundlos storniert
Terry is a great host ! She was up to every detail ! Lots of movies to choose from if you have a difficult day, great advices of the city and awesome place to stay
Friendly hosts, clean facilities, comfy bed - would definitely stay here again. Thanks Terry!
Superb apartment in a great location. Bars and shops nearby in King's Cross, a great view of the harbour and a lovely helpful host. A great place to stay.

My friend and I came for a dream trip to see the Sydney at NYE and what a blessing! Terry’s and Craig’s place is in the perfect location - it is very close to numerous eating spots and public transit. There is even a beautiful park and bay right across the street. 

Thank you for making our vacation! We would and will definitely return. Til next time....

I love the communication with Terry.she was very patient with me. 
She gave me tips for my trip.
And..... the bed is so,so,so confortable!!!!!! You could stay in, all day long! 

Thank you terry and see you!
房东人很好｡一次完美的住宿体验｡如果再来悉尼,我会再一次入住｡

房子和图片里描述的一样,交通便利(靠近King Cross火车站,前后都有还有直达市区公交站)非常好找~
卧室､客厅､厨房都有无敌海景,房间也很舒服~
Terry人很热情,我爸妈完全不懂英文,她还是用心帮助,用翻译软件跟我爸妈细心沟通;分享她的投影电视,还特意找来中文电影给我爸妈佐餐,真是无敌好!我们因为行程定的太晚没和父母住一起,每天来接他们Terry也都热情接待,没觉得我们打扰,真的很感谢!

Terry's place is lovely! The bed is SO comfy, and the living room is super spacious. Terry was a lovely host and really accommodating. Great location, just a short walk from Kings Cross and Edgecliff station and if you can't be bothered to explore there's a great pool for sunbathing.

Terry was a fantastic host and very easy to communicate with. Her place was in a great location for Kings Cross / Edgecliff stations (10minutes away) and buses to town / beaches were also just around the corner. Fantastic view of Rushcutters Bay!

This was my first trip to Australia and I must say I couldn’t have asked for better hosts and location. 

Check in was seamless as I arrived early in the morning on Easter Sunday. 

They gave me tips on transportation and how to get around in the neighborhood. 

The room has a nice view of the park and bay across the street. 

They both are very easy to chat with and very open to answer any questions you may have. 

For being so far away from home, it definitely felt like a home away from home.

I nearly cried when I hugged Terry goodbye. I was there for about 2 weeks and I really felt like I made a friend. Terry was super nice to talk to but she allowed you to set the boundaries so if you wanted to be social, you could and if you didn't want to be,you could have your privacy. Even though the listing technically says that you have a private room and washroom to yourself, I actually had the entire place to myself many days. Terry went the extra mile by taking me out to Salsa night for my birthday and we've had her home-cooked dinner while watching movies. The room comes with several guides on stuff to do in Sydney as well. Everything was clean and there was ample space in the fridge and the cupboards to store your food. Amazing experience overall.

It was my first Airbnb stay and I couldn’t have expected anything better. It was so convenient and comfortable. The location is amazing and is close to everything. 
Would definitely recommend this place!
Very nice host! Terry is very easy to communicate and offered me seamless checkin and checkout. You can access to town easily from her place. Highly recommended.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Ein wunderbar magischer Ort mit einer grandiosen Aussicht, sehr ruhig und erholsam auf einer tollen Insel. Celal ist ein wunderbarer Gastgeber, der sich rührend um unser Wohlbefinden gekümmert hat und uns seine Lieblingsorte und Einkaufsgelegenheiten nahebrachte. Der beste Ort, indem wir auf den Prinzeninseln bis jetzt sein konnten.

name: 5 STARS DOWNTOWN with PARKING ( 2BDR )BELL Center
summary: Condo in the heart of downtown, next to the Bell Centre, this unit is furnished with LUXE equipment, with stunning views of the city. outdoor pool, barbecue area, bar, cinema room, games other salons, and offices, a bathroom and a sauna Sports (all offering free WI-FI). Near the underground METRO TRAIN and SHOPPING CENTRE and all amenities on foot. PRIVATE PARKING IS AVAILABLE $ 25 per day. The best experience of Montreal.

Great open concept living space - 800 square feet- and 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom - Dining Room - Lounge - air conditioning unit - microwave, stove, refrigerator - ceramic and hardwood. Wifi throughout the apartment. WiFi in public areas. You can also access a Netflix account. Questions and concerns will be addressed without delay. I'll make sure you have everything you need to stay as pleasant as possible. Close to all amenities, located in downtown Montreal, the apartment is a few minutes from shopping centers, restaurants, bars, grocery stores and convenience stores.

( les serviettes de bain ne sont ni un démaquillant ni un chiffon pour essuyiez les chaussures )  • Respect mutuel. • PROHIBITS smoking of cigarettes and drugs inside the apartment and the building (smoke detectors are evicted from the building immediately and a fine of 500 $) • No evening or party EXPULSION OF THE BUILDING WITH FINE OF $ 500) (A quiet dinner with friends never bothered anyone) • Absolutely NO guests other than the ones that have reserved.(I charge $ 100 for each traveler not included in th

host.host_about: Responsible and attention to detail. I have 10 years experience in customer service and in the hotel industry. My objective is that you spend beautiful vacations

reviews.comments:
Great location to stay at when visiting Montreal. Very close to downtown and directly attached to the Bell Centre. 

Great host, fast responses and a very nice apartment. Would recommend to anyone, and will come back again!
Noussa and her boyfriend are very nice people. They are very kind to us and show us anything that we need. We were having a very good time! Thanks!
Information is accurate. Everything feels like home. Furnitures are clean. Definitely recommend this place!
Great location in the heart of Montreal with unbeatable indoor parking garage
Great location
L'emplacement géographique est parfaite pour une game du Canadiens. L'accueil de Medhi était excellent et le logement bien adéquat.
Great spot, would recommend to anyone!
Beautiful condo in a great building. Host was very helpful. Will definately stay here again next year!
This apartment is nicely decorated and the space is quite big.everything is  good about his apartment but the owner charge $25 /day of the parking space. It's quite expensive.

Noussa's spot is very convenient base to explore Montreal. Very easy to get to from the airport, and close to public transportation if you want to explore other areas.

The apartment is also very clean and nice, although a bit smaller than pictured. No complaints though on size. I would highly recommend to anyone.
Great stay at this apartment! Noussa and her boyfriend are very friendly and accommodating. Would definitely go back!
Emplacement parfait pour événements au centre Bell. Logement moderne et fonctionnel. Super accueil de la part de l'hôte !

The condo had amazing views and the host was very professional and made the entire check-in/check-out experience fast and easy.

We were also provided with complimentary drinks which were unexpected but highly enjoyed.

Thanks.
Great place with a spectacular view of Montreal! Definitely reccomend!

I can't review the property because this host cancelled my reservation just before my visit. She magically had another property available at twice the price. This was during the F1 race so basically I was stuck as the city was basically no vacancy given the 10 day notice. This is my first host failure with airbandb. I was also disappointed airbandb provided no resolution for this issue. So I am not sure what to others renting from this host.
