Possibly there was a real issue with the apartment that was identified 10 days before my visit but could not be fixed by my arrival or they realized they rented it to me at too cheap a price and canceled the reservation knowing I would be stuck.

Stay perfectly on 26th floor in Montreal!

The condo is directly in downtown perfectly located. The condo is brand new and equipt with everything you need for your stay. The check in was easy and perfectly organized. 5+Star-Rating!
Enjoy your stay. 
Thanks Noussa
Great place, great host, asewome vieu
Nice place good location and great view
We had an excellent stay at the apartment.  It is a lovely building that is conveniently located, including having a metro stop.  Thank you for the hospitality.
Great place

This was my first Airbnb experience and Noussa was very helpful. Not only was checking in easy, she was willing to work with our schedule as we were driving in and had unexpected delays. When we checked in, she gave us a thorough walkthrough of everything from parking to checking out at the end of our stay. Additionally, she gave us suggestions on things to check out in Montreal. She was also very easy to contact, and was always willing to help out, as the case when we came back one day to find out someone had mistakenly taken our parking spot. She was very quick in finding a solution and we didn't have to worry about parking anywhere else since parking downtown can be expensive. 

Overall a very good experience.

Great location. Everything within walking distance. We parked the car all 4 days and walked or used the Metro. Communication was excellent with Noussa. We had 4 adults in the condo, a little tight with only one bathroom. Condo was great, gym was excellent and outdoor common space was nice.
SUPERBE APPARTEMENT!! L'hôte est vraiment gentille. L'appartement est luxueux et entièrement équipé. Je le recommande à tous. Le bâtiment est magnifique.

Had a fantastic time in Montreal! The location is perfect in the centre of everything. We just parked our car and walked everywhere. It was great to have access to the pool and relax after so much walking. Noussa was a great host, easy to communicate with and really accommodating! The place was really clean and that's saying a lot coming from me since I'm a clean freak. I highly recommend this place. I will definitely go back next time I'm in Montreal.

Great location, close to shops, restaurants and metro.  Apartment was clean, spacious and being on the 26th floor had good views over the city.  2nd bed was a pull-down bed and curtained off rather than being in a separate room but worked OK for us.  Great amenities in the building although the spa was closed during our visit but we enjoyed the outdoor pool and would have used the BBQ had we stayed longer!
Great location with walking distances to travelers spots. Noussa is very helpful with the check in. The unit is nice and clean, with all the fancy facilities in the condo building.

The apartment is very centrally located, and convenient. The host was very friendly and easy to communicate. However, the unit is smaller than the photos depicted and not exactly 2 BR as advertised. Also the master BR had only sheer curtains to block any day light after 6 am.

Never felt so welcome before , this airbnb was amazing, i stayed 3 days it was very spacious and really awesome location had a great time! I ever lost one of the house keys in the elevator and panicked but Noussa saved me with a spare at the right time! Communication was great she would reply instantly and make sure i had everything i need ! She went above and beyond! Cleanliness 100% dust free it looks like it was never lived in before and also HUGE balcony and awesome view! Thanks Noussa! Looking forward to coming back soon
Great place at a great price. Noussa answered at once when we had a question or two. We have been travelling the airbnb way for four years. This is one of the best places
Wonderful experience! Great amenities!
Check in and check out was fast and punctual. Very professional. Thanks!
Excellent location! Grocery store right across the street and shopping only a few blocks walk away.
Very central apartment with a good terrace and small swimming pool af 10th flloor. Noussa is very efficient and easy to reach for any help. Parking available

Sehr netter Kontakt- die Lage ist ausserordentlich- wir waren inmitten des Geschehens- die Jugendlichen genossen den Kraftraum und wir Chilene bei Steak und wunderbarer Aussicht. Wer kann schon sein Steak im 10 Stock mit einer Aussicht über die Stadt zubereiten.
Die Altstadt ist mit der Metro, Station unter dem Haus, sehr gut zu erreichen. Wir werden sicher wiederkommen.

The location of the condo was amazing! The condo itself was also beautiful. However, we were a bit disappointed when it said it came with three beds and only two were available on arrival. Thankfully, she kindly brought the other one but we spent some time looking for it! Also, there was unfortunately not enough toilet paper to last out three day stay! There was also some confusion with the parking, there is no free parking available which was disappointing. Despite all this, would still recommend a stay here.

Noussa nous a efficacement accueillis, s'est montrée arrangeante ( notamment pour l'horaire de notre départ, le parking...) et reste discrète .
Nous avons apprécié l'appartement , qui est neuf, même si une des 2 chambres n'est fermée que par un rideau, la Tour avec ses installations communes (nous avons profité de la piscine , des barbecues sur la terrasse, du gym...), de son emplacement près du centre-ville , des commerces, des restaurants, du musée des beaux-arts ...
Nous avons fait un excellent séjour et nous sommes beaucoup plus.
Nadine

Great place, great view, great stay. 
I totally recommend it.
Really great find on such short notice! Our host was extremely helpful with everything! The place was beautiful.

Superbe appartement, propre, et très bien situé pour visiter Montréal!
Noussa répond rapidement et est de très bon conseil!

Our stay here was perfect! AMAZING location with a great view of downtown! Loved the condo, very bright and modern (all new appliances). The amenities were awesome too, we loved the rooftop pool it was very chic and a fun spot to hang out! Noussa was also very helpful and easy to reach if we had any questions! Would def recommend :)
Great location, close to everything. Lots of nice restaurants, bars and entertainment around. Noussa was flexible and made us feel really welcome. Would definitely stay here again.

This was a very cool and close to everything place. The view is great and the condo was laid out very comfortably. Parking was $25 a day, but you are in a climate controlled secured building attached to the complex. If your wanting to be close to everything within a mile or so this is it.

We were visiting Montreal for a couple of days and decided to try air bnb for the first time. We lucked out with such a great apartment and host. The apartment is just as pictured and described, it's very clean and modern. The view is incredible. It is centrally located and easy to get to restaurants, shops, and the subway. The building is very luxurious, modern and has a lot of amenities. The parking lot is clean and well spaced, we left our car there and were able to explore the city by foot and public transit. Noussa met us to show us to our parking space, guided us in and then showed us around the apartment. She was very responsive and texted us all the info as well.  We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back!
Super place, super bien situé, mieux que l'hôtel!
Clean, modern, and convenient. Middle of downtown with shopping, grocery, and restaurants within a couple of blocks.
Great place too stay. Excellent location. Great apartment
We are very satisfied with everything, especyially accesibility, cleaness, comfortability, goodview and so on.
Noussa was great with communication and very nice. Everything was exactly as expected and better! Perfect location !

I absolutely loved my stay here. It is right in the heart of downtown Montréal and everything is short walk away. Noussa was very helpful and answered every and all questions we had. I will definitely be returning to this unit during my next visit!
Sublime appartement dans le centre de Montreal, excellente propreté, très bon accueil, appartement tout neuf, très joli, vue incroyable ;)

L'appartement est merveilleux, niveau qualité prix incroyable.

Le batiment propose de nombreux atouts tels que billiard, piscine etc
Je recommande fortement cet appartement de par sa localisation, sa propreté et la décoration.

L'hote est très réactif et sympathique.

NOTE : 5/5
The place is amazing and clean just as pictures. Convenient location. I had a great time.  Thank you!!
This place is very central and the view is amazing
Had a great stay!
位置很好 房间很干净 阳台风景极佳 房东回复信息很迅速 很热情
J'ai passé un séjour magnifique en toute tranquillité dans l'édifice tout en étant au cœur de la Ville.

Endroit extraordinaire et impeccable, tout était parfait! Propreté, communication, épicerie en face et à même le centre Bell.., sans oublier l'accès au Metro à quelques secondes, bref à ne pas manquer si vous avez un évènement au centre Bell ou dans les environs! Nous avons même ajouté une nuit en cours de séjour tellement nous étions biens, et Noussa à répondu à notre demande en quelques minutes seulement.., merci!!
Beautiful place, Although the photos posted are not what the suite actually looks like.. its different. Parking was $25 a day, the add is misleading on that part.
Great place, great area

Our stay here was great. The location was perfect, and we loved the condo, it was spotless and very modern. This is a beautiful quiet building; we loved the gym and hope to come back in summer to enjoy the pool.  Noussa was very helpful and always responded within a few mins.
Noussa was a great host and very attentive in terms of customer service

Literally right next to the Bell Centre and has some nice views. Space was nice and clean. Has climate controlled parking garage which is nice. Building is pretty neat. The game room (11th floor) was pretty nice too. Overall it is a nice apartment in a great building and lives up to the expectations.
Nice view
Noussa’s has really nice spot in central downtown Montreal,she was an amazing host. The condo was so clean and had everything any visitors would need it. We enjoyed our staying :)

We have rented apartments for over 10 years - Noussa is the BEST agent we have had - her personality and experience really show - An excellent communicator. - We will be back next year  for the Habs 2 games on Super Bowl weekend . Handing over the keys is very easy and the SS1 entrance is great - Nobody gets left standing out in the cold - you are allowed to wait in the SS! lobby on rue de la Montagne - Great communication  from start to finish - Thank you 

Tom Gawrylash, Ancaster, Ontario

Great location next to the Bell Centre. Great gym. One master bed and a another bed sectioned off by a curtain. Very modern kitchen and bathroom. Very useful to get parking in this area. Owner very responsive. Would stay again.
Great location. Amazing hospitality.

You can literally walk downstairs and see a Canadiens hockey game.  The location is central to everything. Restaurants, malls, supermarkets, boutiques, museums, shows, cinema and the metro....etc.  PERFECT!
Niceeee
Will comeback for sure
Good location, quiet building. Had a great time
Great location with great view.
Very central location, lovely view and very clean. Good amenities too.
Extremely clean. Very comfortable sofa and bed. BUT the owner doesn't provide laundry detergent, which brings inconvenience in daily life.

Noussa is a great hostess!  She was very accommodating and responsive.  The unit was clean and in a very convenient location.   Two blocks from  amazing shopping and restaurants.  A nice supermarket is located across the street  Highly recommended!!!

This apartment is really convenient and nice. I was attending a conference at Concordia and I was able to walk. I also had my baby and mother-in-law, and we all had space and a good experience. The beds are very comfortable and our travel crib fit in the main bedroom. It was also convenient to have the parking (which I think Noussa is very clear in the ad that it's 25$ per day), because parking downtown overnight for five days is not easy. The building is very modern and new and there is a grocery store right next door.  Noussa is a great host!
Easy check in. Superb location and facilities. Kids loved the view and the outdoor pool. Would absolutely recommend to anyone visiting Montreal.
Noussa responded very quickly. It was a really nice stay.
Overall it‘s great

Noussa’s place is clean and tidy. The location is great (close to downtown and metro). Although the apartment is small (like 1 BR), it’s very well designed to host three of us without a feeling of crowdedness. 

Noussa is very responsive and considerate. She welcomed us in person and replied to our questions in no time. She offered us another parking space because of the size of our car.
Great location and a modern apartment with stylish ammentaties

Good for groups of 4 or less. 
If you are on a budget, 5 or more can work but it’s tighter...

Great place to stay at in Montreal. Has air conditioning (a big plus for the summer), modern furniture, balcony with a view, pool, bbq, and game room. Beautiful view from up in the high rise. Easy to get to everything downtown.

A great location. Very communicative host. The bathroom is small with limited space for toiletries and towels. Space is adequate for 2 bedroom users but cramped for 3. Cute, small pool with 4 poster sun beds. Felt uncomfortable given it’s not an official Airbnb site.
Merci pour cette accueil . Parfait
Wouldn’t suggest this space due to inaccurate description of listing .

name: HM - Bonjardim Studio Downtown
summary: This apartment is located in Porto downtown, close to Avenida dos Aliados and Trindade subway station. The studio belongs to a building recently rehabilitated and it has all the pleasant accommodations to make your stay more comfortable.
description: This apartment is located in Porto downtown, close to Avenida dos Aliados and Trindade subway station. The studio belongs to a building recently rehabilitated and it has all the pleasant accommodations to make your stay more comfortable.

host.host_about:
Somos uma empresa especializada na gestão de alojamento local. Tratamos cada propriedade como se fosse nossa, porque queremos que os hóspedes se sintam em casa – acreditamos que só assim faz sentido!

Como bons portuenses, somos excelentes anfitriões e sugerimos dicas especiais para que os nossos convidados possam aproveitar a estadia ao máximo, desde visitas a museus aos restaurantes imperdíveis. Partilhamos segredos que fazem do Porto uma cidade mágica. 

Aos proprietários, e nossos parceiros nesta aventura, prometemos experiência, conhecimento e dedicação, com o objetivo de rentabilizar ao máximo cada propriedade. 

We are a company that specialises in managing short term rental properties in Porto, Portugal.

We take care of our managed properties as if they were our own because we want our guests to feel at home and not have to worry about anything when they visit.
 
Just like the inhabitants of Porto, we are friendly hosts and can provide tips for our guests to make the most of their stay. We can recommend museums, restaurants, bars and can provide suggestions on alternative things to do (river cruises, football matches, etc...) As long term residents of the city we can share those hidden gems that make Porto such a magical city.
 
For home owners and potential business partners, we promise a professional service, expertise and dedication that will help you to maximise your returns.
Home Me – Making You Feel Good

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: El apartamento esta limpio y muy completo en la cocina con utensilios y electrodomesticos
Amazing place! We got so many great tips from the host plus the apartment is perfect in every way! Love the design, great location, clean and honestly can’t even dream of something better!

name: Appartement en bord de mer
summary: Nous vous proposons de passer un séjour dans un T3 avec vue sur le port et à seulement 800m de la plage.  Appartement de 6 personnes, spacieux et confortable  doté de 3 grandes baies vitrées offrant une belle vue sur le port de Povoa de varzim, séjour ouvert sur la cuisine, 2 chambres avec des lits de 2 personnes, un canapé-lit ainsi qu'un lit bébé sur demande. Pour vous satisfaire, celui-ci sera équipé de linge de lit, serviettes de toilette et torchons avant votre arrivée.
space: Appartement moderne  avec un bel espace à vivre, avec deux chambres avec lits doubles pour le confort et d'un canapé-lit dans le séjour, un lit Bébé d'appoint ainsi qu'une chaise haute et rehausseur sont à disposition pour les plus petits. L'appartement est spacieux et lumineux grâce à ses grandes baies vitrées offrant une belle vue sur le port de povoa de varzim. Il dispose d'une cuisine bien équipée  (réfrigérateur, lave-vaisselle, four, plaque de cuisson induction, micro-ondes, machine à café, ustensiles de cuisine, etc ...), il dispose aussi d'un sèche-cheveux, d'une télévision et d'internet à haut débit. Draps, couvertures, serviettes de bain sont mis à votre disposition gratuitement . L'appartement est situé à Povoa de Varzim  et à coter de la ville de villa do conde avec plusieurs plages, un port de plaisance et offre une belle vue sur la mer. Près de tout commerces, métro, allées piétonnes/cyclables et également près du grand casino et face à la plage et du port de plaisance.
description: Nous vous proposons de passer un séjour dans un T3 avec vue sur le port et à seulement 800m de la plage.  Appartement de 6 personnes, spacieux et confortable  doté de 3 grandes baies vitrées offrant une belle vue sur le port de Povoa de varzim, séjour ouvert sur la cuisine, 2 chambres avec des lits de 2 personnes, un canapé-lit ainsi qu'un lit bébé sur demande. Pour vous satisfaire, celui-ci sera équipé de linge de lit, serviettes de toilette et torchons avant votre arrivée. Appartement moderne  avec un bel espace à vivre, avec deux chambres avec lits doubles pour le confort et d'un canapé-lit dans le séjour, un lit Bébé d'appoint ainsi qu'une chaise haute et rehausseur sont à disposition pour les plus petits. L'appartement est spacieux et lumineux grâce à ses grandes baies vitrées offrant une belle vue sur le port de povoa de varzim. Il dispose d'une cuisine bien équipée  (réfrigérateur, lave-vaisselle, four, plaque de cuisson induction, micro-ondes, machine à café, ustensiles de cuis
notes: Idéalement situer pour visiter le nord du Portugal ainsi que porto ( 45 min de métro), et profiter du poisson frais que vous pouvez acheter aux pêcheurs directement à 200metres à pieds ou profiter de la restauration pas cher.
transit: Vous pourrez visiter le Nord du Portugal grâce à la ligne de métro reliant povoa de varzim à porto et l’aéroport, et rejoindre Villa do condé via la ligne de bus, arrêt à coté de l’église . Stationnement gratuits sur la voie public. Mer/ port de plaisance : 1 min ( 80m), Plage : 8 min ( 800m ), Centre Ville : 8 min ( 800m), Métro :  5 min ( 550m ),Casino :  7 min ( 750m ) Porto  : Env 45 Min ( 2, 70 € Z6 )      Aéroport  :   Env 40 min ( 1, 50 € Z3)
access: L'appartement est entièrement mis à votre disposition

address.government_area: Póvoa de Varzim, Beiriz e Argivai

reviews.comments: Appartement bien au calme ainsi il y' avait plein de petits cartes visites et des brochures de la ville et les alentours pour visiter la région.
Apartamento totalmente equipado. Estadia bastante agradável.

appartement très bien équipé idéalement situé proche de la mer et des transports en commun. Accueil parfait par une personne parlant Portugais et Français. L'appartement est situé à 5min à pied du centre de Povoa, ce qui permet de visiter la ville très facilement. Nous recommandons ce logement pour un voyage à Povoa de Varzim.

Appartement très très bien situé avec la plage proche.
Toutes commodités à proximité.
Appartement très agréable à vivre avec une cuisine équipée excellente.
Merci à vous pour la location.

Appartement très bien équipé (même avec un enfant en bas âge) et très bien entretenu. Accueil par une personne parlant français qui nous a donné quelques conseil sur la ville, c'est très appréciable. 
Situé à moins de 10 min à pied du centre ville, de la plage et du métro (moins d'une heure de métro pour se rendre à Porto). 
Nous recommandons cet appartement

Overall disappointment with this apartment.
I will describe the two main issues I had with this apartment:
1) Check In: it is listed at this apartment description that the check-in can be done between 3pm and 8pm. However when I contacted the host asking if I could check-in at 3pm, the host told me that I could only check-in at 9pm. After I said that this late time was unacceptable, the host suggested that I could check-in at 6pm. Since I had no other option I had to accept this offer. Then the other problem was that I arrived at the apartment at 6pm - as agreed - but I had to wait 40 minutes until someone came to open me the door and handover the keys.
2) The Noise: the noise coming from the street or from the neighbours was very, very audible inside this apartment. I guess this is not something that the host can fix, but I need to leave this note for future guests.
On a positive note: the apartment is in a good location and, apart from the fact that does not have a washing machine, it is well equipped.
The house and the location was good. May be some noise from the neigbours.
Espaço impecável. A voltar :)

Appartement proche du métro qui vient de l'aéroport, beaucoup de commerces et restaurants aux alentours. Très belle promenade en bords de mer avec de bons équipements pour les enfants ! Nous avons été très bien accueillis dès notre arrivée, l'appartement est confortable et fonctionnel avec des enfants. Nous y avons séjourné avec nos deux enfants de 10 mois et de 2ans et demi...nous avions à disposition un lit de bébé ,une chaise haute et un réhausseur pour les repas...nous recommandons vivement aux familles !!!

Very nice place - great balcony, location is very near the sea and the main hub of the town, and is conveniently near a metro station. It is situated close to a church; the bell rings every 30 minutes which was a little annoying at night. Still, we had a great stay here and highly recommend it.
Super Aufenthalt.
Tanto la casa como su ubicación perfecto.
Super appartement très complet et très bien située. Il y a tout à votre portée , commerces , tramway, plage, restos. je le conseille à tout le monde, moi j'y retournerais.

Bon accueil de Fransisco , et ne donnez pas d'importance à la façade de l'immeuble , l'intérieur est bien agréable . Apparteurefait à neuf avec tous les équipements nécessaires , bien situé en centre ville et près du Port.
Bon rapport qualité prix .

Super appart, jolie endroit et bien situé ! Beaucoup moins de touristes qu'à Porto et vie de quartier typique. Les gens y sont très accueillants. Seul bémol : l'église sonne tous les heures et les voisins et leurs chiens sont bruyants.

Excellent  appartement .N' hésitez pas , accueil parfait par Francisco,l'appartement est moderne et neuf avec tout les équipements nécessaires  pour un excellent séjour, literie parfaite  tout le linge est fournis . Idéalement situé pour pouvoir visiter plusieurs sites incontournables du Nord Portugal grâce au autoroutes toutes proches   et au métro pas loin pour descendre au centre de Porto en toute tranquillité .Sur place de nombreux restaurants et balades en bord de mer en soirée  très agréable.
Très  bel appartement  bien située
Très jolie Appartement très bien situé et propriétaire très réactif et très sympas. À refaire

Alojamiento muy bien situado, cerca del mar, de zona comercial y de metro. Muy buena relación calidad precio. Equipado con todo lo necesario. Sin duda, repetiremos, será una opción excelente en verano, para disfrutar la playa y la ciudad.
Casa numa localização excelente, bem equipada, limpa e arrumada! Fomos muito bem recebidos.
Bien reçu . Appartement propre et accueillant avec vue sur mer  nous renouvellerons sûrement un petit weekend à Povao de Varzim
Pas de surprise, les photos correspondent exactement au logement. Bien situé.

L'appartement n'est pas très grand mais fonctionnel et bien situé. En revanche, les murs sont très mal insonorisés et les voisins parfois bruyants le soir. De plus, le bruit du moteur dans les escaliers est vraiment dérangeant, particulièrement le soir.

Petit appartement qui correspond à l'annonce pas très loin de la plage et du centre ville tout ce fais à pied, malheureusement l'environnement est peu bruyant surtout les cloches de l'église qui est toute proche, l'hôte est vraiment sympathique.

This apartment is cute and very clean. The house keeper was just finishing up when we got there- very thourough. They have a stocked kitchen with everything you need. Towels for each guest and provided a play pen/crib for my toddler and a beach bucket with toys as well. Wifi was available. 
Downfall is that It’s on the third floor so you’ll have to climb a few set of stairs which was hard with luggage’s. It’s beside the port rather than the beach area, but we didn’t have a problem as it was easy to drive to the beach- you could walk, about 3km. The area on the weekend is quite busy so it gets loud, especially with the thin walls you can hear the neighbors very easily. 
Parking was on the streets so you had to drive around a bit to find a spot some times.

Appart au top malgres les voisin quelques fois bruyant... Une clim sera l ideal ou ne serai ce qu un ventilateur serai le bienvenu ! Sinon l'hote est vraiment gentil et l accueil et parfait. Appartement propre et fonctionnel. Merci !

Propre, lumineux, bien situé pour aller en ville où à la plage à pied. Appartement fonctionnel. 
Un peu de bruit mais rien de bien grave. Je recommande .
Malgré une bonne situation et une propreté irréprochable je ne recommande pas cet appartement compte tenu des nuisances sonores trop importantes.

Great location of the apartment - close to the beach, restaurants, shops.
The downside of the location was the church, which bell ringed every half hour - even at night.
A flat smaller than in the picture - I think that there is no more than 40 square meters - for 4 people perfect.
There was no hair dryer in the apartment, and in the description it was.
Very helpful owner - he replied to all messages.
The house is very clean and has everything you need in a house. It's not far away from the beach, it's a nice location. The shops are nearby. We really enjoyed our stay here!
Cozy, well located and quite place.

L'appartement est bien situé géographiquement mais le bruit du clocher qui annonce chaque heure et mêmes les demi... me réveillait tout le temps! 
Il faut aussi savoir que l'isolation au Portugal n'est pas comme en Suisse et que vous entendez tout et quand le voisin reçoit du monde c'est comme s'ils étaient 15 à discuter dans la chambre à côté de vous !
J'ai regretté le manque de literie et aussi le fait qu'il n'y avait même pas de papier wc et du savon pour les mains dans la salle de bains.

name: Coconut Beach. Kapaa Condo 1BD 1BA Full Kitchen
summary: Vacation Rental, Sleeps 4, No Hidden Fees. Guests are sure to enjoy a memorable vacation in this Fully Furnished, 1 Bedroom/1 Bath condo. The Bedroom has a 2 Full Size Beds, and a TV. The Living Room has a TV, DVD Player with Netflix & Vudu Apps and High Speed Wi-Fi. The kitchen is perfect for dining as it is equipped with range, oven, kitchen utensils, and refrigerator. Coin operated Washers & Dryers located in Building at end of hall. PLEASE NO GROUP PAYMENT RESERVATIONS!!!
space: A 3-minute walk from the beach, this laid-back condo is 1.7 miles from the botanical garden at Smith's Tropical Paradise and 9.7 miles from Wailua Falls.  Plush condo offers Kitchen, Large Private Lanai, flat-screen TVs (2) and DVD players, plus Free High Speed Wi-Fi and separate living rooms with pull-out sofa. Amenities include 3 outdoor pools and 2 hot tubs, as well as beach access, shuffleboard courts, and picnic areas with BBQs.
description: Vacation Rental, Sleeps 4, No Hidden Fees. Guests are sure to enjoy a memorable vacation in this Fully Furnished, 1 Bedroom/1 Bath condo. The Bedroom has a 2 Full Size Beds, and a TV. The Living Room has a TV, DVD Player with Netflix & Vudu Apps and High Speed Wi-Fi. The kitchen is perfect for dining as it is equipped with range, oven, kitchen utensils, and refrigerator. Coin operated Washers & Dryers located in Building at end of hall. PLEASE NO GROUP PAYMENT RESERVATIONS!!! A 3-minute walk from the beach, this laid-back condo is 1.7 miles from the botanical garden at Smith's Tropical Paradise and 9.7 miles from Wailua Falls.  Plush condo offers Kitchen, Large Private Lanai, flat-screen TVs (2) and DVD players, plus Free High Speed Wi-Fi and separate living rooms with pull-out sofa. Amenities include 3 outdoor pools and 2 hot tubs, as well as beach access, shuffleboard courts, and picnic areas with BBQs. Pool, Hot Tub, BBQ, Coin Operated Laundry in Building & More You will have total
neighborhood_overview: Unique Benefits at this Condo: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Our guests LOVE our central location along the Royal Coconut Coast on Kauai's east side. Close to any Hawaiian amenity or activity you can imagine and making it easy to for day trip to either end/shore of the beautiful 'Garden Isle' of Kauai. We are also right in front of Sleeping Giant Mountain with 3 hiking trails on different sides to enjoy the spectacular views of the Royal Coconut coast line. Everything you need to relax and enjoy your time on the beautiful 'Garden Isle' :)
notes: A great place to stay!!!  We completely enjoyed our stay at this condo. The size was great for the four of us and the kitchen was a real bonus as it was clean and equipped wit;h the basic needs for the week. We appreciated having extra beach towels and the cooler was a nice touch. The location was great as it wasn't too far from the airport in Lihue. We really enjoyed walking around the Coconut Market in the evenings to complete our day. The beds were comfortable and the place generally felt clean and comfortable. Love the storage closets!!! We would love to return to this condo when we head back to Kauai. Thank you for helping to make our visit to Kauai great!!! Stayed: March 2017Submitted: April 18, 2017 Emily S. Clean, spacious, pool/grill area right off lanai.  Clean, spacious, pool and grill right off lanai. Beach towels and cooler available to use. Beach near condo. Ice machine near front desk. Front desk helpful. Close to shopping center. Perfect spot for traveling around the is
access: Pool, Hot Tub, BBQ, Coin Operated Laundry in Building & More
interaction: You will have total privacy
house_rules: GROUP PAYMENT RESERVATIONS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED!!! NOTICE: You will need a  valid ID that matches the name on the reservation in order to to get the key. You will need to provide a valid First & Last Name to make a reservation. Check-In Info: Go to Office/Reservation Desk located at the property (525 Aleka Loop Kapaa, HI 96746) between 3PM and 11PM. If you cannot arrive before 11PM call the office ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) before 11PM to make arrangements for the Security Guard to give you the key.

reviews.comments: Lovely stay at Pete's place near Coconut Marketplace! Good location near the beach. The condo itself is neat, clean and stocked with everything you need, but definitely no frills. A little decor brush-up wouldn't hurt.
We appreciated Pete's quick accommodation when we found ourselves in a pickle. Great AC, had what we needed, but was definitely on the utilitarian side of things.
This condo has everything you will need and is in a very convenient location. Central to everything and you have easy access to all amenities; enjoy!

Very comfy soft bed, two large rooms so that you have enough place for your luggage, balcony with entry to the garden. Very close to the pool and also to the beach but you can't swim there. 
Internet access was ok.
We  enjoyed our time very much and can only recommend it.

Location of the condo is great for us who were first timers to Kauai. Very walkable to many good restaurants, grocery stores and Kapaa downtown. It's also centrally located so that we didn't have to drive far to both north and south side of the island. Condo was clean and well stocked with necessities for our stay, and most importantly for us is that the AC works great on the hot days. We will definitely stay here again in the future.

Love, love, love - highly recommended!! Great location, easy check-in, beautifully furnished and stocked with everything you could possibly need. Not sure why others called this place utilitarian because Pete & Judi's place was adorably furnished with wonderful little extras like sunscreen, aloe, beach gear, kitchenware, disposable plates/cups, cold ac, great bath products...too many to name. The beds and big fluffy pillows were extremely comfortable and the lanai was peaceful. Their place is right in the heart of the island with easy access to anywhere you want to go from north to south. This place couldn't have been better for our getaway and will be my go-to spot and top recommendation on Kauai from here on out. Mahalo!

Wonderful! Perfect for our family - a quiet spot, easy access to swimming pool and hot tub, comfy beds, and centrally located to explore all of Kauai!  It is well cared for and clean with all the needed amenities to live comfortably. Grocery stores and shops are nearby. The staff of the condo/resort are helpful and friendly. Highly recommend.

This is a very nice unit, quite well furnished, and it worked very well for us. The kitchen was equipped well enough for us to have all our evening meals in the unit. The location is nice with shopping close by and you're in the middle of Kauai. One item I would point out is that the washer and dryer promised in the listing is not in the unit but in a shared laundromat room down the hall. Not what I was expecting. I would recommend this unit.

This is a cute place. It is a true one bedroom, but we had two queen size beds, so it would be perfect for a couple with young children or just two friends, who don’t mind sleeping in the same room , but want to have their own beds. The location is great as you are very close to Kapaa where you have great food spots and little shops. You are also walking distance from a drug store that’s opened until 10pm most days (that’s actually late on Kauai). All the communication with host went smoothly. I strongly recommend staying here!
場所は最高に良いです｡北にも南に行くにも島の中間にあります｡歩いて行ける所に買物やﾚｽﾄﾗﾝがあり便利です｡receptionもあり警備員もいて安心です｡
Wonderful place to stay peaceful and calm. With cozy furnitures and interiors, you can truely enjoy the life at Kauai.

Pete and Judi's unit is excellent for a couple or small family. Conveniently located near the pool and hot tub. It's a short walk to markets, restaurants and stores. We were very pleased with our stay.
We had a wonderful time at your place and should have stayed longer than a week. Great place and centrally located. Close to everything!!! I would go back anytime!!!
All fab.
Great place to stay !!❤️❤️❤️
房子离机场大概20分钟路程,配备完整的厨房设施,适合爱自己煮食的中国人,当然如果能提供电饭锅就更完美了｡房子所在的小区环境优美,有免费泳池,洗衣房就在楼内,2.50美元一机含洗衣和干衣｡出门对面走3分钟可及至海边,旁边是一个购物点,但如需购买食材,可开车去附近的沃尔玛购买｡

Liked the proximity to the market and shopping area.  Location was central and easily accessible for our needs (visiting both North and South).  Beach is small but quite place to sit and enjoy the view.  Not swimmable due to undertow.  Complex was well cared for.

Really nice space. Excellent location next to shopping and morning markets twice a week. Short walk to the beach and a great cabinet full of beach supplies for both us and our daughter. Our daughter loved running around in the yard so we met the neighbors who were also fantastic. Having a full kitchen was awesome! We had not realized how small full beds were (we are both really tall), so we ended up using the pull out couch, which I don't recall being part of the listing, but which was super helpful. Perfect place for the three of us to start our adventure. Thank you!

Pete and Judi's place was really nice and cozy, with great furniture and decor. I felt very at home there. It was also the perfect location, not too far from anything you'd want to see and close to the beach. Pete and Judi provide a lot of "extras" at their place such as beach chairs, coolers, ice packs, beach towels, etc. which means less stuff you need to buy or pack. I would recommend asking them for the full list before you pack anything!  I was super happy that they provided a blender so I could make my daily protein smoothies! The unit also has a huge patio and there is a pool and spa on the property as well as a barbecue grill very nearby. There is also laundry nearby in the building (not in the unit). I would definitely stay here again without hesitation!  Thanks Pete and Judi!
Super clean, easy location, convenient check-in/check-out!

Spacious apartment. Nicely landscaped complex. Strip mall with grocery store at walking distance. Also at walking distance to the beach, but this beach is not very nice (lots of big rocks, very little sand). Good location to explore Wailua Valley or the North Shore by car. Excellent communication by hosts.
Great location, all the comforts of home.
We enjoyed our stay. Very convenient location, across the street from the beach and close to restaurants, markets, etc.

Pets and Judi’s place was ok. It is centrally located in Kapa’a and was walkable to the nearby marketplace and some restaurants. The beach is not swimmable at all due to high surf conditions and there is a wall separating the property from the beach which wasn’t very appealing. It was overall a good value and had a good central location for traveling to different parts of the island.

Enjoyed our time staying at Judi and Pete's place. The location was convenient to reach the beach within a short walk. 

Grocery stores and restaurants are also within a short walk. Complex is relaxing and close to pool and jacuzzi.   


Judi and Pete responded quickly when I had questions.

Great place. I would stay at again.
Great place to stay, convenient location and good amenities nearby.

Kapa'a is a nice place to stay since it's centrally located and easy to get to everywhere on the island from here. This particular area, however, is not super walkable (like much of Kaua'i). It's one of those strip-mall-style areas that's built for cars and doesn't even have sidewalks. The beach is behind an unattractive concrete wall, and is not amenable to swimming or snorkeling. The place itself is beautiful: Nice layout, very comfortable, and stylish. The laundry is at the end of the hall, accessible w/ your keycard. The check-in office is incorrectly located on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps (I just submitted a change, so it may be successful by the time you read this): the building is actually near the end of Aleka Loop, not the middle. The apartment buildings are organized by letter (GHI, DEF, etc.). The check-in office is near building A.
Enjoyed the accommodations. Close to the beach and great pool.

Pete and Judi’s place is in a perfect location on Kauai. It is close to shops and amazing beaches. Also about half way between the north and south ends. Perfect for seeing the whole island. Being closer to local shops and restaurants made the trip even better. I had such an amazing time on the island I can’t wait to go back.

Eine sehr gut ausgestattete Wohnung mit vielen zusätzlichen Details.
Kühlbox, Strandtücher und Matten, Kinderspielzeug für den Sand.

Des Weiteren war die Wohnung sehr sauber und die Kommunikation hat perfekt funktioniert.
Awesome place to save a little money on vacation. The full kitchen allowed us to cook a few meals instead of eating out. Can’t beat the price for what you get at this place.

Pete & Judi are wonderful hosts! Very clean, easy to access, and is perfect for kids. They maintain a well stocked closet of beach goodies (body boards, cooler, mats, etc) as well. Would definitely stay there again on my next visit to Kauai!

Wow, for us, this place was really about location. We loved how accessible the beaches were - made it easy to go see the sunrise every morning. We loved its proximity to Costco and other shops and coffee in downtown Kapaa. And we loved that, being on the East shore, it was about midway to access North and South shores - not even a bad drive to the West!

This is a good solid rental in Kapaa.  It is spacious for a condo, has a well equipped kitchen, good air conditioning, and is very nicely furnished.  The patio was small, but we were happy to stay indoors.

Location was good -- walking distances to a Long's Drugs, and just down the highway from lots of supermarkets and cafes.  It is a 5-10 minute walk to the nicer beaches, a little further than we expected but quite acceptable.   The beaches locally have a lot of wave action, so don't expect to snorkel.

Traffic in and out of the Kapaa area (particularly going south) was pretty heavy in the late afternoon/early evening.  Morning is a better time to venture to other parts of the island.  If you stay here, it is also useful to investigate the back roads in and out of Kapaa.

We were so pleasantly surprised by this place! Way beyond our expectations. Super clean and great amenities. It was the perfect spot to come back to, cook and relax. Love this place and would not hesitate to go back.
Great Spot

Pete and Judi's place was nice and clean and in a great central location. It was great to have a stocked kitchen to make some of our own meals. The cooler, boogie boards, sunscreen, and beach mat were nice touches. The grounds were beautiful too. The air conditioner wasn't working while we were there, but Judi let us know about that well in advance and provided a portable air conditioner. My only complaint was not having any housekeeping during our 10-day stay. It would have been nice to have clean towels and extra toilet paper.
Perfect spot, made it to Intertube BackCountry Adventure tour, Queens Bath, and Zipline tour with minimal drive time. Right across from beach access and the best restaurant on the island.

Lovely 1 bedroom condo in central location of Kapaa. Nice little convenience store and a few restaurants within walking distance. The condo is clean, very comfortable and has everything you need for a fun stay in Kauai.  Highly recommend!

Pete and Judi:
We didn't have the opportunity to meet you, but we found everything we needed at the property. It is a very nice place, very well maintained. 
Thank you for all the responses. You were super helpful with your answers on time. 
Thanks a lot.
We would love to go back... so already making plans.
Thanks.
Great time on Kauai, centrally located and within walking distance to restaurants and shops. Would definitely recommend and stay again.

We enjoyed our stay in this very nice condo located in Kapaa. The location is central to a lot of the activities and destinations on the island and there are many restaurants, grocery stores and other services nearby. The complex has three swimming pools with spas, and the ocean is a 5 minute walk away. I enjoyed daily walks along the beach, and swimming and sunbathing at a nearby pool. On a few nights, we grilled food, using the outdoor grill provided for guests. Overall we enjoyed this stay very much.

For me, the kitchen was a selling point. Every appliance worked great and there were lots of other kitchen amenities that I didn’t expect. 

The condo was centrally of located and we were able to walk or drive with ease wherever we wanted to go. 

The air conditioner worked great too!

I would stay there again.
Perfect location for all sights we wanted to visit during our stay on the island. Very clean apartment with very comfortable beds. Would definitely return during our next trip to Kauai!
A great place in a central location to explore from!
Very comfy condo Very well stocked with everything you need even toys to go to the beach Get ready to enjoy a wonderful stay on Kauai

Great location as convenience stores near by and large shopping center about 15 min walk away.  It is also fairly close to airport and great beach - Lyngate Park. Place was super clean and there were 3 pools onsite.  Restaurants at the resorts a short walk away.  Pete and Judi had many little conveniences that made it much easier for us (cooler, lawn chairs, beach mat, plastic wrap, aluminum foil, etc).  We stayed at four different places in Hawaii but this was by far the best. Thanks!

Great local spot in Kapa'a. Centralized location where everything is in walking distance (and we recommend walking, traffic can be thick). Local beach is secluded enough that very few people are present, yet has easy access. Pete and Judi were very concise and straightforward. We thank them for allowing us to stay in their awesome home on the eastern shore line!

name: Huge kid-friendly Brooklyn home with parking/patio
summary: Our place is close to J train to lower Manhattan, Brooklyn Whiskers Bakery and Cafe, Norbert's Pizza, Toad Style, DeKalb library, walking distance to many more restaurants in both Bed-Stuy and Bushwick.  We have a driveway, it's 2 blocks to the J train, friendly neighbors, colorful street art, and tons of space to unwind inside or out back!  Our house works for couples, families (with or without kids), groups of friends, and pets (but please mind the furniture!)
description: Our place is close to J train to lower Manhattan, Brooklyn Whiskers Bakery and Cafe, Norbert's Pizza, Toad Style, DeKalb library, walking distance to many more restaurants in both Bed-Stuy and Bushwick.  We have a driveway, it's 2 blocks to the J train, friendly neighbors, colorful street art, and tons of space to unwind inside or out back!  Our house works for couples, families (with or without kids), groups of friends, and pets (but please mind the furniture!)
house_rules: - We simply ask that you leave things the way you find them!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Erin: Professionally, during the day I am the head of engineering at The New York Times' Beta department, In the afternoons, I teach at Cooper Union, and in the evening I do fun side-projects with my brother. In my free time though (usually during the summer) I enjoy traveling a lot, with both family and friends: paris, london, tokyo, delhi, berlin, etc.

Marla:  I'm a veteran teacher/librarian in the New York City public schools.  I teach in a dual-language Spanish/English school and use my spare time to quilt, cook, read, and bike.  I also love traveling, especially if it's a place I've never been.  Some of my favorite trips have taken me to Guatemala, Norway, Morocco, and Chile.

We are both from Pittsburgh, PA and recently got married there :)  We've been living in New York for just over ten years.  You can count on us for good subway advice  and the best bike route!

reviews.comments: We stayed two nights, 3 edults and 2 kids, at Erin & Maria's place. The location was great and we used the subway to go into Manhattan several times. The house had everything we needed, it was clean and tidy. Also the car parking at the place was very convenient.

Erin and Marla have a fantastic house - a great place for us to come for a long holiday weekend from Michigan to visit our son and daughter-in-law who live in Brooklyn .   The hosts are welcoming and at ease.  The listing is accurate.  It is a huge kid-friendly house! - even friendly for us and our grown up children.  It was especially nice to be able to park our car in their driveway and conveniently walk to a nearby subway stop.  The neighborhood seemed quiet and peaceful.  The house was well appointed with all the conveniences to make it feel like home (Website hidden by Airbnb)
The host canceled this reservation 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: The Lux MTL Condo steps away from everything!
summary: Luxury Condo closeto Lachine Canal, Sainte-Catherine street, the Bell Center, Crescent Street, and Griffintown (with the trendiest restaurants in the city). You’ll love my place because of it's beautiful, elegant, modern, and spacious layout steps away from the hub of Montreal nightlife, universities, sporting events. Everything a hotel has to offer with more. Downtown living with parking, balcony, and laundry access. My place is perfect for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids)
space: The condo has two entrances, a front balcony, sunken living room, renovated and fully equipped kitchen, two bedrooms with closet space, laundry machines,  fireplace and a beautiful (URL HIDDEN) parking space included
description: Luxury Condo closeto Lachine Canal, Sainte-Catherine street, the Bell Center, Crescent Street, and Griffintown (with the trendiest restaurants in the city). You’ll love my place because of it's beautiful, elegant, modern, and spacious layout steps away from the hub of Montreal nightlife, universities, sporting events. Everything a hotel has to offer with more. Downtown living with parking, balcony, and laundry access. My place is perfect for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids) The condo has two entrances, a front balcony, sunken living room, renovated and fully equipped kitchen, two bedrooms with closet space, laundry machines,  fireplace and a beautiful (URL HIDDEN) parking space included You have free access to the entire condo. I am available on call throughout your stay and will enter the premises once every 48 hours to check-in. Located three blocks from the Bell Center, a short walk to St.Catherines street with all of the best shopping. A ten minute walk from G
neighborhood_overview: Located three blocks from the Bell Center, a short walk to St.Catherines street with all of the best shopping. A ten minute walk from Griffintown and Little Burgundy areas with all of the trendiest restaurants (Joe Beef, Vin et Papillon, Liverpool House, Burgundy Lion)
transit: Just park your car and walk or use public transportation.
access: You have free access to the entire condo.
interaction: I am available on call throughout your stay and will enter the premises once every 48 hours to check-in.
house_rules: -Smoking on the balcony allowed -No loud noise after 11pm -Host will check-in on property once every 48 hours -Absolutely no partying, drug use, disrespectful behaviour

reviews.comments: Their descriptions and photos don't do them justice! What they don't say in the description is that this isn't just a place to stay, but by far an amazing overall experience! Thomas (Nicky's assistant) was available at all times and gave us a lot of recommendations for places to go. But, that's not all... They are the managers at Thursday's and suggested we should go there for dinner, drinks, and dancing. Little did we know that free shots were included (and really good ones, actually)! And Thomas is so energetic and nice that he made us feel super comfortable with our stay and definitely made an impression of how awesome Montreal and it's people are. The apartment was spotless and gorgeous, although we didn't spend much time in the apartment because we were too busy exploring Montreal because of the apartments fantastic location. It is about 15 minutes walking distance to all the restaurants, bars and shops, and the subway is about 5 minutes walking distance as well. When I go back to Montreal, I am definitely staying here again. I definitely recommend this place.
Nicky is a great host. Communication is on point. Location is perfect.
Great place. Very cosy. Perfectly located, quiet yet near everything. Nicky was a great host. And the parking was a major plus.

Nicky's place is a fantastic place to stay in Montréal. It is clean, spacious and makes you feel like you are in a home. 

The location is fantastic with resturants, bars and clubs minutes away but secluded from the downtown area. 

Nicky is a great host and had open communication throughout the weekend and provided info on the local entertainment in the neighbourhood.

I will recommend this place to my friends if they are going to Montréal.
Nicky is a cordial and accommodating host.  Everything was terrific.  The location is accessible to many different neighborhoods, all quite walkable.  No hassles, we would stay there again.
Logement spacieux et bien équipé. Quartier calme. Parking appréciable. Bien situé. Nicky est un hôte prévenant

Wow!!! Def a place to go if u need to stay downtown Montreal! Clean, spacious, cozy. I loved it there! Will def go again! Friendly host and easy to contact. Made sure to let us know to contact him if there was anything we needed. Easy parking as well. Friendly neighbors and very quiet place :)
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nicks condo is spacious, clean and very quiet. It's a very good bargain for such a large space in a convenient location. Nicky is a nice guy and very good to deal with. I would stay there again.

Great, spacious 2 bedroom apartment with anything you need for comfortable stay. Clean bathroom, all equipped kitchen, lovely living room to enjoy time with friends/family. Parking right near the entrance. Communication with Nicky is great.
Clean, comfortable, quiet, helpful host, good design.  All good chez Nicky.
Great location and a very comfortable clean place. Nicky is easy to reach and very helpful with suggestions about enjoying the neighborhood.
Great place, close to Old Montreal, easy to get to, all we needed for a comfortable visit.
Comfortable, good sized condo.  About a 12 minute walk to downtown.  Very close to bars and restaurants.  Place was clean and tidy.  Nicky is an easy going guy and was a great host.

Amazing spot!! Close to everything you would imagine. Absolute best bang for the buck, place was very neat and tidy and had everything you would need and more. Nicky was great, super accommodating and very reachable with lots of helpful tips and suggestions for things to do I  the area. I highly highly highly recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in the area. Don't look any further! 10 out of 10
Great place, convenient walk to train, well equipped, and some nice neighborhood restaurants and gourmet market nearby.
As advertised. Great spot. Close to everything and yet far enough away to get away from the crowds. Nicky's place was clean and had everything you could need. Highly recommend staying there.

Beautiful apartment in central location near metro, grocery shopping, bars, and restaurants. Large comfortable King bed and double size futon in second room. large well-equipped kitchen. Thank you for a great stay!

This home has everything you need for your stay. We made breakfast every day, including coffee with fresh-ground beans. The beds were comfortable and the desk in the smaller bedroom was great for my computer and the work I needed to do after each day out. There is a bus-stop right outside the front door. A parking space is included. It is about a 15 minute walk to the Sheraton Centre (less to the Bell Centre) and less than 30 minutes to most of the sites in Montreal's downtown.

Nicky is a great host and responded quickly to any questions we had. I would happily stay there again.
Great location! Walking distance to stores and restaurants and very short drive to downtown. The place was exactly as advertised and did not disappoint!
Nicky was a great host! The place was even nicer than it looks. I would definitely stay here again.
Nicky was very friendly and welcoming; had an amazing stay !

Die Wohnung ist sehr gut gelegen und sehr geräumig  Das Schlafzimmer ist auf die ruhige Seite mit Doppelverglasung, sodass das Schlafzimmer sehr ruhig ist. Das sehr grosse Bett ist sehr bequem. Wir haben sehr gut darin geschlafen. Alles ist gut zu Fuss erreichbar. Es hat einige Restaurants in naher Umgebung. Die Kommunikation mit Nicky war absolut problemlos. Ein sehr guter Gastgeber. Wir würden die Wohnung jederzeit weiterempfehlen.

Condo was really nice and showed like the pictures.   Nicky was an amazing host, especially on check-in (again, sorry for being late!) and very helpful on local bars and restaurants.   Location was a bit of a walk to the downtown and Port areas but it was summer and made for a nice walk around the city.   Overall, it was a great stay in Montreal and would come back if ever in town again.
Nicky is a great host, and the condo is so close to everything. We visited Montreal for a conference and the location is so convenient that we even managed to do some sight seeing in between.
Big place, close to everything.

What I loved: 
- Nicky and his friend Mike are trustworthy, helpful, and reliable
- The size was fantastic as well as the layout. 
- The kitchen amenities and cooking utensils available were more than expected. 
- The Metro (grocery store) was only 5 minutes away (by walking) and had so many great food items for cooking or ready-made meals, and the prices were reasonable. 
- The shower had great water-pressure. 
- The tap-water was safe to drink and use for anything 
- The neighbours were quiet and polite, and the neighborhood was safe with plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby. 
- Netflix was a huge bonus! 

Good to know: 
- The bedrooms have all you need, but don't have clocks, so use your cellphone or whatever as an alarm clock 
- The air-conditioning unit is hooked up in the living room. So, if you want your bedroom cool, use the 2 fans that Nicky provides. 
- It's better to park your car and leave it at Nicky's to roam the city by foot or transit. The traffic is pretty heavy and it's hard to find parking in Montreal. You'll actually be faster and less stressed on foot or transit.

Great location. Easy parking. Check in was simple as well as check out. As a single female I felt totally safe. The bed was comfortable and it was nice having toiltries provided in the bathroom. I'd stay at Nicky's place again.

Nicky's condo is terrific. Having a dedicated parking space is a big deal even though we didn't move the car for the three days we stayed. The Montreal Metro is a short walk away that gets you to anywhere. There is a good supermarket and a gourmet grocery store within a five minute walk. After each busy day touring in Montreal with our grandson the apartment was a great place to settle in. We cooked a couple of nights and the kitchen is really well equipped.  Highly recommended.
Dennis and Kate

Ma mère et moi avons passé un mois merveilleux ! 
L'appartement est full équipé, confortable, propre et l'immeuble est très calme. 
Le quartier est très agréable, avec de nombreux restaurants et bars sur la rue notre dame. 
Le centre ville est tout près, à pied cela se fait parfaitement. 
Nicky est une personne très agréable. 
Nous nous sommes senti comme chez nous, et nous y retournerons sans hésiter !

This is a great place to stay while you’re in Montreal. The host, Nicky, was very responsive, very helpful and has set up beautiful apartment. 

Having a parking space is a huge plus. Being four blocks from Saint Catherine Street, and three blocks from Grey Nuns, which is where my son has his dorm while he is at Concordia was perfect. The kitchen is really quite handsome and everything was sparkling clean. 

The master bed was much more comfortable than I was expecting. We didn’t use the second room so I can’t say how that bed is but if it’s anything like the first one, you’ll be happy. The bathroom is spacious and refined. 

We will definitely be staying here the next time we come up to visit our son, so you better book early :-)
Good location as you have easy access to mostly everything in all directions. The host was easy to get a hold of and was very flexible.
Apartment was exactly as described. Close to Saint Catherine, Old Port, and Notre Dame.
Nicky was a great host. He was very helpful and available to us. He gave us tips on where to travel, clubs, popular things to do and he was a great host! He was a super host! Thanks Nicky!

Nicky’s place was great! I rented it out a weekend for my dad and brother who were visiting from the states, and they loved it. Said it was like being in a home away from home — which is accurate! Decent location too and close to the metro in any case.

Great location. Walking distance to just about anything you want to see and do in Montreal. Nicky's place is clean and comfortable with all the amenities you need for your stay.  I would highly recommend Nicky's place in Griffintown for your next stay in Montreal.

Terrific location and added bonus of off street parking.  Plenty of room, comfortable bed and a full sized kitchen with everything you'd need if you wanted to cook or just make eggs for breakfast.  Nicky was easy to reach,  friendly and helpful.
Everything was great, close to downtown, very clean, and easy to communicate with.
Beautiful apartment within walking distance of a ton of restaurants and the Bell Centre. Nicky responded quickly and has incredibly accommodating.
Nicky's place was great. Plenty of space, nice amenities, and walking distance to a metro station, even during the Montreal winter. He was easy to communicate with and always responded quickly.
No higher complement as it is like my sweet home in Montreal!

Nicky is probably one of the most responsive hosts I've ever had. The kitchen is by far the best equipped I've ever seen (and clean!). The location is perfect. Steps away from the Bell Centre, and Griffontown. We ended up extending our stay here twice we were so comfortable. Truly a home away from home!
Amazing place great location highly recommend.
Exactly as advertised.  Great place for a weekend in Montreal!  Thanks, Nicky!

Nicky's place was incredible! It was a perfect location and Nicky was always around if we needed anything. The kitchen was super nice and had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. We would definitely come back and stay here in the future.
Easy flexible check-in, everything as described. Ideal location to explore Montreal. There was no cable TV but the TV is connected to Netflix. Thank you.
Place was perfect. Close to everything downtown Montreal. Thank you, Nicky!
spacious and clean.

Nicky was accommodating and responsive; the apartment was spacious for 2 people and in a great location. Walkable to many of Montreal’s attractions, yet quiet and calm neighborhood. Restaurants and grocery store just a few blocks away. Parking spot was very helpful.
Nicki was very helpful and accomodating. Lots of space, clean and a great location.
Great location for a good price, especially with the added benefit of parking, just a few blocks from the heart of downtown. Nicky made check-in very easy and convenient.

Good place! Very convenient, clean. It’s close to Old Montreal. There is a big supermarket nearby. Parking is easy.
Nicky is very kind, he give me lots of traveling suggestions, and he always reply fast.
Great place, great host and great locsrion.
这是一个性价比很高的房子｡地点距离Downtown 不远｡主要是可以免费停车｡房东人很好,会给你一些很实用的建议,屋子内还有Tim的咖啡☕️…… 很棒 下次如果去Montreal 还会选择这里的
Nicky was very nice and helpful, and his place was in a great location!
Thank you Nicky for your welcome. Efficient. Timely. Good location for us (nearby the location of a conference we attended).
great location
Great host. Prompt responses. Good communication. Nice touch with a cold beer in the fridge:-) Cutlery , dishes, glasses etc were all sparkling clean. Short walk to downtown. Would highly recommend.
Lovely apartment and location. Great kitchen! Parking was a huge plus! Nicky was very accommodating!
A spacious home super close to downtown transportations! The kitchen was fully equipped and we enjoyed our stay there!
Nicky has a very nice, spacious apartment. It is in a walkable neighborhood, close to good restaurants and grocery stores. The kitchen is also well set up with dishes and pans for cooking.

I wish I lived here!

Perfectly located and a great place.
Nice, comfortable, spacy, near downtown.Good sheets and shower . Nicky answered to all my questions, highly recomendable

My family loved staying at Nicky’s place.  Can’t wait to return as we just barely got to know Montréal.  What a welcoming community!

The people, location, neighborhood, accommodations, sites, food...I could go on and on.  

Nicky is a wonderful host and a true gentleman.

Thank You for hosting my family.
Good deal for accommodations close to downtown Montreal.
Nice location. Within walking distances to many places.
Very nice place just like a homr and Nicky was very friendly and helpful. I will come again

Excellent location to downtown whether you’re there for work or play.  

Nice quiet place with everything you need for a comfortable
Home away from home.
Fantastic host, space and location - with private parking to boot! We couldn't have been more thrilled with our stay, thanks Nicky!
The place is spacious and clean. Great location and host. Nicky was very accommodating and welcoming.

Had a great stay, no surprises! Apartment was as described. Host was very accommodating to requests for early check-in, etc.  Location is extremely important to us when in Montreal and Nicky’s place is perfectly situated. Close to the metro so that you can leave your car and go anywhere in Montreal. Walking distance to nice restaurants on Notre Dame too!!  Thanks again Nicky.

The best house during my trip to Canada, enough space for everything, and the neighborhood is safe and quiet. Have air conditioner in house. Nicky is very nice, recommend many delicious restaurants to us.

Nicky's place was ideal for the back-end of our week-long stay in wonderful Montreal. It was the perfect location -- a nice stroll to Old Montreal, to the heart of the downtown area and to the Bell Centre where we took in a concert. The walk to the Bell Centre is no more than 10-minutes -- perfectly conveninent for our needs. Nicky's place is great. Communication and check-in was an excellent experience -- easy and fast. The apartment was spotless and the kitchen well-appointed with everything one requires to prepare meals. The air conditioning was a blessing, particularly the one in the bedroom, which made for comfortable sleeping. The patio was also a nice feature. Overall, we very much enjoyed our stay at Nicky's place and would certainly stay there again! Thanks, Nicky!

Great location but needs updating,  organisation and more effort from the host! The second bedroom is inadequate as a double room but would suffice for a child. Positives are washing machine, dryer and car parking space.
Nicky is super friendly and was very helpful in my arrival and check out. The place is spacious, clean, and very comfortable.  Highly recommend!
We would recommend Nicky’s place. Great location. Quick responses and very helpful
great location, huge apartment, very well equipped, very comfortable, co-host Michael was really helpful during our stay, would definitely stay there again and recommend to others

Great place near the heart of Montreal. A lot of destinations are either in walking distance or accessible via the Metro. Very modern bathroom and kitchen - hot, clean shower with good water pressure. Host responded promptly to questions.
Lot of space, parking slot highly appreciated, close to downtown
Great location. The apartment is a bit dark, but very convenient and comfortable, with top notch location. Nicky has been very responsive. Excellent value for money. Will definitely come back.
Great location, great Airbnb and a great host. Hard to find a more complete place to stay in Montreal.

Nicky is great with communication and his place is conveniently located within walking distance of several key attractions of Montreal. The condo is large with all amenities as pictured. The king sized bed was so comfortable after a long day taking in the sites. I’d stay here again.

This appartment is spacious and amazing value. The only issue is that there is no information provided to help guests navigate their stay and the area/ city. It is not the most well appointed apartment but for the price it is acceptable
Great, spacious and clean condo perfectly located in Downtown Montreal. Would recommend to anyone!
The condo was very nice. It was clean, the location was perfect, and the parking space very helpful.

This is a large, modern apartment in Griffintown was has many excellent restaurants nearby.  Old Montreal, the Underground and the Golden Mile of Rue Saint-Catherine (shopping) are within easy walking distance.  Otherwise bus and metro service are steps away.   The master bed is comfortable.  There is a washer and dryer.  A full kitchen and dishwasher for those who cook.  Internet speed is great (40mb down, 15 mb up). Apple TV attached to larger screen has Netflix.  Two comfortable couches. The neighborhood feels safe even at night. Note that you are downtown so expect traffic noise. Highly recommended.

The condo was perfect for our weekend stay in Montreal.  It was spacious and clean and having an off street parking spot was great.  The metro is only a 6 or 7 minute walk but we barely used it since Montreal is a very walkable city.
Location was great and having parking a huge plus.

Excellent location! Also Nicky was very responsive and his place was nice and clean. It was exactly what we were looking for interns of cleanliness, location and parking. If I’m back in Montreal will for sure rent again! :)
Die Unterkunft entspricht genau den Angaben und Fotos. Kommunikation top, super schnelle Reaktionen und sehr hilfsbereit. Sehr sauber. Alles in allem sehr empfehlenswert.
Nicky’s place is clean and comfortable.  Great location - easy to walk to attractions and avoid traffic/parking.  Nice neighborhood.  Would definitely stay again.
The house is really tidy and the host is really warm-hearted.

We had a great stay at Nicky’s place. We’ve visited Montreal many times and this was our favourite. The location was great- in a quieter area but still walking distance to both subway lines as well as many amazing restaurant (for both budget-friendly, as well as fine dining objects). We got some well-needed R&R on our vacation as well from both the large comfy bed, as well as the great living room setup (large TV, great sound-system, lots of couch space).  The place was also very, very clean! Thanks Nicky!
Great location - really good restaurants nearby.  Clean and large apartment with plenty of useful items in the kitchen. The pictures and description are accurate.

Very spacious and cosy condo. The bed is huge and comfy. The kitchen is awesome with all you need. 
Nicky is easy to communicate with and quick to respond. 
Close to the grocery store and lots of restaurants.
NIcky's place was large and warm. Good amenities and easy 5 minute walk to subway. Would recommend.

Nicky was the best host! This is a great space and a fabulous location. Super Value. Very clean, lots of amenities. Easy walk to lots of attractions. We will definitely stay here again if we head back to Montreal!

Large, clean condo with two beds (one king size!), big kitchen, and big living room. All the kitchen stuff you would need if you wanted to eat in. Big tv with Apple TV remote. Parking spot and close to the subway.

Nicky's  place is spacoius and very  clean.  The location is perfect for going to Bell Centre events. Everything you need is with in walking distance I found.
Nicky is quick and clear in his  communications.  I was very pleased with my stay.

Nicky is an exceptional host. He answered all questions promptly and politely. His place was spotless and close to everything. Everything you need is there and there are many restaurants and grocery stores nearby. You won’t regret booking this place!!

Great location, parking is quite easy, lots of cute stuff to do in Little Burgundy or take one of two buses downtown from just outside. The kitchen is exceptionally well-stocked with equipment, and the space is very comfortable!
As advertised!
Nicky went out of his way to ensure a great experience, and his place was spacious and clean.  Two thumbs up!
Stylish and nice location! Good respond!
Amazing host, beautiful place defenitly would recommend

Nicky's place was great! It is within walking distance of a station, has a bus stop in front. The apartment was easily accessible from a small spiral staircase. It is very spacious and clean. It was easy to set the temperature and the water pressure was fine. There is a small restaurant and a European market very close by. Nicky is also very responsive and I appreciated his promptness!
Very big place in the heart of Montreal. Close to the water and three blocks from food!

Nicky’s apartment was perfect for our stay in Montreal.   Close to downtown shopping, Griffintown restaurants and cafes and the Atwater market.  The metro station is also just a short walk away.  The free parking space was a big bonus in this area of the city.  The apartment is super clean and HUGE!  Felt like a home away from home.  Nicky’s replies were prompt and checking in and out was a breeze.

Très beau logement bien situé! Avec le stationnement c’est parfait! Il y avait une légère   odeur de cannabis dans le logement, mais rien de bien dérangeant! C’est normal en copropriété. L’accueil de Nicky était impeccable, nous avons adorer notre séjour! Cette appartement est particulièrement bien équipée!
Great location for a great price
Exactly as listed. Would stay again in a heartbeat.

I could not have asked for a better place to stay in Montreal. Nicky's place was located near everything we wanted to see and was less than a 10 minute walk to the Bell Center. The condo was sparkling clean and had everything you would need during a weekend stay. If I had the opportunity to stay here again I would absolutely take that chance again.
Exactly as described. Nicky was always there if we needed anything and the place was squeaky clean.
Wonderful stay! Nicky has quick communication and the place was perfect! Would definitely stay here again :)

Really nice apartment in a great and up and coming area of the city Griffintown. Big bedrooms, great kitchen and living room for hanging out and enjoying oneself.  Nicky was great at communicating and was also very accommodating of our later flight on the departure date.  Plus, the place is only a few minutes walk from lots of great restaurants, cafés, shops, etc. both in Griffintown and in the downtown core. Would be happy to stay there again.
Nicky's place is large, comfortable and clean.  We thoroughly enjoyed making this flat our home base during our long weekend in Montreal
A warm and cozy place with everything you need and a great location.
Simple et efficace. Les photos représentent très bien les lieux.
Great place in a wonderful location.  My dad and I stayed here for a hockey game and it was so close to the bell center!

name: Ocean View Home for Vacations and Executive Stays
summary: Near the top of a winding road, our home has a breathtaking view of Honolulu Harbor and the ocean & is in a quiet and safe neighborhood with mountain breezes bringing clean air right through the windows. You’ll love the zen-like living space, the nearby park, quiet and elevated location, and close proximity to Honolulu's business district, amazing food scene, hiking trails and beaches.  Friendly neighbors, comfy beds, a large fenced yard... the best place to call home while visiting Oahu.
space: Sit on the couch and enjoy the view of Honolulu and the blue ocean beyond. Cool mountain breezes waft through the house, bringing fresh air and pure relaxation to your day.
description: Near the top of a winding road, our home has a breathtaking view of Honolulu Harbor and the ocean & is in a quiet and safe neighborhood with mountain breezes bringing clean air right through the windows. You’ll love the zen-like living space, the nearby park, quiet and elevated location, and close proximity to Honolulu's business district, amazing food scene, hiking trails and beaches.  Friendly neighbors, comfy beds, a large fenced yard... the best place to call home while visiting Oahu. Sit on the couch and enjoy the view of Honolulu and the blue ocean beyond. Cool mountain breezes waft through the house, bringing fresh air and pure relaxation to your day. Strictly off-limits is the door between the middle bedroom and bathroom. This leads downstairs and into our tenants’ space. I'll be on-island to help with whatever you need. Occasionally I do leave the island but will let you know if I do. On the #10 bus line. (URL HIDDEN) Our house shares a footprint with another house directly be
notes: Our house shares a footprint with another house directly below it. A nice, quiet gentleman lives downstairs and shares the front gate so you may see him coming and going. He is exceedingly nice and so quiet you'll probably never know he's around! We have some pets: Cats and chickens. The cats are outside and will sometimes slip in the door when opened (which is ok with us) but feel free to insist that they stay outside. The chickens are urban yard chickens and stay in the backyard. They lay fresh eggs daily which you are free to enjoy!
transit: On the #10 bus line. (URL HIDDEN)
access: Strictly off-limits is the door between the middle bedroom and bathroom. This leads downstairs and into our tenants’ space.
interaction: I'll be on-island to help with whatever you need. Occasionally I do leave the island but will let you know if I do.
house_rules: - No shoes in the house (soft wood floors that dent); absolutely no smoking, quiet hours from 10pm-7am.

reviews.comments: My best Airbnb experience ever! Deanna is a very helpful host and. The house is spacious and clean. We did not even use the third bedroom during our stay. The view is beautiful and it is very quiet at night.

Deanna’s place is central to everything. It is easy to explore the whole Island. The view during sunset and sunrise are amazing! Deanna was very quick in replying messages and very helpful. Definitely recommend this place for those who want to explore Hawaii.

Secluded and off the beaten path with plenty of space! Also parking which is a HUGE savings. Very attentive if you have questions. If you would like quiet and private away from Waikiki noise this is your place.
Deanna was a great host, the cats whom live outside the house were very friendly as well. Would love to stay there again. Thank you.
Great views from the living room and good location up on the hill, close to some good hiking and not too far from the city downtown. We had good time and cat was extra friendly too :)
The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
great stay, central to everything and lots of great local tips from host.   thanks!
